2b1(rgyud): pa de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dge
2b2(rgyud): nges pacem ldan 'das kyi ljang mnyan / de des pa rtser
3a1(rgyud): / ldan 'das yul b+h+yodz+hai rgyu'i gshegs te/ yas pa'i
3a2(rgyud): grong khyer du byin ras/ yangs po gro'i khyer gyi a sma srung ba'i tshal na bzhugs
3a3(rgyud): so// de ni so bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe da ldan pa ku kyi dga' bo la bka
3a4(rgyud): stsal pa/ kun dga' bo yangs pa'i grong khyer du so de la phyi nas skye
3a5(rgyud): thim pa la rkang pa zhig ste/ gsang sngags kyi gon 'di dag dang / tshigs su
3a6(rgyud): bcad pa 'di dag smros shig/ bi sa ra ta/ bI sa ra te/ bi sa ra te/ bris
3b1(rgyud): ra ta sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas thams cad
3b2(rgyud): kyis dgongs pa// rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsams pa/ dge bcom pa thams cad kyis
3b3(rgyud): prasams pa/ slob pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams pa/ 
3b4(rgyud): bdan pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ chos kyis bsams pa
3b5(rgyud): tshangs pas bsams pa/ tshangs pa so sos bsams pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams
3b6(rgyud): pa / dbang pos bsams pa/ lngas bsams pa// lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams pa/ 
3b7(rgyud): lha ma yin thams cad kyis bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsams pa/ 'byung
4a1(rgyud): po thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la
4a2(rgyud): thugs brtsa ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/ muny+dza ta/ muny+dza ta/ ma 'dag shig yams kyi nang rnam par zhi bar gyur cig/ nirga tu
4a3(rgyud): te/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgan+da/ sangs rgyas lho chen po// lha'i yang lha/ lha'i bla ma gshegs shing / dbang po dang bcas
4a4(rgyud): pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang ba ces pa rnams dang / dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams dang / skya dgu'i bdag po
4a5(rgyud): dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ang / lha 'bum phrag du ma dag dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams
4a6(rgyud): dang rnga lha ma yin 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang 'ong / bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dang po'i 'byung po 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang
4a7(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ongs te/ de dag khyed rnams la gnod pa chen po dad par 'gyur du ring gis/ nairmats+tsha ta/ 
4b1(rgyud): nirma tsA ta/ nirma ts+tsha ta/ nirga ts+tsha ta/ myur byed cig/ khyed cag las gang sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phung par gyur cig/ gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing
4b2(rgyud): nyes par mi 'dod la// srung bar 'jug par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cig/ lus la yang 'jug par gyis shig/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa
4b3(rgyud): su mu su mu su mu su mu/ su mu ru/ suM mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ 
4b4(rgyud): bu ru/ mu~M ru ki rai mai/ r-i mo mau/ ri mau/ ri mo/ ri mi/ ri moM/ ri ma/ ri moM/ mu ru ri mi/ mu ru ri moM/ mu ru ri mi/ mu ru mau/ mu ru ri mi/ mu ru rai maM/ mu ru ri mi/ mu ru
4b5(rgyud): mu ru ra mi/ mu ru ri mi/ su ru ri mi/ su ru ri mo/ mun+du // ri ri ri ri ri ri/ ri rI ri rI rI rI/ ti ma ri/ mi r-i mi rami ri mi ri mi ri mo ri// mi ri ti/ ha si bi ro ti/ 
4b6(rgyud): rI ti/ mi ti/ saM sI/ saM mAM/ kaM ka ra/ ko ka ra ta/ ka ka ra ka ka raH/ kaM ka rA/ kau ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ ka kA rA/ kAM kA rA/ kAM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM karA
4b7(rgyud): R+sha/ kaMkarI/ 18/ kaka/  na// ta du ste/ ri bun nu/ 'du
4b8(rgyud): / rAthA/ nA nA thA Tha/ ra~M bu ri bu/ rA thAH/ ni rgats+tsha te/ ra~M pu re pre/ ni rbots+tshi ta/ pA lA ye ta/ ri pu ri phu/ ba la~M ya ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la zug 'cha ba can/ sems
5a1(rgyud): thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs pa dang ldan pa/ byams pa la gnas pa/ thugs rje dang ldan pa/ dpa' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas pa
5a2(rgyud): gshegs kyis// k+Shi phran na ra gats+tsha swAhA/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mchog dang chos nyid kyis// lha thams cad 'byung po thams cad la bka' stsal ba'i gsang sngags
5a3(rgyud): bzhi 'di dag ni grub pa'o// tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag ni grub pa'o// gang la ser sna rnams chags pa// rnam 'joms dri ma med mdzad cing // zug zhi gnod pa mi
5a4(rgyud): mnga' de// khyed la bde lags mdzad par 'gyur/ 'dran pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams// thar pa'i lam du mdzad mdzad cing // chos rnams thams cad ston pa
5a5(rgyud): de/ khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// sto nA ba rgyug pa rnams kyi rtsi// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// gang gis 'de ba mnga' mdzad// khyed la rang
5a6(rgyud): legs mdzad par 'gyur// spyod pa gang zhig byams pa yi// thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun// bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs te// khyed la bde legs mdzad par
5a7(rgyud): mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi// sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing // gling dang dpung gnyen gyur byed// khyod la bad logs mdzad par 'gyur// 
5a8(rgyud): gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur// gtsang zhing slub mi mnga' la// gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// dpal ba chen po ga
5b1(rgyud): skyes pa// phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing // don grub tshogs kyang grub pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang gis skyes pas sa rnams ni// nags tshal
5b2(rgyud): bcas par rang g.yos shing // sems can thams cad rab dga' de// khyed la bde logs mdzad par 'gyur// byang chub snying por gshegs pa na// sa dag rnam drug ga'o
5b3(rgyud): gyur cing // bdud yid mi bder gyur pa de// khyang la bde lags mdzad par 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gsung ba// thub pa'i snyan po ga
5b4(rgyud): tekhyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// yod 'phrogs mu stegs byed// thad ches kyis phab mdzad cing // tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// 
5b5(rgyud): rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad// brgya bor lhar bcas bad legs dang // 'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni// kye// la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bsod napas pacwa
5b6(rgyud): drag dang // lha rnams kyis ni bsam pa yis// khyed rnams dron 'dod gang yin pa// di nad de ring grub gyur cig/ rkang gnyis khyed cag bde logs shog/ rkang bani khyed cag bde leg/ 
5b7(rgyud): khyed cag las 'gro bde legs shog/ phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog/ nyin mo bde lags mtshan 'di legs// nyi ma'i gung lo bdi legs shing // khyed cag kun tu 'di legs shog// 
5b8(rgyud): cag sdig par ma gyur cing // sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dgis// yongasu bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis// sngang sems ldan pa rnams byer cig/ snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod// sa ng+yas rang su
6a1(rgyud): // rnams dang / dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis// 'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams// grong khyer 'di ni stong gyur cig/ sen kun dang srog chags kun// 'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun/ bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan rgyu
6a2(rgyud): cig/ wad nad rnams med par shog/ kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig/ gang yang sdig par mi gyur cig/ 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lcags gyur te/ sa dang bar snang dag ni gnas pa rnas// skye dgu rnams la rtag byas
6a3(rgyud): gog nyid dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig/ de skad ces bka' stsal nas// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ btsun pa de bzhin bgyi'o zhes gsol to// bac+doMs kyi ltar mnyan nas/ yangs pa'i grong khyer du song ste/ sgo'i rim pal/ 
6a4(rgyud): ya bzhag nas/ gsang spen kyi gzhi 'di dag dang / tshig su bcad pa 'di dag kyang spros// bi sar te/ bi sar ta/ 'i sa re ta/ bi sa dang / sang+yas 'jig rten la thuT brtseb can gyis la// 'astsal to// sa ng+yas thaMd kyis dgongs pa/ rangs rgyas thaMd kyi
6a5(rgyud): bsams pa/ dag btso pa thaMd kyis bsams pa/ slob pa tha~Md kyis/ bsams pa/ nyan thos thaMd kyis bsams pa/ bden pa'i tshig dang lnga na ba thaMd kyis bsams pa// chos kyi bsamra pa/ tshangs pas bsres pa/ tshas sa
6a6(rgyud): sos bsams pa// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/ dbang pos bsams pa/ lhas bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsres pa/ lha ma yin thaMd kyis bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi mang gzhug pas bsam+ba pa/ 'byung po tha~Md
6a7(rgyud): kyis bsam+ba ba/ bi sA ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'dzin la thuT brtsa ba can gyis bka' stsal to// puny+tsa ta/ muny+tsa ta/ yams kyi nang thad zhi bar gyur cig/ ni rgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirbats+tsha ta/ nirbats+tsha ta/ sad+yas lha chen po lA/ 
6a8(rgyud): yang l+ya lha'i bla ma ga sh+ye shing dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha nas dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'o lha stong
6b1(rgyud): phrag du ma dag dang / bla ma yin gyi dbang po rnams sam/ lha ma yin stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'o// bac+doMs la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po brgya stong mang po dag kyang sen thad kyi don gyi phyir 'ong ste/ de dag khyed la gan
6b2(rgyud): pa chen po byed par 'gyur gyis/ nin ts+tsha ta/ ni gats+tsha ta/ nairma ts+tsha ti/ narga ci te/ skyed du byed cig// khyer cig las ngag dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phung bar gyur cig gang dag byams pa'i sas dang ldan zhing zhe
6b3(rgyud): 'dod la/ srung bar 'jug par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cig/ lus la yang 'jug par gyis shig// sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thu bcu ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/ su mu su mu/ su mu su mu/ su mu su mu ru/ u mu ru/ su mu ru su
6b4(rgyud): su mu ru su mu ru/ su mu ru / su ru mu ru/ u ru mu ru/ mu ru/ su ru mu ru/ mi ma ra~M/ ma raM/ mi ri mi ra/ ma ri/ mi ri/ u ru mi ri/ mu ru si ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi r-i/ mu ru mi ri/ u du mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu
6b5(rgyud): mu ru mi ri yu mi rau/ mu rA r-ItI/ r-i r-i ro/ r-I r-I r-I rI/ di rI di/ mi mi r-i/ i ri mi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ ha si mi rI ti/ ma ri si si mAM/ kaM ka ra/ kaMka rata/ kaM ka rakaM ka ra tsa/ ka katsaka ka rA/ kaMkaR+Sha/ ka r+Ya kaM ka rA kaM kaR+Sha kaM ka r+Ya ka/ 
6b6(rgyud): kakap+pa ka rA/ karA kaMki l+le kaka R+Sha ka/ R+Sha ka~M ki rA ka ke rA kaM kaR+Sha kaM ka ra kaka do/ N+Di ku Shi shokakarA kaM ka r-i ni nga ngo ri ra ta/  pusA/ ri pu pra/ Shi pu ri pu Shi phu bu ri br-i pu wA nAH/ nA nA gara~M pu ri p+'u/ mAmArmA/ 
6b7(rgyud): tad pu ri pu ni rmAn+na ta/ pa la ya ta/ ri pu ri pu/ pa la ya ta/ sa ng+yas 'jig rten la thun brtse ba can/ sen thaMd la phan par lhag par dgongs pa dang ldan pa/ byis pa la gan+da pa/ thuT rje dang ldan pa/ dga'i bal gnas pa/ btang snyos li gen
6b8(rgyud): gash+ye kyis/ k+Shi bran ni gan+d+ha ta swA hA// sang+yas kyi yis kyi mchog dang / chos nyid kyis lha tha dang 'thung po zad la bka' stsal pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni grub ba// tshig su bcad pa 'di dag ni bu'o// gang las sanam
7a1(rgyud): / rnam bcom mang mdzad cing / thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' nga / khyed la bde lags mdzad par 'gyur// 'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams// thar pa'i lam du 'dzu
7a2(rgyud): mdzad cing / chos rnams thams cad ston pa de// khyad la bde lags mdzad par 'gyur/ ston pa rgyug pa rnams kyi rten/ sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// gang gis bde ba
7a3(rgyud): mnga' mdzad de/ khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yis// thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun// bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs te// khyed
7a4(rgyud): la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ gang zhig 'khor bar khor ba yi// sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing // gling dang dbu dang gnyen gyur pa de/ khyad la bod legs
7a5(rgyud): mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig ches kun mngon sum 'gyur// gtsang zhing slu ba mi mnga' la/ gsung gtsang gtsang mar ma dzad pa de/ khyad l-i bad lags mdzad pa
7a6(rgyud): 'gyur// dpa' bo tshan gang skyes pa// phun sum tshogs den 'byor gyur cing // don grub tshogs kyang grub pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig skyes
7a7(rgyud): bas sa rnams ni// nags tshol bcas par rab g.yos shing // sems can thams cad rab dga' de// khyed la bode legs mdzad par 'gyur// byang chub snying por
7a8(rgyud): gang zhig gis// sa dag rnams drug g.yos gyur cing // bdud yid mi bder gyur pa de// khyad la 'ad logs mdzad par 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na// 
7b1(rgyud): 'phags pa'i bdad pa rnam gsung ba// thub pa'i snyan pa grang byung ngo // khyad la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed// thams cad chos kyis pa
7b2(rgyud): mdzad cing / tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// sangs rgyas khyed la ngad lags mdzad// brgya byin lhar bcos bang legs dang // 'byung
7b3(rgyud): kun gyi bde legs ni// khang la rtag tu sbyir gyur cig// sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang // lho rnams kyis ni bsams pa yis// khyed kyis don 'dod gang yin pa/ den deng
7b4(rgyud): ring grub gyur cig/ rkang gnyis khyed cag bde lags sho ga/ rkang bzhi khyad cag bad legs shog/ khyed cag lam 'gro ba de legs shog/ phyir ldog dag kyang ngang lem
7b5(rgyud): sheg nyin mo bde lags mtshan bang lags// nyi mi'i lung la'ang bang legs shing // khyad cag rtag tu bde legs shog/ khyed cag sdig por ma gyur cig/ sangs rgya
7b6(rgyud): lha rnams stong dag gis// yongasu bskor te gshegs mdzad cing / sdang sems ldan pa rnams khyer cig/ snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod// sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / dgra
7b7(rgyud): bcopa slob pa'i bden tshig gis// 'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams// grong khar 'di ni gtong gyur cig/ sems can kun dang srog chags kun// 'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun// bde bal
7b8(rgyud): zhig ldan gyur cig/ thams cad nad rnams mang bar log/ kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig/ gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig/ 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur te/ sa dang bar ska
8a1(rgyud): / ngag la gnas pa rnams// skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog// nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig/ 'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i
8a2(rgyud): mdo rdzogaso// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ran+d+ra bo d+hi dang // zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsau ri ba
8a3(rgyud): d+han sA nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mi rgod rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad
8a4(rgyud): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das zhal 'bring ba tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang thab sa gcig tu/ lus 'phags r-i la gshegs pa'am/ 
8a5(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ mi rgod pal be che zhig rgyang ma nas mthong // mthong nas kyang skrag ste/ nga zhes byed na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces gso
8a6(rgyud): to// bcom ldan 'das mi rgod dag gcig// bde bar gshegs pa mi rgod dag gcig// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod mi rgod rnams kyis 'jigs so/ 
8a7(rgyud): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jigs lag so// bde bar gshegs pa 'jigs lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo mi rgod rnams kyis ma 'jigs
8a8(rgyud): shig de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ gti mug chen po'i tshogs rab tu gzhom pa 'di bka' stsal to// tad+ya thA/ a nu lo me pra ti lo ma/ a nu lo ma pra ti lo ma// a ta~M ka/ 
8b1(rgyud): pra taM ke/ baM ke/ a ti paM ke/ gau raM/ gan+d+ha ri/ tsaN+Da li a tAM gi/ pAHsi/ ri mi ri mi/ rid+d+hi/ ma tsa biSh+Ta ti tse ra pra dan+d+ha/ bi sA han+tu/ ba man+tha/ mA mi yan+na ya bad gran thi na muny+tsa mi s+thAhA// kun dga'
8b2(rgyud): bo ngas dpag tshad bcu tshun chad kun tu srung ba dang / mi rked thams cad dang / ri sul gyi grong khyer gyi mo thams cad dang / gsapa lam srung ba thams cad dang / gnod par sems pa bad kyi
8b3(rgyud): rkang pa bcing bar byas// rmugs par byas// rengs par byaso// ji ltar rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo bskor ba 'am/ ji ltar rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo yongasu bskor ba ltar// mi rmong rnams 'a
8b4(rgyud): bar gyur cig/ rengs par gyur cig/ mgo rmongs par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
8b5(rgyud): gsungs pa la mngon par bsted // cho ga ni shi ngakun dang / bong bu'i spu brags te/ bu mo gtsang mas bkal ba 'i srang bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o// yang
8b6(rgyud): nags kyi mtha' ma la mdud pa bor ste/ bde bar phyir na dgrol bar bya'o// 'di ni grub pa'o// 'phags pa pi rked rnam par 'joms pa zhes pa'i gzungs rdzogaso// rgya gar ska
8b7(rgyud): Ar+ya sarba an+ta ra saM grA sa d+hA ra Ni man+ta/ bod ska du/ 'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad sel ba'i gzungs sngags/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thang la phyag 'tshal
8b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje gzungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / bzlas ba
9a1(rgyud): // byed pa de la ni dug dang / mtshon gyis 'chi ba dang / ltogs pa dang / mtshon rgyab pa dang / gcan zan ma rungs pas za ba dang / mes tshigs pa dang / chung 'chi ba dang / 'pho ba'i
9a2(rgyud): rims gzhan yang ba dang / mdze'i nad dang // gsor mi rung ba'i nad ya nga ba dang / g.yang la lhung ba dang / gzhan gyi byad dang / zas kyis mnangs pa dang / bdag rang gis gsod pa dang / de ltar
9a3(rgyud): gshis ngan du 'chi ba bcu gsum gyis rkyen byed par mi 'gyuraro// phyag na rdo rje gzungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / bzlas brjod byed pa de la ni sa dang na mkha' la gnas
9a4(rgyud): ba'i bgegs dregs pa can ma rungs pa rnas kyis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyuraro// phyag na rdo rje gzungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / bzlas brjod byed
9a5(rgyud): pa de la las kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs par sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad byang zhing dag ste/ bad ba can gyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyuraro// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da pa
9a6(rgyud): ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ba la hUM phaT/ sarba big+h+nAM an+ta rA ya bi nA sha ka mA ra ya hUM phaT/ ces brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na 'grub pa'o// nges par 'grub po zhes gsungaso// 'bigs
9a7(rgyud): ba bar du gcod pa thaMd sel ba'i gzungs sngags rdzogaso// / rgya gar skad/ Ar+ya a tsa la nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon
9a8(rgyud): mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha'o// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum gyi khang bu brtsegs pa na bzhugs te// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'dra/ 
9b1(rgyud): kyi 'khor 'dus pa ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / na mkha'i snying po dang / sa'i snying po dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / 'jam dpal dang / spyan ras gzigs
9b2(rgyud): dbang phyug dang / lag na rdo rje dang / byams pa la sogs pa sa bcu pa 'ba' zhig dang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus
9b3(rgyud): mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling 'di ni gnas pa'i lha dang / kla dang gnod sbyin dang / sha za ma
9b4(rgyud): rungs pa dag gis mi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / yams nad dang / rnam par 'tshe ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba dang / sdang ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang
9b5(rgyud): ser ba dang / sa g.yos pa la sogs pa byung sta/ de dag zhi bar mdzad gsol zhes gsol pa dang / bcom lnga na 'das cang mi gsung bar rnam par dge ba'i sgo zhes pa be'i
9b6(rgyud): ting 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag ste/ sku'i ba spu'i khung bu nas 'od zer ma lce rab tu 'bar ba byung ste/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa la zhugs pa ma lnga 'bar ba gcig tu
9b7(rgyud): gyur to// de'i tshe nyi ma dang zla ba la sogs pa'i 'od kyang lham dang / lhan ne dang / lgang ma yin te/ lha rnams kyi 'od kyang lham dang / lhan na dang / lgang ma yino// klu dang gnod sbyin dang / sha za
9b8(rgyud): la sogs pa rnams ni rlung drag pos bdas pa'i shing bzhi no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi dbyings rnam par mi rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag
10a1(rgyud): / stang mnyam pa'i phyag rgya bshig nas zhabs kyi pus mo la brdabs pas thugs kyi bdag nyid brtan pa'i sku can gyi khro bo zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhug pa dag byung ste/ bralas
10a2(rgyud): ba'i khro bo'i sprul pa dpag tu med pa dang bcas nas nam mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gangs pa'o// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dag na bzhugs pa tshang pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen
10a3(rgyud): po dang / drag po chen po bzhi po dag ha hUM hri/ zhes bya bas skrag par byed pa/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang ser sna dag 'joms pa/ klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / sha za ya drags
10a4(rgyud): la sogs pa haM maM zhes brjod pas skrag par mdzad bdag sprul to// gsungs gi bdag nyid kyi brtan pa'i sku can zhabs phye da sa la pus mo dang mthe bong btsugs pa 'dra
10a5(rgyud): gcig langs te pus mo btsugs pas bzhugs pa'i khroH brtan pa'i sku can/ shes rab kyi bdag nyid ralaM gri me 'od nga bcas pas 'od kyis 'gengs padag sprul
10a6(rgyud): to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi bin gyis brlabs pa las byung ba'i khro bo dag gi sngags smras pa/ na maHsa man+ta badz+ra tAM/ a tsa la kanan tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/ s+pho Ta ya hUM badz+ra d+h+r-i ka khaD+ga hUM
10a7(rgyud): maM hUM maM zhes brjod// phyag rgya ni log pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs te/ srin lag dang mthe'u chung gnyis bsgrangs pa ni// ral gri'i phyag rgya ste/ g.yas bskor du mtshams bcad// na maH
10a8(rgyud): ma man+ta badz+ra NAM/ ma col gan na tsaN+Da ma hA rob na/ s+pho Ta ya hUM/ a mri tahU hUM zhes brjod// phyag rgya ni lag pa ser mo rnams brkyang ste mthe'u chung mtha bos mnan pa ni rdo rje rtsa gsum pa'i
10b1(rgyud): phyag rgya ste/ g.yas nas bskor la bgegs bskudo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par dag pa'i ting 'dzin gyis srung ba bsrungs pa ni dmar po'i yi ge raM spyi bor bsam ste// rnam par dab
10b2(rgyud): yi ye 'dis brtan par byas nas rdo rje dang ral gris lus ma 'od dang bcas par sgom ste/ na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NAM/ a tsa la ka na tsaN+De ma hA ro Sha Na ka te b+h+ya/ sarba bi ga ta b+h+yo/ bi shwa mu kha b+h+yaHsarba \u0f7f
10b3(rgyud): thA ga yAM maM rak+Sha zhes brjod// phyag rgya ni rdo rje thal mo sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i rgyab tu sbyar smin mtshan su bca' bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi sems
10b4(rgyud): rig pa chen po'i srung ba bsrungs pa ni hUM dang bzhi'i rnam pas bltas te/ na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NAM/ a tsa la ka na tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na~M ka te b+h+yaHsarba bi ga te b+h+yo/ bi shra mu khaM b+h+yoHsarba tathA
10b5(rgyud): ga ta hAM maM/ rak+Sha ma hA ba le sarba ta thA ga te pra ma ni rbardza hUM hUM phaT Ta tha TA tha/ a pr-i ti ha te swA hA zhes brjod// phyag rgya/ ni rdo rje'i thal mo sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis na
10b6(rgyud): du bdug la gung me rtse sprad/ srin lag gnyis brkyang nas mthe'u chung gnyis cung zhig bkug la snying kar bcas te srung ba ni yum gyi ste/ 'geg so dang log 'dren dang ma rungs
10b7(rgyud): pi bang dran pa tsam gyi 'ber bar 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bams pa'i ting 'dzin la snyems par bzhugs pa te/ kha zas kyi bye brag bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / bzhib pa
10b8(rgyud): btung ba dang / bldag po la sogs pa dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang di dang ro'i bye brag la byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad/ oM sarba d+harmAtrA sa wA sa byas pas dag par byas te/ oM a mri ta maM
11a1(rgyud): hUM hriHzhes bya bas ni 'dod pa'i don du'o// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te sam+b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM zhes bya bas lan bdun btang ste bsngos pas tshim par 'gyur
11a2(rgyud): phyag rgya ni mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ ldang bar 'dod na sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHtsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ na mo badz+ra
11a3(rgyud): kr-i d+hA ya/ daM Sh+To ta ka Ta bai ra wA ya/ a si mu sa la pa ra shu pA shA hasta ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li kha kha khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tilpa ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ grih+Na gr-ih+Na/ gardza gardza/ ba s+pho Ta ya
11a4(rgyud): sarba big+h+nAM bi nA ya kA nAM ma hA ga Na pa ti dzI bi ta an+ta ka ra na swAhA/ zhes bya ba brjod// lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la kha nang du bstan te mdzub mo sbrang la brang du snol la phyag
11a5(rgyud): rgya bcings te/ gtor ma btang zhing 'chags pa'i dusu/ yang de bzhin// nye reg bya ba dang khrus bya ba ni rin po che'i bum par dri zhim po'i chu la/ na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NI/ a
11a6(rgyud): tsa la ka na ya a mr-i ta zhes lan bdun bdun btab ste/ lag pa g.yon pas bum pa bzung nas g.yas pa'i gung mo dang srin lag cung zad tsam bkug la/  mo can gyi nang du a bsam
11a7(rgyud): laM chu blugs te/ oM shud+d+ha dun+te sho d+ha nA ye swA hA/ zhes bya bas khrus bya'o// de skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' byam pa la'o// de nas rgyal
11a8(rgyud): po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis me tog dang / 
11b1(rgyud): dang 'dug spos dang / lha'i zhal zas dang / lha'i bu po dang / bu mo dag rin po che'i rgyan dang bcas pas shing rta dpag tu med pa dang / mchod pa'i yo byad dpag tu med pa dag gis bcom ldan
11b2(rgyud): 'das la mchod pa dang bskor ba rgya chen po dag byas te byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang thabs gcig tu 'du'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa spro ba dang ldan pas bcom lda
11b3(rgyud): 'das la blta'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas bsam gtan dang po la mnyam par gzhag ste/ 'dong po'i bde ba spangs te dga' bar rtogs pa tsa mo// de nas
11b4(rgyud): bsam gtan dang po nas gnyis pa la mnyam par gzhag ste/ rtse gcig pa'i rtog dpyod spangs te/ dga' bde tsa mo// bsam gtan gnyis pa nas gsum pa la mnyam par gal
11b5(rgyud): ste/ rtog pa dang dpyod pa sngas te bde ba tsa mo// de nas bsam gtan gsum pa nas bzhi pa la mnyam par gzhag ste/ tsher ba nye bar zhi bzhi pa'i bad pa tsamo// de nas bcom ldan
11b6(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tingange 'dzin da ngag dang ldan na rnam par dag pa'o// byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang / btang stobs kyis ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyud spel ba'o// de bzhin
11b7(rgyud): du chos thams cad ni na mkha' ltar mtha' bzhi las rnam par grol ba'o// na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NAM/ d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ha~M/ zhes brjod/ phyag rgyan 'di'o// lag pa gnyis so sor khu tshur
11b8(rgyud): bcangs te/ mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug la mdzub mo gnyis snang ba'o// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis / 
12a1(rgyud): stsal pa/ rdo rje'i skyil mo dkrung btus te/ snying khar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la thugs kyi sa bor 'od kyis na mkha' kun khengs par bsams te/ sa bon nga las chos thang tshigs ma
12a2(rgyud): dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba'i sgra dang bcas pas 'phel ba dang 'grib pa'i sgra 'od zer 'phro bsdu dang bcas pa'o// de nas sna tshogs pa'i gangan 'dam nas skyes pa'i dri ma med cing yongasu rgyas pa
12a3(rgyud): tshogs kyi bdag po'i steng du rta dadun pa kun nas 'od 'phro ba// 'dam skyes dang ldan pa dag gi stang du na mkha'i mdog can gyi thugs kyi sa bon dang bdag nyid gcig pa'o// na mkha'i khams kun
12a4(rgyud): tu khyab par 'od kyi 'gengs pa'i shes rab kyi ral gri sngon po dag tu gyur teng de dag las bdud dang ma rungs pa mtha' dag 'joms pa'i khro bo chen po/ rnam rtog thams cad yongasu bcotsem pa
12a5(rgyud): dri ma med cing gzho nu'i sku'o// de yang gzhon zhing sku'i sha rgyas pa ni dper na bus pa gzhon nu lang tsho la bab pa'i lus lta bu ste// de'i sku mdog ni mthing nag tu gnas
12a6(rgyud): te/ dper na dbyar gyi char sprin nag po'i mdog bzhin du gnas pa'o// nam mkha' ma lus pa thams cad du 'od kyis 'gengs pa ni/ dper na rta bdun pa'i 'od kyis gling kun tu khyab pa bzhi no// dbus
12a7(rgyud): gcig tu bcings shing 'phyar ba ni dper na shing a la ka'i 'bras bu bzhi no// sku cung zhig bgying ba dang g.yo ba ni dper na dpag bsam gyi shing yongs 'du sa rtol bzhi no// zhabs brkyang
12a8(rgyud): bskum du bzhugs pa ni dper na gyad kyi 'gos bzhi no// spyan gsum shin tu dmar po ni dper na ba la sha'i me tog bzhi no// spyan steng 'og tu blta ba ni steng 'og bgegs sreg pa ste/ dper na
12b1(rgyud): lha ma yin gyi ba gtong pa za ba bzhi no// mche ba gtsigs pa ni/ dper ra zla ba phyed pa bzhi do// ljags shin tu 'khyug pa ni dper na na mkha'i klog bzhi no// smin ma khro gnyer du sdus pa ni
12b2(rgyud): dper na shing 'brig sha'i lo ma bzhi do// phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa ni dper na gza' chen po'i 'od ltung ba bzhi no// sbrul gyi zhags pa g.yon na bsdams pa ni dper na rgya mtsho'i
12b3(rgyud): 'ching bzhi no// de lta bu'i sku des ni tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag dang / phyogs skyeng ba la sogs pa rnams dbang du sdus pa lha dang klu ma rungs pa dang sringan mo
12b4(rgyud): sha za dang / grul bum dang / lto 'phe la sogs pa 'jom sa par byed pa dag gaM/ de'i sngags bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NAM/ traT/ a mo g+ha tsaN+Da ma hA
12b5(rgyud): rol Na s+pho Ta ya hUM/ tra ma ya tra ma ya~M hUM tra ta haM maM zhes pa rjong por bya'o// das ni 'tshe ba dang / rnam par 'tshe ba dang / sdang ba dang / rnam par sdang ba dang / log 'dun dang / rna
12b6(rgyud): log 'dren dang / srin po dang / lha dang / klu dang / grul bum dang / sha za la sogs pa thang zhi bar 'gyur ro// rlung las gyur pa dang / 'khris po las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'bras dang
12b7(rgyud): shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang / mdza dang / 'brung bu dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / rims nyin gcig pa dang / nyon gnyis pa dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / ljang bub pa dang / yud tsam pa'i rims da
12b8(rgyud): rtag pa'i rims las bar bar 'gyu ro// sing+ga dang / stag dang / de me dang / drang dang / spyang ki dang / sbrul dug can dang / sbrang bu dang / she sbyong dang / bung ba'i gnod pa las tha ro// rgyal po'i chad
13a1(rgyud): / pa dang / dmag dpung gi 'jigs pa las tha'o// rkun po dang / ban dang / bza' mi 'thab cing rtsod pa las za'o// chu yis 'jigs pa dang / me yis 'jigs pa dang / 
13a2(rgyud): sa g.yo bas 'jigs pa dang / lce 'bab pas 'jigs pa las paro// ral gri dang / shak+Shi dang / dgra sta dang / mdung dang / mda' dang / mnga' bo che dang / 'khor lo dang / mtshon cha'i dzig
13a3(rgyud): pa las tha ro// 'chi ba dang dus ma yin par 'chi ba las tha ro// mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa kun dag par 'gyuraro// sems can dmyal ba dang / yi drags dang / dud
13a4(rgyud): 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yul mtha' 'khob dang / dbang po ma tshang ba dang / lha tshe ring po dang / log par lta bar 'dzin pa da/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba las mnyes pa med pa dag
13a5(rgyud): tu mi 'gyuraro// gzungs sngags 'di ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs te/ la na gcig brjod pas kyang sdig pa thams cad 'dag pa
13a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'di brjod pa'i gang zag des ni chos nyid kyi lam rdo rje lta bu myur ba nyid du thob par 'gyuraro// de nas rta bdun pa'i steng du rnam par dag pa'i yi ge na mkha' ma lus
13a7(rgyud): pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa bsam te/ byams pa'i lta bas lta ba'i phyir hi ser po mig tu'o// srog gi lam du na mi nag po bsam par bya'o// spyi bor chos nyid rnam par dag
13a8(rgyud): pa'i yi ge bsams te sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// na maHsa maun+ta badz+ra pA Ni tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM zhes brjod lag pa thal mo sbyar te/ gung mau smyung ba'i rgyab tu mdzub me cug
13b1(rgyud): zad bkug la/ srin lag kyang de bzhin byas te/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// 'di'i byin gyis brlabs kyis ma rig pa 'joms shing ye shes kyi sku nyid du byin gyis brlabs pa'o// gser
13b2(rgyud): la sogs pa'i snod kha zas kyi babrag nas dang / 'bras dang / gro dang / so ba dang / til la sogs pa dang / zho dang / 'o ma dang / sbrang rtsi dang / kha ra dang / gser dang / dngul dang / zangs dang
13b3(rgyud): mu tig dang / bi ru dag blugs te// 'bru gsum pa'i sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs nas sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta ta thA ga te b+h+yoHbi shA mu khaM b+h+yaHsarba thA khaM ud
13b4(rgyud): ga ta/ s+pha ra Na oM baM ga ga na khaM zhes brjed pa ra ba'o// phyag rgya ni mchog sbyor gyi phyag rgya'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki tau/ oM saM d+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM zhes bya ba
13b5(rgyud): las 'byung po kun la mchod par bya'o// nos gsang sngags 'di brjed par bya'o// na maHsa mamaT d+hA nA~M/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na a sa mi dros me mahA sa ma / 
13b6(rgyud): sarba pA bi swA hA// phyag rgya thal mo sbyar ba la gsol ba gdab ste/ dam tshig gso ba'o// 'o phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas dam
13b7(rgyud): tshig ni 'di yin te// sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun ni 'bras bu dang / lam dang / sgrub pa'i khyad par te/ gang nas brtsams te khad par gyis mchod cing nam du yang mi
13b8(rgyud): 'bral bar bya'o// tshad med pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyud rtag tu sgom zhing smon lam rgya chen por gdab par bya'o// sngags dang phyag rgya dang sngags dang phyag rgya'i rten rgyun tu
14a1(rgyud): bcang zhing bral mi bya'o// lha dang / bla ma dang / byang chub kyi grogs la khong nas 'khrug pa'i sems spang // srog gis btus pa'i sems can thams cad la byams pa dang
14a2(rgyud): snying rje sngon du song bas gnod pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba spongs te nam dor bar mi bya'o// ser sna spangs te sems can la sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o// sems can la gnod pa dang / rnar
14a3(rgyud): 'tshe ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims brten pa'o// rang la rnam par 'tshe ba la bzod por bya'o// rang dang gzhan gyi don sgrub pa la brtson pa dor bar mi bya'o// rnam par g.yeng ba spangs te
14a4(rgyud): bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag/ nyal ba dang ldan bku na tu rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i don le ma yengs par bya'o// dam tshig med cing mi gnas pa la
14a5(rgyud): bsam gtan dang / ting 'dzin dang / sngags dang phag rgya la sa gas pa kun bstan cing bshad par mi ba'o// srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la
14a6(rgyud): phyin ci log pa dang / brdzun du smra ba ni tshangs par spyod pa dang / spyang par 'dod pas spangs par bya'o// dge slong rnams dang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / dam tshig dang ldan pa la
14a7(rgyud): gus par bya zhing brnyas par mi bya'o// thun mtshams kyi sbyor ba dang ldan par bya'o// khro ba dang bab tshel du smra ba dang / long lung dang / bshang gtsi 'dor ba dang / dri ma 'khru ba dang / sku
14a8(rgyud): dang sen mo la sogs pa'i mi gtsang ba de dag dang / dri nga ba dang / dri mi zhim po bku zhing mnam pa dang ldan pa thams cad spang bar bya'o// khang pa ni spos kyi khang pa yid du 'ong
14b1(rgyud): ba gtsang zhing dri ba med pa dag bkra shis pa'i sgo shar du bstan pa/ gseng skar dang bcas pa'i khang pa 'am/ bram ze'i khyim mam/ dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra be 'am/ lha khang ngam Shi re
14b2(rgyud): rtse 'am/ bya skad sgrogs pa'i sa 'am/ dgon pa 'am/ bas mtha' 'am/ spang ljongs dag tu dri zhim po'i chus bskyang nul byas la/ rtswa'i sten btangs te gnas par bya'o// khri la 'dug
14b3(rgyud): pa spang bar bya'o// zho dang / 'o ma dang / mar dang / la du dang / la ban dang / snga ma 'khur dang / 'khur skye dang / 'bras dang / 'bras zan la sogs pa dag gasnyung ba dang ldan pas bza' bar bya'o// 
14b4(rgyud): sha dang chang dang / klog pa la sogs pa dgu pa'i zas rnams kun tu spang bar bya'o// zla ba dang / skar ma dang / tshes grangs laso gas pa ni yar gyi ngo dag la dkor mchog la
14b5(rgyud): gsol ba btab la bsgrub par bya'o// ra ba dang / rnga ma dang rtswa ba pa dag ni ma yino// 'dod pa'i don du 'jam zhing gnas pa la ni 'gal ba mdo// dus rtag tu yi dam
14b6(rgyud): la dang ba bskyed pa'i byams pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pas bsgrub par bya'o// sprul pa'i khro bo rdo rje shugs can ni kha dog shin tu gnag pa ste/ nga dang nga yir 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid gan
14b7(rgyud): lcags kyi 'khor lo bsnams pa'o// rdo rje chags ni mdog dmar po tshogs pa dang chags par byed pa'i bzhin gyi mda' gzhu'o// rdo rje rnon po ni ljang ku ste/ 'dzin cing yongasu 'an
14b8(rgyud): ba'i bdag nyid lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje 'bar ba ni mdog dmar po ste/ mi shes pa dang mi shes pa 'joms pa'i bdag nyid rdo rje'i brag 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje khro bo ni ser po
15a1(rgyud): steng khro ba dang khro ba'i bdag nyid kyi ral gri 'bar ba bsdams pa'o// rdo rje gtum chen ni mdog ljang nag ste/ bdang snyoms dang btang snyomasu gyur pa'i bdag nyid kyi
15a2(rgyud): sprin gyi zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje thabs bdag ni du ba'i mdog can bya ba dang byed pa'i bdag nyid kyi rdza rnga bsdebs pa'o// rdo rje stobs cheni ni mthing ka ste/ dman pa dang dam
15a3(rgyud): ba'i rang bzhin can gyi gnam lcags kyi 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje rgyu'i stobs ni dmar nag ste/ rter 'bral dang rten ci 'brel bar 'byung ba'i bdag nyid kyi be con 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje
15a4(rgyud): rab 'byed ni sna tshogs phrin las kyi mdog can mtha' dang mtha' las grol ba'i bdag nyid can gyi rdo rje rtsa gcig pa ba sdams pa'o// de dag ni sa bcu'i bdag nyid
15a5(rgyud): ma 'bar ba'i sku las rab tu 'phro ba'o// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs las le'u ste gsum pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub se
15a6(rgyud): byams pa la thun mong du de dag pa'i phyir de'i cho ga gsungs pa/ gnas khang yid du 'ong bar dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i sa la maN+Dal mnga' gang bu byas te/ ba'i rnam ldi'i bskyang rul
15a7(rgyud): byas la/ me tog sngon po dgram par bya'o// de nas bum pa gser ram/ dngul lam/ zangs las byas pa'i lhung bzed kyi tshad du byas te/ der rin po che gser dang / dngul dang / zangs dang / byi
15a8(rgyud): ru dang / mu tig dang / rnam pa lnga gzhug par bya'o// sbrang rtsi dang / bu ram dang / kha ra dang / zho dang / 'o ma dang / mar rnams gzhug par bya'o// nas dang / 'bras dang / so ba dang / til dang / khro dang rtswa
15b1(rgyud): rtsa rnams gzhug par bya'o// cu gang dang / gur gum dang / dza ti dang / sug mel dang / ka ko la dang / li shi rnams gzhug par bya'o// tsan dan dang / a ga ru dang / du ru ka dang / gla rtsi dang / rgya spos
15b2(rgyud): ga pur la sogs pa'i dri rnams kyang gzhug par bya'o// mtsho dang / rdzing dang / steng ka dang / 'bab chu dang / lu ma bkod pa rnams kyi chu yang blag la ba la'am ras la dri'i chus bsang bas
15b3(rgyud): mgul pa bcings te gzhag par bya'o// de dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i shing la kha rgyan byas te/ dri dang spos dang / me tog dang / mA me dang / byugs pa dang / lha bshos dang / 
15b4(rgyud): rol mo'i sgra dag kyang bsham par bya'o// 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma yang cha bdun nam lnga la sogs par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NaM/ a tsa la tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/ sarba
15b5(rgyud): bog+h+na s+pho Ta ya/ badz+ra d+h+r-ika khaD+ga hUM zhes bya bas mtshams rnam sa bcings par bya'o// de bzhin du srung ba'i cho ga rdzogs pa bya ste/ bum pa la gzungs kyi thag pa btags
15b6(rgyud): nas rnam par dag pa'i ye shes yongasu bsgyur ba'i bum pa la brum zhes pa ba'i sa bon las kha dog dang / tshad dang ldan pa'i bum pa'o// thugs kyi sa bon las byung ba'i bcos don
15b7(rgyud): de kho na nyid las mnyam par bzhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa'i gang zag dang bcas pa gang na sad+mo'i steng na sna tshogs pa'i gdan pad+ma dang zlan
15b8(rgyud): steng na bzhugs pa'o// chos nyid dang ldan pa'i rnam par drag gis bcom ldan 'das sam par bya'o// chos nyid dang / sems dang / sems kyi rnam pa dang / sgra dang / sgra brnyan dang / gzugs de
16a1(rgyud): gzugs brnyan dang bcas pa'i skur nyi ma'i gdan pad+ma dang tshogs kyi bdag po glang snga'i steng du bsam ste/ thugs kyi sa bon las ral gri me 'od dang bcas pas nam
16a2(rgyud): kun khebs pa'o// de las bdud char gcod pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi skur bsams te/ mchod pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bya'o// da paHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ oM AHhUM/ pra ba ra sa
16a3(rgyud): kA rA pra tI tsA hAM zhes brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ oM AHhUM/ sarba ba tA a tsin t+ya a mr-i ta d+ha rA ya swA hA/ zhes brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ oM ha ra b+ha ga bA na/ sarba bi d+ya
16a4(rgyud): pU dza te swAhA zhes brjod par bye'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha re/ a~M I hUM/ d+harma d+hi tu a nu ga te d+hU pa hUM swA hA/ zhes brjod par bskon mo/ sa man+ta bud+d+hA ne/ oM AHhUM/ ma hA mai tri b+h+ye ga te puny+dza
16a5(rgyud): hUM zhes brjed par bya'o// na moHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ oM AHhUM/  rba ta thA ga ta a tsi prA Na a b+hA ba ga gai ni b+hU ni b+hu nid+ya A~M le kaM n+d+ra swA hA zhes brjid par bya'o// na ma an+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ oM aH
16a6(rgyud): ga ga na sa ma ya~M gan+d+he hUM swA hA zhes brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ A hA ra sarba tra thA ga to na wa d+yaM bA dza na sA rA Na ye hUM swA hA zhes brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ a b+hismar ye/ 
16a7(rgyud): s+phar Na i maM ga ga na kha~M/ d+harma d+hAr+dz+dza wA kA shA yo sa man+ta ya/ sarba \u0f7f thA ga Na pa ri shud+d+ha man+ta le ma ma pra Ni d+ha pU dzi na ma len d+harma d+hi t+yai/ a d+hiny+dza na pa tsa hU~M swAh+ma zhes brje // rdo rje dang dril thu bsil
16a8(rgyud): bar bya'o// thal mo bkan la/ mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i rgyab tu cung zhig bkug la sbyar/ srin lag dang mthe'u chung bsnol la mthe bong cung zhig bkug pa ni yon chab kyi phyag rgya'o// sar
16b1(rgyud): me rnams gung mo la brten te cung zad bkug nas gung mo snang ba ni bdug spos kyi phyag rgya'o// sor mo rnams phan tshun bsnol te nang du bcug nas/ mdzub mo mtha bos mnan pa ni me tog
16b2(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// mthe bong dang gung mo'i ser me rtsa sprad/ lhag ma khu tshur bcangs pa ni mar me'i phyag rgya'o// mi 'jigs pa'i phyag lag na g.yon pas 'khrig ma bteg pa ni dri'i phyag rgya'o/ 
16b3(rgyud): me bkan pa'i zung sbyar te/ mthe'u chung gnyis bshibs nas sgreng ba ni lha bshos kyi phyag rgya'o// spyi bor lag pa bkor to/ thal mo khong stong sbyar nas dkrol ba ni rgya chen po'i mchod pa'i
16b4(rgyud): rdzas rnams rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i lha mos rdzas sbyangs pa'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a b+ha ba swa b+hA ba mud ga tA nAM/ nA ma pra t+ye ka bu d+hA Ar+ya shrA ba kA nAM/ na mo be d+hi satwa nAM/ da sha b+ha
16b5(rgyud): mi pra tiSh+Thi ti sha ra NAM/ bo d+hi sa twa la/ ma hAs tra nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ oM kha kha khA hi khA hi duSh+Ta swA hA/ kA ma kra a si mu sa le ba ra shu pA shahasta ya/ tsatrar+dz+nyAHtsa tu thu kha/ 
16b6(rgyud): tsa ra Na/ ga tsA ya/ gats+tsha ya/ sarba big+h+nAM/ g+hA ta bi kr-i tI nAM/ sar+b+ba b+hU ta b+ha yaM ka ra aT+Ta hA sa ni nI ta thA g+hA tsarma ba sa ni/ ku ru ku ru sarba d+harmA tsA/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshan+da sarba man+tha/ b+hin+da b+hin+di/ ba ra man+ta/ A
16b7(rgyud): ya A kaR+Sha yaM/ sarba b+hU ta/ ni rma tha niH tha/ sarba duSh+Tad/ pra ba shaM ya pra ba sha ya/ maN+Da la pa d+h+ye b+haM ba sa t+ya dzI bi taM na/ ka ra ka ra ku ru ku ru ma ma sarba kAr+yaM/ da ha da ha/ pe tsa pa tsi/ ma li laM ge sa ma
16b8(rgyud): yaM a nu sma ra hUM hUM/ s+pho Ta ya/ s+pho Ta ya/ sarba DA ri pA ra ka/ he b+ha ga ban/ kiny+tsi rA ya sau/ ma ma sarba baM sA d+ha ya/ a mo g+ha/ tsaN+Da mahA ro ShA Na s+pho Ta ya hUM/ tra ma tra ma haM maM/ zhes bdun ma
17a1(rgyud): / nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal bar dmigs la las dang rnam par smin pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / gnod
17a2(rgyud): dang / rnam par 'tshe ba dang / nad la sogs pa zhi bar dmigs te bzlas par bya'o// de nas gtong bar 'dod pas zlos pa'i tshe gdams pa'i tshul gyis dbul bar bya'o// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba
17a3(rgyud): gzungs las le'u bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ras ris kyi cho ga gsungs pa/ shing bal shin tu dri ma med pa la bram ze 'am gtsang sbra dang ldan pa'i khrus byas te// / 
17a4(rgyud): mchog gsum la gsol ba btab la brtag par bya'o// rigs ngan dmangs rigs la sogs pa'i ras dag ni spang bar bya'o// ras de gur gum dang grwa rdzi dang a ga rul
17a5(rgyud): sogs pa'i chus dkrus te dag par bya'o// de nas sngags 'di grog 'am ras la bris nas gdags par bya'o// a A i I u U ri rI me l-I e e o o a a
17a6(rgyud): ka kha ga g+ha pa/ tsa tsha dza dz+nyA nya/ Ta tra Da D+ha Na~M/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pA pa pa b+ha ma/ ya ral wa/ sha Sha sa haHk+ShaHzhes bya ba bris te dgod par bya'o// de nas sngags 'di lan bdun brjod par bya'o// na maHsa
17a7(rgyud): mAn+ta bud+d+hA nA/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro ShaH/ s+pho Ta ya hUM tra tha ha maM/ oM bAkya daM na maHzhes bya ba las thams cad 'grub pa ste/ gur gum dang tsan dan dang / gla rtsi'i tshu la bsngags shing gtor bar bya'o// 
17a8(rgyud): de nas ri mo mkhan khrus dag par byas te/ bram ze'i rigs kyis bri bar bya'o// tshon ni gser dang / dngul dang / zangs dang / lcags rang gis bri bar bya ba 'am/ yang na kar rtsi dang / mtshal dang / 
17b1(rgyud): ldong ros dang / ba bla dang / spang ma dang / mthing shun dang / rgya skyegs dang / rdo sol dang snag tshad ba de la sogs pa'i tshon rnams la a ga ru dang / du ru ka dang / tsan dan dang / gla rtsi dang / rgyu spos la sog
17b2(rgyud): ba rnams dang sbyar la sngags 'di lan bdun brjod de bri bar bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hAM/ tra thA haM maM/ bAkye hUM/ oM AHbi ra hUM/ kha tsa ra maM zhes brjod la bri bar ba
17b3(rgyud): ste/ khang par bzang po 'dzom pa'i dusu tshul khrims dang ldan zhing dag pa la kha zas byin ta spyan dbye bar ba'o// bri ba yang de bzhin te// spyan 'byed pa'i dusu sngags 'di brjod// na maHsa man+ta
17b4(rgyud): bud+d+ha nAM/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM/ tra thA haM maM/ ga ga na ba rak+Sha Na/ ku ru Na ma ya/ sarba ta thA go ta tsik+ShaHoM aHhUM swA hA zhes sbrang tsagaser gyi thur ma la byugs la lan gsum du b+h+yaH
17b5(rgyud): par bya'o// bris sku tshad dang ldan pa yongasu zin pa dang / dri mkhan la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyin par bya ste/ gser ram/ dngul lam/ zangs sam/ ra 'am/ rje ba
17b6(rgyud): ngag las byed na yang de bzhin du bya'o// gzugs dang sku'i khyA dpar gyi rang bzhin dang rang bzhin ma yin pas khyad par tha dad pa dag tu bya ste/ rang bzhin dang ldan pa la bar chad zhi
17b7(rgyud): bya ba'i phyir gzugs sku las ni yongasu bsgyur nas byin gyis brlabs par bya'o// de nas khyad par bzang po'i dusu khang pa ba'i rnam lngas byug par byas te/ ras ris dang // zang ka dang / 
17b8(rgyud): pau ti dang / glegs bam la sogs pa maN+Dal gyi steng du bzhugasu gsol to// spos dang / me tog dang / mar me dang / dri dang / lha bshos la sogs pa'i mchod pa' khang par dpag tu med pa
18a1(rgyud): / gtor ma yang de bzhin du'o// gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang bA ra la sogs pa yang bri bar bya'o// de nas khro bo'i sku dang ldan pas sngags brjod par bya ste/ nas/ 
18a2(rgyud): sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ a mo g+ha a hi/ a pra ti ha ta a tsa la tsi ta e naM ta ka NaM/ tiSh+Tha ti ShA tsu ru tsu ru/ ta di ta di/ taT te Ta/ big+h+nAM g+ha ta ya/ mA ra ya/ khA da ya/ s+pho Ta ya/ sa taM me ustA a a d+h+waM ku
18a3(rgyud): a d+ha ha d+ha ha no kre/ ka ta ka ta/ ma ta ma ta/ haM ha maM maM/ a te ba la e hi ma hA nu ni ba sha na/ na TA na TA/ a ba sha ya a be sha yaM/ a tse le tse ha/ ta Ta ta Ta/ da ma da ma/ phaT phaT/ zhes 'bum brjod
18a4(rgyud): par bya ste/ lha'i sku gnyis la ni bye ba'o// zhi ba ni sprul pa 'i sku ste/ sngon du ni de bzhin shes par bya'o// a ga ru dang du ruka/ dang / tsAr dang / ga pud dang / gla rtsi dang / rgya spos kyi chu/ 
18a5(rgyud): lu na me rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHshAkya mun ya/ ta thA ga tan+tu arge b+h+yaHsamya kaMs bu d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ mu na mu ne ma hA mu na~M/ oM dza ya dza ye/ bAkye she swA hA/ oM bAkye baM dza
18a6(rgyud): oM bAkye niSh+Te ye/ oM bAkye na ma/ oM bAkya daM na ma/ oM AHhUM he maM zhes bya bas sku khrus pa'o// de nas rol mo bsgrags par bya'o// rdzas la sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nA/ na ma
18a7(rgyud): sa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ ha maM/ oM A d+ya nu ta pan na tra pa b+ha swa ra su ba~M shud+d+ha/ d+harma d+ha t+ya swa b+hA baM At+ma ke ha~M/ zhes bya bar brjod par bya'o// de nas mchod pa dpag tu med pas mchod/ 'don de ni/ 
18a8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig tu brjod pa'i gzungs sngagaso// na ma s+t+rai ya d+hi kA nAM/ sarba ta thA ga tA naM tsaN+Da tsan+ta pa la bag bau tra ba tra/ shAn+te/ shAn+te/ ha la ha la/ ba ra ba la/ ma rA Na ma rA/ 
18b1(rgyud): Na badz+ra da la s+pho Ta ma/ li ti ta shi kha ra/ sa man+ta badz+ra Ni dz+wa la dz+wa la/ na mo stu te/ a mo g+ha tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na sa saM ra Na ra Na ha hUM la badz+ra spre Ta/ maM swA hA/ na mas+t+rai ya d+hi kA nAM ta thA ga tA nA sarba
18b2(rgyud): tra a pra tiha ta bab+ha d+harma tA ba lI nAM/ aM a sa me sa man+ta to a nAM ta traM bAp+ti shA sa naM/ ha ra ha ra/ s+pha ra sma ra Na/ bi ka ta rA ga/ bud+d+ha d+haH te/ sa raM me ra/ sa ma ba lA/ ha sa ha sa/ tra ya
18b3(rgyud): tra ya/ ga ga na ma hA ba ra lak+Sha Ne dz+wa la dz+wa la na sA ga re swA hA/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA ya/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ oM a ra dze/ bi ri dzi/ ma hA bir dze/ ma hA bi ra dze/ swa ra te swa ra te/ tra yi
18b4(rgyud): yaM / bi d+ha ma ni/ saM b+h+r-i dza ni ra ma ti sid+d+ha a tro traM swAhA/ zhes pa rjod// 'ang ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rnam par dag pa'i gzungs te/ lan
18b5(rgyud): gcig brjod pa tsam gyis kyang lha dang sngags dang / bya ga rgya thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshe gas pa'i dam tshig gsum dang ldan pa'i gcu
18b6(rgyud): 'dis lha dang / sngags dang phyag rgya bcings pa rnams nu sa pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lha dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya rnams kyis ltas dang mtshan ma bar chad med par 'gyur ro/ 
18b7(rgyud): srod dang tho rangs la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi gzungs 'di rje su brjod par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i
18b8(rgyud): khrus 'di la brtson par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ tad+ya thA oM i ho shud+d+he shud+d+ha maM ho shud+d+he shud+d+he/ r-i ho aM shud+d+he shud+d+he/ a shu maM bi shud+d+haM shud+d+he shud+d+he sa ma ya swA hA
19a1(rgyud): brjod do// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i gzungs te/ tshul sngags bzlas nas khras byas na sdig pa kun 'dag par
19a2(rgyud): 'gyuraro// rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / mtshan ma ngan pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyu ro// rims dang 'brum bu dang / lha gor dang / 'bras dang / shu
19a3(rgyud): dang 'gro ba'i nad dang / 'tshe ba las thar bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
19a4(rgyud): dang srin po dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa tshar gcod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo 'i rnam pa gsungs pa/ dang po chos kyi dbyings kyi rang ba ni/ 
19a5(rgyud): gyi e'i rnam pa can gyi na mkha'o// rlung gi nga kyil 'khor sngon po gzhu lta bu ba dan can yaM las byung ba'o// chu'i dkyil 'khor gangs ltar dkar ba'i zlum po bum
19a6(rgyud): pa can bam la so// sa'i dkyil 'khor gser gyi mdog can gru bzhi rdo rje can lam las byung de'i steng ri rab rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa'i tshad dang ldan pa oM las byung
19a7(rgyud): me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po gru gsum pa 'bar ba dang bcas pa raM laso// de'i nang du brum kha dog sna tshogs byung ba'i khang bu brtsegs pa/ gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi dang bcas
19a8(rgyud): ba'i rin po che sna lnga las grub pa ni shel dang / bai DUr+ya dang / byi ru dang / in+d+ra nI la dang / gsar las grub pa'o// de'i nang sna tshogs pa'i pad+ma mdab brgyad pa'i gad no// 
19b1(rgyud): gyi mdab ma ni shel las grub pa'o// lho'i mdab ma ni bai DUr+ya las grub pa'o// nub kyi mdab ma ni byi ru las grub pa'o// byang gi mdab ma ni in+d+ra nI las grub pa'o// mtshams
19b2(rgyud): rnams kyang shel dang / bai DUr+ya dang / byi ru dang / in+d+ra nI la las grub pa'o// dbusu ni tshogs bdag glang sna'i steng du sna tshogs pa'i 'dam skyes dang / nyi ma'i gdan// shar du brgya byi/ 
19b3(rgyud): lhor lnga chen po// nub tu khab 'jug byang du bzangs ros// shar lho mtsham su tshangs pa/ lho nub mtsham su gzhonu/ nu'i byang du dga' byed/ byang shar du kun rgyal ba ste/ lce chen
19b4(rgyud): bo brgyad kyi steng du/ pad+ma dang nyi ma'i gad no// yi ge raM las byung ba'i nyi ma dang / maM las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma maM dang ldan pa las bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
19b5(rgyud): gshegs pa'i bdag nyid kyi mi g.yo ba na ma mkha'i mdog can/ nyi ma'i snying po la pus mo reg cing bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan
19b6(rgyud): 'das na mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa phag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yon na klu'i rgyal po'i zhags pa bsdams pa/ phu phu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don pa'o// 
19b7(rgyud): shar du bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i rigs yi ge tsa ma~M las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan matse dang ldan pa las/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i rigs kyi bdag nyid can gyi mi g.yo ba/ 
19b8(rgyud): shes rab kyi mdog can nyi mi'i snying po las pus mos reg cing bzhugs pa rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das na mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa/ 
20a1(rgyud): pag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yen pa na klu nor rgyas bsnams pa/ pu pu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don pa'o// lhor bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i rigs yige d+ha
20a2(rgyud): las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma d+he dang ldan pa las/ bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i rigs kyi bdag nyid mi g.yo ba/ bai DUr+ya'i mdog can nyi ma'i snying po la pus mo reg cing
20a3(rgyud): bzhugs pa rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das na mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa phag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yon na klu'i rgyal po'i zhags
20a4(rgyud): pa bsnams pa'o// pu pu zhes bya ba'i sna 'don pa/ nub tu bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i rigs yi ge moM las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma maM dang ldan pa las/ bac+doMs
20a5(rgyud): pad+ma'i rigs kyi bdag nyid can gyi mi g.yo ba byi ru'i mdog can/ nyi ma'i snying po la dbus mo reg cing / bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan
20a6(rgyud): 'das na mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gangs pa/ g.yos na ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yon na klu chu lha bsnams pa/ phu pu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don pa'o// byang du bcom ldan 'das las
20a7(rgyud): kyi rigs yige haM las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma haM dang ldan pa las/ bcom ldan 'das las kyi rigs kyi bdag nyid can gyi mi g.yo ba in+d+ra ni laM'i mdog can nyi ma'i
20a8(rgyud): snying po la dbus mo rag cing bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das na mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yon
20b1(rgyud): na klu'i rigs ldan bsnams pa/ pu pu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don pa/ shar lho mtsham su raM las byung ba'i tri shA la raM gyis mtshan pa dang / ldan pa'i zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'i khams
20b2(rgyud): gsum rnam par rgyal ba g.yas kyi dang pe na tr-i shU la/ g.yon gyi dang po na klu mtha' yas kyi bu/ g.yas g.yon gyi 'og ma na rdo rje dang thod pa bsnams pa'o// lho nub mtsham su
20b3(rgyud): dzaM las byung ba'i dbyug zo ShaM gis mtshan dang ldan pa'i zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'i gshin rje'i gshed po bai DUr+ya'i mdog can g.yas kyi dang po na rdo rje'i dbyug tho// g.yon gyi dang
20b4(rgyud): po na klu dga' bo bsnam so// g.yas g.yo na gyi 'og ma gnyis na mtho ba pur bu bsnams pa/ nub bang ma tsham su Na las byung ba'i kha T+wAM ga Na'i mtshan pa dang ldan pa'i
20b5(rgyud): zhal gau cig phyag bzhi pa'i rta mgrin gyi chu mdog can/ g.yas kyi dang po ni kha T+wAM ga/ g.yon gyi dang pon klu pad+ma chen po bsdams pa/ ga~M yas g.yon gyi 'og man ldag
20b6(rgyud): sgrogs bsnams pa'o// byang shar mtsham su hUM las byung ba'i bcon hUM gis mtshan pa dang ldan pa'i zhal cig phyag bzhi pa'i bdud rtsi 'khyil pa in+d+ra nI la'i mdog can// g.yas
20b7(rgyud): dang po na ba con// g.yen gyi dang po na klu stobs kyi rgyu bsnams pa/ g.yas g.yon gyi tha ma gnyis bsnol nas bsdogs pa'o// shar lho'i gru chad la lha mo bdug pa ma mdog mthing
20b8(rgyud): ka spes por 'dzin pa dang ldan pa/ lho nub tu lha mo me tog ma mdog dkar mo me tog 'dzin pa dang ldan pa'o// nub byang du lha mo mar me 'dzin/ byang shar du lha mo di chi bi ma ljang ku dri chu bsdus
21a1(rgyud): / pa'o// de dag ni gzhon nu lang tshe la bab pa/ mdzes pa'i tshul can hUM las bskyed par bya'o// shar phyogasu lha mo rta'i gdong can kha dog dkar po lcags kyu bsnams pa
21a2(rgyud): lho phyogasu lha mo gser gyi mdog can zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// nub phyogasu lha mo dmar mo lcags sgrog 'dzin pa'o// byang phyogasu lha mo ljang ku dril bu 'dzin pa'o// de dag ni cung zhig
21a3(rgyud): khros pa'i tshul can gyi phaT las bskyed par bya'o// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin las yongasu gnas par bsgom par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par brjod pa
21a4(rgyud): gzungs 'di gsungaso// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ na maHsa man+ta badz+ra nAM/ trai lo kya bi dzA ya hUM phaT/ na maHsa man+ta badz+ra nAM a kro d+hi ka ya mAM ta kaH
21a5(rgyud): phaT/ na maHsa man+ta badz+rA nAM/ badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya? grA ga hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ na maHsa man+ta badz+ra nAM/ tra tha a mo g+ha a mr-i ti kuN+Da li hUM phaT/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ tra tha3
21a6(rgyud): a tsa la tsa ta da ha da ha hUM phaT/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ tra tha rat+na a tsa la pa tsa hUM phaT/ nA maHsa man+te bud+d+hA naM/ tra tha pad+ma a tsa la tsa la ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ta thaM e mo g+ha
21a7(rgyud): karma a tsa la ha na ha na/ hUM phaT/ zhes bya ba gsungs te/ lha dang lha ma yin dang / me'i ma ci dang / lto 'phye chen pi dang / lha dang klu dang / ma rung saM paM dang / sdang ba rnams zhi bar byed cing sdig pa
21a8(rgyud): dman pa'i las rnams dag par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi nang du gzungs sdig 'i bka' stsal to/ 
21b1(rgyud): na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na a tsa la ka na/ tsat+ta tsaN+Da/ na tan ta/ ma ta Ta ma ta Ta/ mo Ta ta mo Ta ta/ sha ta sha ta/ Ta ta Ta ta/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ mo ha mo ha/ mo ha sarba pA paM ka ra/ ha sa
21b2(rgyud): ha sa/ badz+ra ha sa aM mai g+ha ku ru ha sa ha sa/ marta marta/ gardza gardza/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ a bi sha ya a bi sha ya/ ma hA man+ta ba la ka/ dun du na/ ti ni ti ni/ kha da kha da sarba big+h+nAM/ mA
21b3(rgyud): ra ya mA ra ya/ sarba duSh+TAn b+haSh+pa b+ha kA/ sarba big+h+nAM/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA bi shAM/ sarba pA paM/ mahA badz+ra/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ hrIHba li tar g+ha na ta ka/ hUM hUM maM ma he haM/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ma hAH
21b4(rgyud): ma hA ro Sha NA ya/ a me g+hA a hi/ a pra tihaM ta a hi/ a tsa le tse ba a nan+ta ka nAM/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Ta/ tsa ru tsa ru/ tidi TaM ta/ ta Ta ta ta/ big+h+nAM g+hA ta ya/ mA ra la/ khA da ya/ s+pho Te ye/ sa tsa
21b5(rgyud): a nu ban+d+ha/ adz+nyA ku ru ku ru/ a ha sa/ a dan kraka ta ma Ta sa Ta ma rbA taM/ a ti ba la oM ti ma hA gu Na ba shi na/ nan+ta naH/ ta/ A bi she ye a tsa la tse ta/ sarba tra/ a nut+ta re/ ka tse/ 
21b6(rgyud): ta ta Ta ta Da/ Da me Da ma/ haM haM/ ma maM/ paT phaT hUM/ na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NAM/ tra a mo g+ha tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM tra ma ya tra ma ya hUM tra Te haM maM/ oM ba lin+ta te dzo ba liM swAhA/ na maHsa man+ta
21b7(rgyud): bud+d+hA nAM/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/ a tsa la tse ta/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya hU~M a sa man+ti ka tra ta/ ma hA pa la/ ShaT+Ta ra man+taM/ aM aM/ haM haM/ shud+d+ha trai lokya tu sh+yaM tu badz+ra/ a pra ti ha ta bi li b+h+yaHna
21b8(rgyud): me dz+wa le ya tra ta/ aT+Ta ha sa na ma hA swA hA// zhes gsungs ma thag tu 'dzam+bu gling na gnas pa'i lha dang / lce ma yin dang / klu dang / gnod skyon dang / srin po dang / mi 'am tsa dang / lto 'phye
22a1(rgyud): / la sogs pa thams cad sreg cing sa la 'gyel bar gyur to// de nas cho ga gsungaso// lcags sna lnga las byas pa'i ral gri khru tshad gsum pa byas te/ sngags
22a2(rgyud): kyi phreng ba maM haM zhes bya ba bkod la/ khru do dang ldan pa'i spos kyis maN+Dal byas te/ mchod pa'i rdzas dang ldan pa'i dro bzhig ste/ gzungs sngags 'di khro brag du brjod cing bzlas
22a3(rgyud): na ral gri na mkha' lo 'phags par 'gyuraro// de nas g.yul du zhugs na dpag bsam gyi shing yang dum bu dam bur gcod par 'gyur te/ g.yul las rgyal bar byedo// lcags
22a4(rgyud): sna lnga las byas pa'i lhung bzad byas te/ maM haM zhes bya ba'i yig bkod/ gser dang / dngul dang / zangs la sa byas pa'i bum par gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dpal
22a5(rgyud): be'u dang / me tog dang / 'khor lo dang / nya dang dung g.yo su 'khyil ba rnams dang / byi ru bcug pa 'am/ yang na zangs la byi ru bcug la byas la gzungs sngags 'di
22a6(rgyud): gro ga 'am ras la bris te/ khong pa 'am mgul du btags nasau gzungs sngags bye ba bzlas na lhung bzad na mkha' la 'phags te/ gsol bo btab na 'dod pa'i yon+ta ci'o// 
22a7(rgyud): pa 'byung ste/ ljon pa'i shing bzhi no// na mkha'i tri ta'i lce dang / 'ug pa'i mag dang / gnyis cha mnyam pa dang / lcags sna gsum gyi phye ma la khwa ta'i khrag gis rol bu bdun nam
22a8(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa gcig byas te/ thod pa dum bu gcig par bcug la gzungs sngags haM maM zhes bya bas pad+ma la bskor te/ gzungs sngags bye ba bzlas na pad+ma na mkha' la 'phags/ 
22b1(rgyud): te/ nga mi dbugs dang bral ma thag tu snying khrag rlabs dang sbar te/ mig ni snang byed du bsam zhing ral gri'i phyag rgyas mig dang rna ba la bskus na thams cad mthong zhing thos la// khar bcug
22b2(rgyud): na rang nyid sus kyang mi mthong bar 'gyuraro// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ sarba ta tha ga ta ba li ki te/ dza ya dza ya/ bAkye dam na wa ni tsak+Shur bi sho d+ha ya swAhA/ rnga lpags la bya rgod kyi tshil bu b+h+ya
22b3(rgyud): nas mnyes te/ lham byas la/ haM dang maM rang gi rkang 'thil la bris te/ gzungs sngags pa ba bzlas na lham na mkha' la 'phags te/ rkang pa la bya rgod kyi tshil bu byugs nas gon na gar
22b4(rgyud): 'dod par byi ni// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ oM br-i ma hA ye gr-i ta swA hA/ zhes bya bas na mkha' la 'gro zhing 'pha gas te/ bya rgod bzhin du'o// skye ba bdun pa'i sha dang / bya rgod
22b5(rgyud): kyi sha dang / rtsangs pa'i sha dang / sbrang rtso rnas sbyar la 'dagu byas te/ gzungs sngags bye ba brjod de lus la byugs nas ram nye ba dang nyi'u shing pa dang / pra ma ka ra'i ma
22b6(rgyud): dang sbyar ba'i 'degu rnams nang ra la srang re cha sbrang rtsi dang / ba ser skya'i 'o ma rnams btang ste/ zla ba gcig tu bsgrubs na na mkha' la thogs pa medado// rta nag po'i mig gnyis kar po'am
22b7(rgyud): byi ba nag po rna ba gnyis dkar po 'am/ pa bang dkar po rnams mi mngal nas skra dkar po'i srog chags la rma bye'i chu 'khar per du blugs pa la gzungs sngags bye ba bzlas te blud la/ 
22b8(rgyud): de'i mig gnyis ma nor bar gton pa grib ma la bskams nas ma rul ba'i phyi ma la sngags 'di btab te/ g.yas g.yon ma nor bar byugs na thams cad mkhyen par 'gyuraro// 'phags
23a1(rgyud): pa'i spyan dang ldan par 'gyuraro// mon spos dang / gi wang dang / stag ma'i shun pa dang / nya khris dang / ru ta dang / pug ron gyi mig dang / lha dang / go ro tsa na dang / rtug pa
23a2(rgyud): rnams la ril bu byas te/ khams pa'i ga'ur ril bu re ra la gzungs sngags haM maM zhes pa ba brjod/ ga'u na mkha' la 'phags nas/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ na maHyaM na ma hA
23a3(rgyud): ri bi ni nat+ti hrIHzhes lan bdun btab nas byin na gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// bya rgod dang / bya gag dang / khra dang / stag dang / spyang ki dang / wa dang / da rnams kyi mche ba dang / sder ma
23a4(rgyud): dang / bram ze rus pa'i thal be la ga/ thugs sngags bzlas te/ sgrub pa byas na dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang / srer bdag la gautor na sprin rnams 'thor zhing ser ba dang / 'brug
23a5(rgyud): dang thog la sogs pa zhi par 'gyur/ gcan zan thams cad dang / sha za thams cad dang / khyi dang / bag dang / rnga mo'i rtug pa dang / gu gul dang sbyar te/ dud pas bdugs
23a6(rgyud): na dom kun 'bros par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u bdun pa'o// // oM tsaN+Da ma hA roSha Na hUM phaT/ gzung smra 'di ni sde kye rgyal po ste/ lan cig brjed
23a7(rgyud): phas kyang 'dzam+bu'i gling gi lha dang / klu dang gnod sgron la sogs pa kun zhi bar 'gyuraro// rims nyin gcig pa dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / zla ba gcig pa dang / ldang dub pa dang / rtag pa'i
23a8(rgyud): rims dang / yud tsam pa las thar// 'brum bu dang / lha gor dang / shu ba dang / ma dpal dang / g.yan pa dag zhi bar 'gyuraro// lan cog brjod pas kyang / mtshams med pa la sog/ 
23b1(rgyud): pa'i sdig pa zhi bar 'gyuraro// rig byed tshig gi dang po dang / gnyis pa'i dang por bcas pa ni// gsum pa dag ni lnga par ldan/ bzhi pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / lnga pa dag gi lnga pa'o/ 
23b2(rgyud): ung+ga'i rnams kyi bzhi pa dang / mthar gnas pa yaM gnyis pa ni/ o yis mtshan pa bri bya ste/ uSh+ma rnams kyis gnyis pa dang / bzhi pa'i yig lnga pa dang / uSh+ma yi ge bzhi pa/ 
23b3(rgyud): lang u yis rgyan cing thig lar bcas pa'o// snga tshan lnga pa dag gi ni/ dang po'i yi ge spangs pa dang / bzhi pa dang por bcas pa ni snying po'i yig bcu pa dag go// 'khor lo rtsabs
23b4(rgyud): bcu pa bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas pa bris te/ khyi nag be ri zod pa'i nang du bcug la/ gzungs sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ nyungs kar gyis brabs par bya'o// 
23b5(rgyud): nas klu yod pa'i gan su khyer la rang gau lus la gla rtsis byugs te/ chu mig tu thod pa bcug la gzungs sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// na mo rat+na ta yA ya/ 
23b6(rgyud): na ma sh+tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha NahUM phaT/ na mo b+ha ga ta bud+d+ha bA rI ya/ trad+ya thA/ pu Ta pu Ta/ b+hai ra b+ha ra/ mi li mi li/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ phyag rgya ni sor mo rnams brkyang ste/ mthe'u chung bkug
23b7(rgyud): la mthe bos maran te bskor bar bye'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mash+tsaN+Da badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba na mi mi li tsi li d+hi/ ban+d+ha ya/ kro d+ha ya/ badz+ra la ma ya/ ma ka nA ya/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ 
23b8(rgyud): pra dz+wa la pra dz+wa la/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/ sarba nA ga ban d+ha ban+d+ha/ nA ga na~M sa ra sa ra/ bi sa ra sarba duSh+Ta~M hrid ya/ sho Sha Na hUM hUM phaT/ phyag rgya ni lag pa'i zur gnyis gshibs te/ srin
24a1(rgyud): / lag gnyis rgyab tu bsnol la 'dzub mo gnyis kyis mnan nas mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs sbeng la gung mo dang mthe bong gnyis gshibs te spyi bor bzhag nas/ sngags
24a2(rgyud): lan bdun brjod ldang bar bya'o// gu gul dang / yungs kar dang / shing kun dang / dri chen dang / nya' mkhris pa dang / sgo skya dang / shu dag rnams sbyar te lus la byugs nas rdzas kyis srung ba'o// 
24a3(rgyud): rgya sol gyi me la bsregs te bdugs na ser ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung rnams zhi bar 'gyur zhing gdon rnams 'bros par 'gyuraro// zho dang 'o ma dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / bu ram dang
24a4(rgyud): kha ra dang / 'bras yos dang / dung dang / mtshal dang / rgya mtsho'i sbu ba la sogs pa dag 'khar gzhong du blugs te/ yungs kar la gzungs sngags 'di brjod cing // klu mchod
24a5(rgyud): par bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra k+Sha/ d+hA hU hU tad+ya thA/ oM a nan+ta ka/ tak+Sha ka/ shaM kha bA la/ bA su~M kaM/ ma hA pad+ma/ oM ga ta ba la wa ta/ ka rko Ta pu swA hA/ nis brjod
24a6(rgyud): bas klu rnams bde ba dang ldan par 'gyuraro// char dbab par 'dod ni dro zhim po'i chus maN+Dal bas te/ spu tshil la k+Sha'i gzugs sor me nyo shu rtsa lnga pa byas nas maN+Dal gyi steng du ma tog gto
24a7(rgyud): la gzungs thag btags te bzhag par bya'o// snying khar gong gi de go ga la gi'u wang gis bris la bzhugs par byas/ nyin mtshan du mchod cing bal po sa'u yaM lcag mas khyab par byas
24a8(rgyud): nas bzungs 'di brjod par bya'o// oM suM su pra ti badz+ra dud+d+he mi li mo lo ba ri sha ya/ ba ri sha ya swA hA/ zhes brjod/ rang bsnyung bar gnas par bya'o// gal te klu rnams kyis char mi 'bebs
24b1(rgyud): na k+Sha rnams kyi mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du 'gas par 'gyuraro// spos kyi maN+Dal bas te/ rgya spos kyi ma la gzugs bsro ning gzungs sngags brjod pa ni spogs pa'i cho ga'o// 
24b2(rgyud): zhim po'i me la bu ram dang / sbrang rtsi dang / kha ra dang / til la sogs pa'i dgang blugs kyi bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bya ste/ oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA zhes bya bas ma
24b3(rgyud): par bya'o// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs le'u brgyad pa'o// // de nas 'dam skyes pad+ma sna tshogs pa'i 'dab ma can gyi stang du a las byung ba'i tshe'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i stang
24b4(rgyud): du muM go sa bon las byung ba'i shes rab kyi ma tshan pa muM dang ldan pa las 'phags pa 'jam dpal mgon po 'i sku byis pa lo brgyad gnyis lon pa lta bu/ gser bcom
24b5(rgyud): 'am gur gum gyi kha dog 'dra ba/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sems dpa'i skyil mo dkrung gis bzhugs ba la phyag g.yas pa na ral gri nam mkha' la 'phyar ba/ 
24b6(rgyud): gsen pas bi ti thugs kar 'dzin pa'o// shar gyi pad+ma'i mdab ma la/ 'jam dpal dpa' bo sku mdog kha be la gur gum gyis gtor ba 'dra ba'i zhal gcog phyag gnyis pa/ ses
24b7(rgyud): dpa'i skyil mo krung gi bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas pa na ral gri na mkha' la 'phyar pa/ g.yon pa ni ud pa la'i sdong bu dang bcas pa thugs kha ni 'dzin pa'o// lho'i pad+ma la 'jam dpal
24b8(rgyud): gsung gi dbang phyug sku mngag mthing ka zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas pa na ral gri na mkha' la 'phyar ba/ g.yon pa na
25a1(rgyud): // 'khor lo thugs kha na 'dzin pa'o// nub kyi pad+ma la 'jam dpal rnon po sku mdog byi ru bcag pa lta bu/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sems dpa'i skyil me krung gis
25a2(rgyud): bzhugs pa phyag gnyis na ud pa la gnyis bsnams pa'o// byang gi pad+ma'i mdab ma la 'jamo dpal shes rab ral gri/ sku mdog ljang ku la zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ sa da'i
25a3(rgyud): skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas kyi dang po na ral grin mkha' la 'phyar ba/ g.yon gyi dang po na ud pa la sdong bu dang bcas pa thugs kar 'dzin pa'o// g.yas kyi
25a4(rgyud): 'og ma na mdar 'dzin pa/ g.yon gyi 'og ma na rin po che'i gzhu 'dzin pa'o// sku de dag ni ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad bsal ba'i na mkha' ma lus pa'i 'od kyis
25a5(rgyud): 'gengs pa'i sku'o// oM d+harmad+hA tu bA ga b+da/ ri mu zhes brjod pas shes rab ldan zhing thos pa 'dzin pa dang yid gzhungs par 'gyuraro// rin po che'i bum bcu
25a6(rgyud): gang dang / gur gum dang / a ga ru dang / tsan dan dkar be dang / gA rtsi la sogs pa di zhim po'i chu blugs te/ na maHsa man+ta ta thA ga ti/ b+h+yaHar+had b+h+yaHsa mya kaM bud+d+he b+h+yaHtad+ya thA
25a7(rgyud): oM ku mA ra b+hU tA ya/ d+ha ra Ni/ bi shwa saM b+ha ba/ A gats+tsha ya A gan+d+ha ya/ hu lu hu lu/ bruM br-i bruM/ hUM hrI/ dzo na dzi na/ many+dzu shri ye/ su shri ye/ ta ra ya maM haM/ sarba du/ khi b+h+yaHpaT/ a
25a8(rgyud): mr-i tod b+ha ba/ sa ma yaM sa ma ya/ ud b+ha be/ sarba pA paM me nA sha ya swA hA/ zhes gzungs sngags 'di bum pa'i tshul lan bdun brjod de// khrus byas na ldog pa thaMd 'dag par
25b1(rgyud): 'gyur/ dbang po che zhing thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur// na maHsarba ta thAg tA ya/ arbad b+h+yaHsa myakr-i bud+d+hA ya/ na mo many+dzu shri ye bo d+hi satwA ya/ dad+ya thA/ oM many+dzu g+ho Sha/ ha na ha na/ pa tsa
25b2(rgyud): ba tse ma TA ma Ta/ ma tha ma tha/ bi d+h+waM sa ya/ ka ra ka ra/ tu tra tu tra/ b+han+te b+hany+dzi/ a bi sha yaM/ u bi sha yaM/ tu tratratra/ tweT tu Ta/ s+phu Ta sa s+phu Ta sa/ hri da ya sad+d+ha ni/ na maHsaM bo d+ha nipra
25b3(rgyud): be sha ya/ lo hu ta lo hu ta/ kr-i te kr-i ti/ pra ban+d+ha pra ban+d+ha/ a be sha ya a be she ya/ haM maM sarba big+h+nAM/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAtAM/ zhes bya bas nad pa la 'bras kyi snye ma 'am/ til btab ste khras
25b4(rgyud): bya'o/ gzungs bzlas pa'i khrus byas pas/ las dang nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par smin pa'i sdug bsngal las thar par 'gyuraro// ka ra'i shing gi ma la sbyin sreg pas
25b5(rgyud): na yang zhi bar 'gyuraro// ral gI la btab gsu la du zhugs na g.yul las rgyal bar 'gyuraro// spang ba dang ldan pas sku gzugs kyi mdun du bsgrub por bya zhing 'a
25b6(rgyud): pa la gsel ba gdab par bya'o// gro ga 'am ras la bris te/ sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa la btags par bya'o// skud pa la gzungs sngags btab ste mdud pa bas la srid kyis
25b7(rgyud): gdung pa la btags te/ 'phags pa la gsol ba gdab par bye'o// rigs kyi bu 'am/ bu mo dag sbyang bas 'dug ste/ yi dam du 'don na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / shaH
25b8(rgyud): la sogs pa'i gnod pa mi 'byung // gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / lci 'bab pa dang / dus mi yin pa'i 'chi ba dag las grol bar 'gyur/ stag dang / dom dang / dred la sogs pa'i dud 'a/ 
26a1(rgyud): dag gi gnod pa dang / rlung dang / ser ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i sa g.yo ba rnams zhi bar 'gyuraro// yid gzhungs shing thos pa 'dzin pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i bag chags
26a2(rgyud): spong ba la gzhol bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa'i sku thams cad thogs pa med pa'i spyan gyis mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang bu mo dag gis 'di lan gcig gam/ lan gsum ma
26a3(rgyud): bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ brgya rtsa brgyad du brjod par byed na de'i lus lo mdza dang / phol mig dang / 'bras dang / shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang / lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang / 
26a4(rgyud): mig dang rna ba'i dang / son pa la sogs pa da ga mi 'byung ngo zhes gsung so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sa zhal 'dzum pa mdzad/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo kun nas
26a5(rgyud): 'jug pa'i 'od ces pa pa'i ting 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag ste/ sems can dmyal ba dang / yi drags dang / dud 'gro dang / gling bzhi'i mi'i 'jigs rten du 'od
26a6(rgyud): kyis khyab par mdzad// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa'i gnas man chad
26a7(rgyud): khyab par mdzad// bsam gtan dang po'i ting 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag/ bsam gtan dang po nas langs te/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la mnyam par gzho'o// gnyis pa las ladra/ 
26a8(rgyud): tau bsam gtan gsum pa la mnyam par gzha'o// gsum pa las langs nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la mnyam par gzhag/ bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs nas na mkha'/ 
26b1(rgyud): mtha' yas skye mched la mnyam par gzhago// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la mnyam par gan go/ rnam shes mtha' yas
26b2(rgyud): skye mched las langs nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched la mnyam par gzhago/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched las langs na yid min med min skye mched la mnyam par gzhag go/ 
26b3(rgyud): de las langs nas de bzhin nyid kyi ting 'dzin la mnyam par gzhago/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ting 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / na mkha'
26b4(rgyud): snying po dang / sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang / 2rngam dpal dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyugs dang phyag na/ rdo rje dang / byams pa la sogs pa rnams mngon par dga'o// 
26b5(rgyud): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / ma 'am ci dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon pa
26b6(rgyud): bsted// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u dgu pa'o// // 'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs// rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA shrI mi tra dang / bong
26b7(rgyud): kyi le tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya badz+ra kro d+ha rA dzA kalpa la g+hA tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rdo rje khri
26b8(rgyud): po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi
27a1(rgyud): na mkha'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor rdo rje snying por byin gyis brlabs pa'i steng du rin po che sna bdun las grub pa lha'i gzhal mad khang bye ba phrag brgyad cus bskor ba'i
27a2(rgyud): dbus dpag tshad 'bum breg khyab pa'i khang pa brtsegs ma shin tu thob/ kun kyang rin po che du ma'i khri pad+ma dang seng ges mthe ba dbu rtse rin po che du ma'i khri pad+ma dang sing+ges mtho ba dang
27a3(rgyud): rtse rin po tsha zur mangs kyi mchod rten pad+ma/ 'khor lo dang / gdugs mtho bar drangs pa la dar gyi sbyangs lding ba// de'i gribi ma sa gzhi la bkod pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnas
27a4(rgyud): lha'i gzhon pa las babs nas nang du gshe gas pa/ sna tshogs dril bu dang / ba dan dang rin po che'o me te gi phreng ba dang / dra ba dang / dra ba byed pa dang /  ba zla byed pas
27a5(rgyud): phyad pa dang / chu 'phyang shar bu la sogs pa du mas mdzes pa/ sgo khyud khyams dang / sgo glegs dang / rin bo che'i me long dang / gdugs la sogs pa du mas/ 
27a6(rgyud): ba rin po che'i pheM gu brtsigs te mdzes par byas pa du ma de thams cad dbusu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang / lhan cig tu bzhug so// de yang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sede
27a7(rgyud): tshogs ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / 'jam dpal dang / kun tu bzang po dang / byams pa dang / sgribs pa thaMd rnam par sel ba dang / zhi ba'i blo gros da/ 
27a8(rgyud): sna tshogs bkram pa dang / mkha' 'dod me tog 'chad pa dang / na mkha'i snying po dang / gzugs mdzes dag pa dang / sa'i stong po dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub se da sa
27b1(rgyud): chen po bye ba phrag bdun dang / shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dag la dang / rta thul dang / 'od srung la sogs pa bye ba phrag bzhi dang / grags chen snyan pa chen po brgya byin dang / tshang ba dang / khyab 'jug
27b2(rgyud): dang / dbang phyug dang / lus ngan pa dang / gshin rje dang / dga' rab dbang phyug la sogs pa lha'i rigs sum brgya dang lhan cig tu chos kyi rnams grangs gsang sngags zhes bya ba la
27b3(rgyud): 'jug pa gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams la dgongs pa tha dad kyi bsam pa dang 'thun pa'i
27b4(rgyud): bkodade pa chen po bskyod pa dang / tshe 'phrul du ma bsgyur ba dang / 'od zer du mo 'gyed cing thabs gcig tu bzhugs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'dzum bzhin du 'khor la gzi
27b5(rgyud): nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram te/ byang rgyu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ yi ge mang tshig dag gi sgos// sngags dbyibs
27b6(rgyud): cho su byin rlabs kyis/ yi ge sgra tsam phyed de ma gcig/ mngon sum rjes 'jug rang thung dang / dbyangs dang gsal byed mtshon mas mtshan// sa bcu pha rol phyin bcu bdag/ dbang bcu
27b7(rgyud): don bcu rnam pa bcu// mi 'jigs bzhi dang ma 'dres chos// byams dang thugs rje chen po dag/ dbyangs gcig gis ni sngags gyis// sdug bsngal sna tshogs rab zhi dang / yid 'phrog dpal
27b8(rgyud): 'byer dbang phyug dang / mthu stobs ma bskyed pa dang // rtag gnas thob dang don ngas thob/ rdo rje bla na med sems bskyed// mdor na gang gis gang 'dod pa/ bsam pas sems rnams rdzogs
28a1(rgyud): pa'i phyir// rdo rje bla na med pa gsor// chosu bla na med pa sgregs// 'khor lo bla na med pa bskor// ral gri bla na med bzung // pad+ma bla na med pa chongs// rin chen bla med gsal bar
28a2(rgyud): gyis dkyil 'khor tshul du spros nas kyang // mchod rten tshul du bsdu bar bgyis// lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang // lha min mkha' lding mi 'am ci// srin po sha za brjid byad tshogs// 'jigs pa dag
28a3(rgyud): kyang 'jigs gyur pa'i// rnam 'phrul du ma 'di bsgyur cig/ gsung mchog de skad thos ma theg/ lag na rdo rje mthu bo ches/ dga' mgu thal mo rab sbyar te// snyan pa'i tshig gis 'di gsol to// 
28a4(rgyud): gser dang rin chen lnga po las// rab mchog ri bor gyur pa las// 'gro rnams kun gyi rten gnas dang / rtagasu yang dag 'dzin pa ltar// rnam par shes dang phung po bzhi/ 'byung ba rna
28a5(rgyud): dag bsgrubs pas// lha dang phyag rgya phrin la su/ sngags shes rnams kyis bzung byas nas// brtul ba'i ye shes bya chub rim// khyad par de la ldan par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan du
28a6(rgyud): pa che/ kun mkhyen ye shes gtso bo ches// sku las sna tshogs mdangs 'od can// 'od zer du ma byung nas kyang // gzhi dang snying po me togs// rgyan pa'i zhing rnams khyab byas che// sa yang rnam pa drug tu
28a7(rgyud): g.yos// 'jig rten skyong dang bdun gyi tshogs// ma lus pa rnams rgyal bar 'gyur// nyan thos rang rgyal 'dar bar gyur// byang chub seda' blo ldan gyi// tshegs rnams shin tu skrag par gyur// de tshe byan
28a8(rgyud): bcu'i zhing rnams nas// sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzod bu nas// khro bo chen po'i tshigs byung ba// 'od zer rtse mos drangs na su// zhing dbus dkyil 'khor 'di ru lhags// 'od zer tsho gas kyang rab 'dus
28b1(rgyud): nasad/ dpal be'u nyi du thim par gyur// de tshe 'od da'i byin rlabs las// mkha' la sgra 'di grags par gyur// shAkya'i mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas// gang du gzi brjid che bzhugs smad// chos kyi phyis
28b2(rgyud): las byung ba yi// rgyal ba'i sras po thang gshegs// dri ma med pa'i dam chos mchog/ gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul dge ba// thos nas byang chub 'dus ma byas// 'jig rten mgon pa bsnyed par gyur
28b3(rgyud): de nas lag na rdo rje tshogs// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tha~Md kyang // snyim pa me tog bkang byas te/ gtor nas phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas// dang zhing gus pa'i tshul gyi su// dbus gtsug thal sbar gso
28b4(rgyud): ba 'debs// mi gnas ye shes che ba'i mchog/ yon rgya mtsho 'byung ba'i gtso// mtshan nyid thams cad rab rgyan pa// mtsha na min spangs pa'i thub pa tshe// dri med dag pa ji ltar lagaso/ gas
28b5(rgyud): sngags tshul du spyod pa ci// 'dus ma byas pa'i byang chub gang / 'jig rten mgon po ji ltar 'gyur/ bdag cag rnam la sman rab dang // 'gro la thugs che mdzad phyir// mgon pa
28b6(rgyud): ldan thub po che// ling dang yang du bshadu gsol// de nas yang dge rdzogs sangs rgyas// rkang gnyis gtso bos bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin// shes rab chen po'i spyan ldan pa
28b7(rgyud): bdag gzhan phan don la brtson phyir// legs par nyon la yid la zung // yang dag yang dag mtha' min tshul// da ni nga yis bshad par bya// srog gcod ma byin lan brdzun 'khrig tshi gau rtsur
28b8(rgyud): dang ngag kyal smra/ brnab sems gnod sems log lha chang / dri re ngon pa'i zas skom dang // srog can sha khrag log 'tshor bcas// slob dpon dge 'dun mchod rten sogs/ khyad par
