29a1(rgyud): // yul can yo byad dang // dmar zhing nyams thag phrog dgu pa// glegs pas 'tshong dang chos kyi zong // g.yang sa ral gri so dgu sogs// me 'obs ltar mthong spangs nas kyang // rnar
29a2(rgyud): dkar la sogs par bya// yig 'dri mchod sbyir rtsol dang // nyan dang 'dzin dang klog pa dang // mchod pa dang ni kha ton dang // de dag sems dang sgom pa ste/ dkar bcu lam la yun rings dang // du
29a3(rgyud): bcus rgyun mi 'chang du 'bad// gtan pa med pa'i byang chub sems// shel ltar dri ma med pa'o// mchog 'di spyad pas sdug bsngal tshogs// myur du gcod pas dge ba'o// chos bdag med
29a4(rgyud): dang mnyam nyid dang // rang sems gdod nas dag ba gang // sgyu 'ang 'du byed med pa dang / zag bcas de dang bral ba las/ byang chub phyogs mos ma lus pa// chos nyid bdag med spyod pa
29a5(rgyud): ni chos dbyings ye shes mngon byas nas// ma 'dras ches rnams rdzogs gsal ba// 'dus ma byas kyi byang chub ste// chos rnams kun gyi gzhi luso// 'dod pa khams
29a6(rgyud): stogs yon tan la// shin tu bde rol spyad pa spyod// sangs rgyas mu stegs can rnams kyi// lkog tu gyur pa gsang ba ste// bskal pa bsam yas dpag mdu// brlabs dka' yangs zab
29a7(rgyud): rgya chen rnams// sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin du// lus ngag yid la gang gnas pa// dbyer med tshul du slob pas na// sangs rgyas kun gyis sngagasu brjod// mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa'i sku
29a8(rgyud): ston mthara' dag rdzogs pa ni// bden pa gnyis la gnas pa yi// byang chub sengar rnams kyi mgon// la la 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gzugs// la lar dge sbyong chen po'i gzugs// la la
29b1(rgyud): srin po srin mo'i gzugs/ la la gro ba bzang po'i gzugs// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang // seng+ge ltar gzigs mdzod la sogs// sna tshogs du ma mdzad pa ni// rkang gnyis lha min
29b2(rgyud): rnams gnyis sogs// 'gro ba'i mgon por gyur pa'o// rtag dang 'dra dang nges med pa'i// gtso bo bsam pas gyur pa rnams// 'jig rten phal pa'i mgon po ste// gzugs byed kha
29b3(rgyud): dog tha dad pa// yul dus rnam pa'i bye brag gis// grangs ma byung ba mchod 'os// thub pas gsungs pa'i de ma thag/ rdo rje can gyis bzhengs nas kyang // phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas
29b4(rgyud): ni// spyad sngar 'dug nas 'di skad gsal// 'dre na pa gtso bos bcom ldan 'das// sngags zhes pa ni gang gang mi na// phyag rgya zhes ni ci lta bu// ting 'dzin zhes ni ji ltar ba
29b5(rgyud): lus ngag yid la ji ltar gnas// dbyer med na la du ji ltar skyobs// bdag la phan pa'i don phyir dang // gzhan la brtse phyir bshadu gsol// de nas rgyal ba gtso mtshogs
29b6(rgyud): ni/ ljags kyi dbang po bkram byas te// tshangs pa chen po'i gsung snyan gyis// rnam rtogs zad phyir 'di gsungaso// snying po nyi snying rtsa ba'i sngags// las kyi sngagasu gyur pa ste// snying
29b7(rgyud): po brjod par sa bo no// nya snying ye shes mchog dang ni// gsang ba'i snying po zhes grag so// las kyi sngags ni gnyis yin te// bdag nyid brtan byed las sngags dang // sbyar tshogs grub pa
29b8(rgyud): byed pa'o// phyag rgya lag pa'i 'du byed dang // rkang pa stabs kyi 'gyur ba'o// rtag su mtshon dang 'debs pa dang // 'gyur ba med par byed pas na// phyag rgya zhesu bshad pa'o// rang gi rtsa ba
30a1(rgyud): sems bsdus na// sems la lhag pa'i chos 'bebs pa// de ni ting 'dzin zhes bya// de ltar de dag la brten nas// snga ma'i gnas de yongs gyur nas// sgo nga bral ba'i
30a2(rgyud): 'dab bzang ltar// lus 'di mkhar la char song nas// rgyal ba'i zhing khams thams cad// rgyal dam chos mnyan nas kyang // rgyal sras kun la bshad pa dang // skad cig mkhyen pa'i shes pas
30a3(rgyud): kyang / shes bya ma lus phyogs khyab pa// lus ngag yid la gnas pa'o// sems dang yid ni 'das pa'i tshe// ye shes bde bar shar ba ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas thaMd kyis// dbyer med tshul du
30a4(rgyud): skyob ces gsungs// 'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal bo'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las lhag par gnas pa'i don yongasu bkod pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // zhi bas btul
30a5(rgyud): dka' bgegs chen dang // log 'dren de rnams 'dul ba'i phyir// sems kyi bye brag thugs chud nas// de dang ga/ zugs 'dral gzhom pa'i phyir// rtog med na mkha'i lam gan+da
30a6(rgyud): te/ rdzogs sangs gdul dka' mjed sku// rab 'phags khro bo stobs chen dpal// sangs rgyas kun gyi sras kyi sras// mi g.yo'i mtshan grags de la 'dir// rgyal dang rgyal sras rtag
30a7(rgyud): phyag 'tshal// tshangs sogs lha dang lus can kun// de la rtag tu mchod par byed// rgyal bas byas bzo rgyal sras kyi// smon rdzogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// ye shes rdzogs nas mi
30a8(rgyud): g.yo'i sa// thob pas mi g.yo ba zhes bya// phas kyi rgol 'joms dpa' bo ste// tshar gcod pa ni khro bo yin// sngags kyi bden tshig mi slu bas// nyan thos bdud tshogs kyis ma
30b1(rgyud): g.yod rtog mang bdud rtsi khro bas rgyal// rdzu 'phrul bskyod med mi g.yo ba// de bzhin nyid kyi snying po mchog/ stong nyid las byung rgyal ba'i sku// chos dbyings bdag nyid la bzhugs nas// sprul
30b2(rgyud): 'dis srid pa'i khams sbyor mdzad// mkha' ltar dri mang spros bral bas// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung // spos med na mkha'i ring bzhin la// tha dad tsam du gsang sngags nas
30b3(rgyud): brjod kyang ngag gi spyod yul 'das// skyob pas tha snyad rtogs phyir gsungs// sems med rang bzhin stong pa nyid// smra 'drar yid kyis sgom pa yin// dngos med mnyam mdzes 'dod don rnas
30b4(rgyud): gsang sngags mgon 'dis brjod pas stsol// mu stegs bdag dang srog gang zag/ gtso bo skyes bu khyab gnas bus// 'khor brtag rtog nga rgyal rmongs// log pa'i zhags
30b5(rgyud): bcings sdug bsngal skyed// bdag med srog med sen med// byed po med cing gtso bo med// khyab gnas med cing dngos po med// rdzas la sogs pa'i rang bzhin med// lo// 
30b6(rgyud): rtog srid 'ching zhag bcad phyir// dngos med sna tshogs gzugs bsgoms pas// dngos grol stong nyid go 'phang thob// phyi nang khyad par gom pa'o// dbu ba chu bur smra 'drar sgom// stong
30b7(rgyud): nyid las ldang ting 'dzin gyis// rnam rtog sdig bcings las grol nas// 'chi med ye shes go 'phangs thob// phung po khams dang skye mtshad med// kun gzhi mo de de gang zag med// 
30b8(rgyud): gzung 'dzin med bcings med par// rgyal ba rnams kyis rtag tu bshad// kun med kun bral kun spangs pa'i// stong nyid byang sems smra 'dra bar// bag yod pas ni brtag bsgoms
31a1(rgyud): / byang chub sems kyi myu gu 'char// yid bzhin nor 'dra rdzu 'phrul che// mkha' ltar gos pa med pa'i sku// sngags spyod byang chub seder yi// byang chub sems kyi sgom pa
31a2(rgyud): thob ngo mtshar gsungs te thos ma theg/ khro bo rnams kyis gcol bskyed// rtag tu dag cing dri med pa// rnam rtog rgyun 'gags kun rtog med// rtag rtog med la zhugs pa yis// dpa'
31a3(rgyud): chen po phyag 'tshal bstod// chos kun g.yo ba med pa khyod// spyod yul kun tu legs sbyar bas// kun mkhyen g.yo ba med pa rtog/ rang bzhin spros bral khyod phyag 'tshal// sen snam
31a4(rgyud): pan don du// mdzad spyod sna tshogs gsungs pa'o// dag po'i lam rnams yang dag 'byung // rnam dag sems la phyag 'tsha la bstod// mun pa phra rab rdul spangs pa'i// sgra/ 
31a5(rgyud): bral na mkha' dag po ltar// mgon po khyod sku shel sgong lha ra// kun rtog spangs la phyag 'tshal sdod// spros med na mkha 'a lta bu la/ dngos po theng dang bral bas// phung la
31a6(rgyud): skye mched shin tu dag/ ye shes rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal bstod// mkha' la 'ja' shar sna tshogs ltar// gtso khyod dag pa'i sems can gzigs// ngan 'gro kun sgrol dpa' chen 'khrungs
31a7(rgyud): go cha chen po phyag 'tshal bstod// chos nyid las byung snying po ni// yi ge gcig pa gzi rjid che// sems can sdug bsngal sa gzhi la// mun 'khrig sel la phyag 'tshal bstod// sngag+sa
31a8(rgyud): mchog gtso bo'i gsang ba 'di// rgyal sras chos 'phel shes rab bskyed// bla med go 'phang myur 'gro gsungs// gtso bo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// dngos kun gyur dang bcas/ 
31b1(rgyud): pa yi/ las dang skye las rnam par grol// rgyal ba rgyu med bdag nyid 'khrungs// gtso mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// dngos med ye shes me lce yis// 'dus byas ri bo kun bsregs
31b2(rgyud): nasadatshes dbyings rang bzhin gcig tu rgyal// bla med sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// bstod pa'i don de thugs chud nas// 'gro la phan phyir cho ga gsungs// gsang sngags log par spyod pa dang / 
31b3(rgyud): ser sna log par goms pa las// 'dod pas non pa'i sems rtog gis// sngags pa yi dag gnas skye// dang pos mar me me tog dang // zhal zas gtor ma phreng ba sogs// mchod pa'i rdzas
31b4(rgyud): dang yo byad dang / mi yi lus dang kha zas la// 'tshe zhing sgrub pa bar du gcod// mi sdug nad skyed lo tog 'tshe// gnyis pa gnod sprin 'dra gyur nas// sha khrag chang la snom zhing
31b5(rgyud): rgyag// thos bsam sgrub pa'i bar gcod cing // nad skye tshe len la ga lta skyed// rigs sdug 'chang gi gdon gzhom phyir// sgrub po sa 'bad sngags brjod bya// sngags mthu bskyed
31b6(rgyud): baM gtor ma dang // sbyin sreg phyag rgya sngags btsas dang // mnan pa'i las kyis nags ma ltar// thogs pa med par 'joms par 'gyur// de dag rten byed lha yin te// de gsal byed par sau ras
31b7(rgyud): yind/ de kun rnam dag gsal byed pa// byang chub mes mchog zhi ba ni// log rtog 'khor ba'i zo chun la// ral gri rnon po'i sta re ltar// 'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog par bsdus pa'i rgyud las
31b8(rgyud): de bzhin nyid kyi le'u ste// gnyis pa'o// // de nas sngags dang phyag rgya dag// 'byung bar rab tu bshad par bya// na maHsar+b+ba sA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+ya/ sarba ta thA ga teb+h+ya/ sarba bA hU~M// snying po dma'o// 
32a1(rgyud): / na maHsarbA sA pa ri pA ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ tsan+da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM/ Ta ta tsa maM/ snying po'o// nA maHsarbA sA ba ri bA ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA hAH
32a2(rgyud): a mo g+ha/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM/ tra sa ma ya hUM/ Ta Ta tsa mau nye ba'i snying po'o// na maHsarbA sA bi ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarbA thA a tsa lAng+ka na/ nan+da nan+ta/ mon+na mon+tau/ saT+Ta sana?/ taH
32a3(rgyud): tan+ta/ tiSh+Tha ti ShA A be sha aHmaT/ ma la ka d+ha Na d+ha Na/ ti Ni ti Ni/ khA da khA da/ bi g+hAn/ mA ra mA ra duSh+TAn rak+Sha rak+Sha sa taM/ ku ru ku ru/ ki ri ki ri/ ma hA bi dza ya badz+ra paT/ hU~M hA p+l-i tr-i bi la ter ge/ 
32a4(rgyud): nan+ta ka/ ha~M tsa ha~M/ a tsa la te tse Ta phaT/ a hUM/ a sa man+taka/ TaT/ ma hA ba las twa a ma na yai/  ma~M he/ shud+d+ha tu le ka/ tu thun tu lo kra/ badz+rin maHswa pra ti ha ta ba mai b+h+rU~M/ dz+wa la ma traH
32a5(rgyud): sa ta na maHswA hA/ gsang ba'i snying po'o// de nas phyag rgya ste sa stabs kyis brjod pa 'dir gsung so// na maHsarbA sA ba ri bA ra/ ke b+h+yaHsarba te thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA oM ha na han
32a6(rgyud): mA ra sa mA ra sa/ d+he na/ kha T+wAM ga hU~M phaT/ ral gri'i phyag rgya'i sngag so// na maHsa r+thaswa pa ri bu ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga Ne b+h+yaHsarba thA oM gr-ih+Na gah+Na/ khA da khAdra/ bA sha na/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ mahA Ar+ya ta/ 
32a7(rgyud): d+harma he swA hA/ zhags pa'o// na meHsirbA sA pa ri pU ra kaM b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA oM rak+Sha rak+Sha/ ha na ha na/ kuT+Ta kuT+Ta/ mA ra ya duSh+Ta baM ni ya kaM/ hUM dza go cha'i'o// na maHsarba pa ri pA ra ke b+h+yaH
32a8(rgyud): sarba tathA ge te b+h+ya/ barba thA oM d+ha ra d+ha ra brdzun la/ kha T+wAM ga~M pA sha d+ha ra smA/ gtsug tor gyi'o// na maHsarba sA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaHsarba thA ny+dza ban+d+ha da ha ba tsab+ha smiM ku ru ku ru han ha na rga
32b1(rgyud): gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na phaT/ tho ba'i'o// na maHsarbA sA ba ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba thA oM Sh+TA na ta murti/ da ha da ha/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ bi dza ya kIr+t+ti swA hA/ mgo bo'i phyag rgya'o// na maHsarba
32b2(rgyud): swa ba ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba thA oM b+hu d+ha ra d+ha ra/ a tsin d+ya ba la bi kra me NaM/ bur bu sa la ya/ rak+Sha rak+Sha sarba swAhA/ rdo ba'i phyag rgya'o// na maHsar+b+ba sA pa ri pA ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga
32b3(rgyud): sarba thA oM badz+ra hr-i da ya/ badz+ra ma taM gaM swA hA/ snying kha'i phyag rgya'o// na maHsar+b+ba sA pa ri pU ra ka b+h+yaHsarba ta thA gA te b+h+yaHsarba thA oM hUM da ha da ha/ kiny+tsi rA ya si/ A na ya shI g+h+raM/ rak+Sha rak+Sha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ 
32b4(rgyud): duny+dzan/ da ma da ma swA hA/ phyogs bcing ba'o// na maHsarbA sA ba pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA a~M dun du na ma hA bA sha khi T+wAM ga d+ha ra/ ba ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHbka' rtags kyi
32b5(rgyud): ni maHsarbA swa pa bI rA keb+h+ya/ sarba zhag tshu la yogagan tu/ b+h+r-i Ta/ ma hA sa ma ya/ pa rI bI re ka swAhA/ dri phyag rgya'o// nam sarbaM swa pA yU re ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaH
32b6(rgyud): thA/ oM bo shud+d+ha dz+nyA na rA dza saM b+ha be sa ga na nan hAHswA hA/ ma mo'i phyag rgya'o// na maHsarbA sA pa ri pu ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga Nab+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM shud+d+ha thAH te/ shud+d+ha shud+d+he/ gr-ih+Na gr-ir+b+ha/ sarba swa pa
32b7(rgyud): pU ra ke b+h+yaHswAhA/ gtor ma'i phyag rgya'o// ne meHsarbA sI ba ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM shud+d+ha ma hA dz+nyA na swa b+hA ge/ tiSh+Tha ti lA ma hA na ye swA hA/ bdug pa'i'o// na maHsarbA swa
32b8(rgyud): ri pu ra ka b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM ga ga ni bi krAn ta gI mi ni ma hA shud+d+hA na ya swA hA// me tog ga'o// na meHsarbA sA ba ri pu ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thAHau ha na ha
33a1(rgyud): // pa ra ma bi shud+d+he/ d+harma na ya pa ri pu ra ke b+h+yaHswAhA/ zhal zas kyi'o// na maHsarbA sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba thA/ oM a pra ti hi ho na d+ya ta da ma da ma/ sarba thA/ sa
33a2(rgyud): ri pU ra ke b+h+ya/ swA hAHdpa'i bo spyan drang ba'i'o// na maHsarbA sa pa ro pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM bi shud+d+ha bi shud+d+ha/ sa kra swa b+ha be A na ya/ ma hA ra ye swAhA/ byang chub senga' spun
33a3(rgyud): ba'o// na maHsarbA sA pa ri pu r-i ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thAHoM bau shud d+ha s+yAhA/ he na ho na/ da ma da ma/ ma hA na ye swAhA/ nyan thos spyan drang pa'i ra// na maHsarba sA ba ri pU ra ki b+h+yAMHsarba taMthA
33a4(rgyud): ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM badz+ra kaR+Sha yau/ shrI g+h+raM/ da ha daha/ ba tsa pa tsa/ ma hA pa ri wA ri swA hA/ phonya po mo spyan drang ba'o// na maHsarbA sA pa ri b+hu ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM ma thamatha
33a5(rgyud): An ya~M/ A na ya/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ sarba de gaM ta ma te ma/ ma hA na ya/ ba ri wa ra swA hA/ 'jog rten pa rnams spyan drang ba'i'o// na maHsarba sA pa
33a6(rgyud): bA ra ka b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA oM sat+ya sa t+ya// ma hA sa dA ya/ da ma da ma/ ma hA dam/ A kaR+Sha ya/ a kaR+Sha ya/ a d+yA ba ma hA na ya shud+d+he swAhA/ drang srong spyan drang pa'o// na maHsarbA
33a7(rgyud): sA ba ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM dza ya dza ya/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ ma hA sa t+ya bdi ni/ sarba hi to swA hA// srin mo rnams spyan drang pa'o// na maHsarbA sA pa ri pU ra ka b+h+yaHsa
33a8(rgyud): ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM hrihI dA/ ma~M thA ma thA/ dam dam/ ha na ha na/ ma hAn ya/ ma ra ma ra/ ha swAhA/ ma mo rnams spyan drang ba'o// na maHsa~MrbA sA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsa can
33b1(rgyud): oM san badz+ra hU~M phaT/ sarba duSh+Ta gra ha~M/ ma tham tha/ b+han+d+ha b+hany+dza/ sarba big+h+nAn dam da ma/ sarba duSh+Ta oM hU~M phaT swAt+ma/ rkang stabs tsham ngam gyi sngagaso// na maHsarbA sA pa ri pU re ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya
33b2(rgyud): sarba thA/ oM AHhUM/ A kI shA ga ga na s+pha ra Na kha~M swA hA/  thugs khur ba 'bru sna tshogs// spos dang me tog la sogs pa// ci 'byor 'byer ba'i gtor ma ni// sngags des spro zhing spel bar bya
33b3(rgyud): na maHsarbA sA pa ra pA ra ke b+haHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM s+t+ra b+hA ba sarba thA b+h+ye bAM swA hA/ na maHsarbA sA ba ri pu ri ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM lab+h+yAM sarba ga ga na lab+d+ha ya swAhA
33b4(rgyud): na maHsarbA sA pa ri bA ra ke b+h+yoHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM sarba sid+d+ha/ drA d+ha mi ha~M swA hA/ byin rlabs bzhin du bsgyur ba dang // kun gyi sa thim par bya ba dang / 'dod pa'i las rnaMs gang
33b5(rgyud): grub par bya ba'i sngags yin// gza' tshan brgyad dang rgyu skar yang // nyi shu rtsa brgyad rnams kyi sngags/ na maHsarbA sA ba ri bA ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ A da d+ya
33b6(rgyud): sauHaM gi raHbu d+haHbr-i ha spa ti/ shukraHsha de sh+tsa raHrA hraHke tuHkr-it+ti kA/ ra hai NAM/ mr-i ga shaM rA/ ar+tha pu narba su/ puSh+ya a shwe Sha/ ma g+ha bur+tha palgu nI ut+ta ra phal+la nAM/ hastA/ tsi tA sAsti/ 
33b7(rgyud): bi shA khA a nu rA d+hA dz+ye ny+dza mu lA/ purbA ShA D+hA/ at+ta rA ShAn+ta shra baHa b+hi dzi ta/ sha ta b+hi ShA d+ha niny+dza/ bAr+tha b+ha dra pA dA ut+ta ra b+ha dra/ pra daM bi bi tI/ a shI nI/ b+ha ra Ni/ au dang swe hA ra bcas
33b8(rgyud): pa ni/ rang rang snying po'i sngags yin te// ganga'i'adod las kyang sbyar bar bya// mchod pa'i rigs kyang ba deng bya// namaHsa men+ta kA ya bA kr-it+ta badz+re thAM/ oM a tsa le tsat+ta ma sngo Sha Na s+pho Ta sa
34a1(rgyud): / ka kha haM maM/ ra paHsa man+ta kA ya bAk+Shit+ta badz+rA NAM/ oM badz+ra ka pa tsa du baM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba b+ha ya bi ga te b+hUH bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA khaM rak+Sha/ bahA ba li/ 
34a2(rgyud): ta thA ga te pu N+ya ni rdza te/ hUM hUM tra thA/ a pra ti ha ta swA hA/ khro bo spyan gcig drag shul can// srung dang bcas par mchod pa dang // sngags bzlas dngos grub blangs pas 'grub// ci 'dod las la chos
34a3(rgyud): sbyar/ lag g.yas gud mdzub bzhibs te brkyang // srin lag mtha chung mtheb mas mnan// shugs drangs tshul byung mkha' la 'phyar// ral gi phyag rgyas bdud tshogs 'joms// g.yon pa
34a4(rgyud): khu tshur bsdogs mdzub sgreng // slar sbyar byed bzhags pa'i rgyo// gung mo mthe'u chung so sor sprad// 'dzub mo ming med nang du da gug/ mthe bong gi zhabs pa 'gram sbyar/ snying kha
34a5(rgyud): bkod dgo cha'i rgya// sor 'khyud khu tshur nang du bsdam// mthe ba gnyis cung bsgyur mgo thong rgya// g.yen pa'i khu tshur nang bcu gnas/ mthe bong g.yas sgreng tho ba'i rgya// phyog
34a6(rgyud): bcur brdung ba ltar bya'o// g.yas pa khu tshur gung mo sgras// spyi gtsug phyag rgya gtsug tu bzhag/ g.yon pa khu tshur gung mdzub sbre // bka' rtags phyag rgya rtag tu 'phyar// khu tshur gnyis
34a7(rgyud): bzho bas lte sbyar ba// rde ba lta bu'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas pa khro tshur snying khar bzhag/ snying kha rgyan pa'i phyag rgya'o// la gaM gnyis sor mo so sor brkyang // phyogs bcu bcing ba'o phyag rgya'o// 
34a8(rgyud): lag sbyar gung gnyid nang bcug pa// dri yi phyag rgyar bshad pa'o// kha tshur rgyab sprad gung mthe bong // mthe bong gung mdzub spyad dang 'khyud// gtor ma sbyin pa'i phyag rgya'o// thal mo khong stong
34b1(rgyud): shugs ltar gdon// bdug spos 'bul ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag gnyis so sor gung srin bkug/ mtheb mnan bzhag brkyang me tog rgya// thal sbyar gung srin mdzub mo bkug/ mthe'u chung
34b2(rgyud): mtheb brkyang zhal zas rgya// skyil krung 'dug ta snyim pa zad// mthe bong gnyis ni nang du bkug/ so gzhibs nas g.yab byed pa ni// dpa' be gtse be spyan dang rgya// thal sbyar mdzub bkug me
34b3(rgyud): bes mnan// byang chub sems tshogs 'gugs pa'i rgya// snyim bkyed mthe chung gshibs te brkyang // lhag ma brgyad pa so sor dgug// nyan thos rang rgyal rdzu 'phrul can// ma lus zad 'gug
34b4(rgyud): pa'i rgya// khu tshur g.yas pa g.yon steng bzheg// mdzub gni sa brkyang te so sor dgugs// cung zad spyod par byed pa ni// pho nya po mo 'gugs pa'i rgyu// khu tshur rgyab sprang dung
34b5(rgyud): ni sor drang por gshibs te brkyang // mthab gnyis cung zad smra de 'gugs// 'jig rten pa rnams 'gugs pa'i rgya// g.yon min geyas pas de ltar bya// brtul zhugs dra
34b6(rgyud): srong dgug pa'i rgya// galen pa khu tshur gung mo sbrang // dngos grub srin po 'gug pa'i rgya// lag gangabs bkan te brkyang nas kyang // mthe bos mdzum mnan gsum po g.yab// ma bdun la sogs
34b7(rgyud): ma me rnams// las kyi dusu 'gugs par gyur// res kyis bteb cing drang po yis// pus mo dag la rkang 'thil sbyar// spyi bor me tog thal sbyar yang // phyogs der g.yob cing 'bru tshugs
34b8(rgyud): lta zlum pa'i stabs kyis 'di kun gyis// bgegs tshogs 'joms shing rnal 'byer srung // lag pa g.yas ni gyen du brkyang // g.yon pa snying khang bsdigs mdzub ste// rkang gnyis spa
35a1(rgyud): / nas rting pa rdebs// hUM brjod drag skad bdun du lha// sa gsum g.yo byed zlag ma stabs// rkang g.yon brkyang ba'i stabs dang ni// ha ha brjod cing zhabs rgya bcings// phan / 
35a2(rgyud): bsgo ba nas bgegs la bsnur// 'khor lo phyag rgya phye mar bya// rkang g.yas brkyang ba'i stabs dang ni// rdo rje thal mo mkha' la bsnun// khre gnyer mig can ma mchu mnan// yan lag gnyis gaN+DI
35a3(rgyud): me ltar spyad// rkang pa mnyam stabs hUM sgra can// lag gnyis sdigs mdzub phyag rgya'o// rkang gnyis mnyam gzhag pa las// g.yon bskor lta ba yin// mdun du g.yas te rgyab tu g.yon// rgya
35a4(rgyud): tshom gsum gsum mnan pa ni/ rtsa gsum yin te rtse lasu ma rgya// lag pa stang brkyang daphyogs sgreng ltar// bgegs la bsnan zhing 'bru tshugs bltar// g.ya su tho ba hUM brjod brdeg/ gam
35a5(rgyud): ba snying kha'i bsdigs mdzub ste// gnyis ka bkr-idaM pa 'khor lo bya// nub bltas rkang pa mnyam gzhag nas// mdun g.yas rgyab dang g.yon phyogasu// g.yon pas bgegs gsum
35a6(rgyud): mnan bya zhing // ma pas ma dang ral gri dang // bsdigs mdzub zhags pas phyogs bzhir bcing // ha hUM drug brjod brjid gnod rgya// rkang ginyis pus 'bur lag pa gnyis// gru mo bsgyur na thig gis
35a7(rgyud): mnan// baM gegs bskrad phyir ni 'bru tshogs blta// rtsa gcig rdo rje stabasu bcad// rkang pa g.yas g.yon res kyis bskor// lho byang g.yon te shar nub g.yas// brkyang zhing drag tu brdab par bya
35a8(rgyud): rgyab nas drang dang tho ba dang // rdo rje dang ni zhags pa'i rgya// phyogs bzhir bya ste 'khor lo'i stabs// phyag rgya dang ni stangs stabs kyis// phyogs skyong rnams kyang skrag byed na// 'byung po'i tshogs 'dzin
35b1(rgyud): smos ci dgos// thams cad dbang du sdud par byed// de nas phyogs bcu bcing ba yis// rkang stabs khyad par bshad par bya// shar du rkang pa mnyam pa yis// rdo rje thal mo gyen du brdeg/ lhor ni / 
35b2(rgyud): ting sprad de gdang / hUM sgrogs thal me mdun rgyab sbyar// nub tu rkang sprad lag pa gnyis// so sor bsdigs mdzum gyen du brkyab/ byang du ral gri'i phyag rgya dang // rkang pa ya gcig sa la sgreng
35b3(rgyud): khu tshur mdzub sbyar dbral bar bzlog/ rkang gnyis mnyam byas res phyar// mche gtsigs hUM sgrogs khro gnyer lta// byang shar thig le re grags pa'i rgya// khu tshur mthe'u chung mche ba'i rgya// 
35b4(rgyud): rkang pa ras bteg shar lhor phye// lho nub rkang gnyis res kyi brdab// zhags pas 'dabs dang ral gris gcod// nub byang rkang ga nyis brdab pa dang // lag gnyis mtheb sprad 'jon
35b5(rgyud): lo bskor// yang na tshe gcig phyag rgyas gdab// stangs ste bas thang ha hUM sgrogs// de nas rig sngags bzlog pa yis// bya ga rgya cheg bshad par bya// khu tshur gung po brkyang
35b6(rgyud): rtse sprad// mdzub gnyis de yi 'gram du bcad// sngags dang phyag rgya thams cad kyis// lha klu srin po gnod sprin dang / mkha' gro 'byung po mi ma yin// gsod dang skrod ma ltar mdzad// 'phag
35b7(rgyud): ba khro bo'i rgyal po'i rgyal po'i rtogs pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las// sngags dang phyag rgya'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // bla na med pa'i ras ris sku// cho ga de nas bshad par bya// bris sku 'dod
35b8(rgyud): pas thaM du// dge ba'i ras bzang btsal nas kyang // bkrus te sngags kyi srung byas la// ngur smig du ni bsgyur bar bya// rgyud bzang dal zhing dul bag yid// chos thos ri mo mkha' la sgra na// sra
36a1(rgyud): / chung yid gzhungs khro med pas// sen ci shun kan tsha la sbyar// spangs dang mu zi kan tar ljang // ba p+la kra ni p+la na ser// li khri sgo nga 'tshal lpags dmar// ram dang 'gri
36a2(rgyud): shun bra ni ra sngo// smrig dang a dza nag po ste/ she tra dag kyang dkar por 'gyur// sa snod so btang skags sdig byug/ bir 'jam rab 'bring tha mabri// rgyal dang sa rin ma gru dang // snron snub
36a3(rgyud): smin drag lha 'tshams shis// de nas yang dag rab shad pa// thub pa'i dge ba ras ris la// dbusu byang chub shing mchog drang // gser mdog 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i chas// ches 'chad phyag
36a4(rgyud): rgya ngur smrib bsnams// logasu 'dab bzang rgyal po gnyis// sdom pa me tog bkang ba'i gzugs// g.ya su 'jig rten dang po bkar// ngur smrig gon pas thal mo sbyar// de yi zhabasu mi gso
36a5(rgyud): bdang spyan gsum khros pa k+Sha yis rgyan// na ra'i stod gamo// gas stag smad dkris// rin chen rgyun can dkar can// rdo bdam ra bo'i khri stengs na// ral gro dang ni zhags pa da
36a6(rgyud): g.yon pa cung zad brkyang ste ba zhengs// gtso bo'i g.yon gyi phyogs cha la// rdo rje 'dzin sngo ngur sgrog can// rdo rje dang ni zhags pa 'chang/ de yi 'og tu sgrub po ni// dbus btsugs spos kyi
36a7(rgyud): khang bu 'dzin dang // gtso bo zhab su khro bo che// nag po khams gsum bstan pa yi// lag gnyis rin tshan khri la bsteg/ gtso bo sna tshogs pad+ma ste// 'jig rten dbang dang khro bo yi// rdo rje
36a8(rgyud): 'dzin dang sgrub pa'i sngo// yan lag lnga pa sdong po gcig/ klu yi bu ma mdzes ma gnyis// pang gas 'khyud 'jig par mdzad// zhi ba rgyas pa dbang gi phyir// de nas bris sku yang dag bshad/ 
36b1(rgyud): dbusu shAkya thub pa dang // g.ya su 'phags pa 'jam dpal te// g.yon du phyag na rdo rje'o// bsnyen pa'i don du ras ris ni// shin+d+ha blta dka' gsus po che// zhal gcig phyag bzhi klu yis
36b2(rgyud): rgyan// kha nas khrag 'dzag lce 'dril ba// mche gtsigs hrIHsgra cher sgrogs pa// spyan gsum nyi ma shar ka'i 'ad// ngur smrig bsnams pa char sprin mdog/ sku la thong rlon phreng ba can// 
36b3(rgyud): thod pa tshar bzhis rgyun// g.yon du rin chen zur phud 'phyang// bskal pa'i me 'od 'bar ba yis// phyogs kyi bag tshogs sreg par mdzad// g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje ste// gnyis pa ral gi
36b4(rgyud): 'od 'bar 'chang // g.yon gyi dang po rdo rje zhags// gnyis pa bsdigs mdzub brkyang ste mdzad// rin chen rdo yi khri stangasu// gags kyi rgyal po mnan nas kyang // g.yon
36b5(rgyud): ba yi gar gyis gnas// de yi mdun du zhi ba'i byad// spos khang bzung ba'i sgrub po blo// ci 'byor rgyun du mchod par bya// / ma don spyod sgrub pa'i ras ris ni// de nas yang dag
36b6(rgyud): bshad par bya// dur khrod ras la mi g.yo ba// mdog nag spyan gsum zur smig lta// ngur smrig gos gon khro gnyer ldan// ral gi dang ni zhags pa 'tshang // bris nas bdag gi khrag ni/ 
36b7(rgyud): spyan phya gsol ba btab par bya// ri mo 'dis ni rigs 'dzin kyang // sgrub po mngon spyod smos ci dgos// yang na sna tshogs las kyi phyir// mthing ka na ra'i rgyan can ni// brkyang bskum rdo rje
36b8(rgyud): buM 'dzin// pad+ma zla ba la bzhugs bri// dmag dpung rangs pa'i rasi ras ni// gser mo dag khri'o mi g.yo ba/ mi sdig mche ba gtsigs pa'i sku// 'bar phreng 'khrigs pa'i 'od ldan pa// zhal
37a1(rgyud): / bzhi phyag kyang bzhi pa ste// ral gri zhags pa dang po 'dzin// ri bo che dang bsdigs mdzub 'og zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi snying kha ro// de nas rigs 'dzin dngos grub kyi// ras ris
37a2(rgyud): bri ba yang dag bshad// mi g.yo khro bo zhal gcig pa// mdangs bzangs zar ma'i me tog mdog/ ral gri zhags pa sdig mdzub can// dbus mo g.yas bteg g.yon po ni// sa la cung zad
37a3(rgyud): btsugs par mdzad// mkha' la lha yi bu gnyis kyis// dbugs 'byoran mdzad pa nyams dga'i gzugs// g.ya su rnam snang mdzad bris te// g.yon du 'od dpag med pa'o// de mdun sbru
37a4(rgyud): po nyid kyang bri// gang yang ris ma thams cad la// mchod me trog gtor nas kyang // spyan phye na bza' gsol byas te/ rten 'brel sngags kyang rab gnas bya// de rjes smod lam btab ce
37a5(rgyud): ni oM ldan bdag gis bsags pa yi// bsod nams grangs med gzhal mo lang // des ni 'gro ba ma lus pa/ bla mang go 'phangs thob par shog/ san dmyal ba
37a6(rgyud): dud 'gro dang // yi dwags gang dag gangs med rnams// bdag gi bsod nams mthu yis ni// thams cad bde dang ldan gyur cig/ gang yang lha mi dbul phongs dang / mi nad mu ge dag chom
37a7(rgyud): sogs// bdag gi bsod nams mthu yis ni// de dag zed bral gyur shog/ ji snyed sems can thams cad rnams// da snyed sdug bsngal rgya mtsho kun// sna tshogs de dag kun zhi nas/ 
37a8(rgyud): yang sdug bsngal med par shog/ seMn gang dag lus ngag yid// mi dge spyod pa bral gyur nas// dge ba phun tshogs spyod gyur te// kun kyang bde ldan thob gyur shog/ de nas rgyal sras kun
37b1(rgyud): btu de// lag na di dang me tog sogs// mchod pa'i yo byad kun thogs nas// bla 'og tha dad gsal bya'i phyir// bde gshegs bsdu don 'di skad brjod// oM bad gshegs pa'i bac+doMs// skyo
37b2(rgyud): ba dngasu bzhugs pa rnams// bdag la slar yang brtse ba'i phyir// rgyal ba sras bcas la mi mnga'o// bdag don grub par 'gro ba la// brtse phyir slar yang byon par bar mdzod// de nas gtor
37b3(rgyud): ma me tog dri// dkyil 'khor rgyan dang rdul tsher rnams// dngos grub dam tshig gnod spangs phyir// lag pas reg par mi bya ste// gos kyi bur ma la sogs pa// ci bde bas ni phyags nas kyang
37b4(rgyud): skye 'gag med pa'i sngags brjod nas// chu ba la ni dor bar bya// 'bras dang 'o ma shaM ka dang // mar dang bcas pa bskol byas te// 'bras zan dang na lhan cig tu// dga' skyed phyir
37b5(rgyud): ni dge 'dun dang // bram za la ni ston mo bya// de nas pi sku brtan par ni// gsang ba'i gnasu mchod par bya// khyad par tshe/ sa brgyad du su mchod// bla ma la ni yon dbul zhing
37b6(rgyud): rtag tu sngags 'dzin tha~Md kyang // mnyes par bya zhing khros pa min// sems can ma mos spang bar bya// dkon mchog gsum la nges bskyed// the tso mo la lo spang bar bya// rang gi phung po
37b7(rgyud): bsnyen kur phyir// khrus dang gtsang sbra ldan byas nas// gos bkra dri ma med pa bgo/ zas kyang 'bros rtsog du med la// nyung ngu bza' zhing btung bar bya// mangs pas gnyid dngale lo
37b8(rgyud): dang 'dri nga ba ni bskyed par 'gyur// thi rangs dang por langs nas na// srod thal bar du brtson par bya// nam gyi gung la gnyid pa'i tshe// 'gro la phan byo'i sems kyi nyal// 'phags pa khri 'i
38a1(rgyud): / rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las bris sku'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ste// lha sgom pa yi rim pa ni// rang gzugs stong par byas nasu
38a2(rgyud): yi ge brang ba'i 'khor lo las// sgra grags pa ni rig pa che// zla ba'i gzugs brnyan lta bur snang // der son pa ni rdo rje sogs// rang gi phyag rgya nyid yino// de las gyur pa'i sku mchog ni/ 
38a3(rgyud): tshen shar ba ji lta bar// mtshan dpe mdangs 'od yang dag ldan// brjid cing dgyes pa'i mdangs dang ldan// sgeg cing rol pa'i cha byad ni// byis pa gzho nu'i lang tshe 'dra// rin chen rgyan dang na
38a4(rgyud): bza' ni// gzugs mdzes lha yi ci lta ba// khrod pa'i srin po lta bu ste// skra dang kha spu la sogs pa// spu sogs ser zhing rtsub la 'khyil// sna tshogs dur khrod rgyan rnams ni// rtsub ci
38a5(rgyud): blo ldan rab tu khros// na bza' rlon pa khrag cani// steng gi khamasu yod par mdzad// ha ha hUM hUM phaT phaT kyi// ngar skad la brug sgra spyugs glu ni// ra rib 'bum rnyi la tshal
38a6(rgyud): chom lta re// lus rab ltos 'gros rgyan pa ni// gzi ldan 'khyud cing phu sgra 'don// 'phro 'dra 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ni// nyi 'bum dus me'i bskal pa 'dra// rab gdug mtshon cha du
38a7(rgyud): ma ni/ lha min dus kyi 'khrug pa'i cha// khro bo khro mo'i tshigs 'byung ba// thams cad yig hU~M sgra can// ma mo dang ni mkha' gro rnams// b+h+yo yig drag po'i bdag nyid can// thub pa
38a8(rgyud): yig muM las bskyed// rgyal sras rig ma nyan thos dang // 'jig rten skyong rnams sngags 'dis bskyed// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsa pa ra pU ra ke b+h+ya/ sarba thA oM sarba saM ska ra ba ri/ 
38b1(rgyud): shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na/ sa mud ga tes ha pa ri shud+d+he/ ma hA na ya pa ri wa ra swAhA/ rang gi lus la sems bcu nas// sdig pa thams cad rab tu ni// ngang tshul bzang por yang dag byung / rigs
38b2(rgyud): gyur pa'i sems ldan nas// drang srong rdzu 'phrul can du 'gyur// gzhan yang sdug bsngal zhi nus na// rang gi bde thob smos ci dgos// rang rang rigs kyi lha rnams kyi// gzugs brnyan phyag
38b3(rgyud): mtshan kha dog ni/ dkyil 'khor ram ni ro sa ma las// gsung ba ji ltar bsgom par bya// de nas mi g.yo khro bo ches// rdo rje 'dzin pa phyag 'tshal nas// dag cing gsal la snyad pa yis/ tshi
38b4(rgyud): yang ni 'di gsol to// rdo rje 'dzin pa bac+doMs// gtu mo mtsha/ nyid ldan pa yi// nga yi mtshan nyid khyed bshad nas// de tshe rdo rje 'an rgyal bas// gtum mo'i cha byad ldan byas nas
38b5(rgyud): rang gzugs sngags dang bcas pa yis// gsang chen brda 'di bka' stsal to// dag pa'i sems nyid hUM rdo rje/ mthing ka'i mdog las rdo rje 'dzin// mthing ka brkyang bskum khro se
38b6(rgyud): na ra'i rgyan bcas 'jigs byed sku// gyen sla kha spu gyon ser dmar// pad+ma zla ba'i steng du ni// de yi nang bzhugs rje rdo la 'ching // rnam snang 'dzin dang gnyis dang po// bzhi pa'i lnga pa de'i gsum pa
38b7(rgyud): lnga pa'i lnga pa bdun pa'i bzhi// me yis sa bon dgugs pas mnan// bdun pa'i dang po gsum pa yin// gsum pas bta go hUM phaT bcas// gsang sngags rgyal po bla med 'dis// dgos pa
38b8(rgyud): zad 'grub pa dang // khyad par du ni 'byung po sa la// klu 'dul ba ni dkar po che// na mkha' lding gi cha byad che// grub pa'i gter gyi don du ni// ser po 'od dang ldan pa yi/ dmar po dang ni ljang nag dag
39a1(rgyud): / drag po'i gdon rnams sel ba dang // tshe ring ba la shis pa'o// lhag pa bskyed pa'i sku mchog ni// 'byung por gyur pa'i de ma thag/ sa stengs thams cad mun nag mkhris// bdud rnas
39a2(rgyud): thad rab tu tshig/ ye shes me 'od chen po 'di/ bzod par bla la gcig ma mchis// bgegs chen log par 'dren pa rnams// dog pa'i sems kyis thag rings 'bros// gsang sngags yi ge
39a3(rgyud): hUM sgra can// glog 'khrug pa yi 'od zer 'dra// klad par yig hUM gi gzugs// gru gsum me yi gzugs brnyan can// 'od dmar tshal pa rab 'thor bas// bgegs tshogs sreg cing 'bros
39a4(rgyud): par byed/ bong bu rnga mo khyi spu'u gzugs// ro langs ma lus thang kun// ha hUM brjid cing 'bres par byed// rlung gis g.yengs pa'i rdul dang mtshungs/ gyan thur haM gi 'phro 'du dang // khre bcu
39a5(rgyud): sa bon yi ge hUM// me dang rlung gi tshul du 'bar// mngon sum rtsa lam bzhin du// snying gi hUM gis 'das nas kya klad pa'i hUM gi sa sreg par byed// 'dod dang phyag rgya lha yi sku/ 
39a6(rgyud): bskrad dang bcing dang myes byed bsam// sang+ga dang ni gling chen 'brug/ dag po'i sgra skad ci 'dra bar// rtsa ba'i gsang sngags zlos pa ni// bgegs dang log 'dren ma lus pa// sreg cing phye ma rdul do rlig
39a7(rgyud): snying nang snying po bstan pa ni// 'od 'bar 'od kyis sdig pa'i tshogs// du ma rnams kyang zad par mdzad// lus ngag yid brtan 'khor lo sngags// oM dang AHdang hUM phyir gyis// dpal 'phel dang
39a8(rgyud): phyag bskyed pa dang // go cha chen po bskon par byed// na me s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nA~M/ ta tha ga tA nAM ha go cha chen po'i gsang sngags 'dis// rgyal sras rnams kyang 'dar gyur na// bgegs rnams sreg bsgo
39b1(rgyud): ci dgos// sa ma ya s+t+waM aM haM gis// ye shes lha dang 'bral bar bya// rgyal bas dbang bskur sbyor bas ni// ye shes dbu rgyan brtags par bya// gtso la mi bskyod dbu rgyan can// 'khor kun
39b2(rgyud): mi g.yos rgyas gdab bya// bdag nyid yi ger byas na su// me gzugs shin tu phra bas ni// mtshan mo dusu nyams par bya// sdang ba hUM gi sgra la so// 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog
39b3(rgyud): pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las lha 'byung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sngags sbed tshul gyi che ga nyeni// dad pa dang yang mi ldan zhing // byang chub sems las ma
39b4(rgyud): bskyed// dbang skur rjes gnang ma thob la/ sdom tshul dang tshig bral ba'i mi// gsang sngags rang nyid len pa ni// byis pa lcags sreg med pa 'di// thog ma med sgrib
39b5(rgyud): bkru ba'i phyir// rdo rje slob dpon 'di skad brjed// oM sngags mchog ting 'dzin rnam dag chu// bskal pa du mar bsags pa yi// sdig pa'i tshogs rnams dag gyur nas/ 
39b6(rgyud): rang bzhin dag pa'i semasu byed// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra ad+hiSh+ThA na kA ya bA ka bi sho d+ha na a b+hi ShIny+tsa hUM/ oM sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa yi// rin chen sngags las byung ba yi// 
39b7(rgyud): dbu rgyan lha rdzas cen pan 'dis// dbang bskur rimatshan mchog tu gyur// oM badz+ra d+ha ra shrI badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+wa~M a haM/ rat+na mu ku Ta oM b+hi ShAny+tsa hUM// rdo rje chen po bla na med// bzung bas phyogs
39b8(rgyud): las rgyal gyur te// rdo rje lta bur brtan byed pa mo// khyed kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung / oM sarba badz+re a b+hiSh+Thany+tsa hUM// dril bu dbyangs snyan bla ne med/ suM yi rdo rje rab tu bskyed/ khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu
40a1(rgyud): / zung khams gsum srid pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// oM sa sa ya g+har+b+ha badz+ra a b+hi ShIny+tsa hUM/ e snying rje shes rab dbyer med rgya// gang gis thos pa nang gi su// de yi ming mtshan ba
40a2(rgyud): por 'gyur// rtag pa'i ngang gnas blang bar mdzod// oM badz+ra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta// thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ri// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo
40a3(rgyud): snyems bdag bdag mdzod cig/ sangs rgyas kun gyi ril bu rgya// shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad// rtag tu khyod kyis gzung byas nas// byang chub mchog thob rgyal bas gsungs// 
40a4(rgyud): oM shes rab ral gri bla na med// gang gis 'chang brgyal 'gyur rje// bdud kyi dpung ni bshegs nas kyang // mkha' la ye shes 'od 'a bar 'gyur// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra dz+nyA na khaD+ga a
40a5(rgyud): bi ShIny+tsa hUM// ang rdo rje zhags thugs rdo rje can// nyon mongs srid pa'i sdong rnams// thabs kyi zhags pas bcings nas kyang / srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol mdzad// oM saH
40a6(rgyud): ta thA ga ta badz+ra pA sha na a bi ShIny+tsa hUM// dbang dang rdzas gnang ma thob cing // dam tshig sdom pa mi ldan la// bla ma mnyes par mi byed na// sgrub pa 'bras med ngan song 'gre log lta na gang bla ma 'a
40a7(rgyud): dmyal ba'i gnasu 'gro bar nges// 'dir nyams pas ni nad yams dang // dgra bo mu ges rtag tu 'tsho// dkyil 'khor sa bzhi nyams dga' ba// chu klung mtsho 'gam ri ljongs dang // 'bras bu
40a8(rgyud): me tog bskyed mos chel// kun dga' ra ba khang bzang mchog/ bzhi mdori sul shing gcig drung // phyugs lhas khang brtsegs glang chen bres// gtsug lag khang dang dgon pa dang // chu gling
40b1(rgyud): mtshe'u 'gram ne ru gsing du// bsnyen dang dbang bskur byed pa dang // dur khrod sogasuM las rnams sgrub// las kyi dkyil 'khor khru gang ste// dbang gi dkyil 'khor chen po la// thub pa'i dkyil 'am
40b2(rgyud): khru bzhi pa// yang na drag gam brgyad kyang bya// gzhan ni khru gsum tshad du bya// yang na lnga 'am bdun du bya// gza'i dkyil re khar khru gnyi ste/ yang na phye dang gsum par bya// kun tu bzhi che po dang
40b3(rgyud): ste/ khang pas tshad kyi phyed yin te// khang pa gnyis pa cha gsum pa// rta babs rdo rje pad+ma'o// lha snam bzhi cha dag tu 'gyur// thub pa'i sgo ni bzhi yin te// gzhan du sgo gcag pa nyid shis// 'jam
40b4(rgyud): pa'i byangs ni byang gi sgo/ chos ni dub sgo rdo rje 'o// gza' dang 'jig rten skyong sogs shar// dbang bsgyung lha yi gnas rnamasu// dum daphyag rgyar bcas pa 'am// sku 'am rang ra phyug
40b5(rgyud): rgya bzhag// thub pa'i dkyil 'khor dbusu ni pad dkar stang du ljang bzed// gtso bo yis ni sor drug ste// lhag ma rnams ni sor ba nir rigs kyi mtshan mas yang yang bskor// byang du
40b6(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang sdud ni// pang dkar rdo rje gdangs por bcas// dbang ldan spyi blugs pa'i'o// shar du 'jam dpal u dpal sngo// mer ni kun bzang yid bzhino// lhor ni rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin// bdan bral
40b7(rgyud): mkha' snying pa dkar ta// nub tu pang ser rdo rje chos// nub byangs snying pad+ma dmar// gtsug tor gnod mdzes steng 'og char// gtsug tor dang ni gtun shing // shar du rnam rgyal thod pa ste/ mer na
40b8(rgyud): 'dod rgyal rtse gsumo// rdo rje rtsa gcig gshin rje bde ni bral ral gri stobs po che// nub tu rna mgrin pad+ma ste/ byang du 'gegs dgra rdo rje rgya/ nub tu dbyug pa sngon pa ste// dbang ldan du ni mi gas
41a1(rgyud): ba de yi rgyab tu nyan thos ni// shA ri'i bu dang rab 'byor dang // mo'u dgal bu dang 'od srung dang // rgyal mchog dang ni sa stengs skyod // rta thul dang ni ba glang bdag// drag shul dbang chen
41a2(rgyud): tshangs bu can// b+ha ra d+h+wa dza stang rgyas dang // dga' bo nyar dga' sgra gca no// de ltar bcu drug phyag rgya'o// pad+ma'i steng du lhung bzed// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'jam dpal dkyil 'khor
41a3(rgyud): bzang po yi// dbusu ral gi mi 'ong can// rin chen rdo brag sdeng du bri// byang du rdo rjes mtshon ma yi// bum pa bri ba byams pa'o// shar du kun tu bzang po yi// rdo rje dkar po bri bar bya// lhor ni me'o
41a4(rgyud): ldan pa yi// lag na rdo rje'i rdo rje'i// nub tu 'jig rten dbang po ste// pad dkar 'od dang ldan pa bri// yid bzhin nor 'dzin mdzes pa/ thugs can// rin chen rdo steng dbang ldan bri// mar ni
41a5(rgyud): 'bar rdo rje yi// bgang phrang pad+ma la gnas bri// bden bral du ni rab brjod pa'i// go cha 'bar bri bar bya// rlung du mdzes pa gnan nu'i lha// rin chen smon ni bri bar bya// steng du
41a6(rgyud): bod ces khro ba'o// pad+ma'o steng du khro bo lo// 'og tu khro rgyal mngag gzhagi/ rdo rje drag stengs zhags pad+mo// zla bo ldog ma sngon gyi ni// tshul gyis rgyal bar dgod par bya// brtan po zhes po
41a7(rgyud): po nya mo'o// chu gri byang du bri bar bye// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'chang ba y-i/ mo khar sor mon shar du'o// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'chi ba yi/ rnam 'jigs ma ni lte ru'o// nub kyi phyog su bri bar bya/ 
41a8(rgyud): mdzod spu ma zhes rin phreng 'dzin// rin chen rdo stang shar lho khri/ shar lhor bgegs 'dzin ma zhes pa// 'khor lo ma 'bar rdo rje bri// 'bar ba'i gshun shing bden bral tu// 'joms pa'i bo la
41b1(rgyud): rlung du bri// thal sbyar gung mo nang du bcug/ pad+ma mdzod kyi phyag rgya dang / sngags 'dis dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHhUM hUM/ ba ga/ maM maM swA hA/ spyan drangs
41b2(rgyud): gshegasu gsal ba dang // srung ba mchog gi sngags yino// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHhe he ha A dz+nyA ba ra ma ra ga ga na// A gats+tsha gats+tsha b+ha ga bAn+da shaM g+h+raM swA hA/ bstan pa 'aH
41b3(rgyud): la byin rlabs dang / lha sgrub pa dang mchod pa'o// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rdo rje sngon gyi dkyil 'khor ni// dbusu 'jig rten dbang sdud nyid// pad+ma dmar po 'chang ba'o// shar du don yod zhags pan
41b4(rgyud): bgrang phreng sngon po 'ching ba'o// lhor nin mkha' dri med/ rdosngon po 'chang ba'o// nub tu gar gyi dbang pad+ma// byang du thugs sa shugs po che// rdo rje dag po 'dzin pa bri// sgrol ma
41b5(rgyud): khro gnyer ral gcig dang // yid bzang ma ni mtshamasu bri// khro bo dang ni pho nya mo// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi rim pas dog de nas phyag na rdo rje yi// dkyil 'khor yang dag
41b6(rgyud): par bya// dbusu phyag na rdo rje nyid// rdo rje dkar po 'chang ba'o// shar du sangs rgyas spyan ma yin// lhor ni pad 'dzin mA ma ki/ nub tu gos 'chang na bza' dkar// byang du sgrol ma ud pa la 'cha / 
41b7(rgyud): phyogs bzhir na mkha' dri med dang / shugs po cha dang rdo rje rtog/ bsnyems tshul chen po zhes pa rnams// rigs kyi mtshan ma 'dzin pa'o// dar yang sngon ltar khro bo rnams// rim pa bzhin brib
41b8(rgyud): byed de yi ma rgyab dkyil 'khor la// drag po lha rnams bkod pa ni// dpung bzang la sogs rdo rje can// brgyad po byang gi phyogasu bri// tshogs 'chang ba shes gzhan 'gro sbyong dang / mthong
42a1(rgyud): / dka' rigs byed bden bral med// ngan spong brgya de drang srong shar// lhor ni rdo rje dgra sta ma// rdo rje tho ba dag shul ma// rten ma dang khro gnyer ma// ro langs ma dang lcag sgrog ma// 
42a2(rgyud): mthong dka' ma ste brgyad po bri// dug sel rma bya 'od zer can// nor rgyu ni ral gcig dpung rgyan ma// dbyangs ldan dril sgrol brgyad nub phyogs// kun kyang rang rig phyag rgya can// sgo yi phyogs
42a3(rgyud): dgod bye ba// thub pa'i 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi// brgya byin khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// tshangs pa 'jam dpal dkyil 'khor lo'o// rgyal dang rnams rgyal mi thub pa// gzhan mi thub pa spyan ras
42a4(rgyud): gzigs// na mo che dang uts+tshal+la// gzhon nu 'phrog mo gtor la dzin gyi// khro bo mi g.yo sgo bzhi la// nag po che dang dga' byed dang // ngan spong dang ni tshogs bdag go// me g.yo dbang bsku
42a5(rgyud): dgyes pa yi// dbu su khro bo mau g.yo ba'o// ral gri me 'od 'bar ba'o// phyogs bzhir khro bo mdog bzhi'o// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i cha byad can// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma da
42a6(rgyud): rgyagam g.yas pa'i phyag tu 'chang // g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa 'chang // rin chen brag le sku bzhugs nas// zhabs gnyis pad+ma'i steng du'o// mtsham su khro mo bzhi po yang // 
42a7(rgyud): gtso bo dang mtshungs sgeg pa'i nyams// nga rgyab sngon ltar khro bo bcu// sku 'am phyag rgya'i phreng ba bri// dkyil 'khor cha yi rgyab tu ni// 'jig rten skyong bcu drag shul can// khros pas rang rigs
42a8(rgyud): 'khor bcas bri// bum pa tshad ldan ras kyis dkri/ dri bzang chus bkang lha grangs sam// bcu gnyis sam ni dag kyang rung // kha rgyan dang bcas bzhag par// bla re ba dan gdugs rgyal
42b1(rgyud): yon chab bdug spos me tog dang // sgron ma byug cha ba zhal zas dang // gling bu sil snyan na bza'i tsho gas// gtor ma dri bzang sman dang bcas// yid 'ong dri zhim zas skom tshog/ dkyil 'khor
42b2(rgyud): spras nas mchod par bya// sa la dbus mo tshad brkos nas// 'bru srin shing rdo dum bu sogs// skyon mang 'bral nas sa yis dgang // ba'i rnam lngas byugs pa'i sar// me tog bcal bkram
42b3(rgyud): mched sogs bkod// lha ni spyan dngas mchod nas kyang // dag dang mi dge'i rmi lam brtag/ rmi lam bzang na spro gyur nas// sa bdag mo la gsol ba gdab// khyad par du yang gtor mas
42b4(rgyud): mchod// bu tshur shog ces theg chen gyi// tshul chen khyod ni snod yin pas// gsang sngags spyod tshul chog rnams// khyod la yang dag bstan par bya// dus gsum sangs rgyas
42b5(rgyud): 'byung ba rnams// mi g.yo mgon por rab bsgoms pas// ye shes mtshungs pa med pa bsgos// skyob pa shAkya sang+ges kyang gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam mad 'dis// bdud
42b6(rgyud): sde shin tu mo bzad pa// dpung chen rnams kyang dpa' bos bcom// 'jig rten 'dul phyir rnams kyi// 'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das// de 'dra kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir// bu khyod blo gas
42b7(rgyud): 'di gyis shig/ u dum b.ra'i me tog ltar// rgya lam na ni ras 'ga' zhig/ 'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ste// skyob pa 'jig rten mgon po che// rnyed dka' rnyed par gyur na yang / 
42b8(rgyud): gsang sngags skyob pa'i tshul 'byung ba// shin tu dka' ste rmad byung phyir// sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzad par// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho cher 'jigs las// myur du stsol ba gsang sngan wa
43a1(rgyud): // sa stengs gsang sngags nor bu 'dra// rgand 'chi 'jigs spong ba dang // nyes mdzad grogs bcugs 'thun 'dod dang // mu ge dgra tshoms bral bde dang // zas skom gos rgyan
43a2(rgyud): long spyod brtag/ bde bskyed dpal 'byor thob pa dang // myur du sangs rgyas 'dod pa yi// gsang sngags thabs la myur brtson bsgrubs// ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ byang chub du ni ngas
43a3(rgyud): mdzad pa'i// byang chub sems ni bla med pa// dam pa bdag gos bskyed par bya// sdom pa yi ni tshul khrims dang // dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang // se ni don byeng tshul khrims gsum// deng nas ma
43a4(rgyud): tu brtan par gzung // 'gro la lhag pa'i sems bskyed nas// bla ma lan yon phul zhu// yid bzhin nor 'dra bla med sku zhib sangs rgyas go 'phangs theb// srog gcod rkun brdzun mi
43a5(rgyud): tshangs spyod// myos byed mthung dang glu gar rol/ rgyan byugs mal chen mtho ba dang // phyi dro kha zas spang ba ste/ brgyad dang bcu gcig bco lnga dang // khyad par du ni gnam stang
43a6(rgyud): dal 'byor thob pa shin+d+ha dkon// sangs rgyas bstan pa shin tu dkon// sdom pa rlangs nas srog bzhin du// g.yengs med bsdams te bsrung bar bya// gsum la rtag tu skyabs 'gro bya
43a7(rgyud): mi bde ldan lus thob nas// dmyal ba dud 'gro yi dwags gnas// thob gnas spang dka'i de dag ni// nam yang thob pa mi bya'o// bdag ni dpa' bo ral gri 'chang // gsang ba'i 'khor
43a8(rgyud): sbyor byed pas// bka' las 'das pa'i gdugs can rnams// dum bu phye mar 'gas par 'gyur// slob ma gzung phyir thog mar ni// bsnyen pas span kyi mthu bskyed bya// long spyod 'phel
43b1(rgyud): phyir gtor ma btang // bsod nams 'dod phyir mchod pa brtson// bla ma thos bsam sgom la gnas// gtong phong dul zhing chos spyod mkhas// nad med bzod ngas snying rje che// sngags sgrub ba/ 
43b2(rgyud): dpal shes rab can// brtags nas slob ma lnga 'am bdun// dang brtson zhi dul bla ma bkur// sdig 'jigs nad med dbang po tshang // dbyibs sdug snying rjer ldan pa bzung // 'phags pa rdo rje
43b3(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las skye bo gzung ba'i thabs kyi le'u drug pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub che// gzhan du med pa
43b4(rgyud): phul byung ba// rgyud 'dir bshad pa mnyan par byos/ mo ni rin chen dang po ste// gang gang sgrub pad dang de// 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// ral gri lcags sam shi
43b5(rgyud): la byas// sor bzhi pa'am sor brgyad bya/ yu bar rigs kyi rgya lnga bri// ba yi rnam lnga dri zham chus// bkrus te/ dri dang me tog mchod// zla drug sngags bzlas khro bo sgom// 
43b6(rgyud): ral gi dud 'thul 'od du 'bar// blangs pas mkha' spyod yul 'gro 'gyur// tsha ni bar gyi bsnyel pa ste// lha ya bzhon pa sna tshogs bcibs// sangs rgyas zhing rnams 'gro bar 'gyur// 
43b7(rgyud): gser dngul zangs kyi zhags pa'am// shing gi zhags pa'ang de ltar 'grib// rgyal mtshan nor bu gi wang gdugs// lcags kyu rnams kyang de bzhin smra// lha rnams sgrub na thang shing la
43b8(rgyud): gang 'dod lha yis gzugs byas te// sngags bzlas tsam gyis mdun du 'ong // ci 'dod gsol 'dabs 'dod pa smra// kA la nA ga ge sar shing // gnod sbyin la ni gser las gzag/ 
44a1(rgyud): // di za la ni 'o ma'i shing // mkha' lding 'jim pa'i gzugs kyi so// srin po la ni dur khrod shing // gang yang gzugs byas rkang pa ni// g.yon pas de yi ske mnan te/ suM 'dre
44a2(rgyud): bzlas na mdun du 'ong // ci 'dod smra che dgos pa blang // shar du ras ris kha sprad drung // dus gsum khrus byas gos rlom gyen// sum 'bum bzlas na mar ngo yi// brgyad la 'byung po
44a3(rgyud): gtor ma sbyin// maN+Dal steng du re bzhag nas// rang nyid rin cheni khri stang du// snying po khri brjod ro 'gul 'gyur// mi skrag kha yi nang du lce// pad+ma kha phye lte can mtho ba// bcad na ral
44a4(rgyud): gri rig 'dzin 'gyur// lha yi gzugs kyi tshangs pa yi// 'jig rten khams kyi gnas rgyu// gi wang bdun zlas thig les no// skye bo kun gyis mthong // mig ma
44a5(rgyud): dbus me btsugs pa'am// 'jam dang la ris ma'i drung du ni// 'jam dpal sngags 'dis ya bzlas nyi la khyad par mchod pa byas// mtshan rangs bzlas pa
44a6(rgyud): tho rengs nas// dang po rtags g.yo bar 'gyur// gnyis pa nyi ma 'gyur ldog byed// phyogs bzhir mkha' la sgra chen po// ha ha 'brag skad grag par 'gyur// gsum pas
44a7(rgyud): mkha' lo rig 'dzin rnams// me tog char 'bebs chun 'phyar sgreng // de rjes rlog 'dzin ma lus dang // 'jig rten skyong bas rab bskor nas// khro rgyal byon nas gsung snyan
44a8(rgyud): gyis// ci 'dod bu khyod gsung bar 'gyur// rig 'dzin rgyal po mi snang sogs// ci 'dod par ni smra bar bya// 'grub nas brgyad gnyis cha byad can// brgyan bzang lag na ral
44b1(rgyud): gri thogs// lha yi ba'on pa la bcings nas// rig 'dzin tshogs mang lhan cig tu// sangs rgyas zhing mang phyin pa'i tshe// rgyal sras rnams kyis phyag byas nas// mchod pa chen po
44b2(rgyud): 'gyur te// bskal pa du mar tshe gnas 'gyur// ud pal sngon po lig bu mig// ru rta zangs snod ril bu bzhan// zla ba gzas zin par bzas// mig bskus 'dod pa'i khams gsal
44b3(rgyud): 'gyur// bdag ni sus kyang mi mtho'o// gnam lcags rdo rje sor bca dag/ ngos gnyis rtse gsum dbyibs can te/ tsan dan dmar dang de bzang phyug/ cho 'phrul tshes gnyis nya yi bar// 
44b4(rgyud): mchod cing bzlas na tha ma ra ni// bar me ba rgya sogs kyis mchod// ku sha khris kyi steng 'dug nas// rdo rje la ga gnyis gzung ma thag/ dad 'thul 'od du 'bar nas kyang
44b5(rgyud): 'khor bcas rig pa 'dzin pa yi// 'khor los bsgyur ba thob par 'gyur// 'khor lo bdun brtsegs mtshan cha dang // gser dang mal lham tshangs skud sogs// dgos pa
44b6(rgyud): zed de ltar sgrub// sngon gyi tshal du dngos grab 'byung // tshes gcig nyin par sku gzugs kyi// mthe bor dza ti sngags brjod brdeg// stong phrag brgyad kyis mthe bong las// 'od zer phyung na
44b7(rgyud): reg ma thag// dbu skra lcang laM 'khol gyur nas// 'khor btsas rig 'dzin rgyal po thob// sus kyang mi thub las grub 'gyur// tsha ni bskal pa'i bar du gnas// sa la pad+ma 'dab brgyad
44b8(rgyud): br-i// bum pa skad pa nag pos bkri/ tsan dan gyis byug dris kyang dgang /  'dug/ stong phrag brgyad bzlas sa gzhigs// pad+mar snang zhings bzhir snang / chu des ga
45a1(rgyud): // la khru gang bskor// blangs pas bskal pa'i tshe tshang po'o// sreg mkhar sa la seng+ge bya// gi wang gis byugs dkyil 'khor bzhag/ g.yon 'gul bar du mchod cing bzlas// seng+ga
45a2(rgyud): gyur nas rgya bzhon nas// 'dod gzugs lha gnas kun tu 'gro// sangs rgyas zhing yang thob par 'gyur// tshe le khri phrag gcig bskor nas// rig 'dzin chen po'i gnasu 'gro// 'dir gsungs pa 'am
45a3(rgyud): ma gsungs pa// sngags dang lha 'dis sgrub pa yis// rig 'dzin grub par grags pa rnams// ma lus thad 'grub bar 'gyur// 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i rtog pa bsdus pa wa
45a4(rgyud): rig 'dzin sgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'i// / de nas yang dag bshad pa pa// phan tshegs las kyi sbyor ba gtso// gza' yi che ba 'di yin te// gnod pa sel dang phan skyed mdzad
45a5(rgyud): ba yi rnam lngas byugs pa yi// dkyil 'khor dbusu pad+ma ni// kha dog sna tshogs nyis rtse gi// dbus sangs rgyas de bzhin lhor// chos ni rdo rje chos dkar po// shar du dge 'dun
45a6(rgyud): ljang ku'o// nub du 'jig rten dbang phyugs dmar// byang du phyag ni rdo rje ste// byang shar du ni 'jam dpal sar// mer ni gshin rje gshed po gnag/ byugs 'chang ma ha zhon pa'o// mi
45a7(rgyud): g.yo mgon pi srin po phyogs// rta mgrin rlung gi phyog su'o// dkon mchog gsum po chos 'chang rgya// sems dpa' khro bo rang rtag so// kun kyang rin tshan khro la bzhugs// de rgyab cha la
45a8(rgyud): rnams te// shar du nyi ma dkar sar ni// rta la zhon te pad+ma 'chang // nub tu zla ba dkar po ni// ku mu da 'chang dang pa zhon// lhor ni mog dmar kha dog dmar// ril ba'i steng bzhugs me sgron bsdu
45b1(rgyud): lhag pa mdog ser ud pa la 'chang // byang du pad stengs bzhugs pa yi// phur bu mdog sngon glegs pa thogs// shar lho phyogs klu la bcibs// pa wa sangs dkar shing thog 'chang // lho nub
45b2(rgyud): gser gyi khri la bzhugs// byang shar spen pa me dog nag ni// tshangs pa'i stang na dbyug pa thogs// nub byang sgra can dud ka ni// sbrul gyi steng na 'khor lo 'dzin// rnon po ljang ku ral gri 'chang // gtso
45b3(rgyud): drung du pang stengs bzhugs// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarbA sA pa ri pU ra ka b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM b+ha kiM nAM swAhA/ nyo ma'i snying po'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba sA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thA/ a sa
45b4(rgyud): tra ye a sAhA// zla bi'i'o// na maHsarba ta tha ga te b+h+yoHsarbA sA pa ri pU ra ke d+h+yaHsarba thA au a bIr+yA ya swA hA/ rnon bo'i'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaHsarbA sA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsa
45b5(rgyud): thA oM su bi shud+d+ha sA hA/ mig dmar gyi'o// na maHsarba tathA ga teb+h+yaHsarba sA pa ro pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM ba~M su Ta ba/ ka ya swA hA/ gza' lha gi'o// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsa
45b6(rgyud): sA pa ri pA ra kaM b+h+yaHsarba thA aM b+hi ka mya d+ha ya sAt+ma/ pur bu'i'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarbA sA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thA oM su d+harmA r+Na ra hi swA hA/ pa wa sangs kyi'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga ted+d+ha
45b7(rgyud): sarba sA bi ra~M pU ra ka b+h+ya/ sarba bAHoM kr-iSh+Ti btsa paka swA hA// spen pa'ire// na maHsarba ta bA ga te b+h+yaHsarba sA pa ra~M pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thAHoM bi hr-i da la ku ru tsi swA hA/ sgra gcan bya'o// sngags pa
45b8(rgyud): brgyad stong brgyad brgya bzlas// ci 'byor mchod de gsol ba gangag/ leng spyod spel cig 'jigs pa sel// nad med bgegs rims 'joms par 'gyur/ rims sogs gzas zin nang / 
46a1(rgyud): la yang // sku yi drung du gsol btab sal// zhi rgyas dbang drag gang sbyar ba// de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// mi dang bya rgod sbrul rus pa// skabs btums nas ngag khyim
46a2(rgyud): spang dgra bo nang skyed der rnams brlag/ rtag tu 'thab mo 'byung bar nges// stag pu thed rus 'ug pa'i spu// dgra be'i sgor smas sbed par byed// ne ru le dag po wa larba rus// rang khrag gcings
46a3(rgyud): pa'i mgo bo rnams// gong bu ming bcas dgra sgor swa// dgra be 'khor bcas shi ba par gyur// mi tshil dur thal rgya skyegs ni// thod pa so can nang blugs nas// gang gi sgor bzhag khang pa 'jig/ 
46a4(rgyud): ku shi'i gzugs brnyan rkang pas mnan// dbang byar 'dod pa'i sngags bzlas na// rgyal po che yang dbang 'gyur na// 2 phung po gzhan lta smos ci dgos// bud med skyes phyugs las
46a5(rgyud): le rang ming ldan pa'i gzugs byas te// dang pa g.yon mnan ming bcas bzla// gang dang gang yang nges par grub// sa la bgegs kyi gzugs bris te// sngags kyis
46a6(rgyud): brdungs na brlag par 'gyur// 'jim pas bgegs kyi gzugs byas te// gad ba cing brdungs na sel bar nges// pur bus gdab dang mtshon chas bral// rdo rje ri rab cig brgyad ldan// sa la byas
46a7(rgyud): pi'i bems par da// gzugs brnyan bcug ste rkang pas mnan// gzas zin nub mo'i maN+Da le// dri zangs me tog sil ma bkram// pa rol phyin pa'i glegs bam bzhugs// dang sa ma'i snod mar
46a8(rgyud): bzhag ste/ seng ldeng mes ni bskol bar bya/ dngos grub rnam gsum 'grub pa dang // gter mthong bar yang 'dis 'gyur// khros pas spyan gyi phyag rgya bya// hUM mtha' gsang sngags drag tu da
46b1(rgyud): dur khrod thal ba gang byin pa// gdon gyi 'dzin nam bran du 'gyur// de nas mi g.yon spyan gcig pa'i// sngags kyi chog bshangad bar bya// ris ma'i drung du 'bum phrag gsum// brjod pas 'di yi bsnye
46b2(rgyud): brdzogs// dben par zar gyi chang bu sbyin// des ni rtag tu 'bral bar 'gyur// mdzub mo'i rtse la hUM bkod nas// brjod pas sprin rnams 'dral bar byed// dgra bo lhar bcas gzugs brnyan la// rkang
46b3(rgyud): g.yon mnan bzlas lcags phur gangab// bka' nyan 'gyur// gtubs na shing // skud pa ser po bcings nang ngag/ spang leb mnan na mdan par 'gyur// ra lpags brabs bka' nyan 'gyur/ srang
46b4(rgyud): yungs kar la bzlas te// 'chang na gang 'ded srung bar bya'o// na baHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM tsaN+Da la ma hA ro Sha Na hAM traM thA ma hA tsaN+Da/ a tsa la ka
46b5(rgyud): na hUM hUM hUM a pra ti ha ta ta thA ga ta dz+nyA/ sma ra hUM hUM pa Ta swA hA/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i cha klung du// tsan dan spags pa'i pad+ma ni sngags bcas ci tsam bsgyur ba'i grangs// gser gyi dong che
46b6(rgyud): rnyed par 'gyur// bram ze 'am ni rig 'dun ras/ rgyal po ras sam gro ga la// pad+ma mu khyud gnyis ldan bri// lte bar oM hUM ming dang bcas/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro laH// phaT dang bcas pa mdab mar bkod
46b7(rgyud): mu khyud dang por rtsa sngags te// gnyis pa 'jam dpal sngags nyid bri// dri dang me tog sogs mchod nas// skabs kyi del nas lus la bcad// gdon dang nad dang mu ge sel// g.yul du phyin pa rgyal
46b8(rgyud): bar 'gyur// yang na ral gri ser bzhir bri// 'od kyi mi nang chud pa// ya d+harma la sogs kyis bskor// dbus ming dang bcas pa yi// snying po sngags ni khrigasu bri// 'dis kyang sngon gyi snyen 'gyur
47a1(rgyud): // mtho lngas 'khor ba'i bar du ni// mtho gang 'phang du yod pa bya// nang du mtshal gyis 'jam dpal sngags// mgo ni gyen du bltas pa bri/ kha la nye bar rten 'brel sngags// spra tshi las
47a2(rgyud): byas dag yi gzugs// dug dang gri khrag gis bris nas// ming yo ge bsad par bcas pa ni// ling kha'i snying khang bcug byas te// dkyil 'khor gru bsu pa nag po yi// dbu su mtho gang brus byas
47a3(rgyud): te nang bzhag steng du spar bu spub// ji srid mar gyis tshes gcig nas// zla ba mi snang zhag du// nyin mo rten 'dral sngags bzlas te// mtshan dus khro bo spyad gcig pa'i// sngags ni ngag tu brjed pa
47a4(rgyud): byad mtshams dang ci srid mtshams bar du// g.yon du bskor zhing rtsa ba'i sngags// drug cu rtsa bzhi'i grangasu brjod/ 'jam dpal sngags kyis chos gos srung // bde gshegs yi
47a5(rgyud): brgya pas ni// mchod rten la ni bseg ba shang ba sol// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig pa dang // sngags la 'phya na seMn 'tshe// log lta log par spyod byed cing // sen la 'tshe bya
47a6(rgyud): ba ni/ rgyal po khro che bcu dang 'jig rten skyong dang rgyal chen bzhi// ma tshogs gza' dang rgyu skar tshegs// bstan dga' rnams kyis myur du sgrol// rgyud gzhan dag la grags pa yi// bden pa'i
47a7(rgyud): mthu yang du ma brjod// dur khrod sa la mchod rten ni// nag po gru gsum khru gang ba'i// srog shing nag po gsum pa la// bde gshegs yig brgya bas dkri/ gur gum li khris bris pa'o// mya
47a8(rgyud): ngan med shing gru gsum la/ rgya gram dbang chen rim par bca'// la staM b+ha ya nan pa brgyad// phyogs brgyad bri ba'i rwa dbus la// nya snying dang bcas pa bri// de yi lte bar snying po ni// bsad pa'i ming bcas ni
47b1(rgyud): tshogs kyi bdag po gtor mas mchod// ma mo rnams dang legs ldan sras// sha khrag me tog nag pos mchod// ci srid gsum dang bdun par du// le lo med par byas gyur na// dge slong dag tshul
47b2(rgyud): bsnyen ldan gang // sdom brtson de ni ldan gyur te// sdig ldan myur du shi bar 'gyur// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gtum po rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// sna tshogs las rnams thun mong ste// khyad par skyo
47b3(rgyud): bcung zad bshad// yungs kar bsnun pas 'thung po 'bros// ser rab srung na 'khor lo 'am// rnga dang dung la bri bar bya// g.yul du 'jug na ral gri sogs// nad la 'khor la chu yungs kar// bod
47b4(rgyud): kor gyis sa por la// bris te skor sbas spre'u srung // spra tshil gzugs brnyan sor bzhi pa// dur khrod thal bzlas sgo stengs bzhag nad pa gdon las srung bar nges// snying khar ming snga
47b5(rgyud): spel bcug nas// tshe ma khar btsugs ngag rengs byad// snying la gtsugs nas khros pa ni// nan tan sems kyis gso dpar nges// ling gas brtags kyi nus pa med// yang na rabs chad
47b6(rgyud): thod pa la// ming sngags bris te mi khrag bkang // rab chad dur sbas rigs rgyad 'chad// khyi nag thod par ming sngags bcas// dug bkang klu gnas stas mdzes 'dzin// dge yi sgor sbas 'byed par
47b7(rgyud): byed dang zhing du sbas na lo nyes byed// phyogs gnas god 'byung zla dang 'byed// chu deng spras na chu skems 'gyur// me dur sbas na rims kyis 'dzin/ yang na dag ming khrag gis bris// spra tshil ga cu
47b8(rgyud): kyi snying khar bcug// mchod rten nag po mtho gang ba'o// nang bcug dong bzhig lhung bzed sbub// bram ze rigs bzhis sngags brjod cing// nag po ches nas phyis bskor zhing // bden pa'i mthu tsho
48a1(rgyud): // gzugs brnyan sreg/ dgra bo shi 'gyur ba tse mad/ gri khrag bya rog 'ug par khrag/ ka tra ta yi lte ba ma la// ka ro ki ya dusu ni// gzugs la mang dang sngags bcas bri// rkang pas
48a2(rgyud): na rdul du 'gyur// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' bzhino// mtshon gyis bsad pa'i thod pa la// sngags dang yul lha'i mang spa ba bri// lha yi gnas bcug da steng du// sngags bzlas bur ba snying kher gad ba// 'dus
48a3(rgyud): pa'i tshar mi'i hom sbar te// mi rtab glang khyim he// sna tshogs khrag bsres 'di skad brjod// lnga khyod yul 'dir thog ser phog/ mad na bskal par khyod nyid sreg/ de rjes dkar dang mngar mcho do// 'pha
48a4(rgyud): pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las sbyor ba phran tshags kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas spyi na sreg las rnams kun// myur 'grub thabs ni bshad par bya/ 
48a5(rgyud): mngar gsum dur ba bsregs pa yis// gnod ra gas zad sel bar byed// yam shing 'bras bu gsum bsregs shing // gdon nad thad zhi bar byed// 'o ma can gyi yam shing la
48a6(rgyud): 'o ma dur ba til dang 'bras// snying rje'i sems kyis brgya bsregs na// gnod pa thad zhi bar 'gyur// ga bur mngar gsum 'bru thams cad// dur ba dkar po'i yam shing rnams// 'o ma can gyi
48a7(rgyud): shing la sreg/ nad dang gdon thad zhi// 'o ma sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad// phyugs ngas chen po zhi bar 'gyur// dur ba mngar gsum mong bcas pas// bsregs pas ta phyugs nad ni byed// shar/ 
48a8(rgyud): lho nub byang phyogs kyi ni// dkar nag dmar ser kha dog 'grub// khru gang khru gnyis tshad kyi thab// sor bzhir kha khyer rim pas btang // se ra pad+ma'i rdo rje dang // gcog pus zho rgyas dbang
48b1(rgyud): dag 'gug/ de nas rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg ni// ci 'deng thob pa bshad par bya// pad+ma'i tshul 'bum phrag gcig/ rgyal po theb ste blon po ni// ku mu da la 'bum phrag gsum// zho dang mngar gsum dang bcwa
48b2(rgyud): ba'o// a ba marga'i 'bras bu dang // mngar gsum 'bum gyis yul bdag 'thob// ri bzang 'bum phrag bdun gyis ni// yid la ci 'dod thob par 'gyur// dur ba til dang 'bras sogs sreg/ bud med
48b3(rgyud): bu bzang thob par 'gyur// ner 'dod pas ni rkun po yi// lag pa g.yas pa mdzod bzhag nas// mchod cing gsol ba btab pas ni// nor rnams myur du thob par 'gyur// yang na rgya yi lpags
48b4(rgyud): la 'gur gum gi wang yung bas ni// byi ba che rdzid ser po bri// shar na mdzod bugs bltas par bzha// zas kyi lhag mas mchod bya zhing // gsol ba btab pas nor rnyed 'gyur
48b5(rgyud): pad+ma'i thai ba kaM li ka/ pri yang kun ni nor d+ha // 'dra sa bsregs pas kyang nor chen thob// ku mu da yi 'bras sogs sreg/ long spyod cha dang sa gzhi 'thob// pad+ma zho dang sbrang rtsi ma
48b6(rgyud): sbyin sreg 'bum gyis mchog stsol ba// gsum pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur// bil ba'i 'bras bu mngar gsum bcas// 'bum phrag gsum du bsregs pas ni// rang nyid rgyal po chen por
48b7(rgyud): 'gyur// mar dang nyung kar dkar pos ni// nim pa'i shing la 'bum bsregs na// snying po snying pa rgyas par 'gyur// nas la sogs pa'i 'bru rigs rnams// gang bsregs gsol btab
48b8(rgyud): de rgyas 'gyur// gang 'dod gos kyi kha dog can// me tog bsregs na gos rnyed 'gyur// spos shing bsregs na 'khor g.yog 'phel// zho mar seng ldeng me la stong // bsregs na nor
49a1(rgyud): / rnyed par 'gyur// de nas dbang gi sregs lugs bshad// til dang 'bras sogs phub bsregs// bud med dbang du byed pa'o// pri yang ku yi sbyin sreg gis// byis pa rnams ni dbang
49a2(rgyud): du 'gyur// 'o ma sbrang rtsi a ru ra'i// shing la bsregs na lha dbang bad // gsum po da dang gu gul srag/ gnod sbyin rnams ni dpeng da 'gyur// mya ngan med pa'i yam shing gis// gnod sbyin mo rnam
49a3(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur// rgyal po'i yungs kar yungs mar bcas// bsreg pas rgyal po dbang du 'gyur// de nas drag pa'i las grub pa'o// sgron sreg yang dag bshad par bya// ming bcas tshad dang nas
49a4(rgyud): pa bsegs// bstan sdang dgra bo myur du 'chi// dgra ming dag gis nim pa la// bris te dug dang lhan cig tu// sbrul shun thum po lnga byos nas// thod pa lnga yi nang bzhag ste// lnga po yungs ma
49a5(rgyud): gyis bkang nas// gsum ni skyed pa gnyis brtsegs la// khros pas gcig tu skra grol bas// sngags brje da thal bar gyur bar du// nyin byed bsreg na dgra 'chings/ 
49a6(rgyud): ltas 'dab ma rtsa ba shun// ra khrag nyung mar tshwa rgya skyegs// tsha ba'i bud shing yam shing la// bdun phrag ming dang bcas pa sreg/ stong phrag gnyis kyis rta phyugs 'chi// bzhis ni bu dang
49a7(rgyud): rkang ma 'tsho// drug gis nya du gnyen 'dun brlag/ brgyad kyis dgra ya rang srog 'chad// gal te skyabasu 'ong gyur na// 'o ma stong bsregs rnal du sos// khrag dang dug phya ni ma pa'i 'bras
49a8(rgyud): yungs mar la skrag brgya rtsa brgyad// myos byed la bsregs dgra bo 'chi// yang na rus phyi nim pa'i lnga// rang gi khrag gam yungs mar sngag/ yang na ske tshe dug dang ni// rnam pa'i 'bras bu
49b1(rgyud): bsad par bya// yang ni gri khrag gis bsregs pas// byad ma myur du gsod par 'gyur// nim pa'i lnga dang ra khrag dug/ dri ma lnga bcas gzugs snying khar// ming yig bcug nas phu
49b2(rgyud): bus gdang // rig sngags byed pa nyid log 'gyur// rgya skyegs mi rus phye ma yis// mi lpags rlon pa dgra gzugs bri// dug dang ske tshe cung zad byug/ nim pa'i me la khros pas bsro// bsregs
49b3(rgyud): bas tsha ba'i rims kyis 'chi// dur ba roms sos par 'gyur/ dug dang nim pa sgog skya dang // mi rus phye bsregs phyugs rnams brlag/ tsha gsum lan tsha du rang sbyar// yungs mar ros spru
49b4(rgyud): shun dang // nim pa'i lnga dang mi rus bye/ skye tshe dug phye sgo tsang dang // sgog skye tsher ma'i me la sreg// dgra bo khwa ga tu skyugs te 'chi/ rgya skyegs lan tshab glang mkhris// bsreg
49b5(rgyud): na mchisags nad kyis 'tsho// sge'u gsher lan tshwa tsha ba gsum// gzugs brnyan dur khrod mgal dum la/ mgo nis rkang pa'i bar du srag/ thig nag gis ni gsod par
49b6(rgyud): 'gyur// 'o ma can gyi yams shing la// dkar gsum bsregs na sos par 'gyur// dri chus spangs pa'i saM las ni// bab khung byas te dug gos byug zhim pa'i 'dab mar dgra bo'i ming
49b7(rgyud): ra khrag gis bris rgyus pa dkris// tsha gsum shing gi mar bsregs pas// rgyal po myur du 'chi bar nges// dug khrag lan tshwa tsha ba gsum// ming bcas gzugs brnyan nim pa'i mer// bsregs
49b8(rgyud): na dgra bong mu rdzing ngam// mdze nad kyi ni gsod par 'gyur// tsha gsum nim pa dug dang dur/ khrag dang lan tshe'i gzugs brnyan ni// lan cha nim pa tsha ba'i mar// byugs nas arga'i shing la
50a1(rgyud): // bsregs// mdze nad chen pos gzung nas 'chi// ra khrag tshwa gsum nyung mar spos// nim pa'i lo ma na le sham// nyungs dmar dug bsregs tshabs 'chi// ne'u sha 'am dug dang tsha/ 
50a2(rgyud): lnga tsha ba gsum// sol ba la ni ngag gzugs bya// nyungs mar byugs te bsregs na 'chi// tsha gsum pa yi 'bras bu yi// nom pa'i 'dam me dgra mong bri// thod par dug nyungs lhan cig bzhag/ da ru
50a3(rgyud): ra lnga btsos na 'ching // ris ma bying du bltas nas kyang // rang nyid lho phyogs blta bar bya// tshangs pa la sogs lha tshegs dang // 'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul can// ma mo mkha' go sha za sogs// sa
50a4(rgyud): dbang phyug byang chub sems// rig 'dzini khro bo'i rgyal po dang sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor lha rnams gson// sdig can nga rgyal gdug cing khro// ched lta sngags 'phya dkon mchog
50a5(rgyud): btsem// bstan la sdang zhing sems can 'tshe// mtshams med can 'di bsgral du gsol// rlung gis 'dar zhing char gyis ga/ ra mes gdung rdul tshub skabs 'dir skye// seng ge
50a6(rgyud): mkha' lding stag khro bos// bcom zhing 'bu snang bung rgod kyis// khrag 'jib bya tshegs mkha' la khyeb// mngon spyod las kyi bsam gtano// de nas sna tshogs las bshad pa// mi rus phye ma
50a7(rgyud): skye tshe// gnod sbyin 'khrig pa dug shing la// tha dad ming bcas bsregs pas ni// bskrad dang dbye dang spro bar byed// du ro ba 'o mar bcas pas sos// da dung yan lag lnga 'bras bu// tshar ma'i mas
50a8(rgyud): bsregs myo bar byed// tsha gsum lan tshas tsha rims bskyed// yang na shing bskams lta bur bskams// jom pa'i ra dang rang sbyar bcas// dgra bo gleng ba'i rims kyis 'debs// kha'i sgro e/ 
50b1(rgyud): raH yi mar khus// byugs pa dur ma la sreg/ lag stebs khwa ta lta bur ni// dgra bos mtha' kun tu 'khyam// ske tshom rus lan tsha dug/ nyungs mar nim pa'i me la sreg// dgra bo rtag tu 'tha
50b2(rgyud): pa dang // nad rnams kun gyis 'debs par 'gyur// dur khrid thal ba sol bar bcas// dge bo'i gzugs byas dum bur mnan// tsham ngam phur bus 'debs pa ni// po la mig nang ngan spyad par bye
50b3(rgyud): bya rgod 'ug pa byi la shaM/ ne'u lo'i bu rnams khyer ba'i mer// drug cu rtsa brgyad bsregs pa yis// mthun gnyis myur du 'byed par ngas// khrag can ras la gzugs bris nas// rkang g.yon sker ma na/ 
50b4(rgyud): ma dam bcas// 'dod bcas sngags ni drag po yis// brgya la dang rims nad mcher nad bskyed// dgra yau sgo dang rkang rjes sa// dgra gzugs dug dang ske tshes byug// chos mes
50b5(rgyud): na rengs par 'gyur// ngagra yi pha rus dug rang sbyar// gzug sa byad ni ma pa'i mer bsregs na// dgra bo gden chen nad kyis 'debs// bag drug sU ha arga'i shing // tshe
50b6(rgyud): sregs na mgo 'khor 'gyur// ne'u la bi la byi tshor spu// bsregs na bud bu brlag 'gyur// mi dang na'u le kha rus pa// yung mar nom pa'i me la srag// gong dang grong khyer bskrad par byed// stag tu
50b7(rgyud): zod rus 'ug pa'i spu// sa ha ma tog na la sham// nim pa'i lo ma dug bsregs byed// nom pa'i 'bras bu dag lan tshwa// da dur 'bra bsregs nad bskyed byed// dug khrag da dur yi 'bras bu yos
50b8(rgyud): nib pa'i shing la dgra ming bri// tshe gsum lan cha khrag gis byugs// lcags snod yungs mar bzhag nas/ nom pa'i shing gos me yis gtso// dgra bo lha dang 'bred par 'gyur// mi khi bya rked
51a1(rgyud): // rus bye drug/ ske tshe yungs mar sbrul shun dang // nim pa'i lnga dang skags lan tshwa// tsher mes bsreg na nad kyis 'debs// skra tshe du sbrul cha ba'i mar// gzugs byas tsha ba'i
51a2(rgyud): me la gdung // char ches pa dang thog 'bab 'gyur// ri phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtag pa bsdus pa'i rgyu las// sbyin sreg le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas tshangs pa khyab 'jug sa
51a3(rgyud): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tha~Md kyis// bzhengs te thal mo sbyar nas kyang // snyan pas che du brjod// a ma sangs rgyas bde la// thabs dang shes rab bsam du med// thugs rjes gyur pa'i thun gyis ni
51a4(rgyud): mtshungs med rgya ched dam chos gsungs// dug gi 'a jigs pas sa stengs 'alakhrigs// nyon mongs mun 'jigs med pa yi bdud rtsi 'od bzang 'di gus na// ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa stong pa
51a5(rgyud): 'gyur// de nas tshangs sogs 'jig rten skyi / rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kun 'dus nas// ngam zhing che du brjod pa'i snyan pa'i tshig gis rab tu gsol// e ma sangs rgyas che
51a6(rgyud): ba'i bdag// sen kun la sman par dgyes// skyob chen 'dzag rten mi gon pa yis// me tshungs med bsam gyi mi khyab babs// gsungs pa 'di la gang gnas pa// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgya
51a7(rgyud): sbyong 'gro la sman mthong bsgrubs pas ni// lhag pa'i bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams kyis// ngo mtshar spyan ni gdangs na su// 
51a8(rgyud): ched du brjod pa 'di brjod// e ma sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab// gdod nas thugasu 'gro don chud// rtog mad rang bzhin las grol nas// bsam gyis mi khyab go 'phang gsungs// 'chang
51b1(rgyud): byed dang po ngan 'gro gcod// gnyis pa mthong chos dngos grub byed// de rjes 'jigs me dang yi med// dogs pa spangs na zad par gyis// sa la bzhugs nas sen don// ma bsapas thogs pa
51b2(rgyud): med par byed// gsang sngags rgyal po skyobs kun la// sbyangs nas 'dod don kun grub ste// na mkha' chu ser dag pa ltar// sgom pa bla med yid rgyas byed// de nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs// 
51b3(rgyud): ma lus pa rnams 'dus nas kyang // gtso la me tig gtor byas te// che du brjod pa 'di brjod// e ma sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab// dam pa'i chos kyang bsam mi khyab/ 'grel par dang don byeng
51b4(rgyud): ba'i mcho ga'i ming dang shes rab dang // snying rje dab bas rgyas gyur nas// mnar med la sogs ngan 'gro yi// 'dzin rnams las rgal pad+ma ltar// rnal 'bor can 'byor can de ba
51b5(rgyud): par skyed// de nas mthu stobs cher ldan pa'i// khyo gas bcu'i khro bo kun 'das nas// shin tu ngas pas snyad tshigs/ cha du brjod pa 'di brjed// e ma sangs rgyas chos chen dang // 
51b6(rgyud): 'dun dkon mchog bsapa mi khab// 'khor ba'i mun pa chen po re ni// bying bas de lta dka' rtogs pa yis// sngags dang phyag rgya bas pa mi khyab// mthong dang thos pa tsam gyis kyang // bltar/ 
51b7(rgyud): 'byung po drag po rnams// lhag pa'i sems ni skyes par 'gyur// de nas rig pa'i lha mo che// spyan la sogs pa rgya chen rnams// ngo mtshar gyur nas spyan gdas te// snyan pas chedadu 'di brjed// 
51b8(rgyud): ma sangs rgyas rmang byung // e pa sangs rgyas dpa' 'o che// a ma sangs rgyas rab tu zab// ches rnams skye med 'gag pa med// sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs rol bltar// sgyu ma gdul bye tshim mdzad pa
52a1(rgyud): // spros pa dang bral spros pa ltar// sgyu ma rab tu 'phel bar mdzad// de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams// stong gsum mi mjed 'jig rten khams// gdul ba dag la rab gzigs
52a2(rgyud): nas 'dul mdzad rdo rje 'chang ba la// de mtshar rmad kyi gsung gis ni// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod// oM zhes dang po phyag 'tshal bkra shis ster byed pa// ser sna rnam par dag nas yo byad dbang thob
52a3(rgyud): dang dang gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ni// rab dga' yis khro bo khams gsum rnam rgyal 'dad// tsaN+Da yig dri bzang tsan byugs dang ngang tshul mtshungs// tshul khrims rnar dag
52a4(rgyud): bas tshe la dbang ba dang // las dang rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ni// dri mad ye shes khro rgyal mi g.yo phyag 'tsha'o// Da yog nyon mongs sgrib pa gtor ba'i ni gnas dang
52a5(rgyud): bzod pa dag pa skye ba la dbang thob pa dang // mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa zhes bya'i stobs dang ni// 'od 'phro ye shes khro bo dbyug sngon phyag 'tshalo// ma yig sgyu 'phrul chen po lhag
52a6(rgyud): mthong che ba'i bdag/ brtson 'grus dag pas sems la yang dag dbang thob dang / khams kyi rnam pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ni// 'od byed ye shes gshin rje gshid po phyag 'tsha'o/ 
52a7(rgyud): yig ma chags shes bya'i sgrib 'phrog sbyangs pa che// bsam gtan dag pas rdzu 'phrul la ni dbang thob dang // thad dag tu 'gro ba'i lam dag stobs dang ni// sbyang dka' ye shes rta mgron kho bo
52a8(rgyud): phyag 'tsha'o// ro log 'khor 'das nad bral shes dag las dbang thob// bsam gtan nam thar ting 'dzin dang ni snyom zhugs pa'i// kunas nyon mongs rnam byang lta ba kun mkhyen stongs/ 
52b1(rgyud): mngon gyur ye shes 'dod pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshalo// Sha yig mnyam nyid sdom chen dbang phyug chen po rgyal// stobs chen dag las mos pa la ni dbang thob dang // sngon gyi gnas rnams rjes
52b2(rgyud): dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs// ring du song ba'i ye shes bdud rtsi 'khyil la 'dud// Na yig skyes bu chen po sgra chen klu mchog gtso// smon lam dag pas smon lam che la dbang thob dang / dbang po
52b3(rgyud): mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mi khyen pa'i stobs// mi go yo ye shes khro bo stabs chen phyag 'tsha'o// hU~M yig hU~M lu sprin gdengs 'brug sgra gang rgyangs can// thabs dag pas ni ye shes
52b4(rgyud): la dbang thob dang // 'chi 'pho dang ni gang zhig skya ba mkhyen pa'i stebs// legs pa'i blo gros ye shes khro bo hUM mdzad 'dud// phaT sgras bag chags kun gtor dag pas shel dang mchu
52b5(rgyud): ye shes dag pas chos la dbang ni thob pa dang / bag bzed yang dag zad pas mkhyen pa'i stobs// chos kyi sprin gyi ye shes khro bo gnod mdzes 'dud// de nas chos rje thung
52b6(rgyud): pas ni// ljags kyi dbang po bkram byas nas// 'dzum pa mdzad pas rab gzigs te// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus// lag na rdo rje mthu chen la// snyan pa'i gsung gis pa/ 
52b7(rgyud): stsal pa// mchog tu brtan par rab bsngags pa// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// mi gang bsod nams dman pa 'am// mtshams med la sogs byed pa yang // rgyud 'dor zhugs pa'i de ma thag
52b8(rgyud): gser 'gyur gyi ni rtsa bzhin du// log rtog ma lus dag nas kyang // rtog med bde ba'i skur byung te// rmi lam bzang po'i sems bzhin du// rnam 'phral sna tshogs cir yang snang / mu
53a1(rgyud): // mtha' med pa 'khor ba'i mtsho// bskal pa'i gzings chen bla med 'di// chags gsang med pa'i tshul du ni// khyod kyis rtag tu gzung bar bya// lag na rdo rje stebs pa ches// sten
53a2(rgyud): la ni 'di gsol to// rgyud 'di byung ba thag tu ni// gdul dka' ba ni rab tu zhi// sa steng nang dang gdon mu ge/ bar ched gnod pa kun dang bral// slar yang bstan pa 'phel ba'i phyir// brtan por ba
53a3(rgyud): gis gzung bar bgyi// de pe'o mkha' gre dag po rnams// yid kyis brtul zhugs phyug nas kyang // rgyud 'di 'dzin pa'i rje su 'breng // lha dang 'job rten pa dang ni// ma mo srin mo mkha' gro ma// 
53a4(rgyud): shaza gnod sbyin srin po rnams// rgyud 'di 'dzin pa sbyong bar byed// rgyud 'dzin long spyod spel bar byed// ston pas gsu ngas pa rdo rje 'dzin// legaso shin tu cher leg so// rgyud 'dzin
53a5(rgyud): rnal 'byor can chen de// rgyun tu srung zhing blo 'phel mdzod// de skad kyin gsung thos nas// byang chub seda' nyan thos dang // mkha' gro ma mo 'jig rten skyong // lha klu gnad sbyin dus
53a6(rgyud): bcas// bde ldan pa'i 'khor de rnams// dgyes ta thal sbyar mengon par dgar// mi g.yo thugs rje'i lcags kyu bzung bas 'khor ba'i gcon ra nas// lha klu 'bum phrag 'tsha bral dkar
53a7(rgyud): dge ba'i kun slong sems// skyes nas byang chub rin chen nor thob mdzad pas rmad byung mtshar// rgyas pa'i tshul bsdus bstan pa'i chos 'di dman la shin+d+ra gsang // 'phags pa rdo rje khro bor
53a8(rgyud): rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa las// mngon par dga' ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// 'phags pa rdo rje khro ba'i rgyal po'i rtag pa bsdus brdzog so// // rgya gar ska du/ Ar+ya kAny+tsa
53b1(rgyud): ti nA mad+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub seMde thad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcos
53b2(rgyud): ma lta bu ni// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song te phyin nas// bcos kyi zhabs la man
53b3(rgyud): bos phyag 'tshal te// phyogs gcig du 'du'o// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag yul po
53b4(rgyud): mchis te// g.yul 'gyed pa na// lha ma yin gyi sgra dang / rig sngags rnams dang // gsang sngags dang / sman dag gis pham par gyur pa mkhyen lags sam// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
53b5(rgyud): rjesu gzung ba dang // bdag cag la thugs brtse ba dang / lha ma yin rnams kyi sgyu dang // rig sngags dang // gas sngags dang / sman rab tu gzhom pa dang // rab tu gzhig
