53b6(rgyud): slad du// rnam par rgyal ba chen po'i legs par bstan du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ke'u shi ka/ deng bzhin// lha ma yin
53b7(rgyud): dang g.yul sprad pa na// rig sngags rnams dang / gsang sngags rnams dang / sman rnams kyis phan pa de de bzhin te/ kau'u shi ka/ snying brtsa ba'i phyir// 'dir rig sngags brjod par bya ste/ sgyu
53b8(rgyud): thed rangs par byed pa rig sngags zad bzlog par byed pa/ gsang sngags thams cad phas par byed pa/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'tshang 'bru ba dang / 'bab mo dang / 'gyed pa thad rab tu zhi bar phyi
54a1(rgyud): gsang sngags dang sman thang gcod pa'i rig sngags bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// de'i tshe rig sngags chen po gser can bka' stsal pa// gang bskal pa sra
54a2(rgyud): med pa gsum du// gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa dang / kun tu rgya dang gcar bu pa rnams kyis ngan du bsams shing // bar cha du byas pa las// ngas de tshun chad sgyu dang ldan pa rnams kyi// rig/ 
54a3(rgyud): sngags thang bzlog nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par byas te/ gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa dang / 'tshe ba rnams kyi rgyu dang / rig sngags dang / sman dang / 
54a4(rgyud): bdud kyi sde thaMd rab tu 'joms pa'i rig pa chen po dngas bshad par byas/ ko ru shi ka/ khyod kyis sen tha~Mng rjesu bzung ba'i phyir/ gsang sngags chen po rnar rgyal ba chen po zung shig/ 
54a5(rgyud): brjes de bzhin zhes gsol te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'ad kyis de'i tshe rog sngags chen po gser can 'di dag bka
54a6(rgyud): stsa la to// tad+ya thA/ au hi ni hi ni/ hI li hi li/ mi liM mi li/ hi mi li/ ni haM ra bA ni/ kAny+tsa nA pa ti/ lo ka mA ta/ b+hu te/ b+hu ta man+ta/ a d+hi kri te ba de be de be ta man+ta/ i d+hi kr-i te/ ha na ha na/ ha sa ha sa/ 
54a7(rgyud): tsin+da/ b+han+da b+hin+ma/ b+ha ga ba ti/ dza ya bi dza ye/ dzam+b+ha ni/ stam+b+ha ni ban+tan/ mo ha ni/ a mau g+ha shak+Shi d+ha ri Ni/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ kI Da ma mA na si/ dzam+b+ha ya/ dzam+b+ha ya/ b+heny+dzA ya/ b+hany+dza ya/ stas+thA ya stam+b+ha ya
54a8(rgyud): ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/ me ha ya mo ha la/ lha'i sgyu dang / klu'i sgyu dang / gnod sbyin gyi sgyu dang / srin po'i sgyu dang / na mkhar ljang go sgyu dang / dri za'i spyi dang / lha ma yin gyi sgra dang / mi 'am ci'i sgyu dang // 
54b1(rgyud): 'phye chen po'i sgra dang / rig sngags 'chang gi sgra dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i rgyal po'i sgra dang / drang srong gi sgra dang / sems can dang / rig sngags 'chang zang kyi sgra dang / 'byung po'i sgra dang / 
54b2(rgyud): sgyu zadar la ra la/ radz+dza radz+dza/ d+hu ma d+hu ma/ d+ha d+ha ma/ rA ba rA ba rA ba na/ tsakrA na tan/ gran tha ni/ ha na ha na/ sarba bid+yA/ sha tA NA na/ stam+b+ha ya/ b+ha yun stam+b+ha ya/ sUr+yAn stam+b+ha yaM/ so nan stam+b+ha ya/ 'a ru
54b3(rgyud): s+t+raim+b+ha ya/ ag+nin stam+b+ha ya/ ud na ne d+hi tid+hi ti/ d+hA ra Ni/ pA sha ha ste/ beSh+Ta ya bA she na/ gang dag bdag la phyir rgol ba rnams dang // ngagra rnams dang / sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan
54b4(rgyud): pa rnams dang / 'thab pa dang / rab tu 'thab pa dang // mi phan par 'dod pa thad ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+hany+dza ya/ b+hany+dza ya/ dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya/ stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/ ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/ mo ha ya
54b5(rgyud): mo ha yaHma hA mo ha ni/ b+ha ga ba ti swAhA/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba thaMd las bsrungs shig bsrungs shig/ phaT swAhA/ ko'u shi ka/ rigs
54b6(rgyud): kyo bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po chen po gang la la zhig gser can gyi rig sngags 'di rje su dran par byed/ de la pha rol gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung // de'i sde
54b7(rgyud): la pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi tshug so// lhas ma yin/ klus ma yin// gnod sbyin gyis ma yin/ srin pos ma yin// dri zas ma yin/ lha ma yin gyis ma yin// na mkha' lding gi
54b8(rgyud): ma yin// mi 'am cis ma yin/ rig sngags 'chang gis ma yin// mkha' go mas ma yin// dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ rig sngags dang / gsang sngags pa
55a1(rgyud): // smad rnams kyis mi tshugs// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi tshugs pa rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur// lus la mtshon gyi mi tshugs// lus
55a2(rgyud): me dang / chu dang / dug dang / rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman rnams kyis mi tshug so// gang gis sdig pa byas pa dang / byed du bcug pa dang / rje su yi rang ba de nyid la slar 'bab par 'gyur
55a3(rgyud): de nyid slar 'gro bir 'gyuraro// ko'u shi ka de lta bas na// dad pa'i dge slong ma/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am// rogs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos/ rig sngags 'di tshul
55a4(rgyud): lan bdun bzlas te/ bdag gi lus la blugs na/ bdag gi lus srung bar 'gyuraro// 'jigs pa thams cadang / gnod pa bang dang / yams kyi nad dang / nad 'ge ba thad dang / rig sngags zad da
55a5(rgyud): gsang sngags dang / sman thams cadang / byad thams cad las shin tu 'das par 'dod pas// gser can gyi rig snga/ 'di ngan par bya'o// rgyal po 'am// rgyal po'i blon po pha rol
55a6(rgyud): gyi dmigs tshogs gzhom pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'dul bar 'dod pas// gser can gyi rigs sngags 'dun par bya'o// lan bdun bzlas te mdud pa bdun bor ba'i srad bu gdags
55a7(rgyud): par bya ba 'am/ tshul lan bdun bzlas pas bdag srung bar bya'o// 'dzegs pa thad la thogs pa med pa'i gzugs yi ger bris te 'chang bar bya/ mgul du gdags par bya'o// yi ger bris nas
55a8(rgyud): rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ g.yul du zhugs na dge ba dang bde bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'di'i stobs kyis nang mi dang / g.yog 'khor dang / snga dang bcas te dag pa dang / bde bar
55b1(rgyud): rgal bar 'gyuraro// ma grub pa rnams kyang grub par 'gyuraro// rig sngags rengs par byed par 'dod pas// srad bu dkar po la lan bdun bzlas te/ mdud pa bdun bor na/ bcings pa dang / rengs bdus
55b2(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// sgra rangs par byed par 'dod pas dur khrod kyis la lan bdun bzlas te/ gtor na smra rangs par byas par 'gyuraro// 'gyed pa'o tshe kha lkugs par byed pas/ zin thig le la lan bdun
55b3(rgyud): bzlas te/ 'chos na smra ba tha~Md kyi lan thebs par 'gyuraro// bklag par bya// kha ton du bya/ brjod par bya ste// brjod pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// gang gis byas par gyur
55b4(rgyud): ba dang / gang gis bsams par gyur pa de nyid la slad 'gro'o// srang bu btags sam/ chus bdag srung bar byas na de'i lus la rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman thad
55b5(rgyud): mi tshugs// ma grub pa rnams grub par 'gyuraro//  'don thams cad kyang 'thun par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin yi phas te/ 
55b6(rgyud): brjes kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod// // 'phags pa gser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / da na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de
55b7(rgyud): shes sdes bsgyur cing / zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// // dge'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs spaT dang btsam
55b8(rgyud): byang chub seMda'i sada' chen po/ spyad ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// na maHsarba bud+d+ha/ bi d+hi satwA nAn/ sa man+ta a mo g+ha/ a pra ti ha ta/ shA sa nA nAn/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ ma rboH
56a1(rgyud): // satwA ya/ badz+ra satwA ya/ badz+ra bi pu lA ya/ pad+ma sa~M b+ha bA ya/ pad+ma lo na ye/ tad+ya thA/ oM hrIHka ra/ shrI ka ra pra b+ha ka ra badz+ra satwa/ badz+ra sa~M b+ha ga/ pad+ma sa~M b+ha ga pad+ma sA ga ra/ pad+ma go tsa ra/ 
56a2(rgyud): ba ra da/ mahA kA ru No ka/ ka ru Na saM b+ha ba hUM hAM/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ da ra da ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka ma hA shud+d+ha satwa swAhA/ de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs bzad kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ 
56a3(rgyud): byang chub seMdar sada' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phrugs gi mgo bo la byugs te/ bka' stsal ga/ yo rten rin po che'i phung po chen po khyod kyis gzungs sngags 'di bshad pas// seMn rnams
56a4(rgyud): la sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i chos bstan pa legaso lag so// 'di ni thos pa tsam gyis kyang / sems can rnams shin+d+ha rnam par dag par byed pa'o// gang la la nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 
56a5(rgyud): kun chub par byed pa das yon phun sum tshogs pa thad dang / dag pa'i mchog kyang thob par 'gyuraro// de nas lha'i bad/ po dbang phyug chen po dpag tshad 'bum phrag du mar khyab cing
56a6(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams gsum po kun tu rgyas ko lta ste/ 'khor dang bcas pa dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa'i byang chub se dar thad kyis mgo bo btud nas 'phags pa spyan ras gnan da
56a7(rgyud): byugs la sa'i dbang phyug dbang po rnar brtsa ba zhes bya ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas mngon par bstod pa// sa yi dbang phyug rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ba// srid gsum ma lus ston chen po'i
56a8(rgyud): bdag/ dri med skyon bral gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor can// snying rjes khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya che ba// rab dga' rab dgyes rab tu ston pa'o// bskal pa bzang po rnam par zhi ba'i mtsho// shin+d+ha
56b1(rgyud): rnam ngag yon tan chen po'i bdag/ rnam dag du mar grags pa'i me tog thod// rab mchog srid gsum dag gi mog gcig pa// mchog sbyin 'gro ba kun gyi 'byor pa mdzes// dpag med pa
56b2(rgyud): kyang dpag med bskal par 'byung // skyabs dang yid 'phrog dag cing sel bar mdzad// nor bu'i thod can rdo rje las byung ba// srid gsum gcig pu dpa' bo pad+ma'i spyad/ thos pa'i rgya mtsho sen kun
56b3(rgyud): pas dpa'// 'gro ba thad rnam par grol mdzad mchog/ snyan cha 'gul zhing pad+ma dag pa bsnams// dbang phyug bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i thor tshugs can/ tshul bzang yon skyen du mtshams pa'i
56b4(rgyud): gzugs// 'jigs pa'i rlung chen 'chub pa'i mtshon cha can// dge ba'i rgyu ste dam pa stsol ba'i rgyu// tshul gyi lo spyod pa de can mchog rgyu// dkyil 'khor mchogi spyod yul
56b5(rgyud): rgyu gcig pa// srid gsum sgrol ba'i zam pa gcig pu lags// dkyil 'khor mchog rgyan te sdig med pa// gser mdog 'od rgyan rten du gyur pa ste// mnyam pa nyid kyis mi mnyam mtshus
56b6(rgyud): bar 'byung // sa brnyas 'od zer rgyas pa rgyan phreng mngar// chen po'i che ba thogs pa med pa ste// snga ma mun pa kun bsal nyon mongs med// dge ba dag pas spyod yul rnam par dag/ tshul gyi dkyis
56b7(rgyud): 'khor yangs shing rnar dag/ srid gsum dbang phyugs pad+ma las byung ba// srid gsum bde tshan yangs pa'i dbang phyug ste// dbang phyug mo g.yo rnal 'byor mkhas pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa
56b8(rgyud): chen po rab mchog yangs// nor bu'i rgyan du rdo rje'i rgyan du thogs// pad+ma sa brgyan pa lhun po las byung ba// dge sdang yon chen po'i snod gcig pa// bde la long skyed rnam 'dren chen po'i bdag
57a1(rgyud): smon lam rgya chen rgya mtsho ldan pa ste// 'go ba srid par lhung gol mdzad pa// sa dang mnyam pa thams cad gzigs par mdzad// skal bzang bskal pa stong gis gnang ba po// rdo rje mchog gis
57a2(rgyud): bsgregs pa'i dkyil 'khor can// ston rnam grangs khyad par dkyil 'khor lo// dge ba'i mtshan nyid dpa' bo'i rtsal mnga' ba// de bzhin chos ro mkhyen spyod yul can// cod pan thig le dbar po'i dkyil
57a3(rgyud): 'khor ldan/ lha chen brgya mnga' sub cu gsum bdag dbang // lha dang lha min dbang bcas rnams kyis btud// brtson 'grus brgya dang ldan zhing rtsal stong mnga'// bsod nams brgya mnga' mchos
57a4(rgyud): cha brgya 'chang ba// pad+ma brgya pa pad+ma nyid las byung // dkyil 'khor brgya yi dbus nas mdzes pa ste// chos ba rgya ldan pa mchog stong ston pa po// sangs rgyas stong phrag ma
57a5(rgyud): bos yongs bstod pa// bskalnga rab 'byam mang par mkhas pa ste// dkyil 'khor mang po dag na dpa' ba'i sku/ 'jig rten 'das pa'i mthu mnga' ston pa'o// rgya chen dri med
57a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs// rab dga' ba springs pa 'bor mdzad ma tog thod// na bza' dar dkar la banabs 'od mdzad pa// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor thugs rjes rgyan pa lags// cha
57a7(rgyud): phrang gser mdzad mtha' yas zad mi shes// dpa' bo'i nyim 'od zer rgyan mnga' ba// nor bu'i dkyil 'khor zla 'di 'od gsal zhing // nyi mas kha phye pad+ma mchog bsdams pa/ me tog mtshon
57a8(rgyud): chathegs pa'i lha zhes grags// gtsug phud gsum pa tshangs sras skye dgu'i bdag/ btsun rigs mchog ste rigs chen nang du skyes// rang gi rigs gsal dbang chen dkyil 'khor la/ 
57b1(rgyud): pad+ma bzang po'i rigs mchog thig le'i mtshan// spyan bzang dge ba'i lha rnams rten gyur pa// gsang sngags mang po 'dzin pa'i dbang phyug po// tshogs chen 'dun ma 'dus pa'i mngar bdag
57b2(rgyud): spyan gsum dag gis dkyil 'khor mdzes gyur gau// ka la bing ka'i skad kyis sdang ba 'dul// mda' dang rus gzhu stobs chen mtshon cha bsnams// stobs kyi lha ste stobs dang brtson pas 'dul// 
57b3(rgyud): rgyan rnams sna tshogs legs par spras pa ste// rgyal ba rig sngags 'chang ba mang pos bstod// tshogs mchog dga' byed rnams kyis rab bstod pa// chu srin 'dzin khri 'jigs las rab
57b4(rgyud): grol mdzad// gzugs mang mnga' zhing bde skying rab sbyin pa// lha yul grol ba'i khyad par dkyil 'khor can// mtshungs med pas kyang mtshungs med mthu rtsal mngara'// stabs gshegs
57b5(rgyud): yod che mchog 'od zer ldan// 'jig rten na na mkhas pa spyan ras gzigs// sa gzhi'i dkyil 'khor dbus kyi dkyil 'khor can// 'od zer mang po stong phrag zad mi shes
57b6(rgyud): shas// nyon mongs rdul rnams thad sel mdzad pa// mtha' dang bral ba kun tu gzigs pa ste// rab zhi kun las 'phags pa'i spyod yul can// don dam tshul la sems can gcig dpa' ba
57b7(rgyud): theg pa bzang po 'dzin pa'i nyi ma lags// dul dang sbyin dang tshul la dad pa brnyas/ skye dgu rnams kyi ngom ma lus bcom// blo gros bzang po rab dgyes ston pa'o// bde ldan gos rgyun
57b8(rgyud): yang ba sna tshogs can// bcom ldan 'byung ba 'jigs pa med par mdzad// rtag tu dge ba kun mchog sbyin pa'o// rgyal bas gsung ba'i rnam thar brnyes pa'i blo// bde la long spyod ma
58a1(rgyud): / 'byung dri ma med// zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas shing dri med pa/ ming dang srid med brgya byin lag pa'i mchog/ 'jig rten mang po gzigs pa'i dbang phyug po// stobs dang rigs dang
58a2(rgyud): mthu stobs che ba lags// sangs rgyas mtshungs shing chos mchog rin chen mtshangs// dge 'dun mtshungs shing chags bral thub par dka'// khyad par gsum 'phags rin chen mchog chen
58a3(rgyud): mtshungs// khyab bdag nyon mongs rnam gsum rdul bsal ba la/ rdo rje sems mchog khyod la phyag 'tshalo// pad+ma dri med phyag gi dbus bsnams pa// thor tshugs can la gzugs ldan cod pa
58a4(rgyud): thogs/ spyi ba~M 'od dpag mang rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan rang byung mun sal ba// rnga chen sgra ltar brtan pas ba ka' stsal pa// mchog che rdo rje'i klu la bstod pa yi// ming brgya
58a5(rgyud): rtsa brgyad skyon sel legs pa mnga'/ ci ste la la rtag tu dge mchog 'dod// spyan ras gzigs dbang la ni bstod byed pa/ des ni ring po mi thogs yin gyi// long spyod mchog ca
58a6(rgyud): chos ni thob par 'gyur// mi ni gang zhig rtag tu 'dis bstod la// spyan ras gzigs dbang dam pa smin par byang // sdig pa rnams kyang de la 'byung mi 'gyur// 'dod pa gang yin bde blags de yi
58a7(rgyud): 'thob// de ni sdig pa'i dri mas ma gos te// lam sras bzang por dmigs te 'gro bar 'gyur/ srid gsum skyabs 'os gcig pu pad+ma skyes// de 'dri'i chos kyi mchog la spyod par 'gyur// de ltar
58a8(rgyud): ming gi khyad pang grub 'dod cing // gang zhig rtag tu bde bar 'dod pa yis// 'gro kun skye dgu'i bdag po spyad ras gzigs/ pad+ma las byung rtag tu bstod par gyis// bcos bla ma/ 
58b1(rgyud): dbang phyugs mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags bcas pa rdzogaso// / 'phags pa byams pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sedal sede'i chen
58b2(rgyud): byams pa la phyag 'tsha lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas rang gi snying po gsungs pa/ namAste ya d+hi ka nan/ sarba ta thA ga tA nAn/ tad+ya thA/ oM sa ra sa ra/ su ru su ru/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA d+ha ra
58b3(rgyud): tsa ra tsa ra/ ma hA tsa ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ma hA b+ha ra/ kam+ba kam+ba/ ma hI kam+ba hAM/ ma hA s+pha ra Na/ d+harma a gra sA ga ra swA hA/ de ne saM de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi 'di skad ces bka' stsa la to// kye ma gzungs chen
58b4(rgyud): po ni yod che ba// mtha' yas par khyab pa/ bskal 'bye ba phrag mang por yang shin tu thos par dka' ba/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba zang ston pa// de bzhin gshegs pa grangs mang
58b5(rgyud): pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snyed kyis ste/ na bkur mdzad pa// sgrib pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa thams cad las thar
58b6(rgyud): byed pa'o// sen gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa yongasu thar par byed pa ste// shin tu dkon pa'o// de nas rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lha dang / lha ma yin du bcas pas nor bu'i cod pan
58b7(rgyud): gyis bsgyings pa/ rgyan phreng rab tu g.yo ba rnams kyis spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas// byang chus nga'i mchog 'phags pa byams pa la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ dpa' bo
58b8(rgyud): chen po thabs brnyes pa/  rgyal chab mi yi bdag po ste/ 'jig rten bdag po rnar gsal// dang ba chen po mngon par rgyas// tshan chen stobs ldan che ba ste// de bzhin gabye shing rdul dang bral/ 
59a1(rgyud): // dbang chen brtse ldan 'od ldan pa// sa yi dbang phyug rnam par gnon// rgyal chen potshon cha brgya pa ste// mtshon cha chen po rdo rje'i mtshon// yon 'od sgyings pa ste// nor bu'i rna cha'i
59a2(rgyud): rgyan thogs pa// srid gsum dag na dpa' ba'i sku/ rgya mtsho lta bu'i spyod yul can// lhun po zla 'byin te se yi// rtse nas dkyil 'khor 'char ba po// dkyil 'khor chen po long spyod pa// rab tu dga' ba de
59a3(rgyud): bzhin des// yongasu dga' ldan chen po'i lha// che ba lha rnams kun gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas gdung brgyad rgyas mdzad cing // sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rgyan dang ldan// sangs rgyas long spyod len
59a4(rgyud): bar spyod// sangs rgyas bstan pa ston pa po// ti si zla 'byin pa zhin du gnas// sa yi dbang phyug bde mdzad pa// rdo rje'i pad+ma legs par skyes// chos kyi long spyod lengs par spyod// / 
59a5(rgyud): dang mnyam pa thub par dka'// snang bar mdzes pa 'byung ba'o// srid gsum ye shes nyi ma lags// gtso bo chen po cher grags pa// seng+ge chen po stobs po che// cha lugs tshon po
59a6(rgyud): zhal cha ba// skye bo ngan dang sdug bsngal 'dul// rdo rje byi ru bai DUR+Ya/ nor bu'i dbu rgyan du thogs// byi ru gser gyi gcal bkram la// sku chen zhabs kyi stabs kyis gshegs// zhal gdangs nyi ma du
59a7(rgyud): ma'i gzi// lcang lo rjed pa na debu thod can// rig sngags 'chang brgyas zhabs la gtugs// brjod par bya ba rnams kyis mchod// norare bu rgyan 'gul 'od zer gyis// brang gi phyogs rnams dag pa
59a8(rgyud): byas bcod pan can te 'od 'char ba// nyi ma bye ba rgya 'od ldan// rin chen sna tshogs mchog bkram zhing // dri med dkyil 'khor rab tu 'phro// rlung gis ma lus bskyod pa yi// 'bar ba chen po'i lnga/ 
59b1(rgyud): ba can// 'od zer mang pos phog pa yi// phan pa'i thabs ni rab ston pa// brjid pa'i tshul gyis bshad pa yi// 'od kyi zhal gsal rnga yab bskyod// dpung rgyan 'od zer spel bar bkod// tshon bris
59b2(rgyud): shin tu mdzes par 'tsher// lhun po phrad cing 'khrug pa ltar// ha ha zhes pa'i sgra chen sgrogs// rdo rje chen po'i rtse mo can// shin+ta dga' mdzad bde sbyin pa// byams pa'i dkyil 'khor go char bgos
59b3(rgyud): btsan pa kun las rnam par rgyal// snying rje'i stobs las byung ba ste// mtshon cha chen po shin tu 'bar// byams pa byams pa'i rtog pa can// kun nas dpa' ba'i dkyil 'khor ba// ma pa mthub me
59b4(rgyud): dag pa ste// sangs rgyas cha lugs mnyam mang che// byams pa'i snying po snying po che// byams pa'i pad+ma las byung ba// rdo rje 'chang chen rdo rje can// rdo rje'i bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor ba// rig sngags
59b5(rgyud): 'chang ba rnams kyi btud// de bzhin bsten cing bstod pa'o// grwa ba ba chen po'i rig sngags grub// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor mdzes par mdzad// thad grub mdzad grub pa'o// sang+yas
59b6(rgyud): gdung gi sdong chen lags// gsang sngags chen po'i rna ngas// mdo sde'i bkod pa mdo sdud pa// nges gyur ngas pa'i 'od sgron gyi// sdang bas dri ma sel bar mdzad// 'bar ba rtsa mar 'od snang ba
59b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dkar po che ba ste// gzhung dang 'thun pa'i chos dbyings dang // nye bar gyur cing shin+d+re ngas// swA hA swAhA'i bdag po mchig/ 'od zer bde legs bde legs mdzad// stobs che 'chang ba 'akris
59b8(rgyud): pa/ nyi ma 'dra ste snyoms pa lags// stobs byeng rgyal ba'i lo spyod ldan/ mkhar ltar dri med spyod yul cin// dpa' bo rdo rjes 'joms par mdzad// rdo rje chen po rab sgrub pa// sgrub pa po ste rtsod pa
60a1(rgyud): // dkyil 'khor ldan 'ardo rdzas ston/ glu chen shugs kyis bskyod pa 'i// g.yo dang 'brug sgrogs smra ldan pa/ sangs rgyas spyod yul pad+ma ste/ de banan nyid kyi tsholas skyes/ mdzin pa
60a2(rgyud): chen po mngon shes brnyes// khab bdag sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// de nas sa yi dbang phyug po// byams pa'i dkyil 'khor byams pa la// bstod nas kun mkhan gnod bral ba// thub pa'i nyi mas
60a3(rgyud): bka' stsal pa// kye ma ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog/ ming go ljon 'od ldan la// bde dang phun sum tshogs sgrub pa// thabs chen bla na med pa ste// ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni// 'jig rten kun gyis
60a4(rgyud): bde byed pa// 'di ni gton pa tsam gyis kyang // sdig pa thang dag par 'gyur// sdig pa dang las rgyal ba yi// byams pa bstod pa 'i gnas po la// ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'dis// ming na la
60a5(rgyud): gang bstod pa// de la lha la sogs kun dang / ga na rdo rje stobs chen rnams// rtag pa nyid du sdug bsngal kun/ gtan du bsal phyir brtson par byed// gang zhig ming brgya rtsa
60a6(rgyud): brgyad mchog/ myur du 'don pa'i mi de ni// sangs rgyas sa yang thob 'gyur te// 'di la the tsom yod mdo/ ning par mal nas langs nas ni// gleng zhig byams pa'i sems kyis bstod// de la byas
60a7(rgyud): par rtogs pa yi// byams pa bde legs byed par 'gyur// de phyir dri ma zad sal byed cing // sdig 'joms yon zad bskyed pa dang // de bzhin 'jog rten sdug bsngal sel ba yi// ming brgya
60a8(rgyud): brgyang ched du dag par lhogs// 'phags po byams pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa// gzu na dang bcas pa rdzog so// / oM AHme tri ma~M swAhA/ 'phags pa na mkha'i snying po'i mtshan/ 
60b1(rgyud): / brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa 'phags pa na mkha'i snying po zhal ras rgya che zhing spyan gyi 'od 'phro bas na mkha'i dkyil dri zhim par mdzad pa la phyag 'tsha'o// na mkha'i spyod
60b2(rgyud): can sa'i dkyil 'khor thang snang bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshalo// oM swasti ka mA lak+Shi bi pu la sam+b+ha ba~M/ d+harma d+hA tu go tsa ra swA hA// gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu ngan song dang ngan 'gro thad rab tu zhib
60b3(rgyud): 'gyur// sa yang g.yos par gyur// rnga bo tsha dag gi sgra yang grags par gyur// sangs rgyas tha~Md kyi kyang legs zhes bya ba byin// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnar snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
60b4(rgyud): kye 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'khod pa'i sen rnams na mkha'i snying po dkyil 'khor mngon sum pa rnams kyi swAhA'o mchog gis gzungs 'byung bar shaun+ta dka' ba/ bsod nams
60b5(rgyud): chen po// sdig pa dang nyon mongs pa thang sreg pa byang chub senga' bad kyi ma/ rin po che'i phung por gyur pa 'di nyon ci ga dang / 'di thos pas dri ma med par 'gyur zhing len par khrus
60b6(rgyud): byas par 'gyur la shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyuraro// pad+ma lte bur 'gyur te// 'khor ba'i 'dam gyis ma goso// nyi ma lta bur 'gyur te// sen thad snang bar bya'o// zla ba lta bur 'gyur te/ seMm
60b7(rgyud): rab tu sim par bde// na mkha' lta bur 'gyur te/ ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi go so// sa gzhi lta bur 'gyur te/ mtho dman med// lhun po lta bur 'gyur te/ sen thad kyi bskyed
60b8(rgyud): par mi nuso// bor pa lta bur 'gyur te/ bdi ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi goso// de la sogs pa yon stong phrag bgrangs pa tshad med grangs med pa dag thob par 'gyur te/ nyan pa dang / 'tshangs
61a1(rgyud): // klog pa dang / brjod pa dang / sten pa tsam dang / bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis gang ci yang rung ste/ de'i 'dod pa dang / smon pa dang / re ba de dag grub par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod byas pa
61a2(rgyud): tsam gyis kyang char ches pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / sdang bas dkrugs pa dang / mi nad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / gnod pa 'byung ba dang / 'jigs pa'i dus dang / 'tsho ba dang / chom rkun dang / 
61a3(rgyud): mgon med pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / gcan zadan dang / mu ge'i sdug bsngal rnams las yongasu srung bar byed pa/ bde ba dang / 'byor pa dang / ci 'dod pa dang // ci la dga' ba thams cad 'grub
61a4(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// de nas 'khor de dag thams cad kyis ha ha zhas ca tse dang gzha bton te/ sgra ring zhes byas nas gos dang rgyan sna tshogs bskyod// snying nas phyag 'tshal nas/ byang chu
61a5(rgyud): sedar thad la dbang byed pa 'phags pa na mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i sngags pa brgya mtshostod pa yang dag par brjod pa/ na mkha'i snying po srid gsu sen
61a6(rgyud): mchog/ 'byor ldan blo gros rin chen rgya mtsho mngar// sems can dag pa bla med rin chen mchog/ thar pa'i sa bon 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sal// kun mkhan tshul mkhyen legs dang
61a7(rgyud): legs min mkhyen// thar mkhyen chos mkhyen bde dang mi bde mkhyen// lam mkhyen gces mkhyen dge dang mi dge mkhyen// dus mkhyen dag mkhyen stobs dang stobs min mkhyen// 'go mtsha
61a8(rgyud): chos mchog sen ston mchog/ lam mchog sngags mchog tshul dang tshul min mchog/ rgyan mchog chos mchog 'dzin dang mi 'dzin mchog/ dag mchog rtogs mchog mchog deng
61b1(rgyud): min mchog/ zhi rab snying rje'i rab ste 'khor gyi rab// 'od rab thar pa'i rab ste rten gyi rab// rgya rab sngags kyi rab ste thugs brtse'i rab// mnyam rab sems can rab ste gsum rig rab// leg sgra
61b2(rgyud): mchog sgron stob dang stobs min sgron// bar sgron rigs sgren rgyal dang rgyal ma ni sgron// dge slong gzi sgron nor bu'i 'od kyi sgron// rgyu skar zla ba'i rgyan las shar ba'i spron// mchog 'od ston kun gyi
61b3(rgyud): 'od kyi 'od// lags 'od thar pa'i pho brang rten gyi 'od// 'od chen gti mug rab tu 'byed pa'i 'od// rdo rje'i 'od 'bar bde ba'i 'od 'chang ba// rdo rje'i dbang po 'dren dbang sems cad dal/ rin chen
61b4(rgyud): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgyan dbang po// rgyal dang rgyal ba'i spobs rgyun tshad med dbang // dpa' bo rigs sngags 'dabang srid gsum dbang // rdo rje bzang po rdo 'di rdo rje 'bar rdo
61b5(rgyud): rdo rje 'bar bas rgyan// rdo rje 'od can rdo 'dzin rdo rje ga/ rdo rje rgya chen rdo rje rab mchog dbang // na gzara' sngo zhing sku yi cha lugs sngo// sku mdog sde zhing sngo ba'i 'od kyis rgyan// 
61b6(rgyud): gi rno 'jabs sde zhing brtag pa bsnams// mkha' sngo gzhal med khar 'bar nang na bzhugs// lha zhal dri med shin tu mi bzang 'bar// rab tu drag la 'od zer 'phro zhing 'gyur// sdig sel rdul wA
61b7(rgyud): 'khrugs be daphreng mchog can// k+She gi stobs kyis snang bas sgeg la brtan// ral gri mtshon thogs dbang ldan mthu stobs mtshon// rdo'i mtshon thogs mnga' dang mdung thung 'jigs// 'khor
61b8(rgyud): mtshode thogs bcibs pa dang 'khrul// gsal zhing mtshon bregs 'gags kyi stobs 'joms pa// bde'i byung 'dzag rten gsum bdag rdo rje'i dbyug sku rnams theng nyi ma'iri 'od kyis rgyan// 
62a1(rgyud): // grags pa'i rigs byung bas rgya po mdzad// mu tig phreng bas sgeg cing mdzes par bgyis// sku mdzes brnyes shing phun sum tshogs pa brnyas// rab 'bam mchog brnyes sa la
62a2(rgyud): 'jug pa brnyes// mthu stobs lhag pa brnyes shing grub brnyes la// rigs pa gsum gyi stobs brnyes mthu brnyes pa// bde 'dren zhi ba 'dren kyi 'dren pa/  lpags la mchog dar ba chen po 'dren
62a3(rgyud): byams 'dren nyi ma 'dren cing skye dgu 'ded// legs 'dren zhing gi stobs 'dren snying rdza can// dri med cha lugs gsal ba cha lugs 'bar// rnam grags sgeg pas grags pa'i ba dan can/ 'gro
62a4(rgyud): ba'i skabs 'byung 'dug dang ldog pa bakhyen// long spyod gsal bar ston pa'i sems kyis 'jug/ sku dkar sku mthon sku mdzes sku bzang ba// sku ser sku dkar dar ba chen po'i sku/ 
62a5(rgyud): sku rol rdo rje'i sku mnga' spyan legs sku/ rigs sku rig sngag 'chang ba rin chen bsnams// gtsug gi nor bu gtsug can cod pan mchog/ cod pan can te chos 'dzin rdo rje mahA
62a6(rgyud): dpa' 'dzin rin chen dam pa 'phang ba'i mchog/ sngags bzhi phyag rgya 'chang ba phun sum tshogs// rab mdzes mkha' la gshegs shing rab tu rgyu// srid gsum nyi ma gcig pu 'od stong mang
62a7(rgyud): ri rtsar 'char ba bdal legs bkra shis pa// yon mthu stobs khyad par rnam par grags/ nor bu chen po nor sdug nor bu'i 'od// nyi ma'i nor bu tshul spyod nor bu 'bar// yid bzhin nor bu 'gro kun
62a8(rgyud): mgon gcig pa// na mkha'i dkyil na nor bu gtsag snang ba// seMn rnam dag yang shing rnar grags// srid gsum bsrungs ma gcig pu rgyal sras mchog/ zhi ba rab tu zhi'i skyabs 'os stag skye/ 
62b1(rgyud): dgu'i bdag po bang byung pad+ma skyes// kun nas 'od bzang legs bshad chos mngara' ba// dang pa legs bshad rab dul legs bshad phyag// blo bzang 'od bzang bde ldan skye gnas bzang // mkhas pa
62b2(rgyud): zhi rab mchog chos dang ldan// zhi mdzad rgyal 'byung bde ba 'byung ba'i gnas// 'od kyi 'byung gnas bde mdzad dbang du mdzad// legs 'byung shes rab 'byung gnas stobs bskyed pa// snying rje
62b3(rgyud): 'byung gnas blo bzang rnam grangs mdzad// rnam grol nges gol shin tu grol ba'i blo// blo yangs par bkram zhing rnam par grags// kun tu leng spyod sgo ste blo yo mchog blo gros brtan pa dkon
62b4(rgyud): mchog gsub las bsgrubs// sangs rgyas pad+ma mdarang rgyas la draba' zhal// dag cing spyan yangs cha lugs yid du 'thad// snying po gsol ba'i snying po brtan zhing dul// ngo bo nyad
62b5(rgyud): rgyun gnye rab gsal ba// spyan zur mda' ni rab dul gtad leg sa pa// 'jig rten zhal ras ston gyi zla ba 'dra// mdung thung brgya yi mtshan mchog mtshon cha rdzogs// drag po
62b6(rgyud): 'jigs pa sdig sel gsum las skyes// rab dul mkhas pa 'grogs dga' 'dris pa sla/ rab tu drag pa gnyen rab gsor mdog can// lha chen bde byed gsal shing phyag na bsdams// spya
62b7(rgyud): gsum rig pa gsub ldan me gsum sal// 'od bzang me tog mtshan thogs me tog mnga'// na bza' bzang banabs gnas 'phen tshabs tshar 'ben// legs bris sna tshogs mtshon cha sna
62b8(rgyud): tshogs mda'// na bza' sna tshogs sna tshogs rgyan gyi dpal// zhal ras zla ba 'od zer rgyas pa 'dra// zhal mdang bstan pas 'jig rten kun 'byor mdzad// bzhad pa nyi ma'i 'od zer rab 'jim
63a1(rgyud): // mnga'// zhal mdangs sa rgya mtsho gsal mjed lam me ba// dbang chen rdo rje'i thogs lags 'jigs pa'i sgra// rdo rje drag po nor bu g.yo ba 'dzin/ sgra snyan snang bar mdzad pa'i mthu
63a2(rgyud): dang ldan// blo gros chen po blo gros rna ba'i mchog/ rgyan 'dzin dpal 'dzin rin chen zhal dang ldan// rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba kun gyi gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa mgon sras phreng ba bzang // stobs
63a3(rgyud): chen 'jig rten blo gros ngo bo nyid// skye dgu'i bdag po bka' lung mnyam zhing brtags// mi yi mangs bdag mtho ris bskyed pa'i rgyu// sgyu 'dra 'dod pa'i mda' dang rdo rje can// mthu stobs
63a4(rgyud): mnga' zhing sman bzang sdug par ldan// ston pa bzang po stong nyid lam gyi sngags// gces gsum 'phel ba'i rgyal 'jug pa mdzad// brtan po rgyu la rab tu nges gyur pa// dkyil
63a5(rgyud): 'khor dam pa kun gyi sgrib dpon lags// gcig pu skye dgu dkyil 'khor cho ga mkhyen// rnam par snang mdzad zhing gi gnas na sa skyes// dbang bskur brnyes shing sa bcur la
63a6(rgyud): gnas// gnas tshan son pa mchog gnas gcig pu lags// skye drug rnams kyi nyon mongs sel ba dang // sdig 'joms mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di thos nas// bde gshegs sras mchog su
63a7(rgyud): zhig 'don byed pa// 'jig rten zla ba gcig shar bzhin du snang // na ma kho'i snying po sems can gcig pu yi/ mdun 'dug nang par bstod pa 'di brjod gang / don srid gsum sen mchog 'gyur
63a8(rgyud): shing / dri ma'i gnas kun las kyi 'thar par 'gyur// g.yul dang mtha' rtsod shin tu mi bzad dang // mu ge'i gnod pa mi nang byung ba na// mkhas pa su zhig sngar langs dang skyes nas// na mkha'/ 
63b1(rgyud): / snying po la ni bstod byed pa// de ni 'jigs pa'i 'byung gnas zad dang // sdug bsngal 'byung 'dren sdig pa rnams las grol// des ni zhi mchog mchog bde kun gnas dang / bde ba rgya chen nges par po
63b2(rgyud): par 'gyur// bde 'thob long spyod 'phel bar bya ba 'am// rgyal srid 'thob dang byad gzugs nor 'thob dang // rigs 'thob ljon kun gyi gzhi sgrub phyir// bton na 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsho med// de phyir ci
63b3(rgyud): ste rtag tu 'dod pa de kun// 'dod na 'gro ba kun la gcig dpa' ba// na mkha'i snying po srid gsum mgon po la// rtag tu brtan cing sngags kyang brtan par bgyi// 'phags pa na mkha'i snying po'i mtshan
63b4(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzog so// / 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs snga gas dang bcas pa/ byang chub se dang se chen po// 
63b5(rgyud): snying rje chen po kun tu bzang po na mkha'i dkyil kun rab 'byas/ ma lus pa dang / mnyam pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos kyi snang ba gsal ba brnyes pa// sa'i dkyil 'khor kun tu 'phros pa
63b6(rgyud): sku tha dad pa med tsang // dus gsum gyi sku mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa// gzugs sna tshogs can/ byang chub sems dpa' se chen po'i mchog dang / rab mchog dam pa sbyin pa yon chen po'i sku
63b7(rgyud): sa kun tu mnga' mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal// de nas de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog kun tu bzang po gzugs sna tshogs can// byang chub sade' rnams kyi ting
63b8(rgyud): 'dzin rab 'byams so'i dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhug so// de nas byang chub se dang se 'a chen po kun tu bzang po snyoms par zhugs ma thag pa de'i tshe// stong po'i 'jig rten gyi
64a1(rgyud): / khams kyi rdul phra ba rdul snyed kyi sku rab 'byam kun tu yongasu rgyas par gyur te/ namakha'i khams kyi khongasu gtogs pa'i sku rnams sa'i dkyil 'khor 'khor du ma dag tu kun nas
64a2(rgyud): 'khod par gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam zad kyi khongasu gtogs pari de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis phyag g.yas pa berkyang ste/ byang chub sada' seda' chen po kun tu bzang po'i
64a3(rgyud): mgo bo la byugs te bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legaso leg so// sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi snying po gzungs chen po shod cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' seda' chen po'i mchog
64a4(rgyud): 'od zer 'bum gyis snang bar byas pas// de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad g.yo brlabyas nas/ gzungs 'di bshad// tad+ya bA/ oM na me mam s+t+rai/ b+hu ba ni/ shwa re/ ma hA b+ho gA ya/ a sams
64a5(rgyud): ma a mri ta sa ma/ a nan+ta sa ma/ ga ga na sa ma/ tri b+hU ba nas ma/ a she Sha sa ma/ be Sha sa ma/ ba ra mAR+YA sa ma/ swa b+ha ba sam/ tatha tA sam/ a ra dza sa ma/ a d+hI sa ma/ bud+d+has
64a6(rgyud): d+harma ta thA hA sa ma/ a b+hi Sha sa ma/ sa ma sa ma/ e kA nA ya sA ga ra/ bi shud+d+he/ A lo kA/ hI h+ni/ lab+d+ha lab+d+ha/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ oM brA sa ga ta/ na ya na ya/ ha ma/ ni ra d+hiSh+ThA na/ saM b+ho ga/ aM
64a7(rgyud): an la ya la ya/ d+harma a gra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ dza ya dza ya/ hrI ts+tsha/ d+ha ma d+ha ma swA hA/ de nas rgyal ba'i sras kyi thu'i go// 'jig rten zad kyi mgon pa gcig pu/ sen pad la phan par 'dod pa// byang chub
64a8(rgyud): sededar kun tu bzang po ga bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bstis te/ sa'i dkyil 'khor g.yo bar byas nas// de skad ces smras te/ 'jig rten gsum po kun tu gang bar byaso// de nas lha dang
64b1(rgyud): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gang ba'i dkyil 'khor nas/ 'od zer 'bar zhing snang la rab tu g.ye bas rgyan pa'i lus can sa steng kun gyi rdo rje me
64b2(rgyud): tog stan chen po las bskyod/ dkyil 'khor nas langs nas/ ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ste/ smras pa kye ma snying rje chen po dang // yon grangs med pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu 'bum pa'i gzungs chen
64b3(rgyud): mo kye ma sangs rgyas 'byung ba chen mo// mtha' dang / dbus med po'i sa gsum dang mnyam zhing // sems can gyi khams grangs med pa yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir gnas pa// ches
64b4(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor gnas med pa'i gzungs chen mo// kye ma ba skal ba mtha' yas pa nas// 'phags pa'i sdig pa'i bag cha sel cig// nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho skems la
64b5(rgyud): lta ba'i ri bo 'thor bar byed pa'i gzungs chen mo bskal pa mtha' yas par dge ba'i tshogs 'byung ba yang dag par bsag/ sa shing // bde bar gshegs pa 'bum phrag du ma
64b6(rgyud): mngon sum du mthor bas/ byang chub kyi sa bon ma bsgrubs la/ thang mkhyen pa'i sa'i khyad par gyi yon rgya mtsho yongasu rdzogs pa rje su thob pa ma yin pa gzha ni// sus kyang de bzhin gabye ba za
64b7(rgyud): kyi snying po gzungs chen po 'di mnyam par yang mi nus na/ gzung ba dang / klag pa dang / kun chub par bya ba lta ci smos/ gzungs chen mo 'di'i ming tsam yang bskal pa bye ba phrag stong gi ba
64b8(rgyud): du thos par dka'o// kye ma gzungs chen mo 'di sen gang dag gi lag na 'dug pa de dag ni rnying pa legs par rnyed pa'o// 'tshe ba bzang pos 'tshe ba'o// mngon par shes pa rnams kyis
65a1(rgyud): // bzhi bzang ba'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa'o// yon thar yang dag par rdzogs pa'o// 'di lan gcig brjod pa
65a2(rgyud): gyis ngan song gi sdug bsngal thad las thar bar 'gyuraro// lan gnyis brjod pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyuraro// lan gsum brjod pa tsam gyis// nyen mongs pa zad la
65a3(rgyud): thar bar 'gyur// de ltar na brjod pa tsam gyis/ gong nas gong du ston rnams 'thob par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'chag bzhin du bzlas brjod byas na// sdug
65a4(rgyud): bsngal thams cad las thar bar 'gyuraro// shing gcig bsgrang sa kyi drung du bzlas brjod byas na/ grub pa bang thob par 'gyuraro// gro bzhin du bzlas brjod byas na/ sen zad dpa
65a5(rgyud): du 'gyuraro// nags tshal chen po'i nang du skyil me krung bcas te 'dag la lan bdun brjod na// bsam gtan chen po thob par 'gyur la// nyon mongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur/ 
65a6(rgyud): 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i sku gzugs kyi drung du skyil mo krung bcas te 'a dag la/ me tog la sogs pa dza rnyed pa mchod nas/ lus ngal bar gyur gyi bar du/ gzungs chen mo 'di
65a7(rgyud): brjod la// ngal bar gyur nas de nyid du nyal na/ rmi lam du byang chub seMng kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'gyur te/ phyag g.yas pas de la byugs nas/ yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad
65a8(rgyud): chos kyi snang ba chen po yang stsol bar mdzad// 'di skad du/ rgyal ba'i sras legaso leg so// khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pa yin te/ khyod tsha brjes
65b1(rgyud): nas sa chen po thob par 'gyuraro// zhes kyang gsu// de nas lus bde ba dang / sems bde ba dang / dga' ba chen po dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen po dang ldan bzhin du sang par 'gyuraro/ 
65b2(rgyud): chen po dang / che bar grags par yang 'gyur// lha rnams kyang de la blta ba'i phyir 'ongo // nang par langs nas// byang chub sede rnams kyi yang dag par bsdus pa'i mdo sde rnams bklag par bya'o
65b3(rgyud): sen zad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o// de nas pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yong su rdzogs shing // sdig pa thams cad dang bral te/ nyon mongs po'i phyogs rnams be tsam gang
65b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang bsngags par 'gyuraro// lha la sogs pa yang de la srung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / sba ba'i phyir brtson bar 'gyur// de ltar ji skad bstan pa bzhin du byed
65b5(rgyud): pa'i rgyal ba'i sras de ni/ ring po mo thogs par kun tu bzang po'i sa chen po la 'jug par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje'i gtsugs bu nga la sogs pa stong gsum gyi bdag po rim
65b6(rgyud): 'chang chen po rnams dang / spyan chen mo la sogs pa/ rig sngags 'chang chen mo rnams dang // rdo rje snying po la sogs pa byang chub se' chen po rnams dang / rdo rje'i zhags pa la sogs pa rig sngas
65b7(rgyud): kyi lha chen mo rnams dang / rin chen dag pa can la sogs pa rig sngags kyi lha mo chen me rnams dang lha me sgrol ma la sogs pa byang chub sede chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams dang / 
65b8(rgyud): dang tshan dang / gzugs bzang dang / shin tu sdug pa la sogs pa gzhon rnams dang / bran rnams dang / bran mo rnams dang / mi 'khrugs pa la sogs pa log 'dun chen po rnams dang / lus
66a1(rgyud): // mchog la sogs pa srin po'i dang po rnams dang / ma mo la sogs pa srin mo rnams dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i dbang phyugs rnams dang / rdo rje me tog thod la sogs
66a2(rgyud): ba dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad langs nas/ byang chub seda' chen po'i mchog/ 'phags pakun tu bzang po la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad
66a3(rgyud): na med pa'i ston gyi snangab zhes bya bas bstod pa/ kun tu bzang po kun gyi mchog/ sna tshogs kun gyi 'byor pa cha// dkyil 'khor chen po'i rdo rje'i mchog/ sna tshogs gzugs can bya
66a4(rgyud): bzhag/ rdo rje chen po dgyes pa che// gzi brjid chen po stobs po che// gnod dang rab gnon dpal gyi ba// khyab bdag rgyal ba'i blo gros rgyal// rdo rje chen po rab tu bzhad// sgrub dka' chen po/ 
66a5(rgyud): sgrub mdzad pa// rol mo chen pos rnam par rol// rab dga' chen pos 'dul ba po// lha chen dbang phyug chen po ste/ btsan bo khyab 'jug skye dgu'i bdag/ sa stengs sa
66a6(rgyud): 'og sa la dgyes// de bzhin sa 'dzin sa gsum pa// dul dang sbyin pa'i go rims thabs// rab mkhyen stong gi mnga' bdag lag sa/ shes nyen can te bzod la dgyes/ brtson pa
66a7(rgyud): 'byung ba 'byor pa che/ btsen 'grus bcu dang thabs bcu pa// stobs bcu'i sras chen thu bo ste// mthu stobs stong gis spro ba dang / yongasu ldan zhing bcu sel ba// rdul sel rgya mtsho chen po/ 
66a8(rgyud): ste/ rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'o// rdul rnams rab tu zhi ba'i thabs// cho ga mkhyen pa blo mnga' ba/ mkhas pa mdzes pa skal pa bzang // shin tu sdug pa dga' bskyed pa// snying
66b1(rgyud): chen po las byung ba// nyon mongs bral ba thub par dka'// sa dang mnyam pa na mkha' dang // rlung dang mtshungs pa'i spyod yul can// ma seM pa ging us// rgya mtsho bzhi yi chu dang 'dra/ rmus
66b2(rgyud): dang spro ba zhi bar mdzad// thub par dka' ba'i nyon mongs 'jil// g.yul sel g.yul la dgyed pa ste/ g.yul gyi nyes pa rab 'joms pa// gsungs bzang ngang pa'i gdangasu bzhed// 
66b3(rgyud): po nye dbang dbang chen sras// dbang po'i las lhag thub dang mnyam// chos 'dzin 'byor dang ldan par bstan// rab dga'i bun longs ni mdzad pa// nyon mongs 'dam rdzab skems par mdzad// @
66b4(rgyud): po rgyags pa'i rims nang sel// khro bo'i degs pa rnam par 'joms// gsung snyan 'jam pa nyid dang mnyam// mnyam pa mi mnyam mnyam pa dang // mnyam med yul las
66b5(rgyud): rnam par 'das// sangs rgyas kun dang spyod yul gcig byang chub snying po rgya cher rol// rim pa rab sngon dge ba ste/ spyan bza nga phun sum tshogs pa dag/ gtsang ma lam
66b6(rgyud): bzang sbyin mdzad pa// dag mdzad sreg mdzad mchog sbyin po// 'joms bang bgegs rnams rnam par 'joms// 'thob mdzad dpe med gsung ba po// rdo'i 'jig rten gcig snang ba// 
66b7(rgyud): skyes pa bud med tshogs kyi bdag/ nges par yon 'byor mdzad pa// seMn 'khor ba zhi mdzad pa// brtan po sdig pa rnams dang bral// kun tu rnam rgyal snang ba bo// kun tu rgyas pa'i dkyil
66b8(rgyud): 'khor can/ kun tu rgya mtsho'i snang ba mdzad/ ku tsu nyes pa sel ba lags/ mi bzad sa 'og rnam par dkrugs// de bzhin thang mdzad thugs par mdzad// nyon mongs rgya mtsho da dkrugs/ nyon
67a1(rgyud): // mongs phyogs rnams zang bar mdzad// 'bar ba'i dka' ba 'phrog mdzad pa// rgyags shing bdo bzhi par mdzad// rdo rje chen po stobs bskyed pa// sdang ba thams cad nges 'joms// 
67a2(rgyud): pha rel zhugs pa'i sdig sel ba// dag pa na mkha'i spyod yul can// dag pa sbyin zhing yon tan sbyin// 'bras ma brgyas// ye shes sbyin zhing bsod nams sbyin// leng spyod sbyid zhing rgyal sbyin pa/ 
67a3(rgyud): phyug sbyin zhing tshig sbyin pa// ner sbyin tshogs ldan rdo rje can// gzugs bzhin dbang po rnam par rgyal// dag tsang dge ba'i tshul sbyin pa// bad 'byung gtsug na nor bu thogs/ saM 'dzin gzung bar
67a4(rgyud): ba pe dkyil 'khor mgu bar sgrub mdzad la// 'bab cing de ba zhin dbebs par mdzad// rin chen dra ba rin chen mnyam// sgron ma mu na sil rgyal ba can// yon ye shes theg chen lnga
67a5(rgyud): brtan mchog che ba'i chos nyid can// gsung ba chen po shes ra ba che// sangs rgyas tshul ni rab bston pa// mchod pa chen po tha ga chen gyi// theg pa bla na med par ldan// mtsha
67a6(rgyud): pa chen po'i chos che ba// 'bras bu chen po ches kyi mchog/ ston mdzad 'dul mdzad sted pa po// zhi ba de bzhin zhi mdzad pa// bzang po bzang dang mtshungs pa nyid// kun tu rab 'byam sel mdzad
67a7(rgyud): pa ma snying rje ye shes snying po mkhyen// snying rje'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can// snying rje chen po yengasu rdzogs// dus chen rnam par dag par mdzad// me tshe mchog dang ba rab 'theb// rtsod chen 'das
67a8(rgyud): pa spyod yul can// skye dgu spang zhing spyan yang ba// rnyed par dka' ba'i del 'byor can// kun tu spyod pa khong dag pa// dga' ba'i dam pa sbyin pa po// kun tu yul kun mnga' ba ste// zhes bzang
67b1(rgyud): po rtag tu mngag/ dul ba sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// dkyil 'khor chen po'i pad+ma lags// zla ba lta bur sim mdzad thabs// mkhas pa rgyags spangs cho ga mkhyen// spyod yul gcig
67b2(rgyud): la gnas pa ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mnga'// dam tshig chen po'i de nyid mkhyen// slob dpon chen po gags pa che// dam pa nyid bla na med// gsang sngags rlabs ni rgyas par
67b3(rgyud): mdzad// de ltar khyab bdag chen po ni// ston 'tshul spos kyis rgyas// dag cing byang la mkhas la sogs// yon tan 'byung ba rig sngags rgyal// gtsug na nor bu thog la sogs// mchog
67b4(rgyud): rnams kyis ni bstod nas kyang // sdug bsngal chu bo bcom pa yi// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di gsungs// kye ma bstod pa chen po brgya// ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa yin
67b5(rgyud): mi rnams la la gang zhig gis// sdig bsal kun tu bzang be la/ snying nas 'di yis bstod byas na// des ni sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'theb// gang zhig mang brgya rtsa brgyad 'don
67b6(rgyud): mi de ston yongs rdzogs shing // de bzhin gshegs tshul che ba yi// ye shes ma lus smra bar nus// de ltar thub mchog sras po snyen brgya'i spobs las nges par 'byung 'gyur zhing // lcen
67b7(rgyud): sna tshogs byung dang 'dzag rten yan chad dag gis yon rgyas rnams las// bstod pa chen po snang byas rgyal ba'i sras la bstod pas nyin ra bstod byas na// stobs bcu mnga' ba'i
67b8(rgyud): skur 'gyur snang ba thob cing rnam dag yon 'byung gnas 'gyur// 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzog so// / 'phags pa
68a1(rgyud): // lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tsha'o// byang chub seMd la lag na
68a2(rgyud): rang gi snying po smras pa// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da/ sarba duSh+TA na ta ka/ ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ de nas gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu/ sa chen po g.yos par gyur te// bgegs dang / log 'dren zad kyang skrag
68a3(rgyud): nyam thag pa'i skad phyung // dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa thams cad kyang ha ha zhes 'dzar te// lha la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang chen po rnams kyis kyang // rgyan gyi cher chen po bab / 
68a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zhal 'dzub bzhin du// rdo rje 'chab la gzigs nas bka' stsal pa// sdang ba sel ba dang / 'khor la de dag ha cang skrag par ma byed cig/ rdo rje 'cha
68a5(rgyud): gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi gzungs 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba lag so// rig sngags thad kyi mchog dang / bgegs thams cad bzlog pa dang // sdang la
68a6(rgyud): bzlog pa dang / sdang ba thad sel ba dang / dam pa bstsal pa dang / 'byor pa stsol pa dang / sdang ba rnams dga' bar bgyid pa dang / thos na don mchis pa dang / brjod na don mchis pa dang / bsnyen du
68a7(rgyud): 'gyis na don mchis pa dang / stobs bskyed pa dang / gzugs bzang bar bgyid pa dang / spobs pa bskyed pa dang / dbang phyug thob par bgyid pa dang / nor dang ldan par bgyid pa dang / dab
68a8(rgyud): bgyi ba dang / sdang ba 'joms pa dang / snang ba 'jig par bgyid pa dang / dug sel ba dang / rgyal bar bgyid pa dang / dga' bor 'gyid pa dang / mchog tu dga' bar bgyid pa dang / dang bar bgyi
68b1(rgyud): pa dang / nga rgyal 'joms pa dang / pha rol pham par bgyid pa dang / sdig pa zhi par bgyid pa dang / nongs par bgyis pa sbyor ba dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar bgyid pa
68b2(rgyud): dang mtshams ma mchis pa bzlog pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / bkra mi shis pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / dpal bskyang ba dang / skal pa bzang por bgyid pa dang / sen thad dga'
68b3(rgyud): bar 'gyid pa dang / gzhan la dbang bgyid pa dang // ci 'tshal ba stsol ba dang / yon thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyid pa dang / char chas pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus kyi gnod pa rab
68b4(rgyud): tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags so// g.yul chen po dang / mi nang che na pe dang / rtsod pa dang / mi ma lags pa la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa dang / sdang ba dang / byad stems dang/ ro langs kyi sbyor
68b5(rgyud): ba chen po dang / skrod pa dang / srog 'jig pa'i tshe dang / 'jigs ba chen po byung ba na/ nang par langs nas/ lus khrus bgyis la gos dkar po 'tshal ste/ kha shar byos su
68b6(rgyud): bsdus la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi gdong du lta zhing / lan bdun brjod na brjod pa tsam gyis// 'jigs pa thaMd las thar bar 'gyur zhing grub pa chen po yang thob par 'gyur la
68b7(rgyud): thams cad du yang rgyal bar 'gyur te/ sems can rnams la srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbeng ba ni gzungs chen po 'di las lhag pa ma mchiso// de nas 'khor thams cad ngo mtshar rmad
68b8(rgyud): gyur nas// rdo rje 'chang la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod// rdo rje sems dpa' senga' che// rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che// rdo rje 'jig pa gyes pa che// rdo rje snying po stobs pa
69a1(rgyud): // rdo rje 'khrug pa zhags pa che// snying rje chen po stobs po che// rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par mdzad// rdo rje hUM gi hUM lags te// rdo rje sa 'og 'jigs pa po// chags pa'i
69a2(rgyud): chags pa che// chags pa'i zhags pa mgyogs pa che/ phyag dmar phyag ni rong ba ste// spyan dmar spyan dang ldan pa lags// rdo rje mthon ka mthon ka cha/ mthon 'thing dbu skas rgyan pa
69a3(rgyud): lags// ral gri sngon po ral gri cha// dkyil 'khor sngon po'i dkyil 'khor can// mthon ko'i spyan te dbu sngo ba// 'od chen mthon ka'i 'od dang ldan// rdo rje sngon po stobs mi mtshungs// rdo rje spro ba
69a4(rgyud): stobs che ba// khro bo'i rdo rje khro bo tshe/ sal mdzad khro bo'i rgyags pa sal// khros pa'i spyan ni rab tu gtod// khro bo 'gegs ris sel bar mdzad// gzhu bsnams zhags pa bsnams pa
69a5(rgyud): sta rdo rje'i mangs ni nges par 'gums// dbyug thogs rdo rje'i ral gri bsnams// rdo rje'i zhags pas rab tu 'joms sa rdo rje'i 'khor lo 'khor lo che// 'jigs pa'i
69a6(rgyud): sgra sgrogs rab tu khro// sna tshogs skye ste thag las bris// gzi brjid skyed pa grags mdzad pa/ bzod pur dka' ba reg mi bzod// sdig dang 'gegs rnams gcod mdzad pa/ dag po chen po
69a7(rgyud): rdo rje khro// sbrel byed dag po sbrel bar mdzad// gting dpag dka' ba ring du gshegs/ rin chen rgya mtsho rab tu dga'// rgya mtsho lhun po'i dbang dang ldan// dam pa'i ti sa lhun po'i ri// gang rgya
69a8(rgyud): chen pos gzhad pa po// spyod yul bskal pa grangs med gsum// rig grangs 'chang mchog rdo rje can// rig sngags 'chang chen mnga' bdag lags// na bza' dza gong rtsa dmar gsol// 
69b1(rgyud): mthen ka na bza' mthon la dgyes// srin po srung po drag po ste// me tog phreng ba'i rgyan la dgyes// nyi ma chen po nyi ma'i 'od// 'od zer brgya phrag rab tu 'gyed// gol mdzad mgon po sun
69b2(rgyud): pa pe// rab mchog rab mchog rnams kyis mchod// mgrin chen mgrin pa'i mdog sngo ba// mgar bzang zhal bzang dam pa lags// cod pan chen po rdo rje'i 'od// phun sum tshogs ldan mas
69b3(rgyud): dag pa// ye shes che ldan srung ba che// rlung mar lags te spyod yul ring // gtso bo sgrol mdzad pa ril gshegs// 'jigs las sgrol ba rab 'jigs pa/ rgya chen gtsug na nor bu thogs
69b4(rgyud): mtshon cha chen po sna tshogs mtshon// 'jig rten gsum gyi tshul tshan gcig gsum gzigs rtse gsum btsug pud dge sum// 'dod pa'i lha ste snang chen mtshon// zab pa
69b5(rgyud): ste 'jigs par mdzad// mtho ba sku mchog zhal gsum ba// tsha mtshom med srin las byung // rtag par dkar dgyes dus 'bor ba// rgyu skar rgyal ris 'phel bar mdzad
69b6(rgyud): rgyal po sngags 'chang chen po ste// bgegs kun dbang phyug mkhas pa lags// bai DUr+ya ltar de med sku// mdzes shing stobs skyed sna tshogs stobs// dga' ba skyed pa dga' bar mdzad// 
69b7(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum po 'dzin pa'i mchog/ lha chen dpa' bo chen po ste// brtan pa dpa' bo lam me be// bde ba chen po 'ching nga gcod// dam du 'chi ba'i rtsal mnga' ba// mtshon che cha
69b8(rgyud): cod pan can// rig sngags 'chang gi tshogs dga' ba// pad+ma chen po phyag ring ba/ pad+ma las byung pad+ma'i mdog/ nag po chen po 'byung po che// gtum chen thog thog chen po ste// rlung chen
70a1(rgyud): bzhang mo 'byung ba dang // rdo rje mtshon cha brgya rdzogs pa// rtul pong thub pa brdzun pa ste// 'thung po chen po tshigs kyi rje// zhib pa dbang po rdo rje mchod// khrag gi rtse mo na
70a2(rgyud): 'gems// rgyal ba'i sras pa gzugs che ba// rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor rgyan// rdo rje lcags mdas sreg mdzad pa// rdo rje mangs ri rnam par spyod// rdo rje don yod rdo rje'i dbang // rdo rje bzang po rdo rje'i
70a3(rgyud): ye shes dam pa theg pa che// thabs brnyes snying rje chen po lags// rdo rje chen po rtsed mo can// spyan bzang rnam par gzigs pa po// rdo rje dral bu rnam dag spyan// 'dza' bo sdug pa dam tshig
70a4(rgyud): mkhyen// rdo rje chen po dgon po po// rdo rjes 'og 'jigs par ma dzad// rdo rje chen po gang rgyangs sgrogs// me tog chun po 'odags la gdag pa zas gtsang sras kyi sras// des
70a5(rgyud): pa skal bzang gtsang ba lags/ sna tshogs can te lha kun ma cho ga/ rdo rje'i dpung gi dkyil 'khor ldan// rdo rje gtsug sdud shes rab can// rdo rje bkod pa rab tu mdzes// 
70a6(rgyud): pa shin tu rnar dag/ bskal pa'i rlung chen lta bu lags// dpa' bo gsang ba chen po 'chang // rig sngags 'chang gi mchog rjed// gang ba ba ste gsang ba gsungs// skyes pa bud tshegs
70a7(rgyud): dga' ba// rdo rje thog thog sgra chen sgrigs// rdo rje'i sgra de rdar 'joms// rdo rje'i lcags kyu dgyes pa che// rdo rje 'ab 'a chen 'bar ba// nor bu spras pa'i na bza' gsol// spris dang me tog phreng
70a8(rgyud): gis rgyan// dbu yi snyan cha gdub kor btags// sangs rgyas bstan pa ston papo// rgyal po sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// dbang phyug chen po grags pa che// dkyil 'khor slob dpon dkyil
70b1(rgyud): 'khor can// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ston pa po// dbu rgyan cong ban kun nu bcings// sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa lags// de ltar rdo rje dbang phyug mgon// mtshan brgya rtsa
70b2(rgyud): ngag gis bstod// de nas rdo rje don yod pas gsungs pa// rdo rje gsang bas rgyan pa yi// rdo rje brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'di// ming na rdo rje don yod 'byung // sdang ba thams cad bzlog byed pa// ming ni
70b3(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'di// dad pas gang zhig 'chang byed pa// grub pa thad 'gyur zhing // nyes pa kun las rnam par grol// lag na rdo rje stobs po che// rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// lag na
70b4(rgyud): rdo rje'i yon che// gang zhig nang bar langs nas brjod// don sde ga ba kun las grol// ngan 'gro kun las thang bar 'gyur// gsang sngags thog mar smos pa 'di// su zhig nang bar la
70b5(rgyud): nas brjod// rgyal po blon po grong khyer ba// gnyen rnams kyang ni dga' bar 'gyur// bstod pa'i mchog 'di su 'don pa// 'jig rten thang de dbang 'gyur// sdig pa thad zad pa dang
70b6(rgyud): tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur// ji ltar 'dod pa dam pa bzhin// bde ba de yis thob par 'gyur// gang zhig nang bar langs nas ni// lag na rdo rje drung du brjod// da ni ji ltar 'dod pa
70b7(rgyud): dang // ldan 'gyur 'di la the tshomad// ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'don pa la// bgegs dang log 'den thad dang // 'dzegs byed rgyal po rnams kyis kyang // zil gyis mnan par mi nuso// shes
70b8(rgyud): rab can ni gang zhig gis// ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog gton na// gzugs bzang stobs ni skye ba dang // bde ba 'phel ba de yis 'thob// gang zhing ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di// nges par ga
71a1(rgyud): shing gtsang mar 'don// mdor na yon rgyas pa yi// bde ba de yis thob par 'gyur// 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ gzungs sngags dang bcas
71a2(rgyud): rdzogaso// // 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa// gzungs sngags dang bcas pa// phyogs bcu'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ 
71a3(rgyud): shes bya mtha' dag ma lus par khyab cing mchog tu rmad du byung ba'i rnam par dag pa'i blo mnga' ba rnams la phyag 'tshalo// 'jam dpal gzhi nur gyur pa// bugs dri ma dang skyon thad
71a4(rgyud): bar yon dri ma med pa'i tshogs kyi 'od zer gyi rgyan pa'i sgra zhabs brten gyi pad+ma la// lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / klu dang rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi thor tshugs dang / 
71a5(rgyud): cod pan gyi rtse mos gtug pa la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dza ba'i dbyangs ngan song gi 'a gro ba sna tshogs rnar 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal
71a6(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ oM g+ho ma hA ma Ni/ ru tsi ra ka lA pa/ bi tsi tra/ muk+taM dA ma/ a laM kr-i tA sha rI ra/ par ma satwa mo tsa ka/ ta thA ga ta ma hA d+hama?/ ko la d+ha ra/ pra ba ra d+harma/ lab d+ha/ bi dza ya/ su ra ta/ ba
71a7(rgyud): ga pA dang sha ka/ kle sha ga ra/ pra sha ma ka/ shU n+ya nA swa b+hA ba/ a nu swa ri/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra/ ba ra ta/ ba ra Na dang / oM mahA pA sha pra sa ra/ a sa ma sa ma/ a nan+ta sa ma sa man+ta/ b+ha dra/ saM/ 
71a8(rgyud): ma d+ha las man mug gas bra mi gse me nyicom sdu ga 'a 'jam smra lan/  khyo mau dzab ga/ gam sa bags ga/ su rug ru d+ha da d+ha duH/ 
71b1(rgyud): ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha/ d+hu d+hA d+hA d+hu/ ma hA mahA/ ma hA ma hA/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ b+ho g+ho ma b+hI ma/ nad nad/ sa ra sa ra/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ mo tsa ya/ mA ma nA tha/ ma nu sri ta/ a bA
71b2(rgyud): ya du/ khan su khaM da ma hA kA ru Ni kaM/ i nA tho ha/ duHkhi te haM/ sa ra dzo haM/ u bad dru to haM a bo bo k+Shi haM/ ku sAM do haM/ ma ra Na d+harme hi/ tAn b+ha ga bAn/ duHkhi ta nAn/ su kha na da dA/ a nA thA
71b3(rgyud): nAn/ sai nA thA ka ra/ sar dza saM/ bI ra dza ska ra/ u pad dru tA mAn/ sa ro ba tra ga/ pra sha ma ka/ a bi big tA nAn/ ku sha am+b+ha ra/ pa ri pu ra yi tA/ ku si dA nAn/ ma hA bAN+ya da ta/ ma ra Na/ d+harma
71b4(rgyud): Nad ma mi ta/ ba dA dA tA/ ma ma bi br-i bAn// nA tho b+ha ga/ sha ra NAM/ ba ra yA nAM tra tA/ sarba duHkhA ni/ me pra sha ma ya// sarba kle shi ra dzi si mau/ a ba na ya/ sarba sa na/ sa ro badra ga duHkha ni ma/ 
71b5(rgyud): nA sha ya/ sarba ku sha~M la d+harma/ pa ri pu ra ma me/ ku ru/ sarba kama?/ a ba ra Na/ kle sha pa ra tAm/ mi bi ki ra/ ma hA'o/ d+hi satwa saM bi d+hi/ dIr+ya pA ra mi tA/ yo gar+m+ma
71b6(rgyud): san+do yo dza ya/ A ba ra Na/ d+harma/ bi rA ga bi ra dza/ sany+tsi ha pra dza ha/ d+ha ri Ni/ sa ma kha sa ma/ dza la ni d+ho sa ma/ me ru sa ma/ ma hA bo d+haM satwa ba ra da swA hA// r-ig sngags don kun grub
71b7(rgyud): pa 'di// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa na/ de ma thag tu sen rnams/ skye dang rga ba zad par gyur// ngan 'gro thams cad zhi gyur nas/ bdud kyi sde rnams rab tu 'ang // lha rnams
71b8(rgyud): rab tu dga'// log 'dren rnams ni skrag par gyur// sdig bzhi par byed pa yi// gzugs 'dibashad pa'i mdo la yang // grangs med phrag ni dung phyung snyed// 'khor ba'i 'artson
72a1(rgyud): / dag nas thar// 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa yis// 'jam pa'i byangs ni rab bsgrubs shing / gang tshe rigs sngags bshad pa na/ khrag dang nags dang tshal du bcas// zlu
72a2(rgyud): mi rgyu ba'i// sa gzhi de yi tshe na g.yos// sangs rgyas 'od kyis snang ba yis// sa yi steng yang khyab par gyur// bgegs dang log 'dren thang dang / srin po mi bzang gzugs can rnams/ 
72a3(rgyud): bcu ldan la phyag 'tshal zhes// skad phyung tshig ni 'thun par smra// lha rnams zhi ba'i cha lugs can// thams cad yid ni dgar gyur nas// gang na rdo rje ral gri che// de yi drung ljags smras pa
72a4(rgyud): ni phyag 'tshal mchog sbyin rdo rje'i mchog/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni stobs chen la// shugs stong ldan pa rgyal ba can// bgegs kyi yul 'khor rab 'joms pa// sngags 'chang gas
72a5(rgyud): sngags chen po 'chang // sna tshogs gzugs can mi yi bad ga/ shin tu stobs ldan gzugs mdzes 'jigs/ drag po dag bo rab 'joms pa// gzi brjid gzi brjid
72a6(rgyud): mnga' ba'i dpal// dpal ldan mnyam pa med pa'i dpe// rdo rje can da snying sbyor ba// mi shes pa yi rab rib sel// sgeg pa'i cha lugs mchog mnga' ba// skye dgu'i bdag po sgeg par
72a7(rgyud): dgyes// gzhu stobs can la phyag ring ba// nyon mongs dgra rnams sel bar mdzad// mdzes pa na bza' sna tshogs gsol// me tog phrang rgyan sna tshogs can// spyan bzang dbu ni mdzes
72a8(rgyud): pa ste// dgyes shing na bza' sna tshogs gsol// 'jam pa'i dbyangs te rab tu bzhad// dkar gnag 'byed pa'i spyan mnga' ba// ha ha'i sgra ni rab tu bsgrags// rab tu dka' ba ston pa dga'
72b1(rgyud): rgyan chen gser gyi mdog dang ldan// rgya mtsho'i snying po'o spyod yul can// tshul mkhyen tshul ldan 'jigs pa ste// sdang ba'i snying ni 'jigs par mdzad// cha lugs sngo bas skyeng ga lha'i
72b2(rgyud): bdag po dga' bar mdzad// 'dod pa'i lha ste 'dod sel ba brten// rgyal po 'jig rten sa 'dzin pa// brtan po rnams la brtan par grags// ston dag gi phyogasu gzhang // btud pa yis
72b3(rgyud): btud phyag bgyis pa// rtag tu mchod cing brjed pa lags// stobs po che la shugs che ba// phyag ring g.yul chen mnga' ba po// sgeg chen rdo rje dam pa ste// mdzes shes rab srung tsha shwe/ 
72b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po mchog/ dkyil 'khor chen bor ston pa'o// dkyir chen por grags pa ste// dkyil 'khor chen po mdzad pa lags// dkyil 'khor
72b5(rgyud): slob dpon dkyil 'khor can// zhabs la brjed pa'i cho gas dang ldan// ha ha swAhA'i bdag che ba/ mchod pa chen po sa dang mnyam// hUM gis 'jigs mdzad 'jigs pa
72b6(rgyud): ste/ 'jigs pa'i 'od kyis gsal ba bo// lha dang lha min rnams kyis btud// de bzhin mchod cing ri mor bgyis// zha 'bring gang rgyangs chen po ca ni// rlung dag mun pa sel bar mdzad
72b7(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum du snyan par grags// gnod sbyin srin pos brnyan bkur ba// drag po dkar mdzad bde 'byung ba// mnga' bdag gtsug nor bu can// 'dzum zhing skrag par kun tu spyod// 
72b8(rgyud): spyod pa sa ltar brtan pa lags// nor bu'i dkyil 'khor 'od mdzes pa// nyi ma gsal ba la me gnyi ma'i 'od 'dra 'jar khugs bzhin// ba ler bzhugs shing rgya cher bzhad// 
73a1(rgyud): / mthong na dga' zhing dga' bar mdzad// nor sbyin de bzhin gsang sngags sbyin// dbang phyug sbyin zhing rgyal srid sbyin// gzugs sbyin de bzhin stobs sbyin// dpal ldan dpal
73a2(rgyud): mdzad bgegs gnon ri// kun tu rmongs pa sel bar mdzad// 'dus pa'i nang du gdan gshegs pa// zhabs la mchod pa'i tshigs bsags pa// dpung rgyan snyan che gdub 'khor can// 
73a3(rgyud): nor bu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste// rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba'i sgron// rab rob sel bar mdzad pa po// ston pa ston mdzad pa// dbang po mnga' bdag dmag gi mchog/ 'dzags pa sel bar mdzad
73a4(rgyud): ba ste// 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas sbyin pa// dka' ba sngo ba 'ang bzang ba// mgrin sngon gyi ni ston pa lags// ji ltar 'dul ba 'dul 'gyur ba// de bzhin cha lugs rab tu ston// shes rab ba
73a5(rgyud): gis 'debs par mdzad// ston nyid chos ni lhur 'dzin pa byams pa mchog dang tha ma mkhyen// rnam par grags bags na pa des// rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi sto
73a6(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang ba stobs pa che// shin tu rnam brgya la 'khos bsgyur// 'jigs med blo gros shes rab can// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dzin pa// mgur bzang du mdzad zhi ba ste/ 
73a7(rgyud): zhi ba'i lam ni ston mdzad pa// lha dang lha mon bcas pa sa bkur// se ni thad 'jigs med mdzad// sems can kun la rab ston pa// bstan po sen kun gyi mchog/ sems can kun gyi blo
73a8(rgyud): la mkhas// sred med bu ste drag shul stobs// me yi 'od dang 'dra ba ste// byis pa'i sku mchog mchog sbyin pa// rtsed mo rol mo ston par mdzad// phyag rgya mdzad cing gsang sngags
73b1(rgyud): bdag gir mi mdzad rdul med brtan// mkha' 'dra dpe med smra mkhas pa// bdud dpung nges par 'joms pa po// mi mchog brtson pa bskyod med// de bzhin thub med rnang rgyal// / 5
73b2(rgyud): po sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs// mya ngan med cing gnas pa med// 'joms med tshig bzang cha lugs bzang / dpa' bo dgra rnams rnam par 'jims// tshad med ngas 'joms rnal lce
73b3(rgyud): par 'dod pa gnon pa khyad par gshegs// mgon po rgyal ba'i sras kyi mchog/ gshin rje 'pham mdzad skye dgu srung // las dang nyon mongs rab bsregs pa// ston mdzad nyon mongs
73b4(rgyud): sel ba lags// legs pa khyod kyi mchog mtshan// brgya rtsabargyad pa rab gsal zhing // dad pa bskyed par byed pa 'di/ lha mchog rnams kyis rab tu bshad// 'gegs chen dang
73b5(rgyud): ni log 'dren dang // gnod sbyin lha mon srin po dang // mdangs 'phrog rkun po rgod rnams kyis// da ring lags par bstod par gyur// 'jam dpal rdo rje mchog rab// bskyil
73b6(rgyud): bas lha yangs bde bar 'gyur// de dag kun la bltas nas kyang // 'di skad ni tshig smras pa// khyod kun rtag tu bgegs med cing // nges legs thar pa thob gyur la// 'dzir med bkra
73b7(rgyud): yang shes par shog/ nga la 'jigs par ma sems shig/ de nas rab tu cher bzhad cing // 'brug cher sgra ltar sgrogs pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa zhal gsal bas// shar phyogs gni
73b8(rgyud): nas bka' stsal pa/ kye ma gsang sngags mchogi yul// sen gti mug bsal ba'i phyir// sen rnams kyi bsod nams tshogs// shin tu rgyas 'byung bar gyur// kye ma bsod nas
74a1(rgyud): // cher bcas pa'i// seMn rnams ni rab sbyangs phyir/ dam pa sbyin pa'i grub pa'i gzungs// 'jam pa'i glog gis rab tu bshad// la la gang zhig mnyam gzhag nas// sdug bsngal
74a2(rgyud): sel ba yi// grub pa'i gzungs 'di 'don pa 'am// yang na nyan tam sems kyang rung // de yi don kun 'grub 'gyur zhing // sdug bsngal kun las thar bar 'gyur// sdig pa thams cad rnam dag
74a3(rgyud): pa// de yis nges par 'thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs kyi sa chen yang // ring por mi thogs de yis 'thob// byang chub sada' rnams kyis// rab dga' shin+d+ra dri med// 'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro can// snru
74a4(rgyud): dka' de bzhin mngon du gyur// ring du song dang mi g.yo ba// legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin// sa tshan dam pa de dag kyang // gang zhig nges gnas 'don pa yi// se ni chen pos mi thogs par// che zad nas
74a5(rgyud): thob par 'gyur// sdig pa zad rnam dag dang // sen kun la sdug ba dang // spros pa thams cad zhi ba yi// byang chub bla med thob pa 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang kun bskyed pa dang // sdi
74a6(rgyud): ba zad zhi byed cing // bkra shis mchog tu dge ba yi// ming brgya rtsa brgyad yid 'ong 'di// sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar nas// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi mdun 'dug la// shin tu dang ba'o sems kyi su// 
74a7(rgyud): nang par langs na su brjed pa// de la rig sngags 'amang kun dang // de bzhin lha yi bdag po rnams// gnod sbyin srin po mang po dag/ rtag tu yang ni srung bar byed// de bzhin ga sh+ye ba'i sras/ 
74a8(rgyud): kun dang // de bzhin gshegs pa nyid rnams dang / de bzhin rdo rje'i mchog 'chang rnams// de la nges par srung bar byed// de ni sangs rgyas skur bzhugs shing // mnyam par gzhag pa snang bar
74b1(rgyud): 'gyur// gnod sbyin lha yi bdag po rnams// bgegs dang log 'dren chen po dag/ dga' zhing bsam pa dam pa yi// rgyang ma drag nas phyag kyang 'tshal// de phyir bgeg rnams dga' byung
74b2(rgyud): pas// 'tshe bar byed kyang mi nuso// lan gcig bklags na tshangs chen dang // bsod nams mnye bar thob par 'gyur// shes rab chen po gang zhig gis// nyi zer mtshan mchog brjod byas nas// dri ma
74b3(rgyud): med cing rab dag la// rab tu 'di gsal sgra snyan dang // sems can thaMd dga' ba yi// yid du 'ong ba'i gnas kyang 'thob// mtshungs pa med cing stobs skyed lam mchog 'gro ba dang // 'od gas
74b4(rgyud): dam tshig can gyi lha rnams kyis bstod cing // yid 'phrog lnga dang lha min tshegs te 'dun pa yi// gzung 'di rgyal ba rnams kyis legs par gsungs yin// 'phags pa
74b5(rgyud): 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogaso// // 'phags pa sgrib pa thaMd rnam par sel ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa// gzugs sngags da
74b6(rgyud): bcas pa// byang chub seda' sede' chen po sgrib pa zad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshalo// oM a mr-i ta/ bin+da dza ba/ ma hA su kha swA hA// de nas bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa rnar snang mdzad kyis/ 
74b7(rgyud): phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ byang chub mde'i sada' chen po sgrib pa thaMd rnam par sel ba tshim par mdzad nas/ bkar stsal pa// yon rin po che'i tshegs can khyod kyi gzus sngags 'di byung
74b8(rgyud): sen rnams kyi bde ba chen po bskyed pa leg so leg so// kye rgyal ba'i sras gang la la gzus sngags 'di thos pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung bcu bye ba snyed kyi spyan sngar/ dge ba'i
75a1(rgyud): // rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyuraro// gang la la ri rna lam du grags par gyur pa de yang / sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyuraro// sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du zla ba yang ngo'i chos
75a2(rgyud): brgyad dam// tshes bcwo lnga la bsnyung bar 'dug cing // gso sbyong dang ldan par byas te/ spos dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / me tog dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa la sogs pas mchod la// bsgo
75a3(rgyud): ba byas nas/ bzlas brjod byas ni/ dam pa ci 'dod pa thob par 'gyur te/ sdig pa thams cad dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa'
75a4(rgyud): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la// spos la sogs pas mchod/ bzlas brjod byas na/ rmi lam du ston par 'gyur te/ bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed cing / nyon mongs
75a5(rgyud): pa dang / sdug bsngal ba thams cad sel bar byedado// de nas rdo rje me tog zod chen pos gsum gyi dbang phyug dang / thabs gcig tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de'i nang
75a6(rgyud): nas stan las langs te/ byang chub seda' song 'chen po sgrib pa zad rnar sel ba la btud nas// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa// sems can kun gyi gtso che/ byang chub sems dpa
75a7(rgyud): tshul che ba// nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das// chos dbyings khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// sgrib pa kun las nges par grel/ nyon mongs dri ma kun sel cing // nyes pa kun las rnam grol ba// skyon bral
75a8(rgyud): khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// lam srang gcig pu'i tshul ston cing // thag pa gcig pu'i tshul gcig pa// theg pa chen po'i tshul brnyas te/ theg pa dag la khyod phyag 'tshal// snang ba chen por
75b1(rgyud): snang ba brnyas// yon tan dkyil 'khor 'jig rten bdag/ zla ba bzhin du 'od dkar ba// 'jig rten 'das pa khyod pag 'tshal// theg pa chen po dag pa che// sangs rgyas theg pa rtogs gyur cing // rdo rje'i
75b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rnams grangs pa// rdo rje chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// dpa' bo chen po bdud las rgyal// dar ba chen po nyan mongs choms// bgegs thub gshin rje thub pa ste// rin chen pa khyod phyag
75b3(rgyud): 'tshal// zla ba chen po nyi ma che// lhun po chen po dbang phyug che// lha chen mgon po chen po ste// 'byor pa chen po khyod pag 'tshal// sgrib pa thams cad gcod mdzad cing // sgrib pa thad sal mdzad pa/ 
75b4(rgyud): kun mkhyen yin bdag nyid che// rnam sel khrod la phyag 'tshal sangs rgyas spyod yul bzhugs pa ste// chos kyi spyod yul gshegs pa lags// ye shes dbang phyug yas
75b5(rgyud): sred bral khyod la phyag 'tshalo// sku mdzes ston snying po mkhan/ rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor rgyan// sangs rgyas lam ste don yod che// ye shas dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal// bstan pa gnas da
75b6(rgyud): bdag po ste// bde mdzad thugs kyang zhi ba ste// yangs pa dri maud shes rab can// snang ba dag pa khyed phyag 'tshal// zab cing brtan la rnam par gnon// zhi ba 'jig rten dag par mdzad// ston pa stsa
75b7(rgyud): 'os srid gsum na// dpal btsan khyod la phyag 'tshalo// skal ba chen po nyon mongs bcom/ 'khor ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jom pa ste/ zhi bzhi mdzad bde byung ba/ chu bo zhi mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal
75b8(rgyud): thar pa'i rgyu ste chos lugs che// bad 'grer gnas pa dri ma med// rnam dag thugs mnga' zhi ba mkhyen/ nyes sel khyod la phyag 'tshalo// rtse mo yangs pa rnam par grags/ sngags chen ma
76a1(rgyud): // 'dul mdzad pa// snying po chen po dkyil 'khor mchog/ dkyil 'khor mkhyen pa khyod phyag 'tshal// sdug bsngal gsum sel gsum gyi mchog/ dkon mchog gsum dang spyod yul
76a2(rgyud): 'dras rnam gsum mkhyen pa brnyes pa'i bdag/ rnam par gsum khyod phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sa de'i yon gyi// 'byor ba brnyes shing mnyam nyid banas// bskal pa dag ni grangs med par/ tsha na
76a3(rgyud): bsags khyod phyag 'tsha lo// sa la gnas pa sa tshan brnyes/ sa yi 'bras bu phun sum tshogs// yang dag sa 'dzin las byung ba/ yis khyod phyag 'tsha'o// ting 'dzin la mnga' brnyes pa// nyes bcu
76a4(rgyud): spong zhing sdig pa sel// ting 'dzin mkhan cing rgya che ba// mnyam pa nyid mnyam khyod phag 'tshal// mgon po chen po snang ba cha// sdug bsngal chen po'i dri ma sa la// zhi gyur ma lus zhi mdzad pa// smon
76a5(rgyud): pa mtha' khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas kun mtshungs gsung ldan pa// chos kun zhi ba phun sub tshogs// dkon mchog gsu rigs dpe med pa// rin chen mtha' yas khyod phyag
76a6(rgyud): 'tshal// rdo rje chen po de med pachog/ rdo rje mtshan bsdams sdig mi mnga'// na mkha' ma lus yul dang ldan// ye shes spyod yul rgya mtsho banga'// de bzhin gshegs dang yul gcig pa// 
76a7(rgyud): sel ba po ste dri ma spyod// shes rab chen po rgyal ba'i sras// srad gcod khyod la phyag 'tshalo// rdo rje dkyil 'khor rdo rje mcheg// rdo rje 'dul ba rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje stsal can rnams kyi rtsal
76a8(rgyud): rdo rje snang ba khyod phyag 'tshal// rin chen chen po'i rin chen blo// rin chen rdo rje'i 'od chal// rin chen 'od mdzes rin chen 'byung // rin chen bsten pa srung mdzad pa// stong pa nyid kyi yul 'anas/ 
76b1(rgyud): shing / ye shes stong pa nyid kyis ston// stong nyid long spyod yul dang ldan// stong nyid mchog khyod phyag 'tshalo// shA rab mtshungs med shes rab can// dag pa rnam dag sa dang bral// chos kyi
76b2(rgyud): las byung snang ba po// 'jig rten 'das pa'i tshul chen logs// 'jig rten snang mdzad smra mkhas pa// 'jig rten chos las snang bar 'das// 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i lton brnyes// rgyan par
76b3(rgyud): mdzad pa dkyil 'khor dag/ nyes pa ma lus sel ba ste/ phyag tshan skye bo kun la phan// sa 'dzin rnam par grags pa po// kun mkhyen khyod la phyag 'tshalo// dga' mkhyen dga' la long spyod
76b4(rgyud): dga' ba'i rigs mchog rnams kyi mchog/ dgar bar mdzadape'i rtog pa can// dga' ba ldan pa khyed phyag 'tshal// sgeg chen 'dzin zhing dgongs par ldan// nang sgeg la
76b5(rgyud): spyod pa brtan// rdo rje rog bsgag pa'i mchog/ skrag chen khyod la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas byang chub sede'i mchog/ rdo rje mchog dkyil 'khor che// theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas
76b6(rgyud): bla meng mchog khyod la phyag 'tshalo// dbar bo byang chub sede'i mchog/ sgrib pa zad sel mdzad la// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyis// ming brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bston nas// rdo rje bsten pa rna gras
76b7(rgyud): pa// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// kye ma 'byor chen snang ba yis// dkyil 'khor rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ba// gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa// 'di dag so sor brjod byed na// nga ni nyes
76b8(rgyud): ba kun bzlog cing // rtag tu da yi phyi bzhin 'brang // nang par langs nas gtsang ma yis// sgrib pa zang sel ba dang / blo ldan gang zhig bstod byed pa// de yi sdig pa med par 'gyur// gang zhig ming
77a1(rgyud): // rtsa brgyad mchog/ nang bar langs nas brjod byang pa// sdang ba thad de dbang 'gyur// bgegs rnams kyis kyang yengasu btang // sdig pa dag pa 'thob pa dang // de bzhin bsod rnams 'phel
77a2(rgyud): ba dang // yis rgya mtsho long spyod cing // sa mchog chen po thob par 'gyur// gang zhig nges par gnas byas la// ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog 'don pa// ngas ni 'byor chen sangs rgyas sa// ring por mi thegs
77a3(rgyud): thob par 'gyur// rgyud chen ldan zhing blo tsha ba// gang zhig ming mchog 'don pa ni// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bstan pa na// ring por mi thogs 'jug par 'gyur// byang chub seda' chen po'i sgrib pa zad rnam
77a4(rgyud): sel ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzog so// / 'phags pa sa'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa// dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po
77a5(rgyud): byang chub seda'i sada' chen po sa'i snying po la phyag 'tsha le// au suM b+ha ni suM b+ha/ ha ra tsa ra/ ma hA pA shA/ ma ru tA/ a mo g+ha/ badz+ra satwa swAhA// de nas ston sbyin pa yi// gzungs 'di
77a6(rgyud): bshad ma thag tu yang // rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// ti se'iri gangs bcas g.yos par 'gyur/ sa yi snying po tsho gas dbang la/ bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis spras// bsgo ldan chen po legs
77a7(rgyud): leg so// sa stengs khyod kyi yang dag byas// khyod kyi gzungs ni rnam grags shing // yon dpag med mchog bskyed pa// san kun gyi sdug bsngal dang // nyes pa bzlog cing thes pa 'di// 'khor
77a8(rgyud): rab tu rgyu ba na// nyes pa kun gyis mi gos te// ji ltar 'dam gyi pad+ma dag/ 'dam gyi nyes pas mi gros bzhin// lus can dag la su yang rung // khyod kyi gsang sngags 'chang byed pa// de dag las
77b1(rgyud): ni gcig tsam yang // byang chub las ni ldeg mi 'gyur// mkhas pa gang zhig gzungs sngags mchog/ thos nas mos par byed pa dang // nges par ljon zad kyang // thos par 'gyur te the tshom med// de ma
77b2(rgyud): ldan pa'i 'khor// langs te sa yi dbang phyug po// sa yi snying pos mchog la// maung brgya rtsa brgyad smras pa ni// sa yi snying po gtso bo che// glog 'gyur lta bu'i spyad mnga' ba// cod pan can te sa brnyes pa/ 
77b3(rgyud): phun sum tshogs ldan 'byor pa mchog/ rigs ldan rig mdzad mchod pa'i gnas// gtso bo dge sbyong ston pa po// gzhi bcas ldan pa'i klung gi tshul// swAhA'i blo ldan stong rje'i rab// thad mkhyen pa nyi ma'i ma
77b4(rgyud): snying po snying po mkhyen par grags// gsang sngags rol cing rgya che ra rol// sa yi dbang phyug gar thabs can// sgeg po zhal bzang gar mkhan ldan// 'bra sdu mngon sumi ston pa po// byo
77b5(rgyud): blo gros snying po mkhan snying po brnyes pa 'jigs pa med// mgod bo sangs rgyas gzugs mnga' ba// shes rab kyis ni ma lus ga/ thogs// 'dod chags la sogs skyon bsal zhing // gang
77b6(rgyud): stabs chen po sten pa po// ston pa dpag bsam shing dang 'angadra // na mkha'i dbang phyugs gsung snyan pa// nyi ma chen po nyid yin te// dbang phyug chen po 'bar ba bskor// ston mtha' yas long spyod pa// sa yi
77b7(rgyud): dbang phyug spyod yul can// chos kyi long spyod long spyod che// yin rgya mtsho'i gang chen mtsho// yin sna tshogs long spyad pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchog// thabs tshul zab la mkhas pa
77b8(rgyud): theg pa chen po 'jigs pa med// mchod po chen po sgra cher// zla ltar grags pa'i dkyil 'khor can// rdo rje 'chang chen mtshon brgya ba// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor me tog zong / blo gris chen po phyag ring la/ 
78a1(rgyud): / 'dra chen po sdebs po che// sngags 'chang chen po stobs cher ldan// sa gzhi chen po lhun pa lags// lag na rdo rje yin ngas// nor bu'i me tog zed kyis rgyan// mnyam nyid 'byas pa
78a2(rgyud): long spyod pa// rgya chen zhing gi rgya mtsho can// rdo rje'i 'od mnga' rdo rje ldan// sa yi bdag po lhun po bzhin// sa la long spyod long spyod cha// mtshon cha g.yo ba phun sum tshogs// rab 'byam snod ni rnar grags
78a3(rgyud): smra mkhas rdo rje rab 'joms pa// spyad rtsa yid tsam dmar ba ste/ me tog sngon po'i thaMd kyis bcings// spro ba chen po phyag ring ba// brtan po brtan pa bde sbyin pa// ded dpon dpal bzang chen pa
78a4(rgyud): gangs can lhun po lta bu laT/ dbang po gshin rje rgyal chen dang btsan po khyab 'jug stobs dbang phyug/ 'jig rten mchog rig sa ng+yas tshangs// de bzhin nyid tshul spyod tshul can// rin chen tog
78a5(rgyud): tshar bzhad pa// dgyes pa na bza' sna tshogs gsol// gzigs ba ring ba spyan yangs pa// na mkha' bzhin du thogs pa med// ba med dpogs rin chen gtsug/ srid gsum 'dod
78a6(rgyud): med pa'i rgyu// dul ba nyon mongs dri ma gsal// dag pa gtsang ma gso sbyong can// rnyor gnon pa yul las 'das// ljang mdog skyabs mdzad snying rje che// stobs kyis grags pa rgya che ba// bsas na
78a7(rgyud): ba'i spyod yul can// dpa' bo sang+ge 'jigs par byed// sdang ba rnams kyi snying 'joms pa// mngar bdag grags pa yul dang ldan// dga' ba rgyal tshar rab 'byung ba// rigs mkhyen rigs kyi snyi
78a8(rgyud): mkhyen// rigs kun tu ni mchod pa lags// rgyal po rigs cho spyad pa'i rten// rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor rgyan// rdo rjes 'og rab grags pa// rig sngags 'chang ba stobs po che// mngon par la nam pa
78b1(rgyud): khyad par mchog/ mgrin bzang nang dang bral ba lags// skyong mdzad ston pa dag pa ste// sangs rgyas lam ni rab ston pa// sgrol ba sprin mdzad sdud par mdzad// dkyil 'khor ma lus rnams kyis btu
78b2(rgyud): rab zhugs dkyil 'khor rnams la mkhas// rdo rje'i slob dpon yon can// grub pa sbyin pa rnam ngag mchog/ tshul dang tshul min rtogs pa po// dkyil 'khor rtsa ser mnga' ba ste// 'od zer ljang bu
78b3(rgyud): 'od dang 'dra// ser la na gza' ser po 'anabs// dkyil 'khor ma lus kun gyis can// spyan rtsa dmar bzla ba'i dpel// ner bu sna tshogs 'od 'byung ba// rdo rje brgya yi stobs kyi ba spro// mnya nyid mnye ba
78b4(rgyud): dri ma med// sku yang dag cing na bza' dag/ dag pa mkhyen cing dag par ldan// dag pa'i chos mnga' dang ba ste// 'byung ldan sreg pas la mdzad pa// 'khor ba zad mdzod shes rab can tshu
78b5(rgyud): shas tshul la spyod yul ba// rdo rje rgya mtsho'i snying po lags/ rdo rje sede'i dge ba che// 'byung ldan rang 'byam shes rab can// ma lus ga/ pa'i 'od bzang ba// sa yi snying po snying po che// rdo rje'i sku
