78b6(rgyud): bo rnar 'dan// dpag tu med pa dpag med rdzogs// khyad par 'phags pa'i yul la gnas// zab cing gsal ba'i gtso bo ste// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer bsil// dga' ba dang bskyed pa ste// yis rgya
78b7(rgyud): chen spyod yul ba// rlung gi drag shul lta bur grags// drag po lags te drag sel bcang // rgyal bar byang cing rgyal la ni// rgyal ba'i dpal mdzad dga' bar mdzad// lhun po ti se ma la yas// sprongs
78b8(rgyud): zab mo nod pa ste/ rin chen rdo rje snying po ma// sa gzhi spyod yul mnga' ba lags// rin ched brag las byung ba'i 'od// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dag gis rgyan// de bzhin gshegs pa lhun dgyes pa/ zhu
79a1(rgyud): // drag dpal gyi gzhi rten lags// rab gsal dpal mdzad gtsang ba ste// phyogs cha'i dbang phyug dbang phyug // de ltar rdo rje rachang chen la// bing brgya rtsa brgyad mchog rnas kyis
79a2(rgyud): rdo rje sings bstod nas ni// rdo rjes gsum dbang mchog spras// yon snying po shes rnams kyis// bing brgya rtsa brgyad pa cheg brjod cing // nyes pa bzlog pa 'di las gzhan// sa yi steng dngas pa mtho
79a3(rgyud): ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di// thams cad 'grub byed dga' ba ste// sdig pa thad sel ba dang // dri ma kun bral yin nges// de phyir sgrib pa zad kyis// phun sum tshogs pa 'ded pa'i mis// ming brgya
79a4(rgyud): brgyad dge ba 'di// rtag tu yang ni brjed par gyis// ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di// bsam pa kun dang 'byer ba yi// gnas mchog bla na med pa ste// dpal yon rgya chen sprin pa yi// yid ni shin tu dang ba
79a5(rgyud): sa yi snying po mtshan gsal ba// 'dod pa thams cad rab bsgra ba ba'i// len mchog ni gang brjod dang // dpal yon rgya tshar 'dzan pa yi// ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di// mi nig
79a6(rgyud): zhig rjed byed pa// sdug bsngal kun las myur du grol// 'phags pa sa'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad ba gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogaso// / rgya gar skad/ Ar+ya me tri pra ti dz+nyA nA
79a7(rgyud): ma d+ha ra NI/ bod skad du// 'phags pa byams pas dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs// dkon mcho gsum la phyag 'tshalo// rgyal ba byams pa la phyag 'tsha'o// na mo rat+na trai la ya/ na mo b+ha ga be te/ 
79a8(rgyud): shAkyaM mun ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samya ka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a dzi ta a dzi te/ a ba rA dzi te/ a dzaM tany+dza ya/ ha ra ha ra/ me tri a ba lo ki te/ ka ra ka ra/ mahA sa ma ya sid+d+hi/ b+ha raH
79b1(rgyud): ma hA bo d+hi maN+Da bI dze/ sma ra sma ra/ A sma kaM sa ma ya/ bo d+hi bi d+hi/ ma hA bo d+hi swA hA/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngagaso// oM me hi me haM/ ma hA mo haM swAhA/ snying po'o// oM mu ni mu ni sma ra swA hA// nye ba'i snying po'o// gzungs
79b2(rgyud): 'di nyan pa tsam dang // klog pa dang / kha don byed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la sems pa dang / bsgoms pa tsam gyis/ gang gi tshe bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzog par
79b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas par gyur pa na/ bdag gis sen de nges par btsal bar bgyi ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bgyi'o// tha na dud 'gro'i skye gan su gyur pa'i ri dregs
79b4(rgyud): dang / bya rnabs kyi rna khung du sgrog par byed na/ de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'the'o// 'di thos pa tsam gyis// nam du yang ngan song du 'gros
79b5(rgyud): mi 'gyur// ngan sengs gi dri mis kyang mi go so// ma'i mngal du yang mi skye'o// lha'i bskal pa stong du 'khos bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur// dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur// ji ltar
79b6(rgyud): shing ded du gnyer ba'i long spyod 'grub par 'gyuraro// bcos bdag kyang sen de bskyed par mi bgyi leg so// nges par bdag byang chub snying po la mchis nas// de ji ltar gyur kyang rung // bla na med pa la
79b7(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyi'o// 'phags 'byams pas dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogas+ho// / rgya gar ska du/ Ar+ya aSh+Ta maN+Da la ka nA ma ma hA lA na sU tra/ 
79b8(rgyud): bod skad/ 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba// theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub seda' thad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bac+doMs ri gra
80a1(rgyud): // 'dzin na// 'phags pa spyan ngas gzigs dbang phyug gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' bya ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas byang chub se
80a2(rgyud): chen po// rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de stan las langs nas/ chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ dbus mo g.yas
80a3(rgyud): pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dang log su thal mo sbyang ba btud/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus na nu ba lung bstan pa'i smad/ bac+doMs kyis @
80a4(rgyud): la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bac+doMs
80a5(rgyud): kyis byang chub seda' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po thA ba snang ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rin chen snying po zla ba sdang ba/ khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang ngas dris
80a6(rgyud): ba de dang de'i lung bstan pas// khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' seda' chen po ron chen snying po zla ba snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
80a7(rgyud): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig dkyil 'khor brgyad pa bgyid par 'tshal na// des ji lngar bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
80a8(rgyud): kyi bu khyod skye bo mang po la shin tu phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / dus gsum du skyes pa'i sen rnams kyi mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes sgrub pa'i phyir// rigs kyi bu khyod spongs pa skyes/ 
80b1(rgyud): pa ni bzang ste/ legaso lag so// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir snying po gang brjod pa tsam gyis/ mtshams med pa lnga 'byung zhing / dngos grub zad kyang thob par 'gyur ba/ byang chub se 'a brgyad kyi snying po
80b2(rgyud): nyon cig/ oM mu ne hUM ma hA bI ra swA hA// snying po 'dis ni dbus kyi bcom ldan 'das mchodado// oM hrI hU~M pad+ma pri yi swA hA// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugi snying po'o// oM me ha ra Na swA hA/ 
80b3(rgyud): byams pa'i snying po'o// oM a gar+b+ha ya swAt+ma/ na mkha'i stong po'o// oM ma se hi rA dza ya sAhA/ kun tu 'izang po'o stong po'o// oM ku ru ba na ra ha swAhA/ lag na rdo rje'i snying po'o// oM shrI ma ra~M ga swAhA/ 
80b4(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i snying po'o// oM ni swa raM ba swA hA// sgrib pa thang sgrib pa thang rnam par sel ba'i snying po'o// oM k+Shi ti ha ra dza swAhA/ sa'i snying po'i snying po'o// byang chub
80b5(rgyud): brgyad kyi snying po'o// de bzhin gsheg pa dang ldang pa 'di rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du lan cig brjod na// de'i don tha~Md 'grub
80b6(rgyud): par 'gyur te/ myur du bla na meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sed
80b7(rgyud): chen po de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa lo mngon par bstod// 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzog s+ho// // rgya gar gyi ma
80b8(rgyud): ba~M dzi na mi tra dang / dran/ shI la dang / nu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsang chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la ba' ga/ rgya gar ska du/ a mr-i ta b+ha ba nA mad+hA raNA
81a1(rgyud): // bod skad du/ bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// bac+doMs rgyal po'i
81a2(rgyud): khab byang chub kyi shing drang na// 'khor rnam bzhi dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyis bskor nas bzhug so// de nas 'khor rnams kyi nang nas khyim bdag bzang skyong gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor rnam pa
81a3(rgyud): bzhi dang / rigs drug gi sen thad la/ spos dang / sman dang / zhal zas kyi mchod pa chen po bshams nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bza' ba dang bca' ba
81a4(rgyud): dang // btung ba 'di rnams sen rnams kyi don du byin gyis brlabs tu gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ zhal zas kyi
81a5(rgyud): steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi stang du raM dkar bo la chos thad rdul dang bral ba'o// zhes bya ba'i sgra byung bas zhal zas kyi dam dag par gyur to// yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
81a6(rgyud): stang du a dkar po bsams te/ zhal zas lha'i bdud rtsi dang yo byad du gyur to// yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du// oM zhes pas 'phags pa dang sen thad mnyes shing tshim par gyur te// 
81a7(rgyud): da nas bac+doMs kyis phyag na rdo rje ltar byas te gzungs 'di gsung so// oM sarba d+harma tA badz+ra sid+d+ha hUM/ oM a mr-i ta ts+tsha/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ bi shA mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba thA khaM ud ga te s+pha ra Na/ 
81a8(rgyud): maM ga ga na khaM swAhA/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ko to sa~M b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM/ oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha la~M tsan sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ne swA hA// zhes gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu mchod pa'in
81b1(rgyud): zas kyis mchod nas/ 'phags pa zad mnyes pa dang / sen dzad bde bar gyur te// de nas khyim bdag bzang skyong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs
81b2(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sede' thad kyi mthu dang / chos kyi dbyings rnar dag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi mthu dang / bdag gi bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i stobs kyis 'phags pa thad kyi grong dang / sen
81b3(rgyud): bad kyi gnas dang / sems can thang kyi rgyud la chos dang zang zing gi long spyod dpag tu med cing brjod kyis mi khyab pa brjod kyis mi rdzogs pa 'thung zhing rgyas par gyur cing / sangs rgyas
81b4(rgyud): kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang / gsang sngags dang / rigs sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / ti 'dzin gyi bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi pha
81b5(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa la sogs te chos kyi sbyin pa dang / bdag gi zang zong gi sbyin pa 'dis bde ba dang / dga' bar gyur cig/ bcom ldan/ 'das kyis legaso// zhes bya ba byin te/ khyim pa
81b6(rgyud): bzang skyong lag so// dga' ba'i spyod pa 'di lta bu byed pa leg so// nga'i 'khor lho dang mi rnams kyis kyang 'di lngar mchod par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis nga skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 
81b7(rgyud): thang dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / khyim bdag bzang skyong rje su yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod dga' bar gyur to// bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs
81b8(rgyud): rdzog s+ho// // yi drags kha nas ma 'bar ba la skyabs mdzad pa'i gzungs// de'i cha bcos yul ser skya na/ dge 'dun gyi gnas na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / byang chub sa de'
82a1(rgyud): // grangs med pas yongasu bskor ba la chos ston te/ de'i chan tshe dang ldan pa dag pa dga' bas mtha' zhig na chos yid la byed cing / dran pa mngon du bzhag nas 'dug pa las/ do
82a2(rgyud): mo nam gyi cha smad la/ yi dwags kha nas me 'bar ba zhes bya ba/ gzugs byang mi sdug pa/ shin tu ring cing skem pa/ kha nas me 'bar ba mgrin pa mo khab tsam du phra ba/ skra 'dzings pa sen
82a3(rgyud): dang mche ba ring la rno ba shin tu 'jig su rung ba zhig/ dga' bo'i dang du 'ongs nas// dga' bo la 'di skad ces smraso// khyod da ste zhag bdun na tshe'i dus byas te/ yi drag su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes
82a4(rgyud): smraso// dga' bos des smras pa thos nas/ shin tu 'jigs sbal ste/ yi dwags de la 'di skad ces smras// bdag tshe'i dus byas nas yi dwags kyi khamasu skye bar 'gyur ba 'di/ 
82a5(rgyud): ci byas na sdug bsngal de las yongasu thar bar 'gyur// de nas yi drags des dga' bo la 'di skad ce smra so// gal te khyed kyis sang gi nyi ma la yo dwags gang+gA klung gi
82a6(rgyud): ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la gtor ma byin te/ bram ze dang drang srong brgya stong snyad la yul dbus 'gyur tshal gyi bre tshad ma ra ra yi zhol zas mchog dam pa phul te/ khro bo'i phyir
82a7(rgyud): dkyil mchog gsum la mchod pa byas na/ tsha ring zhing yi dwags kyi sdug bsngal dang bral te/ mtho ros kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe dga' bos yi dwags kha nas me 'bar ba lus
82a8(rgyud): mi sdug pa dang / shin tu rid cing skem pa dang // kha nas me 'bar ba dang / mgrin pa mo khab tsam la spa 'dzings pa dang / sen mo dang mche ba rong zhing rno ba yang mthong la// yi du mi 'od/ mi 'dod
82b1(rgyud): pa'i tshig kyang thos nas/ lus spyi bung zhes byed pa tsam du 'jigs skrag nas 'dug pa las langs te/ myur bar bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der se // bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
82b2(rgyud): phyin nas lus smad lnga sa la gtug te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lus 'phang bzhin du sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa'i dpung gnyen mdzad du gsol
82b3(rgyud): bac+doMs la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag pas mtha' zhig na chos yid la 'gyid cing mching pa las/ yi dwags kha nas ma 'bar ba zhes bgyi ba de bdag la 'di skad ces mchi'o// / 
82b4(rgyud): khyod da ste zhag bdun na nges par cha'i dus byas te/ yi drag sa kyi kham su skye bar 'gyu ro zhes mchi'o// bdag gis de la thabs ci bgyi na/ yi dwags kyi sdug bsngal
82b5(rgyud): de las yongasu thar par 'gyur zhes dris na/ des bdag la khyod kyis yi dwags gang+gAr klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la gtor ma byin te/ dri za dang drang srong
82b6(rgyud): sogs pa brgya stong snyed la/ zhal zas mchog dam pa phul na tshe ring bar 'gyur zhes mchi na// bcas bdag gis ji lta bur yi dwags dang drang srong la sogs pa de snyed kyi kha zas
82b7(rgyud): 'byor par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod 'jigs par ma byed gcig/ khyod kyis yi dwags ged+hA ri klung gi bye ma khrag khrig rgya stong
82b8(rgyud): snyed dang // bram ze dang srong la sogs pa la kha zas dang gtor ma mang po 'byor pa'i thabs nga la yod kyis yid blong bar ma byed cig/ de nas brdzis kyis dga' bo la bka' stsa
83a1(rgyud): // nga la gsungs sngags gzi brjid tshad med pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i 'od zer rnam par rgyal ba'i shugs zhes bya ba yod/ gang zhig gis gzungs 'di brjod na/ yi dwags
83a2(rgyud): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed dang / bram ze dang drang srong la sogs te/ mang po'i kha zas dang gtor mchog par 'gyur te/ de dag la sogs pa cig kyang kha zas yul
83a3(rgyud): dbus 'gyur tshal gyi bra tshad mas bcal ba'i bri ba dun bdun snyed thob par 'gyuraro// dga' bo nga yang brin gyur pa na/ byang chub se' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / de bzhin
83a4(rgyud): pa dbang sgyur yon zhes bya ba las gzungs 'di thos pas na/ de'i dbang gis yi dwags tshad med pa rnyed dang / drang srong mang po la mkha zas dang / gtor ma byin par gyur
83a5(rgyud): te ya dregs kyi kham su skyes pa de dag kyang sdug bsngal las rnar grol nas mthe ris kyi lhar skyes par 'gyur to// dga' bo khyod kyis zung shig/ bsod nams dang che'i tshad kyang
83a6(rgyud): 'phel zhing skye bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe bac+doMs kyis dga' bo la gzungs sngags 'di bka' stsal to// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki ti/ saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM/ bac+doMs kyis dga' bo la
83a7(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig tsha ring bar 'dod dam/ bsod nams che zhing 'phel ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha gol tu phyin pa myur du yongasu rdzogs par bya bar
83a8(rgyud): 'dod na/ rtag tu snga dro'i dus sam/ yang na dus thad du byas kyang bar cha du 'gyur ba medo// snod gtsang ma'i nang du chugatsang ma blags la chan nam/ phye 'am/ khur ba la sogs pa cud
83b1(rgyud): zad cig btab ste/ lag pa g.yas pa snod kyi steng du bzhag ste/ gzungs 'di lan bdun bsngags nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi'i mtshan nas brjed par bya'o// de bzhin ga
83b2(rgyud): pa rin chen mngal phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang gi mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis// yi dwags thang skye ba mang po'i sar sna byas pa mi dge ba
83b3(rgyud): las bcom zhing / bsod nams yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs dam pa la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs dam pa'i mtshanas brjod pa'i byin gyis
83b4(rgyud): brlabs kyis yi dwags mang po byad gzugs mi sdug pa bcom zhing gzugs dang mtshan phun sum tshogs par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa sku 'jam klas la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin
83b5(rgyud): gshegs pa sku 'jam glas kyi mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis yi dwags mang po'i skom pa spangs shing tshim par 'gyur te/ sbyin pa'i gnas yid bzhin du za ba
83b6(rgyud): dang chog cing 'drangs par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa dang bral ba la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyis hAH
83b7(rgyud): kyis nga yi drags mang po'i 'jigs pa thad dang bral te/ yi dwags kyi khams zhi bar 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu la sogs pas de bzhin gabye ba
83b8(rgyud): mtshan nas brjod/ byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'og tu se gol lan gsum byas te/ gtor ma'i snod blangs nas lag pa brkyang ste/ sa gtsang mar blugs par bya'o// de ltar gtor ma byin
84a1(rgyud): // bar byas nas/ phyogs bya'i nas lhags pa'i yi dwags gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya steng snyed so so nas yul dbus 'gyur tshal gyi bre tshad mas bcal
84a2(rgyud): ba'i bre bdun bdun thob par 'gyuraro// kha zas de dag yi dwags kyi yid bzhin du za ba dang tshig 'drangs pa dang / yi dwags kyi khams spong ba dang / mthe ris kyis lhar skye bar 'gyu'o// dag
84a3(rgyud): be gal te dge slong ba 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen no// dge bsnyen ma gang zhig rtag tu gzungs 'dis/ kha zas la bsngags te yi dwags la sbyin pa byin na/ bsod nams tshad med
84a4(rgyud): snyed yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / de nas sangs rgyas bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams dang khyad par med tshe ring ba dang bsod nams dang
84a5(rgyud): mdangs dang stobs skye/ 'phel ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu rdzogs pa dang / mi ma yin pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi drags ma rungs pa thad kyis gtse zhing gnod
84a6(rgyud): par byed mi nus pa dang / gzhan la gzi brjid tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gal te gang zhig bram ze dang / drang srong la sbyin pa byad 'dod na/ kha zas yongasu dag pa snod gcig nang du
84a7(rgyud): bkang ste/ gzugs sngags lan bdun bzlas te/ 'bab chu gtsang mar gter na// de ltar byas pas lha rdzas kyi zhal zas mchog de par gyur te/ de na bram ze dang / drang srong de dag kyang sngags
84a8(rgyud): kyis btab pa'i zas thob nas/ sngags kyi byin gyi so so nas// sngon chad ci dang tsal dga' zhing mos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bsod nam su yong su 'gyur bas/ so so nas 'thun par dus gang+gA/ 
84b1(rgyud): tu de la tshe ring ba dang / mdangs dang stob su ldan te/ bdeg sgyid par gyur cig ces smon lam 'deb so// gzhan yang mi de sems bsams pa bzhin du mthong ba dang / thos pa'i sgo nas
84b2(rgyud): yongasu dag cing / shes pa mi nor ba dag tshangs pa'i lha'i spyod pa mchog dang ldan zhing yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khra/ 
84b3(rgyud): khrig brgya stong snyed la mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams dang 'dra ste/ pas kyi rgol ba thad kyis gnod pa mi nus par 'gyuraro// gal te dge slong ba 'am/ dge slong ma 'am// dge bsnyen
84b4(rgyud): pa 'am/ ngage bsnyen ma gang zhig sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa byed par 'dod na/ spos dang me tog dang zhal zas dam pa la gzungs sngags 'di lan nyi shu
84b5(rgyud): rtsa gcig tu bzlas te/ dkon mchog gsum la dbul bar bya'o// de nas rigs kyi bu po dang / rigs kyi bu mo des phul ba'i zhal zas de lha rdzas kyi zhal zasu gyur
84b6(rgyud): tephyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas bstod pa dang gsol ba gdab pa dang / rje su yi rang ba'i
84b7(rgyud): bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur te/ rtag tu sangs rgyas bac+doMs kyis sngags shing dgongs par 'gyuraro// lha mang pos rtag tu srung zhing skyol ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
84b8(rgyud): yang rdzogs par 'gyuraro// dga' bo khyod kyis 'di rje su chos bzhin yid la byas te/ san thaMd kyis mthong zhing thos par bya ba'i phyir yongasu rgyas par ston cig dang / bsod nams
85a1(rgyud): tshad med pa theb par 'gyuro// yi dwags kha nas me 'bar ba la skyabs mdzad pa'i gzungs rdzog s+ho// / yi dwags kha 'bar ma dbugs dbyung ba'i gter ma'i cho ga
85a2(rgyud): dkon pa chog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya na/ shing n+ya gre da'i kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub se de'i tsho gas chen
85a3(rgyud): po dang / sen gyi tshegs chen po dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te chos ston to// de nas kun dga' bo dben par 'dug ste/ nang du yang dag 'dzeg cing rtse gcig tu yid la byed pas/ tshes men
85a4(rgyud): sum du byed pa na/ mtshan mo nam gyo cha smad la de'i mdun du yi dwags mo kha 'bar ma 'dug nas smras pa/ kye kun dga' bo khyod gnangs 'chi bar 'gyur te/ yi dgas kyi gnas 'dir skye
85a5(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// kun dga' bos smras pa/ brten pa'i thabs yod/ yi drags mos smras pa/ kun dga' bo gal te nang par yi dwags gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig phrag
85a6(rgyud): 'bum gyi bya ma snyed dag la/ yo drags re ra la yang zas dang / skom yul ma ga d+ha'i bre bo tsam byin te/ bra bze'i dang srong 'bum yang tshim par byas la/ bdag ming gis dkon mchog
85a7(rgyud): gsum la mchod pa byas na de ltar na da ltar na khyed kyi cha yang phyir nur bar 'gyur la/ bdag kyang yi dwags kyi 'jig rten nas shi 'phos te/ mthi ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur
85a8(rgyud): de nas kun dga' bas// yi dwags mo kha 'bar ma rid cing mdog ngan la/ lus skem pa kha nas me lce 'bar ba/ lto dang kha skam pa/ ral por phung po g.yangs pa// bu dang / sen me ra
85b1(rgyud): ba mthong ste/ chib mi snyan cing yid du mi 'ong ba de thos nas sreg cing sngangs te/ spu zong zhes byas nas/ lhan las langs te shin tu rings pa dang shin tu myur ba'i shugs kyis// 2
85b2(rgyud): ga la ba der seng sde byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ 'dar bzhon du 'ang skad ces gsol te/ bcos skyabs mdzang du gsal// bang bar gshegs pa skyabs
85b3(rgyud): mdzad du bsel bdag ni gnangs sreg 'gum par 'gyur lagaso// bcom ldan 'das rang gi bi sa yi dpas mo kha 'bar ma mthong ste/ khong gnangs 'chi bar 'gyur// zhes mtshan

85b5(rgyud): par byas pa bram ze'i drang srong 'bum yang tshim par byas na/ de ltar mkhyed kyi che par nur bar 'gyuraro nas mchin/ brjes de ji ltar sgrub pa 'gyi ba bka' stsal du gsel// de nas bcos
85b6(rgyud): bzhin bshags pa shAkya thub pas// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka'i stsal te/ na dpa' bo gang gis kha yi dwags rnams dang dra za'i drang srong rnams che ba ba
85b7(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba'i thabs yod kyi ma 'jigs shig kun dag 'a be 'du reng dang ldan pa rgya chen shugs ldan zhes bya ba'i bzungs ying ngo // de khyer pa tsam gyi yang ba sa ra d+ha ri kAng ba
85b8(rgyud): khrag khrig brag 'bum gyi bye ma seng ngab chem por 'gyur te yi drangs dang bA za'i drang srong rar la zas dang sem yul pa ga d+ha'i dwa re 'ang ma 'ang ma khyen par 'gyur// ngani sdom pa
86a1(rgyud): bram zar gyur pa na byang chub sada' seng la chen po 'jig chen dbang phyug dang / de bzhin bshags pa 'jig can padang phyug 'ong las ngas bzung ste/ ngas mi drags da dz+ra
86a2(rgyud): drang srong grangasu grangs pa mang ba dang / chos mang ba dab ngas zas dang / sker gyis tshim pa ngas te de dang zang li drabs kyi 'jig can ches pa'i 'phos nas lha'i 'jing chen nga sbya / ma
86a3(rgyud): bo khod kyis zung la ngo lom gyis shig/ ma maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo te oM saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hAM/ na dpa' bo 'di yi dwangs kyi gtong ma la lan dngan bzlas brje byas pas// lag pa
86a4(rgyud): sde drung du sbyin par bya'o// sa gol yang brngub par bya'o// da ltar byas na bin ma zag tu phyogs bzhi'i lo dwags pad+d+hi klung gi bya sa khrag khrig brag 'bung phrag bam snang dag tshim par byas

86a8(rgyud): mi ma yin pa rgyug 'byung po dang / sha za dang / grul bum la sogs pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gdon dang / yi dwags rnams kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur// stengs dang brgyan
86b1(rgyud): 'grus dang yang ldan par 'gyuraro// gzugs dang ldan pa dang / gzi brjid dang / ldan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan par yang 'gyuraro// bram ze'i drang srong tshim par byed pa 'dod 'dres ni/ mchod yin

86b6(rgyud): teg gam/ 'dug pa 'am/ spros sam/ zas sam// skem gyi yo byad la/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la 'bul bar bya'o// de ltar shas/ 
86b7(rgyud): rigs kyi bu ba/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pa des/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la lci
86b8(rgyud): mchod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i mchogs/ mchod pa byas par 'gyuraro// bla mar byas/ rom gror byas par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyis dgongs shing lung
87a1(rgyud): bstan pa dang / lha thad kyis kun tu srung bar yang 'gyuraro// kun dga' bo song lo po lon yang gyis shig/ sen thad la yang dag par ston cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs
87a2(rgyud): kyang gyis shig tsas nga smra'o// yi dwags mo kha 'bar ma dbugs dbyung ba'i gtor ma'i cho ga rdzogaso// / oM dz+nyA nA ba lo ki te sa man+ta/ s+pha ra Na rashrI b+ha ba sa ma ya/ ma hA ma Ni/ du ru du
87a3(rgyud): hrid ya dza la naM hUM/ 'bab chu 'am mtsho'i 'gram du 'dug ste lag pa g.yas pa'i khor bar chu blugs la/ ye shes skeng mda'i snying po 'di lan bdun bzlas te/ chu khyer ba bdun 'bab chu
87a4(rgyud): gnor na/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa'i yi drag ji snyed yod pa de dag zad lha'i kha zas kyi ro dang btung ba'i ro mchog dang ldan pa 'thob cing / yi drags re ra
87a5(rgyud): yang kha zas dang / btung ba yul ma ga d+hir bre bdun bdun gyis tshim par byas par 'gyur zhing / chu de 'thungs pa tsam gyis de dag thad lo dwags kyi skye gnas las thar cing / 'de
87a6(rgyud): mtho ris kyi gnasu skye bar 'gyuraro// skyes 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ gzhan yang byol song gyi skye gnasu gtogs pa/ yi drags ma/ bya 'am/ chu la gnas pa la sogs
87a7(rgyud): pa gang gis chu de 'thungs pa de dag bad/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thang byang zhing bde 'gro'i lam du 'gro bar 'gyuraro// ye shes skar ma'i snying po'o// // rgya gar ska du/ pradz+nyA bar+d+ha ni na maH
87a8(rgyud): ra Ni/ bod skad/ shes rab bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ thad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcos byang chub seda'i' blo ldan zhes bya ba ri rab kyi
87b1(rgyud): nges la bzhugs te/ ri rab la gnas pa'i lha'i bu thad kyis bskor nas/ mdun du byas te chos ston to// de nas byang chub seder se 'a chen po gzho nu'i gzugs can gyis thal mo sbyar te/ 
87b2(rgyud): chub senga' blo ldan la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das sen shes rab rtul ba/ blo dang mi ldan pa/ yid mi gzhungs pa rnams kyi slad shes rab bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs pa shadugs
87b3(rgyud): be shad pa/ hUM bicu pi tsu badz+nyA badz+ra na/ dz+wa la dz+wa la me d+ha bar+d+ha ni/ d+hi r-i d+hi ri/ bud+d+hi bar+d+ha ni swA hA/ gang zhig gzungs 'di klog pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / chu
87b4(rgyud): du yang yi ge 'bre tsog tsam thob na yang / tshe 'di nyid la shes rab chen por 'gyur// gang gis zla ba drug gi bar du/ nyin re zhing rtsabs khyer gang la rig pa 'di lan bdun btab te/ nyi ma shar ci
87b5(rgyud): tshe 'thungs na tshig su gcad pa stong 'dzin par 'a gyu ro// lan gcig 'thungs na/ lnga brgya 'dzin te/ nyin cig ban na du shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur ro// nyin ra bzhin du brjod pa
87b6(rgyud): tsam gyis ngan pa dang / yid gzhungs par 'gyuraro// shes rab bskyed pa'i gzungs rjegas+ho// // dkon mchogasuM la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang
87b7(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phag 'tsha'o// tad+ya thA/ ma ti ba hu l+ye/ ta thA ga tA dz+nyA na/ dar sha ne badz+ra ba ta/ gaM b+hI re/ bo d+hi maN+Da nu sa ro Ni/ a bid+d+ha/ te bon d+ha/ ka ri
87b8(rgyud): d+ha ma ni/ dzA la dz+wa la/ pradz+nyA dI pe/ me d+ha pa din sarba a d+hiSh+Ti te/ su ru su ru/ d+hA ru d+ha ru/ me d+ha a na yaM swAhA/ cho ga no na de re zhing bzlas brjod byis na/ lo bas skyen par 'gyuro// sman baM/ 
88a1(rgyud): hi snyim par bcug ste dud pa byung gi bar du bzlas pa byas te/ zesar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro// thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs rdzog s+ho// // sangs rgyas dang byang chub
88a2(rgyud): se der thad la phyag 'tsha'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' singa' chen po rgyal ba'i bla mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i bla ma'i gzungs
88a3(rgyud): sngags kyi gzhi 'di gang gis gzungs pas chos thams cad gzung ba dang bcas par 'gyuraro// mi khom pa brgyad las 'das par 'gyuraro// tshe rabs dza du yang gnod skyon de la srung ba
88a4(rgyud): dang skyabs pa dang / sbar bar byed la de la nad zad kyi 'jigs pa mdo// s+yAd ya the dan/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ dza yot+pa ra/ bo d+ha ni bo d+ha ni/ saM bo d+hi/ pa hA saM bo d+hi/ a d+hi bad bo d+ha ni/ ha la ha la
88a5(rgyud): ha laHhi li hi li hi li/ hu lu hu lu hu lu/ sarba bud+d+ha/ \u0f7frma a ba bo d+hi ni/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta s+phu TaM ni/ sarba pA pa ni/ bud+d+ha/ ad+hi Sh+TA ne na swA hA/ 'phags pargyal ba'i bla ma'i gzu
88a6(rgyud): rdzogas+ho// // rgya gar skad/ ma hA sa mA dza sU t+yan nA ma ma hA s+yA traM/ bod skadadu/ mdo chen po 'dus pa chen po'i mdo zhes bya ba dkon mchog gsupa la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bang/ 
88a7(rgyud): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams kyi ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal na/ dge slong lnga brgya thad kyang / dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa bye ba
88a8(rgyud): byas pa// khur bor ba/ bad gi dor rjesu thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongasu zad pa yang dag pa'i shes pas/ sems shin tu rnam par grol pa/ sha stag dang thabs gci gyu bsu/ 
88b1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun la/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam ston par mdzad/ de'i tshe na phyog bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang na dang
88b2(rgyud): che bar grags pa'i lha dag lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bye// de nas tshangs ris kyi lha tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa bzhi zhig 'di snyam
88b3(rgyud): du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni shAkya rnams kyi ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal no// dge slong lnga brgya thams cad kyang / dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zang ba/ bya ba byas pa
88b4(rgyud): ba byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rje su thob pa srid par kun+du sbyor ba/ yongasu zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas/ sems shin+du rnar grol ba sha stag dang thabs gcig bzhug
88b5(rgyud): de nas bac+doMs dge slong gi dge 'dun la/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam ston par mdzad de// ngor chen phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ 
88b6(rgyud): bar grags pa dang / dbang che bar grags pa'i lha dag lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen pa kun byed kyi/ bdag kyang song la/ bcom ldan 'das la
88b7(rgyud): re nas tshigasu bcad bcad pas mngon par bstod par bya gor ma chag sa mo// de nas tshangs ras kyi lha bzhi po dag 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa bskum pa
88b8(rgyud): pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bsgrub pa tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur cing / bac+doMs kyi spyan sngar lcags te phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ tshangs ris kyi/ 
89a1(rgyud): // lha gcig gis tshig su bcad de gsol pa// 'dus pa chen la gzhol ba yi// lha tshogs kun nas ljags gyur pas// gzhan gyis mi thub dge 'dun la/ blta ba'i slad bdag
89a2(rgyud): cag mchis// tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis pas tshig su bcad gsil ba/ drang por gyur pa'i sems kyis ni/ 'od na dge sbyong rab brtson pa/ kha lo pa ltar mig blangs shing // dbang po rnams ne la
89a3(rgyud): sdom bgyid// tshangs ris kyi lha gsuM pas tshig su bcad gsol ba// dbang pur 'od pa 'obs 'dra ba'i// phur bu rab bcom dkrir mi tshugs/ de dag sred bral dag spyod cing / 'dran pas glang po
89a4(rgyud): bzhon ltar brtul// tshangs ris kyi lha bzhi pas tshigasu bcad gsol pa// gang dag sangs rgyas skabs mchi ba// de dag ngan 'gor mi mche zhing // mi lus spangs par gyur nas kyang // lha yi lus
89a5(rgyud): ni thob par 'gyur// tshangs ris kyi lha bzhi po dag gis de skad ces gsol nas de nyid la bag bcu ma ste 'khod // de nas ba chos kyis lha'i 'khor zad la rnar gzir nas/ dag
89a6(rgyud): slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag kye ma lha rnams kyi 'dus pa 'di ni che ba yino// dge slong dag kye ma lha rnams kyi 'dus po 'di ni shin tu che ba yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
89a7(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang dag 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ da ltar nga'i lha rnams
89a8(rgyud): 'dus pa chen po 'di kho na lta bu dag 'dus par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba
89b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang 'di lta ste/ dper ka/ da ltar nga'i lha rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po 'di kho na lta bu dag 'du bar 'gyuraro// dge slong dag lha rnams kyi ming bdag / 
89b2(rgyud): brjod par byas// lha rnams kyi ming dag zung shig/ gang dag sa la gnas pa dang / gang dag ri khrod na gnas pa rnams/ seng+ge bzhin du tha dad la/ sems bsdus mnyam par gzhag byas shing ku
89b3(rgyud): 'dus par gyur pa ni// spu dag zing zhes byed pa yin// gang dag sa la gnas pa dang / gang dag ri khrod gnas pa rnams// seng ge bzhin du tha dad la// sems bsdus mnyam par gzhag byas
89b4(rgyud): shing kunas 'dus gyur spu zing zhes// byed pa bdag gis brjod par bya// yid byang dag cing rab dang la// rnyog med 'chi dag spangs pa rnams// tshangs pa'i 'dzag rten
89b5(rgyud): mthar thug pa'i// lce dang mi yi bar na 'khod// slob pa lnga 'argya phrag gnyis dang // gzhan yang brgya dang bcu dag dang / stong phrag du ma rnam dag gi/ lha rnams 'dus par gyur pa
89b6(rgyud): mtha' nas mtha' ma mi mthong zhing / phyogs rnams thad khyab gyur pa// sangs rgyas kyis ni de mkhyen nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas rnam gzigs te// de nas ston pas bstan dka' ba'i// 
89b7(rgyud): nyan thos rnams la dge slong dag/ lha tshogs mngon par lcags gyur gyis// nges par rtog shes bka' stsal pa// tshig su bcad pas mthar chags kyis// de dag rnam kyi ming brjod kyis/ 
89b8(rgyud): rtse gcig gyur pa'i yid kyis ni// nga yis bshad pa mnyan par gyis// ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal gyis// gnod sbyin stong phrag 'dun po dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snga
90a1(rgyud): bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan/ 
90a2(rgyud): dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// gsar cad stong phrag drag po kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dang / ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal
90a3(rgyud): ni snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phral ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge
90a4(rgyud): slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// shar phyogs rnam rgyal tshal gyi ni// ri dwags stong phrag gsum po dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags chal
90a5(rgyud): ni snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu bral ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing gra/ 
90a6(rgyud): ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// de ltar stong phrag bcu drug kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag / ser skya'i gnas tshan
90a7(rgyud): ni ra snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dres par lhags// rdzu 'phral ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rdzas
90a8(rgyud): dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// gnod sbyin chu srin rgyal po'i kha ba// yangs pa la no rtag gnas shing // brgya stong brag ni mang po/ 
90b1(rgyud): gnod sbyin bsnyen bkur byed pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams
90b2(rgyud): dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// kun tu bshes gnyen lnga brgya dang // rdzu 'phrul chen po kun gyi lha// gang dag de gnyis 'khor rnam
90b3(rgyud): dang de gnyis kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tsha
90b4(rgyud): du mngon par zhugs// shar phyogs mngon par skyebyed pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// dri za'i bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni yul 'khor bsrung zhes bya
90b5(rgyud): de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ klu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog lnga
90b6(rgyud): zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par bzhugs// de la buM ni mang yod// brgyad bcu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag mang
90b7(rgyud): 'thun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bya stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par// kun tu gzhan gyis mo thubs pa// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dzus
90b8(rgyud): par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing gags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / 'dus pa'o tshal du mngon par zhugs// lho phyogs
91a1(rgyud): // mngon par skyong byed pa/ rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// glal bum bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bya// de ni nya du lhan cig tu// glu dang gang gyis rtag tu rtsa/ 
91a2(rgyud): ngag de yi 'khor rnams dang // da yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs// rdzu 'phral ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la pag 'tshal zhing // 'das pa'i tshal
91a3(rgyud): du mngon par zhugs/ de la bu ni mang yod// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcog/ de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bya stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par// kun tu gzhan
91a4(rgyud): gyis mi thub pa// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong na
91a5(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// nub phyogs mngon par skyong byed pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// klu yi bdag po rgyal po ste// mang ni mog mi bza
91a6(rgyud): zhes bya// da ni nya du lhab cig tu// klu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de yang 'dus pa'i na dang 'ongs// rdzu 'phral ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags
91a7(rgyud): ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// de la bu ni mang yod do// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming 'thun gags pa ni// dbang
91a8(rgyud): po zhes bya stobs po che// lha dang lhan min g.yul 'gyed par// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub pa// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'o/ 
91b1(rgyud): dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshul du mngon par zhugs// byang phyogs mngon par skyong byed pa// rgyal chen grags dang
91b2(rgyud): ldan pa ni// gnod sbyin bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni lus ngan po zhes bya// da ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu dang gang gyis rtag tu rtsi// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs
91b3(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshul du mngon par zhugs// de la bu ni mang yod// brgyad cu dang ni
91b4(rgyud): bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni/ dbang po zhes bya stobs po che// lce dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par// kun tu gzhan gyos mi thub pa// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / de dag
91b5(rgyud): ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnam la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs
91b6(rgyud): shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung // lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po// nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang // byang phyogs na ni lus ngan pa// rgyal po chen po de bzhi dag/ 'jig rten sbyang
91b7(rgyud): grags dang ldan// rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che// phyogs bzhi dag ni skyeng bar byed// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'o dang ldan/ 
91b8(rgyud): kha dog ldan zhing gags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// de dag ni khol po rnams// mchod rten mngal gnas bcas pa// sku byed
92a1(rgyud): g.yon can sgyu ma can/ sgyu ma shes dang rnam shes dang / ngan spong khri gnyer lhan cig tu/ de tshe rdzu 'phrul ston cing lhags// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / de dag kyang ni 'dus par
92a2(rgyud): ljags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin chen po dang / gnod
92a3(rgyud): sbyin gyi sde dpon dang / dmigs dpon 'di dag kyang der kunas lhags te/ 'di lta ste/ dbang po zla ba chu lha dang // ba ra dwa dza skye dgu'i bdag/ dbang ldan tsan 'dod gcod po/ mgrin ngan dang ni mgul nges dang / 
92a4(rgyud): stobs ldan nor bu spyod dang // sgra rab dang ni nye lnga dang / ri mnyam gsar can gang po dang // sang ldang ba dang g.yon can dang // gnod sbyin skyong ba 'brog gnas dang // rgyal ba khyu mchog mo rgyal po// dri za sna
92a5(rgyud): snga dang ni// lcags mdung ring dang ma ldan dang // tshig lnga ser po yid dga' dang // gnod sprin ring po'i 'khor dang bces// 'bras bu gsum dang mgul gsum pa// 'gro nas ji
92a6(rgyud): yod pa yin// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'ong dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa
92a7(rgyud): tshal du mngon par zhugs// lhan cig 'byung ba'i kA dang ni// 'jog pa dang ni yangs pa'ang 'ongs// la ba dang ni mgyogs mchog dag/ srung byed 'gro dang lhan cig lhags// klu bdag bran bzang bu dang ni// 
92a8(rgyud): yul 'khor srung dang glang po che// 'jigs byed tshe dngas srung bu// rdzu 'bru ldan pa'i klu yang 'ongs// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ rdzu 'bru ldan zhing 'dang ldan// 
92b1(rgyud): ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// gang zhig klu rgyal zil mnan len// stobs ldan mig rno 'dab chags pa/ de ring ma
92b2(rgyud): bzangs khra bo yang // mkha las tshal du mngon par 'ongs// de tshe klu rgyal mi 'jigs byin// ston pas mdab bzang bdi mdzad cing // gsung 'jal brjod pa de nyid la// sangs rgyas skyabasu nye bar
92b3(rgyud): song gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de yang 'dus pa'i nang du'o// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa 'tshal
92b4(rgyud): du mngon par zhugs// lag na rdo rje pam byas shing / rgya mtsho sten pa'i lha min rnams// thad nor lhas skrag gyur cing mtshe la skyabasu 'du shes pa// thag bzangs ris dang rab bkra dang / 
92b5(rgyud): rab sim byed dang btang bzung dang // stobs ldan bu ni brgya po kun// rnam snang byed bu'i bu rnam dang // stobs ldan sde dang sgra gcan bzong // dpa' chen khyod kyi dus lags shes// dge slong 'dus
92b6(rgyud): pa'i nags tshal du// go cha bgos te lhags pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'das par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnas// dge
92b7(rgyud): slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// chu lha mo dang bu mo dang / zla ba mo yang phyi bzhin 'das// mdza' bshes ma yang chu lha can/ lha mo grags ldan nyid kyang
92b8(rgyud): rengs sa dang chu dang rlung gi dang // me yi lha mo'ang 'ongs gyur ste// bcu tshan tshigs bcu de dag kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dang / ser skye'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang ba rlabs te 'khod
93a1(rgyud): pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la
93a2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// khyab 'jug lha dang gzhon can lha// mtshe ma gnyis kyang lhags par gyur// zla la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis// zla ba
93a3(rgyud): nyid ni mdun du 'dar// nyi mar gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis// nyi ma nyid du mdun bdar cing // char pa 'bebs par byed pa dang// rgyu skar rnams kyi mdung bdar lhags// thad bzang po rdo can/ 
93a4(rgyud): byin khyar 'jig 'ongs gyur te// bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dang // ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yaM
93a5(rgyud): 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni'aM dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog/ ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal
93a6(rgyud): zhing 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// lha mo tshogs can ma dang ni// me lha'i rtsa 'dra mchi ltas can// zhi ba me dang dka' bzlog ma// me tog gos can 'ongs gyur cing // rgyab mo
93a7(rgyud): dang mtshan tshangs bzang // mchi med rnam pa du ma dang // gang zhig phyogasu char 'bebs pa// 'dod lha'i dbyangs can ma yang 'ongs// bcu chen tshegs bcu de dag kun// kha dog sna
93a8(rgyud): ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phra ldan zhing 'od dang ldan
93b1(rgyud): khadog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// sngo bsang sngo bsangs chen me dang // mi 'dra mi 'dra dam pa dang / 
93b2(rgyud): rtsed mos myos dang de bzhin du// yid rab 'khrug mnga' 'ongs gyur cing // phag mi phag mo chen mo dang // slong ma nges pa lhan cig lhags// bcu tshan chags bcu de dag kun// kha dog
93b3(rgyud): sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang
93b4(rgyud): ldan kha dog ldan zhing gags ldan rnam dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mdo bar zhugs// dkar mo rgyags byed snying rje dang // go sngon mo yang
93b5(rgyud): gyur cing / skra dkar mo la sogs pa dang / gos ser mo yang 'ongs par gyur// 'phrog me rtag tu myos pa dang spel ma rnam pa du ma dang // dag pa dang ni 'ang can ma// ma mo gags
93b6(rgyud): ldan rnams kyang lhags// bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dang // ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi la
93b7(rgyud): rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phra ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing gags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon
93b8(rgyud): bar zhugs// bde byed dga' ldan 'thab bral dang // nag po btab pa du ma dang // lum bi ni dang lume bi mchog/ skar ma zhes bya leg smon dang // 'phrul dga' rnams dang de bzhin du// dang
94a1(rgyud): bsgyur rnams kyang lpags par gyur// bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun/ kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang ba rlabs te 'khod pa dang / 
94a2(rgyud): gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'das par lhags// rdzu 'phral ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i
94a3(rgyud): / tshal du mngon par zhugs// lha tshogs drug cu de dge kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// sdang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag da yi 'khor rnams dang
94a4(rgyud): de dag kyang ni 'das par lhags/ rdzu 'phral ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing gags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'das pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// tshangs
94a5(rgyud): pa'i 'jig rten stong dag gi/ tshangs pa chen po na bya be// kun bged gzhonu skar rgyal ste// so sor dbang sgyur dbang phyag bcu// rdzu 'bru ldan pa de dag dang // lhan cig 'grogs
94a6(rgyud): dang lhags pa// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams deng // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan pa// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag
94a7(rgyud): zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// dbang sgyur byed pa'i 'phrog ma mo// kha dog gzugs mchog ldan pa yang // bu rnams kyis ni yings bskor zhing // de dag rnams kyi phyi bzhin
94a8(rgyud): 'ongs gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de yang 'i dus pa'i tshal du 'ongs// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal ni
94b1(rgyud): 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// dbang por bcas dang dbang ldan bcas// skye dgu'i bdag dang bcas pa yi// lha rnams de dag der lhags shing // dge slong rnams kyang der lhag so// nag
94b2(rgyud): pos spras pa'i tshogs la ltos// 'dod chags kyis ni 'di bzung la// bcing bgyis dang khyer la legs// 'di dag kun nas yongs sang la// 'di dag gson por ma btang zhes// de na nag po
94b3(rgyud): sde bo che// sde rnams la ni bskul byed cing // khros shing rab dbang med gyur nas// rang yang mngon par zhugs gyur te// lag pa sa la brdabs nas ni// shin tu 'jigs pa'i sgra byung ste// de nas
94b4(rgyud): lha'i spyon phreng dang // glog dang bcas pa'i char yang pab// sangs rgyas kyis ni de mkhyen nas// de bzhin gshegs pas rnam gzigs te// ngan ston pas bstan dga' ba'i// 
94b5(rgyud): nyan thos rnams la dge slong dag/ bdud sde mngon par lcags gyur gyis// nges par rtogs nas bka' stsal pa// rtson par byed pa de dag gis// sangs rgyas gsungs pa thos
94b6(rgyud): nas ni// de dag spu yang mi g.yo bas// de dag chags bral yin par rtogs// rgyal sras nyan thos de dag ni// slob ma rnams dang lhan cig dga'// de dag g.yul nas rnam rgyal zhing // 'jigs
94b7(rgyud): bral grags dang ldan pa yin// bar gyis sdom ni// mdun stong gser can ri mnyam dang // de bzhin gnod sbyin chu srid dang // kun gyi bshes dang rgyal po rnams// de bzhin khol po gnod sbyin dang
94b8(rgyud): klu dang mda' bzang lha mon dang // ma lha mo dang khyab 'jug dang // tshogs can ma dang sngo bsangs dang // dkar mo 'di byed dbang phyug dang // kun 'gyed gzhon dang 'phrog ma dang / dbang bcas bdu
95a1(rgyud): dang dge slong // de nas gsang ba'i lha'i bu shin tu dbang sa par grags pa rnams mdo sde bstan pas yi rangs par gyur nas// de'i cha tshigs 'di dag gis 'dus pa chen po'i bde ba
95a2(rgyud): bac+doMs bdag cag gis kyang tshig 'di dag gis mdo 'di yang dag par bstan par bgyi zhing // yang dag par brjod par bgyi lags// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lag so// tad+ya thA/ te dza
95a3(rgyud): dza ba ti/ tsi tatr-i tsing tra ba ti/ ta le ta la ba ti/ kha me kha ma ba ti/ k+She me k+She ma ba taM/ b+ha de b+had dA ba ti/ ya she ya sha ba ti/ dU twe dA ta ba ti/ tsa pa le tsa ba la ba to// kha tse kha tsa bA ti ti// bac+doMs 'di dag na gnas
95a4(rgyud): gtsang ma pa rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig mdo sde 'di dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag rmongs pa ma mchis par 'dzin par 'gyid na// den
95a5(rgyud): ji srid mtsho'i bar du 'byung po thad las srung bar 'gyid par 'gyur lags// 'byung po tha~Md kyang dga' bar 'gyur/ de la bro nad zad kyi tshugs par 'gyur lag so// gong du klog
95a6(rgyud): pa der dge bar 'gyur zhing // de la dgung lo bdun du sra nga bar bgyid par yang 'gyur lag so// ji tsam 'tshal bar 'gyur pa da tsam gyis dgung char 'bab par yang 'gyur// chad par yang
95a7(rgyud): 'gyur// dgung ser 'bebs par yang 'gyur/ ched por yang 'gyur lag so// blo nad zad la byab par bgyis ma// chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te stsal na/ des de'i blo nad thang rab tu zhi bar 'gyu
95a8(rgyud): de nas bac+doMs la tshang bas gsol pa/ bcis gnas gtsang ma pa dag ma gtogs pa// gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i rigs gong ma rnams kyi rig sngags 'di lags la// gsang sngags kyi
95b1(rgyud): zhib mo yang 'di dag lags te// 'di ni 'dir mdo sde yongasu 'dzin par bgyi pa lagase/ tad+ya thA/ b+ha le b+ha la ma le/ dung du le/ hi / phub bi se/ kA tsak+Shi ku tsi sI/ mI mA deShe re tho ra d+hi/ ram 'iza'o
95b2(rgyud): be taswa ke/ ta re ke gu ru ga ro Ta/ gug gu mi ti// ta re rak+Sha/ sU tA ma nu pA la ya thA/ 'di ni bdag cag rig sngags kyi tshig zhib mo lags te/ gang la la zhig mad ste 'di dang / gsang sbran gyi tshig
95b3(rgyud): 'di dag dum bur pa gyur par 'dzin tam/ klog par bgyid de// de la mi dang mi ma lags pa dag mchi bar mi 'gyur zhing / gdugs pa yang mi mchi sbrul yang mi mchi// dug yang mi mchil/ dong
95b4(rgyud): lus la gnon pa dag gis mi tshugs par 'gyuralag so// 'byung po thad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags// ji srid 'tshe'i bar du 'byung po thad las srung bar bgyis par yang
95b5(rgyud): 'gyur lags// gang klog par bgyid pa dang / gang nyan par 'gyid pa de la dgung lo bdun du srung bar bgyis par 'gyur la/ gso// cha ba la bzlas brjod 'gyid te gtor tam/ 'tshal du
95b6(rgyud): sprul na de'i blo nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dod pa'i bdag po tha~Md kyis gsol pa/ bcos 'di ni bdag cag gi yul yang lag te/ mdo sde 'di
95b7(rgyud): yongasu gzung ba'i rig sngags ni 'di lag so// tad+ya thA/ lin de la pi lo po ba pi pang ke ka me/ kA tse kA tse kI/ ka tsa bing ga le/ du me du ma du me/ ta Ta traTe/ tad tra Ta/ tra TA k+Shi/ ko lA ko li/ ke ki / 
95b8(rgyud): li ke/ sA d+ha sU tra ma nu pA la ya thA/ ud gri NA tha tsa ti/ bcos gang zhig gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dang / mdo sde legs par gsungs pa 'di dem bur ma gyur pa dang / ma nyams pa/ 
96a1(rgyud): bzung ste/ srung bar bgyid na/ de ni thad las srung ba 'gyid par 'gyur lag so// 'byung po thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lag so// ji tsam 'tshal ba de tsam gyi dgung char yang
96a2(rgyud): 'bab par 'gyur// 'chad par yang 'gyur/ dgung ser 'bab par yang 'gyur/ 'chang par yang 'gyur lag so// 'byung po dang gdon rnams las yongasu thar par yang 'gyur lag so// dug
96a3(rgyud): 'byin par 'gyur lag so// cha ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/ gtor tam 'tshal du stsal na/ des bro nad zad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya
96a4(rgyud): byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rigs sngags 'di yang de bzhin du/ mdo sde 'di yongasu 'dzin par bgyid cing // 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha gong ma rnams kyis ni rje su yi rang
96a5(rgyud): bor bgyid la// 'og ma rnams kyis kyang legs pa rje su yi rang bar 'gyis pa lag so// tad+ya thA/ bI ra bI ra ba ti/ to Ta to Ta ba ti/ b+had de b+had da ba ti/ ge ne go na ba ti/ me g+he ma
96a6(rgyud): g+ha ba ti/ dz+wa la ne dz+wa la na ba ti/ b+hU te b+hU ta ba ti/ kho ra de kho ra da ba ti/ i da pu tra ma nu gr-ih+Na thA/ a nu pA la ya the tse ti/ bac+doMs gang zhig mdo ste 'di dang gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag du
96a7(rgyud): bur ma gyur par 'dzin par bgyid na/ de ni ji srid 'tsho'i bir du 'byung po thaMd las srung bar bgyis par 'gyur lags// de la mi dang mi ma lags pa 'ga' yang 'tshe bar mi 'gyur lags
96a8(rgyud): gang du klog pa deng ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srung ba bgyis par 'gyur lag so// sen thad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lag so// de la zil gyis gnon pa 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so/ 
96b1(rgyud): de'i lus la bro nad rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur lag so// sems can thamams cad la phan 'dogs par yang 'gyur lag so// gang du klog par 'gyur ba der dkrung lo 'dudan du srung
96b2(rgyud): bgyis par yang 'gyur lag so// 'byung po dang gdon rnams la thar par yang 'gyur lag so// dug 'joms par yang 'gyur lag so// bro nadang thongs la bar yang 'gyur lag so// skud pa'i chab
96b3(rgyud): la bzlas brjod bgyis te bcings sam gtor na// bro nad thad dang bral bar yang 'gyur lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis gsol pa// bac+doMs bdag cag rgyal po chen
96b4(rgyud): bo'i rag sngags 'di yang mdo sde 'di yongasu 'a na cing grub par bgyi ba lag so// rnam thos kyi bus gsol pa/ tad+ya thA/ ku re ku ra tI/ mo ra mo ra NI/ ka tse ka tsa tI/ kri mi
96b5(rgyud): kri mi ni/ yul 'khor srung gis gsol pa/ bu re/ kho ra/ bur tI/ hor ho ra nI/ pra ho ra/ ho ra nA~M/ ho ra nI/ 'phags skyes po sa gsol pa/ ka shaM kaM sha pa ti/ ke shar+t+ti/ ma ke sha Te ti/ tho
96b6(rgyud): ni/ me ri ti/ mig mi bzang gis gsol ba/ tsash+ma tsakrA NI/ tsak+ka bA ki/ ri b+hi ti ro/ tirma na/ shi me shi me/ sha mA na te/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig rgyal po chen po bzhis brjod pa'i rigs snga
96b7(rgyud): kyi cho ga zhib mo 'di bzhi dang / mdo sde 'di dum bur ma gyur pa dang / ma bkol bar legs par bzung ste/ srung bar bgyid na/ de ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srung ba bgyid par 'gyur lag so// del
96b8(rgyud): 'byung po thang dang / bro nang zad kyang slar mi ldog par 'gyur lag so// gdug pas zin pa dang / dug thad las thar par 'gyur lag so// skud pa 'am che ba la bzlas brjod bgyis te/ bcings sam pa/ 
97a1(rgyud): // cing 'tshal du stsal na/ cho ga des de la 'grub par 'gyur lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha ma yin dang rlung lhas gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi rig snga
97a2(rgyud): 'di yang / mdo sde 'di yongasu 'dzin par bgying ba lags// tad+ya thA/ ga le/ ga ga le/ ga ga le/ ga NAM/ khi ni khaM ni/ g+ha she g+huSh+Tu/ g+hu g+hASh+Ta/ kha ne/ kha kha ne/ kha na kha ni/ li pa lu pa/ lu ba
97a3(rgyud): lu be de/ bac+doMs gsang sngags 'di dag dang / mdo sde 'di dum bur ma gyur tsang / ma bkol bar bzung na/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srung bar 'gyur lag so// de'i bro nad thad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur
97a4(rgyud): lag so// lus la dug gis mi tshugs par yang 'gyur la gso// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas gtsang ma'i ris tu lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun
97a5(rgyud): pa bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'di'i dgongs pa yongasu bzung ba 'i slad phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas lhags pa kyir ga sngags dag smras pa lags na/ bcos nyan zhes
97a6(rgyud): kyi tshogs dang bcas pas kyang yang dag par rje su yi rang bar mdzad cing / kun tu gzung ba dang / srung ba dang / sgrub pa dag legs par bshad du gsol// de ltar na rigs kyi bu de dag sprin
97a7(rgyud): bar bgyi ba'i chos kyi mdo sde 'di 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur lagaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed kyis gsang sngags kun tu gzung ba 'di ni grub pa yin// 
97a8(rgyud): nga nyan thos kyi tshegs dang bcas pas kyang mdo sde 'di grub pa dang / srung ba dang / sgrub pa dag bshad par bya ste// nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o// gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis
97b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin lags te/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos tshogs dang bcas pas mdo sde chen po 'di grub par bgyi ba'i slang du srung ba dang / sgrub pa dag 'a shad gsol// de nas bcos
97b2(rgyud): kyis mdo sde 'di grub par bya ba'i phyir srung ba dang / sgrub pa dag bka' stsal pa/ de la rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyi grub pa ni 'di yin// tA la ta la/ ta ne ta la/ ta to ta le/ mai te/ lan gcig phyir
97b3(rgyud): 'ong ba'i grub pa ni 'di yin// sa 'as lo to/ phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi grub pa ni 'di yin// la TA la Te/ lo la ti/ dgra bcom pa rnams kyi grub pa ni 'di yin// d+hU pu d+hu pu/ d+hA ru d+hu ru/ katso
97b4(rgyud): ka tsi/ ka tsa bi ka tse te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gab pa ni 'di yin// d+hu me d+hu me/ d+ha sa d+ha se/ d+ha so d+ha so d+ha re/ d+ha d+ha re/ d+ha ro d+hi d+hA ti/ de la srang ba ni 'di yin// tan ti tsa rak+Shi/ pi ga lak+Sha rak+Sha
97b5(rgyud): mtshams bcad pa na 'di yin// d+hU bab+h+yo bad+d+ha/ si ri mir/ bar+d+ha/ gu'i bad+d+ha/ g+hu g+hA She/ 'ang+ga/ b+hU'i g+hu la/ ya ma bar+d+haH/ sgrub pa ni 'di yin//  kha la d+ha ya tu tu les/ 
97b6(rgyud): d+ha ye ti/ zhagasum smyung ba byas pas/ tshis bco lnga'i nyin par gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dang / mdo sde 'dis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ kha shar phyogasu bltas
97b7(rgyud): la srung ba lan brgya po rjod par bya zhing / bzlas brjod lan brgya byas la mdun pa re ra la/ brgya rtsa brgyad byas na srung ba byas pa yin zhing / lan gsum spu zong zhes byed par yang 'gyur to// 
97b8(rgyud): sngon gyi las kyi rnar smin pa ni ma gtogs// zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu gnyis la/ bac+doMs la mchod pa byas la/ skud pa de lag tu blangs te/ bzlas shing mtshams bcad par byas te/ lan
98a1(rgyud): // brgya rtsa brgyad brjod cing / mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas te mtshams gcod par byed na/ lan bdun spu zing zhes byed par yang 'gyuraro// lho phyogs nas lce spyad mos lanag
98a2(rgyud): sgra phyung ste/ 'dug par gyur na// de nas mtshams bcad par shes par bya'o// des de bzhin du smyung ba byas te/ tshes bcoM lnga'i nyi ma la mchod pa byas te skud pa blangs te/ nyan thos kyi tshig rnams
98a3(rgyud): dngang bac+doMs kyi tshi ga zhib mos lan bdun bzlas te bzlas brjod lan brgyad brjod cing / rig sngags zad lan gcig bzlas brjod byas shing / bsgrub pa byas na/ char pa chen po dang / rlung tshan
98a4(rgyud): po yang 'byung ste/ mtshams kyi phyi rol du ldan zhing 'bar/ skad cig gis 'chad par yang 'gyur te/ lan bdun gyi bar du yang brjod par bya'o// de nas lha'i bu sprin ces bya ba dang / spyan
98a5(rgyud): bzang zhes bya ba gnyis 'ongs ste/ da'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing / grub pa sbyin pa dang / rje su yi nga bar 'gyuraro// de la grub pa ni 'di dag yin te/ sprin ni kA
98a6(rgyud): tsu ku tsa zhes bya'o// sprin bzang gi ni 'di yin te/ ka ra ka ra ka ra ra zhes bya'o// tshig 'di dag dang / skud pa lag tu blangs pas// mdo sde dang gsang sngags rnams bsams
98a7(rgyud): na gang bya bar 'dod pa de dag thad byed par 'gyur ro// bcos kyi mdo sde dang // rig sngags 'di dag thad kyis chu 'am/ skud pa la bzlas na gang byed par mi 'gyur ba de med/ las thaMd 'grub
98a8(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag dang / gzhan dag srung ba'i phyir mdo sde 'di bzung bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rang te/ 
98b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod// 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lcags gyur cing / sa dang bar snang dag la 'khod pa rnams// skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing / 
98b2(rgyud): nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig/ mdo chen po 'dus pa chen po'i mdo zhes bya ba rdzog s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi ta dang / pradz+nyA barba dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+ho ye shes
98b3(rgyud): snga la sogs pas bsgyur cing nus te/ gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya d+harmA sA gar nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad/ 'phags pa chos kyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas
98b4(rgyud): dang byang chub seda' thad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdagis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bA ra na se na drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nags na dge slong lnga brgya tham
98b5(rgyud): ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcos kyi dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong de dag gis bac+doMs la nyan pa dang / bcom ldan
98b6(rgyud): 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong dag ngas ni chos zab mo mthong bar dka' ba/ rtogs par dka' ba/ cha phra ba/ brtags pa/ mkhas shing shes pas rig par bya ba
98b7(rgyud): rtog so// ngas ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po bde ba dnga'ajig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che'i don dang / lha dang / mi rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir chos
98b8(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo bskor to// ngas thogs pa med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir nges pa kho nar bsgrub par bya'o// dge slong dag chos kyi rgya mtsho'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam gras
99a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dran pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ blo gros dang ldan pa/ rtogs pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ bcan pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ 
99a2(rgyud): rab kyi blo dang ldan pa/ gsung gi mchog dang ldan pa/ spobs pa mchog dang ldan pa/ mkhyen cing gzigs pa dag gis bstan cing bshad pa yod// gang dag de shes pa dang / gang dag de 'dzin par
99a3(rgyud): dag gis ni myur ba kho nar chos lnga thob par 'gyuraro// lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thos pa 'dzin pa'i dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur// brjed ngas pa med pa'i dran pa dang ldan zhing chos bzung ba rnams chung
99a4(rgyud): za bar ma'i gyur ba'i blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rnon po thob pa'i rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / yi ge dang don dang tshig la 'jug pa'i spongs pa thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa
99a5(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / sen rnams kyi rgyu'i lam mngon par shes nas sngon gyi gnas rje su dran pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba ste/ chos lnga po 'di dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa
99a6(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bzhago// da ltar nga yang 'jog// de nas bac+doMs kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo chos thad kyi sdom
99a7(rgyud): gyi gzhi bsdu ba khyod la bstan par bya ste/ de na khyod kyis ma thos pa'i chos rnams thos par 'gyur ro// thos pa'i chos rnams 'dzin par 'gyuraro// gzung ba'i chos rnams ni nyam su len par 'a
99a8(rgyud): nyam su blangs pa'i chos ni gzhan dag la khong du chud par byed// tshigi rab tu dbye ba lnga ni 'di lta ste/ 'du byed kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba dang / de bzhin du ma thos pa'i chos kyi tshi go rab tu dbye ba dang / 
99b1(rgyud): bla na med pa'i tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang / sa nas sa rtags pa'i yi ge'i tshig rab tu dbye ba dang / nges pa'i tshig dang brda sna tshogs kyi tshig gi rab tu dbye ba'o// de la 'di dag ni byin brtan pa
99b2(rgyud): byed pa'i tshig rig sngags dang ldan pa ste/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum dang / yi drags dang / sha za 'jam+bu'i gling du lhags pa zad kyis gang
99b3(rgyud): zag de la zas kyi rnam grangs rnams dang / sman rnams sbyin par 'gyuraro// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig chos las byung ba gzhan dag la mi gnod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa lba
99b4(rgyud): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / de za rnams kyis mnos pa/ bstan pa yongasu 'dzin pa ni 'di dag yin te/ kun dga' bo gas sngags kyi tshig 'di nyid cig/ khyod phyis 'gyod ta re/ swAng
99b5(rgyud): thaM dan/ karma ka ta ma nud tsi ra ti ru ta gran+d+ha ma/ thu ma na/ naM la ta/ a saM ku la s+thA bu mi mi a nusma ri/ i sha ga ma i sha sA/ kle na a nu ga te/ yA mu la gum b+he/ ba b+he ma gur ba ya ba/ 
99b6(rgyud): a s+ya bAkya s+ya bi liM ge/ be la ma thA/ shrI ba ba rI pany+tsa ka/ pra sa te/ a ba be le/ a gre ba la/ ni sha~M khu u tsa dzu me/ u dze dzu me/ kun dga' bo 'di dag ni gnod sbyin gyi dbab 'grub pa dang / 
99b7(rgyud): sbyir gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dge bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung mthong la bsnyen bkur yang byed byed/ rim go yang byed byed pa rnams 'ching ste/ kun dag
99b8(rgyud): bau khyod kyi gnod sbyin bab pa grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa rnams zung shig// kun dga' bo gang la la gsang sngags kyi tshig sbyin med pa'o tshig 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / 
100a1(rgyud): pa dang kun chub par byed pa de la ni rgyal po chen po bzhi sems bzhin du gnaso// kun dga' bo gang la la gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bzung bas ni ngan pa dang ldan par 'gyu/ 
100a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams dang bral bar mo 'gyuraro// kun dga' bo shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling na ni gnod sbyin srid pa snang byed ces bya ba gan so// kun dga' bo nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gleng na ni gnod sbyin cher
100a3(rgyud): spyod ces bya ba gnaso// kun dga' bo byang ni sgra ma snyan gyi gling na ni// gnod sbyin rnam gags zhes bya ba gnaso// kun dga' bo 'jam+bu gling na ni gnod sbyin grags thob ces bya ba gnas te/ kun dga' bo ga/ 
100a4(rgyud): sbyin de dag gis kyang rje su dran par 'gyuraro// kun dga' bo gnod sbyi na gzhan gzi brjid za ba gang yin pa de dag kyang dad pa thob par 'gyur// dad pa thob par gyur nas kyang dad pa mi phyed pa
100a5(rgyud): thob par bya ba'i phyir 'gro bar byedado// kun dga'i ba de la 'di dag nid bzhin gyi tshig drang srong gis bstan pa dag yin te/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis de bzhin gshu ba dang srong gi tshig gi mchog srog chags
100a6(rgyud): 'byung po thad la rnar mi 'tshe ba'i tshig rnams zung shig dang ngas bshad// kun dga' bo de la nga'i phyin 'brang ba'i gnod sbyin gang yin pa de dag gis kyang bar chad byed mo nuso// s+yAd ya tha dan/ dan d+ha ra ma hA
100a7(rgyud): ha ra/ ha ra ma ba ra na/ rud dA tra/ ku ma ti dwi tra/ in da man tu ke/ a baM taM/ sa hA rA/ sa d+ha ma ti/ i la la ba ma ti/ a ba ti/ ta ra pa ra/ yi biSh+Ta sa da biSh+Ta/ a ba tiSh+Tha/ pa ri brta/ i sha brda/ sa da barba/ 
100a8(rgyud): kA ma kra ma ti ran/ a si ba ma la bin ha thi/ tha sha su re d+hur d+hu ra/ ag+na mug+ma/ ug+na be to/ bi sa ra ga mi ta/ thad dang ldan pa'i gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / 
100b1(rgyud): grul bum dang / yi dwags dang / srul po dang / k+Sha dang / dri za dang / sha za gnas pa gang yang rung ba de dag gis khyim gyi nang na gnas pa dang / lam du zhugs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs
100b2(rgyud): ba'i tshig 'di dag thos nas dga' bar 'gyur// kun dga' bo khyod kyi gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag zung shig/ phyis 'gyod ta re/ de nas de'i tshe bac+doMs kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal
100b3(rgyud): gnod sbyin grub pa 'di dag ni// gling bzhi dag na gtso zhes bya// gsang sngags 'di dag su 'chang ba/ de yi ngan pa 'phel bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yi// gnod sbyin de dag lhags
100b4(rgyud): nas ni// chos rgyal rnams kyi bstan pa dag/ nyams par gyur pa de la ston// dpag tshad brgya phrag mang po yang // mthar gyis ni seng nas kyang / zab cing don dang ldan pa yi// tshig 'di dag ni mnyan pa
100b5(rgyud): bya 'di dang chos kun rtsa ba ste// de dag mkhas rnams nyan par gyis/ drag po dag gis thos nas yang // phyi nas mchog tu dga' ba ste/ gang la bde dang sdug bsngal med// de la de ni dga'
100b6(rgyud): 'gyur// sa 'di chags pa med pa ste// sangs rgyas sa ni bas mi khyab// chags pa med par bstan pa yi// bsam yas sa de thob gyur nas// nyi ma sprin las byung ba ltar// de ni sa stang de bzhin sna // 
100b7(rgyud): 'di la sku mched phung po rnams// bden dang byang chub yan lag dbang // dge ba'i chos ni zab mo rnams// sangs rgyas gsungs pa ci yang yod// de yi thos pa'i tshogs rnams gang // nams kyang chud za
100b8(rgyud): mi 'gyur te/ ma thos chos rnams de dag thos// nyi sa dang nyes min rnams la mkhas// rtogs par khong du chud pa'i mchog/ mig bzang rnams kyang dag par 'gyur// 'chang ba dang ni ston byed pa/ 
101a1(rgyud): / rtag tu sangs rgyas bsngags// sangs rgyas kyi ni chos rnams la// the tsom mi mnga' bden pa gang // bden des bdag la lung mnos pa// ci yod thang gnas gyur cig/ sangs rgyas
101a2(rgyud): rnams ni 'byung rnams la// byams pas gnas pa'i bden pa des// rang gi sems dang gzhan sems la// ston par rab tu gnas gyur cig/ gling bzhi'i gnas kyi gnod sbyin dag/ ma dad pa dang dad
101a3(rgyud): par bstan// gang la rtogs pa mi snang ga/ de la de kun don sngon 'gyur// gnod sbyin skar gdong gang yin dang / glang chen snang dang khyad par stobs// drag po dga' bad gsod byed dang // zla ba mgo med lus
101a4(rgyud): gsod pa// dpa' sde dang ni lags dpa' dang / srin po dang nis 'dzin pa// ljang ku kha dang sna bzang dang // ral gri'i spu can bong bu rnams// thang grub par byed par shog/ gsang sngags 'di dag su 'dzi
101a5(rgyud): la gnod sbyin srin po de dag ni// spro bar gyur nas 'dzud par byed// rtag tu don spongs pa dang // tshig rnams dang ni lung bstan dang // nges pa'i tshig dang chos kun dang // yi ge rnams
101a6(rgyud): la mkhas par 'gyur// lung mnos pa yang chud mi za// rtogs pa mtha' yas 'phel bar 'gyur// rtag tu don dang yi ge la// de ye shes pa 'phel bar 'gyur// sum cu rtsa gsum
101a7(rgyud): lha rnams dang // mi mdzad bdag po tshangs pa yid de yi legs bshad nyan pa rnams// de yi mod la 'dan par byed// s+yAd ya the dan/ hu ku na/ mu ku na/ ha ra na/ bi ha ra na/ i sha saM kA maM na/ oM su
101a8(rgyud): mu kha/ ta ka Na/ a pri ya/ mu s+thA me/ ko ba ha re/ u ru ba/ pra ba Na tan saM gra me ba ha dza ga ra/ pra shi ga re/ gu d+hA ba naM/ ud ta na/ bi ku Na/ i sha kun/ a tu la tu la/ a Ti ba Ti/ ba ri tsa mo sha/ ha ra/ 
101b1(rgyud): dza ga ta/ e ba saM pra mu kha a ga b+ha re/ Sha hu sa hu/ i ti ya/ thA hu/ tsa tur dI bi ka yan/ Tha hu ma hu/ ug+nA hu/ d+ha ra sa hu/ saM gra ha/ a bi na gra ha/ a bi na gra ha/ pradz+nyA bi d+hi ye/ tra hu sa hu/ ka ra ku ru/ 
101b2(rgyud): d+hu sa hu/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gsang sngags kyi ni tshig 'di dag/ gang gi lag dang lus la yod// da ni thos la rmongs pa med/ de ni shes rab med mi 'gyur// sker mda' ji bzhin nyi ma bzhin/ zla
101b3(rgyud): ba ji ltar snang ba bzhin// de ltar thos dang don gyis kyang // mya ngan 'das pa'i bar la reg/ de nas bcos kyis de'i cha gsang sngags 'di dag bka' stsal to// s+yAd ya the dan/ tsa ra d+he bi tsa d+ha/ a ma ma
101b4(rgyud): ku te/ a ti mi ti/ ba ra ha re/ g+hA Na b+he/ hi pa ra me mA hA pra ti ba hA ne/ dza ya dza ya/ ma nu ke/ pa la pa le/ ug drA ba ti skA ra swa ra/ a bi sa re/ gu gun de/ pra bi ba d+he/ sa me/ AdzAH
101b5(rgyud): dza ya nu ba la su/ kho ma su d+hi ni ku ma no// sa k+She/ tsA pa tsA pa/ tsu pe/ tsu lu tsu lu/ pu lu pu lu/ bya ba pra sa re/ ka ra ka b+hin d+ha/ bi dza bI dzi/ a pra ti san d+hi/ nA nA nu mai ti/ pra na nu ma ta/ a rid si dze/ 
101b6(rgyud): nu pa ni de/ a saM gra a ba ti/ rig sngags bsdus pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag lus la thogs te 'chang na// gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang
101b7(rgyud): grul bum dang / yi dwags dang / sha za gnas pa de dag thaMd dbang 'gyur zhing / dbang du ma gyur pa rnams kyang dbang du 'gyur // gdon thad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba bzhin du 'tsho ba'i
101b8(rgyud): mthar thugs bar nga 'chi bar mi 'gyur// de la cho ga ni 'di yin te/ dgon par 'dug la gzungs sngags 'di dag tha~Mng zhag bdun gyi bar du brjod// nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum dang / 
102a1(rgyud): par bya'o// de nas zhag bdun lon pa'i 'og tu bsam pa thad 'grub par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / thang dang lnga
102a2(rgyud): pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha mo yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcos kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod// 'phags pa chos kyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzos
102a3(rgyud): so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ran+da bo d+hi dang / pra dza barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes snga la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya big+h+nAn bi na
102a4(rgyud): ka ra tA d+ha ra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bgegs sel ba'i ga zungs// 'di skad bdag gis pa dus gcig ni/ bcom ldan 'a/ sa mnyan du yod pa'i mdze ta'i 'tshal migon ma
102a5(rgyud): zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ba na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo tshogs kyi bdag po su gang tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po 'dzin pa
102a6(rgyud): des cho ga thad dang / dgongs pa thad 'grub par 'gyuraro// gsang sngags zad 'grub par 'gyu ro// tad+ya thA/ na mo stu ste/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ da ra da ra Da ha Da ha/ gr-ih+NA/ b+ha dz+nyA b+ha dz+nyA/ na mo stu ste/ 
102a7(rgyud): ru ru tsa tsa ye swAny+dza/ a b+hu tA/ bin du/ khan man tsed d+ha bar sa ma gan+d+he to/ ha ha ya/ ma hA hA sting kA ta nan/ pra go ba ya mo/ ku ru ku ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ na ma na me swA hA/ nang par langasata
102a8(rgyud): sngags lan bdun bzlas laM/ chu khyer ba gang stang 'og phyogasu gtor cig dang 'gegs zad bcings par 'gyuraro// gsang sngags sgrib 'dod pas skud pa dkar po la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcis
102b1(rgyud): ber te/ lag pa la bcings na rig sngags 'grub par 'gyuraro// gegs zad bcings par 'gyuraro// gang na tshogs kyi bdag po snang ba der sngags 'di lan gcig bklags na/ yang bgegs
102b2(rgyud): rnams bar chad mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis da skad ces bka' stsal nas 'khor de dag thams cad dga' ste/ lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bcos
102b3(rgyud): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod// 'phags pa bgags sel ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzob sngo// / rgya gar skad du/ A TA nA DI ya ma su tran nA ma ma hA sU traM/ bod skad du/ 
102b4(rgyud): mdo chen po kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang / 'thun pa'i mdo zhes bya ba/ dkon mchog gsub la phyag 'tsha'o// 'di skad bdag gi thos pa dus gcig na/ bac+doMs mnyan mong
102b5(rgyud): nang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas spyiran gyi kun ga' rab na bzhug so// de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu/ kha dog 'phags pa g.yor 'khor gnod sbyin
102b6(rgyud): ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin brgya phrag du mo dang / g.yog/ 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa nam sres pa dang / 
102b7(rgyud): ga la bdeng seng ste phyin nas/ bac+doMs kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogaso gcig tu 'du'o// de'i tshe rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu'i kha dog gis mthus rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thang
102b8(rgyud): snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur te// rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas// de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ 
103a1(rgyud): // blo ldan khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa// lha rnams kyis ni dmatshal// dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa dang / da ltar byung dang mabyon pa/ thang la ni bdag phrag
103a2(rgyud): 'tshal// khyod la'ang bdag ni skyabs mchi// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dag bsnyen ma dag gnas mal dgon pa dag dang / nags mdab
103a3(rgyud): ngag dang / bas mtha' dag na gnas pa dag kyang mchis la/ de nas gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdugs pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa
103a4(rgyud): dag dang / mngon par ma dad pa dag kyang mchi te/ gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdugs pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag ba com ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa
103a5(rgyud): dag ni/ shin+d+ra nyung la// gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon mar ma dad pa de dag ni chos mang lags te
103a6(rgyud): btsun pa bac+doMs kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams 'di ltar bdag nyid srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas
103a7(rgyud): par bgyi ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdugs pa gnyug mar gnas pa mngon par ma dad pa dag mngon par dad par bgyi ba dang / mngon par dad pa rnams kyang slar zhing 'phel bar bgyi ba
103a8(rgyud): slad/ kun rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun ma'i mdo// rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid/ rgya cher 'dzin cing kun chub par bgyid na ce
103b1(rgyud): leg so zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la cang mi gsung bar gnang bar mdzad// de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus/ bac+doMs kyis cang mi gsung bas
103b2(rgyud): gnang bar rig nas/ bac+doMs kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgya ba ma yin pa dang / 'thun pa'i mdo rig sngags dang / srung ba dang
103b3(rgyud): sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher gsol to// skye bo gang dag gtong phod cing / phra ma ma mchis ser sna bral// gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchis pa// mi de rnams kyi rna
103b4(rgyud): ba legs// gang gi char la can nas ni// ngas na nyin mor brjod pa yi// nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can// nyi gdugs gang nas 'char 'gyur ba'i// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ rgyal chen ba
103b5(rgyud): dang ldan pa ni// dri za'i bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni yul 'kho ra srang zhes bgyi// de ni nya du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// dri za rnams kyi yongs bskor cing // dri za rnam
103b6(rgyud): kyis mdun gyis bltas// de la bu ni mang mchis te// brgyud cu dang ni bcu dang gzig// de dag ming 'thun lpags pa ni// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ 
103b7(rgyud): kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags// de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyi ma gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// 
103b8(rgyud): mi yis phyag 'gyis khyod la ni// rgyang rings gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/ bdag la dge bas gzigasu gsol// khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/ de skad yang dang yang du thos// de slang bdag ni
104a1(rgyud): 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshal cig/ go'u ta rgyal la phyag 'tshol shig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi// de lngar
104a2(rgyud): gyi phyogs de ni// bzang la lags shes skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags// gang na yi dwags zhes bgyi ba// rgyab kyi sha 'tshal phra ma can// srog ce
