104a3(rgyud): bgyid pa ma rungs pa// 'jungs shing mi snyan smra bgyid pa'i// phyogs da mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal tshan grags dang ldan pa ni// grul bum bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni 'phags skyes po
104a4(rgyud): zhes bgyi// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag turtsa grul bum rnams kyis yongs bskor cing // grul bum rnams kyi mdun gyis bltas// de la bu ni mang mchis
104a5(rgyud): brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gtsag/ de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs pa che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags// de dag rnams kyis
104a6(rgyud): rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shes la 'dad// skyes mchog la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyed la ni/ rgyang ring gnas shing phyag
104a7(rgyud): 'tshal lags// bdag la dge bas gzigasu gsol// khyod la mi man phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang dang yang du thos// de smad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig/ go// 
104a8(rgyud): tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshal mchi// de ltar lho yi phyogs de ni// bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngo
104b1(rgyud): bar skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen gags dang ldan pa lags// gang zhig nub pa kho na las// des na mtshan mor brjod pa yi// nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can// nyi gdags gang du nub 'gyur pa// de/ 
104b2(rgyud): mtshe chen zab mo ni// shin tu 'da' ba bka' ba ste// da ni chu sngon rgya mche zhes// skya bos rtogs pa mchis pa yi// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgya che ni grags dang ldan pa ni// klu yi
104b3(rgyud): bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni mig mi bzang zhes bgyi// do ni nye du lhan cig tu// klu dang gar gyi rtag tu rtse// klu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor cing // klu rnams kyis ni mdun gyis bltas// de la
104b4(rgyud): bu ni mang mchis te// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag mong mthun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ kun tu gzhan gyi mi thub lags/ 
104b5(rgyud): de dag rnams kyi rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud// skye ma cho ga khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis bya ba
104b6(rgyud): bgyis khyod la ni/ rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/ bdag la dge bas gzig stsol// khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang dang yang du thos// de skad bdag ni
104b7(rgyud): 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig/ go'u tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol shig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol ba chi/ de ltar nub kyi phyogs
104b8(rgyud): da ni/ bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid la// rgyal chem grags dang ldan pa lags// gang na byang gi sgra li snyan// dga' zhing ldan palta mdzes dang // gang
105a1(rgyud): mi rnams che lo no// brgya phrag bcu pa skye 'gyur zhing // de dag mi rmo mi 'debs la// bshol yang 'cha' bar mi bgyid cing // tsha ring mdog dang ldan pa dang / nges par yong
105a2(rgyud): spyod bgyid cing // za su sa lu kha dog dag dang / dri dang ro dang ldan pa dang // di bda' ma tog tshogs 'dra zhing // lha yi bdud rtsi'ang ba 'tshal// na li ka ra bskol bgyis nas// tshod mar de 'tsha
105a3(rgyud): sran sred min// gang na ma lce'i rtsa 'dra ba'i// sman dag 'khrung bar 'gyur ba yin// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen gags dang ldan pa ni// gnod sprin bdag po rgyal po ste/ 
105a4(rgyud): ni lus ngan po zhes bgyi// de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// gnod sbyin rnams kyis yongs bskor cing // gnod spyod rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas// de la bu ni mang mchis
105a5(rgyud): brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag 'thun grags ba ni// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min gsu la 'gyed pa/ kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags// de sa rnam
105a6(rgyud): kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas// sang+yas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shas khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang ring gnas
105a7(rgyud): phyag 'tshalags/ bdag la dge bas gzigasu gsol// khyod la ming 'thun phyag 'tshal ba/ de skad yang dang yang du thos// de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'den po rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig
105a8(rgyud): go'u tam khyod la phyag 'tshal cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshal mchi// de ltar byang gi phyogs de ni/ bzang ba lags shes skye bo mtsho// phyogs de mngon
105b1(rgyud): par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags// shar phyogs na ni 'khor srung // lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po// nub phyogs na ni mi bzang // byang chu phyogs na ni lus ngan po// rgyu
105b2(rgyud): po chen po sde bzhi dag/ 'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan// rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che// phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid// rgyal po dag gi mnga' gzhugs pa// gnod sprin 'dod dgar mchi
105b3(rgyud): ba rnams// de dag glang po che 'tshal zhing // phyog dag tu rdar rgyu// de dag ni chibs rta dang / rnga mo dang / khyu mchog dang / ma he dpar dang / lug dang / sbrul dang / bya dang / skyes pa dang / bud me dang / gzhon
105b4(rgyud): gzhon nu ma la 'tshal zhing phyogs phyogs dge tu yang mchi lags// glang po che gtsigs shing rta drangs shing / phyogs dag tu yang mchi lag so// chibs rta dang / rnga mo dang / 
105b5(rgyud): khyu mchog dang / ma he dang / ra dang / lug dang / sbrul dang khyu dang / skyes pa dang / bud medang / gzhon dang / gzhon du ma gtsigs shing rta drangs shing / phyogs phyogs dag tu yangs mchi lags// rdzu
105b6(rgyud): 'phrul chen po stobs po che'i// gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mche bo rnams/ gzhed pa de dag 'tshal nas ni// phyogs bzhi dag ni skyod par bgyid// rgyal po dag gi gong khyer dag/ sna tshogs mkha'
105b7(rgyud): la rgyu ba mchis// 'di lta ste/ kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / sa la kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / gang bcas sa stengs kun tu rgyu ba dang / sbubs can dang / grong khyer sbubs can
105b8(rgyud): bgyi ba dag lag so// byang phyogs na mcho ka bi ka zhes bgyi ba yang ma mchis lags// nub phyogs na grong khyer sar pa gsar ldan dang / gos can dang / gos mchog car dang / pad+ma can dang / pad+ma bzang po
106a1(rgyud): // can dang / sa gzhi can zhes bgyi ba dag kyang mchis lag so// cha ba rgyun mang po'i gnas gyur pa// 'dzin pa zhes bgyi'i mtsho mchis te/ chab rgyun tha dad de las 'byung / de las
106a2(rgyud): dgung char 'bab par 'gyur// btsun pa grong khyer u shi ra'i sbubs kyi pha rol na// lus gnas dang ni gnas yangs dang // de bas gnas yangs rgyun lugs can// rgyun lugs mang dang de bas mang
106a3(rgyud): bar snang mkha' la bya ltar gda'// btsun pa grong khyer sbubs can gyi// pha rol byang gi phyogs chan// 'dun sa bya dkar can zhes 'gyi ba de mchis te// der ni gnod skyon rnams 'dra zhing gnas la sa
106a4(rgyud): rkang mi sdug la mchu 'phangs dang // 'jig rung ste spu can dga' mchis// de de ljod shing 'bras bu rtag/ rma ba khrang khrung sgra snyan// khu byug smra skad chen po dang / shang shang da ru dag
106a5(rgyud): sgra 'byin cing // rma bya rnams kyi sgra dag dang // ko'u ku ba dang chun lag dang // bya rnams sna tshogs skad 'byin cing // me tog sbrang rtsi'i ro la dga'// lus ngan po dakla gar gyis/ 28
106a6(rgyud): can dang lhan cig rtse// btsun pa gong khyar lcang lo can gyi pha rol na// rgyal po dpa' bo zhes bgyi ba// yul 'khor bu khyud na mchis lagaso// bdag gang na mchis pa'i mdun sa da naM khyu mchog
106a7(rgyud): can zhes bgyi ste// bdag gi ming ni rnam thos kyi bu zhes bgyi lag so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags// tad+ya thA/ i li mi li/ i li mi li/ ki ri mU le/ hi lo ki Ti mU la/ hu
106a8(rgyud): hu dur du le/ gau ra~M/ gan d+ha ri/ go do hi ni/ o ka mo ke swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyad sngar bdag gis dri za rnams dang / dri za chen po rnams dang / dri za'i sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon na
106b1(rgyud): kyi ming brjod par bgyi lag so// 'di lta ste/ 'dod myos dga' bas myos pa dang / klu yis myos pa spud dang ni// phreng bas myos dang sbrang rtsis myos// me tog myos pa spun rnams dang / rtag tu
106b2(rgyud): dang dpal gyis myos// nor gyis myos dang dga' byed dang / ut+pal pad+ma zla ba dang / rnga 'dzin dang ni khu byug sgra// tum bu ru dang gtsugs lnga dang / gser spring bu mo gser can dang // pa bya sangs dang
106b3(rgyud): bu dag/ 'brog gnas ji snyed rgyal po lags// de dag ni bdag gi spyan lags te// de dag la bdag dri za 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o// dri za 'di ni bdag mi gtong zhes mchi zhi zhing // de dag la go bar bgyid la
106b4(rgyud): sor/ bdag la 'tsha ba'i dri za dang // bdag mi gtong ba'i dri za yis// legs par smras pa 'di thos nas// ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin/  mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag
106b5(rgyud): lag sa// tad+ya thA/ kun+du le kun+d+ha le/ kun+d+ha la/ kun+d+ha la/ e hi e hi/ sA d+ha ma ti ke/ sA d+ha b+hAN Di ni kaM tiSh+Tha duSh+Ta bA to si sAHbtsun pa bac+doMs kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ 
106b6(rgyud): bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun+du rgyu ba dang / kun+d+ha rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid/ rgya tshar lus mnam
106b7(rgyud): shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te dri za 'am/ di za mi 'am/ dri za rgad po 'am/ dri za rgan mo 'o/ di za'i bu po 'am/ de zi'i bu mo 'am/ ngi za'i 'khor pho 'am/ dri za'i 'khor me laM di za'i mngag gzhug pa
106b8(rgyud): dri za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing grags tshel ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'ging ngam/ nye bar mchos par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed/ gnas me rnyeng la/ di za rnams
107a1(rgyud): / kyi dri za 'dra ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du 'tshal ba bdun du 'gas lag so// 
107a2(rgyud): pa bcos kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nas/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo// rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug
107a3(rgyud): pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal ta sha za 'am/ sha za mo 'am/ sha za rgad po 'am/ sha za rgan mo 'am/ sha za'i bu pe 'am/ 
107a4(rgyud): za'i bu mo 'am/ sha za'i 'khor po 'am// sha za'i 'khor mo 'am/ sha za'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ sha za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tsha bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshel ba la la zhig nye bar
107a5(rgyud): mchi zhing / nye bar 'gang ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na// glags mi rnyed la sha za rnams kyis sha za 'dra ba'i nang du mtshor mi chud tsang / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang
107a6(rgyud): gnas mi 'thob ste/ da'i mgo arka ka'i dogs pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lag so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lag so// tad+ya thA/ hU me hU ma/ hU me li/ hU mi lA/ ba tI ye
107a7(rgyud): swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis gral bum rnams dang / grul bum chen po rnams dang / gral bum gyi sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon gyi mang brjod par bgyi lags/ 
107a8(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ byin dang nye byin kr-i mi sha/ rtsi bo logs che dang gsus po che// lag bcu dang nis la rgyu// g.yon phyogs nig po dmar po dang / sprin mdog dang ni dri mang dang / na ba ring dang 'brug sgra sgrogs/ 
107b1(rgyud): ral pa can dang stobs bcu dang // srid sgrub dang ni 'dod dgur mchi// 'jog po dang ni bya ba sbed// la ba bzang ldan gsum po dang / tshe na kun dang ni mig bka po// 'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags/ 
107b2(rgyud): de dag ni bdag gi spu lags te/ de la bdag grul bum 'di ni bdag la mtsha'o// grul bum 'di ni bdag mi gtong // zhes mchi zhing // de dag la go bar 'gyi lag so// bdag la 'tshe ba'i gral bum da
107b3(rgyud): bdag mi gtong ba'i grul bum gyis// legs par spras pa 'di thos na// ardza ka'i dag pa bzhin// de yi mgo tshal bdun du 'gas// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag lag so// tad+ya thA/ sa
107b4(rgyud): bi sau ra/ si ri bi sa re// bi ra bi sa re/ kriSh+Na tsha ga le/ ka rA Di/ bi ga le swA hA// btsun pa bac+doMs kyi nyan thos dge spong ngam// dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma ga
107b5(rgyud): la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / 'thun pa'i mdo// rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par
107b6(rgyud): 'gyid pa de la gal te gral bu ba 'am/ grul bu mo 'am/ grul bum rgad po 'am/ ral bum rgan mo la/ gral bum gyi bu po 'am/ gral bum gyi bu mo 'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor po 'am/ gral bum gyi
107b7(rgyud): 'khor me 'am/ grul buM gyi mngag gzhug pa dang / grul bum gyi mngag gzhug ma 'che bar byed pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'geng ngam/ nye bar
107b8(rgyud): par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ grul bum rnams kyis grul bum 'dra ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing // rgyal po'i grong lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo aH
108a1(rgyud): // dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du lags lag so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la/ kun tu rgyu ba
108a2(rgyud): ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo// rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid/ rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te yi dwags
108a3(rgyud): sam/ yi dwags myo'am/ yi dwags rgad po 'am/ yi dwags rgan mo 'am/ yi dwags kyi bu po 'am/ yi dwags kyi bu mo 'ab/ yi dwags kyi 'khor po 'am// yi drags kyi 'khor 'am/ yi
108a4(rgyud): drags kyi mngag gzhug pa 'am/ yi dwags kyi mngam gzhug ma 'tshe bar 'gyid pa glags lta zhing grags tshol ba la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ 
108a5(rgyud): ljags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ yi dwags rna mas kyi yo dwags 'dra ba'i nang du mtshar mi chud cing / rgyal po bo brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo
108a6(rgyud): ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lag so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lag so// tad+ya thA/ yu mi yu mi/ yu mi le/ yu mi la ba tra ya swA hA/ btsun pa bac+doMs kyi spyan snang
108a7(rgyud): bdag gis klu rnams dang / klu che ni po rnams dang / kA'i sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lag so// 'di lta ste/ dga' dang nye dga' kun dga' dang // nor rgyas dang ni 'dzem
108a8(rgyud): bzang ser po dang ni na dang // dbang po'i lag bkra shis dang / mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral// rab grol dang ni rgyal ba'i 'dag/ ngos yangs po dang ngos bkra dang // yangs pa can dang bkra bdud rgyal
108b1(rgyud): gdengs ka chen dang skar dga' dang // nag po che dang lag 'gro dang // ra skyong dang ni 'jog po dang // g.yon phyogs de bzhin nag po dang // sngo bsangs dkar dang 'grogs pa ni// 'gro gnas ji ste
108b2(rgyud): mchis pa lags// de dag gi spun lags te// de dag la bdag klu 'di ni bdag la mche'o// klu 'di ni bdag mi gtong zhes mchi zhing // de dag la go bar bgyod lag so// bdag la 'tshe ba'i kA
108b3(rgyud): ngag dang / bdag mi gtong ba'i kA rnams kyis// legs par smras pa 'di thos na// ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin// de'i mgo tshal bdun du 'gas// da la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lag
108b4(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ tsi la bi tsi la/ tsi li bi tsi li gau ri gar+b+ha ri/ me tog/ tsaN+Da li swA hA/ btsun pa bcos kyi nyan thos kyi dge spong de/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma
108b5(rgyud): gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags ba dang 'thun pa'i mdo// rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid/ rgya cher lung mnos shing
108b6(rgyud): 'don par bgyid pa da la/ gal te k+Sha 'am/ klu mo 'am/ klu rgang po 'am/ klu rgan mi 'am/ klu'i bu pro'am/ klu'i bu mo 'am/ klu'i 'khor po 'am/ klu'i 'khor mo 'ab/ klu'i mngag gzhug pa ra
108b7(rgyud): klu'i mngag gzhug ma mtshe bar 'gyid pa glags lta zhing / glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing / gnas mi rnyed la/ k+Sha rnams kyis klu
108b8(rgyud): 'dra ba'i nang du 'tshor mi rgud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'iri dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lagaso// btsun pa bac+doMs kyi nyan
109a1(rgyud): // zos kyi dge slong ngam/ dge slong ba 'am/ dge bsnyen nas/ dge bsnyed ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba pa lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo// rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug
109a2(rgyud): ba rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid/ rgya tshar lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de laM/ gal te lu srul po'o// lus srul mo 'am/ lus srul rgang po 'am/ lus srul rgan me
109a3(rgyud): lus srul po'i bu be 'am/ lus srul po'i bu mo 'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor po 'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor mo 'am/ lus srul po'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ lus srul po'i mang gzhum
109a4(rgyud): ma 'am/ 'tshe bar bgyid pa// glags lta zhing glags tshe la ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing // gnas mi rnyed la/ lus srul
109a5(rgyud): po rnams kyis lus srul po 'du ba'i nang du mchi mi chud cing / rgyal po'i brong lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'o/ bste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba 'dun du
109a6(rgyud): 'gas lag so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag lagaso// tad+ya thA/ A pa ba ha ni/ ma hA na ba tri ye swA hA/ btsun pa bac+doMs kyi spyan sngar bdag gis gnod sbyin rnams dang / gnod sbyin
109a7(rgyud): po rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod bgyi lagaso// 'di lta ste/ dbang po zla ba chu lha dang // ba ra dra tsa skye dga'i bdag/ dbang ldan can 'dod ci dang
109a8(rgyud): mgrin ngan dang ni 'gul ngas dang / stobs ldan nong spyod dang // smra ra ba dang ni nye lnga dag ri mnyam gser can gang po dang / seng ldeng ba dang g.yon can dang // gnod sbyin pa yang spyod dang 'breg nas
109b1(rgyud): dngar rgyal ba khyu mchog mi rgyal po// dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni// lcags mdung ring dang ma ldan dang // tshig lnga ser po yad dga' dang // gnod sbyid ring po 'khor dang bcas// 'bras bu gtsu
109b2(rgyud): dang bgul gsum pa// 'gro gnas ji snyed pachis pa lags// de dag ni bdagi sprin lags te// de dag la bdag gnod sbyin 'di ni/ bdag la 'cha'o// gnod sbyin 'di ni bdag mi gtong zhes
109b3(rgyud): mchi zhing / de dag la ge bar bgyid lag so// bdag la mche ba'i ba'i gnod sbyin dang / bdag mi gtong ba'i gnod sbyin gyis// lags par smras pa 'di thos na/ ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin// 'i mdo
109b4(rgyud): tshal ba bdun du 'gas// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lag so// tad+ya thA/ hri li mi li/ hi l-i me le/ kauHmU li/ hi li kAdzi pU la/ oM tum+bA tub+da/ oM tum+ba tum+be/ 
109b5(rgyud): gle me ga/ go de ho/ b+h+r-i ga re/ ri She sad+ha me swA hA// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu
109b6(rgyud): ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo// rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid/ rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par 'gying ba de la/ gal te gnod sgyu
109b7(rgyud): nam/ gnod spyod mo'am/ gnod sbyin rgad po'am/ gnod sbyin rgan mo 'am// gnod sbyid gyi bu pho 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor po'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor gyi 'kho
109b8(rgyud): 'am/ gnod spyon gyi mangs gzhug pa 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar 'gyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ bla
110a1(rgyud): // mi rnyed cing / gdas mi rnyed la/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyir 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pre brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog
110a2(rgyud): bzhin tshal ba bdun du 'gas lag so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong de/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen dam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun+d+ha rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags
110a3(rgyud): pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo// rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug brkang pa phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid/ rgya cher lung mnos shing mngon par bgyid pa de la/ gal te srin po 'am/ srin mo 'am/ sran
110a4(rgyud): po rgad po 'am/ srin mo rgan mo 'am/ srin po'i bu bo 'am/ srin po'i bu mo 'am// srin po'i 'khor phro 'am/ srin po'i 'khor mo'am/ srin po'o mngag gzhug pa 'am/ srin po'i mngag gzhug ma
110a5(rgyud): 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol la la zhing nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'geng ngam/ nye bar mchis pa ra gyur glags mi rnyed cing / gnas mi rnyed la/ srin po rnams
110a6(rgyud): 'dra ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i bo brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'o mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal la bdun du 'gas lag so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig
110a7(rgyud): 'di dag lag so// tad+ya thA/ hi li hi liM hA lu hU lu/ yu ma yu me li/ yu mA la ba tri ye swA hA/ de nas rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus/ bac+doMs kyi spyan sngar kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang 'thun
110a8(rgyud): pa'i mdo// rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid// rgya cher brjod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de nyi du mi snangs
110b1(rgyud): gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gtso la gangan bshams pa de nyid la bzhug so// bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis pa
110b2(rgyud): slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mdang rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu kha dog 'phags pa/ g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang / g.yos
110b3(rgyud): 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa nam sros pa dang / nga ga la ba der 'ongs te phyod nas/ nga'i zhabs la mge bas phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs
110b4(rgyud): gcig tu 'dug/ de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnams rjes kyi bu'i kha dog gi mthus rgyal byed kyi tshal thad snang ba chen po gsal bar gyur to// rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs
110b5(rgyud): gcig tu 'dug nas/ de'i cha tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// blo ldan khyod kyi sa gang mkhyen pa// lha rnams kyis ni dam chal// dpa' chen lce
110b6(rgyud): la phyag 'tsha'o// sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa dang / da ltar byung dang mabyon pa/ thang la ni bdag phyag 'tshal// khyed la bdag ni skyab su mchi// btsun pa 'chos kyi nyan thos dge slong dang / 
110b7(rgyud): sbeng ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nag/ dge bsnyen ma gang dag gnas mal dgon pa dang / nags mang ba dag dang / bas mtha' dag na gnas pa dag kyang mchis la// de na gnod sbyin dang mi ma lags pa
110b8(rgyud): gdug pa gnyug ma gnas pa gang dag// bcos kyi gsung rab mngon par dad pa dag dang / mngon par ma dang bdag kyang mchis te/ gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar ga
111a1(rgyud): // pa gang dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs rab la mngon par dad pa dag ni shin tu nyung la/ gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag/ bcos kyi
111a2(rgyud): gsungs rab la mngon pa ma dad pa de dag ni ches mang lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams 'di
111a3(rgyud): ltar bdag nyid srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang / gnod sbyin dang mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa mngon par ma dad pa dag par bgyi ba dang / 
111a4(rgyud): bar dad pa rnams kyang slar zhing 'bar bar bgyi ba'i slad du kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba
111a5(rgyud): 'di nyid rgya cher 'dzin cing kun chub par bgyid na/ le gso legaso zhes gsol ba dang / dge slong dag ngas rgyal po chen po rnams thos kyi bu la cang mi gsung bas gnang bar mdzad
111a6(rgyud): de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus/ ngas cang mo gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ nga'i spyan sngar kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang 'thun pa'i
111a7(rgyud): mdo// rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher gsol te/ skye bo gang dag gtong pod cing // phra ma mi mchi ser sna bral// gang dag sangs rgyas smra
111a8(rgyud): mchis pa// mid rnams kyi rnyed pa lags// gang zhig 'char la brten nas ni/ des na nyin mor brjod pa yi/ nyi mchen po'i dkyil 'khor can// gnyi gdugs nas 'char 'gyur ba'i// phyogs ngo man
111b1(rgyud): par skyed bgyid ba/ rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni//  za'i bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes bgyi// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyi rtag tu rtse// dri za rnams kyis yongs bsgo
111b2(rgyud): dri za rnams kyi mdun gyis bltas// de la bu ni mang mchis te// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lde min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun+d+ha
111b3(rgyud): gzhan gyis mi gru'i lags// de dag rnams kyi rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyi mi'i gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/ mi yis
111b4(rgyud): phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags// bdag la dge bas gzig stsol// khyod la mi min bya ga 'tshal ba//  skad yang dang yang du thos// de slad bdag la 'di skad
111b5(rgyud): ces// 'dod pa rgyal ni phyag 'tshol cig// ge lu tam rgya la la phyag 'tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi// de ltar shar gyi phyogs de ni/ 
111b6(rgyud): bzang ba legs shes skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par skyong 'gyid pa/ rgyal chen gags dang ldan pa lags// gang na yi drags zhes bgyi ba/ rgyab kyi sha 'tshal phra ma can// srog gcong bgyid pa
111b7(rgyud): ma rungs pa// 'jungs shing mi snyan smra bgyid pa'i// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// glal bum bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bgyi// de ni
111b8(rgyud): nye du lhan cig du/ glu dang gar gyi rtag tu rtse// grul bum rnams kyis yongs bskor cing // sbrul bum rnams kyi mdun gyis bltas// de la bu ni mang mchis te/ brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig dag ming su
112a1(rgyud): / grags pa ni/ dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun tu gzhan gyis pi thub lags// de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i ga
112a2(rgyud): mthong nas// skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang rings gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags// bdag las dge bas gzigasu
112a3(rgyud): khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang dang yang du thos// de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'den pa rgyal la phyag 'tshal cig/ go'u tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa
112a4(rgyud): mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshal mchi// de ltar lho yi phyogs de ni/ bzang ba lags shas skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen gags dang ldan pa lags// gang zhig nub pa kho
112a5(rgyud): las// des na mtshan mor brjod pa yi// nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can// nyi gdugs gang du nub 'gyur ba// des na ma tsho tshan zab mo ni// shin tu 'dar bar dka' ba ste// de ni che sngon
112a6(rgyud): mtsho zhes// skye bo rtogs pa ma mchis pa'i// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ kA yi bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni mig mi bzang zhes bgyi// de ni nyed
112a7(rgyud): lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// klu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor cing // klu rnams kyis ni mdun gyi ltas// de la bu ni mchis te// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming 'bun grags pa
112a8(rgyud): dbang po zhes 'gyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags// de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/ skyes bcang
112b1(rgyud): shes khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/ mi yi phyag 'gyis byed la ni// rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags// bdag la dge bas gzig su gsol// khyod la mi med
112b2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang dang yang du thos// de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dedren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshal cog/ goru tam rgyal la phyag 'tshal cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan
112b3(rgyud): 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi// da ltar nub kyi phyogs de ni// bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par spyong bgying ba// rgyal chen gags dang ldan pa lags// gang na byang gi smra mau snyan/ 
112b4(rgyud): dga' zhing ldan chen lnga mdzes dang // gang na mi rnam tsha lo ni// brgya phrag bcub skye 'gyur zhing // de dag mo rmi mo 'das la// bshol yang 'chang bar mi bgyid cing // tshe ring mdog dang ldan
112b5(rgyud): pa dang // nges par yongasu spyod 'gyod cing // za su lu kha dog dang // dri dang ro dang ldan pa deng // de dang me tog tshogs 'dra zhing // lha yi bdud rtsi 'dra ba 'tshal// na li ke ra bskol bgyis nas// tshod mar de
112b6(rgyud): 'tshal sran tshong min// gang na me lce 'dra ba'i// sman dag 'khrung bar 'gyur ba yi// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grogs dang ldan pa ni// gnod sbyin bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni
112b7(rgyud): lus ngan po zhes bgyi// da ni nye du lhan cig tu/ k+Sha dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// gnod sbyin rnams kyi yongs bskor cing // gnod sbyin pa rnams kyi mdun gyis bltas// de la bu ni mang mchis te// brgyad
112b8(rgyud): cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming 'thun gags pa ni// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags// de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sa ng+yas
113a1(rgyud): // sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud// skyed mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis la ni// rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tsha
113a2(rgyud): bdag la dge bas gzigasol// khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang dang yang du thos// nga slad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig/ go'u taM rgyal la phyag 'tshe bsgris
113a3(rgyud): dang zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshal mchi// de ltar byang gi phyogs da ni// bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/ 
113a4(rgyud): phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung // lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po// nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang // byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po// rgyal po chen po de bano dag/ 'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan
113a5(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che// phyogs bzhi dag na sbyong bar bgyid// rgyal po dag gi mang mngag gzhug pa// gnod skyon 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams// de dag glang po che 'tshal zhing / 
113a6(rgyud): phyogs phyogs dag tu rnar rgyu// de dag gi ni tshabs rta/ dang / rnga mo dang / khyu mchog dang / ma he dang / ra dang / lug dang / sbrul dang / bya dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhon ma 'tshal
113a7(rgyud): zhing // phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lag so// glang po che gcig gis shing rta dngas shing // phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mtsho lag so// tsho bas rta dang / rnga mo dang / khyu mchog dang / ma he dang / ra dang
113a8(rgyud): lugs dang / sbrul dang / bya dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhon ma gotsogs shing / phyogs dag tu yang mchi lag so// rdzu 'phral chen po stobs po che// gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchi/ 
113b1(rgyud): ba rnams// bzhon pa de dag 'tshal nas ni// phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid// rgyal po dag gi grong khyer dag/ sna tshogs mkha' la rgyu ba mchis/ 'di lta ste/ kun rgyu ba dang / kun rtsub ma lags pa
113b2(rgyud): dang / sa la kun+d+ha rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / gar bcas sa stangs kun+da rgyu ba dang / sbubs can dang / gong khur sbubs can zhes bgyi bdag lag so// byang phyogs na mcho ka pi wang ka zhes bgyi ba yang mchis
113b3(rgyud): lag so// nub phyogs na grong khyer sar pa gsar ldan dang / gos can dang / gos mchog can dang / pad+ma can dang / pad+ma bzang po can dang/ sa gzhi can zhes bgyi bdag kyang mchis lag so// chab rgyun ma
113b4(rgyud): bo'i gnas gyur pa// 'dzin pa zhes 'gyi mtsho ma chis te/ chab rgyun tha dad de las 'byung // de las dgung char ra bab par 'gyur// btsun pa gong khyer u shi ra'i sbubs kyi pha rom
113b5(rgyud): na// lus gnas dang ni gnas yangs dang / de bas gnas yangs rgyun lugs can// rgyun lugs mang dang de bas mang // bar snang mkha' la bya ltar gang la// btsun pa grong khyer sbubs can gyi pha
113b6(rgyud): byang phyogs na 'dun sa bya gar can zhes bgyi ba de mchis te/ deng ni gnod sbyin rnams 'du zhing gnas lags// rkang mi sdug la mchu 'byangs dang // 'jigs rungs l-I spu can dag mchis/ 
113b7(rgyud): na ljon shing 'bras bu rtag/ rma bya khrung khrung sgra snyan dang // khu byug skra skad chen po dang // shang shang teru sgra 'byin cing // rma bya rnams kyi sgo dag dang / ke'u dum pa dang chun lags dang // bya rnams
113b8(rgyud): sna tshogs skad 'byin cing // me tog spang rtso'i rol dga'// lus ngan po de glu gar gyis// pad+ma can dang lhan cig rtsa// btsun pa grong khyer lcang lo can gyi pha rol na// rgyal po dpa' bo zhes bgyis
114a1(rgyud): yul 'khor mu khyud da mchis lag so// bdag gang na mchis pa'i mdun sa de ni khyu mchog can zhes bgyi ste// bang gi ming ni rnam thos kyi bu zhes bgyi lag so// de la gas
114a2(rgyud): sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lag so// tad+ya thA/ i li mi li/ i le mi le/ ki Ti mU le/ hi li ki Da mA le/ hu du me/ hu dur du me/ gau ri gar+b+ha ri/ gau do ha ni/ oM ka mo ke swA hA/ btsun pa bac+doMs kyi spyan snga
114a3(rgyud): bdag gis dri za rnams dang / dri za chen po rnams dang / dri za'i sde dpor rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lag so// 'di lta ste/ 'dod myos dga' bas myos pa dang / klu yis myos pa
114a4(rgyud): spyan rnams dang / phreng bas myos dang sbrang rtsis myos/ me tog byos pa spun rnams dang / rtag tu myos dang dpal gyis myos// nor gyi myos dang dga' byed dang / ud pa la pad+ma zla ba dang / rnga 'dzin dang ni khu
114a5(rgyud): byug sgra// tum bu ru dang gtsug lnga dang // gser spyod bu mo gsar can dang // pa ba sangs dang phur bu dag/ 'gro gnas ji snyed rgyal po lags// de dag bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag pa
114a6(rgyud): bdag de za 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o// dri zi 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing // de dag la go bar bgyid lag so// bdag la 'tshe ba'i dri za dang // bdag mi gtong ba'i dri za yis// legs par smras pa
114a7(rgyud): 'di thos nas// ar+tha ka yi dog pa bzhin// de'i mgo tshal ba bdun du 'gas// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lagaso// tang thA/ ku t+ye le/ ku tu le/ ku tu la/ ku tu le/ a hi e hi/ sA d+ha ma ti ka/ 
114a8(rgyud): d+ha ma ti ke sA d+ha ma ti ke/ sA d+ha b+ha NI ni ke tiSh+Tha duSh+Ta bA to sa~M swA hA/ betsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan pos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'ag/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyed ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dag tu
114b1(rgyud): tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo// rog sngags dang / srang ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur pa 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing // 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te de za 'am/ 
114b2(rgyud): za mo 'am/ de za rgad po 'am/ di za rgan mo 'am/ di za'i bu pho 'am/ de bu mo 'am/ dri za'i 'khor po 'am/ ri za'i 'khor mo 'am/ da zir bdag gzhug pa 'am/ dri za'i mngag gzhug pa tshe bar 'gyed pa/ bAr+Ya
114b3(rgyud): lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig/ nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'gong ngam/ nye bar mchis mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing / gnas mi rnyed la/ dri za rnams ni dra zi 'du ma'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / 
114b4(rgyud): rgyal po'i bro brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lag so// btsun pa bac+doMs kyi nyan pos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma
114b5(rgyud): 'amaHdge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo// rig sdigs dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di
114b6(rgyud): nyid/ rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te sha za 'am/ sha za bo 'ag/ sha za rgang po 'am/ sha za rgan mo 'am/ sha za'i bu pe 'am/ sha za'i bu mo 'am/ sha za'i 'khor po 'am/ sha za'i 'a
114b7(rgyud): mo 'ab/ sha za'i bdag gzhug pa 'am/ sha za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa// glags lha zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ 
114b8(rgyud): mi rnyeng cing gnas mi rnyeng la/ sha za rnams kyi sha za 'du ba'i nang du mchis mi chud cing // rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dogs pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun
115a1(rgyud): / du 'gas lag so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lag so// tad+ya thA/ hU me hA me/ hU pi le/ hUM mi la/ ba tri ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis gru
115a2(rgyud): bum rnams dang / grul bupa chen po rnams dang / grul bum gyi sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyis ming brjod par bgyi lagaso// 'di lta ste/ byin dang nye byin kri mi sha/ rtsib logs cha dang
115a3(rgyud): gsus po che// lag bcu dang ni sa la rgyu// g.yon phyogs nag po dmar po dang / sprin mdog dang ni dri med dang // rna ba ring dang 'brug sgra sgrogs// ral pa can dang stobs bcu dang // srid sgrub dang ni 'di
115a4(rgyud): dgur ma chi// 'jog po deng ni bya ba sbed// la ba bzang ldan gsum po dang / tshon kun dang ni mig bkra po// 'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags// deg ni bdag gi spyan lags te/ dag
115a5(rgyud): la bdag grul bum 'di ni bdag la 'che'o// grul bum 'di ni bdag mi gtong zhes mchi zhing / de dag la go bar bgyod lags// bdag la 'tshe ba'i gral bum dang / bdag mi gting ba'i grul bu
115a6(rgyud): legs par smras pa 'di thos na// ardza ka'i dag pa bzhin// nga yi mgo tshal bdun du 'gas// de la gsang sngags kyi cho ga ni 'di dag lag so// tad+ya thA/ si ra bi siM ge si ribi sa re/ si ri bo sa
115a7(rgyud): kriny+tsA tsha ka li/ ka ra ki pi ga le swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa
115a8(rgyud): dang 'thun pa'i mdo// rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid// rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te grul bum mam/ grul bu'o/ 
115b1(rgyud): 'am grul bum rgad po 'am/ grul bum rgan mo 'am/ gal bum gyi bu po 'am/ grul bum gyi bu mo 'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor po 'am/ grul gyi 'khor mo 'am/ grul bum gyi mngag gzhug pa la
115b2(rgyud): grul bum gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng de/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glag mi rnyed cing // gnas mi rnyed la/ 
115b3(rgyud): grul bum rnams kyi grul bus 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi thob ste/ ngor mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun du 'gas lags// bcu
115b4(rgyud): ba bcos kyi nyan thos dge slong / dge slong 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rtsu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i med// rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sum pa de/ 
115b5(rgyud): ba la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid/ rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te yi drags so// yi drags mo 'am/ yi dwags rgang po 'am/ yi drags rgan mo la
115b6(rgyud): yi drags kyi bu po 'am/ yo dwags kyi bu mo 'am/ yi dwags kyi 'khor po 'am/ yi dwags kyi 'khor mo Sham/ yo dregs kyi mngag gzhug pa'am/ yi dwags kyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid
115b7(rgyud): pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar mchis par gyur na// glags mi rnyed cing // gnas mi rnyed la/ yi dwags rnams yi dwags 'du ba'i nang du mching mi chung
115b8(rgyud): rgyal po'i phra brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi mthong ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dge pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun du 'gas lag so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lagaso// tad+ya thA/ yu me yu ma
116a1(rgyud): / yu mi li/ yu mi lA ba tri ye swAd // btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis kA rnams dang / kA chen po rnams dang / klu'i sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi mang
116a2(rgyud): brjod par bgyid lag so// 'di lta ste/ dga' dang nye dga' kun dga' dang / nor rgyas dang ni 'dzam bu bzang // ser po dang ni zhe rna dang // dbang po lag dang bkra shis dang / mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral// rab grol
116a3(rgyud): dang ni rgyal po'i bdag/ ngos yangs po dang ngos bka dang // yangs pa can dang bkra bdun rgyal// gdengs ka tsha dang skar dga' dang / nag po che dang lag 'gro dang // ra skyong dang ni 'jog po dang / g.yon phyogs
116a4(rgyud): de bzhin nag po dang / sngo bsangs dkar dang 'gogs pa ni// 'gegogs nas ji snyed mchis pa lags/ de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te// de dag la bdag klu 'di ni bdag la 'che'o// klu 'di ni bdag
116a5(rgyud): mi gtong zhes mchi zhing / de dag la go bar bgyid lag/ so// bdag la mtshe ba'i klu dag dang / bdag mi gtong ba'i kA rnams kyis// legs par smras pa 'di thos na// ardza ka'o dag pa
116a6(rgyud): bzhin/ de yi mgo tshal ba bdun du 'gas// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags// tad+ya thA/ tsi le bi tsi le/ gau rI gan+d+ha ra/ ma taM gi/ tsaN+Da li swAhA/ btsun pa bac+doMcos kyi nyan thos dge slong
116a7(rgyud): dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge brnyan ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo// rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur
116a8(rgyud): ba 'di nyid/ rgya cher lung mnas shing 'don par bgyid pa de laM// gal te klu 'am/ klu mi 'am/ k+Sha rgad po'am/ klu rgan mo 'am/ klu'i bu po 'am/ klu'i bu mo 'am/ klu'i 'khor po 'am / klu'i 'khor mo 'am/ 
116b1(rgyud): klu mngag gzhug pa 'am / kA'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'geng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na// glags mi rnyed kyi
116b2(rgyud): gnas mi rnyed la/ klu rnams kyi 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chung cing / rgyal po'i pra brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza kI'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun du 'gas lag so// 'gyu
116b3(rgyud): ba bac+doMs kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nas/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo// rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa na
116b4(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur pa 'di nyid/ rgya cher lungs nas shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te lus srul po 'am/ lu srul ma 'am/ lus srul po rgang po 'am/ lus srul po rgan
116b5(rgyud): me 'am/ lus srul po'i bu bo'am/ lus srul po'i bumo 'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor po la/ lus srul po'i 'khor mo 'am/ lus srul po'i mngag gzhug pa 'ang/ lus srul po'i mang
116b6(rgyud): gzhug ma la bar bgyid la/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchis zhing // nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na// glags mi rnyed cing / gnas mi rnyed la/ khu srul po rnam
116b7(rgyud): kyi lu srul po 'dra ba'i dang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pe brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du chal pa bdun du 'gas lag so// de lags bsngams
116b8(rgyud): kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags// tadad+ya thA/ e paM/ ba ha na/ ba hA na/ Sha tI ye swA hA/ btsun pa brjes kyi spyan sngar bdag gis rnams dang / gnod spyod chad pa rnams dang / gnod sbyir gyi sde dpon dmas dpa'
117a1(rgyud): dpon namam tha mang 'arjod ba makyi lagaso/ 'das ste/ gang po zlab su lnga dang / pang na ste dgu'i bdag ya ldan nga rtso dang / matsun smra nam su langs
117a2(rgyud): ldan nor bu nor spyod dang // sgra rab dang ni nya lnga dang // ri mnyam gser can gang po dang // seng ldeng ba dang g.yon can dang // gnod sbyin bskyong 'brog nas dang // rgyal ba khyu mchog mi rgyal po/ dri za sna tshogs sde
117a3(rgyud): dang ni// lcags ma dang ring dang ma ldan dang // tshig lnga ser po yid dga' dang // gnod sprin ring po 'khor dang bcas// 'bras bu gsum dang mgul gsum pa// 'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags// 
117a4(rgyud): de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te// de dag la bdag gnod sbyin 'di ni bdag la che'o// gnod sbyin 'di ni bdag mi gtong zhes mchi zhing / de dag la go bar bgyid lag so// bdag la 'tsha ba'i gnod sbyid nga
117a5(rgyud): bdag mi gtong ba'i gnod sbyin gyis// lags par smras pa 'di thos nas// ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin// de yi mgo tshal pa 'dun du 'gas/ de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags
117a6(rgyud): tud+ya thA/ hi l-i mi le/ hi le mi la/ kA d+ho mA le/ hi lo d+hi mA la/ oM tum be tum ge oM tum be tum ge/ oM ga me ho/ gai do hi/ b+hing b+ha re/ r-i Sha sa t+yai ma~M swA hA/ btsun pa bcos kyi nyan thos dge slong de// dge
117a7(rgyud): ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun+da rgyu bam lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo// rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya
117a8(rgyud): lung mnos shing 'don par bgyis pa de la/ gal te gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo 'am// gnod sbyin rgang po'am/ gnod sbyin rgan mo 'am// gnod sbyin gyi bu po 'am// gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am/ gnod sbyi
117b1(rgyud): gyi 'khor po 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug pa'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing
117b2(rgyud): nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing / gnas mi rnyed la/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi mthong
117b3(rgyud): ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lag so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba
117b4(rgyud): dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal ba 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung nod cing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ 
117b5(rgyud): gal te srin po 'am/ srin po 'am/ srin po rgan po la/ sro rgan mo 'am/ srin po'i bu po 'am/ srin po'i bu mo 'am/ srin para'akhor po 'am/ srin po'i 'khor mo 'am/ srin po'i mngag gzhug
117b6(rgyud): 'am/ srin po'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing grags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ma/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing / gnas mi rnyed la
117b7(rgyud): srin po rnams kyi srin po 'dri ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste// da'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lag so// de lags
117b8(rgyud): sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lag so// tid+ya thA/ hi lai haM le/ hu lu hu lu/ yu ma yu me le/ yu mi lA bi tri ye swAhA/ zhes rgya cher smras nas/ nga'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de nyid du mi sna
118a1(rgyud): / bar gyur to// dge slong dag khyed kyis 'di ltar bdag nyid srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi ma yin pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas
118a2(rgyud): pa mngon par ma dad pa dag mngon par dad par bya ba dang / mngon par dad pa rnams kyang byir zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir/ kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang 'thun po'i mdo// rig sngags dang / sku
118a3(rgyud): ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshol bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid long shig/ zung shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ c+doMs kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slang de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan
118a4(rgyud): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod/ bang sdom na/ a ki/ chu sa/ yu tsi/ a hi hi/ gsang sngags kyi tshig rnam pa dgu smos pa dang / go rims bzhin du smraro// mngo chen po kun tu rgyu
118a5(rgyud): dang kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang 'thud pa'i mdo// sa bya ba rdzog s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi ni mi tra dang / badz+nyA barba dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he ye shes snga la sogs pas skye
118a6(rgyud): cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA ma g+ha/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sprin chen po// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sed thad la phyag 'tshal// 'di skad bdag gis thong pa dus
118a7(rgyud): gcig na/ bac+doMs klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga'i gnas na/ nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po sprin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / 
118a8(rgyud): byang chub sede'i dge 'dun chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po'i tshogs chen po 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po dga' ba dang / nya dga' dang / rgya mtsho dang / ma dos pa dang / gzi can dang / chu lha dang / 'jog po dang / 
118b1(rgyud): yul 'khor srung dang / nor rgyas kyi bu dang / klu'i rgyal po gtang zung dang / sa srung gi bu dang / mdongs bu dang / dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / dpal bzang dang / glog gi phreng ba dang / gtsug na nor bu rin po tsha dang / 
118b2(rgyud): gtsug na nor bu bogs dang / snang ldan gtsug pud can dang / gtsug pud 'ja' can dang / kwa'i rgyal po dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dang / dbang po'i bachod sdong dang / 'dzam+bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / bka shis ldan dang
118b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chad po cand dang / lag gi 'gro ched po dang / skar mdog dang / zla ba'i gzi brjid dang / dpal gyi blo gos dang / zla mthong dang / kwa'i rgyal po legs mthong dang / shin+d+ra bstan dang / mgul na nor
118b4(rgyud): dang sprid byung dang / chang rgyu dang / rab 'jom dang / rnar 'jom dang / mthu ba sbyongs dang / gdengs ka chen po dang / dbyangs zab dang klu'i rgyal po cher sgrogs dang / rnar sgra 'byin dang / ud pal dang / rtsol chen
118b5(rgyud): gshol mda' 'dzin dang / sna tshogs sde dang / zhags pa chen po dang / kwa'i rgyal po a la'i mdab ma dang / kun tu snang dang / rna rtsub dang / dung dang / dar da ra dang / klu'i rgyal po u pa dang dar da
118b6(rgyud): bang byang dang / lag 'gro dang / lag 'gro chen po dang / de mtshan po dang / 'bur ldong dang / sog ma med dang / 'phyang ba dang srin bu gnas dang / nag po dang kwa'i rgyal po dbang po sde dang / 'dam bu dang / nye ba'i
118b7(rgyud): 'das bu dang / dung thogs dang / 'gro lding dang / rab mdzes dang / glang chen sna dang / rnon po dang / ser skya dang / glog 'bar dang / glog 'od chen po dang / stobs lha dang / rga stobs dang / klu'i rgyal po dang
118b8(rgyud): pa 'gebs dang / bdud rtsi can dang / bu stegs can dang / bai DUr+ya'i 'od nadag / gser mdog sgra dang / gser 'od dang / zla ba'i rgyal mtshan 'od dang / nyi 'od dang / 'char ba dang / ba glang mgo dang
119a1(rgyud): // rgyal po dkar po dang / nag po dang / gshin rje dang / dge tshul dang / sbal ba dang / ngang pa'i gzi brjid dang / mu khyud 'dzin dang / sa 'dzin dang / mgo slong can dang / gtsug na nor bu dang / k+Sha
119a2(rgyud): bo don yod mthong ba dang / sprin chen dang / sde bzang dang / sa skyeng dang / mis byin dang / rnar dul dang / dga' ba 'byung dang / chu srin kum b+hi ra dang / chu srin kum b+hi ra'i gdong dang / dge 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyu
119a3(rgyud): po myur gdugs dang / pad+ma ka dang / mjug ma dang / rab 'byung dang / 'jigs byed dang / gzi brjid mdzes dang / mgo lnga po dang / bil li ra dang / shing rtas rgyal dang / klu'i rgyal po bla ma dang / kwa'i rgyal
119a4(rgyud): mjug rings dang / mgo 'o che dang / bim ba ki dang / 'i char dang / mgyogs 'gro dang / klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa dang / klu sde dang / gzi chen dang / 'dam bu byin dang / klu'i rgyal po skrag byed dang / 
119a5(rgyud): 'od 'bar dang / mgo bdun pa dang / sdong chen dang / mthong dga' dang / rab tu cher gsum dang / de med gzi brjid dang / mig bzang dang / drag po chen po dang / 'od 'phro phung po dang k+Sha
119a6(rgyud): rgyal po gtum po dang / khro bo dag shul can dang / rin chen cha sbyid dang / chu spyan sprid chan dang / dbang po'i 'od dang / rkang pas 'thung dang / spring zla dang / rgya mtsho'i sprin dang / me tog dri chen po dang / ku
119a7(rgyud): mu da'i 'byung gnas dang / kA'i rgyal bai rin chen mig dang / tig chen po'i'o rgyal mtshan dang / sprid chen snying po dang // ba ba can dang / dpal gyi snying po dang / sprin mthu can dang / mtshan mo 'dzin dang / chu
119a8(rgyud): sbyin dang / chu sbyin chen klu'i rgyal po gzi brjid me 'dra dang / sman gyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / khre mad dang sa'i bum pa dang / klu dpa' dang / chu 'dzin dang / sprin gdugs dang / ing gi ra'i gdong dpe
119b1(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po gzi can dang / sprin las mngon 'byung dang / klu'i rgyal po gom stabs mtha' yas dang / cha byad mdzes dang / lus chen dang / spyang lho dang / zhi ba dang / dpa' ba dang / gser nga can dang / mchog
119b2(rgyud): brtson dang / dug dag dang / dbyangs snyan dang / kA'i rgyal po bdud rtsi snying po dang / rab tu char 'babs chen po dang / rnam par g.yo dang / 'khrags sgra dang / rnga sgra dang / bdud rtsi'i rkyen dang / dga' bar byed pa dang
119b3(rgyud): 'brug sgrogs dang / dpa' snga dang / sred med kyi 'u dang / rgya mtsho'i klong dang / kwa'i rgyal po yon po dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po de dag le sogs pa/ kla bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi
119b4(rgyud): 'dus te 'khong pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po de dag 'khor dang bcas te stan las la sa nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar ste/ dbus mo g.yas
119b5(rgyud): pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bA ma la gus pa dang / phu dud chen po byed pas/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba
119b6(rgyud): dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 'a dan dang / dar gyi lda ldi dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / klu dbyangs dang / rin po che'i me tog dpa
119b7(rgyud): rig po che'i lnga rdzi da/ mu tig gi phreng ba dang / klu'i me tog dang / mu tig gi dra ba mchog tu mdzes pa rnam pa sna tshogs dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa dag bac+doMs la phul nas/ bskor ba byas
119b8(rgyud): te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/ phyogs gcig tu'i dug nas/ smon lam rnams btab ba/ lus rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho zad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyis sangs rgyas dang / 
120a1(rgyud): // byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byas rgya mtsho thams cad dang/ sa dang / chu dang / me dang rlung zad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdu
120a2(rgyud): rnams dang / gzugasu snang ba zad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams las// rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la yang lus kyi sprin rgya mtsho bgrangs pa'i rgya mtsho tha~Md las yang dag par 'das pa/ grangs
120a3(rgyud): dpag tu med/ bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med// gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa las yang dag par 'das pa dag dang / lus re re la yang lag brgya mtsho'i sprin phyogs kun gyi rgyun tu
120a4(rgyud): mngon par phyogs pa/ dpag tu med pa/ gangs med bdage byin gyis brlabs nas/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyi cha re ral+la kyang mchod pa thams cad kyi sprid rgya mtsho phyogs kun gyi
120a5(rgyud): gzhi rgyas par 'gengs pa/ ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub se de' thad la mchod pa bya'o// snyam pa 'di lta ste/ kun tu spyod pa'i lus rgya mtsho'i sprin ma 'das pa dpab tu
120a6(rgyud): med/ grangs med pasam gyis mi khyeg gnal du med/ tshad med brjod med pa dag gis/ namakha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas/ byang chub se 'i lus rgya mtsho sprin rnas kyi
120a7(rgyud): ji lta ba de bzhin du rin po che thad kyi kha dog dang / 'od zer stug po dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba thang lta bu'i lus kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thad kyi phreng ba dang / me tog ga/ 
120a8(rgyud): rgya mtsho sprid rnams dang / rin po che thad kyi snang ba chen po'i snying po khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bye ma dang / shing ljon pa thad kyi mdzod rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos dang / bdug pa
120b1(rgyud): kyi gzugs kun tu ston pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sgra thang sgrogs pa'i rol mo'i rgya mtsho'i sprid rnams dang / spos thang kyi shing ljon pa rgya pa tshe sngon rnams dang / namakha'i dkyil kun+da khebs
120b2(rgyud): par byin gyis brlabs nas/ de la sogs pa mchod pa thaMd kyis spring rgya mtsho dpag tu med pa/ gangs mad/ bsam gyis mi khyag gzhal du med/ tshad mang / brjod med pa/ ma 'dres pa rnams kyis
120b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub seda' rgya mtsho thang la sti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// yul thams cad bkod pa rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po can gyi nor bu'i rgyal
120b4(rgyud): po rgya mtsho spring rnams kyis na mkha'i dbyil kun du khebs par dbyin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sede'i rgya mtsho zede la sti spang du bya'o// bla ma bya'o//  mo bya'o// mchod par byas/ 
120b5(rgyud): thad kun tu snang ba'i nor bu rin po che'i char 'bab pa bkod pa'i nor bu'i rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / ring po che thang kyi 'od 'phro ba 'bar ba dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas la nges par
120b6(rgyud): gyur pa'i dbyangs kyi nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho spro/ rnams dang / kun tu spras 'gengs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos zad kyi du ngas can nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas skye
120b7(rgyud): rin po che 'od zer gyis sang+yas kyi sprul pa snang bar byed pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ma 'dres pa rnamasu bkod pa thang snang ba kun tu ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya ma
120b8(rgyud): sprin rnams dang / 'od 'phro ba smod pa sangs rgyas kyi yul zad kyi rjesu 'jug pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprod rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyos mi khyab pa rnams nga bzhi/ 
121a1(rgyud): gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang snang ba kun tu ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs zad kyi rdul la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku
121a2(rgyud): snang ba rnam par snang byed pa'i nor bu rgyal po rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams kyis/ na mkha' dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sedar rgya mtsho sprin thad la
121a3(rgyud): sti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// rin po che dang / spos dang / me tog sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa/ ma 'dras pa rgya mtsho'i sprid rnams dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal
121a4(rgyud): po kha dog mtha' yas pa thad kyis rab tu rgyan pa khang pa brtse gas pa'i rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i sgron ma dang spos kyi 'od 'phro ba can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa
121a5(rgyud): rgya mtsho'i spyan rnams dang / mu tig thad kyis rnam par spras pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog zad kyi ze ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i phreng ba maH
121a6(rgyud): yas pas legs par rgyan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis/ na mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas/ phyogs bcu kun tu 'od zer snang ba'i snying po can// 
121a7(rgyud): bzad yang dag par 'du ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho rnams dang / rin po che zad kyi rdul phra rab kyis rab tu rgyun pa bkod pa du ma kun tu ston pa khang po brtsegs pa'i rgya mtsho sprin rnams da / 
121a8(rgyud): bkod pa zad kyis rab tu rgyan pa kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sgo kun tu me tog gos rta babs dril bu'i dra ba dbyangs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyi/ 
121b1(rgyud): namakha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sed rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// gser dang / rid po
121b2(rgyud): cha sna tshogs kyi tshimatshom dang / phreng ba dang rin po che'i mgul gdub kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho spri rnams dang / me tog ltar snang ba sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi sang+ge'i rgya
121b3(rgyud): sprin rnams dang / an da rnyil dang / 'dzam+bu chu bo'i gser gyi pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi sang+ga'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che'i sprin ma'i pad+ma'i snying po cad gyi seng+ga ri khrirgya
121b4(rgyud): mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che snang gsal rgyal mtshan gyi pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi sang+ga'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po ches rgyan pa'i pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng+ga
121b5(rgyud): khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / a nad rnyil mdzes par 'bar ba'i 'od zer ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi sad+mo khri rgya mtsho sprin nam/ sa dang / 'od zer 'bar ba zad mi shes pa'i gzi
121b6(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can mi sid+d+he ri khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / ring po che 'bar ba thang 'byung ba'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng+ga'i khri rgya mtsho spri na rnams dang / rin po che 'bar ba mchog dab pa
121b7(rgyud): byung ba'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung sgra'i 'od zer dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng+ga 'i khri rgya mtsho sprin pa 'dres pa rnams kyis na mkha
121b8(rgyud): dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sedar rgya mchi thangal sti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// spos dang / nor bu sna tshogs brtsa
122a1(rgyud): / kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprid rnams dang / kun nas sgo lo ma las thal mo sbyar ba'i sprin 'byung ba'i spos kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho spring rnams dang / shing ljon pa thad kyi gzugs mthara' ya
122a2(rgyud): pa kun tu ston pa'i ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog thams cad kyi sprid rab tu 'phyang ba'i sprin shing ljod pa rgya tsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa zang byung ba'i mdzod mtha' yas dang ldan pal
122a3(rgyud): ljon pa rgya mtsho sprid rnams dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang bar byed pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / byang chub senga'i lus byed tsam na thang kyi phye ma
122a4(rgyud): kun tu ston pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang byang chub kyi snying po thabs cad kyi bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od can gyi shing ljon pa'i rin po tsha'i gos tha~Md kyi mdzod nya
122a5(rgyud): lter snang bar byas pa dang ldan pa'i shong ljon pa rgyas/ tsho spri rnams dang / sgra blangs bang sgrogs pa yid du 'ong ba'i dbyang sa ku stu gtong ba'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / tshan rdzo
122a6(rgyud): kha dog mthar yas pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi sad+ma'i khri mtsho sprod rnams dang / kun tu mngon par phyogs pa'i nai ro bu'i rgyal po snang bar byed pa'i snying po can gyi sang+ga'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 
122a7(rgyud): rgyan bkod pa zad kyi rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can gyi sed+mor khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs 'od 'phro ba'i sprod ma'i phreng ba'i snying po can gyi sang+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprid rnams dang / kunasarma
122a8(rgyud): rin po che'i shing ljon pa 'byung ba'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos dang me tog dang pad+ma zad kyi phreng ba rin po che'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sang+yas thaM ts+yai/ 
122b1(rgyud): gdan bkod pa kun tu ston pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad kyi phreng ba rab tu dpyangs pa'i rta babs stegs bus rab tu rgyan pa rin
122b2(rgyud): bo che'i sbron gyi snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che'i yal ga dang / phye ma'i mdzod yod pa'i sdong po zad kyi snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprid rnams dang / spos sna
122b3(rgyud): tshogs dang / rin po che'i dal bu g.yer ka'i dra ba kun nas rgyan pa nyid sdang bar byung ba'i snying po can gyi seng+ga'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis// na mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par bon gyis brlabs te/ 
122b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sengar rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal thad kyi gzhal mang khang rgya mtsho spyan rnams dang / 
122b5(rgyud): darnyil gyi zab can gyis me tog bkod pa zad kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos dang / nor bu thabs cad bla rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sgron pa'i
122b6(rgyud): gzugs kyi bla ra rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phral nar sten par snang ba'i dbangs can gyi nor bu'i rgyal po'i bla ra rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu sna tshogs kyi gos bkod pa
122b7(rgyud): snang ba'i kun tu sten pa'i bla ra rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog thed kyi chu bo 'bar bar snang po'i rin po che'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / dril bu sna tshogs kyi sgras kun tu rgyas par 'gengs
122b8(rgyud): pa'i dra ba bla re rgya mtsho sprid rdepas dang / pad+ma 'bar ba kha dog mtha' yas pa sna tshog su sdang ba'i ner bu'i snying po can gyi pad+ma dra ba'i bA ra rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / gser gyi za ba cad kyi 'od zas
123a1(rgyud): / ba'i rgyal mtsharan gyi bA re rgya mtsho spring rnams dang / bkod pa bsapa gyis mi khab par sdang ba'i 'od zer mtha' yas pa bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyan bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / na ma
123a2(rgyud): dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sengar gang chen mtsho sprid rgya mtsho bde la sti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// nor bu rin po che sna tshog
123a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis/ na mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs la/ rin po che bcu'i 'od zer snang ba bkod pa'i me tog gdugs rgya mtsho spring rnams dang / mu
123a4(rgyud): tig kha dog mtha' yas pa'i mdzod kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub seMde thad kyi snying rje'i sgo'i sgra'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprid rnams dang / rin po
123a5(rgyud): cha sna tshogs kyi 'od 'phro ba'i gdugs rgya po che spri rnams dang / nor bu rin po ma rdul kun tu sdang bas rab tu brgyan pa 'dil bu'i da ba dbyangs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho spring rnams dang / 
123a6(rgyud): nor bu tha~Md kyi sdong bu yal ga'i rgyan gyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nyi ma rnam par snang bar byed pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po dang / spris dang gdugs pa tha~Md kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dpa
123a7(rgyud): tsan gyi phye ma'i mdzod kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po snang bar byang pa kun tu bkod pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin ma
123a8(rgyud): pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub se de'i rgya mtsho tha~Md la sti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o//  mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// rin po cha thang snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro
123b1(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprod ma 'dres pa rnams dang / me tog gi sprid snang bar byed pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che tha~Md kyi 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi
123b2(rgyud): sprul pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thad snang bar gtogs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgo sangs rgyas kyi yul sgrogs
123b3(rgyud): pa rin po che'i yal ga'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bai DUr+ya dang rin po che'i rigs dang / nor bu rin po che'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rgyal po thad kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnam
123b4(rgyud): dang sen gyi gzugs mthar yas pa dag/ sems kyi skad cig la kun tu ston pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thaMd kyi smon laM las byung ba/ yi du 'ong
123b5(rgyud): sgra rab tu 'byin pa dang ldan pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dga'akhor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad sin 'dul ba'i dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od kyi kyil 'khor rtsa
123b6(rgyud): mtsho sprin rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub seMda'i rgya mtsho thad la sti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// nor bu thad kyi mdzod kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sang+yam
123b7(rgyud): thad kyi gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang reg bye'i 'od zer rgya mtsho spyan rnabs dang / rin po che tha~Md kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thaMd kyi chos sgrogs pa rgyas par 'grengs
123b8(rgyud): 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sa ng+yas kyi zhing bkod pathad snang bar byed pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprid rnams dang / 
124a1(rgyud): bo cha zad kyi rdul gyi 'od byer rgya batsho sprin rnams dang / bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa 'du sangs rgyas 'byung bas sed yong su smod par byed pa sgrogs pa cad gyi 'od
124a2(rgyud): rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che pi zad pa thad bstan pa dang / me tog zad kyi za ba'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / khri stan bkod pa thad kun tu ston pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin pa 'dres pa rnas
124a3(rgyud): kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshe thams cad la sti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o//  mor ba'o// mchod par bya'o// rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba kha dog mtha' yas brgya mtsho sprid pa
124a4(rgyud): 'dres pa rnams dang / kun tu 'odi kyi der bu'i rgyal po 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprid rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing rgya chen po bkod pa snang bar byed pa'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho spyod rnams
124a5(rgyud): / dang spos zad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprid rnams dang / bkod pa tha~Md kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas zad kyi sprul pa'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprid rnapas dang / rin po
124a6(rgyud): sna tshogs kyi shing gi ze ba 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / gos thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / byang chub ser mtha' yas pa'i sprod pa dbyangs cad nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od
124a7(rgyud): 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig gi sgod ma thad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sa de' gang chen mtsho'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho zad la sti stang du bya'o// 
124a8(rgyud): bla mar bya'o// ri mor ba'o// mchod par ba'o// spos dang / me tog sna tshog bad kyi rgya mtsho sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba thaMd kyi pad+ma'i da ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu
124b1(rgyud): rin po mkha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che zad kyi kha dog dang ldan pa'i mu tig gi mdzod rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che dang / spos dang / 
124b2(rgyud): kyi phye ma rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu'i rgyal po yi du 'ong zhing sdug pa mdzes pa'i dbyangs can rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nyi ma'i 'od kyi nang
124b3(rgyud): bu'i tshogs kyi phreng ba rgya mtsho sprid rnams dang / rin po che'i mdzod mtha' yas pa rgya mtsho sprid rnams dang / zad kyis kun tu bzang po'i lus ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang / 
124b4(rgyud): byang chub sedar gang ched mtsho'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho thang la sti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// zhes de lha'i bu'i smon lam btab nas/ klu'i rgyal po de dag gis yang / 
124b5(rgyud): bac+doMs la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas la rang gi stad la 'khod// de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po
124b6(rgyud): klu'i bdag po chen po par mi ldog pa'i smon lam gyi stobs can g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gabye
124b7(rgyud): lo mchod pa dang / phyag bya ba dang / banyan bkur bya ba dang / chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir 'ong so// de nas klu'i rgyal po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil lon/ 
124b8(rgyud): gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsug te/ bcos ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ bac+doMs la 'di
125a1(rgyud): // skad ces gsol to// gal te zhu ba zhus na lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das las bdag la skabs phye na/ bcos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
125a2(rgyud): sangs la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kwa'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdug
125a3(rgyud): lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i bdag po tsaM dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas nges pa de dang de'i lus bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa
125a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la kI'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjod kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bac+doMs
125a5(rgyud): ji ltar na klu thad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal zad rgyun chad pa ra 'gyur// bde ba thad dang ldan pa dang / rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ 'dza m+bu'i gling 'dir dusu char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur/ rtsa dang shing rga
125a6(rgyud): ba dang / sman dang nags tshal zad 'khrung bar 'gyur te/ 'bru thang skye bar 'gyur/ bcud thams cad yang dag par skye bar 'gyur/ gang gis 'dzi m+bu'i gling gi mi rnams bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ 
125a7(rgyud): skad ces gsol pa dang / bac+doMs kyis kwa'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to ka'i sa
125a8(rgyud): po khyod sen za de la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongasu 'di bar sems pa leg so// legaso// klu'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la zung shig sa
125b1(rgyud): ngas khyod la bshad// klu'i bdag po chos gcig dang ldan na klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal zang rgyun chad par 'gyur/ bde ba dang ldan par 'gyuraro// chos gcig po gang zhe ga/  'di lta ste/ byas
125b2(rgyud): pa'o klu'i bdag po bems pa de la gnas pa'i lha dang / mi rnams ni mes mi 'tshig/ mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ chus mi khyang / dug gis mi tshugs/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi zil byos mo nan
125b3(rgyud): bde bar ga nyid kyis log par 'gyur bde sad par 'gyur/ rang gi bsod nams kyis yongasu srung ba'i 'gyur/ bsod nams chen po'i gzi brjod kyis gza can du 'gyur lha dang bcas pa
125b4(rgyud): 'jig rten gyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang / mthong na dga' bar 'gyur/ 'gro ba thams cad du zag thogs med par 'gyur/ sdug bsngal thad rgyun chad pa dang / rab tu dga' bar 'gyu
125b5(rgyud): bde ba thang dang ldan pa dang / mi'i chos bla ma rtog sa dang / lus zhig pa'i 'og tu tshangs pa'i 'jog rten du skye bar 'gyur te/ klu'i bdag po lha dang mi'i byams pa la gnas
125b6(rgyud): pa rnams kyi phan yon ni 'di dag go// klu'i bdag po de bas na byams pa'i lus kyi las dang / byabs pa'i ngag gi las dang / byams pa'i yid kyis las kyis gnas par bya'o// klu'i la/ 
125b7(rgyud): po gzhan yang bde ba zang sbyid pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs brjod par bya ste/ des klu zad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thad rgyun gcod par byed/ bde ba thang sbyin par byed/ 'dzam+bu'i gling dus dusu char gyi rgyun
125b8(rgyud): 'bebs par byed/ rtswa dang shing gal ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / lo tog thang skye bar byed do// klu'o bdag po de la bde ba zang sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs de gang na na/ tad+ya thA/ d+ha ran d+ha/ 
126a1(rgyud): u d+ha ra ni/ saM pra tiSh+Thi tA/ bI dza ya bar+Na/ sad t+ya pra ti dz+nye sa ra hA/ dz+nyA nA ba ti/ ud da pA da ni b+hi nI mA ni/ a b+hi sha tsa nI A b+hi bya hA ra/ shu b+ha ba ti/ A dzi ma du/ e hI ku ma hA
126a2(rgyud): la ni/ bA hA ha ra k+She sha na/ d+hu nA pA bAm/ sho d+ha ya margan/ nir ka d+harma tA shud+d+ha/ lo ke bi ti mI ra rA dza sa du khA/ she ma nA sarba bud+d+ha a ba lo ka nA e d+hiSh+Tha tai/ pradz+nyA dz+nyA na ba swA hA/ klu'i bdeg po
126a3(rgyud): gzungs kyi tshig don thang sgrub par byang ba/ chos kyi sku la 'jug pa/ sa ng+yas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pas/ bde bzang sbyin pa 'di dag gzung bar bya/ brjed par bya'o// klu'i 'dag po
126a4(rgyud): gzhan yang sprid gyi rigs las 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs bkod pa gzi brjid kyi snying po sprul pa snang bar byed pa/ ye shes kyi tog gi chu'i rgyun gyi sprin gyi dkyil 'khor dpal dang
126a5(rgyud): ldan pa gser gyi 'od zer rnam par snang bar byed pa/ skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas gcig las byung ba'i rus dang / rigs kyi da bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan bzung ba
126a6(rgyud): byad yid la bya'o// de dag gis kA thad dang / klu'i rigs tha dang / klu'i rus thang dang klu'i tshe rigs zad dang / klu'i 'byung ba thud dang / klu'i skye gnas zang klu'i rgyal po tha~Md dang / klu'i zhu ma
126a7(rgyud): klu'i g.yo ga thams cad kyi klor sdug bsngal zad gcod par byed/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad sgrub par byed// kA'i bdag po de de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 
126a8(rgyud): badz+ras de bzhin gshegs pa rnar snang mdzad ming po can gyi sprin chen po la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs bklu'i rigs las byung ba sprin gyi rnam par mdzes pa la
126b1(rgyud): phyag 'tsha'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi chu 'dzin la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan sprin gyi gzi brjid la phyag 'tsha'o// bac+doMs
126b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'byung la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i sprin la phyag 'tsha'o// bac+doMs de ban
126b3(rgyud): gshegs pa na mkha' dpag med la phyag 'ba'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po'i glog 'bar ba'i tshogs la phyag 'tsha'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs bsgri
126b4(rgyud): chen mthu rtsal dpa' bo la phyag 'tsha'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprid mdzes la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin sdug chen po la
126b5(rgyud): phyag 'tsha'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la phyag 'tsha'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhi na gshegs pa sprin gyi 'od la phyag 'tsha'o// 
126b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen seng+ga la phyag 'tsha'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spron tshad gdugs la phyag 'tsha'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blta sdug sprin chen
126b7(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen pos khebs pa la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin las byung ba snang bar byed pa'i dkyil 'kho
126b8(rgyud): phyogs bcu mtho 'gabs rnga'i sgra dbyangs shin tu rab sgrogs la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin las byung ba snang bar tshan gsol byung mi dga' rab 'jom smra
127a1(rgyud): / sgrogs la phyag 'tsha'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen gda' la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gaSh+mi chu sprin la phyag 'tshalo// 
127a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rtsal gyi sprin ltar dpa' bo la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brag sgra bsgrags pa la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin
127a3(rgyud): kun tu ston la phyag 'tshalo// bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa sprin rgya chen po la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin 'dzag la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gabye
127a4(rgyud): ba sprin ltar rdar sgrogs la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprir lhar 'phags la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin lta bu'i na bza' ba nabs pa
127a5(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyis lo tog bskyed la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi gnas la gnas
127a6(rgyud): pa la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa char sprin gyi sprin la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin 'dra bar mdzad la phyag 'tshalo// bac+doMs de bzhi
127a7(rgyud): gshegs pa sprin rnam par rgyal la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen ud pa la la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen spos kyi
127a8(rgyud): sku la phyag 'tshalo// bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'phags la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// bac+doMs de bzhin gabye
127b1(rgyud): pa sprid ched 'od mdzad la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen byin la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor rin po che chen po'i sprin la
127b2(rgyud): bu la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ltar rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi chu ba la phyag 'tsha'o// 
127b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang lce 'babs pa rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal
127b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po ltar na mkha' mthon nas bsgrags pa la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan la des de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen sgra 'byin la
127b5(rgyud): phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chan char chu skyes la phag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga/ shags pa bsnyems pa'i gzi brjid sgrub pa'i sprin la
127b6(rgyud): phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ro bro ba dag dang ldan pa'i cha chen po'i sprin la phyag 'tshalo// bcos de bzhin gshegs pa chu thor sprin ched la phyag 'tshalo// bac+doMs de bzhi
