127b7(rgyud): gshegs pa sprin chen rgya mtsho 'gengs la phyag 'tshal// bco ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pa char mi 'bab pa na sprin gyos kun tu 'gebs la phyag 'tsha'o// badzes de bzhin gshegs
127b8(rgyud): pa sprin gzugs mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin chad yad der sgrub pa/ 'dzam bu'i gling
128a1(rgyud): // gyi dpal gyi gzi brjid 'od mdzad pa sprin gyi 'od zer can rnams la phyag 'tshalo// klu'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag brjod pas/ klu zad kyi sdug bsngal
128a2(rgyud): rgyun 'chad pa dang / bde ba zad dang ldan pa dang / 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus dusu char pa'i rgyun 'bab pa dang / rtsa dang / shing gal ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / lo tog thaMng bskyed par byed// de nas
128a3(rgyud): bac+doMs la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po gsol ba btab pa/ #
128a4(rgyud): slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char mi 'bab pa'i tshe/ gang dag brjod na char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par bgyid pa dang / mi bzad pa'i dus kyi tsha/ gnod pa 'byung ba'i dus
128a5(rgyud): kyi tshe dang / chos ma lags pas/ skye bo 'thab pa'i dus kyi tshe/ gang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe dang / nad dang 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe dang / skar ma ma rung
128a6(rgyud): pa gnas pa'i dus kyi tshe/ yams kyi nad dang / 'tsha bo dang / gnod pa thaMd rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ nga lta bu'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams bsha du gsol/ sangs rgyas kyi byin
128a7(rgyud): gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par gsol// gang dag klu tha~Md la yang dag par skul ma 'debs par 'gyur ba dang / lha thang rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / bdud tha~Mng rnar 'joms pa
128a8(rgyud): 'gyur pa dang / sen tha~Md kyi 'jigs pa zad 'dzegs par 'gyur ba dang / gnod pa zang bzlog par 'gyur ba dang / bde lag su 'gyur bar bgyid pa dang / rgyu skar ma rungs pas 'gyod pa rab tu
128b1(rgyud): zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis char pa'i bar chad lnga gsungs pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad sel bar 'gyur ba dang / 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char pa'i rgyun legs par
128b2(rgyud): par 'gyur pa de lta bu'i gzungs kyi sngags gzhi rnams/ bcom ldan 'das mchog tu thugs rje dang ldan pa/ sems can thaMd la phan par thugs brtse ba dang ldan pas bshad gsol/ bac+doMs
128b3(rgyud): bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'tsha'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi klu'i rgyal po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdus
128b4(rgyud): lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i bdag po khyod sen thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ nga ba zhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa le
128b5(rgyud): lag so// klu'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / snying rje chen po las byung ba 'brug chen po'i sgra can ba gyings pa/ dpa' ba'i tog ces bya ba'i gzungs san
128b6(rgyud): thad kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thad kyis gsungs pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa rje su yi rang ba bshad par bya ste/ de ni char med pa'i tshe char 'bab par byed cher ches na gcod/ 
128b7(rgyud): ba'i gnod pa rab tu zhi bar byed/ klu thaMng bskul bar byed/ lha zang sim par byed/ bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed/ sen thang bde ba thang dang ldan par bye'o// tad+ya thA/ ma hA dz+nyA na/ a ba b+hA sa~M ni
128b8(rgyud): shI ti dza la gasmai Di tsa ba kr-i mA/ badz+ra saM hA tan/ pa ra ma bi ra dza/ nirma la gu Na ka tu sUr+ya pra b+he/ bi ma laM ga yaSh+Ti/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ du dum bu/ san ha na/ ma hA pre b+he bi d+hA ta ma ma ha maM
129a1(rgyud): // d+ha kA re/ pradz+nyA gra shud d+he/ pa ri pU ra Na mi tra/ mai tri bI ra man sman d+ha/ mai tI ma bud+ha re/ dza la dz+wa la/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ dza la bu d+ha re/ bo d+h+yang ga ku su me/ da sha ba le/ tsa tur du be shA ra d+ye/ 
129a2(rgyud): an+ta da sha a bc-ig bud+d+ha d+hi shu bya mchi pu N+ya rAka/ shruk+Sha d+ha rmas ma nI shigs b+hai re bor rje// ba ma 'o// 'ge 'bru ba / ni ra pra b+ha d+ha rmA/ sarba la~M kadz+ye lA/ dz+reShA bar pra ba de/ a nuH
129a3(rgyud): a sang ge/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ shAn ta ma te/ shAn ta pA pe/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsau ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ pa ra ma bud+d+he nu mA taM/ ma hA pradz+nyA pA ra mi te swA hA// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa
129a4(rgyud): snang mdzad ye shes rgya mtsho dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md la phyag 'tsha'o// de nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char dbab pa'i phyir kA thad kyi snying po
129a5(rgyud): brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub so dang thams cad kyi bden pas char pa'i chad byed pa lnga bsal ra bya'o// s+yAd ya the dan/ sa ra sa ri/ sau ri sa ri/ su ru su ru/ 
129a6(rgyud): nA gA nAn/ dza ba dza ga/ dzi bi dzaM gi dzu bu dz+re bu/ klu chen po dag tshur shog/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling la ding char rab tu phob shig/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ k+ShiM
129a7(rgyud): bdeg po chen po dag tshur shog/ kye klu chen po dag/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pas/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig/ ba ra ba ra/ bi ri bi ri/ bu ru bu ru/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pas/ klu
129a8(rgyud): thad dgug par bya'o// byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / btang snyoms kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md kyi byin gyis brlasan
129b1(rgyud): bden pa dang / bsam pa chen pos/ klu'i bdag po chen po dag tshur shog/ sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon rnams dran par gyis shig/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ 
129b2(rgyud): b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ chu chen po'i chu dang / sprin gyi chu 'chang ba can lag gis 'gro chen po'i g.yog rnams byams pa'i sems kyi tshur sheg/ ston pa'i bstan pa dam pa ngan par gyis shig/ 
129b3(rgyud): g+ha Da g+ha Ta/ g+hi Di g+ho Ti/ g+h+r-i Ta g+hu Ta/ dge shul can khro ba shugs chen po dang ldan pa/ dug chen po'i lha 'byin pa rnams byabs pa'i sems dang ldan pas tshur shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa za
129b4(rgyud): kyi bden pas/ 'dza m+bu'i gling 'dir char pheb shig/ swAhA/ ta Ta ta Ta/ ti Da ti DI/ tu Tu tu Tu/ nor bu rin po che'i cod thogs pa dang ldan pa/ sbrul bdug pa'i gzugs can rnams/ 
129b5(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum gyi byin gyis brlabs dran pa ra gyis la/ rdo rje 'chang gi bden pas/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char po bshig swA hA/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ chu chen po
129b6(rgyud): la gnas pa dang ldan pa/ sprin chen po'i brtsegs pa'i banon pa la zhon nas/ mngon par 'gro ba rnams chur shog/ byams pa'i sems kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char gyi rgyun thong shig/ 
129b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i bden pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ lag na rdo rjes bgo ga ra la ra la/ ri li ri li/ ru lu ru lu/ lag gi 'gro tha~Md ma khyed rnams gnyid med
129b8(rgyud): par dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bden pas/ g+ha ma g+ha ma/ g+hi mi g+hi mi/ g+hu mu g+hA mu/ swA hA/ klu thams cad dgugo// byams pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems sngon du 'gro bas/ 
130a1(rgyud): na ra na ra/ ni ri ni ri/ nu ru nu ru swA hA/ yon po sna tshogasu gyur pa mgo stong pa/ mgo dang / mig dmar pa/ stobs che ba'i lho chen po rnams dgug par bya'o// kye kye lag gis
130a2(rgyud): 'ge chen po dag mchog tu thugs rje can/ bsod nams thams cad gzi brjid kyis brjid pa nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs pa dran par gyis
130a3(rgyud): shig ga ra ga Da/ gi Di gi Di gu D+ha guny+tsa swAhA/ stobs dang / pha rol gnod pa dang / gzi brjid thog pa med pa dang ldan pa dag gis/ 'dza mA'i gling 'dir char gyi rgyun rnams phob shig/ shar sha
130a4(rgyud): shi ri shi ri/ shu ru shu ru sAhA/ kye kye klu chen po rnams rang rang gi rigs dang / tshe rig dran par gyis la/ ma shol bar lha tha~Md kyi bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir char
130a5(rgyud): gyi rgyun pob shig sAH/ tshangs pa'i bden pa'i byin gyis ba rlabs kyis/ 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swAhA/ brgya byin gyis bdan pas 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir char
130a6(rgyud): tu pheb shig swA hA// rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bden pas/ 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ klu chen po dag brgyad pa'i bden pas/ 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swAhA/ 
130a7(rgyud): klu chen po dag rgyun tu zhugs pa'i bden pas/ 'dzam+bu'i gling du char rab tu phob shig swAhA/ klu chen po dag len cig phyir 'ongs pa'i bden pas/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig smras
130a8(rgyud): klu chen po dag phyir mi 'ong ba'i bden pas/ 'dzam+bu'i'o gling 'dir char rab tu bobashig swAhA/ klu chen po dag dgra bcom pa'i bden pas/ 'dza pA'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig sAhA/ 
130b1(rgyud): klu chen po dag rang sangs rgyas kyi bden pas/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu bob shig swA hA/ klu chen po dag sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sed thad kyis bden pas/ 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir char
130b2(rgyud): rab tu pob shig/ sbya/ klu chen po dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pa dang byin gyis brlabs kyis/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig snad/ lha zad kyis bden pas gnod pa zang
130b3(rgyud): zhi bar gyis shig swA hA/ klu thad kyis bden pas sa chen po 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ gnod sbyin thams cad kyis bden pas sems can zad bsrungs shig swAhA/ di za tha~Md kyi bden pas mi rnam
130b4(rgyud): kyi 'khrug pa dang / gnod pa thams cad sol cig swA hA/ lA ma yin thams cad kyi bden pas rgyu skar ma rungs pa zang rnam par bzlog shig swA hA// na mkha' lding zad kyi bden pas
130b5(rgyud): klu thams cad byams par byos la/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir cha ra chen po'i rgyun pos shig swA hA/ mi 'am ci'i thams cad kyi bden pas sdig pa thad zhi bar gyis shig snang // seMn thang ni
130b6(rgyud): bar gyis shig spyad/ lto 'ab chen po thaMd kyi bden pas/ yangs shing rgya che ba'i char gyi rgyun pob shig swA hA/ 'dir char la sgrib pa lnga po yang dag par zung shig swA hA/ mi thad kyis bdan pas/ mi
130b7(rgyud): la yongasu bsrungs shig s+t+raihA/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ da ra da ra/ di ri di ri/ du ru du ru/ na tan ta/ ne Te ni Ti nu Tu nu Tu/ shin tu 'gyogs mar bzhud ma/ sprin chen po'i chu 'dzin ma/ sprin ldan
130b8(rgyud): ma sprin chen ldan pa/ sprin chen chu 'dzin pa/ sprin gsal ma// sprin 'byung ma/ dus sprid mi/ sprin gyi 'byung gnas ma/ sprin sgregs ma/ sprer bzhugs ma/ sprin gyi cod pan ldan ma/ sprin gyi phreng bam
131a1(rgyud): / sprin gyi rnam par rgyan la/ sprid bcibs pa/ sbrid la gnas bcas ma/ sprin gyi snying po// sprin gyi ral pa can/ sprin 'od ma/ sprin gyi 'khor ldan ma/ rgya chen sprin bzhugs pa// mchod par
131a2(rgyud): thogs ma/ lo tog 'ongs sgrub ma/ ri sul na bzhugs ma/ klu'i yul bcom ldan 'das ma/ sprin tshan dpal ldan dkar mdog can/ bsil rag ma/ chub ma chen mo spyod yul ma/ klu cher rnam par rol
131a3(rgyud): mdzad pa/ bac+doMs ma bon tra bcud kyi len dag 'dzin ma// sangs rgyas kyis bden pas 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu dba' du gsol swAhA/ g+ha ra g+ha re/ g+hi ri g+ha ri/ g+hu ru g+hu ru/ g+hi ri Ni g+hi ri Ni/ b+h+ra ma
131a4(rgyud): g+hu ma g+hu ma/ g+hu ma g+hu ma g+hu mi g+ha ma/ g+ha ma g+ha ma g+hu ma ri/ dbu dgu dang ldan ma/ sprin chen phreng ldan ma/ glog tshogs phreng ldan ma/ lag gi 'gro thang 'dzin/ sprin lta bu'i na bza' ba nabs ma/ dug dag po tha~Md
131a5(rgyud): spyod yul ma/ sprin bkod pa la bcibs me// 'breg sgrog ma/ sgra sgra ga ma/ klu tshogs la bskul ma/ lha mo sprin chen phreng ldan ma kluHmas cad la ma shol bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyi
131a6(rgyud): gyis brlabs kyis 'dza pA'i gling 'dir char phob shig ces bskul du gsol swA t+ma/ ya ra ya ra/ yai ri yi ri/ yu ru yu ru/ dza ra dza ra/ dzi ri dzi ri/ dzu ru dzu ru/ dz+ha ra d+hA ra/ gu Tu gu Ta/ gu gu nu/ ma Da ga
131a7(rgyud): Da/ gi Di gi Di / ha ra ha ra/ hi lo tsa lo/ mu lu mu lu/ ta la ta la/ ti lo ti li/ tu lu tu lu/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ mar dmar da/ pra mar+tha/ pra bar sha dzag+na nAn/ mai traM yadz+nyA pa ya ti s+t+ra
131a8(rgyud): prad+d+ha bud+d+he/ bud+d+ha/ su bud+d+he/ ha ra pA baH/ sarba sAtra nAn/ a d+hi sha ya pa N+ya/ sarba bud+d+hA nAn d+ha da Ni d+ha re/ shu b+ha mA te/ gu NA gra bA b+haH/ mahA dz+nyA no/ la ge/ shu k+Shad+ha me sa t+ya ba ti dz+nye/ ma hA ya ne d+huSh+Ti taH/ 
131b1(rgyud): ka dz+ye b+ha ga ba ti/ bud+d+ha mai tri A pU rA ya sarba k+She trA NI/ shukle shwe tA ma/ ba ra d+ha / pan tar ba si ni/ d+hu d+hu re/ d+hu d+hu ru/ sha ma sha ma/ shAn tam sa/ char gyi bgegs thams cad rnam bar gas la bang gso
131b2(rgyud): swAhA/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyis bden pas byams pa'i thugs kyis yang dag par brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub kyi thugs skyod med pas klu chen po rnams la yang dag par bsku
131b3(rgyud): kwa'i rgyal po chen po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la yang dag par bsku'o// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig ste
131b4(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo la yang dag par bsku'o// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swAhA/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la yang dag par bsku'o// 'dzam+bu'i gIng
131b5(rgyud): char rab tu phob shig spyang / klu'i rgyal po madros pa la yang dge ba ra bsku'o// 'dzim+bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ klu'i rgya la po gzi can la yang dag par bsku'o// 'adz+ra pA'i
131b6(rgyud): 'di cer rab tu phob shig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po'i chu lha la yang dag par bskulo// 'dzam+ba'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swAhA/ k+Sha'o rgyal po 'jog po la yang dag par bsku'o// 'dzam bu'i glong
131b7(rgyud): 'dir char rab tu phob shig swAhA k+Sha'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung la yang dge par bsku lo// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu pib shig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu le yang dag par bsku'o/ 
131b8(rgyud): 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir cha rab tu pob shig s+yAhA// klu'i rgyal po btang bzung la yang dag par bskul// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu pi'i shig swAhA// kA'i rgyal pos srung gi bu la yang dge
132a1(rgyud): / par bsku'o// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu ngob shig swAH// klu'i rgyal po nu ta la yang dag par bsku'o// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig spyang // klu'i rgyal po dpal
132a2(rgyud): gyi gzi brjid la yang dag par bsku'o// 'dza pU'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po dpal bzang la yang dag par bsku'o// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu ngob shig sna
132a3(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po klo gi phreng ba la yang dge par bsku'o// 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swAhA/ klu'i rgyal po gtsug na nor bu chen po yang dag par bsku'o// 'dza pU'i gling 'dor char ra
132a4(rgyud): pheb shig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po gtsug na nor bu thogs pa la yang dag par bsku'o// 'dzam bu'i gling char rab tu phob shig swAhA/ klu'i rgyal po snang ldan gtsug pud can la yang dag par bskul
132a5(rgyud): 'dzam bu ri nga 'di char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ de dag la sogs pa kA'i rgyal po thang la yang dag par bsku'o// 'dza p+lu 'i gling 'dir char rab tu bob shig swAhA/ na ge na
132a6(rgyud): ma hA na ge/ g+ho re mA na se/ nA ga hr-i da ya/ d+hu mA ku le u gra ro She/ pra tsan da ti dzi/ bi 'o ga/ a ShI bi shi a hi go ra/ kri She bing ga le/ tsany+tsa la/ lo la dzi ha/ ma hA pa na ka raM/ kA la pA shai/ r-i tra bA sa
132a7(rgyud): ni/ Tu Tu pA gaM g+ha Na g+ha Na/ shi ki nI/ ka na ka na/ ga Na ga Na/ ma hA ga Na gA Ne/ pa ra pa ra/ pi ri pi ri/ pu ru pu ru/ bi s+phurdza ne/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ ma hA b+ho ge/ ma Ni da re/ pha ri pi ri/ phu ru phu ru/ 
132a8(rgyud): phar/ badz+ra b.rA dz+wa la m+bu d+ha ri/ sha s+phu stsu pa / tu num me/ d+hu ng+ku/ dz+ye d+hu pa le/ ma~M g+ha pra b+he ma g+ha ba hIne/ d+ha ka d+ha kar+d+ha ka d+hI mA gau wA na~M g+ha nA/ sha~M kan/ ka na ka na/ ga Na ga Na/ ma snganA gag
132b1(rgyud): ni ratrad+d+ha/ ba dza raH ka ri ma hA nA dId ye/ g+hu ma g+hu ma/ g+hu ra pA ya ti ka/ dzaM ga ri b+hu dzaM ga me/ bi ka Ta saM ka Te/ go ra bipUrdza ni 'adz+raHNe/ glu tha~Md dgugo// sangs rgyas thad kyi byin gyis brlabs
132b2(rgyud): dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pa dang / byams pa'i thugs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swAhA/ na maHsarba bud+d+he b+h+yaHsid+d+han+t+ra man+ta/ ba da ni swAhA/ 
132b3(rgyud): 'phags pa sprin chen po thag pa'i chen po'i mdo stong phrag brgya pa las char dbab pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i le'u ste dag cu rtsa bzhi'o// // cho ga ni cher chen dbab par 'dod na/ bla
132b4(rgyud): gab med pa'i sa phyogs gtsang bar bla ra sngon po pra/ ba dan sngon po dung // chos smra ba lus bkrus la/ yan lag brgyad la nye bar gnas shing / gos gtsang ma sngon po bsgom
132b5(rgyud): la spos dri zhib pos bskus nas/ zas dkar gsum zos la/ stan sngon po'i steng du 'dug na/ kha shar phyogasu blta ste/ de ba zhin gshegs pa thaMd la gsol ba btab nas/ sprin
132b6(rgyud): chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u 'di nyid mtshan rgyun mi 'chad par bklags par bya'o// chu sngon pos bkang ba'i bub pa gang ba bzhi bzhag par bya'o// gtong ma dang / 'dug pa dang / me tog ci nus
132b7(rgyud): kyi sbya'o// de la chos smra bas/ phyogs bzhir ba'i lci ba'i khu bas bri bar bya ste/ shar phyogasu khru gsum tsam du/ klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa/ klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa/ 
132b8(rgyud): ba'i lci bas bri bar bya'o// lho phyogasu khru lnga tsam du klu'i rgyal po mgo lnga pa/ klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas 'bri bar bya'o// nub phyogasu khru bdun tsam du/ klu'i rgyal po mgo
133a1(rgyud): / bdun pa/ klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pabri bar bya'o// byang phyog su khru dgu tsam du/ klu'i rgyal po mgo dgu pa/ klu'i g.yon 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa bris
133a2(rgyud): bya'o// chos smra bas rang gi lus bsrungs la/ byams pa la gnas te/ sems can zad la snying rje'i sems nye bar gzhag nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sengar thad la gsol ba btab na kA
133a3(rgyud): rnams dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bgo bar bya ste/ 'di ni che ga'o// gang zhig char mi 'bab pa'i tshe/ sprin chen po'i klung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u 'di klog na/ nyon zhag cig gam gnyis nas nyin
133a4(rgyud): zhag bdun tshun cad// gdod mi za bar char 'bab par 'gyuraro// rgya mtsho ni dus las yol yang srid kyi thub pa chen po 'i gsung ra' char gyi cho ga 'di ni gzhan du mi 'gyur// de lta
133a5(rgyud): mod kyi tshul khrims dang / yon la gnas te/ 'tsha la ba'i tshul khrims dang / sha dang nyal sogs pa yongasu spang bar bya'o// 'o thug dang zho dpe'o ma dang / 'bras can bu ram can
133a6(rgyud): la sogs pa dang / mngar gsum za zhing bklag par bya'o// de ltar na 'grub par 'gyur te/ thub pa'i rgyal pos gsung ba bzhin du the tshom med par bya'o// 'phags pa sprin chen po theg
133a7(rgyud): chen po'i mdo las char dbab pa/ klud kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u zhes bya ba drug bcu rtsa bzhi pa cho ga dang bcas pa rdzogaso// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mai tra dang / shi lan dra
133a8(rgyud): d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba bad+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gas tshad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar gdu/ ar+ya ma hA me g+ha bA tra maN+Da kha~M saM rbanA ga r+tha
133b1(rgyud): nga yan nA pa ma hA yA sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sprid chen po rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le luk+Sha zad kyi snying po zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen por med// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub med bad la
133b2(rgyud): 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen po na/ nor bu rin po che'i rtse mo can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa na/ klu stong du tshang ba'i klu tshogs chen po// klu tha
133b3(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul che zhing / klu'i rgyal po 'khor chen po dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / kwa'i rgyal po nya dga' bo dang / kA'i rgyal po yang dag skul dang / klu'i rgyal po klog phreng
133b4(rgyud): can dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can dang / kA'i rgyal po gzi can chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po btang gzung dang / klu'i rgyal po dung dang / klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab dang / klu'i rgyal po mtshams 'tha
133b5(rgyud): dang / klu'i rgyal po stobs kyi rgyu dang / klu'i rgyal po kA ga 'byung dang / klu'i rgyal po snang ldan gtsug pud can dang / klu'i rgyal po sprin chen rnam par 'phrul dang / klu'i rgyal po sprin
133b6(rgyud): rgyas byed dang / klu'i rgyal po 'brag sgrogs dang / klu'i rgyal po char 'byung dang / kA'i rgyal skar mda' gtang dang / klu'i rgyal po dus min sgrogs dang / klu'i rgyal po 'brug skad dang / klu'i rgyal po glog
133b7(rgyud): rab tu gtong dang / klu'i rgyal pos 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po sog ma med dang / klu'i rgyal po lags mthong dang / klu'i rgyal po rnam par snang dang / klu'i rgyal po 'brug chen sgregs dang / klu'i rgyal
133b8(rgyud): po 'od chen lam dang / kwa'i rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang / klu'i rgyal po mdangos bu dang / kA'i rgyal po dpal 'dzin dang / kI'i rgyal po rnga s+tha dang / kA'i rgyal
134a1(rgyud): // rnga sgra rnam par sgrog pa'i skad dang klu'i rgyal po zla ba dang / klu'i rgyal po 'dran byed dang / klu'i rgyal po dpal mgrin dang / klu'i rgyal po dpal bzang dang / klu'i rgyal po sha sho sgra chen da
134a2(rgyud): kwa'i rgyal po ding dang sgra dang / kA'i rgyal po rab 'dzem dang / kA'i rgyal po char 'byung dang / klu'i rgyal po rlung chen rnam par 'phral dang / kIr rgyal po rlung rab tu gtong dang / klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang
134a3(rgyud): k+ShiMri rgyal po dang ldan dang / klu'i rgyal po smad dkris bzang dang / klo rgyal po bkra shis dang / klu'i rgyal po sprin rgyas dang / klu'i rgyal po sprin gyis dga' byad dang / kA'i rgyal po sprin gyis 'gabs
134a4(rgyud): pa'i rigs dang / klu'i rgyal po legs par 'gebs dang / klu'i rgyal po rnang rtsa dang / kA ro rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po 'od bzang dang / klu'i rgyal
134a5(rgyud): mthong dga' dang / kla'i rgyal po don yod dga' dang / kwa'i rgyal po sprin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi legs par 'gebs dang / klu'i rgyal po gzhan gyi mi thub dang / k+Sha'i rgyal po spyan las chu
134a6(rgyud): 'byin dang / klu'i rgyal po bad mthong dang / kwa'i rgyal po klung 'byung dang / klu'i rgyal rgyal po 'khrug par byed dang / klu'i rgyal ba gtsug na nor bu dang / kla rgyal po chen po de dag dang / gzhan yang kI
134a7(rgyud): rgyal po stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhags te/ de dag zed kyang kA'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / klu'i rgyal por 'phrul pa chen pos/ na mkha' la di ri do ra sgrogs shing / rdzi char chen po rab tu
134a8(rgyud): te/ bac+doMs la srid zhu bya ba dang / chos nyen pa'i lhagaso// kye klu chen po dag/ klu dag tshur sheg/ mu lu mu lu/ tsa ta tsa ta/ pa Ta ba Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta swA hA/ glog 'bar ba rab tu byung zhing rdzi chen po'i rgyun
134b1(rgyud): zong la char pob shig/ kye kye klu chen po bdag/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa dran par gyis shig/ kye klu chen po dag chur shog tshur shog// 'dzam+bu'i gling
134b2(rgyud): char rab tu bob shig/ g+hu Tu g+hu Du mun+d+hA/ ha~M hi hi hi/ tsun+da tsur+ya/ ma hA na ga hr-i da ya/ sarba rA gA nA~M A kAn+d+he seny+tso da ya/ sha~M grAn+da ra swAhA/ sprin chen po rnor 'phrul bai ri rgyan bkod pa dag/ gser rna mas
134b3(rgyud): kyi mtha' rin po che thadi tshon gyi lnga lding mdzes pa mu tig gi rgyan phreng rab tu 'byung ba/ rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag dang / lha'i rin po ches mdzes par byas pa'i gzhal khang be tog rab tu
134b4(rgyud): ba rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag gi na mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis rlobs la/ rin po che'i sprid rab tu 'phyang zhing / lha'i ras bcos pa mang po mu tig gi rgyan phreng rgya mtsho chen po'i
134b5(rgyud): sprin dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phral pa zab mo sna tshogs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sgra sgrogs pa rgya mtsho'i sI na ngag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon gyi rgya
134b6(rgyud): bkod pa bsamagyis mi khyab pa rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston pa'i ring po che bkod pa chen po'i rgya mtsho'i sprin dag gis// na mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis rlob ma/ smra
134b7(rgyud): chen po rnam par 'phral pa'i sgra sgrogs pa rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi lha'i bla re'i dril bu'i sgra snyad pa sgrogs pa rgya mtsho'i sprin rngabs dang / bya'i tshogs zad skad 'dzin
134b8(rgyud): cing me tog gi char chen po rab tu 'babs pa rgya mtsho chen po'i sprid dag dang / rgya mtsho sprod ched po sgra cher sgrogs shing / lha'i rin po che rab tu 'phyang la/ mu tig gi lnga lnga rnam pa sna tshogs rab
135a1(rgyud): tu 'phyabyung ba rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang / gser skad kyis rgyan pa'i sdang ba chen po can gyis rtse mos na mkha'i kun tu khebs par byed pa rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi
135a2(rgyud): phreng ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis na mkhar kun tu khebs par byed pa la mkhas pa rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang / sdang ba chen pa'i rgya mtsho chen po'i sgras kun tu khebs pa'i rgya chen po'i sprin dag gis
135a3(rgyud): namakha' mngon par khebs par gyis shig/ klu dang klu'i rgyal po thams cad chur shog/ sa'i steng 'dir 'brug sgra sgrogs shing char phob shig/ char rab tu phob shig/ char kum+b+ha rab tu phob shig/ pa
135a4(rgyud): sgrogs shig/ klog chen po snang ba rab tu phyung shig/ 'dra shing kun tu 'dal teg yang dar dir zhing 'dug ste/ klu'i skad chen po yid du 'ongs pa'i sgra chen po 'byin cing dbyangs chen po rab tu sgrogs
135a5(rgyud): bi dag 'dzam bu'i gling du char rab tu pho'i shig/ g+ha Da g+ne Da/ ts+tsha Di g+h+r-i ki hu Tu huT+Ta/ g+hu Tu g+hu Tu/ laT ga Ta/ g+hi Te g+hi Ti/ ma Ta ma TaM/ tsa Ta tsaT/ pa Ta baT/ kr-i kya klu dang klu chen po dag chu
135a6(rgyud): tshwar tshwar shog/ tshur shog/ d+hA d+ha/ drA drA/ hA hA ha hA/ hA hAM/ hUM hUM/ 'brug chen po sgeg shing / rlung chen po rab tu gtong ba dag sangs rgyas kyi bden pas/ 'dzam+ba gling 'dir char rab tu pob shig/ swAhA/ kya kye
135a7(rgyud): klu dang klu'i rgyal po dag/ klu thad la yang dag par bskul gyis/ 'dzam bu'i gling du char phob shig/ g+hu Tu g+hu Tu/ phaT phaT/ hA hA/ ha he/ klu chen po dag 'dus shig// sa'i stang du char rab tu po'i shig/ g+hu ru g+hu
135a8(rgyud): ki ri ki tsi/ tsi ri tsi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ di ri di ri/ ki wi ki li zhing zad yongasu gang bar gyis shig/ 'bru dang shing ljon pa dang / tsA dang / shing gel ba dang / sman thad rab tu skye bar gyis shig/ byams par
135b1(rgyud): kyis chur shog/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang / lag na rdo rje'i bden pa dang / klu thams cad kyi bden pas klu chen po dag tshur sheg chung sheg swA hA/ 
135b2(rgyud): rgyal po mdongs bu la yang dag par bsku'o// sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swAhA/ kA'i rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid la yang dag par bsku'o// chos kyi
135b3(rgyud): pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu pho bai shig swA hA/ kA'i rgyal po mtha' yas la yang dag par bsku'o// dge 'dun gyis bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swAhU~M/ klu'i rgyal po
135b4(rgyud): nor rgyas kyi bu la yang dag par bsku'o// lag na rdo rje'i bden pa sa 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu pob shig swAhA/ k+Sha'i rgyal bo 'jog po la yang dag par bsku'o// tshangs pI
135b5(rgyud): bas 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shi swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po dpal ma yin la yang dag par bsku'o// dbang po'i bden pas 'am bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu po'i shig swAhA/ 
135b6(rgyud): rgyal pos srang gi bu la yang dag par bskalo// khyab 'jug gi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu ngo bo shib swA hA/ kA'i rgyal po phreng ba can la yang dag par bsku'o// drag po'i bden pas 'jam
135b7(rgyud): bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ k+Sha'i rgyal po gzi can la yang dag par bsku'o// drang srong gi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ k+She'i rgyal po skag 'bros byed la
135b8(rgyud): yang dag par bsku'o// lha'i bden pas 'dzem bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shog swA hA/ k+Sha'i rgyal po gzi can chen po la yang dag par bsku'o// klu thad kyi bden pas 'ja mU'i gling 'dir char rab tu
136a1(rgyud): // phob shig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po rab 'joms la yang dag par bskul// gnod sbyin gyis bden pas 'dzar bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ kA'i rgyal po ma dos pa la yang dag
136a2(rgyud): bsku'o// srin po'i bded pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab po ba shig sA hA/ k+Sha gong mthang kyi bdan pas char rab tu phob shig char pob shig/ ma 'phyo bar tshur shig zhung shig kye kyo chen po dag glu
136a3(rgyud): kyi snying po la yang dag par bsku'o// kun nas dang // sa ra sa ra/ hA hA/ d+hu ma d+hu mai/ hA hA hA hA/ hi hiM hi hi/ e h+ye ha/ tha tha tha/ tsa tsa tsa ra ta/ zhing thad kun gar bar gyis shig/ 'bru thad kyi cher po bshig
136a4(rgyud): chen po rab tu thong shig/ dr-i d+hi/ g+hu g+h+r-i/ bI hUM/ Ta Ta Ta ni bA ra Ni/ sa~M b+hi ni/ mo hI ni/ dzA gU li puk+ka sa~M/ pra h+ma rbe/ ma ta gi dza ye ba~M dza ye/ hA hA swAhA/ de bzhin gsheg pa sprin chen snying po dpal gyi gci
136a5(rgyud): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin tshe ni rab 'joms dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin 'byung dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen snying po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen kun tu
136a6(rgyud): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug chen sgrogs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen rgyas mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug tshan rnar sgrogs pa'i sgra'i rgyal po dang / de bzhi dag bye pa sprin
136a7(rgyud): 'dzir mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen srung dang / de bzhin gsher ba sprin chen rnga smra dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug chen sgra dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen dpal gyi gzi brjid
136a8(rgyud): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen dbyangs snyan dang / de bzhin gsher pa sprin chen skar ma'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprid chen chub pa'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshaM Da pa sprin chen shin+d+ha brtam
136b1(rgyud): por rgyal po dang de bzhin gshegs pa sprin brtan pas dga' bar mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'ur 'ur sgra dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'jigs pas 'jigs mdzad
136b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa sprid chen thog tog rab 'babs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen rnam par 'phral ba'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin bkra shis kyi ched dang sangs rgyas pa
136b3(rgyud): kyi byin gyis rlabs dang / byang chub seMda' thad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen snying po tha~Md la yang dag par bsku'o// dkon mchog gsuM gyi bka' lung gis/ myur du shes
136b4(rgyud): sheg kyi kye klu dang / k+Sha chen po dag tshul sheg/ tshur shag/ hu lu hu lu/ su ru su ru/ d+ha ba d+ha ga/ g+ha ra g+ha ra/ b+hu ru b+hU ru/ ma 'chi bar sangs rgyas kyi bden pas tshur sheg/ chos kyi bad
136b5(rgyud): pas tshur sheg/ dge 'dun gyis bdeni pas chur shag/ k+Sha thing dang / kA chen po gang mgong mngag gis bden pas// 'dzam bu gling 'dir char phob shig/ a la la zhes gar byed cing / a lA la zhes
136b6(rgyud): klu len pa dang / a la le zhes gA ri rdor 'phrul pa chen po byed cing 'dul/ char gyi rgyun chen po 'bebs shing / klu chen po rnams kyi chos kyi sgra yid du 'ong ba ston pa dag/ gu lu gu lu/ rA ga nA ga
136b7(rgyud): tsa Ta tsa Ta/ nA ga ni/ hA hA/ hi hi/ nA ga nA gi ni nA ga/ sarba nA ge/ baSh+Ta ma b+ha ni/ mA ra Ni/ ma ra ta ra Ni/ ta re/ ta ra ta ra/ ta rA/ ka bi la ke sha/ bi kr-ita daM Sh+Ti/ b+ha yA nA ga/ A ka Da D+ha A ka Da d+ha/ mA baM
136b8(rgyud): le ba tha/ bi d+yu dzA rai/ g+ho ra rU pi Ni/ kA la/ a kA lai/ gardza ta/ sarba me g+ha bi gurba Ni/ sany+tsa da ne/ sarba k+Sha tran/ a pA ra Ni/ tsakre tsakra brti/ hi ri hi ri/ b+hi ga b+ha ge/ sma ra sma ra/ kA li kA l-i/ ma hA kaH
137a1(rgyud): // hri da yaM/ pra bi sha/ a te/ ma tre/ sarba nA gA A kaR+Sha Ni/ pu ra ya bu ra ya hUM hUM/ rat+na tra ya bi kurbi ta/ badz+ra Na/ badz+re badz+ra pA Ni/ kA la sho dI ga/ nA ga tu bi ni/ su ru le/ b+ho gi ts+tshe gi ma
137a2(rgyud): b+ho gi/ ba hA bo gi/ b+ho ga ru pu/ ta ya ba le/ ba rA Ni/ sarba na ga sany+tso da ni swA hA/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na pash+tsar+b+ha badz+ra pA Na ye/ b.re d+ha ban d+ha/ su ru pe/ kA la rU pi Ni swAhA/ chos smra bas thog ma
137a3(rgyud): kho nar srung ba'i cho ga byas la/ chos gos kyi grwar lan bdud bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud pa bor nas/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u/ klu tha~Md kyi snying po zhes bya ba 'di/ zhag nyi shu rtsa
137a4(rgyud): bi bar du/ rgyun ma chad par bklag par bya'o// shar phyogasu ni ba la ngagi lci bas klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa zhes bya ba 'khor dang bcas te bri bar bya'o// lho phyog su ni klu'i rgyal po
137a5(rgyud): rab tu rgyas byed ces bya ba mgo lnga pa 'khor dang bcas te bri bar bya'o// nub phyogasu ni klu'i rgyal po snang ldan gtsug pud can zhes bya ba/ mgo badra pra 'khor dang bcas te bri bar bya'o// bang phyog
137a6(rgyud): su ni klu'i rgyal po sprin bskul zhes bya ba/ mgo dgu pa 'khor dang bcas te bri bar bya'o// bla ra dang gos sngon po dang / rgyal mtshan sngon po dang / lha bshos thams cad kyang sngon por bya'o// klu tha~Md la
137a7(rgyud): ba ni mngar gsum gyis bya'o// mngar gsum gyi dgang blugs bdun yang / klu'i snying pos sbyin bsreg bya'o// sprin gyi rgyal po rnams kyang bris te/ char gyi rgyun 'bebs te phan tshun thug cing mthar klog
137a8(rgyud): 'gyu bar bya'o// 'dir dbab pa ni khur ba bkris ldan dang / pen ce dang / sha dang / nya sha dang / sbrang rtsi las byas pa'i zas mchog rgyas par 'gyuraro// de nas chos smra ba gtsang zhing gos gtsang ma bgos/ 
137b1(rgyud): pas rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u klu tha~Md kyi snying po bklag par bya'o// de nas klu rnams dang po'i nyin mo nas brtsams te/ di ri ring sgra sgrogs par byed cing / sgra yid 'ong ba dag 'byin par 'gyur te/ le'u
137b2(rgyud): 'di la the tsom dang bsdus par mi bya'o// gal te rgya mtsho dus tshod las yol na/ 'di yang char las yol bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btso pa pa yang dag par rdzo
137b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying pobartsegs pa rdar bsgrags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang+yas rnga sgra sgrogs la phyag

138a7(rgyud): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brag nges par sgrogs la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas thad la phyag 'tshalo// sen zad bde legasu gyur cig/ 'byung po thaMd la byams par gyur cig
138a8(rgyud): dud 'gror gyung ba zad 'jigs pa med par gyur cig/ ngan 'gro zad zhi bar gyur cig/ sgrib pa zad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshen ba zad kyi cho ga/ sangs rgyas tha~Md kyis gzigs ni
138b1(rgyud): cho ga 'di grub par gyur cig/ trangad+ya thA/ sU ta sU ta/ s+phu ta sU ta/ s+phu Ta s+phuT sUT swA hA/ char mi 'bab pa'i tshe/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'o// dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen mag la la zhig gis/ mgo pas
138b2(rgyud): te gos gtsang ba bgos la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag yi ger bris nas/ gdan gtsang ma la bzhag ste/ pog por mdun gyis na mkha' la gyen du 'a
138b3(rgyud): cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rnams lan lnga bcu'i bar du brjod la mchod pa chen po byas te/ zhag bdun gyi bar du rgyun ma chad par byas na char 'bab par 'gyu ro// 'phags pa sprin chen po klung gi
138b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi la'u klu tha~Md kyi snying po zhes pab theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogaso// // rgya gar skadu/ Ar+ya na ga rA dza bI ra prits+tsha nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skadu/ 'phags pa klu'i rgyal la ga

138b6(rgyud): bo brag phug na bzhugs te/ de nas kwa'i rgyal po gzi can khe dog shin+d+ha 'phags pa dang ldan pa/ nam sros pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la

138b8(rgyud): ces gsol pa dang / bac+doMs kyi klu'i rgyal po gzi can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i rgyal po legaso lag so// 'di lta bu ni khyod kyi bya ba yino// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong
139a1(rgyud): // rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong de'i phyir/ dug dang / sman chen po bco brgyad po 'di dag gi ming zung shig/ tad+ya thA/ ban+d+ha re/ ka ra Te/ kre yU re/ po dang ga ma te/ bIng du ma te/ a
139a2(rgyud): Ta ta ra ta ra/ ta ru t+ya/ da ha da na/ a ta da hi/ dza le dza la/ pa la/ sha Ta sha Ta/ ku le na ku li/ e kar shi ta/ ra gA pi shA/ dge slong dag su zhig dug dang / sman chen po bco brgyad pau de dag ming 'dzin pa
139a3(rgyud): de'i lus la rims kyis mi tshugs/ dug dang / mtshon dang / byad stems dang / ro langs dang / nyin cig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa mi tshugs/ de la ring po dag 'tshe bar mi 'gyur//

139a5(rgyud): kyi gsungs pa la mngon par bstod // 'phags pa kA'i rgyal po gza can gyi nus pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogaso// rgya gar skad du/ gra ha mA tri ka nA ma d+ha ra NI/ bod skad du/ gza' nas

139a7(rgyud): dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / bdud dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / mig dmar dang / ba bsangs dang / pur bu dang /

139b1(rgyud): / rdo rje'i khri la bzhug so// byang chub sems dpa' du ma dang yang thabs gcig ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje'i dang / byang chub seng seda' chen po rdo rjes

140a1(rgyud): // ste bsnyems pa dang bcas pas skyil mo klung legs par bcas nas/ 'khor de dag la 'agling bag tu bltas te/ rdo rje'i thal mor rang gi snying khang bzhag nas/ bcos la

140a4(rgyud): la gnod cing 'tshe bar bgyid pa de rnams kyi spad / bcom ldan 'das kyi chos gyi rnam grangs gang gis sems can zad la srung bar 'gyur ba bshad du gsol// bac+doMs kyis ga

140a7(rgyud): kyang ches gsang ba ngas bshad// de dag mchod pas mchod gyur cing // gnod pa byas na gnod byed pa/ gza' de kun gyi kha dog dang / ji lta bur ni 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams dang ni lha min dang / mi 'am
140a8(rgyud): da klu dag dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang srin po dang / mi rnams dang ni mi ma yin// drag po gzi brjid chen po dang / khros pa zhi bar byed pa de'o// gsang sngags rnams dang mchod pa dang / rim pa bzhin
140b1(rgyud): bshad par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa nyid kyi thugs ka nas snying rje rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer ba skye ste/ gza' rnams kyi spyi bor zhug so// 
140b2(rgyud): de nas de'i mod la nyi ma la sogs pa'i gza' thad langs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la lha rdzas kyi mchod pa byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas dbus mo btsags nas tha
140b3(rgyud): mo sbyar ba byas te/ bac+doMs la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag la smad yon btags par
140b4(rgyud): gyur to// bac+doMs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs gang gis bdag cag rnams la sogs pas chos smra ba rnams la srung bar 'gyur ba dang / yongasu bskyab pa dang / zhi ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur ba dang / mtshon cha
140b5(rgyud): spang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / dug bzhil ba dang / dug bsad pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / sa bcing ba rnams bgyid par 'gyur/ ba bshad du gsol/ de nas bac+doMs de bzhin ga
140b6(rgyud): pa shAkya thub pas gza' rnams mchod pa dang / gsang sngags bka' stsal to// oM me g+holpA ya swA hA/ oM shI tAM sha be swA hA/ oM rak+ta aM ka ku mA rA ya swA hA/ oM bud+d+hA ya swA hA/ oM b+ho g+hasma ta/ 
140b7(rgyud): ye swAhA/ oM a su rod ta pA ya swA hA/ oM kr-iSh+Na ban+d+ha ya swAhA/ oM a mr-i ta pri yA ya swA hU~M/ oM dz+yo tiD+ga ta ba~M swA hA/ lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni gza' dgu'i gsang sngags kyi snying po bklags pas
140b8(rgyud): grub pa yin te/ kha dog dang 'thun par spos kyi dkyil 'khor sor bcu gnyis pa byas pa'i dbusu mchod par bya'o// kham pa la/ zangs la sogs pa 'am/ gser dang dngul gyi snod du mchod
141a1(rgyud): // yon phul nas/ re re la yang bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// lag na rdo rje da'i 'og tu gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gsungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig lan bdun brjod par
141a2(rgyud): bya'o// de nas gza' rnams thang srung bar byed par 'gyuraro// dbul po'i gdon las thar par 'gyur ro// tshe zad pa las tshe ring por byed par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / 
141a3(rgyud): bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / gzhan yang sen gyi rigs gang yin pa dang / gang dag gi rna lam du grags pa de dag kyang dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyuraro// phyag na rdo rje gza'
141a4(rgyud): / rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus mchod par bya ste/ nyin cig ba zhin du klog par byed pa'i tshe smra ba gang yin pa de la gza' thad bdag nyid kun gyis bsams pa thad yongasu
141a5(rgyud): par byed par 'gyuraro// da dang rig gcig pa rnams kyi dbul ba yang ses bya'o// de nas bcos de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gza' rnams kyi yu zhes bya ba bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas la
141a6(rgyud): phyag 'tsha'o// rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshalo// pad+ma 'chang la phyag 'tshalo// bsam pa tha~Md yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'i gza' rnams la phyag 'tsha'o// rgyu skang rnams la phyag 'tshalo// gza'
141a7(rgyud): khyim bcu gnyis po rnams la phyag 'tsha'o// tad+ya thA/ oM bud+d+ha bud+d+he/ badz+re badz+re/ pad+me pad+me/ sa ra sa ra/ swa ra swa ra sar sma ra swA hA/ na maHpad+ma d+ha ra ya/ na maHsarba gra hA NAM/ sarbA sha pa ri pu ra
141a8(rgyud): kA NI na mo rak+Shad+hA NAM na mo dwA da shaur shA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM bud+d+he bud+d+ha/ badz+re badz+re/ pad+me pad+me/ sa ra sa ra/ swa ra swa ra sa ra/ sma ra sma ra/ bau kr-i Da/ bi kr-iH/ pA ra mA ra/ marda ya mdza ya/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ 
141b1(rgyud): sarba big+h+na na/ ku ru ku ru/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ k+Sha ba yak+Sha pa ya shAn te/ dAn te dAn te/ dA pa ya da pa ya/ bac+doMs ma bdag nyid myur du bstan du gsol// bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / semadzad la
141b2(rgyud): srung du gsol/ srang du gsol/ gza' thad dang / rgyu skar rnams kyi gnod pa bzlog tu gsol// bcom ldan 'das ma rdzu 'phral chen po mnga' ba sdang ba'i san rnams gsal glu gsol// bdag gi
141b3(rgyud): sdig paM rnams bskam du gsol/ tsin+da tsat+ti/ tu ru tra~M du/ tsiN+Ti tsidz+dzi/ su mu su mu/ mu tsu mu nu/ b+ha ba b+ha ga u ga u gre rU be/ pU ra ya/ pU ra ya/ ma ma sarbas twa nAny+dza ma nor thaM/ sarba ta thA ga Na
141b4(rgyud): d+hiny+dzi ta sa ma ye swA hA/ oM sAt+ma/ b+hAHswA hA hrI/ swAhAHd+huHswAhAHb+hi swAH/ pad+ma d+ha rA ya swAhA/ A ditA la sAt+ma/ sau mA ya swAt+ma/ d+hi raNI su tra la swA hA/ bud+hA ya swAhA/ bi swa ta ye swAhA/ shu kA ya
141b5(rgyud): swAhAs sha ni sh+tsa rA yai swAhA/ rI hA ba~M sAhA/ ke Na'i swA hA/ bud+d+he la swAhA/ badz+ra d+ha rA ya swA hA/ pad+ma d+ha rA ya swAhA/ ku mA rA ya swAhA/ sarba gra heb+h+yaHswA hA/ sarba nak+Sha tre b+h+yaHswAhA/ sa rba
141b6(rgyud): da sha rA shi ni b+hu swAhA/ sarba u pa dre be b+h+yaHswAhA/ oM sarbabi d+yi hUM hUM phaTaswAhA/ phyag na rdo rje 'di ni gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig dngos grub thad kyi gzhi yin
141b7(rgyud): phyag rdo rje gang yang gza' rnams kyi gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ston zla ba chung yar gyi ngo'i chas bdun nas brtsams te gso sbyong dang ldan par byas nas/ tshes bcu bzhi'i bar dugan
141b8(rgyud): rnams la mchod pa bas te gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ston par bya'o// de nas zla ba nya'i nyin mtshan thogs zag bklags na de dag la lo dgu'i bar du 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung // 
142a1(rgyud): / 'jigs pa dang / skar mnga' lang ba dang / rgyu skar gyi gnod pas 'jigs par mi 'gyur// cha rabs ngan parar gyuraro// gza' bad la mchod pa byas par 'gyuraro// gza' thad kyis ci 'dod
142a2(rgyud): ba sbyin par bye'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gza' rnams kyis phyag 'tshal te/ leg so leg so zhes gsol te mi snang bar gyur// gza' rnams kyi yul zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// rgya garas
142a3(rgyud): gra ha mA tri ka~M nA ma d+ha ra NI/ bod skad du// gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs// sangs rgyas dang byang chub seda' zad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skang bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bac+doMs 'brob
142a4(rgyud): gnas kyi grong khyer na/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod spyan dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho 'phye chen po dang / bdud dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang
142a5(rgyud): mig dmar dang / ba ba sangs dang / bung bu dang / gzar lag pa dang / sman pa dang / sgra gcan dang / 'jug rings dang rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad lnga sogs te/ mang po rnams kyis bskyed cing / rdo rje chen po
142a6(rgyud): tshig gi byin gyos brlabs kyis rgyan pa'i seng+ga'i khri la bzhug so// byang chub sems dpa' du ma dang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sedar chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sa dang
142a7(rgyud): chen po rdo rje gtum po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cheni po rdo rje'i sde dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje gzhu can dang / byang chub sed la sa de' chen po rdo rje
142a8(rgyud): bdag po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i rgya dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i 'od dang / byang chub se nga sa de'i chen po spyad ras gzigs dbang
142b1(rgyud): phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu gzigs dang / byang chub sems dpa' seda' chen po 'jig rten dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i tog
142b2(rgyud): dang / byang chub seM de'i seda' chen po zhal ras rgyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i spyan dang / byang chub
142b3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams kyi bskor cig/ mdu
142b4(rgyud): tu ltas pa la chos ston te/ bkod pa chen po rgyan gyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba/ thog mar dag ga bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge bdon bzang po// tshig 'bru bzang po// ma 'dren pa/ yong su dge
142b5(rgyud): pad yongasu byang ba'i chos ston to// de nas phyag na rdo rje 'khor de dag la bltas te langs nas/ bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi byin gyis brla bas kyis bac+doMs la/ lan brgya stong du mar ba
142b6(rgyud): ba byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas spyan sngar 'dug ste/ snyems pa dang bcas pa'i skyil mo krung legs par bcas nas/ 'khor de dag la 'gying bag tu bltas te/ rdo rje thal mo rang gi sIng khar
142b7(rgyud): bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gza' mi zad pa'i gzugs can/ drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/ khro bo'i gzugs can dag/ sen rnams la 'cha
142b8(rgyud): bgyid/ mtho tsam par 'gyid// mdangs kyang 'phrog par bgyid kha cig ni nor rdzas 'phrog/ kha cig ni srog 'phrog par bgyid cing / seMn tshe ring po rnams ni che rung bar 'gyid pa ste/ de ltar sen za pa
143a1(rgyud): // gnod pas 'tshe bar bgyid pa de'i snang du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rnam grangs gang gis sen thang srung bar 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bac+doMs kyis bka'
143a2(rgyud): stsal pa/ gang yang khyod kyis snying rje bskyed nas/ sen thang la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir gsang chen pas kyang ches gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar byed pa de ni/ leg so lag so// de'i phying
143a3(rgyud): legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / gza' mi zad pa'i gzugs can/ shin tu khro bo shin tu 'jigs par byed pa rnams kyis mchod pa dang / mchod yon dang / bzlas brjod bzang po bang
143a4(rgyud): ba bas kyang ches gsang ba ngas bshad// de dag mchod pas mchod 'gyur zhing / gnod par byed pa gnod byed pas// gza' de kun gyi kha dog dang / ji ltar dga' bar 'gyur ba dang // lha rnams dang ni lha
143a5(rgyud): min dang / mi 'am ci'i kA dag dang // gnod sbyinanams dang srin po dang // mi rnams dang ni srul po dang / drag po gzi baR+Sha chen po dag// khros bzhi par byed pa da'i// gsang sngags dang ni mam
143a6(rgyud): pa dag/ rim pa bzhin du bshad par bya// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa nyid kyi thugs ka nas// snying rje rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer bkye ste/ gza' rnams kyi spyi bor zhugaso
143a7(rgyud): de nas de'i mdo la nyi ma la sogs pa gza' thad langs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la lha rdzas kyi mchod pa rnams kyis mchod par byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas
143a8(rgyud): dbus mo btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar ba byas nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas
143b1(rgyud): rgyas kyis bdag cag la sman yon btags par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi rnam grangs gang gis bdag cag rnams tshogs pas/ chos smra ba rnams la bsrung bar 'gyur ba dang / yo
143b2(rgyud): bskyang ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug bzhil ba dang / dug bsang pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / sa bcing ba rnams bgyid par 'gyur ba bsha du gsol/ de nas bcom
143b3(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gza' rnams mchod pa dang / gsang sngags bka' stsal pa/ oM me g+ho lpA ya swAhA/ oM shI tA sha be swA hA/ oM rak+ta ga ku mA rA ya swA hA/ oM Tad+d+ha
143b4(rgyud): ya swAhA/ oM b+ho gA pa dA ya swAhA/ oM a su ro/ mA ya swAhA/ oM kr-iSh+Na bar NA la swA hA/ oM a mr-i ta pri yA ya s+thA oM dz+yo ti shwe ba swA hA/ lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni gza' dgu'i/ 
143b5(rgyud): sngags kyi snying po bklags pas 'grub pa yin te/ kha dog dang 'thun pa'i spos kyi dkyil 'khor/ sor bcu gnyis byas pa'i dbus mchod par bya'o// kham pa 'am/ zangs la sogs pa la
143b6(rgyud): gsar 'am/ dngul gyi snod mchod yon phul bas// re ra la yang bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgya do// lag ni rdo rje de'i 'og tu/ gza' rnams kyi yuM zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig lan
143b7(rgyud): bdun brjod par bya'o// ngas ni gza' thang srung bar byed par 'gyuraro// dbul ba'i gdon thams cad las thar par 'gyur // tshe zad pa la tshe ring bar byed par 'gyuraro// lag na rdo rje dge slong dang / de/ 
143b8(rgyud): slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / gzhan yang sen gyi rigs gang yin pa dang / gang dag gi rna lam du grags pa de dag kyang dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur
144a1(rgyud): // lag na rdo rje gza' rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus mchod pa bas te/ nyid cig bzhin du klog par byed pa'i tshe smra 'a gang yin pa de la gza' tha~Md bdag nyid kyi bsam pa thaMd yongasu
144a2(rgyud): rdzogs par 'gyur// de dang rigs gcig pa rnams kyi dbul ba yang sel bar bye'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa gza' thad kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs bka' stsal pa/ sangs
144a3(rgyud): rgyas la phyag 'tshalo// rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshalo// pad+ma 'chang la phyag 'tsha'o// bas pa zad yongasu rdzogs pa'i gze' rnams la phyag 'tshalo// rgyu skar rnams la phyag 'tshalo// gza'i khrim
144a4(rgyud): bcus rnams la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+he/ badz+re badz+re/ bad+me pad+me/ sa ra sa ra/ swa sa ra/ swa sar/ sma ra s+pha ra/ bi kr-i Da/ bi kr-iH/ mA ra mA ra/ marda mdza/ g+hA ta ya/ g+hA ta ya/ saH
144a5(rgyud): big+h+nAn/ ku ru ku ru/ tsin+da tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ k+Sha pa yak+ShA pa ya/ shAn+te/ dan+te/ dA pa ye/ bcom ldan 'das ma bdag yid myur du bsdu na du gsol// bcos sgyu 'phrul chen po rnams
144a6(rgyud): 'dul du bsol/ bdag sdig pa rnar skam du gso ge tsar+t+ti/ su mu su mu/ mu tsu mu tsu/ b+ha ba b+ha be/ u gA/ rU pe rU ra ya/ pU ra ya/ ma ma sarba satwa nAny+tsa ma no thi/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ a d+hiSh+Ti ta sa ma
144a7(rgyud): ye swA hA/ oM swAhA/ thAHswAhAHhrIHswAhAHhUM swA hAHd+hi swA hAHpad+ma d+ha ra ya swA hA/ A da~M t+yA ya swA hA/ sa mA ya swA hA/ d+hA raSh+Ti su tA ya swAhA/ bu d+hA ya swA hA/ br-i he s+phaspa dA ya swA hA/ shu krA ya swAhA/ k+ShiSh+Tha
144a8(rgyud): badz+ra la swA hA/ rA h+ya be swA hA/ kai ta ba swA hA/ bud+d+hA ya swAhA/ badz+ra d+ha rA ya swA hA/ pad+ma d+ha ra ya swAhA/ ku mA rA ya swA hA/ na kIta trA NA na swAhA/ dri da sha rA shi nA swAhA/ sarba u pa dra bA na~M swA hA/ oM sarba
144b1(rgyud): d+ye hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ phyag na rdo rje 'di ni gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ston zla tha chung gi yar ngo tshas bdun nas brtse ste/ gso sbyong dang ldan par byas nas/

144b3(rgyud): 'jigs pa dang / skar mnga' ltung ba dang / zla ba dang / rgyu skar gyi gnod pas 'jigs par mi 'gyuraro// tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ gza' zad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur/ gza' zad kyi ci 'dod pa spyid
144b4(rgyud): par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gza' rnams kyis phyag 'tshal te/ leg so lags zhes gsol nas mi sdang bar gyur to/ za' rnams kyi yul zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs//

144b6(rgyud): thos pa dus gcig na/ bac+doMs ko'u sha me bi na/ tsher ma can zhes bya ba'i nags chen po na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub se ra seda' chen po/ sangs rgyas
144b7(rgyud): kyi yin thaMd dang ldan pa/ rab tu mang po dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe ko'u sham pa'i grong khyer chen po na/ khyim bdag zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba/ dbang po nye bar zhig yid nye bar zhi ga/ bu po
144b8(rgyud): dang bu mo mang ba bza'i ma mang po dang ldan pa/ dang cing tsher dang pa zhig gnas pa de/ bac+doMs ga la ba song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan 'bu
145a1(rgyud): / phrag du mar bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'du'o// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas
145a2(rgyud): zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phyi nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs
145a3(rgyud): 'ga' zhig zhu lag so// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag zla ba bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa to// khyim bdag khod ci dang ci 'dod pa ris shig dang / khong
145a4(rgyud): kyis ji ltar nges pa'i dri ba lung bstan pas/ ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos// bac+doMs la legaso zhes gsol te/ 
145a5(rgyud): kyi ltar nyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// ba com ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dbul por gyur pa las/ ji ltar dbul ba ma mchis parar gyur
145a6(rgyud): zhing 'bro nad kyi thebs na yang blo nad ma mchis par 'gyur pa lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du/ khyim bdag zla ba bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag/ 
145a7(rgyud): khyod ci'i phyir dbul po'i dod du 'di/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dbul ba mang ba dang / 
145a8(rgyud): gos pa mang ba dang / bu pho dang / bu mo mang ga bza' mi mang po dang ldan pa lags te/ do slad du/ gang gis sen dbul po rnams kyi dgul ba ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / bro nad kyi thabs pa rnams
145b1(rgyud): bro nad ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / nor dang 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang mdzod mang po ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sdug pa dang / yid du mchos pa dang / mthong na yid du 'thad pa dang / dbang phyug du 'gyur
145b2(rgyud): ba dang / sbyin bdag mdzod pas mi 'tshal zhing / dbyig dang / gser dang / nor dang 'bru'i mdzod dang / bang mdzod rnams dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / rdo rje dang / bai DUr+g+ha dang / bung dang / mni shel dang
145b3(rgyud): dang / sa la sbrum dang / dbul bas ma 'tshal cing / 'byor par 'gyur ba dang / khyim gyi bu smad dang / bza' mi rnams bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis legs pa
145b4(rgyud): bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag zla ba bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim pa dag 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa 'das
145b5(rgyud): par gyur pa de'i tshe/ da'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshe/ pa dgra po tsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rigs pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs
145b6(rgyud): 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyar ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang rgya mtsho'i dbyangs zhes bya ba 'jog rten du byung ste/ 
145b7(rgyud): rigs kyi bungs de bzhin gshegs pa de las/ nid gyi rgyun zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di thos te/ gzung zhig bcangs bklags/ kun chub par byas/ rdza su yi rangs par byas shing / gzhan dag la
145b8(rgyud): yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan te/ rigs kyi bud yang ngas de bshad par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di'i mthus mo rnams rnam par 'gro 'cham par mi byed// mi ma yin pa rnams
146a1(rgyud): / rnam par 'tho 'tsham par mi byedado// gnod sbyin rnams rnam par 'tho 'tsham par mi bye'o// srin po rnams dang 'tho 'tsham par mi bye'o// yi dwags rnams rngang 'bo cham
146a2(rgyud): mi byedado// sha za rnams rnar 'tho 'tsham par mi byedo// 'byung po rnams rnar 'tho 'tsham par mi byedado// gral bum rnams rnar 'gro 'tsham par mi byed// brjod rnams rnar 'gro 'tsham par mi de//

146a4(rgyud): par mi byed// zasu mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang / za su gcin 'thung ba rnams dang / zasu khrag 'thung ba rnams dang / za su sha za ba rnams dang / za suM rnag 'thung ba rnams dang / za su zhag za
146a5(rgyud): ba rnams dang / zasu rkang za ba rnams dang / za su ngar snabs za ba na mas dang / zasu gtor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung rnams dang / za su dbugs rngub pa rnams dang / 'byung ba za ba'i
146a6(rgyud): rnams par 'tshe bar 'gyur// rigs kyi bu nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gi khyim na yod dam/ snying la yod dam/ lag na mod dam/ glegs pa du chud dam/ 
146a7(rgyud): par gyur te/ kun chub par byas sam/ bklags so// bzung ngam/ rje su yi rang bar byas sam/ gzhan dag la rgya che rab tu bstan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu be de la yun ring po'i don
146a8(rgyud): phan pa dang / dge ba dang / grub pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs par 'gyuraro// su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa byas te/ ner gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di nam phyed na lan gnyis lam
146b1(rgyud): ma mad lan bzhi gton na/ de'i lha yi rangs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ston pa la dga' ba dang / chos gdags pa byas pas dga' ba dang / dge 'dun gdags pa byas pas dga' ba dang / chos
146b2(rgyud): smra ba la dga' bas lhag pa'i bsam pas/ bdag nyid 'ong ste 'bru'i char 'beb so// na mo badz+ra d+ha ra sA ga ra nirag+ho ShA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM su ra ba b+ha de b+ha dra ba ti/ aM ga le/ maM ga la
146b3(rgyud): mi ga la ba ti/ a la/ a tsa le/ a ra le/ a tsa ba la/ ud ka te ni/ ud b+he da ni/ s+ya ba ti/ dA na pa ti/ d+ha ma pra ti/ shri ma ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ a ma le bi ma le/ nirma le/ ru ru su ra ge su rU pa maM
146b4(rgyud): bi ma le/ tsa le/ a tsa na ste/ a nan ste/ bi nan ste/ bi shwa ke she/ ShashA ni shi/ aM ku ra/ maM ku ra/ pra baM ku ra/ bI ri me/ bI ra me/ khi d+ha ma/ ri ri be/ di ri me/ du du me/ kha kha me ta ta ra
146b5(rgyud): ta ra tar/ tA ra tA ra/ badz+re badz+ra bedz+re/ ba me/ Ta ke Ta ke/ Tha ke Tha ke/ u ka kaM pu ka ke/ Tha ke dza ra ke/ a bar+Na ni/ baR+Sha ni Sha da ni badz+ra d+ha ra sA ga ra nir go Sha Na/ ta thA ga ta ma nu sma ra sa
146b6(rgyud): ta thA ga tA/ sa t+ya ma nu smai ra/ d+harma sat+ya ma nu sma ra/ saM g+ha sa h+ya ma nusma ra/ da tad ta/ pu ra pu ra/ pU ra ya pA ra ya/ pA ra Ni/ b+ha ra b+ha ra Ni/ a ra le/ su maM ga le/ shan ta ma ti/ shu b+ha ma ti/ 
146b7(rgyud): maM ga la b+ha ni/ mahA ma ti/ b+ha ra ba ti/ pra b+hA ba ti/ su tsan+d+ra ma ti/ a gan+d+he/ a gats+tshe/ sa ma ya ma nu s+phA ra sIhA/ A ba ra Ni ma nu sma ra sAhA/ pra b+ha ba ma nu sma ra sA hA/ di di ma nu s+pha ra sI/ 
146b8(rgyud): ma nu s+pha ra swAhA/ bi dza ya ma nu s+pha ra swAhA/ hi da ya ma nu s+pha ra swAhA/ sarba satwa bi na ya ma sma ra swA hA/ oM bA su d+ha re swAhA/ oM bA su shi ye swA hA/ oM shrI bA su swA hA/ oM dwe su~M swA hA/ r-ig+sa
147a1(rgyud): / kyi bu 'di ni nor gyi rgyun ces bya ba'i gzungs te/ gzungs 'di'i mthus/ mu ge dang / nang dang / 'chings 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom
147a2(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa byas te/ nor gyi rgyun gyi gsungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag nub gcig bton na/ de nas dngos grub tu 'gyuraro// rgyas pa'i ro// 
147a3(rgyud): tu bdag gi khyim maM/ gnas gtsang ma'i bang mdzod dam/ gnas gang du yang rung bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub seda' thaMd dang / gsang snga/ 
147a4(rgyud): kyi lha'i phyir tsan ngan gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas te/ nub gcig bton na/ rigs kyi bu de'i khyim nor dang / 'bru dang / gser dang dang la dang / yo byad thad kyi rgyun mi chen po'i tshad tsam
147a5(rgyud): gyis gang bar 'gyuraro// 'jigs pa dang gnod pa zad kyang med par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu khyed de'i phyir khod rab tu bsgrims la no ra gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di zung shig/ chongs shig
147a6(rgyud): lhogs shing / ston cig gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang / des khyod kyi yul ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das legs zhes gsol te/ 
147a7(rgyud): khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di thos nas tshim zhing / dga' ba mgu zhing yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas/ dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ bac+doMs
147a8(rgyud): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bac+doMs la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis nor gyi rgyun ces bgyi ba blangs lags gzungasu zin lags/ gzung lags// 
147b1(rgyud): lags/ kun chub par bgyis lags/ rje su yi rangs par bgyis lag so// gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyis lags so// de'i skad cig tsam la khyim bdag zla ba
147b2(rgyud): bzang po'i bang mdzod rnams yongasu gang bar gyur to// de nas khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag
147b3(rgyud): 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyed song la khyim bdag zla ba bzang po
147b4(rgyud): nor dang / 'bras yongasu gang ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / mdzodan po dang / bang mdzod yongasu gang ba rnams la ltos// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bac+doMs kyi ltar
147b5(rgyud): mnyan nas/ kai'u sham bi'i gong khyer chen po ga la ba dang / khyim bdag zla ba bzang po'i khyimag la ba der song ste byin nas na du zhugs pa dang / nor dang / 'brus yongasu ga
147b6(rgyud): ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / rin pi cha phun sum tshogs pa dang / yo byad zad kyi mchod pa chen po dang / bang mdzod rnams kyang yongasu gang bar mi thong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshim ning dga'
147b7(rgyud): la mgu yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang / yid bdab skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bder so // de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ya mtshan du 'dzin cing dga' ba dang / 
147b8(rgyud): yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gis khyim bdag zla ba bzang po nor mang zhing mdzod chen po dang / bang mdzod rnams kyang nor
148a1(rgyud): / dang 'bru phud sum tshogs pa'i rgyu gang lags// rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' po rigs kyi bu yi rang bar bya bzang po dad cing mchog tu
148a2(rgyud): dad lang dge ba'i bsam pa can des/ nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di bzung zhing rab tu gtod te/ blangs shing bklags kun chub par byas/ rje su yi rang bar byas shing / gzhan dag la yang rgya
148a3(rgyud): yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i pi ri// kun dga' bo de'i phyir khrod kyis kyang nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di long shig/ tshangs shigs/ lhogs shig/ ston cig/ zung shig/ kun chub par gyis
148a4(rgyud): shig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya tshor yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang / de ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying rtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che
148a5(rgyud): dang lha dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde bar 'gyuraro// kun dpa' bo su zhig rig sngags 'di las gzhan du smra ba ni/ lnga dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs
148a6(rgyud): pa dang bcas pa dang / dge slong dang / bram zer bcas pa dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ngase ma mtho // lan gnyisu gten tam/ lan gsum du gton kyang 'gal bar
148a7(rgyud): byed pa de ni gnas medo// kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni mi byed pa yin// kun dga' bo 'di dag ni san dge ba'i rtsa ba zad pa rnams kyi rna lam du grags par mi
148a8(rgyud): 'gyur na/ glags bam la yi ger 'di pa dang / yid la gzung ba lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi bka' ste/ gzungs sngags 'di ni se ni dbul po dang / nad sna
148b1(rgyud): sna tshogs kyi gzir ba dang / 'jigs pa dang / seMn sdang bas gnod par byas pa thad kyi don du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyis gsungs pa dang / bshang ba dang / rje su yi rang ba dang / rab tu phye ba dang / 
148b2(rgyud): bsngags pa dang / bkrol ba dang / gsal bar mdzad pa dang / bskyed pa dang / bir gyis brlabs pa dang / chos kyi phyag rgyas 'ab pa dang / bstod pa dang / snyan par brjod pa dang / go bar mdzad pa dang
148b3(rgyud): bsnyad pa'i phyir// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ de'i tshe thal mo sbyar nas ched du brjod pa'i cheng du rjod cing tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsol te// sangs rgyas bcom ldan pas
148b4(rgyud): gyis mi khyab ste/ sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam gyis mi khyab las sa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa la dang rnams kyi// dar smin pa'ang saM gyis mi khyab lags// zhi bci yang mkhyen pa
148b5(rgyud): mkhan// chos kyi rgyal po rga shi mi mnga' ba// ye shes pa rol bcwo/ da ba ben gyur pa/ sangs rgyas dpa' bo khyod la phyag 'tshal// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la mgu zhing
148b6(rgyud): yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/ dga' dang / yid bde ba skyed nas/ bcos pa 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyis rnam grangs 'dir ming ci lags/ ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ 
148b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'di khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos pos zhus pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ nor dang / 'bru dang / rin po thad kyi gter zhes bya bar yang zung
148b8(rgyud): shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyis bsngags pa nor gyi rgyun gyi gzung zhes bya bar zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da skad ces bka' stsa lenas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / dge gleng de
149a1(rgyud): // ngag dang / byang chub sede de dag dang / bang dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsum
149a2(rgyud): ba la mngon par bstod// 'phags pa nor gyi rgyun zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog s+ho// / de nas bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma'i rtog pa bshad par bya ste/ dang po re shig spring zla tha chung gi dkar
149a3(rgyud): bo'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig la rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu bor song ste/ de nas nu ma'i bar du chu'i nang du nub par byas te 'dag la/ nyi ma la sngon du phyogs par yongasu rtog pa ji snyed gnas kyi
149a4(rgyud): du bzlas pa bya'o// bza' bzad spangs te/ nyon mongs shing smra bcad byas ste/ nub bdun tu bzlas pa bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i thang skra yang dbu smra ma gtogs par bya
149a5(rgyud): gum dang / tsan dan gyi byugs par bya ba ni nub mo snga bar langs te/ chur khru bdun/ zhing du khru gsum ste/ khru bcu dang bcas pa la tsher sna ma lu sa pa gso sbyong dang ldan pa'i lha
149a6(rgyud): bzas bac+doMs ma mdog ljang sder sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas po na 'bras bu chen po bsnams paM/ phyag g.yon pa na sgrub pa po rnams la ster ba'i rin po che'i tha ma
149a7(rgyud): mu tig dang / rdo rje pha lam dang / bai DUr+ya'i 'bras bu can bsnams pa'i phyag dang ldan pa bya'o// steng du lnga'i bu rin po che char mngon du 'bebs bzhin pa bya'o// g.yas log su dpal chen mo pad+ma'i
149a8(rgyud): phyag can sgrub pa po la nye bar dgongs pa la gnas bzhin pa bya'o// g.yon log su pad+ma'i dpal rin po che'i snyim pa gang ba bya'o// 'og tu sgrub pa po pad+ma'i lag pa can bya'o// de nas zang sku/ 
149b1(rgyud): gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi dadrung du nub phyogasu kha bstan la bkram ste/ de nas nye bar spyod pa'i gtor ma ma gtogs pa mdzod kyi bzhengad pa yang dbul zhing dri zhim po'i me tog gis mchod
149b2(rgyud): chen po byas la tsan dang a ga ru'i bdugs pas bsregs par bya'o// zhu mar gyi mar me brgyu 'bul bar bya'o// de nas stan gcig la gnas la bcom ldan 'das ma'i zhal la dpogs la nu
149b3(rgyud): mo mtshan bzlas pa byas na/ de nas skya rangs shar ba'i dusu skyes bu chen po tsam gyi nor rin po che thad kyi rgyun 'bab cing khang par 'gyuraro// yang na mtshan phyed na chu'i nang du zhugs la brgyad brgya
149b4(rgyud): bzlas par bya'o// zla gcig gi sbyor bas nor gyi rgyun 'bab par 'gyur ra te/ mi shes par kha cig 'phel bar 'gyuraro// yang na rgyal po'i skor mngon par 'dod ni nyin mo chu'i nang du bzlas partsa
149b5(rgyud): zhing mtshan mo'i phyed na til gyi sbyin brgyad brgya byas na rgyal rigs las snyed pa chen po thob bo// yung kar mang la bsres nas sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po dbang du bying // kun tu
149b6(rgyud): ra'i sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po'i blon po dbang du byed// kha cig gis de sbyor ba gang gis mtshan mo bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i gdan can dran par byas na sbyin bdag chen por 'gyur // yang na spru
149b7(rgyud): thabs chen po bshad par bya ste/ tshe 'phral gyi dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas brtsams te/ zas ci srid du bcad nas gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung na thang ka nub phyogs su
149b8(rgyud): bstan la dgram zhing / nyin mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa klag cing / mtshan mo stan cig la gnas pas/ nub yal gyis bzlas pa byas na nor gyi phung po ched po rnyed de/ mthong gnod byas kyi
150a1(rgyud): mdzad par mi 'gyur te/ lha khang chen po bya'o// cho ga 'di'i tshe 'phrul gyi dkar po'i phyogs la bzlas byas na 'khor los bsgyur ba 'thob cing / bcom ldan 'das ma nor gyun pa
150a2(rgyud): dengasu mthong zhing phyir mi ldeg pa'i byang chub se dang 'gyuraro// ji ltar da ltar tshangs spyod bya zhing // kha na ma tho ba'i zas chang dang / nya sha la sogs pa spangs shing mtshan po bzlas pa byas na dbul
150a3(rgyud): mi 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phags pa kun dga' bo dang / zla ba bzang po yongasu dga' nas khyim bdag zla ba bzang po'i don du gsungs pa la mngon par bstod// bcom ldan 'das
150a4(rgyud): ma ner rgyud ma'i tog pa rdzogs// / na me rat+na ta yA ya e bA su d+ha ra swAhA/ snying po'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM bA su shrI swAhA/ !ba'i snying po'o// na me rat+na tra yA ya/ oM bAswa swA
150a5(rgyud): nye ba'i snying por yang nye ba'i snying po'o// bal mo sbyar te gung mo gany+dza dang / de nas srin lag gnyis dang / mthe'u chung gnyis bshebs te bsdigs mdzub phan tshun sbrel la/ maze'u rlung
150a6(rgyud): gnyis cung zhig bsnol te/ rtse mo gnyis rgyab sprad de/ kha' lta bu byas la/ gung mo che spang ba la mtha' mo zung cig de'i 'og tu sbyar te/ reg pa bcas pa ni rab tu gzung ba'i rtog pa las gsungs pa ste/ khwa
150a7(rgyud): thad sgrub pa'i bac+doMs mener rgyun ma'i gzungs 'di grub pas gsungs po'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM shrI yai shrI ka ri/ d+ha na ka ri da na kA ri swA hA/ bsgrub par bya ba'i sngag so// rig pa 'di'i dang perare shig/ 
150a8(rgyud): dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni sor mi rnams thal mo sbyar la mthe 'tshan dbu su bcug pa ni bac+doMs ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// oM sa ma ye/ sa ma sa ma ya ka ri/ ma hA sa ma ye swAhA/ dam tshigi phyag rgya
150b1(rgyud): dang sngag so// phyag rgya de nyid la gung mo dang sdigs mdzub kyi tshigs gsum pa skul zhing mtheb chung gnyis cung zad phyir byung ba ni bcos ma'i phyag rgya'o// 'di ni dbab pa dang / bsdu ba dang / bsgrub
150b2(rgyud): bya'i sngags kyis bya'o// phyag rgya nyid la bsngags mdzub gnyis brkyang ba ni me tig gi phyag rgya yin te/ oM bI su d+he swAhA/ ma ti gi phyag rgya de nyid las gung me brkyang ba ni bdug spos kyi phyag
150b3(rgyud): yin te/ sngags de oM bA su d+ha ra swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid la ming med brkyang ba'i phyag rgya yin te/ sngags ni oM bA su d+ha ma ti shri ye swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid la mthe'u chung gi sen me mtheb chen gyi
150b4(rgyud): bka' ste/ ser me gzhan rnams ni rdo rje'i mtshan nyid du byas pa ni ma ra me'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags ni oM ba su d+ha ri Ni swA hA/ san mo gan rgyal du byas la mthe bong gnyis log su smra ba ni
