176b3(rgyud): bzhi de'i phyi bzhin 'brang zhing srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed par byed par 'gyur// oM na mo b+ha ga ba ta a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+dza na su bi ni sh+tsita te dzo ra dzA ya/ te thA ga tA ya ar+ha te samyak+saM bud d+ha
176b4(rgyud): yatad+ya thA/ oM bu N+ye bu N+ye ma d+de bu N+ye a pa~M ga sa skyes pa mi ta Te ts+yai dz+nyA na sa d+hA ma / oM sa sa skar tsa'i shung d+ha bu/ tog gnas sung gte swa b+ha ra thi shud+d+he ma snun la
176b5(rgyud): ri dA ra~M swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ga 'drir 'am/ yi ger 'dir 'jug na/ de de bzhin gshegs ba 'dod bag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig
176b6(rgyud): dzan gyi khams bde ba can du sme bar 'gyor// oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a ba ri mi ta a yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ti te dze rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya arba te samyakr-i bud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pUN+ye pu N+ye mahA
176b7(rgyud): pu N+ya a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra bi ri shud+d+ha d+harmA te ga ga na sa mung ga te swa b+ha ba bi shud d+ha ma hA na ya bi ri bA re swA hA// sa phyogs gang du mdo sde
176b8(rgyud): dkon mchog 'dri ba'i sa phyogs de yang mchod rten du gyur te phyag bya bar yang 'os par 'gyuraro// byol song gi skye gnasu song ba'i bya dang ri dwags gang dag gi rna lam du grags par gyur pa de dag
177a1(rgyud): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta a yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya
177a2(rgyud): ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te samyak+saM bud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+yaM pu dz+yaM ma hA pu N+ya a bar mi tar+b+ha a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro ba tsi te/ oM sar+b+ba saM sA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harmA te ga ga na sa mudag
177a3(rgyud): swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya ba ri bA re swA hA// gang zhig tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi gar 'di 'am/ yi ger 'dir 'jug na de bud med kyi lusu nam yang skye bar mi 'gyuraro// oM na mo b+ha
177a4(rgyud): gab a pa ra~M mi ta A yur+dz+dza na su bi nai sh+tsi ta te dzo rA la ta thA ga tA ya/ aHte samya kr-i bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu d+h+ya pu N+yem dA bu d+d+he a pa ri mo ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu
177a5(rgyud): dz+nyAn saM b+ha ro ba tsi te/ oM sar+b+ba pa~M skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga nas mung ga te swa b+ha ba bi shud+d+ha ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ gang la la zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i phyir kar
177a6(rgyud): she pa ni 'ga' zhig sbyin pa byin na des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongasu bkang ste sbyin pabyin par 'gyuraro// oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri
177a7(rgyud): mi ta A yur+N+Na na su ba nish+tsi ta te dze rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te sa myakraM bud+d+ha ya// oM pu N+yai pu N+ya ma hA pu N+ye a pa ra mi ta pu N+ya a pa ra mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro ba tsi ta/ oM sar+b+ba saM skar
177a8(rgyud): pa ri shud+d+ha d+ham+l-i ta ga ga na sa mud ga te swA b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha ma hA na ya ba ri shwa re swA hA// gang la la zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa byed par 'gyur pa dang dam pa'i chos mtha' dag
177b1(rgyud): mchod par 'gyuraro// o na mo b+ha ga ba te a ba ri mi ta A yur+dz+dza na su bi nish+tsi ta te dzo rA dza ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te samyaglai bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a ba ri mi ta puN+ye dz+nyA
177b2(rgyud): na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra ba ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mu ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA ra swAhA/ 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs dang / 
177b3(rgyud): gtsug tor can dang / thang skyob dang / log par dad sel dang / gser thub dang / 'od srung dang / shAkya thub pa la sogs pa la rin po che sna bdun gyi mched pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas pa'i bsod
177b4(rgyud): nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar nus kyi tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di'i bsod nams kyi phung po tshad ni bgang bar mi nuso// oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur+N+Na nasa?
177b5(rgyud): bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyakr-i bud+d+ha ya[:]tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mai ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM san+na
177b6(rgyud): saM skA ra ba ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga ta swa b+ha ba tsa~M shud+d+he ma hA yan pa ri bA re swAhA/ 'di lta ste dper na/ rin po che'i phung po ri rab tsam sbubs te sbyin pa byin pa de'i bsod nams hU~M
177b7(rgyud): phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar nus kyi tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'da'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar mi nuso// oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yudz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te rje
177b8(rgyud): rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyakr-i bud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye bu ts+yai ma hA pu N+ye a ba ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sar+b+ba saM ske ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+Ya
178a1(rgyud): // ga gnas mudag te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya ba ri bA re swA hA// 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po bzhi chus yongasu gang ba'i thig pa re re nas bgrang bar nas kyi tshe dpag tu
178a2(rgyud): med pa'i mdo sde 'di'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar mi nuse// oM na mo b+ha ga ba ta a ba ri mi ta a yur+N+Na na suM bi ni shI ta ta dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ aH te simyakraM bud+d+hA ya/ 
178a3(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu d+h+ya mahA pu N+ya a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a bi ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA saM b+ha ro pa tsi taM/ oM sarba saM skA ra ba ri shud+d+he d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga ta swa b+ha ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya ba ri bA ra swa hA
178a4(rgyud): gang zhig tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/ sti stang du byas te mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba ngas phye gas bcu'i sang+yas kyi zhing thad du de bzhegs pa
178a5(rgyud): thams cad la phyag byas pa dang mchod pa byas pa yino// oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a bi re ri ta A yur+dz+dza na su bi nish+tsi ta te dzo rA ya/ ar+ha ta samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu/ 
178a6(rgyud): N+ya a ba ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro ba tsa te/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma taM ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+ha bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swAhA// sbyin pa'i stobs kyi sangs
178a7(rgyud): rgyas yang dag 'phags/ mi yi sang+ges sbyin pa'i stobs rtogs te// snying rje can gyi gong khyer 'jug pa na// sbyin pa'i stobs kyi sgra ni grags par 'gyur// tshul khrims stobs kyis sangs rgya
178a8(rgyud): yang dag 'phags/ mi yi seng ges tshul khrims stobs rtogs te// snying rje can gyi gong khyer 'jug pa na// tshul khrims stobs kyi sgra ni grags par 'gyur// bzod pa'i stobs kyis sang+yas/ 
178b1(rgyud): yang dag 'phags// mi yi seng ge bzod pa'i stobs rtogs te// snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na// bzod pa'i stobs kyi sgra ni gags par 'gyur// brtson 'grus stobs kyis sangs
178b2(rgyud): rgyas yang dag 'phags/ mi yi seng ges brtson 'grus stobs rtogs te// snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na// brtson 'grus stobs kyi sgra ni grags par 'gyur// bsam gtan sto
178b3(rgyud): kyi sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ mi yi seng ge bsam gtan stobs rtogs te// snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na// bsam gtan stobs kyi sgra ni grags par 'gyur// shes rab stobs kyis
178b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ mi yi seng ge shes rab stobs rtogs te// snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na// shes rab stobs kyi sgra ni grags par 'gyur// oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi
178b5(rgyud): A yur+dz+dza na su bi ni sh+tsi ta tA dzo rA dza ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ ar+hatasamyakr-i bud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ya a par maM pu N+ya a pa ra mi ta pu N+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha re pa tsi te/ au
178b6(rgyud): sarbA si skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga ne sa mud ga ta swa b+ha bi shud+d+he ma hA ya pa ri bA ra swA hA// bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing da skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
178b7(rgyud): dad thang dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod // 'phags pa tshad
178b8(rgyud): ya shas dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzob ste// / rgya gar skad// Ar+ya a pa ri mi ta a yur+dz+nyA na nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshe dang ye shes
179a1(rgyud): dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub senga' tha~Md la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod
179a2(rgyud): na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dag brgya phrag bye dang bcu ga sum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' seda' chen po rab tu
179a3(rgyud): po dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'ja ma dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal snying gi pags na 'jig rten gyi khams ston
179a4(rgyud): dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba zhig yid/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa shin tu rnam par gdon mi za ba'i rgyal
179a5(rgyud): po zhes bya ba bzhugs// tshe 'dzin cing / tsha mthar phyin par bzhed sems can rnams la chos kyang ston to// 'jam dpal gan nur gyur pa nyon cig/ 'dzam+bu'i gling 'di'i mi rnams
179a6(rgyud): ni tshe thung ba tsha lo brgya pa sha stag ste/ de dag las kyang pha la char ni dus ma yin par 'chi bar bstan te/ 'jam dpal sen pa/ nga dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang ye shes dpag
179a7(rgyud): tu med pa de'i ston dang bsngags pa yongasu brjod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam gangs 'di yi gar 'di 'am/ yi ger 'dir 'jug gam/ ming tsam nyan te/ klog pa nas glegs bam la bris
179a8(rgyud): te// khyim na 'chang gi bar du byed dam/ me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / phye ma rnams kyis mchod par gyur pa de dag gi tshe yongasu zad pa las tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyuraro// 'jam dpal sa
179b1(rgyud): gang dag tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa shin tu rnam par gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad thos pa de dag tshe yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyuraro// sen gang dag tshe yongasu zang
179b2(rgyud): kar mtshan 'chang bar gyur pa de dag gi tshe yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyuraro// 'jam dpal de lta bas na rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo tshe ring por 'dod pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang las
179b3(rgyud): dpag tu med pa de'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad nyan tam/ yi ger 'di 'am yi gar 'dir 'jug na/ de dag gi ston dang legs par gyur pa ni 'di dgo/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa ta a pa ri ma ta A yur+N+Na na rtsa
179b4(rgyud): bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha taM samya kAM bud+d+ha ye/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra ba ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te s+t+ra b+ha ba bi shud d+ha ma hA da ya pa ri wA raM swAhA/ 
179b5(rgyud): 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad po 'di dag gang la la zhig gis yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'dir 'jug sa/ glegs pa la bris te/ khyim na 'chang ngam/ klog par gyur
179b6(rgyud): na tshe zad pa las tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur// de shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa che dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bdab cad yod dpag tu med
179b7(rgyud): ba la sogs par skye bar 'gyur// oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+dza na su bi nish+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te sa myag saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+ha
179b8(rgyud): te ga ga na sa mu dag te sa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wa re swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med
179'a1(rgyud): / pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungaso// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+dza na su bi nish+tsi ta ti dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samya graM bud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri
179'a2(rgyud): d+har+m+ma ta ga ga na sa mud ga taM swa b+ha wa bi shud+d+he bahA na ya ba ri wa re swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye 'a phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis dgongs pa gcig dang dbyings gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu
179'a3(rgyud): pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungaso// oM na me b+ha ga wau ta a pa ri mi ta A yu ra dz+nyA na su bi nish+tsi ta te dzo rA dza ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te sa mya kraM bud d+hA ya/ trad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra ba ri shud+d+ha d+harmA te ga ga/ 
179'a4(rgyud): na sa mudag te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wa re swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gtsigs tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdos
179'a5(rgyud): 'di gsung so// oM na bo b+ha ga wi te a pa ri ta A yur+dz+dza na su bi nish+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga ta sa mya gr-i bud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oMs rbA saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harmA ta ga ga na sa mud ga tasa?
179'a6(rgyud): b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na pa ri wa re swAhA// yang do'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa lngas dgengs pa gcig dang dbyangs gtsigs tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs
179'a7(rgyud): oM na mo b+ha ga wa te a pa ri mi ta A yu dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta ta dzi rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyakr-i bud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+har+m+ma taM ga ga na sa mud ga ti swa b+ha wa
179'a8(rgyud): shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wa re swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsung so// oMH
179'b1(rgyud): mo b+ha ga wa te a pa ri pi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni shwe ta te dze rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+tha te ga ga na sa mu ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+ha maH
179'b2(rgyud): na ya ba ri wa re swAdahA// yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bzhi bcu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyings gtsigs tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsung so// oM ne me ga wa ti
179'b3(rgyud): pa ri mi ta a yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dze rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te sa myak+saM bud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga ta swa b+ha wa bi shud d+he ma hA na ya ba
179'b4(rgyud): wa re swA hA// yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungaso// oM na
179'b5(rgyud): so b+ha ga wa te a pa ri si ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni shr-I te te dze rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te samyakr-i bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba sa skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa
179'b6(rgyud): b+ha wa bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wa re swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gi tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs
179'b7(rgyud): oMn mo b+hag wa te a pa ri mi ta A yu dz+nyA na su bi ni shI ta ti dze rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+tha te sam+ba k+saM bud+ha ya/ d+hi thA/ oM sar+b+ba si skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+har+m+ma teg ga nas mung gtes b+hAH
179'b8(rgyud): bi shud+d+ha ma hA na ya pa ri tha re swA hA// yang do'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bya ma snyed kyi dgengs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde
179''a1(rgyud): / 'di gsungaso// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su di nish+tsi tA te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te sam+ba k+saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma
179''a2(rgyud): te ga ga nas mu dag te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+ha ma hA na ya ba ri wa re swA hA// gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'di'am/ yi gar 'dir 'jug gam/ 'chang na de cha
179''a3(rgyud): ba la tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyuraro// tsha yang rna 'phel bar 'gyur// oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a ba ri mi te A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te samya kr-i bud+d+ha ya/ d+yaH
179''a4(rgyud): oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma tA ga ga na sa mung ga te/ swa b+hA wi shud+d+he mahA ya pa ri wa re swA hA/ gang zhig che dang ye shes dpag tu me pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dra
179''a5(rgyud): 'amar yo ger 'drir 'jug na/ de sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/ nam du yang mi khom par skye bar
179''a6(rgyud): mi 'gyuraro// gang dang gang du skye ba'i skye ba thad du skye ba dran pa 'gyur// oM na mi b+ha ga wa te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi nosh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyakr-i bud \u0f7f
179''a7(rgyud): ya tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra ba r-i shud+d+ha d+harmA taM ga ga na sa mud ga ta swa b+ha wa bi shud d+ha ma hA na ya pa ri wa re swA hA/ gang la la zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi
179''a8(rgyud): ger 'dri'o/ yi ger 'dri 'jug na/ des chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong 'drir bcug par 'gyur// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te a ba ri mai ta A lur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dze rA dzA ya ta thAH/ 
179''b1(rgyud): tA ya/ an te sa myakr-i bud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM ska ra pa ri shud d+hA d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+ha ma hA na ya pa ri wa re swA hA// gang zhig tsha dang ye shes dpag tu med
179''b2(rgyud): ba'i mdo sde 'di yi gang 'di 'am/ yi ger 'dir 'jug ni/ des chos kyi phung po brgyad khri ba ni stong byang du bcug pa dang / rab tu gnas par byas pa yin// oM na mo b+ha ga te a ba ri pi ta a
179''b3(rgyud): yur+N+Na na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dze rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga twe ya ar+ha te samya kr-i bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra ba ri shud+d+he d+harmA ta ga ga na sa mud gau te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+ha ma hA na ya pa ri wa re swA hA/ 
179''b4(rgyud): gang zhig che dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo ste 'di yi ger 'di'am/ yi gar 'dir 'jug na de'i 'tshams me pa lnga yongasu 'byang bar 'gyur// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te a ba ri mi ta
179''b5(rgyud): yur dz+nyA na su bi nish+tsi ta ta dze rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya aHte sa myakr-i bud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra ba ri shud+d+ha d+harma/ te ga ga na sa budag te swa b+ha wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya
179''b6(rgyud): ba ri wa ra swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'di'am/ yi ger 'dir 'jug na/ de'i sdig pa'i phung po ri rab tsam yang yongasu 'byung bar 'gyur// oM na me b+ha
179''b7(rgyud): oM na mo b+ha ga wa te a pa ri mi ti A yur+N+Na na su bi sh+tsi ta te dze rA dza ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te sa mya kr-i bud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga nas mud ga te swa hA
179''b8(rgyud): wa bi shud+d+ha ma hA na ya pa ri wa ra swA hA// gang zhig cha dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'di 'am/ yi ge 'dir 'jug na/ de la bdud dang bdud kyi rigs kyi lha dang / gnod sbyid
180a1(rgyud): // dang srin pos glags btsal kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur // oM na mo b+ha ga wa te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsa ta te dze rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya aHte samya kr-i bud d+ha ya
180a2(rgyud): tad+ya thA oM sarba sa skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na se mung ga te sra b+ha ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wa ra swA hA/ gang zhig tshi dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'di 'am/ yi ger 'dir 'bru
180a3(rgyud): na de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa dgus mngon sum du lung ston par mdzad// sangs rgyas stong gis de la phyag skyeng bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyo zhing nas sangs rgyas
180a4(rgyud): kyi zhing du 'gro bar mdzad par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tshom dang som nyid dang / yid gnyis ma byed cig/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa ta a pa ra bi tra A yur dz+nyA na su bi dish+tsi ta tre dze rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga
180a5(rgyud): tA ya/ ar+ha te samya kraM bud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra ba ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mung ga ta swa b+ha wa bi shud+d+ha mahA na ya ba ri wa re swAhA/ gang dag tshe dang ye shes dpag tu me
180a6(rgyud): pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'di 'am/ yi gar 'dir 'jug na/ rgyal be chen po bzhis de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang zhing / srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed par 'gyu ro// o na me b+ha ga wa te a pa ri mi ta
180a7(rgyud): A yur+d+ha na su bi nish+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA g+ha tA ya/ ar+ha te sa myakr-i bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harmA te ga ga na sa mung ga te swa b+hA wa ri shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wa re swAhA/ ga
180a8(rgyud): zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yo ger 'di 'am/ yi ger 'dir 'jug na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du
180b1(rgyud): skye bar 'gyur// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te a ba ri mi ta A yur+d+ha na su bi ni sh+tsi tA ti dze rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya aH te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM san+na saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga gnas
180b2(rgyud): mu ga te swa b+ha wa bi shud+d+he mahA na la pa ri wa re swA hA/ sa phyogs gang du mdo sde 'di 'dri ba'i sa phyogs yang mchod rten du 'gyur te/ phyag bya ba'i 'o su 'gyuraro// byol seng gi skye gan su song
180b3(rgyud): ba'i bya dang / ri dwags gang dag gi rna lam du grags par gyur pa de dag thang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur// oM na mo b+ha ga wa
180b4(rgyud): te a pa ri mi ta A yur+d+ha na su bi ni shI te ti dzi rA dzA ya/ tan+ta ga tA ya ar+tha te sam+bag+ni bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+baM saM swA ba ri shud+d+ha dArma te ga ga na sa mud ga ta swa b+hA wa bi shAd+d+ha
180b5(rgyud): ma hA na ya pa ri wa re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'di'am/ yi ga raSh+Ti dir 'jug na/ de bud med kyi dngos por nam du yang skye bar mi 'gyur// oM rnam
180b6(rgyud): b+ha ga wa te a pa ri ma~M te A yur+dz+dza na su bi ni shrI te te dze rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha ti samya hA bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba sa sA ra pa ri shung+ga d+harma te ga gnas ga ti swab+hA wa bi shud+d+ha ma
180b7(rgyud): na ya ba ri wa re swAhA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i phyir kang sha pa Ni gcig sbyin pa byin na/ des stong gsuM gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamasar
180b8(rgyud): po che sna bdun gyis yongasu bkang ste sbyin pa byin par 'gyuraro// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni shI ta ta dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya yar+ha de sa mya kAM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o
181a1(rgyud): // sar+b+ba saM skAr pa ri shud+d+ha d+harmA te ga ga na sa mu ga te swa b+ha wa bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wa re swA hA// gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod par byed pa de dag gis dam pa'i chos
181a2(rgyud): thang chub par 'gyuraro// i na mo b+ha ga wa taM a ba ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyAn su bi ni sh+tsi te te dzo rA dzA ya/ ar+ha te sa pye k+Sha bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma tA ga ga na sa pud ga te swa b+hA
181a3(rgyud): tha bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wa re swA hA/ 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / log pa dang sel dang / gser thub dang / 
181a4(rgyud): 'od srung dang / shAkya thub pa la rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod paHsa pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar nus kyis tsha dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams
181a5(rgyud): kyi phung po'i tshad ni bkang bar mi nu so// oM na mo bA ga wa te a pa ri mi ta A yudz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ aHta sa myak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra
181a6(rgyud): shud d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga ni sa mud ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya ba ri wa re swAhA// 'di lta ste dpar na ri'i rgyal po re rab dang mnyam pa'i rin po che'i phung por byas te/ sbyin pa byin pa de'i bsod
181a7(rgyud): nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bang nus kyi// tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i bsod rnams kyi phung po'i tshad ni 'grangs par mi na so// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te a ba ri mi ta A yudz+nyA na bi ni ts+tsha
181a8(rgyud): te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ye/ ar+ha taM samya kr-i bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra ba ri shud+d+had+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mu dag te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wa re swA hA// 'di lta ste dper na rgya / 
181b1(rgyud): chen po bzhi chus yongasu gang ba'i thig pa re re nas bgang bar nus kyi/ tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar mi nu so// oM na po b+ha ga wa te a pa ri mi
181b2(rgyud): ta A yur+d+ha na~M su bi ni sh+tsita te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga ta ye/ ar+ha taM sa myak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ d+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saMskA ra pa ri shud d+ha drarmA ta ga ga nas su dag te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he bahA na ya pa ri wA re swAhA/ 
181b3(rgyud): gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'di 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/ gus par byas te/ mchod par byed pa de dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha~Md kyi
181b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd la phyag byas pa dang mchod pa byas pa yin// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te a pa ri mai ta A yur+dz+dza na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samya kaM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+yathA
181b5(rgyud): oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra ba ri shwad+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mu ga te swa b+hAH bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya ba ri wa re swAhA/ sbyin pa'i stobs kyis sa sa rgyas yang dag 'phags/ mi yi sang+ge s+thin
181b6(rgyud): pa'i stobs rtogs nas// snying rje can gyi gong khyer 'jug pa na/ spyi na pa'i stobs kyi sgra ni grags par 'gyur/ tshul khrims stobs kyi sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ mi yi seng+ge
181b7(rgyud): tshul khrims stobs rtogs te// snying rje can gyi gong khyer 'jug pa na/ tshul khrims stobs kyi sgra ni grags par 'gyur// bzod pa'i stobs kyi sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags// mi yi seng
181b8(rgyud): ge bzed pa'i stobs rtogs te// snying rje can gyi gong khar 'jug pa na/ bzod pa'i stobs kyi sgra ni gags par 'gyur/ brtson 'grub stobs kyi sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags// mi yi sang+gas
182a1(rgyud): brtson 'grus stobs rtogs nas// snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ brtson 'grus stobs kyis sgra ni grags par 'gyur// bsam gtan stobs kyi sangs rgyas yang dag la
182a2(rgyud): mi yi seng ges bsam gtan stobs rtogs nas// snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ bsam gtan stobs kyis sgra ni grags par 'gyur// shes rab kyi stobs kyi sangs rgyas yang dag 'phag
182a3(rgyud): mi li seng+ge shes rab stobs rtogs nas/ snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ shes rab stobs kyi sgra ni grags par 'gyur// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta ta dzorarA
182a4(rgyud): dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA yan ar+tha te samya kr-i bud+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra ba ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya ba ri wa re swA hA// bcom ldan 'das kyi de skad ces pa/ 
182a5(rgyud): stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / thang dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lnga dang / mi dang / lha ma yin/ dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bac+doMs kyis gsung
182a6(rgyud): ba la mngon par bstod// 'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i gzungs rdzogaso// / rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya a be ri mo ta a yud dz+nyA na hri da yanA d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad/ 'phag
182a7(rgyud): ba tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md la phyag 'tshale// 'di skad bdagis thos pa dus gcig ni/ bcos gang gau ta sa ske
182a8(rgyud): ba'i rdzing bu'i 'gram na/ dge slong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dag 'dun chen po dang / byang chub se de'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bco ldan 'das kyi dge slong rnams la
182b1(rgyud): bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi lhar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'di nas nub kyi phyogs rol na/ bde ba can gyi 'jig
182b2(rgyud): rten khams/ den rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med// su zhig de yi mtshan brjod na// de ni de ru skye bar 'gyur// 'chi ba'i dusu ston pa ni/ dge slong dge la
182b3(rgyud): bcas te mthong // de na bud med yod pa min// mngal na gtas pa yod ma yin// rin chen rnams kyi pad+mo las/ rdzu 'phrul chen po 'byung bar 'gyur// zas dang gos dang sman rnams dang // chos
182b4(rgyud): gos mal cha lhung zed rnams// sems kyis bas ma thag tu ni// de dag mod la 'byung bar 'gyur// phyogs bcu bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// bde ba can gyi bsngags pa
182b5(rgyud): brjod// de ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam mi khyab// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun bsam mi khyab// bsapa mi khyab la dang byas nas/ rnar smin pa bas mi khya
182b6(rgyud): rnam dag zhing du sme bar 'gyur// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi pho brang 'khor dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i rgyu dag
182b7(rgyud): tshad khri yod// rgyal rigs skye so// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi yab ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po
182b8(rgyud): po'i mchog ces bya bar gyur te// de'i yum ni gzi brjid can zhes bya bar gyur to// de'i btsun mo ni rgyal rigs bzang skyong ma zhes bya bar gyur to// dge slong dag de bzhin gi shegs pa tsha dpag
183a1(rgyud): med kyi sras ni zla ba'i 'od ces bya bar gyur to// rim gro ba ni snyan pa'i dri ma med ces bya bar gyur to// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag med kyi shes rab can gyi
183a2(rgyud): mchog tu gyur pa ni bzang po'i tog ces bya bar gyur to// rdzu 'dral dang ldan pa'i mchog dang // brtson 'gas chen po dang ldan pa'i mchog ni bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'o// dge slong dag
183a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi bdud ni mchod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar gyur to// lha sbyin gyi ming ni dang ba zhes bya bar gyur to// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi nya
183a4(rgyud): thos 'dus pa chen po ni nyan thos chen po drug khri yod// dge slong dag sen zad kyi legs par bsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi mtshan legs par gzung la/ zhag ba
183a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa yid la ma yengs par sgom zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na bzhugs pa'i bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med rgyun tu yid la ba'o// dpal
183a6(rgyud): med rnga sku'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di yang rtag tu bzlas brjod bya'o// nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum yan lags lngas phyag byas la/ se ni thaMd kyis de bzhin gabye ba
183a7(rgyud): dpag med bsams na/ zhag bcu 'das pa'i dusu de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag mthong bar 'gyu ro// phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bac+doMs zad kyang mthong bar 'gyuraro// dge ba
183a8(rgyud): rtsa ba med kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du yong su bsngos na/ de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag med
183b1(rgyud): de'i sangs kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyuraro// dge slong dga' chi med rnga smra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs de gang zhe na/ d+ya thA/ shA ba le/ a ba le/ sa ma dza ge ni rnge she nir dzA te/ ni rukye/ nir pu khe dz+wa la bar
183b2(rgyud): dir/ su kha ba ti ni r-i da she/ a mr-i te/ A yu gar b+ha ni ra hA ni/ a mri te/ A yur pra sA d+ha ni/ nir bud+d+ha A kA nir dza te A ka sha ni de she/ A ga sha ni ra da shaM/ A ka sha ni ku sha le/ a kA
183b3(rgyud): nir dar dar sha raM/ A kA sha ad+hiSh+ThA na/ su kha ba ti sa d+hiSh+Ta ne/ rU pa nir daM sha/ tsa tA ri d+har+m+ma pra sa d+ha ne/ tsa tA ri Ar+ya sat+ya pra sA d+ha ne/ tsat+sa ri mArga b+he ba na pra sA d+ha ne/ ba le bIr+ya pra sA d+ha ni/ d+har+m+ma ts+tshed
183b4(rgyud): ne ku sha le/ ku sha la nir de sha/ ku she la pra tiSh+Tha bud d+ha ku sha le/ bi bud d+ha pra b+he sa/ d+har+m+ma ka ra Ne ni rdzA te/ nir du dad+he/ bi ma le/ bi ra rdze/ rA dzA sa na/ ras gre/ ra sA gra/ ba la/ ra sA tra
183b5(rgyud): a d+hiSh+TA na/ ku le pra ta ku la/ bi ku le/ daM ta su doHtsit+ta/ su pra shAn+ta tsit+ta/ su pra tiSh+Tha te/ su li su mu khe/ d+har+the tsa d+harme ba le ba le/ a nu sha a ba le/ bud d+ha A kA sha gu Ne bud d+ha/ A kA sha
183b6(rgyud): ning gu Ne/ a mr-i ta du du gi swa ra swA hA/ dge slong dag dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la 'chi med rnga smra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di skad bstan pa de bzhin du kha te de byed
183b7(rgyud): ba des/ gos gtsang ma dges te sa phyogs gtsang zhing dri ma med par de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med la/ me tog dang spos kyi mchod par bya'o// byang chub kyi snying po pad+ma'i gnas dang / byang
183b8(rgyud): chub kyi shing phun sum chags pa yang yid la bya'o// de la yang 'dod pa bskyed par byas te/ 'dod pa dang dad pa byas na de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar zhu
186a1(rgyud): / dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi shing gi rgyal po ni rin po che'i pad+ma rnar snang ba zhes bya shing de me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshegs pa'o// pad+ma'i gdad ni da
186a2(rgyud): cing gsal la bzang zhing bkra ba'i 'od zer can zhes bya ba te/ rin po che du mas bskor ba la de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med bzhug so// g.yas na ni byang chub sede spyad ras gzigs dpa
186a3(rgyud): byA go// g.yon na ni byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i cho gas gangs med pas bskoro// dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la mos pa dang dad pa
186a4(rgyud): dang gus pa mang ba der skye bar 'gyur te/ gser gyis bzhi chen po la rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma chen po dga' brdzus te skye bar 'gyuro// dge slong dag dge slong ba 'am/ dag
186a5(rgyud): ma 'am/ dge snyen pa 'am/ dge snyen ma gang la la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i mtshan yang dag par 'dzin pa de la/ me'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung chu'i 'jig
186a6(rgyud): pa mi 'byung / dug gi 'jigs pa mi 'byung / mtshon cha'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / gnod sbyin gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung // srin po'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / sngon gyi rnang smin pa ni gang la yang
186a7(rgyud): ma gtog so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang thad ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zer bcas pa'i 'dzag rten yi @
186a8(rgyud): te/ bac+doMs kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod// 'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogasaso// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po su N+ya saM b+ha wa dang / zhu
186b1(rgyud): gyi lo ts+tsha ba pa chab nyi ma grags kyis bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad/ b+ha ga ban a mi ta bA d+hA ra Ni man+t+ra/ bod skad/ bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas kyi gzungs sngags/ bcos de bzhi
186b2(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ a mai ta/ a mi tod b+ha be/ a mi ta saM b+ha be/ a mi ta saM krAn traM ka re/ a bi/ 
186b3(rgyud): ga ga na kIn+ti ka re sarba kA sha kA ya ka ri swAhA/ gzungs 'dir yer ni bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yang 'di lan gsum bzlas brjod byas na sgrib pa de rnams zad par
186b4(rgyud): 'gyuraro// lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na rtsa ba bzhi'i ltung ba yang yongasu byang bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bkrun par 'gyuro// bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas rjes
186b5(rgyud): ngan pa la phyag 'tshalo// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ ma hI da hi ke swAhA/ lus la nad byung ba dang / nad kheng bskam su gyu ra kyang rung ste/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bsngags te/ bsil yab
186b6(rgyud): kyi de la g.yabs na dad med par 'gyur ro// gzungs de gsungs ma thag gi/ 'khor zad yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par bstod// bcom ldan 'das snang ba baH
186b7(rgyud): yas kyi gzungs rdzog so// bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ a mi te/ 
186b8(rgyud): a mi tod b+ha ga/ a mi ta sa~M b+ha ga/ a mi ta bi kran+ta ga mi ni/ ga ga na kIn+ta ka re/ sarba kA sha kA ya~M ka ri swA hA/ gzungs 'di'i yon ni bskal pa brgya stong du bsngags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa
187a1(rgyud): // lan gsupa bzlas pa byas na de rnams zad par rig par bya'o// nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas pa byas na/ rtsa ba bzhir ltung ba'ang sdig pa yongasu byang bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas stong la
187a2(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskud par yang 'gyuro// sdang ba mtha' yas rjesu dran par rdzogs/ #// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa ra pad+ma dz+wa la pu la tan+ta rA dza nA ma/ bad skad du/ 'phags pa byud
187a3(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyu gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus pangar phyag 'tshal/ 
187a4(rgyud): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcos nyi ma la ya'i tshal chen po can dan stong po dang myur gu rgyas pa 'idakyil 'khor gyi tshogs chen po dang thabs gcig tu bcu
187a5(rgyud): te/ 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'ong srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa 'od sru nga dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun 'ged gzhon nu dang / tshe dang ldan pa
187a6(rgyud): 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'i'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang / 
187a7(rgyud): byang chub seda' chen po 'di lta ste/ pad+ma dkar po dang / nyi 'od dang / gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / pad+ma'i spyan dang / ye shes dbang phyug dang / pad+ma'i dbang phyug dang / rdo rje'i snying po dang / rin
187a8(rgyud): tshan snying po dang / kun tu bzang po dang / smir ba rnam par sel ba dang / na mkha'i snying po dang / byam pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / 'jig rte dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / blo gros pi zad pa dang
187b1(rgyud): na mkha'i mdzod dang / blo gos rgya mtsho dang / mthu chen po thob pa dang / zla 'od dang / dra ba can gyi 'od dang / spobs pa brtsegs dang / mya ngan dang mun pa thad sel ba'i blo gros la sogs pa byang chub se
187b2(rgyud): sed chen po grangs med pa dang / gzhan yang gcer byams pa gnas pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma mang po dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma mang po dang / lha'i tshogs dang / klu'i na dang / de zoni/ 
187b3(rgyud): du gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto che chen po dang / grul bu pa dang / sha za dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa bye ba phrag drug dang / khre bo chen po rdo rje hUM mdzad
187b4(rgyud): rdo rje gshin rje gshing dang / rdo rje gzhan gyis mi grub pa dang / rdo rje rta mgrin dang / rdo rje bgegs mthar byed dang / rdo rje gtsug ter dang / rdo rje gnod mdzes rgyal po la sogs pa bdan cu dang / sprad pa
187b5(rgyud): dang / mA ma ki dpa na bza' dkar me dang / sgrol ma dang / 'od zer can dang / dbyangs can ma dang / bag zhal ma dang / khro gnyer can dang / ri khrod ma dang / dug sel ma dang / nor chu/ 
187b6(rgyud): ma dang / dkar me dang / yid bzang ma dang / rnang rgyal ma dang / dpal phreng mo dang / sa 'dzin bzang po dang / rdo rje dbang phyug ma la sogs pa stong phrag drug brgya dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs/ 
187b7(rgyud): tshe 'khor de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la bla ma dang / bkur sti dang / rim gor bya ba'i phyir mchod pa du mas mchod cing bsngags bdu mas bstod par byedado// de nas bcos thub pa
187b8(rgyud): chen po thugs rje chen po yongasu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyems par zhugs// snyems par zhugs pa thag tu sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos shing ltas bco brgyad gyur te// de'i
188a1(rgyud): // lhas de mthong nas lang ka'i rgyal po sgra glegs shin tu snyems pa dang ldan nas rang gi 'khor du ma dang lhan cig der lhag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sgra sgregs kyi sems kyi
188a2(rgyud): rtog pa thugasu chud nas sku'i gnas thad nas 'od zer byi ba phrag du ma byungo // 'od zer de dang sa g.yos pa de dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing zad kyang gsal bar gyur te/ de'i tshe snga
188a3(rgyud): skegs snyoms po dang bcase pas de'i 'khor thad kyis 'dzam bu'i gling du yams nad la sogs pas rnar 'tsha ba de thugs kyis yengasu dgongs nas byang chub sede sede' chen po 'phags pa
188a4(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gdong bcu gci ga ba drang srong rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag brgya stong dang lha/ cig bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sdug lhags nas zhabs la sbyi
188a5(rgyud): phyag 'tshal te/ g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas na/ sa phyogs gcig tu 'khod// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i tshogs rnams kyis nang nas lha'i bu rin po che pad+ma'i da bas rgyan pa
188a6(rgyud): zhes bya ba bzhengs te/ thal mo sbyar nas byang chub seMda' se' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smraso// kye ma mgon po thugs rje can/ rig sngags 'chang
188a7(rgyud): ba'i tshogs dang bcas/ che ba'i byin rlabs ldan pa rnams// sgra sgrogs snyems pa gzhom pa dang // nyon mongs rtsad nas gdon pa dang // sen rnams la phan pa dang // bdag la shin tu sman pa'i phyi
188a8(rgyud): sku dang rjesu 'thun pa yi// rig sngags sbyor ba khyad pa can// snying po dam pab shadu gsol// de tshe 'khor tshogs thaMd kyis// mkha' phyogs me tog char gyis bkang/ bcom ldan thub pa'i dgu pa
188b1(rgyud): rin chen me tog gdugs gyur// lha rnams gtsang mar sbyar ba yi// yon chab bdug spos di dang bshos// ci 'byor dad pa'i stobs kyis phul/ thub pas na mkha'i mdzod du rlabs/ lha yi bu mo dum
188b2(rgyud): yis// rol mo'i sil snyan 'phan gdugs dang // bla re rgyal mtshan lhab lhub dang / lnga ldi na bza' dums mchod// de nas mgon po spyan ras gzigs pad+ma gzhon nu'i zhal mnga' bas/ bzhengs 'ju
188b3(rgyud): thal mo sbyar nas ni/ ston pa la ni 'di skad gsol// sgra sgrogs bzhin gyis snyoms pa dang / mnga' dang rtsal gyis drags pa ste// 'od ni legs brtsams las byung yin// shin tu log pas las
188b4(rgyud): kyang min// smon du sangs rgyas gdong mdzes kyis// bstan pa la yang mgo btang ba'i// bsod nams grangs kyis byung ba yin/ lag pa du mar 'khrul pa ni/ zas dang snod sprad gos nor rgyan/ 
188b5(rgyud): bskal pa bzhi bco'i mched sbyin te// de nas rtsal dang shugs kyang yin// mda' ni b+h+r-ing gi ti yi/ byin rA sa sngon du byed mod kyang / grangs mang tshul khrims bral bas ni/ 
188b6(rgyud): srin po'i rigasu'i khrungs pa dang // 'khor bcas gzhan la gnide 'gyur yin// ngas ni nga tshul rmad byung ba'i// lus kyi bde gshegs sbyin pa dang / sgrub brtson legs byas mtha' yas
188b7(rgyud): spyod bzang la gnas bsgral ba'i grangs// gang ga rlung gi rdul dang mtshungs// de skad 'bras bu de brtsams te// dang po'i las can ji snyed la// phan gdogs bzhi ni bye ba'i phyir// cung zad bsdus nas
188b8(rgyud): brjod bya ste/ legs par nyon la yid la zung // sngon che 'das dus bsgral pa ni// gang gi klung bcu'i snga'i snga rol gyi// cher 'das pa pa yi snga rol na// bde gshegs rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi ma
189a1(rgyud): // man da ri'i dri zhes bya ba// 'jig rten stor pa byung ba'i tshe// bdag ni khyim bdag dag por gyur// thub pa de la rig sngags mnos// thob ma thag tu bskal ba'i grangs// bzhi khri snyed kyi la
189a2(rgyud): ba bsnyil// de rjes bskal pa gang ga klung // bye ba snyed gcig snga rol na// bde gshegs rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mtshan// thogs med pad+ma brgya yi spyan// gtsug tor yon rab rgyas pa'i// 'od ze
189a3(rgyud): rgyal po zhes bya ba/ 'jigs rten ston pa bzhugs pa'i tshe// bdag nyid drang sreng bdag por gyur// rig sngags 'di mnos sgrub pa yis// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhal mthong zhing // skye me chos
189a4(rgyud): la bzod pa thob// de rjes 'das dus bskal pa ni// bye ba phrag brgya'i snga rol na/ de gshegs rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mtshan// tshe dpag med ces 'jig rten du// ston pa byung ba bdag gis mnos// 
189a5(rgyud): de tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis// bdag la dbang bskur lung bstan mdzad// khyed kyi sngon du bskal pa'ig ngas// brjod mi lang nas rig sngags phyir// yang dag stong phrag
189a6(rgyud): stong snyed kyang // dang ba'i mched sbyin chen po byas// bye ba phrag grangs bcu gcig tu/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dbang bskur blangs// de dang de yi rnam smin mchog/ sangs rgyas zhing khams
189a7(rgyud): 'byam du// yang dang yang du 'byung bar 'gyur// phyis ni 'den pa shAkya zhes/ mi mdzad 'jig rten khams khrungs che// mi yul las kyang khyad par du// yi dwags gling du skyes pa 'ga'// 
189a8(rgyud): gtan la 'dud 'phel bya ba'i phyir// mtshan mo mun nag sprin rume du// skad cig glog 'gru ji lta bar// rig sngags 'chang ba gdong bcu gcig/ yan lag steng dang ldan pa la// spyan no chog
189b1(rgyud): stong su bcu pa'i// mtshan dang ldan pa'i sku 'byung 'gyur// de tshe bskal ldan la la zhig/ mtshan nas brjod cing sku la mos// rig sngags zlos pa po gang zhig/ 'jig rten 'dod pa kun grub cing / 
189b2(rgyud): nas ye shes nyis 'gyuraro// lung bstan de skad theb pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas bya ba phrag bcu gcig/ grangs snyed zhal nas gsungs pa yi// rig sngags snying po gdong bcu gcig// mthu chen thogs
189b3(rgyud): ba med pa ste// 'gro la sman cing bde ba dang // nang kun sel byed sdig kun spyod // bkra shis med pa kun bzlog cing // rmi lam mtshan mngan kun sel/ dus min 'chi dang ngan sems bzlog/ rtag tu
189b4(rgyud): dpal dang sems bde thob// mya ngan sdug bsngal ngal ba sel// rtsod 'khrug thams cad zhi ba dang // bdud dang gdon bgegs zhi bar 'gyur// 'jig rten smon pa kun 'grub tsang
189b5(rgyud): dang bar chad mtshon cha nang / dbyig pa dang ni bcing ba dang // brtson rar bcug dang mtshon chas brtsal// gseng sar khrid dang yan lag bcad// mig 'bra mtshon gyis btsam pa dang // rgung
189b6(rgyud): me dang rlungs g.yas// dug dang byad stems ro langs dang / chom rkun mo ma yin rnams gnon// rig sngags 'di yis bsrungs pa dang / len dang 'dzidan dang bri ba dang / klog dang kha ton bshad sogs
189b7(rgyud): rnams// brtson la 'jig rten lnga bcas dang // bdud dang tshangs pa dge sbyong dang / bram ze bcas pas gnod pa med// sngon gyi las ngag yod pa yang // byang zhing bsrabs te med par 'gyur// nges
189b8(rgyud): pa'i dngos po 'di lags pas// rig nas mngon sum yid ches par// rnar rtog med sems kyi blang // de skad skyabs dang skyob pa dang // srung dang dbugs 'byin dpal mgon dang // gling dang kha
190a1(rgyud): / khyim 'di nyid yin// nye rings phyogs ji srid par/ mtshams bcad nas ni rig sngags dang // 'byung po rnams kyis 'tshe ba med// gang gi sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal mchod/ sgyu
190a2(rgyud): 'gro zhing sdig pa bshags// mngon par dga' zhing gzungs sngags 'dis// nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod pa la// phyogs bcu sangs rgyas ma lus pa// mtshungs par yi rangs legs pa sbyin/ 
190a3(rgyud): rtsa ba bzhi dang mtshams meng lnga/ ma lus sdig kun byang bar 'gyur// gnod sbyin srid po sogs snang yang // bzung nas byabs pa'i snying rje'i sems// dang po bskyed nas bla med kyi// byang chub
190a4(rgyud): sems mchog sa la 'god// gang ga klung 'argya 'i sangs rgyas kyi// mtshan nas brjod cing bstod pa bas// rig+sa kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang // bdag gi ming brjod dran byed ci
190a5(rgyud): sngags rgyun tu brjod na de// myur du mchog dgil sa 'thob cing // lag pa'i mthil nas mthong ba ltar// bla med byang chub myur du 'byung // rtse gcig dran pas gus byas te// rtag tu nang pa
190a6(rgyud): sngar langs nas// chos bzhin du ni dge dgyes te// brgya rtsa brgyad du gang brjod pa// tshe 'dir phan yon bcu thob 'gyur// rtag par lus la nad med dang // lha dang sangs rgyas kun gyi srung // nor
190a7(rgyud): rin chen gos rnyed dang // dgra sdang dul zhing 'jigs med dang // bza' rnams bkun cing rigs btsun 'thob// dug dang 'di gshen gdon bral dang // lus la dri zhim kun dga' dang // bsam ngan
190a8(rgyud): snyan brjod byed dang // rims nad bra ba zhing dgang sla dang // dus min 'chi ba sangs par 'gyur// gzhan yang ston bzhi thobo ste// 'chi kar sangs rgyas zhal mthong dang // mkha' la 'od 'thung ltas
190b1(rgyud): mchod dang / nam yang ngan 'gror mi 'gro zhing / bde ba can nam bde 'gror skye// rig sngags 'di dang sangs rgyas kyi// ye shes snying po 'dzin pa la// byang chub sems dang sangs rgyas kyi// da
190b2(rgyud): thar pa'i chos sgo 'thob// bskal pa du mar dag bsags dang // rig sngags 'di snyed 'gyur ba ste/ dad ldan khrel yod ngo tsha shes// blo bzang brtson ldan snying rje che// mdog dkar dang bzang gso
190b3(rgyud): bor smra// sems 'jam lus ngag dal bar spyod// bla ma la gus brtul zhugs che// sred pa chung zhing spyid la dgal// sangs rgyas gus shing sems bcas pa// nyin mtshan rgyun tu rab sngags
190b4(rgyud): 'den// bcu bzhi 'am ni bco lnga dang // khyad par du ni ches brgya de la// gso sbyong sku yi mdun du blang // skyon med tsan dan dkar sogs shing // rig bzang las byas sku gzugs sapa// yang nas
190b5(rgyud): rdo na chen sogs// bzang las bde ba dag/ gas gzugs bya// yi na ris suM bris kyang rung // sku gcig bo 'am lnga tshogs kyi/ dkyil 'khor rgyas par byas pa la/ man
190b6(rgyud): sum bzhin du dmigs pas na// myur du mngon su ma mthong bar 'gyur// yon kun gyis rgyan pa yi// bum pa rga dang bcas pa la// sngags brjod pas ni 'dod don kun// 'grub 'gyur
190b7(rgyud): the tshom mi bye'i// nad dang 'phod pa'i smar rnams la// sngags 'das bza' 'am byugs pas sam// bdugs pa tsam yeng gnod pa sel// srad bu 'am ni gis dag dang // phyag rgyas gdab kyang
190b8(rgyud): bzhini// 'dod pa gang dang gang la yang // me yi las kyi ster bang ba// gsang sngags 'don 'dzin yid bang la// bdag kyang rje su 'jug par bya// de skad gsungs pa'i de ma zag/ byang chub se
191a1(rgyud): 'jam dbyangs kyis// sngags kyi ngo bo nyid la ni// ched du brjod pa 'di brjed// e ma rangs bzhin med pa'i ches// sna tshogs gzugasu snang ba la// brjod rtog bral ba'i
191a2(rgyud): skad cig ni// zhi ba'i che ba nyid yino// sred pa dngos po med pa la// dmigs par byed par sgom pa'o// dmigs pa mthar thugs med mthong ba// de ni sgom pa'i 'bras bu'o// kun tu bzang po'i
191a3(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi// dod la ched du 'di ltar brjod// e ma sku gsum tha dad par// lus ngag yid kyi don las byung // don gcig pa yi rnal 'byor gyis// sku gcig tu ni nges par gzung // gang
191a4(rgyud): la gang phan bskyed pa la// mdza' tshen bzhi na du snang mod kyang // tshig gis brjod pa'i sprul tsam ste// ye sa sku la dbye ba med// sgrib pa rnam sel las la ni// che du 'arjod
191a5(rgyud): ba 'di ltar brjed// e ma dngos po ngo bo nyid/ ma byung ma skyes ma 'gags pa// skye 'gag lte bu'i cho 'phrul ni/ sku des phyag rgya sngagasu snang // lhon chu yi rlabs bzhin du// skye
191a6(rgyud): ba ri ngo la gsal bar byed// nan tan gyis ni de nyid kyang // rgyu ba med par khong du chud// byang chub sems dpa' sa snying gis// rgyal che du 'di brjedado// e ma rang bzhin rnam dag la// thog med
191a7(rgyud): blo yi mun pa'i dbyings// rnam rtogs bag chags kyis bkrugs nas// blo bur dkar gnag la su snang // dkar po sangs rgyas chos dge 'dun// de la sgro btags byang chub sems// de las byung
191a8(rgyud): ba'i 'phrin las kyis// nyon mongs las kyi sgrib sbyong byed// mgon po byams pas sngags sbubs kyi// lam la tshang du 'di ltar brjod// e ma gded nas grol zhi'i sems// mu ltar dang bar sna
191b1(rgyud): med kyang // sna tshogs 'gro ba'i gzungs byung bas// mun pa thobs pos rnam par brgyud// de nyid sems kyi sdang ba'i phyir// 'bad rtsol med pa'i sems kyi grol// rtsol ba sems kyi rims ni
191b2(rgyud): dri ma med pa'i sems 'ching 'gyur// na mkha'i snying pos sngags ming la// ched du 'di ltar brjod par mdzad// e ma stong pa mtshan ma bral// kha dog dbyibs bral chos nyid dag/ dga' ba'i sem
191b3(rgyud): chen gsal byed// shes rab chen po'i yi ge min// mtshan dpe ye shes bde ldan sku// gang gang don du de snang ba// snying rje chen po'i ring shugs kyis// 'byung 'a gyur yi ge ta yi don// byang chub
191b4(rgyud): sed pad+mas ni// gnas la ched du 'di ltar brjed e ma rgyu rkyen na mkha' la// nye zla skar rgyun 'khor baM yos// gsal nas nyin mtshan bye brag brjod// nyon mongs ma rig sred len gyis// 
191b5(rgyud): 'du byed srid pa'i las bskul to// rnam shes ming gzugs skye mched drug/ reg cher skye rga shi sdug bsngal// gsal byed dag pa nyid kyis dag phyag na rdo rjes 'bras don la
191b6(rgyud): che du brjod pa 'di brjod// oM ma zab cing rgya che ba// sngags mthu bla na med pa ni// sangs rgyas mu stegs kyi mi shes// shes pa nyid kyang rdzas med la// shes bya rdza su ga la yod// shes pa yul
191b7(rgyud): gyi nar no// rtag pa'i gzungs 'dzin gyis bsgos pa// de zad nas ni grol bar 'gyur// de nas rig pa'i lha mo'i tshigs// spos dang me tog 'thor byed cing // snyan pa'i sngags kyis kA yis ni
191b8(rgyud): mgon pa spyan ras gzigs la bstod// oM bcom ldan mgon po thugs rje spyad ras gzigs// zhal grangs mdog dbyibs du ma cing yang snang // stong dang brgya dang bcu gcig drug dang ga
192a1(rgyud): / byams pa'i zhal bzangs mnga' ba'i mgon la phyag 'tshalo// spyad ma'i 'o// oM/ rab dgyes zhal mdog du ma cing yang 'gyur// la la byams pa snying rje dga' ba'i zhal/ lal
192a2(rgyud): 'dod rmongs ser sna chen po'i zhal// khro sdang gtum chags lnga ldan phyag 'tshalo// mA ma kI'o// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dbang srur rdzogs pa'i zhal// bstan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin rgyal po
192a3(rgyud): phyag/ mdzad pa grangs med chub pa'i phyag rgyar ldan// gdan gnyis zhabs gnyis gshegs la phyag 'tshalo// na bza' dkar mo'i'o// oMr mdzad pa thugs rje'i dbyibs la thug med kyang
192a4(rgyud): rtsom pa rgya mtsho rgyun mi 'chad mdzad pos// zhi rnams rgya mtsho rnar sbyor ba yi// mgon po spyad ras gzigs la phyag 'tshalo// sgrol ma'i'o// oM/ nyi ma'i gzi ldan 'od zer rtse
192a5(rgyud): bya ljang// 'jug dgongs mi mnga' kun tog/ sun bral yang / bskal ba rgya mtshod khyad par don gsal ba li/ mgon po spyan dus gzigs la phyag 'tsha'o// 'od zer can rnam
192a6(rgyud): oM sems kyi rgyud 'gag mya ngan 'das pa'i tshe// 'dod chags byung ma thag tu yal ba ste// nyon mongs rtsab bcad nas pa mtha' med// mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshalo// phya
192a7(rgyud): can oM/ nyon mongs bdag tu gzung na 'khor bar skye// de la yang yang rtags na ngan 'gong skye// rang bzhin med par shes nas grol bar 'gyur// mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag
192a8(rgyud): phag gdong ma'i'o// yod chos rnams dag par mthong na mtho ris 'job/ gnyis 'dzin rtog pa chad na mya ngan 'das// sgyu ma'i sems dang ldan na gzhan don 'byung / mgon po spya sa
192b1(rgyud): gzigs la phyag 'tsha'o// khro gnyer spyan ma'i'o// oMd rang tshul spyod la chags pas sa bon rul// gzhan tshul dman par brjod pas zhing sa tshig/ lus ngan gtsang sbra tsam las byang chu
192b2(rgyud): ring nga mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshalo// sa 'dzin me'i 'o// oM/  bdag lta mun pa'i dug gis brgyal ba la// bdag med phyogs bral ye shes bdud rtsi'i smin// pha rol phyin
192b3(rgyud): bcu spyod dang rtag dang rtog rtsol mdzad// mgon po spyad ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal// dug sel ma'o'o// oMd dang tshul bzang spyod nga rgyal zhen pa med// gzhan spyod gtang snyoms byas nas
192b4(rgyud): rang sems spyod// srad med bzod ldan dang gi rgol ba lags// mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal// ri khrod ma'i'o// oM khrel yod ngo tsha shes shing gtong la dag
192b5(rgyud): dad dang thes ldan tshul khrims shes rab ba zad/ tsheg shes 'dod chung 'di dang gzhan du thug/ mgon po spya/ ras gzig la phyag 'tshalo// nor rgyud ma'i'o// oMd yig rdza
192b6(rgyud): 'tshod sbyin nyan klogau dang 'chad/ kha ton 'dzin sems sgom brtson de la chu'i// khrus sogs bsnyung gnas dkar gtsang yon stsol// mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshalo// 1
192b7(rgyud): ma'i 'o// oM rang sems dul zhing lus ngag bag yod spod// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das mchod dam pa 'dzin// thes bsam sgom brtson da ni ngag las rgyal// mgon po spyad ras gzigs
192b8(rgyud): la phyag 'tsha'o// rnang rgyal ma'i klu'o// oMHtha dad kyi 'o ching dbyer med grol ba yi// thabs dang shes rab bde chen byang chub lam// rnam thar yo shes mtha' yas dpal ster ba// mgon
193a1(rgyud): / po spyan ngam gzigs la phyag 'tsha 'o/ pal phreng ma'i klu'o// yong bsam pa bzang po gser gyis bzhi la// byang chub bregs chos dpag thas ma gang chen 'khrungs/ yas
193a2(rgyud): rje rgyun munan mdzad pa'i// mgon po spyan ngas gzugs la phyag 'tsha'i/ yid b.rang ma'i klu'o// sgra sgrogs 'khor brgyas 'dar gyung / rlung gis bta' pa'i rwa dang mtshungs// bal me ma
193a3(rgyud): spya na sa// ched du brjod pa 'di gsol te// oMd mgon po rang 'thung bcom ldan 'das// gci ba ri'i tu che ba'i lha// bsod nams du mas spyod pa'i sku// ye shes mtha' yas thugs mnga'o/ 
193a4(rgyud): TI ldan srid mthar mdzad pa po// tshul ldan tshul khrims la sbyor mdzad// gtsang ldan bram ze tshangs pa che// mdzad spyod mkha' mnyam spyod phyag 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan
193a5(rgyud): bachis// 'khor la leg so la gis zhes/  aHhrIHts+tsha s+t+wa~MhA bcas// yang yang brjod pas byin gyis bad+hAbs// lcags kyu can gyi nya nas// klu phyugs 'bum drag 'dzim
193a6(rgyud): ltar// dge sbyong kun slong dkar pos ni// byang chub rin chen gling 'jig mdzad// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las glen bzhi'i le
193a7(rgyud): sta dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan thub pa che/ mgon po yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyaso// sna tshogs snang ba zhes bya ba'i// ting 'dzin la snyems zhugs nas// yan lag cha shas
193a8(rgyud): las dang 'od zer sna lnga bye ba phrag/ drug cu drug cu'i mtha' gzhal pa// grangs med dag ni bkye bar mdzad// zhing khams gangs med bdun gyi mtha'// phyogs bcu ma lus thad du// 'od kyi gang

193b5(rgyud): rol pa yi// drang du byang chub seMde'i gtso// spyan ra sa gzigs dbang seng+ge'i sgra// mdog dkar shel gyi ri 'dra ba// byang chub sems mchog bye ba phrag/ bcu dang lhan cig mkha'

193b7(rgyud): so rdzogs sangs rgyas/ 'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang // rmad 'byung chen po cheg bcad kyis// zhing rnams rnar g.yos par 'gyur// 'gro ba'i gti mug mun pa bcas// shes rab mtha' yas gsal
193b8(rgyud): bar mdzad// bdag kyang snying po 'di yis bathus// phrin las 'di nyid gogs bgyi do// oM hrIHsaM ha nA da hUM phaT/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang // thub pa'i ga la de legasu// 'khor bcas dga'
194a1(rgyud): // tshul gyis ni// dbus btsugs thal po sbyar nas bzhugs// lha yi phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog/ grang med bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi/ zhing khams rin chen brtsegs pa na// sangs rgyas
194a2(rgyud): rin chen dpa' bzhugs pa'i// drung du byang chub sede'i gtso// spyan ras gzigs dbang yid bzhin gyi// nor bur 'khor los bsgyur ba tsha// gser gyi ri bo mdog 'dab// byang chub sems tshogs
194a3(rgyud): bya ba phrag/ bcu dang lhan cig mkha' laM gshegs// glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon// bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/ phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas// 'dab ma stong dang dang ldan pa yi// rin
194a4(rgyud): chen gser gyi me tog ni// rgya che du ma 'thob par byed// bde bar gshegs rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang / rmad 'byung che bo'i tshogs bshad kyis// zhing rnams rnangs sngo
194a5(rgyud): bar gyur// 'go ba'i ser sna 'ching ba bcad// sprin pa'i 'byung gnas gter chen rdol// bdag kyang snying po 'di yi mthus// phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid// oM pad+ma d+hA ra d+ha ke
194a6(rgyud): hUM phaT// snying po de skad phul nas kyang // thub pa'i ga la de log su// 'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni// bus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// nu kyi phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog glang
194a7(rgyud): med bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi/ zhing khams pad+mo brtsegs pa na/ sangs rgyas pad+mo'i 'byung gnas ba zhugs/ drung du byang chub seMde'i gtso// spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rdza can/ pad+ma nirta shwar
194a8(rgyud): gtsod pid+ma ra ga'i 'dra ba// byang chub sems tshigs bye ba phrag bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/ glog 'gru bzhin du zhing 'di pyod/ bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/ phyag 'tsham
194b1(rgyud): bskor ba du ma byas// 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi// pad+ma ra ga'i me tog ni// rgya che du ma 'thob par mdzad// bde bar gshegaso rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang // rmad 'byung
194b2(rgyud): bo'i tshogs bcas kyis// zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par 'gyur// 'gro ba'i 'dod chags 'dab rdzab bskams// tshul khrims byugs spos char du phab// bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus// phrin
194b3(rgyud): las 'di nyid grogs bgyidado// oM pad+ma nri te shwa ra hrIHhUM phaT/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang // thub po'i ga lang log suM// 'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni// pus gtsugs thal mo sbyar
194b4(rgyud): nas bzhugs// byang gi phyogs kyi zhing khams sa tshig// grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi// zhing khams rdo rje bkod ba na// sangs rgyas rdo rje thogs med bzhugs/ drang du byangs
194b5(rgyud): sems dpa'i gtso// mgon po spyan ras gzi gas dbang ni// thugs rje chen po mi gshol ba// rin chen mar gdar po 'ang // byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag/ bcu da
194b6(rgyud): lhan cig mkha' la gshegaso// glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byed// bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la// phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma bya// 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa liM// marga ta li ma
194b7(rgyud): no// rgya che du ma 'thob par mdzad// bde bar gshegaso rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang // rmad 'byung chen po'i tshogs bshad kyis// zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par
194b8(rgyud): 'gyur/ 'gro ba'i le la'o nags tshal bsregs/ brtson 'grus bskul ba'i me phung sngar// bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus/ phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid/ oM rat+na a grA a pra tita mU
195a1(rgyud): // paT/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang // thub pa'i ga la de log su// 'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni// dbus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// byang shar phyogs kyi zhing
195a2(rgyud): mchog/ gang med bdan gyi mtha' nyid kyi// zhing khams gter chen brtsegs pa na// sangs rgyas don yod 'byung gnas bzhugs// drang du byang chub se de'i gtso// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dang
195a3(rgyud): ni rje bcan don yod zhags pa can// shal gyi ri bi'i mdog 'dra ba// byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag/ bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs// glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byen// bcom
195a4(rgyud): ldan mgon po thub pa la/ phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas// mdab ma stong dang ldan pa yi// rin chen shel gyi me tog ni// rgya che du ma 'thor bar byed// bde bar gshegs rdzogs sangs
195a5(rgyud): rgyas// 'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang // rmada' byung chen po'i tshogs bshad kyis// zhing rnams rnam par g.yo sa par 'gyur/ 'gro ba'i zhe sdang ri'o bcom// bzod pa'i nyam
195a6(rgyud): lhang nger mdzad// bdag kyang snying po 'di yi mthus// phrin las 'di nyid gogs bgyid// oM hrIHtrai lokya bi dza ya a mo g+ha pA sha/ a pra ti ha ta hrIHha hUM phaT swA hA/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang
195a7(rgyud): thub pa'i ga la da log su// 'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni// dbus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// shar lho'i phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog/ grangs med 'dun gyi mtha'
195a8(rgyud): nyid kyi// zhing khams bdud rtsi brtsegs pa na// sangs rgyas sman gyi 'byung gnas bzhugs// dung du byang chub sede'i gtso// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni// rje btsun ha la hi la che/ bug
195b1(rgyud): ra ka'i ri bo 'ang // byang chub sems mchog bye ba phrag/ bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs// glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byod// bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la// phyag 'tshal bskor ba
195b2(rgyud): byasas 'dab ma steng dang ldan pa yi// pu shA ra ka'i me tog ni// rgya che du ma 'thor bar byed// bde bar gshegs rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'od zer nge mtshar ldan pa dang // rmad 'byung chen po'i tshigs
195b3(rgyud): bcad kyis// zhing rnams rnam par g.yes par 'gyur/ 'gro ba'i phrag dog dug sdong sprul// bas pa gtan bdud rtsi rgya batsho rlabs// bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus// phrin las 'di nyid gogs
195b4(rgyud): bgyid do// oM ha la ha la hrIHpad+ma gar+b+ha hU~M phaT swAhA/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang // thub pa'i gal de logasu// 'khor ba cas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni// dbus gtsugs thal mi sbyarahA
195b5(rgyud): bzhugs// lho nub phyogs kyi zhing khams mtshog/ gangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid na// zhing khams pad+mas rgyan pa na// sangs rgyas pad+ma'i snying po bzhugs// drung du byang chub seMd
195b6(rgyud): gtso// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni// rje btsun pad+ma rgyas pa'i lung // zangs ma zhun gyi ri bo 'dra// byang chub sems mchog bye ba phrag/ bcu dang lhan cig mkha' kha gshegs// ldeg
195b7(rgyud): 'gyu bzhin du ning 'di byen// bcom ldan mgon po thub pa li// phyag 'tshal bskor bdu ma byas// 'dab ma stong deng ldan pa yi/ zangs mthun gyi me tog ni/ rgya che du ma 'thong bar byed/ bde bar
195b8(rgyud): gshegs rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang / rmad 'thung chen po'i tshigs bshad kyis// zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par 'gyur// 'gro barmongs pa'i thibs po bcom
196a1(rgyud): // tshogs thabs kyi rlung chen 'phyo// bdag kyang snying po dade yi mthus// phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyidado// oM pad+ma a laM kA ra hUM phaT swA hA/ snying po de skad bul nas kyang // thub pa rig la
196a2(rgyud): de log su// 'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni// dbus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// nub byang phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog/ gangs med bdun pa mtha' nyid na// zhing kham stong
196a3(rgyud): brgya zhes bya bar// sangs rgyas dam tshig dpal bzhug so// drung du byang chub se'i gtso// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni// rje btsun rdo rje chos dbang phyug/ nor bu dung gi kha dog 'ang/ byang
196a4(rgyud): sems mchog bye ba phrag/ bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs// glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon// bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/ phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas// 'dab ma stong dang lnga
196a5(rgyud): pa yi// spugi snying po me tog ni// rgya tsha du ma' thor bar byed// bde bar gshegaso rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang // rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis// 
196a6(rgyud): zhing rnams rnar g.yos pa bar gyur// 'gro ba'i mnar sems zhen pa gsal// mthu stobs chen po'i rdo rjes btab// bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus// phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid// oM
196a7(rgyud): d+harma d+hA tu hUM swA hA/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang // thub pa'i ga la de log su// 'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni// dbus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// steng gi phyogs kyi zhing kham
196a8(rgyud): mchog/ gangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid na// zhing khams gtsug tor brtsegs pa na// sangs rgyas gcig tor rgyal po bzhugs// dang du byang chub sa de'i gtso// mgon po spyan ras gzigs
196b1(rgyud): dbang ni/ ha ri ha ri ha ri la// nod zhes rab tu grags pa yi/ rje btsun chos kyi gtsug tor te/ in+d+ra nI la'i ri bo mdog/ byang chub sems chogs bye ba phrag/ bcu dang ldan cig mkha' lag bye// klog
196b2(rgyud): 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dod byed// bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la// phyag 'tshal bskor bdu ma byas// 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yo/ in+d+ra nI la'i me tog ni/ rgya che dum 'thong bar mdzad// bde 'as
196b3(rgyud): so rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang // rmad 'byung chen po'i tshogs bcad kyis// zhing rnams rnar g.yos par 'gyur// 'gro ba'i log lta'i sgrib g.yogs sel// dag pa'i spa
196b4(rgyud): lam 'khor lo bskor// bdag kyang snying po 'a yi mthus/ phrin zas 'di nyid grogs bgyid// oM b+h+rUM hrIHha hU~M swA hA/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang // thub pa'i ga la de logasu// 'kho
196b5(rgyud): bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/ dbus gcu gas thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// 'ogi phyogs kyi zhing khams mdo gagrangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid na// ning khams za matog
196b6(rgyud): mdzes na/ sangs rgyas gnon pa'i dpal bzhug so// drung du byang chub senga' gtso// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni// rje btsun mgrin pa sngon po rgyal/ an da rnyir gyi ri bo 'dra// byang chub
196b7(rgyud): tshegs bye ba phrag bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs// glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon// bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la// phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas// 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa
196b8(rgyud): yid an+d+ra rnyil gyi me tog na/ rgyan du mar 'thong bar mdzad/ bde bar gshegs rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang // rmad 'byung chen po'i chog bcad kyis// zhing rnams na
197a1(rgyud): // g.yos par 'gyur// 'gro ba'i shes bya'i sgrib nags sel// ye shes ral gris rtsa ba brags// bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus// phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid// oM ma Ni pad+me ts+tsha
197a2(rgyud): snying po 'di skad phul nas kyang // grub pa'i ga la de logasu// 'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni// dbus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// spyan ras gzigs dbang tshogs 'das nas/ 
197a3(rgyud): rig sngags mthu chen 'chad pa dang // gzhan don rdzogs par mdzad pa de'i// shin tu dga' bar mdzad pa la// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thang kun// phyag rgya rnams ni spyi bor bzhag/ 'dzum pa'i
197a4(rgyud): mdangs kyi legaso byan// na mkha' snyan pa yis kyang bkang // de'i tshe phyogs bcur bzhugs pa yi// khro bo'i rgyal po ma lus rnams// sa stengs thad gar gyis bkang // g.yas brkyang g.yon brkyang

197a6(rgyud): ba thal sbyar tshe'i tsums 'gyed// sor mo cig snol gcig 'khyud dang / kun snrel kun 'khyud kun gdengs dang // rgyab stsol res 'khyud kun 'khyud dang // mos ras 'khyud grang kun sbrang dang / mnyam
197a7(rgyud): gzhag dang ni mchog gi rgya// sa gnon sgrub sbyin mchog sbyin sogs// phyag rgya du ma bgegs rtsol mdzad// gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong ba'o tshogs// ma lus 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// gdo
197a8(rgyud): bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba// snga na med pa'i rog sngags med// ngo mtshar byung zhes thos ma thag lus kyang shin tu 'dang gyur nas/ rgyal mchog gtso bo drung lhags te// phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar na
197b1(rgyud): ning spyan sngar 'dug te 'di skad gsol// gang zhig gdong bcu gcig pa yi// rig sngags len cing 'dzin pa dang // rgyun du 'don dang yid la byed// 'jig rten mgon po spyan dus gzigs/ kyi
197b2(rgyud): 'khor chen po'i tshogs 'di rnams// gang gi yid la byed pa'am// yang na ji tsam ngan yang rung // dge ldan rigs kyi bu da ni// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba rnams kyi sras// byang chub seMda' rnams kyi
197b3(rgyud): bshes// rigs pa'i lha mo rnams kyi yab// byis pa rnams kyi gnyen yin te/ bdag cag rnams ni de yi 'bangs// skyes bu khyu mchog chen po ste// bsod nams rnams kyi gtar ldan zhing // 
197b4(rgyud): de yi tshul khrims ral ba med// mi de skye bo don yod// lha gnas dga' gnas spugasab tu// ye shes 'od zer bdud rtsi 'dzud/ 'jig rten 'di yi nad rigs dang // gdon rigs ji snyed
197b5(rgyud): yod pa'am// rig sngags byung snyams ma lus ba// de la tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// cho ga bzhin du spyad pa yis// tshangs pa'i tshe tshad gnas nas// shi ba sems rgyal med par ni
197b6(rgyud): gnas 'pho tshul gyis mtho ris 'jug/ rgyal ba'i zhing du gshegs nas kyang // rgyal ba rnams la chos nyan cing // rgyal sras rnams dang stabs gcig tu// stobs dang mi 'jigs kun brnyes te/ 
197b7(rgyud): mtshan dang dpe byad ldan gyur nas/ skad cig glog 'gyu ji bzhin du// 'gro ba ma lus dag byed cing // zhing rnams ma lus dag par byed// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud
197b8(rgyud): kyi rgyal po bad+ma ba las lha byung ba'i le'u si gnyis pa'o// de nas lag na rdo rje 'dzin/ bzhengs te thal sbyar thub pa la// phyag 'tshal phyogasu 'khod nas ni// gsang ba gtod nas tshan ni
198a1(rgyud): // gsol/ phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i rgyal dbang po// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang kun// rang rang gnas nas gshegs nas byon// 'gro bathugs brtse chen po yis// snying po
198a2(rgyud): byin rlabs ldan la gsol// rma du 'thung ba'i snying po la// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras bcas dang / rig pa 'dzin rnams 'thun par dgyes// 'on kyang 'gro mangs gzung ba dang // dngos grub zang
198a3(rgyud): myur ba dang // snying po mthu dang ldan pa'i phyir// mgon po thugs rje che rnams kyis// byin rlabs ldan pa rtsa ba'i sngags// 'dran pa de ring bshad gsol// rig sngags nyi ma zla ba'i'o// rtsa de'i snga
198a4(rgyud): kyis sprin bral byed// 'go ba thugs brtse mdzad pa dang // bdag la phan pa'i don sladadu// rgyal ba mya ngan bral bas// rtsa ba'i gzungs sngags bsha du gsol// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// sdig
198a5(rgyud): kun myur sgrol bya ba yi/ ting 'dzin la snyom zhugs nas// sku gsungs thugs kyi thugs rje las/ spyan ras ga/ zigs dbang sang+ge'i sgra// rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsung so// 
198a6(rgyud): na mo rat+na tra ya ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a ka Te bi ka Te/ naM ka Te/ Ti ka Te/ ka TaM ka Te/ ka ro Ta/ bIr+ya swA hA/ yon yas
198a7(rgyud): tshogs kun// rig sngags 'dis ni nges par bskyed// khyad par du ni mdza nad la// rtswa las byung ba'i me bzhin// rtog ldan rnam shes brgyad kyi bzhi// sbyor byin maN+Dal lci pa brgyad// ba ser skya
198a8(rgyud): yi bdud ces byugs// yan lag bcu gnyis mgor bcas pa'i// sngags grangs byin gyis brlabs byugs nas// lhag ma yan lag thig ler bya// cung zad lha la myang bas ni/ dus dus sus
198b1(rgyud): brgya dag cu'i tshe/ nyi ma grangs kyis dag nas ni// lo gcig du su rtogs ldan 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// dpal skyed 'tshe ba bzlog pa yi// ting 'dzin la snyoms zhug nas// sku gsung
198b2(rgyud): thugs kyi rdo rje las sa// mgon po yid bzhin 'khor lo yi// rdza ba'i rig sngags 'di gsung so// na mo ran+na tra yA ya// na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bi d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ mahA
198b3(rgyud): kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsakrA warti pad+ma tsin+ta ma Ni dz+wa la mahA pad+me ru ru tiSh+Tha dz+wa la A kaR+Sha ya hrIHhUM phaT swAhA/ 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ glo bung gnod pa bsal ba'i phyir/ 'du
198b4(rgyud): phrag sngags grangs dang mnyam pa'i// nyungs kar ser po brgya rtsa brgyad// rang gi lus sam yin lag la// mcho dang bcas pas gdags par ga/ dal yang yang gsol ba ga

198b6(rgyud): 'di gsung so// na mo ran+ta tra ya ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ sarba satwa bA sa nA gA d+ha ni// na maHsarba satwa bi san// AH
198b7(rgyud): NI/ na maHsarba satwA ba yo d+ha ra NA ya/ na maHsta~M b+ha pra ma nA ya/ namaHsarba sar+b+ba bid+d+hAH gas ne kA rA ya na maHsarba sar+b+ba ban+d+ha na ts+tsha da na ka rA ya/ na maHsarba satwA du// kha'i mi hAHka rA ya
198b8(rgyud): namaHsa rba yar+b+ba ka rA bi d+ha nA ma ka rA/ na maHsarba ba dA d+ha ra rA pra sha pra ta ye marje mo g.yo gI shwa ra ya/ ha sa ha s+yai nA~M ya/ ni ma swA t+ma yid Ar+ya sa pa kro ki ti shwa ra mu kho ga/ 
199a1(rgyud): / bi ba di da/ yak+Sha rak+Sha sa/ shAsh+ya brah+ma loka pA la ya/ biny+tsA ma he shwa ra/ nA ra ya Na sman dku ber/ a su rA/ ma trig / na maskr-i tatra/ badz+ra khu Nas hrid ya/ ha ya grI ba nAm
199a2(rgyud): da yang na war+t+tid+dA mi a be pra ma yetas dka sa paH/ sarba bi nA ya kaM a mo g+haM/ sarba kadz+nyA ba Shiny+tsa/ bi rA ya kan/ tad+ya thA/ oM ta ru la/ Sha nu ta la/ bi 'du la/ sarba'iSha ka ka/ sarba bud d+he ba di ni/ 
199a3(rgyud): ti pata/ e ni la baM sA li ka aT+TA sa ke shwa rA ya/ a to ba pra bi ta ya/ badz+ra khur nir+m+me ti ta/ tsa li ta pra pu da ta la/ badz+rod shAnr-i ta ti/ si ta ma du to ga ta pra na ma Na ba kA ra ba da tu bid+yA ka ma ga saM b+ha kan kA
199a4(rgyud): sarba bid+yA ba tA he sha kA ra/ da ra me shIR+Sha ka ra/ bud d+ha bo d+hA ya ma ti/ b+ha ge bA ha yaM grA ba sarba bid+yA hr-id ya/ mA brti Sh+ya mi/ la trakha dra/ ma hA ro dre/ man+than/ rakA ra k+Sha/ At+ma swas+t+ri tan man+t+ran sing d+ha

199a6(rgyud): kra ma kri tAn+ta gra/ ka khor da dur laM gi \u0f85haM/ bi Sha ka ta/ sA sha deny+dza/ bi Sha tsur+ya yo ga a b+hi tsa ra/ ba shI ka ra Na sA d+ha any+tsa naM/ tsaku mo ha ni tsin+ta/ paM she sa na kA ra nair+ya a pa ra bri Sha ka ra Na/ trA sa ya trA sa
199a7(rgyud): ma hA bo d+hi sat+su/ rin d+ha da sha na~M/ sarba b+hU b+h+ya/ sarba satwA nAM/ rakA rak+Sha/ mA ma nu trA d+harmA saM g+ha a nu dz+nyA ti ma karma shI g+he/ ku ru ku ru phaT/ ha ya grI ba phaT/ badz+rA daSh+To ta ka Ta b+hai rab par se nA phaT/ ye ke tse
199a8(rgyud): mA ma a hid shaM go ba kA ya kra min to// mo tra yaM tre sa man+ti/ dza ya ri dzu haM ti/ ka khor da kurba da na/ sarba dza mu khe da pra tad+da ya phaT/ na maHsarba duSh+Ta ga ho ta swe da na ya ha ya gri ba sid d+hu tu me man+ta
199b1(rgyud): dA na~M swAhA// oM a mr-i tong bya bA ya hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ na maHsarba satwa shwA si d+h+yaM tu me man+t+ra bdA ni swAhA// gang zhig klas non sprul ni// dung gi me tog sngags stong gis// byin gyis brlabs nas ga gul
199b2(rgyud): 'dug lus la thog nas legs par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan thub pa tshas// thogs med sems dpa' zhes bya ba'o// ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// mgon pa
199b3(rgyud): thugs rje mig shol ba'i/ rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsung so// na mo ran+ta tra yA la/ na ma Ar+ya ma 'amo ka te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ mahA sa twA ya/ ma hA ku ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ na maHsarba b+hI ma tsaka raM/ 
199b4(rgyud): sarba rog pra sha ma na ka raM/ sarba b+hU dIn b+ha ra ka raM/ any+dza k+Sha Na pa di sa satwe b+h+yaHtA rA sa mya kA tA rA/ NaM da sha dig dzod+haM satwe b+h+yaHna maHsamya kAM bud d+ha ko Ti nAM/ a he na ma sto nga Ar+yA
199b5(rgyud): lota shwar shud d+ha d+hA ra Ni maT+Ta kA ru Ni kA la/ mar+thakye / ma hA ka ru Ni kA la~M/ e gra nA ma dzi las ti kA ra/ mahA/ ru Na b+hu ba sa matan riH/ tad+yan+te/ oM dzaTadzAHdza~MHrje
199b6(rgyud): dzu Tu dzu Tu/ re re ra be ra ra ra ri/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hA kA ru NaM ka ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ ma hA saM ga ha/ a nu ha ran+ta/ e h+ya saM d+ha ya/ e h+ye hi/ tsa ta tsa na/ tsi ti tsi ti/ tsa tu tsU tu/ 
199b7(rgyud): sarba bo d+hi satwa/ pra Ni d+hA na grih+Na/ kA ra a nu san+na ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ saM b+hA ba e h+ye he/ ra la ra la/ ru lu ru lu/ d+hu na bri mo kA sa mA d+hi/ sa ma ba tIn+ti shur+Na a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ tsa la tsa la/ tsi li tsi li/ tsula?
199b8(rgyud): tsu lu/ bo d+hi bi d+hi/ e hi e hi/ bud d+ho bud d+hi/ bud d+ha sa t+ye ne/ d+ham sa t+yaM na/ saM g+ha sa t+ye na/ o Ta s+phA Te s+thA/ sarba ma hA me tri b+hU NA ni pa ran+d+ha/ ma hA ka ru Na me g+haM mA ma sarba ra ga ni ba ra yan+d+ha/ bun Tu
200a1(rgyud): / bi bu na'i bu na/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ oM Ta s+pho Ta swa/ e h+ye he/ mA ma sarba sha pu yaM tu/ karma bi sho d+ha ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ mahA pad+ma nA dA yas/ pad+ma a pA yi swAhA/ shwe
200a2(rgyud): A dz+nyA u pa bi d+hA ya swAhA/ ka ru ri Ni swA hA/ shu b+ha d+d+he swA hA/ tsakra NAM swA hA/ ya me swA hA/ oM da tsa bi bud d+he b+haHswA hA/ saM s+pha tsha b+h+yo bud d+he b+h+yaHswA hA/ a du ba du ke b+h+yo bya d+hi da swA hA/ bid ka b+h+yo byA d+hi b+hiHswA hA
200a3(rgyud): bai d+ha de b+h+yo byA de b+h+yaHswAhA/ swapa ni pradz+nye ke b+h+ye b+ha de b+h+yaHswAh+ne/ b+ha mi aM ti ra ka sha tsa re b+h+re byA de b+h+yaHswA hA/ tad+ya thA/ au tra Ta traT/ tra ti tra tau/ tra tu tra tu/ na mA ma sarba b+ha ya b+h+yaHsarba u pa dr-i ba b+hU/ rokA rak+Sha
200a4(rgyud): ku ru swAhA/ gre sa grA sa swA hA/ ma tha ma tha/ br-i ma tha dr-i ma the/ ha ne ha na/ da ha da ha/ ba tsa pa tse/ na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa tA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ A dz+nyA ba ya
200a5(rgyud): swAhA/ shing kai ri'i sa bon las/ stong du 'das nas dri na dang / lhan cig sbyangs la byugs pa ni// ldog nad drag po 'joms par byed/ de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/ rig steg

200a7(rgyud): te b+h+yaHsarba bud d+ha bo d+hi sa tre b+h+yaHna maHpra t+ye ka bud d+ha Ar+ya shrA ba ka saM g+hA b+h+yo/ a tAM ta a nag ta pra d+hud pan+de b+h+yo/ na maHsamya ka ga ta ni/ na maHsa myaka pan+d+ha nAM/ na maHshA ra dr-i tI butwA ya maH
200a8(rgyud): ma ta ye/ na ma Ar+ya ma tr-i ya pra mu khe b+h+yo/ ma hA bo d+hi sarba saM g+haM b+h+yaHni moHsu pra tiSh+NI ta shai lan+di rA dza pra mu khe b+h+yaHsarba ta tha ga to b+h+yaHad+had b+h+yaHsa myaM kr-i bud+d+he b+h+yo b+ha ga'ang b+h+yaHna maH
200b1(rgyud): su bar+N+Na bar+d+ha su pra tib+hA se bi nan+te shwa ra rA dzA ya thA ga tA ya/ na maHsi tsa b+ha~M kr-i DoM ta rA dzA yaHthA ga tA ya/ na ma a bya sa mi tA b+hA ya/ na maHsu pra ti ShI ta ma ni kA Ta rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ nam
200b2(rgyud): sa man+ta ra spyad ga ta shr-i kA Ta rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bi pA sh+tsi ne ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHshi khi ni ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bi shwa b+hu dze ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHkra ku tsAn+da dA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na maH
200b3(rgyud): na ka mun ye ta thA ga tAM yaM/ na maHkA sh+ya pA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHshAkya mu na ye ta thA ga tA yaM/ ar+tha taM samya kr-i bud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM mu ne mu ne ma hA mu na ya swAhA// oM sa maM sa mi mnyam
