207b7(rgyud): samya kl-i bud d+haM ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+hUHad+hi b+h+yaHsamyak+saM bud d+he b+haHna ma Ar+ya ba lo ki ta shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM d+hu ru d+yA ru/ ha ra ha
207b8(rgyud): swA hA/ bdun phrag re re btang ba yi/ spos bsregs pa bdang / mar me sbar/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na se ga ra be ro tsa naM b+hu ha rA dzA ye/ ta thA ge ta ya/ aM d+had te/ sa mya k+saM bud+d+hA ya/ 
208a1(rgyud): // sarba tA thA ga twe b+h+yaHad+ha b+hU/ samya kAM bud+d+ha b+h+yaHna ma Ar+yA ba lo ka ta shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ si ri si ri/ d+hi r-i d+hi ri/ sid+hi r-i saM d+hi ri swAhA
208a2(rgyud): me tog byug spos me tog phreng / bdun bdun brjod la sku gzugs la/ gtor dang byug dang gdags par bya// na mo rat+na tre yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya d+he na sA ga rA ba tsa na b+hU ha ra dza ya/ ta thA ga tA ya aR+thaH/ 
208a3(rgyud): samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta b+haHad+had b+hAHsa myakraM bud+d+he b+h+yoHna ma ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru NaM kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sA d+ha sA d+ha/ so ha siM hi/ so du so du
208a4(rgyud): bshos gtsang me tog 'bras bur bcas// nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod nas ni/ zhal zas rnams kyis rnar mchod// na ma rot+na tra yA ye/ nA ma Ar+ye dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ aH
208a5(rgyud): te san+yakr-i bud d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHar+Ya b+h+yaHsamyakr-i bud+d+he b+h+yoHna ma Ar+yA ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kI ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM ma mA d+hisi/ 
208a6(rgyud): le tsa le/ tsu ru tsu ru/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru s+yA hA me tog dkar pi'i shing dum buMs/ sum cu bzhi mar sbrang rtsi ra ni/ zhag gcig spangs nas nyin gtsog gam/ nang ra nu ba ra ra re la// sngags re btab nA
208a7(rgyud): bsregs nas bzod// ci dgos pa rnams bsgrubs nas 'grug na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsan byA ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a rnyad te/ samya kaM bud+d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ 
208a8(rgyud): ar+had b+h+yaHsa myakr-i bud+d+ha b+h+yoHna ma ar+yA ba la kai te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM i li mi laM/ bi l-i ti li/ tsi li ti l+r-i/ s+yAhA/ chu'am thal ba yungs kar l-i// 
208b1(rgyud): / lan bdun bsngags nas phyogs bzhir gtor// sa phyogs nya ring gang du yang // mtshabs gcod pa yi mchog lag so// ra po rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+tha dz+nyA na sa ga ra re ro tsad b+hA ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga
208b2(rgyud): ya/ a r+yAd te/ samyakaM bud+d+ha ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHaR+shad b+huHsamya kr-i bud+d+he b+h+yoHda ma Ar+yA ba lo kau ta shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sad+d+ha ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ si ri ti bi ti/ ti Ti taM Te/ 
208b3(rgyud): be de be de/ ka tsa ka tsa/ b+ha gi bAd/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te sha rA ya/ sarba sA d+ha naM swa hA/ sku sogs slar yang spyan dngas dang / rang nyid gnas nas ldeg don phyir// rgol lan btab pa yis// bkrus nas dgongs pa
208b4(rgyud): de dag 'grub/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na b+hU he rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA yau ar+he ta/ samyakaM bud+d+ha ya/ na pa/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHar+thad b+h+yaHsamya kr-i bud d+hir+g+ho/ na ba swa R+shab lo
208b5(rgyud): ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ sahA satwA ya/ mahA ka ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM badz+ra hU hrIHhoH'jig can 'jol rab dag ba zas skem byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags// de nas bcom lda
208b6(rgyud): thub pa ches// ti nge 'dzin la snyems zhugs nas// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// mgon po zhal ni bcu gcig pa'i// rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs// na po rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA gar
208b7(rgyud): tsen b+hA ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya aR+sha taM/ samyakA bud d+ha ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga twe b+h+yaHad+had b+hUHsa mr-i kr-i bud d+he b+h+yoHna ma Ar+yA ba lo ki ta shwa rA ya/ be d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ 
208b8(rgyud): dad+ya thA na maHsarba b+hU ha T+Ti he sarba a ha~M bud+d+he pras ke saM be b+h+yo/ na ma rat+na tra yA ya~M/ na ma A~Mr+ya dz+nyA na sa ga re bai ro tsa na b+hu he rA dzA la/ ta thA ga tA ya/ i d+had te/ samya kr-i bud+d+hA ya/ na maHsarba \u0f85
209a1(rgyud): // ga tA b+h+yo/ ad+had b+h+yaHsamya kaM bud d+he b+h+yo/ na ma Ar+tha ba lo ki ta shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka ya/ a b+ha ya d+ha na/ sarba pa tag+ga ra tA na ka raM/ sarba Ar+d+ha yag
209a2(rgyud): ba pany+tsa pra sha ma na ka Te/ sarba bi shud+d+ha/ kI li hi g+hA tA/ bi ga hA/ pra ma Na ka ra/ sarba pA paM nA shwa ya ka raM/ sarba b+hu da ba ta le/ ba she ma d+he na/ dungs dan/ dur+Na mi taM/ sarba bag+h+na bi nA ya ka na/ bo d+hi saH
209a3(rgyud): kar/ ba ra tsakA/ du b+hek+Sha/ sha ke b+h+r-i ya ni sa ra ka ra/ sA d+hi ga/ nA ga/ ya k+Sha/ gan d+har+Ya/ e su ra/ ba ru Da/ kin+da ra/ mahor ge/ sarban+na da ke ra~M/ sarba bi shAH ke Da D+ha/ su k+She d+ha g+he d+ha/ kratsAka
209a4(rgyud): ri bai Da li/ maM g+ha la/ bi nA sha ka rA ya/ na mo nA tha ma hA ka ru Na/ e ka da sha mu kha swa/ tra sa b+hu dze swAhA/ sre naka/ tad+ya thA/ oM dzaHka ri/ yu dita hA ri Na/ bi tsi tra mu khi e ka sa pu kha/ sarba sa p+pa
209a5(rgyud): ma hA ra Ni dza mut+ta/ sa hasra b+hu dza ma hA ni dr-i/ mahA shrI ni na laM kA ra/ ma Ni kur+tha/ ya sa na d+ha hA se nat+te/ bi tsit+ta mu lad+ha ra/ tsan+da sA r+ya/ a ti ra ke A kA sha ga ga na tsa ri Ne/ maM ga la
209a6(rgyud): sha ri dzi mu ti be bit+ta dr-i Na ma~M ga le/ b+hu ra mi tra kA raH/ tsu re tsu ru she ta pA ke/ pu ru mu ru/ shaSh+Ta ma pa na tataM/ hu ru hu ru/ bAM pad+ha pu Shi/ ku ru ku ru/ tsi tra mu khi/ A ra~M d+ya ba ra Ni/ dzaM d+ha ni/ ma g+ha dz+nyAH
209a7(rgyud): sarba pan+d+har b+he/ ma hA naM/ a mo g+ha pA sha hasta/ sarba b+ha ya bai tsi yo nI ra tsa ri/ ag+ni baM shwa/ u dka pa ya/ pra sha ma ni/ ka khor da ni/ bA na/ oM hi r-i ha ri/ dza ya ka ri ba la ka ri/ d+ha na ka ra~M/ ta tsas/ 
209a8(rgyud): ra b+ha ba d+hi/ prag mno/ udz+nyAn par kra sha mngon par s+ya/ be ni ni mu do ta tar no prab+hu na b+ha la ma Ni ma/ mahA gagi sa Ni d+der/ trai log ma la~M ka ka ri ti pu Na ka re/ tri yU N+Dag bings na/ 
209b1(rgyud): ba rje na/ Shi tra bA dzi ni/ sarba bi rakarma Ni/ swa ni/ sarba b+hUd+hi ni/ bra ga maNi swAH/ oM tsi li mi le swA hA/ tsa li tsi li swAt+ma/ mi li mo li swAt+ma/ sa la si li swAH/ tsim tsi li swAhA/ tsin+da li mchin
209b2(rgyud): swAt+ma/ uR+ShA ka sha pi ga la ka to d+ha ma nu mu khi swAhA/ oM ka ra ka ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si raM/ su ru su ru/ muny+tsa muny+tsa muny+tsa ya/ pra shA ma ya pra shA ma ya/ su d+hod d+hA rA Ni swAhA/ tsin+da ni
209b3(rgyud): pA la ka ri piT/ a su ra na ra ki ti ti phaT/ dza ya ka ri phaT/ ska ti ri phaT/ sa ha sra ne tre phaT/ sarba b+ha dra d+ha ra na maHtra taM phaT/ sarba b+ha la bi mo kA Ni paT/ ma ra tsakran pa ra Ni phaT/ ba re sen+ya si g+hu
209b4(rgyud): pa ni phaH/ sarba kr-i tu ka ma si du ni phaT/ sarba d+ha d+hi pra sha ma ni phaT/ sarba byAd+ho bo nA sha ya phaT/ sarba gra ho tits+tshin+dan phaT/ rak+Sha ra kA mAM/ sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nA/ sa pa ra sa pa ra/ nai ta tsa
209b5(rgyud): ri sa ma nAM/ sarba pre te b+h+yaHsarba yut+te b+h+yaHdus tri te b+h+yo/ sarba trit+ta ka khor da/ sarba be she b+h+yaHsarba kA ya bA k+Shita te/ si tse b+h+yaHrak+Sha rakA mAM swA hA/ sa ha swa b+hA / sa ha sra na tra
209b6(rgyud): ka da sha mu khi/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma ha satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sid d+h+r-i tu me man+ta pa dI ni swA hA/ rje btsun zhapo ni bcu gcig pa'i// sngags 'a da yon mtha' yas te/ 
209b7(rgyud): gang la 'di ni gtsug tor du// yid bzhin nor bu thogs dang mtshungs// 'chang dang klog par byed pa des// mtha' yas yon rnyed par 'gyur// nad dang gdon rnams sel ba dang // khyad par du ni
209b8(rgyud): sdig kun 'byung // ba dkar mi yis bdud ci lngas// maN+Dal 'jam po lnga byugs la/ gtsang sbra ldan pas dbus ni// shing sku ring bsrel ldan pa bzhag/ gzhan yang ring srel ldan pa yi// 
210a1(rgyud): // sku gdung bzhi ni phyogs bzhir te// chad ldan pa yi bum pa ni// lnga po dbus dang mtshamasu ste// rigs lnga'i mdog dang phyag rgya can/ sna tshogs rgyan dang mchod pa dang // srad bu za da
210a2(rgyud): bra bar ba// ci 'dod phyag rgya bris pas te/ tshes gcig nas ni bcu bzhi'i bar// 'dod la dmigs nas sngags brjod// bzhi khri rdzogs nas bco lnga la// 'dod pa gsol gdab khras byas nas/ ci 'ad
210a3(rgyud): myur du grub pa dang / bdud dang bar du gcod pa dang // rnar 'tshe dang mi mthur pa// khrus kyis nges par sel bar 'gyur// sngags brjod len mtha' yas rnams// bsdus nas sgrub be la ldan 'gyur/ ma
210a4(rgyud): / ba spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/ sngags gang brjod pa tsam la yang // gshis ngan shi ba bco lnga med// skyes bzang bco lnga thob par par 'gyur// mu ge rgyal po'i chad pa dang // dug dang mtshon dang
210a5(rgyud): g.yul 'gyed dang // stag sogs sbrul sogs gcan zan gdug/ dug can zas dang me chus// srog chags dunadang nyal nyes dang // g.yang byed dang ni lha 'dis gces// gas
210a6(rgyud): mi rung dang bdag lci ba rnams// de la nam yang mi 'jig so// rgyal po chos ldan yul skye zhing // 'phags pa bzhugs dang dus bzang yul// bshes gnyen bzang dang dbang po cheng // dge la dga'
210a7(rgyud): zhong tshul khrims ldan// bran khol bzang po nor mangs rtag/ gzhan gyis bkur zhing dgos 'dod sbyor// sems bder 'jig rten skyong bas srung // sangs rgyas zhal mthong don zab rtags// gzha
210a8(rgyud): yang de man la byams sems bskyed// snying rje mtshim 'khrug pa dang / skyon dran nas spro ba dang // dkon mchog gsum la dam pa dang / phul du 'byung ba'i blo yis 'phel// tshul bzhin ma chi/ 
210b1(rgyud): yid dral dang // bka' lung sde snod dang ba rnams// yang nas yang du skye bar 'gyur// ji ltar spros pa'i gnas mthong na// sngags 'di rang bzhin med par byas// oM swa b+hA ba shud d+hAHsarba d+harmAHsa
210b2(rgyud): b+hA ba shud dz+ye ha~M/ 'dzin pa dge zi'i blo byung cha/ sngags 'dis stong po nyid du bya// oM shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko tsa/ gang gis lus ngag yid g.yon// sngags 'di brten par byin gyis ba
210b3(rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya kroH badz+ra swa b+hA wA At+ma ga haM// gang la gnod mod sems ldan dang / ring gis sa gni 'gags yod pa// gsal bying seng ldeng dkar po ni// khrag las smras shing
210b4(rgyud): gzhon pa las// sor dag tshad ldan phur bu ni/  rjid ldan rtse mo rno dpal can// mgo bi rked pa brgya mdang tshul// sor chad phyed phyed ldan pa la// zur ni bcu drug rkang pa la// gsor
210b5(rgyud): gnyis zur brgyad ldan pa'o// ser gsum zung gsum rtse rno ba// dpal mabo cung zad par reg pa// des dang skabs ni zab pa ste// sngags kyi byin rlabs ldan pa brgyad// khang pa'i
210b6(rgyud): zur dang phyogs bzhi por// ga ya su phyogs pa gzugs par bya// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ de ma Ar+ya dz+nyA sA na ga ra be ro tsan byA ha rA dzA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tA aR+Sha te b+hAHsamya kaM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma
210b7(rgyud): AR+sha ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mash+tsar+tha badz+ra ko d+ha ya/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Ta/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ a mr-i ti tsI phaT/ 
210b8(rgyud): ltas ngan zad 'joms pa dang // gnas khang byin gyis brlabs pa dang / tshe dang long spyod rtags pa dang / ngal 'byor phun sum tshogs pa dang / dang po thal mo sbyar byas te/ phyis ni lag g.yon bsdig
211a1(rgyud): // mdzun bcas/ oM dang ma la la la ho// zhes ni brjod cing khang pa yi// nang du 'jug pa khro bor bcas// de nas hUM sgras so gtogs/ de nas oM AHbadz+ra dang // smra ba Ni b+h+yaHa tsaM// 
211a2(rgyud): rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM phaT brjod/ shin tu 'jam pa'i gtan la ni// rdo rje skyil krung gis gnas nas// bsrang te pog ni sna rtser phab// dayo ba'i rlung ldan dkan la ni// lha yis cung zad rig pa bye// lte bcu
211a3(rgyud): zad 'khum pa yis// sems ni bag yod gnas par bya// rtag pa ma yin mi rtag min// gtsang ba ma yin mi gtsang min// bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal min// bdag dang ngar min bdag med
211a4(rgyud): min// blang dang 'dor ba'i 'jigs tshogs min// se mos ma yin zhing sems byung min// phung khams skye mched med ma yi na// yid min rtag min chad pa min// mun pa ma yin shes pa
211a5(rgyud): min/ 'gro min 'od min gnas yin// 'dod pa/ thugs du ma bsgyur byed pa// mkhas byung na mkha' la ni thim// 'gro 'ong ston pa 'dod bskul pa// med med na yang de ltar
211a6(rgyud): spyod// yul gyis ma skyes dbang po min// dus kyis ma yin gtan gyis min// rgyu dang de bzhin gyis min// gnas skabs gzhan yang de la med// de la sa de'o sems nyid kyang // gnas ma
211a7(rgyud): 'ongs gar mi gnas// gar yang ma song brtags na stong // brtags par byed pa rtog pa tsam// dngos rnams rtags pa ming tsam te/ kun rdzob tsam du ming yig la// rten na rang gis sems
211a8(rgyud): bzung na/ drod kyi bzhi pa dang por gzung // phrug pa'i gnyis pa de la brten// de la dang po pas bskor// dang po'i bco lngas mnan pa ste/ bcu drug pa ni gros su gzhag/ yi ge drug la grub pa ni/ 
211b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas drug gi rang bzhin te/ 'od zer rnam pa drug dang bcas// rlung drug gis ni dbang byas nas// yul ni rnam pa drug la 'jug/ yul drug gi dbang bas nas/ nyon mongs rnam pa drug dang bcas/ 
211b2(rgyud): nyon mongs rgyas par 'gyur ba yin// phung po rnams pa dag dang ldan// phung po grangs kyi dbye bas ni// yan lag drug drug 'phel bar 'gyur// yan lag rdzogs pa'i grib mas ni// rang bzhin
211b3(rgyud): dag pa'i sems sgrib byed// sgrib gnyis go bas 'thug pa ni// gsal ka ri ri bo dang bcas pa// rtag chad gan su bzhugs pa'o// srog rtsol bsdams pa'i sbyor ba yis// phyi rol snang ba nub par
211b4(rgyud): 'gyur// rtsol dang bral nas dge' skye ste// yi ge la ni sems gnas 'gyur// yi ge gsal ba'i 'od zer ni// ba spu khung rnams zad nas// sems dang bcas pa ldang 'jug ste// slar yang thig
211b5(rgyud): le bsdus nas ni sa/ yi ge nyid kyang mi dmigaso 'dzin pa de las thos nas kyang / sgyu ma'i rnam parjes dran bya// la goms nas ting 'dzin ni/ nyams pa med pa thob par
211b6(rgyud): 'gyur// ting 'dzin de bstan gyur nas ni// las 'dis rig pa 'dzin pa thog// rig 'dzin de la gnas nas ni// bla med byang chub de thob 'gyur// skad cig de la rdos rnams ni// nam mkha' lta
211b7(rgyud): bur dag nas kyang // mkha' ltar kun la khyab par spyod// rten ni spyan ras gzigs dbang ste// lus ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal// yan lag phyag na rdo rje ste// mgo dang thod ni ma pham pa/ 
211b8(rgyud): gtsug tor sgrib pa rnam sel nyid// nyenyi zla kun tu bzang po ste// sa rga me rlung na mkha' dang // rnam shes nyid dang bcas pa'o// thad dbyer med 'gyur ba ste/ bsam gtan la ni gnas pa'i phyir/ 
212a1(rgyud): // sul rnams so sor bsdu bar bya// sems klong pas ni nges par 'gru'// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi// dus ni rtag pa ma yin te// mi tog sems nyid 'brel gyur nas/ dus la tha dad
212a2(rgyud): mi rtog ge// nyi ma'i 'khor lo cha rgyun dang // na mkha'i phyogs ni ji lta bar// sems kyang sems kyis btsal bar bya/ gzhan ni go skabs mi 'byed// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtsa ba'i
212a3(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las/ thun mong gi sngags byung ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas drang srong gnas nas ni// sna tshogs gzugs ldan zhes bya ba// bskal pa du mar sbyangs pa
212a4(rgyud): yi// byang chub sems dpa' rigs 'dzin zhig/ rgya cher rang gi 'khor bcas la// dkyil 'khor dra du lhags nas ni// rmad byung chen po'i tshigs kyis mchod// phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma
212a5(rgyud): byasangathal sbyar 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis ni// ston pa la ni 'di skad gsol// oM mtha' ya spros la nyer zhi zhing zhi mdzad du zhi rab spyod mdzod// rtag bcom rtog mkhyen rtog
212a6(rgyud): yongs zhugs// ye shes kun rgyal phyag 'tshal lo// zhi las zhi 'gyur mtha' 'byung ba// chos rnams kun mchog zhi chos che// spros med las spros dkar bcu bya// mtha' yas chos lo phyag
212a7(rgyud): 'tshalo// gil gyur gol mdzad dag pa che// dag par spyod pa gtsang ma mgon// tshogs rdzogs tshogs ldan tshogs spyod rgyal// tshogs rtag bdag nyid phyag 'tshalo// rab mdzes thugs rje'i
212a8(rgyud): nyi mas rgyan// 'jig rten rab gsal mdzad pa'o// rtag pa don chen rtag zhags la// mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal// khams gsum bag chags kyis bkrugs pa// thibs pa
212b1(rgyud): ling rtog zhugs pa rnams// mngon du snang bar brjod pa dang // sems la gsal myur shin tu dga'// mngon sum med la bral yang // lkog tu gyur pa smos ci dgos// lkog don mngon du byed pa la// phyag
212b2(rgyud): rgya dang ni 'di 'bag mchog/ mngon sum thong ldan ming nas kyang / don la sems kyi gsal ba skye// don gang yang yang goms pa las// sems kyi 'jug pa rtog pa ste// de gsal mi rtog zlo phras
212b3(rgyud): bu sgom pa'i pha rol phyin pa'o// blo dpan rnams kyi 'jug pa dang // 'bring po 'gro bar bya phyir dang // rnon po rdzogs sangs rgyas 'gyur phyi// gzugs brnyan byung tshul bsha du gsol// myur du 'jug pa
212b4(rgyud): grol ba dang / byung du byang chub cher 'gyur cing //  zugs brnyan dge ba'i tshul 'byung can// 'dren pas di ring ba shadug sel// mkha' sprin rtag pa med pa la// mtshan mar gzung du med
212b5(rgyud): bltar// rnam rtog sa bkru gis sems la ni/  zhig mtshan mar 'dzin par 'gyur// dmigs pa'i mtshan pas sal byed pa// gzugs rnyan tshad dang ldan pa ste/ legs par
212b6(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i yid 'jug cing // byir rlabs nges par 'jug par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'den pa gtses// ljags kyi dbang po rab bkram nas// gzugs rnyan dge ba'i tshul byung ba// nga las ma
212b7(rgyud): par brtson pa ni// legs pa lha yi drang srong mchog/ rigs 'dzin byang chub sems khyod lags// rtse gcig sems kyis mnyan nas kyang // legs par gsungs pa yid la zhog/ khyod la
212b8(rgyud): yang dag bshad bya ba/ nyin rlabs dgyes pa'i gzugs brnyan dang // tshon gyis risu bris pa 'am// rin chen rigs sams rdo 'am// shing la byas na mchog tu bsngags// dang po'i las canas
213a1(rgyud): la dmigs pa gsal bar 'gyur ba dang // byin rlabs mchog ni 'jug par 'gyur// tsan dan dkar po gsal zhing drang // gzhan zhing chags pa med pa la// bsang zhing dad pas
213a2(rgyud): bdugs nas ni// dang ldan dang tshul bzang bas bzhag// 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon gyi sku// bco brgyad sor tshad ldan pa la// gdan khri dag ni sor dgu ste// rgyab yol sor chad drug gis bskyed// 
213a3(rgyud): bzhengs te ldem bag nyams dga' ba// rin chen du ma'i gzugs kyis// g.yas kyi dang po bgrang breng ste// gnyis pa mi 'jigs stsol ba'i phyag// g.yon pa dang po pad+ma dmar// gnyis pa ral
213a4(rgyud): baspyi blugs thogs// zhal gyi drangs ni bcu gcig la// mdun gyi zhal gsum mtshan bzang can// byams pa snying rje dga' ba'i mdangs/ dkar po dkar ser dmar smra 'o// gago
213a5(rgyud): gyi gsum ni khro bo'i zhal// sgeg pa'i mngangs dang ldan pa ste// dmar dang dmar ser lab rga no// g.yasu gtum pa'i khro zhal gsum// sngo dang ser dang ljang ku'o// rgyab tu khro gtum mdog
213a6(rgyud): dmar ba// rta skad rab tu 'tsher ba'i zhal// khro ba'i zhal rnams mche ba gtsigs// mig gsum dbu skra se re bo ni// gyen du thor btsugs bcings pa'o// stengs du sangs rgyas 'dzum pa'i zham
213a7(rgyud): byi ru bcag pa'i mtshan 'dra ba'i// dbu li cod pan nang rnam su// 'di dag phyogs bcu'i thub pa rnams// nga re bzhin du bzhugs par bya// dbu rgyan cod pan ldan pa dang / rna rgyad mgul rgyan dang
213a8(rgyud): rgyan dang / lag rgyan sen mo der bcas pa// do shal rkang gdub ska rags can/ rgyan dngan 'tha' mdzes pas brgyan// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ris ma dga' gyur nas/ yid gzungs dpa/ 
213b1(rgyud): spyod khro ba med// sred chung shes rab snying rje che// thabs ldan mo rgyud la mkhas// bsam pa bzang ldan tshul khrims srung // 'di chos gzo la gzhus pa yis// dben zhing nyams dag ri gnas
213b2(rgyud): br-i gzugs bzang yid dal gtsang ldan pa'i// bu mos bkal ba'i ras la ni// tshon bzang ngur smrig ma gi bya'i// 'thas par bces te 'jam por bya// thig phyogs cha bshad nas kyang // ser skya
213b3(rgyud): chen gyi gzugs brnyan ni// tshad la mkhas pa chad ldan pa'i// nan tan du ni bri bar bya// dkar po wa ye shes yin te// dmar po sems rtso li khri'o// sngon po rams dang mthing shing ste// ser po bad+ma
213b4(rgyud): dag pa yin// nag po snag tsha nyid yin te// ljang khu rams dang ldong ngos sbyor// yang na spang ma nyid kyis byas// smug rtsi rams dang skags sbyar te/ gzhan yang ci rigs sbyar bar bya// sprin dang bral na
213b5(rgyud): grub par 'gyur// shing skyon ser dang ka pa ti/ lo mi ta dang than dzar/ de dag so sor sbyar ba yi// gsal zhing bkrugs med dag par byed// a ta bas ni snun par byed// gan taH
213b6(rgyud): ni rtag par 'gyur// rgyas pa grwa bzhi sgo bzhi pa// yang na sgo gcig pa yang rung // dkyil 'khor cha rim gsum pa 'am// yang na ga/ nyis sam gsum yang rung // dbus gdong na
213b7(rgyud): bcu gcig ni// mdzes pa'i lha mo bzhi ldan bri// shar du spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/ dkyil 'khor rnam snang gtso bo can// de yang spyan sogs lha mo bzhi// phyag bzhi pa dang bcas pa'o// 
213b8(rgyud): lhor ni 'jig rten dbang phyugi// dkyi shAkya thab gtso bo can// lcags kyu nags pa lcags sgrog dang // 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya ldan pa'i// nub tu rig ma'i dkyil 'khor ni// sa dnga' bzhi bzhir bcwa
214a1(rgyud): // dbus rdo rje dbang mo yang // mdun du rdo rje rtag pa ste// g.yas rdo rje dpal 'byong// rgyab tu rdo rje dpag med// g.yon du rdo rje don gru'o// shar du lha mo spyan ma Ni/ mdun du rdo rje sed
214a2(rgyud): g.ya su rdo rje rgyal po'o// rgyab tu rdo rje chags pa ste// g.yon du rdo legs pa'o// lder ni lha mo mA ma kI/ bdun du rdo rjer rin cheno// g.ya su rdo rje nyi me ste// rgyab tu rdo rje rgya lo mtsha'o// g.yon du rdo rje ban
214a3(rgyud): ba yin// nub du na bza' dkar mo yang // mdun du rdo rje chos yon te// g.ya su rdo rje rnon po yin// rgyab tu rdo rje rgyu zhes pa/ g.yon du rdo rje smra ba'o// byang du lha mo sgrol ma yang // mdun du rdo rje las yin
214a4(rgyud): te g.ya su rdo rje srung ba'o// rgyab tu rdo rje gnod sbyin te// g.yon du rdoHkhu tshur// 'khor gyi byang chub sa dar rnams// kun kyang na lag cig phyag bzhi ste// g.yas kyi dang por na
214a5(rgyud): rtags// gnyis pa thaMd skyabs sbyin te// g.yon gyi dang po pad+ma yang / phyo gas kyi kha dog ldan pa'o// gnyis pas phyogs kyi mdog ldan pa'i/ sngags nor phreng yang 'chang ba'o// 'khor gyi
214a6(rgyud): mo de dag kun// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// g.yon pa'i tha ma bum pa 'chang // lhag mgong ltar shes par bya// byang du khro bo'i dkyil 'khor yang // khro mo bzhi bzhir bcas pa'i// dbu su rdo
214a7(rgyud): rdo hU~M byed// sngon po u ba la yi mdog// mdun du sngo bsangs chen po ste// g.yas rdo rje drag mo'o// rgyab tu rdo rje brjed pa'o// yon du rdo rje mthu chen mo// shar gyi 'khor lo'i chartsibs la// khro / 
214a8(rgyud): gshin rje gshed pa nag/ mdun du rdo rje dbang nal ma/ g.yas rdo rje khyab 'jug mo// rgyab tu rdo rje gnon ma// g.yon du rdo rje bskul byed ma// 'khor mi rtsibs ni mnyam pa la// khro bo gzhan byen
214b1(rgyud): mi thub ser// mdun du rdo rje gnag byed mo// ga ya su rdo rje me chen mo// rgyab tu rdo rje zla ba mo// ga yon du rdo rje rnon po ma/ rtsibs gsum rdo rje bcugs tor gser// rdo rje khro mo khrag mthung mo// rdo rje'i rlu
214b2(rgyud): 'dzin chen po dang / rdo rje sdeng byad mor bcas pa'o// nu'i kyi rtsibs la tsam grin dmar/ mdun du rdo rje rmongs byed do// gal su rdo rje zhib mo// g.yon du rdo rje tshol byed ma lnga pa'i rtsibs lang bzhin du/ zlam
214b3(rgyud): bgegs mthar byed pa ldang // mdun du rdo rje gsor byed ma/ g.yasu rdo rje ga tu mo che// rgyab tu rdo rje ro langs sam// g.yon du rdo rje reng byed ma// rtsibs dag 'khor lo bri ba ni/ rdo rje gnod mdzes rgyal ljang sde
214b4(rgyud): mdun du rdo rje chu dbang mo// g.yasu dngos grub 'thung ma'o// rgyab tu rdo rje mtshan mo ngag// g.yon du rdo rje mkha' dbang phyug/ de ltar rdo rje khro bo khro mo rnams// kun kyang nal gcig phyag bzhi pa'o// khro ba
214b5(rgyud): phyag gnyis mda' gzhu bkang // g.yas na be con kha T+wAM dang / thob rdo rdza rgya graM dang / 'khor lo gtun shin rdo rje rnams// rang rtags phyag rgya 'chang ba'o// g.yon na bsdigs mdzub zham
214b6(rgyud): pa'os kun kyang sta mi sham thabs can// khro mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni/ g.yas na gri gug cang ste'u ste// g.yon na thong khrag kha T+wAM // zhing lpags dag gi chos gos te/ gzigs gi lpags pa
214b7(rgyud): thabs can// khro bo'i g.yon na sgeg pa'i tshogs// de rgyab cha yi snam 'u la// phyogs rer lha mo bzhi bzhi nga // de bzhin byang chub se 'a bo ni// phyogs rer brgyad brgyad bkod pa ste// sum cu rtsa gnyis
214b8(rgyud): bzhengs pa'i tshul// de bzhin bskor bzhin sems ma mchog/ lcags kyu zhags pa lcag sgrogs dang // 'bebs ma rang rtags phyag rgya g.yas// gnyis pa mi 'jigs phyag rgya ste// g.yon pa
215a1(rgyud): phyogs mdog pad+ma dang // gnyis pa dar gyi chos goso// kun kyang sgeg nyams ldan par dri// de rgyab dkyil 'khor chal ni/ shar du brgya byin glang chen go// g.yas kyi dang po rje
215a2(rgyud): gnyis pa skyabs sbyin phyag rgya can// g.yon pa phyogs mdog pad+ma ste// gnyis pa rang mdog phreng ba bri// de yi g.yon du tshangs pa ser// ngang pa'i khri la bzhugs pa la// g.yas kyi dang po nyi ma 'cha/ 
215a3(rgyud): me yi phyog suM nyi ma ste// mdog dmar bzhon me dpung 'dzin// lho yi phyogasu gshed rje sngo// theng dbyug bzung ba ba he zhon// bden bral du ni srin po gnag/ rtse gsum bzung nas srin po zhod// nub du rku
215a4(rgyud): dkar po ni// klu yi khri la sbrul zhags bzung // de yi g.yon dus ba dag dkar// bum pa bzung ste rus sbal zhon// lha min phyogasu rlung lha ljang // ba dad gzung ste sha ba zhon/ byang drig
215a5(rgyud): sbyin mi la zhe na// ljang nag phyag na gter sme mo// byang shar dbang ldan dkar me ni// rtse gsum bzung ste khyu mchog zhen// sgo bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi// phyogs kyi kha dog cha can/ 
215a6(rgyud): pi wang ral gri zhags pa can// rin chen dbyig tha~M g.yas kyis 'chang // gnyis pa skyabs kyi phyag rgya ste// g.yon pa ma la bgrang brang ni// phyogs kyi kha dog ldan pa'o// kun kyang sgeg nyams phyogs
215a7(rgyud): kyi mdog/ rim bzhin stag gzig dos seng ge ri// khri la bzhugs pa'i gzig pa can// rang rang phyogs kyi sgo la ni// srung brtson shin tu 'grus pa'o// kyil 'khor cha brgyad khor yug du/ bza'
215a8(rgyud): me tog spos shing dang / mdzes pa'i shing tshogs tshel gseb du// mdzes pa'i bya tshogs dud 'go dang // lho yi bu dang bu mo sogs/ de bzhin klu dang gnod sbrid dang / do za grul bum bu mo'o// rol mo
215b1(rgyud): byed pa du ma bri/ 'di ltar dang na la las ni// 'jig rten skyong ba'i nang rol tu/ bza' dang rgyu skar sum cu dag/ rin chen pad+ma la gnas bri/ smid drug pad+ma dpar po 'chang // sngar ma yis ni mgo ud pa la
215b2(rgyud): nab se pad kar lag tri shul// rgyal ni bgang phreng skag sbrul nag/ mchu ni pad ser ge mnyam gzhag/ ma bzhi pad kar dbong dbyug pa// nag pa pad+ma sa ri ras/ sa ga po ta lha mtsham bu pa// sman ni
215b3(rgyud): rdo rje snabs dbyug ste// cha snod ril pa chu smad pad/ byi zhun gser gyi 'khor lo ste// go zhun chu sgyogs mon ga dang // mon ge shel slong khrims stod kyis// ral gri khrums spad ku mu da// nam gru ba dan thi skad
215b4(rgyud): gyis// shing le bra nye brug sran// zla ba ku mud dkar po ste// nyi ma pad ma dmar po'o// mig dmar me yi phung po ste// gza' lag ud pa la sngon po'o// phung bus chos kyi glegs bam mo// ba ba sangs ni \u0f7f
215b5(rgyud): breng gzang // spen pa lag rnal gi 'chag// sgra gcan bdud rtsi'i gnod/ bu'i// nang gi grwa yi char gtogs pa/ bkra shis lha mo ba rgyud yin te// rtag dga' ma dang rgyal ba shar/ do/ 
215b6(rgyud): grub ma dang mi 'pham lhor// nub tu bde ba bde dga' ma// myur gab ma dang gtan ma dang / rtse lnga rtse gsum rdo rje dang // sngon po ser po rin tshan dang // dkar dang dpar dang ud bal dang / ud pal sngon dang ku mu
215b7(rgyud): dang po phyag na rim bzhin 'chang // skyabs sbyin pad+ma 'gang phreng ni// lhag ma rnams kyi rim bzhin 'chang // de dag zang phyogs mdog/ rgyas pa'i pa'i spros pas skyon yang // lnga bcu brgyad das suM cu 'dun// nyi shu
215b8(rgyud): dgu 'am nyi shu lnga// bco lnga dgu 'am lnga 'am gcig/ yig phyag rgya gzugs brnyan tshegs// sprul pa'i sku yi cho 'phral te// rang gi ji ltar 'dod pa yi// sems kyi byini rlabs nyid 'gyur// bdag
216a1(rgyud): / sku dang po ti dang // phyag rgya sogs par rab gnas bya// nyams sam dri mas gos pa ni/ bkrus dang bshig nas dag byed pa/ rtog pa med pa'i sems kyis// de la bsod nams dpag
216a2(rgyud): tu med// gzugs tshogs sngo bas smad 'gyur yang // de yis bsod nams mtha' yas thob// phrin las dang ni sku gsang ba// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid// de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid// byang chub nama'i
216a3(rgyud): mtshan nyid dang // mtshan dang dpe byad kun rdzob ste// sgyu ma rmi lam lta bu'o// sum cu gnyis dang brgyad cu ni// yi ge brda dang spros pa'i sku/ long sku bsod nams rgyu 'thun 'bras// kun rdzob don dam mtshan
216a4(rgyud): nyid ldan// dag dang ma dag skal ldan la// bde gshegs phrin las ga zug sku gnyis// tshogs gnyis la ni sku gsum byu // rnam bya de kun nyon mongs pas stong // lus ngag yid kyi skye
216a5(rgyud): yul min// dmigs med na mkha'i khams rtog pa// rgyal ba rnams kye chos sku'o// rtags chad med pa'i rten 'bral ni/ skye 'gag/ med par thugs chud pas/ yid kyi rnam shes 'ju
216a6(rgyud): lam gyis// bsam gtan gom pas shes par bya// dad pa'i lcags kyu shes rab can/ klu 'bum phrag dkar po'i sems dge ba// kun slong byang chub gter gyi rin cha nor// thob par 'dis mdzod 'khor
216a7(rgyud): bsgyur ba 'byung // sems kyi dbus ces phyir ral spyod pas// dbang por bya ba'i rgyud kun khyad par du// pad+ma'i dra ba phyag stong gis rgyan par// myur de sgrub pa'i thabs mang gsungs pa rnams// bsdus
216a8(rgyud): brtson dang byas ldan pas cesu byas// bla ma'i lung yod snying rje gang ldan po// rgyal dang rgyal sras tshogs rnams kun dgyes nas// 'jig rton skyong tshogs dga' ba smos ci dgos// 'phags pa spyad pas/ 
216b1(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyugi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+mad pa zhes bya ba las gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i le'u ste lnga'o// / de nas dga' ldan gnas 'khrungs pa/ bskal pa du mar tshogs bsags pa/ cig
216b2(rgyud): pa gsum ldan lha yi bu// mdzes pa'i rtog ces mtshan gsol pa/ spyad ras gzigs la cher dang nas/ bzhengs te thal mo sbar byas shing // 'khor tshogs chen po dang bcas pas// mgrin gcig tu ni
216b3(rgyud): 'di skad gsol// oM khams gsum kun gyi bla ma gtso// 'dren pa mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas// sa gsum ye shes 'od po che// bde bar gshegs la phyag 'tshale// yon kun gyi 'byung gnas mad+ma/ 
216b4(rgyud): rig ldan 'de ldan byin rlabs can// g.yung dang rtag pa dang chos gtso// kun rtog sel skyob phyag 'tsha'o// rtag par brtsa ldan spyad ras gzi gas// byang chub sems tshogs 'brung tshogs rgyal// 
216b5(rgyud): bya ba byas nas bskal par gnas/ pad 'ching tshogs la phyag 'tshalo// bskal pa du mar bsogs pa ga/ zugs rjes ye shes wa byung ba'i/ reg sngags phreng 'byin rlabs can/ 
216b6(rgyud): po spyan ras gzigs dbang gis// seMn rnas la phan dod pyig// phyag rgya phrid las ldan par gzungs// las kyi dri ma dang ldan zhing // nyon mongs bdag rgyal gyis bcings nas// le mo ser sngo'i 'dab rdzab can// 
216b7(rgyud): dang ljon pa'i sen rnams// myur du grol bar bya ba dang // thugs rje nyi ma bkram byas te// srid 'ang ba sdug po bskam pa dang // myur du sangs rgyas 'gru bya'i byi ba lha dang gsang sngags blang ba dang // phrin las skye
216b8(rgyud): ba ldan/ brgyud pa rgyun med pa yi// sbyor ba'i tshul 'byung ba shadu gsol// rig sngags rjes gnang med pa ni// sgrubs kyang 'bral med ngale ba ste// 'dren pa med pa'i shing rta ni// 'khor lo bzang yang
217a1(rgyud): // gang du phyin// nyon mongs rtsa ba bcad pa'i phyir// rig sngags ral gri rno dang mtshungs// bdag 'dzin go cha 'bigs pa'i mdung // sdug bsngal mtsho bskams nyi ma che// kun rtog rngu
217a2(rgyud): bung sreg pa'i me// shes rab me tog 'khrungs pa'i rlan// nang ngan kun sel sman mchog ste// beg tshogs sel ba'i sred med bu// bag chags bkrus pa'i chu rgyur te// khong spyod 'phel ba'i gteng
217a3(rgyud): chen nyid// 'khor ba la rgal gru gzings te// nyes pa kun sel rlung dang mtshangs// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// mgon pa rdzogs sangs rgyas chen gyis// srab 'jam ring po'i ljags bkram
217a4(rgyud): tshangs pa'i gsung snyan dbyangs kyis gsung // 'gro la thugs rdza chen po yis// sngags 'byung brgyud pa'i ribs 'byung ba cho ga dpa pa nyan brtson pa/ shid+d+ha legaso lha
217a5(rgyud): nyams dga' dge ba'i sa phyogasu// sa yi cha mnyam dkyil 'khor ltar// pad+ma'i gdan 'dra'i dkyil 'khor ni// tshen sna ma lus na mas kyi bri// mgon po spyad ras gzigs dang
217a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub sede dang // rig pa'i lha mo khro bor bcas// 'jig rten skyong sogs ma lus pa'i// sku 'am phyag rgya bkar ba dang // mchod pa'i tshogs kyang bkram por bya// mar me yon
217a7(rgyud): byug pos dri// zhal zos gtor ma sna tshogs dang // gzhan yang zas skom sna tshogs dang // rgyan dang na bza' lha'i lbub dang // sil snyan me tog phreng du ma// yid 'ong mdzes pa'i tsho gis rgyun// sleb ma
217a8(rgyud): gus pas bla ma la/ yon phul brtson byas 'di skad gsol// sen kun gyi seMs kyo mnyan// dmus long lam log las 'dren pa// rab rib sel ba'i thub ma can// bdag la 'dan pa'i sgrol mgo/ 
217b1(rgyud): shes rab snying rje'i skye ba can// thos bsam sgom pa'i gru gzings can// las can sdug bsngal chu sgrol ba'i// thabs brtson mnyan pa khyod phyag 'tshal// byang chub lam mthong dpag yas thums
217b2(rgyud): 'gro rnams thar lam rten gzigs pa// dge brtson dge la bskal pa'o// dge bcu med pa dag la stsol// dam tshig sdom gnas ngang tshul bzang // bag yod dbyangs mkhas ltung ba med// chos don
217b3(rgyud): gnyer ba'i don skye'o// skyabs dang sdom gnas bdag la stsol// dba' brtan zhi du la spyad pa yi// dga' slang slob dpon 'di skad brjod// oM gti mug rnam dag bang gshegs bu gas/ rnar snang mdzadas
217b4(rgyud): sum chi// zhe sdang rnams dag rdo rje thugs/ mi bskyod pa la skyab su mchisaser sna rnam dag long spyod gter// rin chen mdangs ldan sgrub su mchi// 'dod chags rnam dag pad+mar gsung / 'od dpag
217b5(rgyud): la skyabasu mchi// khrag dog rnam dag phrin las rgyal// don yod rdo rje skyabasu ma chi// A gnas med mkha' dang mnyam spyod pa/ chos dbyings chos la skyabasu mche// skye med skyes
217b6(rgyud): ltar sgrub ches// 'phaDa lam brgyad la skyabasu mchi// don gcig tshogs lam bcu gnyis grangs// gsung rab yan lag skyabasu mchi// rgyu 'bras sdang ba'i so sor rtogs// nyan thos dge 'dun
217b7(rgyud): skyabasu mchi// gcig gam tsheg spyod rdzu 'phrul che// rang rgyal dge 'dun skyabasu mchi// snying rje shes rab byang chub 'bral// sems chen tshogs la skyabasu mchi// gsod dang ku brdzun 'khrig
217b8(rgyud): spyod dang / tshig rtsub bram ngag 'khyil nas// brdab sems gnod sems log lta spyod/ thar pa'i srogacod bcu po spongs// chang mthung til mar 'chir las dang // pagar dang rgya skyugs rgya
218a1(rgyud): gcod// srog chags tshogs dang mgo zlum 'tshong // mtho ris lus kyi gags chen spong // rtag dang phyag rgya 'ag 'bag dang // rten dang dge 'dun rtags yi ge/ bgrang phreng 'dzin
218a2(rgyud): ba'i yo byad sogs// 'gom dang bshig pa gtan du spong // mchod pa snying dang sgrog pa dang // 'bags dang lhag mar gyur pa dang // sha dang dman pa'i lag gi zas// srog chags yod pa'i chu
218a3(rgyud): spongs// de nas bzung ste ji srid pa// byang chub snying por thug par du// sdom pa yin tshul khrims dang // dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang // sen don byang tshul khri ba sogs/ nam du mi dor ba chen por gardza
218a4(rgyud): lha dang slob dpon yid byed cing // rdo rje dril buM phyag rgya gzung // 'gro la zang zing mi 'jigs skyabs// chos kyi sbyin pa ci 'byor stsal/ thig gsum tha dad chos tshul rnams// mi 'ag
218a5(rgyud): sbyor bas rgyun tu spyad// lus ngag yid dang long spyod bcas// ser snem dpas mchod 'os mchod// lha dang lha mon gsang ba pa'i// ga 'byung sku gsung thugs kyi rgya// da spyod dam
218a6(rgyud): tshig dam pa rnams// sdom tshul brtan po gzung bar bya// 'gro rnams kun la snying brtsa dang // yi dwags rnams la gtor ma sbyin// dzam+b+ha la ni chu yis mchod// yi dwags dag kyang rgas gnyis bya
218a7(rgyud): de rjes slob ma rab dga' na sa// ci 'byor lha dang bla ma mchod// dga' chen las sbyor slob dpon dgongs// snying brtse bdag la gzigs nas kyang // lha dang sngags dang byin rlabs thabs// de bdag
218a8(rgyud): brtse phyir stsal du gsol// rgyal ba sras bcas tshogs bzhugs pa'i// nyams dga' thang pa'i grong khyer che// yid bzhin long spyod char du 'bar// khang chen dang ni bdag 'jug 'tshal/ 
218b1(rgyud): gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ zab mo'i sangs rgyas spyod yul ba// spos bral dmig su med pa'i don// lam ched bdag la stsal du gsol// de nas slob dpon sngags rig pa// de nyid bcu sbyar mkhas
218b2(rgyud): ba pos// g.yon pa chos gos rtse gzung ste// lag pa g.yas chos phyag rgya can// gsang bstod 'dzum pa'i 'od mdangs rgyas// dad ldan pa ni 'di skad brjod// oM bu shog theg pa chen po yi
218b3(rgyud): khyod ni tshal chen snod yin phyir// gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga rnams// khyod la nges par bstan par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// dus gsum sangs rgyas thaMd kyi// rdo rje gsang sngags
218b4(rgyud): rabaslob pas// mtshungs med pa'i ye shes rnams/ shAkya seng ge dang / la bos kyang // gsang sdug sbyong ba ma'am med kyis/ bdud sde shi matu mi bzad ba'i// dpung chen dag kyang 'dis
218b5(rgyud): bcomo// 'jig rten rdzas 'dal rdzogs bya'i phyir// 'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das// de phyir kun thob pa pa'i phyir/ bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shog/ sngags dang rdzas kyi
218b6(rgyud): srung ba dang // lha yi rten mig de la mchod// u dum ba ra'i me tog ltar// 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen dag/ rgya lam ni ni res 'ga' zhig/ 'byung 'gyur yang na 'byung // sngags kyi spyod tshul phra
218b7(rgyud): ba ni 'debs kyang ni ches dkon te// ngang gi tshal min sen don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// bskal pa du mar bsags pa'i sdig/ gang la sdig khur tse yod pa// lha yi dkyil 'khor mthong ba
218b8(rgyud): dang byin rlabs tsam gyis byang gyur nas// blo gros dri ma med pa yis// spyod tshal rlabs bzhugs nas lha// ngan 'gro sdug bsngal rgyad bcad nas// mtshan ldan sku ni gzhan don spyod// bdag
219a1(rgyud): / nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis// rnyed pa mtshungs med ring rnyed// gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pas// bdag nyid chen po khyad rnams ni// gang du skyes kyang gzung ba'i byor// de nas khyed
219a2(rgyud): zag chen rigs// sha sta ga~M tu ni skye nges te/ zag pa chen po tshor 'byung ba// dpal dang ldan pa'i lam mchog 'di// gang du rgyas pa khrid nas kyang / 'ang bar gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur// de bas sprol
219a3(rgyud): brtson par gyis// slob ma ku sha dge ba yis// stan la nyal nas rmi lam de// gsang dang spang ba byas nas kyang // chus bkras 'di rnams klag pa dang // bkra shis du ma klag byas te// gdong ba dar gyis
219a4(rgyud): bcings nas kyang / 'bras kyi me tog phreng ba ni/ lnga yi dkyil 'khong dbus dang // slar blangs mgo la bcings bya ste/ pad+ma ny+dza ni rigs mtshan gyis rgyan// mig bye de la lha rnams
219a5(rgyud): dang / byang chub phyogs chos mtshan ma yi// yon ye shes stobs mngar ba// mchod rten lha tshogs bcas pa gdan// yid ches dang / ba mngon byas la// ci 'byer pa yi mchod pa bya// de nas
219a6(rgyud): dag pa'i sros de la// mar me la ni mar me ltar// 'dod pa'i lha ni stsal par bya// brjod pa dang bcas 'brel pa yis// rtsa ba'i snying po nya stong tshogs// sngags kyang gsal bar sbyin par bya// zhi
219a7(rgyud): shel gyi phreng ba ste// rgyas pa la ni/ a ru ra// dbang la lung thang dmar po shis// drag po ra 'am ru rag sha/ bo de cas ni las kun byed// sngags bcad btsal nas mgo la bcing // hU~M dang bcas pa'i
219a8(rgyud): rdo rje yang / lag pa g.ya su bzhag par bya// stod g.yogs kr-iSh+Na sa ri b+he/ smad g.yogs kha dog sngon po'o// ngabu rgyan rigs lnga'i kha dog ste// zhal zas snod ni pad+ma rgyan// sen kun don spyod pa'i/ 
219b1(rgyud): rdzas 'thub pas bkra shis bzhed pa'i rtags// gdugs nya bum pa dpa' be'u dang // rgyal mtshan 'khor lo pad+ma su la// nad sel bde byed 'tsho ba'i bying // 'dod yon phyogs rigs grub pa'i rdzas// 
219b2(rgyud): wang ngur ba li khri no// bal basbrang rtsi a ru ra/ ka ra bi ri'i 'bras bu rnams// hrIHzhes dag pas stsal bar bya// gur gum ga pu ga pur gla rtsi dang // ba yi 'o mas byar byas nas// tshig 'di lnga la bzhag pa
219b3(rgyud): oM yan gang nges pa'i tshig rig dang // ming gi rnam grangs chos rig dang / dri ba lan ldon spobs pa rig phyi nang mtshan nyid don rig shog badz+ra d+haHpra be sha/ oM bcas brjod cing lce la ni// lan gsu
219b4(rgyud): rdo rje bzhag par bya// hrIHyi ge dmar po me 'bar bsam// gang la goms pade 'thung zhing // goms pa gzhan gyi dbang med na// rtog pa'i 'byung 'a chang pa'i phyir// kun rtog phyag rgya la dmigs bshad/ 
219b5(rgyud): dmigasa'i rten gyi sngags la yang // byin rlabs tha dad 'byung bar 'gyur// sa la dbang bskur thob 'dod pas// phyag na 'khor lo 'chang la dmigs// ting 'dzin brtan pa rdo rje ste// 
219b6(rgyud): dpa' thob 'dod pas rin chen dmigs// gzugs bzang 'dod pa sa pad+ma ste// spongs pa 'dod pas ral gi'o// gzhan don 'dod pas rgya gram ste// rdo rje dkar pos sems gsal 'gyur
219b7(rgyud): shes rab 'dod pas glegs pa mo// khang bzang gis ni mi'i rgyal po// thub gzugs rtag tu sangs rgyas 'jam// thul sbyar bas ni 'gro bas bkur// 'khar bsil byams dang snying rje skye// lcags
219b8(rgyud): klu 'jig rten skyong bas srung // rin chen ze'u 'brus lce bder 'gyur// dril bus skad snyan byed par 'gyur// bgrang phreng gis ni lung bstan 'thob khri rkang gis ni nye dbang 'gyur/ lha sogs gdu
220a1(rgyud): bdud yin te/ mdung rtse gsum pas g.yul las rgyal// pad+ma dmar pos lA ru ste// ril ba spyi blugs tshang ril skye// sprid mdog lnga ni drang srong skye/ be long gis ni ldan la mtho
220a2(rgyud): rags ye shes skye// pad+ma sngon pos dag pa'i zhing // pad+ma dkar pos dge tshogs 'phel// ri bos bu dang bu mo 'phe'o// dgra sngas bdud kyi bar tshad sal// 'khor dang sems 'thun 'bring g+ha ras// phu
220a3(rgyud): dgra dang gcan zan 'joms// rnga yab dkar pos sdig pa 'phyag/ me tog snyems nad sel byed // rin chen mdangs ni yid 'ong grogs// gzhus ni nor dang go 'phangs rnyed// chu shal dug dang tsha rig ce
220a4(rgyud): mi 'jigs spyan gyis 'jigs skrag 'joms// dgra la rdo rje gtun shing ste// rdo rje nag mo bdud 'dul 'gyur// rin chen ral gri sa rig sngags bzlog/ lto ba na las lhung bzed// rims nang
220a5(rgyud): sel byed zhags pa'o// 'bru 'dod pas ni 'bru'i snye ma nor dbyig 'dod pas rin chen phug/ yang na lung bston 'dod bas na// mgo la sangs rgyas dpags par bya// mngon par
220a6(rgyud): ba lnga 'dod na// sangs rgyas lnga po dmigs par bya// de nas mgon po spyan ras gzigs// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis pad+ma'i zhal// sa yi snying po la gzigs nas// sa yi go rims 'ang
220a7(rgyud): gsungaso// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rtog pa ni// gsang sngags thangs gsum ste// gsang sngags dang sngags sbyar sa// rigs 'chang sa dang rigs gsal sa// rigs mchog sa dang rig chen sa// 
220a8(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po'i sa rnam so// gtsugs tor po'i sangs rgyas sa// gnas skabs drug tu rgyal bas gsungs// kun tu 'od dang dad pa'i spyan// yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chenas// rdo 'chang ye shes
220b1(rgyud): bla ma'i sa// rdzogs sangs bde ba chen po'i sa// sa yi snying pos gsol pa// mgon po 'phags pa thugs rje'i spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ byin rlabs lcags kyu lta bus 'khor ba'i brtson
220b2(rgyud): nas// klu phyugs 'bum phrag dang ltar dge ba kun slong gis// byang chub rin chen sa la 'jog mdzad ngo mtshar che// 'phags pa spyan ngas gzigs dbang phyugs gis rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po bad+ma
220b3(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba las byin rlabs 'byung ba'i le'u ste dag pa'o// / de nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du// rab dga'i tshul du 'khrungs pa'i lha// ting 'dzin yangs pa zhes bya ba// rtogs pa rgya che zab ba zhig
220b4(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa bzhengs byas te// me tog rin chen rigs byung ba// ston pa'i phyog su chang bzhin pa'o// mkha' la gdugs kyi bla re bkang // 'khor dang bcas pa mgrin gcig tu
220b5(rgyud): bsang bstod nas ni tshig 'di gsol/ lag na rdo rje rdo rje'achang // rdo rje thag pa bla med pa'i// rdo rje rig 'dzin mchog grub pa// rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung phyir// bdag deng sems
220b6(rgyud): can kun tu yang // dngos gaba'abyung rim bshad du gsol// la lag yang bar gyur pa yis// bla ma'i rgyud don bral mod kyi// sngags rgyud brdebs pa 'chang byed 'byung // ston tshig rmongs rnams
220b7(rgyud): mtshar ste// gang bas dge med pas 'gro ba bsres// dngos grub med pas bsten pa zhig/ sred pas lan cig sogs par 'gyur/ gnyis pa dmyal tshegs ngan 'amang 'gro// la la las kyi skye
220b8(rgyud): mched ste/ dbang po nyid khang dmang srung la// gdimi ngag chung tshul yod mod kyi// chos tshul bzhin du myong byang cing/ gang la dbang du gzung ba li// blo 'da'am kyang brnyes gyur nas/ sngang ba tsho
221a1(rgyud): / nas rtsod par 'gyur// des kyang gnyis ka dmyal sogs 'gro/ la la thos chung shes rab dman// rmongs pa gzhan rkyen nga rgyal can// bstan pa dang ni 'chang byed la// snron spong smaH
221a2(rgyud): dbyal sogs 'gro// la la mi dga' bshes gnyen gyis// log lam 'jug pa'i nges 'dzin cad// yang dag lam sbed brtson pa dor// log sgrub cad de dmyal bar 'ge/ la la bas medo sngags
221a3(rgyud): med// mar me bdag spos gtor ma sogs// 'byung pos brlabs te bdag nyid dang // 'khor bcas tshe thung lang sprod 'grib// la la 'dod sreg gi tum rdeb che// mkhas gzhan dag la dogis// sgo
221a4(rgyud): kun tshul 'tshe sa chos la smod// rang nyid lta ngan sgrub la rtsod// ther zug blo yi mun pa can// 'byung po dag po'i rigs skye// la la ser sna rab 'jug pas// lha dang bla ma'i tshig gis bstod// 
221a5(rgyud): zas dang long spyad rgyun gos dang / me tog bdag spos gtor ma sogs// nyudu mug tshul rgyun stsol na// zas skom ngag gi gdungs pa yi// yi dwags dman pa'i rigs ni/ 
221a6(rgyud): yang nas yang du skye bar nges// de phyir de dag spangs nas ni/ ya rabs bsam pa bzang ldan pas// tshul bzhin blangs te thos bsam gyis// gtan la phab don ma'i khrul bar// brjod cing yid
221a7(rgyud): la byed pa dang // the tsom med par rtson byed pas// 'go tshogs sgrol byed thabs thob nas// rang don 'ba'i zhig smos ci dgos// de nas lags na rdo rje gtso// ye shes mtha' yas mnga' ba'i sku
221a8(rgyud): 'gro la snying rtsar rab gzigs nas// gsang ba'i skad kyis 'di skad kyis 'di skad gsungs// nga la mnyan par brtson byed pa// shin tu legaso lha yi bu// lha dang dngos grub 'byung 'brel ba'i/ 
221b1(rgyud): ting 'dzin pa yi bshad par bya// khyod nyid rtse gcig yid kyis ni// legs par nyon la yid la zung / shin du zab cing rgya che ba'i/ dam chos thob pa shin du dag la// rgyun chad med pa'i thugs
221b2(rgyud): can dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon po gtso// rang gi sems la bskyed par bya// shin tu gsal na dngos grub 'gyur// dang po stong pa'i byang chub sems// gnyis pa yi ge'i byang chub ses
221b3(rgyud): gsum pa sgro btags ming tshogs sems// bzhi pa gzugs brnyan phyag rgya'i sems// lnga pa byin rlabs rgyan 'debs sems// sgra dang brag cha'i tsha la 'byung bar// gtso bo'i 'khor gyi khang pa
221b4(rgyud): gsol// dbusu yi ge oM la ste/ shar du hUM ste lho ru na// nub du hrIHyig byang du hA/ rigs kyi rigs ni yang yang bskyed// lha ni gang du 'pho 'gyur bas// dkyil 'khor de yi
221b5(rgyud): rigs 'byung yin// rigs kyi phyag rgya de nyid kyis/ ga pa rigs kyi rgyas 'debs shing / rigs kyi lha tshogs pho mo rnams// nyams dga' dben pa'i tshul gyis// pan na
221b6(rgyud): du ni bltas nas gnas// ldem bag na bza' 'phyang 'bral dang // 'phur lding sil snyan rin chen tshogs/ du ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan bya ste// la la ldem bzhengs bgyid dang bcas// lal rdo rje spyil
221b7(rgyud): krung bcas// la la pad+ma'i spyil grang ste// la la sems dpe'i skyil krung can// lal khro thabs brkyang bskum can// la la zhal phyag zhabs kyang med// la la zhabs ni gnyis yin te// kha las
221b8(rgyud): gtsog phyag kyang gnyis// la li pad sdong pa bla can/ la la pad+mo mi 'dzegs phyag/ guNe dbu pa 'khar boso la dang // rnga yab log so skyabs sbyin phyag/ rdo rje dril bu mda' gzhu dang // khang can
222a1(rgyud): / rnga rdza rnga dung // zangs lcags rdo dang rus pa'i rnga// ring zlum rked nyeg le'aphyal che// chung phra sbo yangs dog pa dang / ral gri chu gri gri rings dang / gri leb gri zlum gri kyog dang / sna
222a2(rgyud): zur sta leb phyal sta dang // lnga chung gshegs sta'i bag sta dang // zlum ste phreng ste bzhar sta dang // mdung dang rtse gsum 'ben mdung dang // 'khor lo kha T+wAM gtun shing sgyogs// sgo ma tog bu ma to// 
222a3(rgyud): dang sdong bu lo 'dab yal ga dang // ba dan pad gdugs rgyal mtshan spangs// rgya gram pad+ma rin chen sgrom// 'khor lo glags bem ud pala'o// de la sogs te mchog mtha' yas// phyag rgya stong
222a4(rgyud): snyed tshangs pa 'am// brgya rtsa brgyad dam bzhi bcu dag/ nyi shu gnyis sam bcu gnyis dag/ bzhi 'am gnyis sogs mos pas 'byung // phyag rgya bcings ldan phyag rgya ste// des ni lha la rgyas
222a5(rgyud): 'dabs byed// goms pa'i stobs kyis phyag rgya che// seng+ge'i sgra ni seng ge zhon// rgyal po rol pa'i stabs chul can// rtse gsum sbrul dang mi 'jigs phyag/ pad+ma sdong
222a6(rgyud): bcas ral gri 'bar// dpa' ze'i ljags kyu thod pa ni// nang pa bdun gyi cha gnas pa// gtum po dag po 'od ldan ma// g.yon du kA ya dbang phyug mo// pad+ma dang ni zla ba'i steng // phyogs mdogs
222a7(rgyud): dpa'i skyil krung can// yid bzhin nor bu rta la bcibs// zhal gsum phyag drug 'khor lo dang // rdo rje pad+ma rin chen phyag// skyabs gsol mchig sprin phyag rgya can// 'khor ni se de'i skyil krung
222a8(rgyud): can mdog bzang sgeg pa'i lha mo ni// lid myur rin chen bzang po dang // pad rgyal mo dang rta rna mo// rin chen pad+ma zla nyi ma// 'khor lo grogs kyi tshul du'o// pad+mo 'brung gnas rma bya zhon/ 2
222b1(rgyud): cig phyag bani ldem pag can/ pad+ma skabs sbyin lhag krung nga// ri lab spyi thug phyag na 'chang // sgeg mo phrengs glu ga ma/ bang zla sems dpa'i spyil krung // ma bskyod pa ni mkha' lding nam
222b2(rgyud): ral gri pad+ma mad ga zhu dang // skyabs sbyin long ba'i bum pa bogs/ bzang 'dzin ma dang rnam sbyangs ma/ sa srung me dang rab brtan mo// de dag gong gi cha byed mtshungs// don yod zhags pa klu stes
222b3(rgyud): bzhugs// rin po che ngange zhags pa dang // skyabs sbyin lcags kyu 'chang ba'o// seng ge mo dang glang po ma// rta gdong khyu mchog gdong ldan pa/ pad+ma zla ba'i gdan lo'i/ ha la ha la rus sbal stings/ 
222b4(rgyud): rdo rje dril bu skyabs sbyin dang / chos kyi tha me tog 'chang pa 'o// nyi 'od mdang zla 'od ma/ chu dbang mo dang nor phreng mo// dag/ bor mdangs ldan pa'o// mgon po pad+ma rgyan lung ce// chusra
222b5(rgyud): steng du rol po'i rgal// Da ma du dang 'grang phreng dang / mi dzigs phyag dang lcags sge ga/ lu gu chud ma 'khor lo ma/ gsang ba mo dang ril bsrel mo// glang sor rdo rje chos dbang nus
222b6(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo tshes 'chang rgya// skabs sbyin pad+ma po tir bcas// dga' ba dga' skyes snang byed ma// sil snyan ma rnams pad zlar ni phyed krung ldem bag tshul du'o// rje btsun chos kyi gtsug
222b7(rgyud): tor ni// ha ri ha ri ha ri zhon// zhal gsum phyag ni brgyad pa la// 'khor lo rdo rje mda' gzhu dang // pad dkar bgrang brang skyabs sbyin dang // bdud rtsis bkang ba'i bum po 'chang // mkha' lding gdangs
222b8(rgyud): shA riri gdong //  zhal zla zhal lnga mo'o// mgrin sngo dga' bo nya dga' ste// zhal gsum phyag drug pad+ma dang / po ti skyobs sbyin 'grang phreng phyag/ seng ge'i gdong mo klu zhal mo// dga' byed mo/ 
223a1(rgyud): // dang srog byed mo// pad+ma zlar sems dpa'i skyil krudo// dbusu mgon po gdong bcu gcig/ gsang 'dzin mo dang 'dzin pa mo// sngags srung ba dang grub bsrungs ma// gong ljang chu byad
223a2(rgyud): phyogs mdog// phyogs bzhir 'khor lo'i cha la ni// gtso bo sems dpa' bzhi dang bcas// shar du rdo rje dbang phyug ni// thogs med yid dang grub dbang phyugs// rdo rje phyag rgya gter sgom can// 
223a3(rgyud): kun kyang pad+ma zla ba la'o// lhor ni rin chen dbang phyug ste// grub chen dbang phyug phag zhal// grub pa'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug dang // ga 'dzin dbang phyug zhes bya'o// nub tu pad+ma'i dbang phyug ni// skyes
223a4(rgyud): / seng ge'i zhal dang ni/ pad+ma'i phyag dang sbrul nag phyag rtse bran rgyas 'dzin zhes bya'o// byang du dam tshig dbang phyug dang // 'khalo 'chang dang stag lpags 'chang // kun grub dbang phyug sgra
223a5(rgyud): dung 'phel phyogs dang phyogs kyi mdog cano// 'jig/ rten skyong ba bcu po dang // rgyal po chen po sde ba ni 'o// kun tu gra gas pa'i lha chen rnams// stan la dga' ba dgod par bya
223a6(rgyud): rten 'jig rten 'das don du// rigs bzang skye ba bzhes dgongs pa// bskal pa bzang po 'di 'byung ba'i// sangs rgyas stong yang dgod par bya// da ltar rgyas par spros pa ni/ lha rnams bgrang
223a7(rgyud): tsha bar// tshig stong nyis brgya bzhi bcu bdun// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i lha// mgon po gdong bcu gcig pa yi// lha grangs dkyil 'khor bkod pa'o// spyan ras gzigs kyi dkyil
223a8(rgyud): 'khor bcu// 'jig rten dbang ni dkyil 'khor lnga// rig pa'i lha mo'i dkyil 'khor lnga// rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bdun// dkyil 'khor de dag re re la// sems kyi dkyil 'khor lha ma
223b1(rgyud): ste rang bzhin gyis ni nyi shu lnga/ rgyu 'bras tshul du rnam pa dgu// ye shes chal lnga yin te// chos nyid ngo bos gcig tu rgyal// gang gang mos pade dang de'i// dkyil 'khor nang spro ba 'am/ 
223b2(rgyud): gcig tu mes pa'i sbyor ba yis// byang chub rdo rje mchog thob nas// khams gsum rgyal por long spyod che// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur// gtsang sbra che zhing dang son// rtse gcig sgrar
223b3(rgyud): nan tan stsol// blo bzang 'gro la 'jug cing spyod// ngag snyan dang gos khro ba med// g.yo sgyu 'dod bzhi ga yeng ba med// lus ngag dal zhing thos pa mang // nga rgyal ser sna chags pa med// 
223b4(rgyud): bod snying rje drag ldan pas// spyan ras gzigs lag nga dmigs nas// de yi snying po rtsa sngags la// bar chod me dbus rab brjod nas// gzhan la phan phyir smon la brjod/ 
223b5(rgyud): spyan ra gzigs mgron phyag 'tsha'o// gang la 'jigs pa brgyad snang tshe// khro bo chen po rdzu 'phrul gyis// de dag myur du sel byed shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tsha lo/ 
223b6(rgyud): nad rims gang byung che// gso spyang sman dang sman par ni// bdag nyid myur nas myur sa la shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tsha'o// mu ge'i nang du 'byung 'gyur tshe// phyogs gcig nas
223b7(rgyud): rnam g.yos nas// zas skom rgyun chad med par shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tsham// gang du 'khrug pa tshe 'byung cha// rang dbang gis ni sems gyur nas// bde ba na tshun snga par shod
223b8(rgyud): spyan ras gzig mgon phyag 'tshalo// byol song gcig la gcig za dang // zas skom dkon dang gzhan 'jigs tshe// de dag sel ba'i skyabs gyur cig/ spun ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal/ 
224a1(rgyud): // yi dwags zas skom gdungs pa dang // log par lta ba'i gnas zhugs che/ nad bral bdud rtsi kun snang shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tsholo// 'gro ba'i skabs dang batha ma lnga
224a2(rgyud): dang shes rab ga dang ldan nas kyang // thabs kyi sdug bsngal grol bar shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshalo// tshul khrims zhags ldan lam la rtag/ mya ngan 'das pa'i ri bo 'dzes/ 'as
224a3(rgyud): ma byas kyi khyim 'jug shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tsha'o// ngan song gnas rnams mthong nas kyang // deng byin de rnams zang ba yi// gnyen po sa sar 'byung bar shog/ spyan ras gzhi
224a4(rgyud): mgon phyag 'tsha'o// dam pa rnams tsha grang bcad gtu sa tshe// go cha che dang bsal lib dang // dod kyi 'od du gyur par sho ga/ rig sngags yang yang brjod pa yis// yang dag la nyid rtog
224a5(rgyud): par shog/ kun 'byung sa bon rul nas ni// sdug bsngal phung po skam par shog// mgon po mya ngan 'odas thob nas// 'dzin phyo/ bcur rab grags 'gyur// de nas yang dag bshad pa ba// 
224a6(rgyud): pas bgags kyi mthu btsem nas// dngos grub myur du rnyed bya'i phyir// slab pa lan brtson par bya// zla ba dkar po'i tshes gcig nas// khras byas gos gsar gyon byas nas// sku gzugs bzang po'i
224a7(rgyud): mdun 'dug nas// bsnyung bar gnas nas nyin gcig la/ dus gsum sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad// brjod cing ci 'byor mchod par bya// ches brgyad tho rangs dus nas ni// dben par gdan khri bzang po
224a8(rgyud): la sku gzugs nub du gzigs nas bzhag/ bza' ltung mingar bas sngags par mchod// a ga ru dang du ru skri/ bdug pa rgyun tu bsreg par bya// 'bru dkar 'o ma'i zas bza' zhing // zhags
224b1(rgyud): bzlas pa'i nus pa// de nas zhag gsum bar du 'dag 'o ma zho dang 'bras can 'tshal// lha la mchod pa cher bskyed nas/ byang chub shing drung stong rtsa brgyad/ du ru ka yi mar da spang / dum bu ri re s+pha red
224b2(rgyud): chub se de'i drung du sregs yang g.yo zhing sku yang g.yo// stang zhal nas ni snyan pa'i sgra// legaso lagaso rig kyi bu// khyod ni nan tan brtson 'grus can// 'dod sman don gnyer gang yin/ mkha' la
224b3(rgyud): 'phur re rkang mgyogs sam// drang srong rig 'dzin rgyal po la// bdag dang skal mnyam 'dod na yang / de ring nyid sprul bar bgyi// bco lnga'i tshes la sku gzugs te// bde gshegs ring bsrel yo
224b4(rgyud): ba yi/ mchod rten nang drung du bzhugs// gso sbyong blangs nas bsnang bar yis// skya snang me tog brgya rtsa brgyad// sngags de 'arjod pas sku la 'jig de cha mdun nal rtsa ba nas// 'brug sgra chen po
224b5(rgyud): lta bur 'byung / sa chen rab tu gi yo bar 'gyur// da tshe ba/ gnyid mi sdug par// sngags bsgrub rjesu dran pa ste// byang chub sede'i seda'ache// mgon po spyan ras gziT dbang phyug/ chu
224b6(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa la// bdag nyid gus pas phyag 'tsha'o// bdag ni sen thad kyi// mgon skyabasar gnas gyur nas kyang // 'pho ba kun gyi re 'dod rnams// tshul bzhin du ni sring bar shog/ de tsha 'did stsal
224b7(rgyud): laH lha klu tshogs kyi bar chad med// sngags kyi 'dod don kun grub yin// bsod nams rdzogs byed smon la mo// phyaga'i tsha lo brtan la bskor ba dang / mchod rten rtsig cing dkyil 'khor ni// rnal gyi
224b8(rgyud): yan lag las ldan pas// bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir/ rgyun chad med par 'artson pa na// dge byang spen lam rgyas pa ni// de dag myur du 'byung bar 'gyur// de phyir smon la mchog tu ba shang / 
225a1(rgyud): // la dge spyod g.yel ba yis// le lo can ni bdud gzung nas// gya chom smra zhing chos la spang / bstan pa 'jig par byed par 'gyur// de phyir sman rigs mngol pas// long spya
225a2(rgyud): du song ser sna le lo nga rgyal can// bag med g.yeng dang bcas pa ni// bdud kyi 'ching lam log lam pa/ zhugs dang slar la btang bar bya// 'phags pa spyan ngas gzigs dbang phyug rtsa po'i rgyud kyi
225a3(rgyud): rgyal po pad+ma da ba las dngos grub 'byung ba'i le'u bdun pa'o// // de nas nad dang gnod pa sogs// sngags brjod ce gyos gsal bar bshad nad gdon gang dang gang la yang // sngags pas ga/ 
225a4(rgyud): tu gsal btab la// rang gi rtse gcig sems kyis bzla// dang po ste/ brjer bcas pa yi// sngags kyis nang dang gdon las grol// tshe mchod la brtson par bya// spyan nad nyin re ldang 'a
225a5(rgyud): nyin gnyis pa 'am nyin gsum pa 'am// nyin bzhi nyin bdun lnga nga ba'i rims// 'byung po mkha' gro sha za 'am// spro byad brjed byad lus srul po// 'di gdon dag pos mod kyang / 
225a6(rgyud): rtsa brgyad kyis sel bar 'gyur// yan srad bu kha dog lnga// me da re sngags re brgya rtsa brgyad// mdud ldan mgul lam dpung bar gdags// kha na ma tho bsags pa yi// sgrib kun zhi zhing byang gyu
225a7(rgyud): na bgegs sogs nad lta smod ci dgos// bad rlabs bsam gyis mi khya'o// skangs dang 'bras kyi phreng ba dang / shu ba phol mig rma 'dze dang // me dpal lhog pa g.yan la sogs// ma rungs pa yi
225a8(rgyud): nad rnams dang // ral gri mda' mdung la sogs pas// myos samado yis nyon pa dang / sbrul dang sdig bgrangs pa dang / rung ba mchu rnon la sogs pa'i// 'dug pa rnams la lan bdun dang / brgya/ 
225b1(rgyud): / brgyad dang stong du brjod/ yang nas ser 'jim pas byug/ de yi nad las grol 'a des// bgegs sam rlung la sogs pa yi// gnogs gcig phyog sun langs// rnga ba'on nam sna sums sa su
225b2(rgyud): rtsa brgya du bzlas pa 'am// 'bru mar no dang ru rba dang // lan bdun brjod nas spu drug dang / zos shing na ba snar byugs nas// sos par 'gyur darang the tsomang// de nas byang chub sed chem nyi 'od kyis kyang
225b3(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang // srung dang lam 'gro bskyab pa'i phyir// byi na rlabs ldan pa'i tshig 'di gsungs// na mo bud+d+ha ya gu ra be// na mo d+harmA ya tA yi ne// na maHsaM g+ha la ma hA ye ma hA te/ tri b+h+yo ba~M swA hA na ma/ 
225b4(rgyud): nyin mtshan dusu 'di brjed pas// sdig kun byang zhing nang rnams ni/ lam du bgegs bdud mi pad cing // rtag tu sems dga' dam pa 'thog/ byang chub sed nA 'od kyang // srung ba'i don du sdun
225b5(rgyud): 'di gsungs// sha ma ta ha ru sha ho// A dz+nyA ba te/ su ru te/ sha ka/ Te/ ba ra ma b+hU te/ su ru ti/ kA la Ta te khi ma ta swA hA/ tshon sna lnga yi skud pa la// bdun bzlas mdud pa nyi shu gi
225b6(rgyud): na sar btags na nad sil 'gyur// gzhan yang ston gangs med tho'o// sbrul gyi rma ni sgo phye la// bdun bzlas rma khar btab na sos// seng ldang stag gzigs dom dad kyi// lpags la nyi shu rtsa ban+d+ha
225b7(rgyud): spam brjod nas gra khrims can la bskon// de ma thag tu rim sel 'gyur// blo bur nad kyis nyan pa la// lan 'dun brjod pa'i gu gul 'dug// ldong ros yung kar len tsha dkar// sbyar nas nyi shu
225b8(rgyud): gcig brjod// nad pa'i mal bzhag nas bdugs na// 'thung po 'bros te nad las grol// til mar nang du ru rta ba ces// byugs pas gshegs nad nand dang / zhagrum myur du sel bar byed// yang
226a1(rgyud): // mar nyid la bya// til mang lte bar bskus pa yis// myur du bu thon 'gyur bar nges// khyim rtsa sha mthon par nges// du ru ka dang spyi mong sbyar// snying nang dag po sel bar 'gyur// ba rog mo
226a2(rgyud): lci don gyis// ma khar brnyan na mes tshig sos// srin bu ring bu snying la zo// rta dkar gcan la khyod gang 'thun// des ni srog chags bu par 'gyur// 'bros la rams kyi lo ma yis// khu ba skol bas byung
226a3(rgyud): par bya// bong bu'i rtug pa sang ba btsir// nyal kar mig du blug na sos// mtshan mo srang la kud dkaro// de ku nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas// brgya rtsa brgyad brjod shu dag dkar// dpung par btags pas
226a4(rgyud): g.yul las rgyal// phug ron ril ma nyid shu brgyad// zlas bcas bskus pas lcags sgrogs dang // shing sgrog la/ sogs grol bar nges// thal ba 'am byed pa la ni sngags// stong
226a5(rgyud): bzlas me tog srin bu grol// gdon dang yams nad bzlog/ pa la// di bzangs tshul bzlas nas bkru/ bud med bu 'dod donadu ni// stong bzlas pa par btung bar bya// byi ba sprul dang ru sA la
226a6(rgyud): phye ma gtor na phyugs rnams rangs// mar ga ni dang shu dag dang // sgra dang gos stong sbrang rtsi sbyar// sngags 'di yis no shes ra'i 'phel// na mo rat+na tre yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ta shwa rA ya// 
226a7(rgyud): swat+tha ya/ ma hA kA ru NI kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ShA hi khA hi/ ba li te swAhA/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya~M/ na mo Ar+ya a bamo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ i pad+mi Ta/ 
226a8(rgyud): pad+me phre/ pad+ma lo tsa ne pu/ a mo g+ha be ta/ na mo a dota ku NA ya/ sa ra sa ra/ gats+tsha gats+tsha/ i maM ma kI ro ga nA sha ya swA hA/ shi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas kyang // thal bas mig ni phyi rol skus/ 
226b1(rgyud): nad zad 'joms par 'gyur// skud pa dkar po mdud pa bdun// bsngags bdun bzlas pas rna ba yi// nad rnams tha~Md 'joms par 'gyur// gur gum ka ra cha mnyam pas// sna yi nad ni sel bar byed
226b2(rgyud): a ru ra yi phye ma dang / sbrang rtsi bsres pa'i 'dag pa ni// sa yaM nad dang lce yi nad// bde 'joms par shes par bya// oM hUM shI hU~M shu k+She phu/ nyi shu rtse gcig tshu la bzla// 'thungs pas ma zhu'i gnod pa
226b3(rgyud): sel/ na mau rat+na tra yA ye/ na ma Ar+yas pa lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA swat+tA la/ ma hA kA ru/ kA la/ tod+ya thA/ oM ra t+ne // ma hA tsar+tha/ a su ra man+ta kai dz+wa la dz+wa la/ rI dz+dzadr-in+da/ d+ha ru hu ru ka
226b4(rgyud): ki ri/ ha na ha na/ sarba dz+wa ren+da ka ban d+ha na/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ sarba gra haM swAhA// sngags 'di mtshal gyis bris nas kyang // mgul dubatags na nang rnams sel// gzhan yang rtsa ba'i sngags gang
226b5(rgyud): gis// las rnams de dang de la sbyar// sbrang bu srin du sbrul lhog pa// g.yan pa shu bskye nad la// sbrang rtsi pi bi lA ngagis byug/ gang zhig btson du zhugs pa la// nyi shu rtsa gcig
226b6(rgyud): bzlas pa la/ tsan dan sde gu snying kar byug// gang gi mig nad sel ba la// shing mngar 'am spos tshwa'am// la le sha yi khu yis bya// rna ba la ni tol mar gyis// gan ni gyi yi ge gsal ba dang / 
226b7(rgyud): mo shags 'gyed 'gyur ba'i tshe// bum pa chu yis gdong ba bkru// gang yang byis pa srung ba ni// seng ldang phur bu sor bzhi pa// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang // don yod zhags pa'i sngags rings das
226b8(rgyud): stong rtsa brgyad tu bzlas btags na// tshe ring nyid du bde bar spyod//  lang rwa dang po so 'cha'// shing kun dang dang sbrul lpags pa dang / ras bal sa bon drag po dang / de bzhin du ni ser po gnyis// nas
227a1(rgyud): / kyi phub ma g.yengs pa'i sgra// byi la'i drug pa bra ha ti// shug pa bya rog sgo nga dang / ba lang rmig pa na le sham// nga rung dang ldan cig sbyar/ de rnams bsres pa'i dud pa yis// lpags rnams
227a2(rgyud): sel phyi ru dza yis// dud pa bcu drug zhes bya ba'i// bu shal rtse dang ba bla dang / btsan dug ni sprul shun gyis// 'dugs na rims nad zad sel// nad gzhan dag kyang sel bar byed// ba langs lci ba'i khwa
227a3(rgyud): bar ni// so ma ra dza'i phyi ma gang ba// yig hU~M yis byin rlabs nas// mgrin pa sngon po'i rtsa ba'i sngags// brgya rtsa brgyad brjod mthungs pas ni// dug dang rims nang sel bar byed// skyer ba bsgom
227a4(rgyud): ba'i khu bar ni// so ma ra dza'i phye ma sbyar// ril bu brgyad sran tsam gyis tshad// yid bzhin nor bu sngags brjod nas/ zos pa tsam gyis dug rigs rnams// zos kyang lus la gan
227a5(rgyud): pa med// 'o mar yung ba sran cig bskol// so mar dzap+sA gas te blung// so so chang la ha li'i sngags// brgya rtsa brgyud snga gas gang tshang ba// brjod blung na skyugs nas ni// dugis tshugs
227a6(rgyud): bar mi 'gyuraro// khyim gyi drung ba rgyam tshwa dang // skye dung dmar rtsa lo mar bcas// phye ma ma nga sar sbrang rtsi bcas// ha ro chen po rtsa ba'i sngags// dergya rtsa brgyad kyi btung bar bya// sbrul nang zing sel
227a7(rgyud): byad// shu dag ru NA sa ga ru/ yung 'a bong nga dkor ba rnams// don yod zhags pa'i sngags kyis mnye// byugs pas dug nad dzadangs la/ rgya ma tsha srang gang mar srang gnyis// gcan srang brgyad
227a8(rgyud): lhan cig bska'o// rdo rje chos kyis sngags kyis 'thungs// dug nang thad sel bar byed// rgya mtshatshwa gsum mar srang bzhi// sbyar te mi shol sngags brjod nas// blugs nas reg pa tsam gyis ni// 
227b1(rgyud): ba sbrul gyi zin pa sel// ku ma ri dang ser po gnyis// lcim tsha myang tsha spar bcas la// gang dbang sngags dang chu yis btung // dug nang thad sel bar byed// ser po gnyis dang ldong ros dang // go thal
227b2(rgyud): gur gum leb rgan rtsi// pad+ma rgyan lung sngags kyis btung // dbyig dug zad 'joms par byed// gang la gza' dang rgyu skar gyis// 'tshe ba 'byung na des bsal phyir// pad+ma 'dab brgyad maN+Dal gyi
227b3(rgyud): phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnamasu// mgon po 'jam pa'i rdo rje ni// mkha' lding gzugasu 'gyur ba la/ spyan ras gzigs dbang bcu gtsigs// gus pa'i tshul du mchod byed bkod// nyi ma nA
227b4(rgyud): ba lag 'dzin pa'i// khyab 'jug gis ni byi ba'i gzugs// mnan pa'i mkha' lding mig smad mngag/ dor rgyas bu gnyis lha yi gzug/ mig gsum ldan pa brjod pa'i// rin tshwan lnga na
227b5(rgyud): sdeng ba shog can// rdo rje mchu rdo khro dang bcas// nyi mabye bas rgyan pa'i 'od // snying kar nyi ma 'od 'bar la// gaM yi gnas/ po s+phaT kris bskul// spu rnams gzings kyis gyur nas kyang
227b6(rgyud): phyogs bcur rdo rje khab par 'dra// gza' dang rgyu skar pos byas te// gdon dang klu rnams sreg par byas// thugs rje mi bshol ba yi sngags// 'brug sgra lnga bu gsal bar brjod// gang yang grangs
227b7(rgyud): mang stong phrag ni// las rnams pang sngags 'dis gag/ mkha' lding dkar pi brjid pa'i lus// kA yi gdon las sbyar bar bya// de la mgrin pa sngon po yis// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bkul ba
227b8(rgyud): ni/ sa stang gtub po kA yi gdod// dum nges par sel bar byed// klu dang tshangs pa'i srin po bsreg sa// 'gro la mdzend gtong bar byed/ mkha' lding dmar po sprul zam/ me te gzong ba la N+DI ga ma
228a1(rgyud): // 'chang ste g.yas pa na// ral gi me 'od 'bar ba 'chang // bgon po sad+ma'i sgras bskul nas// dpa' rlabs bskal pa'i pe dang panyam// sbrul dang rin chen dbyug tho can// mkha' lding sha rba
228a2(rgyud): gnon la ni// mgon po ha ri'i sngags kyis bskul// mkha' gro'i gdon la mkha' lding ni// ljang kai ral gri pur pa 'chang // pad+ma ral gi sngags kyis bskal// las rnams gang dang gang la yang // sngags dang
228a3(rgyud): phyag rgya ldan sbyor ba'o// ji ltar pos te phyag rgyar bcas// lus kyi phyag rgya sems kyi rgya// ngo bo nyid kyi mtshon po yis// sngags dang phyag rgyas rgyas 'debs 'gyur// da ni phyag rgya bshad par bya// sku yi mngan
228a4(rgyud): du langs nas kyang // rkang pa g.yas pa yud tsam bskams// la gnyiso sor thung du brkyang // gung srin so sor mthil du bkug/ mtheb mdzub dag ni sor brkyang // gla khug lag mthil mdun de brtan/ 
228a5(rgyud): rim 'dug kyang ngag dpung las// rgyal phyir sngags 'di brjod par ba// ne mo rat+na trai yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki twe shwa ra laya// bi d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA ke ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a ba
228a6(rgyud): ba ra ba te/ oM h+ya hi swAhA// yang na sngon ltar lus bsrang te// snying khar thal sbyar spro ba bsnol// mdzub mo gnyis bsgrengs rtse mo sprad// mthe' gnyis mdzub tshig dang por bkug/ lag mthil cung zad
228a7(rgyud): ma reg pa// gzung sdigs gang brjod phyag rgya'o// bgags kyi 'tshe 'byung po'i tshe// sngags dang phyag rgya 'dis gsal bya// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki ti shwa ra ya/ bo d+l-i satwA la/ maH
228a8(rgyud): satwA ya/ mahA kA ru Ni ka ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba d+harmA Ni maN+Da la ya// e h+ye hi ba ri ma shud+d+ha satwA ya swA hA// yang na sgom pa 'jug pas ni// bog mar phyag rgya 'di bcing // dbus gtsug spyi ba
228b1(rgyud): mo sbyar ba mdzub gnyis bkug la rtse sprad nas// de la 'theb gnyis bzhar bar bya// 'ad ni bdud las rgyal bar nges// yang na la gnyis rgyab sprad nas// sor mo rje rnams reg par bya// mtheb gnyis
228b2(rgyud): brkyang nas mthub dang sngar// smin mtsham su ni bzhag par ba// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki ta shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka ya tad+ya thA/ oM sarba Sh+TA na mo badz+ra ma
228b3(rgyud): swA hAH/ khyad par dun lho mthong 'gyur// yang ni 'greng ste mnyam gzhag rgya// snying kar bzhan la sngagasa'i di brjod// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki taM shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA sa
228b4(rgyud): ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba da ba a na le swA hA/ glo bur rtsod pa rgyal byed yin// yang ni bgreng ste rting pa spang // lag gnyis kyis 'jigs bang tshul ba// rtsa sA Da gang rung brjod pas
228b5(rgyud): ni ting 'dzin yan lag brtan par 'gyur// yang na pad+ma rgyan byed yin/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyi phyag rgya'o// la gnyis thal sbyar nr-i na lagis// mthe bo'i sonam mnad byas te/ mthe'u chung
228b6(rgyud): mo'i gung po sprad// gsheg stsol ba'i phyag rgya ste// dgugs na mdzub rtse bgul zhing dgug/ yang na g.yas pa'i mdzub mo dgug/ g.yon pa slar btang bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba
228b7(rgyud): lo ki tai shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM brah+ma/ a h+ye he swAhA// yang na sor rtse rnams bskyed na// mdzub mo g.yas pa lnga chen rnams// yang na phyag rgya
228b8(rgyud): 'di bcas la// nyi zla gzas bzung dus// gzung sngags pa mar bzlas nas// phyag rgyas btab nas zos pas ni// shes rab 'phel dang tshe 'phel zhing // nad med gzur bzang thob par ngos/ 
229a1(rgyud): / te rkang bshibs thal sbyar nas// mthe' gnyis lag pa'i nang bkug pa// snying khar bzhag bya spyan ras gzigs// yid bzhi nor bu'i 'khor lo'i rgya// mchod sogs las kyi sdon
229a2(rgyud): 'gro ba'o// de bzhin gshegs la yang // mdzub bkug mthe bong sen mor bcas// la gnyis rgyab sprad gar dbang rgya// bal sbyar mtheb mdzub so sor brkyang // mgrin pa sngon po'i phyag rgya'o// mdzu
229a3(rgyud): mo gnyis bkug lhag ma brkyang // mi bshol ba yi phyag rgya'o// la gnyis rgyab sprad mtheb gnyis brkyang // bdag pa bzang lo sngags 'di bzla/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA a ba lo ki te shwa rA
229a4(rgyud): ya/ bo d+ha satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ trad+ya thAn mo rat+na sha ra tsan+da/ a laM kA ra marga te dza su pra tsaka bi shwa rA dza ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM rat+ne ret+na/ ta ta sha rat+na ta ta sha rat+na/ 
229a5(rgyud): pra te ma ha ret+ne prab+hA ta/ ra ShA gar+b+he swAhA/ sA ber brgya rtsa brgyad brjod/ nor yang thob pa'i gter rnyed 'gyur// 'gro gzhan bdag la bya mas 'dod na/ so shing la ni nyi shug cig/ ldob rgyas
229a6(rgyud): 'dod pa shu dag la/ stong brgyad bzlas snying khar bsku/ gang bshad phyag rgya dang bcas pas// gdug pa'i sngags 'dis bgegs kyang 'bros// na maHsarba d+hA d+harma saM g+ha ya/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ 
229a7(rgyud): ma Ar+ya ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA la/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM hu bi hu pi/ ka pa hu bi/ pra gA ya ni swA hA// na ma gangs bdug pas sang+yas
229a8(rgyud): 'dug lha rnams dag kyang mchod par bye// yan lag g.yas pa'i mthe bong ni// lag mthil bzhag nas sor mo dgag rna ltag phyar nas mdzumo ni// brkyang bskum bskul bas spro ba dang / 
229b1(rgyud): ba mi 'jigs phyag rgya ste// dus ma yin par 'chi sogs bzlog/ lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas kyang // sor mo bsnol te bkod pa las// mthe bong mthe'u chung so so ni// sprad sprad pa shes rab
229b2(rgyud): oM sarba saM shod+ha ni swA hA/ de bzhin snol te dkan pa yi// gung gnyis nang du bshings sbreng ba// mar me'i rgya ste sngags 'di'o// oM dibu lo tsa na swA hA// de nyid sbubs nas gung mo gnyis// rtse spra
229b3(rgyud): bsgrengs pa bdug spros// oM d+hU pa d+ha ta swA hA// rting sprang so rtsengs sar dgug/ byug pa'i tshul ni byug pa'i rgya/ oM d+ha li be t+ya swA hA// rting sprad sor mo gyan du bgrod// zhal nas mthor tshul
229b4(rgyud): bshos kyi rgya// oM nai bi d+yA prak+Sha taM swA hA/ la gnyis bkug nas rtse brgyad spang // mthe bong gyen du yin pa ni// na bza' dam pa'i phyag rgya'o// oM bA sa ra Ni swA hA/ snyom pa kha phye bte
229b5(rgyud): pa'i tshul// ma stsal ba'i phyag rgya'o// oM a krAhrIHsa ka la ga Na ba ro wa re NaM ba kai ra a a/ a btang ti/ a ba ta rAn+du da sha dki lo ka pA la/ sa pa ri wA re b+h+yA
229b6(rgyud): dr-i ba li gr-ih+Nan+ta/ khA daM tu bi baM tu/ ya the baM ya theSh+TaM dzaHhU bi ho// saM trip+ta sarba satwa ni// shA tiM ku ru/ puSh+TiM ku ru ba shiM ku ru/ A ba ra Na ku ru gu pa ti/ ka ro ta kurbaM tu hAM tsA phaT/ Ar+ya a ba l-i kita
229b7(rgyud): shwa rA s+ya// AM dz+nyA ba ya ti swAhA/ oM a ka ro ma khaM sarba d+harmA NAM a d+ye nutA ban+na twe ta oM AHhUM phaT swAt+ma/ aM hrIHdzaM b+ha la dza len+da ya swA hA/ long spyod rtag phyir gnod gnas la// chu gtsa
229b8(rgyud): rtag tu sbyin par bye// oM A ha~MHlo ke shwa ra hu nu s+thi ti ka rA ya swAhA// yi dwags rnams la sra ra zas// tsa phyor chu dang bcas pa spe la// rnal 'byor ldan pa'i rnal 'byor grogs// lha dang 'dzi/ 
230a1(rgyud): / rten skyong ba dang / 'byung po yi dwags kun brtson 'gyur// sems kyi lcags kyu ldan bya ste// nyon mongs sems par badrang ste// lha k+Sha 'bub phrag sems dga' ba'i// kun slong bya
230a2(rgyud): chub rin chen gyis// las la bsgyur ba'i lhag bsam bskyed// mdzad pa rgya chen kun grub 'gyur// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma da ba zhes bya
230a3(rgyud): ba'i rgyud las sngags kyi sbyor ba'i le'u brgyad pa'o// // de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas// byang chub sede'i seder tshe// nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba/ 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas po zhag
230a4(rgyud): mchod pa'i bkod pa chen po dang / bstod pa'i dbyangs dang bcas pa yis// bac+doMs la mchod par byas// bskor ba du ma byas nas kyang // phyag 'tshal gsang ba stod phyogs gcig mchod// dbus
230a5(rgyud): btsugs thal sbyar 'di skad gsol// mgon po'i yon kun gyi rgyal// ye shes rmad kyi 'byung gnas gotso// thar pa'i lam chen nyi shur rgyal// 'dren pa rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal
230a6(rgyud): mtshan dpe mthar thugs med pa'i sku// gzi brjid rgya che mkha' khyab la// blo gros yangs pa'i na mkha' can// sku yi gsang ba phyag 'tshalo// tshangs dbyangs du ma bsam mi khyab// na mkha'
230a7(rgyud): yangs pa'i mthar bkang nas// tshad med yan lag bcu gnyis byung // gsung gi gsang ba phyag 'tshalo// ting 'dzin rnam thar bsam gtan sgo// bsam yas bsam du med bsres pas// bas mi
230a8(rgyud): khyab pa'i shes rab dang // thugs rje'i thugs la phyag 'tshalo// 'gro ba'i nyon mongs 'a chang gcod pa'i// ma rig g.yul las rgyal byed pa// kun rtog dra bsel ba yi// smon pa de ring bsha ga
230b1(rgyud): byis rnams mud pa'i 'ob su lhung // nyan thos 'dod chags tshogs kyi skrag// rang rgyal gsang ba'iri bzo dang ldan// byang chub sengar 'chings pas 'jigs// nyon mongs mnga' bdag gsang snga/ 
230b2(rgyud): lo// shes rab snying rje'i sbyor ba yis// bag chags bcas pa gtan spong ba'i// thabs mchog da ma bshad gsol// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// 'od zer phyogs bcur rgyas byas nas// 
230b3(rgyud): pa'i dbyangs chen gsung snyan pas na mkha'i khams chen rab bkang nas// shes rab snying rjer 'brel ba yi// sbyor ba'i cho ga du ma gsungs// bsdus pa'i don du byas pa 'di// nyi ma'i snying po nyan pa ni
230b4(rgyud): legaso byang chub seda'ache// dpal dang ldan pa khyod leg so// rtse gci lus dang bcas pa la// sems kyi legs nyon yod la bzung // nyams dga' bde ba'i sa phyoT su// shin+d+ra dga' ba'is
230b5(rgyud): las ni// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa bya// gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta ba bas bcas// shar ram lho yi sgo gtong bya// dkar po ser po dam po dang // ljang ku'i tshon gyis bri bar bya// dbu su pa
230b6(rgyud): 'dab brgyad pa// dkar po'i lte bar 'tshams par dmar// mu khyud gnyis dang ldan pa'o// gser dngul zangs saM sa nyid la// bub pa lho yangs mgrin pa pra// baM g.yel zhabs tshod nu ba la/ 
230b7(rgyud): gtsang mar bkrus nas kyang // ga pur gur gum bcu gang dang // gA rtsi gi wang chu yos bkang // byA g+hi seng g+hi ha sa der// ka ri kar ni da bko/ nas 'bras til gro mon sran dang // gser dngul hi
230b8(rgyud): mu tig dang // man shel yin te rin chen lnga/ bri ber stsal nas dkar gyis// mgul pa bcings naso kha rgyan yang // dri zhing lo me tog bzhag/ me tog phreng dang bcas pa de// pad+ma'i dbusu bzhag
231a1(rgyud): / kyang rgya mtsho chen por 'khrugs pa nas// dpag bsam shing chen 'bras bung bcas// 'jig rten dbang gis gang ba yis// spun kyang mtha' yas khyab dmigs nas// sngags
231a2(rgyud): mthu yis sangs rgyas nas// dgongs pa chen skyes 'gyur te// leg so bkra shis 'bab par 'gyur// rgyal sras rnams dang rig pa yi// lha mo tshogs dang glu len dang // bkra shis du ma brjod
231a3(rgyud): 'gyur// de tshe mkha' la ye shes kyi// 'od zer bya ba phrag brgya yis// shing chen yongasu smin pa las// bdud rtsi char chen 'bebs par 'gyur// 'jig rten skyong la gtor ma sbyin// rgyal dang
231a4(rgyud): rgyal sras mchod par bya// skar ma la sogs 'bab pa 'am// chos gcig nas ni nya yi bar// sngags kyi phreng ba brjod par bya// lha la yang yang bskor ba bya// las rnams gang dang gang la yang
231a5(rgyud): lha yi dbang gyur sbyang bar bya// de dang de las rnams la// ci bde bang yang sbyar bar bya// phrag tshogs las la spyan ma'i sngags/ lhog pa 'brum pa la sogs la// mi bshol ba
231a6(rgyud): sngags kyi sbyar// gdon rigs bzlog la gar dbang ste// byang stems rig sngags bzlog pa la// don yod zhags pa'i sngags kyi bkru// shes rab 'phel ba rdo rje chos// klu nad ha la ha las
231a7(rgyud): sel// tshe 'phel pad+ma rgyun lung ste// mgrin sngon sngags kyis dpal 'phel byed// hi ra chen pos bdug spos te// gdong bcu gcig pas blo bur sel// seng+ge sgras ni mdze nad si la// rnal 'byor
231a8(rgyud): byang 'dod pas ni// yid bzhi nor bu'i sngags kyi bkru/ bkra shis rol mo du ma dang // gtsang sbra gos sar ldan pa yis// snyan pa'i mdang dang ldan pas bkru// myur du sgrib pa 'byang ba dang / 'dod yon tu
231b1(rgyud): grub sngags breng ni// gang dang gang yang sbyar bar 'gyur// phran tshogs gzhan lta smos ci dgos// zla ba gzas bzung gyur pa'i tshe// mar srang gcig ni dngul snod gzhug/ sku gzugs mdun pa la
231b2(rgyud): sngags brjod nas// zla ba sos nas mar blangs te// bos lus la blugs pa yis// nad rnams zhi zhing bde bar 'gyur// ldong ros gi'u wang cha mnyam pas// sku yi mdun bzhag sder stong bzla/ chus

231b5(rgyud): phyugs nang zad 'chang // skud pa cang ma mdog dmar po// sngags btab pa'i mdud pa bdam// zhal gcig steng zhal btags nas ni nad pa la btags rims nad ni/ sngags re su
