237a1(rgyud): rur yi shing sar la// 'o mazho mar sbrang rtsi la// sum stong bsregs pas lha dbang 'gyur// bud med dbang du 'dod pas ni// ti kha dang 'bras sogs phub ma la// 'bras dang rang 'byung
237a2(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad// bsregs pas bzang mo dbang du 'gyur// byis pa dbang du 'dod pas ni// bri yang ku yi sbyor bsreg bya// las rnams gang dang gang la yang // de dang mtshungs po sems kyi sbyar// zhi bzhi
237a3(rgyud): ba'i yid kyis te// bskal bzang blo ni rgyas pa la// chags dang mdun sems ldan pas ni// dbang du gyur pa tha tsa med// khro dang bcas pa'i yid kyis ni// drag pa'i lasu 'gyur ba yod// brtan po dal
237a4(rgyud): 'byor ldan pa'i blo/ rgyun rtags gsal ba yod 'gyur bas// ji ltar bsam pa de 'grub kyi// gzhan du yang ni de ltar min/ mig la skyon zhugs lus kyi ni// dngos gang gsal
237a5(rgyud): bor lta ba ltar// bla ma dang ni bral gyur nas// sngags kyis byin rA bas snang ba me// lus ngag yid kyi sgo nas kyang // rnam pa kun tu bla ma la/ snod pa 'a'ang de spangs par bya// smad pas
237a6(rgyud): dmyal sogs ngan 'gror 'gro// bla ma'i ngag las byung ba dang // ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya mchod// oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wA la tiSh+Tha sid d+ha lo tsa ne sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA// bsang gtor dang ku sha \u0f7f
237a7(rgyud): pa'i sngag so// oM dzA la dz+wa lA na la rka swAhA/ sAr ba'i sngag so// na maHsa me ta bud d+hA nA~M/ oM ag+na ya~M A di bya A bi sha ma hA shri ya ha bya ka byA ba ha nA ya swA hA/ mchod mar gyi sngag so// 
237a8(rgyud): sarba pA pe da ha na badz+ra ya swA hA// til gyi sngagaso// oM sarba saM pa de swA hA/ zho dang zan dam pa yi'o// oM badz+ra b+hasmiM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ ud pa lo'o// oM badz+ra puSh+pe yai swA hA// 'bras kyi'o// oM badz+ra
237b1(rgyud): a pra ti ha ta badz+ra swAhA/ ku sha'o// oM badz+ra ba dzA ya swAhA/ lag pan kyi'o// oM badz+ra mA le puSh+pa ye swAhA/ mngar gsum dang dgar gyi'o// oM badz+ra ma hA re pA ya swAhA/ nas kyi'o// so ma
237b2(rgyud): ba lA ya swA hA/ sran ma ma sha yi'o// oM badz+ra g+hasma ri swA hA/ gro'o// oM badz+ra Adz+nyA swA hwe/ u dum pa ra'o// oM ti ti pra mi swAhA/ byang chub shing // oM badz+raR+Sha ya swAhA/ n+ya gau ta'o// oM nAM kA ya swAhA/ 
237b3(rgyud): a mra'i lo// oM AHhrIHhUM/ zad bsang ba'o// chus ni dge par byed pa dang // rdul sogs mun po zhi bar byed// zhi ba chu yi dkyil 'khor bar// dkar po zlum po kha na'o// sas ni rtsa shing 'bru ma
237b4(rgyud): bskyed dang dngos po rgyas par byed// rgyas pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor ltar// ser po gru bzhi pa na'o// rlung gis sdud dang 'byed pa dang // dbang du byas nas g.yo bar byed// dbang la rlung gi dbyer lha
237b5(rgyud): zla gam dmar po'i kha dog// mas ni smin cing sreg pa dang / drag shul gyi ni yal bar byed// dag po gru gsu me'i dkyil 'gro nad dmar rgyu ba ni nag por bya// mkha' la nyi ma sha
237b6(rgyud): bA niHmun pa'i sgrib pa zhi par byed// zhi la shar du bltas pa ste// dang ldan gos kyang dkar po'o// nyi ma byang du 'gro ba'i tshe// dngos po rgyas par 'gyur pa'i phyir// rgyas pa byang du bltas bya ba// gos ni
237b7(rgyud): ser re ljang ku shis// nyi ma thal nas mtshan mo ni// dbang du dngos po 'byung ba'i phyir// dbang la nub phyogs bltas pa dang // gos kyang dmar ser rab tu shis// nyi ma lhor 'gro'i dusu ni// shin+d+ha grang ba'i
237b8(rgyud): chu yis ni// tsa sogs dngos rnams bsad nas kyang // des dang 'thor dang dengs pa dang // bskas dang g.yengs dang dab pa dang // rab tu g.yos dang bcas par 'gyur// mngon spyod lho yi phyogs blta
238a1(rgyud): // nas gos kyang sngo dang nag po bya// tsam pa ka dang pu ti ka/ lag skyes pad+ma dkar po dang // ku mud dkar po zla seng rnams// chu gtsang dang bar bcas pa dag/ zhi ba'i las la mchod par
238a2(rgyud): bya many+dzu nA ga be sha ri// su mud le dang a spras dang // gser mdog chen po chu dung dang / tse'u li sar dang pad+ma ser// chu bo chen po chung bcas pa// rgyas pa'i las la bsngags pa'o// pu tsi na dang man du
238a3(rgyud): dpar// le yi che dang nya sha rnams dang / sin du ra dang pad+ma dmar// ku ma ta rig dmar po rnams// lu ma'i chu dang bcas pa ste/ dbang gi las la mchod par bya// ud pa la k+She pa la ka dang // ung khyam
238a4(rgyud): dang ma mi she/ dzu mong sbyin la mgo bo dang // phag na dan nyid pa la rnams// khron pa'i chu dang lhan cig tu/ mngon spyod las la mchod par bya sa lu dkor po zan dang no// khri ka spos ni zhi ba la/ sa

238a6(rgyud): de zhal zas dang // bdug spos bye brag shes par bya// rtsi mar dang a se yi// sdong bur ldan pa'i mar me ni// zhi ba'i las la shin tu shis// yang ni bdakar sdong bu'o// til lam shits+tsha dang se ma dang / sa
238a7(rgyud): hi ya sdong bu ni// rgyas pa'i las la shin+na shis// yang na ba yi la gi cha// na ke la yi mar dang ni// pad+ma dmar po'i mar da ni// dbang gi las la shin+ta shis// yang na ba ya ma ri'o// yung dang rtsi li ma
238a8(rgyud): dang niSha tsing tra'i sdong bu mar me ni// yang na gso ma'i shun pa yis// mdog dmar ngal zhing gsal ba ni// gangs ri'i rtse ltar dkar 'bab pa// bar bre sma gul spos dkar de// zhi ba'i las ni 'grub

238b2(rgyud): lhab sgra tsam pa ka yi dri// rgyas pa'i las 'grub ze tsho med// leb rgan mdog ldan 'khyil zhing spug/ hur sma rul dro bro ba dang / rigs kyi ri ba ltar 'bang ba/ mngon spyod las la 'gru' par 'gyur// 'dzim 'i
238b3(rgyud): 'dzin ldan grub pa'i// deng srong rigs la dpag med kyang // me yi lha ni bzhi bcu bzhi// sbyin bsreg las la spang bar bya// 'jig rten 'das pa'i ting 'dzin can// bcu gnyis grangs ni gzung bar bya//

238b6(rgyud): gzhung du gtor ba bya// zhi dang dbang gi zhing phyogs dang / ra ba bskyed mos tshal du gtor// dag par byed pas chu bo ltar// rgyas pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ga/ gang bar byed pa rgya mtsho ltar// sbyin srog ni

238b8(rgyud): grogs byed srang ba dang / skyob phyir tshe ring dpal 'phel zhing // nad med long spyod rgyas pa dang // bas pa bzhin du 'gab par 'gyur// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
239a1(rgyud): / pad+ma'i dra ba zhes bya ba las me la rten pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// de nas byang chub sede' che/ rdzu 'phral 'khor lo zhes bya ba// mkha' la yi ge sprul nas ni 'go don sna tshogs
239a2(rgyud): mdzad pazhig/ 'khor bcas dkyil 'khor deng lhags nas/ phyag 'tshal bskor bdu ma byas// mchod pa'i sprin gyis rgyas par mchod// phyogs gcig 'khor nas ston pa la// mgrin gcig ga
239a3(rgyud): ni snyan pa yis// 'di skad tshig ni gsol ba 'debs// oM mtshan dang dpe byang rgyan pa'i sku// 'dzin 'dzin 'das pa yi// chos kyi long spyod ji snyed la// rdzon par long spyod mdzad phyag 'tshal// gang la
239a4(rgyud): / mkho ba de yi gtso bo// 'dren pa gzugs brnyan du ma 'chang // sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul mdzad pa'i sku// bde ba che la phyag 'tshal/ mi 'gyur rnam dag byang chub laM// phyogs chos bya

239b1(rgyud): 'od zer nyi ma 'bum gzi can// 'gro la 'dren gtso ded dpon gyi// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang gi sngags dang phyag rgya bcas pa yis// 'bro la sna tshogs phan don du// ji ltar 'gyur mdza

239b8(rgyud): bzlog nas khad par da// rdo rje dkar po rtsa lnga la// 'od kyi rabazlum po yi// ri mo gnyis dang bcas pa bri/ rwa rnams la ni hA gnyis par// rig sngags bzlog dang bcas pa bri// lte ba ra oM hrIHswAhA'i bar

242a1(rgyud): // pa lang shin tu srab 'jam sor gnyis rngams// shing de la ni rta babs gzugs// 'khor lo gdugs dang bcas pa yi// brtsegs pa'i g.yas zung dang po ni// rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga ste// gnyis
242a2(rgyud): pa ud pal dmar po'o// gsum par 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad sar// bzhi par pad+ma dkar po'o// g.yon zur dang por pad+ma dam// gnyis pa ud pal sngon po'o// gsuM pa nor bu bzhi rgya gam// nang khong du

242a5(rgyud): gdab sngags dag ni// bdun steng re ra brjod byas nas// sgo gong la gdags 'byung 'jug tshe// 'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal/ rta phyugs yis nad ma lus la// rig pa'i lha me
242a6(rgyud): tshogs bcas pa'i// 'jig rten mgon gyi rog smaDa mthus// myur du sel bar mnan pa dang // bzlog dang bcings par brjed ces brjod// phyugs bdag chen po skyong ba ltar// glang po rta bong ma he
242a7(rgyud): brtan zhing nad dang gnod pa med// shin tu 'phel zhing rgyal bar 'gyur// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dmag dpung chen po 'jigs pa la// khyad par du ni skyob pa yis// phyag rgya sbyor mnyan par gyis
242a8(rgyud): yung bas ras shing la ni// padakar steng du kha T+wAM dang // ral gri 'od ma bri bar bya// de la gdubu gsuM gyi bskor// dang po gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags// gnyis pa seng+ge sgra yi sngags// gsuM pa ra ha ya chen
242b1(rgyud): po'i sngags// de rgyab me yi ra ba bri// 'di la gsol ba btab nas ni// g.yul ngor khyer te zhugs pa gang // dag dpung chen po 'bros 'gyur te// rang nyid g.yul las rgyal bar 'gyur// long spyod spyir ni
242b2(rgyud): byang bltas bri// dbang byed pa ni nub tu ste// g.yul bzlog pa ni lhor bltas bri// lhag ma rnams la shar bltas bro// dkar ser dper dang sngo ba yi// dbye bas zas dang gos shes bya// 'dzum dang rjem dang
242b3(rgyud): dgod dang khri/ bzhin gyi rnam pa bshad pa yi// sngags dang sngags kyi 'od phreng dang / lha yi kha dog dbye ba dang // snod la sogs pa'i dbye ba dang // brgyan yang de ltar shes par bya// kun kyang rid chen pad+ma
242b4(rgyud): gdan// kha dog sna tshogs ldan par ni// sngags kyi yig 'bru'i lha rnas bzhugs// sngags rdzogs nas ni sngagasu dmigs// gang gis phyag rgyu 'chang byad la/ byang chub seng ri tshoDa rnams dang
242b5(rgyud): rig pa'i lha mo'i tshogs rnams dang / 'jig rten 'dren pa bcas dang // spyan ras gzigs dbang tshogs chen dang // khro 'o tshogs bcas ma lus dang / 'jig rten skyong ba gra
242b6(rgyud): ldan rnams// ci 'dod las rnams ma lus pa'o// grogs dang dpung du byas nas ni// tshul bzhin du ni sgrub pa la// brtson 'grus gang dang gang gis kyang // / the tsom du ni mi bya'o// 'phags pa
242b7(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma rid ba las phyag rgya la rten pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// de nas mkha' lag sh+ye ba yi// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rang srong mchog/ mtshan
242b8(rgyud): dbo du ma rgyas pa che// nyi ma'i gong bu zhes bya ba// drang srong rje dpon tshogs kyi mchog/ 'gro dad rdzogs mdzad thugs rje can// spyan ras gziT dbang mgon po la// sangs rgyas tshogs 'di skad gso
243a1(rgyud): // mau 'od zer du mther zug/ srid 'dab sngags po sal byed rgyal// yon ye shes kyis rgyan sku// mgon po spyan ras gzig phyag 'tshal// gsung snyan yan lag brjod bral chos// 2ga
243a2(rgyud): chags ri bo snyil mdzad rgyal// skye 'gag bral sten sde snod gsum// mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal// skye 'gag gnod bral mnyam gzhag pa// ting 'dzin shes rab 'phel mdzad
243a3(rgyud): rgyal// ye shes gzigs pa mtha' yang thugs// mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal// sna tshogs smad dang sngag sbyar nas// lha yi gong bu'i rib bu ni// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das
243a4(rgyud): yi// dngos grub ma lus rdzogs pa yi// thugs rje'i nyi ma lho mdzad pa'i// mgon po pad+mas pa shadu gsol// 'gro rnams ma rig 'das la zhen// srid pa'i zag pas rgya gam bcings 'o/ 
243a5(rgyud): cha ni sdang mun pas g.yogs/ nga rgyal phrag dog chu bos pa/ longs ngan rtog log la g.yangs lhung // bag med ser sna'i dugs myos// sdig pa'i gr-ib mas rnang rgyal// bag cha chu
243a6(rgyud): po'i ri'is mnan// mgon khyod thugs rjes ngal ba med// nyes pa'i rgya mtsho bsal ba'i phyir// shes rab thabs 'byung ba shadu gsol// de nas 'jig rten mgon po rje// thur rje thugs dpag mas
243a7(rgyud): ba yi// thugs dam rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu bcas// khyad par gzung 'di bka' stsal to// mtha' dag gzug sgra thos pa dang // rdzu 'phrul bsgyur dang gzhan sems shes// 'das dang ma 'ongs don shes
243a8(rgyud): dang mtha' yas shas dag las spyod pa// dngos dang rtags dang cha 'thun gyis// rnam pa bco brgyad dag tu 'gyur// pra dang yang dang mchod par bya ba dang // bdag por gyur dang dbang du 'gyur pa da
243b1(rgyud): gar yang phyin yang 'dod dgur ldan pa dang // dga' mgur gnas te dbang phyug stono// rnam pa brgyad kyi dpe bya yis// long spyod dbang dang lus la dbang // tshe la dbang dang rkang mgyogs// chu la mi
243b2(rgyud): bying mkha' la 'gro/ sa 'og 'gro dang mi snang ba// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod sogs// dngos po gang dang gang bsgrubs rnams// ril bu las ni 'byung 'gyur gyis// gzhani myur du 'grub mi 'a
243b3(rgyud): byang chub seM de'i ril bu ni// mtshams med la sogs byed pas kyang // rnyed ma thag tu dngos grub 'gyur// nyi dang dbang lha yi sras// ma mos dbang du byas gyur na// 'thung po sha za lha min mo// mtsho
243b4(rgyud): mkha' go 'thung po klu/ dud 'gro la sogs rdzogs gzugs can san gzhan lta smos ci dgos// dngos grub bzang po 'dod pa yis// khyad par ril bu 'di bsgrub bya// gi ru wang dang ni log
243b5(rgyud): bu mig/ ldong ros bzang por sbyar ba yis// ril bu rgya sran tshad byas nas// snod gtsang nang du bzhag par bya// sku yi mdun du sngags brjod na// sngon chad ma mthong snang ba 'a
243b6(rgyud): sgra thos ni bde gash+ye gzun/ yid 'ong mngon du byung ba sogs// mar ngo gsum gyis 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas zla ba gzas bzung tshe// ci 'byor mchod snyim par bcug/ bzlas brjod byas nas nyi
243b7(rgyud): shar na// ngu bar 'thul dang dri can 'gyur// dud 'i thu lus la byugs pas kyang // snang ba dang 'od gzugs can dang // 'jam gling phyogs rnams rgyu ba dang // long ste de tshe dang ldan 'gyur te/ 
243b8(rgyud): 'phos dga'i ldan gnasu skye// de ma tsam gyis lus byugs kyang // 'gro ba zad dbang byed cing // thos pa 'dzin cing rgyu btsal mkhas// shi nas 'jam gling 'di nyid du// lcang lo can gyi gnod
244a1(rgyud): sbyini// 'khor ba gzhon nu'i rigasu skye// yang na mi yi rgyal po 'am// glang po nyid skye bar nges// 'bar ba lus la bskus na lta// rig sngags 'chang lus nyi shar mdog/ bskal par gnas te
244a2(rgyud): 'dod dgur spyod// 'jig rten kun tu thogs med rgyu// mkha' lding sa 'og chu bran 'gro// sangs rgyas kun nas phyin nas kyang // dbang por gnas te rgyal por gnas// sprul pa'i rdzas kyis bde gshegs mchod// 'dod
244a3(rgyud): nas shi 'phos 'jig rten khams// gzhan 'das sangs rgyas dag tu skye// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// bdag nyid yid 'ong 'dod pas// gur gum ga pur bla rtsi dang // gi'u wa bsregs na sngag stong
244a4(rgyud): / bzlas// brdungs te phye mar byas nas kyang // sngags stong bzlas te mu gtsang gis// ril bu rgya sran tshad byas nas// re re la yang stong stong brjod// rlu dang nyi ma ma reg pas// bskams nas gnod
244a5(rgyud): gtsang bzhag par bya// ril bu tsam cig mur na yang // rgyal po zla na po 'khor bcas kyis// mthong na bu bzhin gzigs 'gyur na/ tha mal skye ba smos ci dgos// nor rnams gzhan gyis
244a6(rgyud): ster ba dang // bsgo ba la ni ngag btsan 'gyur// ga pur gu gul gi'u wang dang // tsAn+da gan da brda dang // gla rtsi dag ste ma mnyam du// re re sngags stong bzlas na su// brdangs te ril bu byas pa dag// ga
244a7(rgyud): pa'i zhal la gdags par bya// mdun nas nya yi bar du ni// sngags bzlas pa dang / mchod par bya// gdugs pas nad dang gdon rnamasel// mig la byugs pas rgyal po dang // rgyal mo bu dang bu mo dang

244b1(rgyud): bdugs pas kyang // sdig pa thang byang 'gyur te// kun gyis mthong dang dga' ba dang // gzi byin 'phags pa kun gyis mchod// ga pur gA rtsi gur gum dang // tsan gA rtsi ka ko la// spos kyi rgyal po pad+ma dang /

244b4(rgyud): stong bzlas del nas ril bu bya// mig nad sel na chu dang sbyar// so nad la ni ka ka ru// rna ba'i nad la ru rta ste// ud pa la mu ti gi mig nad la// gre ba'i nad la ba sha ka glau nad la nai ba li ka/ sha
244b5(rgyud): ra yi thang dang sbyar// rlung nad la ni ma dang sbyar// mkhris nad la ni tig ta dang // bad kan la ni sgra dang sbyar// mdze nang la ni dug mo nyungs// ma zhu ba la kha ru tshwa// skrangs nad rnams la
244b6(rgyud): thug po che// bgags dang yas nad sel ba la// gu gul dang bcas 'dug par bya// ril bu'i yon mtha' yas ni// nam yang brjod par mi nus// gu gul la ni stong bzlas pa'i// ril bus ba/

244b8(rgyud): lus rgyas te// na dang gnod dang dgras mi chug// 'dod rnams thang 'grub par 'gyur// ta ka'i rtsa ba ba ru ra// skyu ru ra dang til ti la// mnyo bya srin bya'i khrag dang mo/ ril bu byas nas mig la byugs// 
245a1(rgyud): / dang yi dwags khang pa dang // sa 'og thad mthong bar nges// byis pa zla ba gsuM pa'i lce// nyin gcig spos por nang du gzhug/ gnyis par 'o gsuM dang 'byung // bzhi pa ril bu tshil

247a1(rgyud): // ngo bo nyid// nga yi mtshan nyid 'di gsungaso// kun tu bzang po spyod tshul can// dkar la bcu pa rnam spro ba// sen gang du 'dod sbyor ba'o// rigs ni rin chen thad pa'o// lus ngag yid bcu

247a8(rgyud): drug ni sangs rgyas kyo// sa chen bla med mthar gan so// ngo bo spros med chos mas pa// gsang sngag sgrub pa'i rgyu gcig// seMn sem snyoms byang sems 'dzin// nges par sgrub pa'i rgyu gnyis// seMn mi gtong chu
247b1(rgyud): brim srung // sngags don mi spong nyi dang gsuM// rang gi sngags grub gzhan gyi sbar// bar mi gco dang 'gro ba la// byams pa sgrub dang snying rje sgrub// sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu bzhi'o// dben pa bsten dang 'du 'dzi spong // thos
247b2(rgyud): pabs zhing de don spyod// phyi rol sngag spong zhe sdang sbyang // deg sngag sgrub rgyu lnga'o// dad pa 'dun pa gsol ba dang // byi nang sngags la mi spyod// spros med ston pa'i gzhung 'jug dang / theg chen mdo gnang yin
247b3(rgyud): pa dang // sngags gzhung tshol ba mi skyo dang // dge sbyong brtson dang dag pa'o// bzlas dang sprin bsreg mchod rtor brtson// phyi rol dka' thub gdung me dang // snod bcud 'og min gnas lha dang / bu mo pha rol phyin yuH
247b4(rgyud): 'go ba mi sla tshe mi 'byed// reg dman pa len pa dang bdun// nyan thos rang rgyal blo ldan dang // ngag 'dzin rdzu 'phrul ba med// lha dang bla ma'i bsnyen bkur dang // dbang bskur lung nod spro ba dang // ser sna ma
247b5(rgyud): dang gtong le dga'// gsang ba dga' zhing mi g.yeng dang // gzi brjid dbang che'i lus thob dang // gags kun blo ldan brgyad por blta// bsku ra ba med cing bden par smra// bag yod tshul 'tsho spa
247b6(rgyud): pa steng brgyad pa de yang sgrub pa'i rgyu// rgyu med 'bras bu ga la srid // gang zhig lcags kyu bzung bas gnyis re nas// k+Sha breg 'bum phrag 'den ltar dge ba'i sems// kun slong byang chub rin tshin thob ma
247b7(rgyud): rgyu// rtag par 'chang na gnas bsgyur byed par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// blo ldan rnas la bka' stsal pa// lagaso leg so so 'a che// gang dag de dag de bzhin du// bde 'dod rnar g.yeng ba dang / des ni
247b8(rgyud): sdug bsngal mya ngan 'das// gdung ba chag sdang 'khrag pa dang // de ni log pa'i chos 'dor yang // dge sbyong log ltas tshangs pa'i gdon// sngaT log spyod byed rig 'dzin gdon// gdul dka' dag la rgyun ring po
248a1(rgyud): // skye ngan 'jigs phyir blo zab spyod// gang gi khyim na rgyud 'di yod/ khri dang klag dang mchod pa dang / rim gro chad zhugs la byed la/ bkris tshe ring dpal 'byor bskyod/ bac+doMs kyis de skad ces bkar sna
248a2(rgyud): ba dang / byang chub sedang seda' chen po'i tshogs de dang // rig pa'i lha mo dang // khro bo du ma dang / nyan thos kyi tsho Da thad dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ brjes kyis gsung
248a3(rgyud): bal mngon par bstod// 'phaDa pa spyan ras gziT dbang phyug rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dab zhes bya ba la sbyor ba sna tshoT kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// 'phaDa pa spyan ngas gzi dbang phyug rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgya
248a4(rgyud): bo pad+ma'i dra ba zhes bya ba rdzog so// rig pa'i 'byung gnas rig pa'i 'od zer gyis shes rab pad+ma rgyas pa'i kha che'i bdud rtsi'i 'byung ba'i gtsug khang chen por paN+Di ta chen po so ma shri b+ha ba zhes bya ba dang / baM kyi
248a5(rgyud): k+Shu ra dge slong tshul khris 'od zer gyis bsgyur ba'o// rgya gar skadu/ Ar+ya a mo g+ha pA sha hri da yaM na ma ma hA sA tra/ bod skad/ 'phaDa ba don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
248a6(rgyud): 'phaDa pa don yod zhags pa la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo// thugs rje chen po la phyag 'cha'o// 'di skad bdags thos pa dus gcig na// bac+doMs po ta la ka'i ri'i rtse mo 'phar pa spyan ras gan
248a7(rgyud): dbang phyugi gnas sa ma la dang / ta ma la dang / rtse ba ka dang mya ngan med pa dang // a ti mu ta ka la sogs pa mang po dang / sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i sdong pos yang dag par rgyan par dge slong gi dge 'od na chen po
248a8(rgyud): stong phrag 'aco brgyad dang / byang chub soda'i bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha bu stong phrag dum pa yongasu bskor cing mdun du byas nas mang po dang babs gci gyu bzhug so// dang phrugs
248b1(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams gtsor byas nas tshe ston to// de nas byang chub sedar se ngar chen po 'phags pa spyad ras gzi dbang phyug stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig pa
248b2(rgyud): nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ gang bac+doMs la da yis thal po sbyar zhing phyag 'tshal nas// zhal 'dzum par gyur pas// bac+doMs la 'di skad ces gsol to// bac+doMs bdag la don yod nas
248b3(rgyud): ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod// gang sngon bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na 'jig rten nor gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi kham su// 'jig rten gyi dbang po rgyal po de bzhin gabye pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
248b4(rgyud): rdzon pa'i sangs rgyas las bdagis blangs te/ gang yang bdogs dbang phyug dang // dbang phyug chen po gtsor byas pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong bang po yang 'duso// bla na med pa yang
248b5(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don yod zhags pa'i ye shes kyi gtso bo'i ting 'dzin bcu pa brgya stong bdag gis rab tu da do// gzhan/ yang gang gi tshe bac+doMs sa bzhir phyog gci rab tu spro
248b6(rgyud): ba las rtog par bya ste// brjes de'i tshe sa phyogs de dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang // tshangs ris gcer byas pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag bcu gnyis kyi srung ba dang // bskyab pa dang / sbed pa'i don du gnas pa
248b7(rgyud): 'gyuraro// gang 'ding don yod zhags pa'i snying po rab tu spyod na bac+doMs sa'i phyir gcig po de mchod rten du 'gror// sen gang dag don yod zhags pa'i snying po nyan pa de dag ni sang+yas mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya
248b8(rgyud): stong la mchod par 'gyuraro// bac+doMs byang chub sada' gang 'dir yod zhags pa'i snying po bos pas bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// gang kha cig bac+doMs sdig pa'i skyon byed pa// sdig pa'i chos bde la
249a1(rgyud): / dag par spyod pa// 'phaDa ba la skur pa 'debs pa// da pa'i chos la smod pa/ panar med pa la gzhol ba// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sede' thad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sa ng+yas la smod pa po de/ 
249a2(rgyud): 'gyod par gyur cing slan chad gcod cing sdom par gyur na// bac+doMs des re shig de nyid bsnyung bar gnas pa gtsigs de bzlas na de'i skye ba 'di'i las yongasu dag cing yongasu zad par 'gyu ro// phyir bzlog par 'gyur
249a3(rgyud): rims nyin gcig pa'am/ nyin gnyis pa'o// nyin gsum pa'am// nyin bzhi pa 'am/ da'i phyir khrag tu 'khra ba'i// tshad pa'am// lag pa na ba 'am// rkang pa na b.laM// ha la ha la yis brtags pa'am// mdzel

249b4(rgyud): lta ste/ gang la la'i skyes bus tsan+da nam// ga pur/ gur gum ne/ gla rtsi gnur zhing brgyad cing rdo ba 'am sa la bzhibs nas bdag nyid la byugs na// de la tsAn+da nam// ga pur/ gur gum maM/ gla rtsi ga
249b5(rgyud): ba'i brgyad pas de ltar de 'pho bar mi 'gyur// yang de zhim po yang de nyid// bcos de ltar kho nar bdagis don yod zhags pa'i snang 'dil yang la la zhigs 'phye zhing spang ba dang / sngam
249b6(rgyud): ltar ji snyed bdag la rgyu dang g.yos mchad pa de dag ni bcos mu rgod kyi sen da dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// 'dod pas dka' bar 'dzin par brjod phyi ma la yang // gang dang gang du skyes pa

250a1(rgyud): // te lan bdun du don yod zhags pa'i snying po tshig tu mi brjod par yongasu bzlas na// de la bac+doMs mthong ba'i chos nyid la phan yon nyi shu thai ba so sor 'dod par bya'o// nyi shu po gang zhe na/

250b5(rgyud): rnams la nus sam mi nus shes par byas la nyan du gzhug par bya'o// slob dpon gyi ser sna mi bya ste/ gang gi phyir phrag dog/ dang ser sna'i dri ma spangs pa ni byang chub sed mi

251a1(rgyud): // gshegs pas kyang rje su yi ra // phyi ma'i dus na byang chub seng rnams kyi pa'i bya ba byed par 'gyuro// de nas byang chub sod la sed 'a chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug spyad mi
251a2(rgyud): 'dzums par gyur pas// bac+doMs la 'di skad ces gsol to// bac+doM sa gson cig/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sad tha~Md kyis phyag byas pa'i nar thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye
251a3(rgyud): bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la rje'u brtse ba dang / skye dgu'i tshogs chen po la phan pa dang bde ba dang / rdor thar pa'i don gyi phyir yang// na ma s+t+rai ya d+hA a nu ga ta pra tiSh+Thi ta b+h+yaHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi seH
251a4(rgyud): na maHpra t+ye ka bud+d+ha Ar+ya shrA ba ka saM g+he b+h+yaHa tI ha nA ga ta pra t+yu b+h+ya na maHsamyag+na tA nAM/ na maHsa pyaka pra ti pan nA nAM/ na maHshwa ra dwa ti pu tra ya ma hA ma ta ya/ na ma sAr+yA saM tr-i ya pra mu kha b+h+yaHmaH
251a5(rgyud): bo d+hi satwa saM g+he b+h+yaHna maHsu pre tiSh+Tha tra shau lan+da rA dza pra mu khe d+hAHsarba ta thA ga to b+h+yaHarAd b+h+yaHsamya kr-i buN+ye b+h+yAM/ b+ha ga bad b+h+yaHnas/ su ban+d+ha bar+N+Na su pra te b+ha sa bi nang ti te shwa ra rA dzA
251a6(rgyud): ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsiM ha bi kI Di ta rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya na maHsu pra tiSh+Thi ta ma Ni kU Ta rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsa man+darasmad ga ta shri ku Ta \u0f7f
251a7(rgyud): ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bi pa s+ye na ta thA ga tA ye/ na maHshi khi ne ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bi shwa b+hu dze ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHkra kuts+tsha nadA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ na maHka na ka mu na ya~M/ ta thA ga tA yai/ na
251a8(rgyud): kA sh+ya pA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHshAkya mu na ye ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+d+ha te sa myak+Sha bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM mu ne mu ne ma hA mu ne swA hA/ oM sha me she me ma hA sha me rakA ra kA mAM sarba satwA sh+tsa sarba
251b1(rgyud): baM pra sha ma ne swAhA/ na maHsu ba ri kIrti ta nA ma d+h+ye mA ya/ shri ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsa man+ta a wa b+hA sa bi dzi ta saM grA ma shri ye ta thA ga tA ya/ na ma in+d+ra ka tud+hA dza shri ye ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo rat+nar+tha
251b2(rgyud): b+ha se shwa ra rA dzA ya ta thA ga ta yan mo a pra ti ha ta bai Sha dz+ha rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bikrAn+ta gA mi na ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bud d+ha ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na meHsaM g+hA ya/ na mo a tI ta a nA gaH
251b3(rgyud): pra t+yuta ban+de b+h+yo/ sarba bud d+ha bau d+hi satwe b+h+yo/ b+ha ga ba b+hUHtad+ya thA/ smr-i ti bar+d+ha ni/ ma ti badz+ra ni/ ga ti bar+d+ha ni/ d+hI ti bar+d+ha ni/ pradz+nyA bar+d+ha ni/ pra ti b+hA na ba d+ha ni/ d+h+ya na bar+d+ha ni/ sA man+ma bar+d+ha ni/ bi ba sh+ya na bar+d+ha ni/ 
251b4(rgyud): bo d+hi bak+Sha d+harma bar+d+ha ni/ sa ku la bud d+ha d+hirma pa ri pU ra NI ye swA hA/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA a wa lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo dz+ha satwA yam hA satwA ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ na mo mahA s+thA ma
251b5(rgyud): prap+tA ya bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ mahA kA ru Na~M kA ya/ oM b+h+yAM/ ma skr-it+ma/ i daM Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shwa ra mu khing gir+m+ma a mo g+ha bA sha re dz+nyA na ma hr-i da ya~M/ ta be tA sa mu kha~M T+TA ShAH
251b6(rgyud): ma hA pa ra ShaM ma d+he a ha mi dA nI mA brta ya Sh+ye mi/ sid d+hun tu me man+ta pa dAHsarba kar+yA Ni/ sarba b+ha ye b+ho ma ma sarba satwA nany+tsa rak+She b+hu ban+d+ha/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi raM tsi ri/ tsu ru tsa ru/ ma ra mar/ 
251b7(rgyud): mi r-i mi ri/ mu ru mu ru/ ma hA ku ru Ni kA/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bi ri bi raM/ bai r-i bi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ ma hA pad+ma hasta/ ka la ka la/ ki li kau l-i/ ku lu kuH
251b8(rgyud): ma hA shud+d+ha sat+ka/ bud+d+ha bu d+h+ya/ bo d+ha bi d+ha/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ bo d+ha ya be d+ha ya/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni ku N+ya ku N+ya/ pa ra ma shud d+ha swa tA/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA smA ma prap+ta/ tsa la tsa

252a5(rgyud): ka bi nA ya ka ba hu bi ba~M d+ha be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hur+ya d+hu ru/ tadatar tha ra tha ra/ b+ha ra g+ha ra/ yaM ra ya ra/ kha ra l-ir/ ha ra ha/ ba ra ba ra/ sa~M ra sar/ bar bar/ ba ra dA ya

252a7(rgyud): mAM sarba satwash+tsa sarba b+ha ya b+h+yaHsarbo pa da ba b+haHsarba ba sarge b+h+yaHsarba gra he b+h+yaHsarba bya d+hi b+haHsarba bi Sha b+haHsarba dz+wa ra b+haHa baM/ pa d+ha ban d+ha na/ tA Da na/ rArdza na/ rA dza/ taska ra/ a g+ni/ ud
252a8(rgyud): kaShi2/ kasta~M pa ri mo tsa ka/ ka Na ka Na keHka~M Na~M/ ku Nu ku N+ya/ tsau ra tsa ra/ tsi ra tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ inI ga po la// kho d+h+yag/ tsa~M tur sAr+ya satwa saM praka she ka Na ba tag/ ta ma ta ma/ dmad ma/ 
252b1(rgyud): sa mas sems/ d+ha sa d+ha ga/ sa rbA kA ru \u0f7f// ma don yan d+ha kAr ba d+ha man/ 2Ta bAr mi tA par ju ga/ sa lam ga tha mam gzum sa ma thamama'a' co
252b2(rgyud): dzi Thi Shi'i/ du dzu Tu b+da/ e na ya tsatrA~M k+ShiHpa rakar/ a ts+yai hi mahAg ru tsi ka I shwa ra/ mahe shwa ra/ ma hA b+hU ta ga Na sa~M b+hany+dza ka/ kA ra ga ra ki ra ka r-i/ ku ru ku ru/ pa ra pa ra/ ha ra ha ra/ Sha rab ra/ sa
252b3(rgyud): ma ra ma ra/ ka ra ka ra/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ki Ti ki Ti ku Tu ku Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ ma sna bi shud d+ha Shi Sha la ni ba si naM/ mahA kA ru Ni ka shwe ta yadz+nye u pa bI ta/ r-it+na kr-i ku Ta/ mA lA d+ha ra/ sarba dz+nyA shi ra si kA
252b4(rgyud): ta dza Ta mu ku Ta/ mahA yang b+hU ta/ ka ma la a li krota ka ra ta la d+hA na/ sa mA d+hi/ bi mo k+Sha a pra kamyA/ ba h+ye satwa san+na tri pa ri bI tse ka/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka sarba karma A wa ra Na ri sho d+ha ka
252b5(rgyud): dz+nyA dz+nyA na pa ri pu ra ka/ sarba bA d+hi pa ri mo tsa ka/ sarba satwa a sha ba ri pU ra ka sarba satwA sa mA shwA sa ka ra na ma/ stu te swA hA/ amo g+ha pA shA ya swA hA/ a dza tA ya swAhA/ a ba raH
252b6(rgyud): tA ye swA hA/ a mi tA b+hA ya steH/ a mi tA b+ha su tra la swA hA/ mA ra se n+ya pra mdzan ya swAhA/ a b+ha yA ye swA hA/ A d+ha ya~M pra dA ya swAhA/ dza yA ya s+t+waM hA/ bi dza lA ye swAhA/ dza ya bi dza yA ya swAhA/ 
252b7(rgyud): ba ra dA ye swAhA/ ba ra pre dA ya swA hA/ a kA la mrit+te pra sha ma na ya swAhA/ i me karma ku run mo sU te swA hU~M/ oM ra Na ra Na hI phaT swAhUM/ oM dza ya hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM dz+r-i dz+r-i dz+r-i swA hA/ oM hrI tra la
252b8(rgyud): dza ya a ma g+ha bA sha a pre ti hi tahrIHhahU~M phaT swAH/ oM ba su pa ti swA / oM a ro li ka swA hA/ oM bahUM la~M ba tu la swA/ oM A ro li ka hrI/ hrihUM phaT swAt+ma/ ni ya oM ni ya ta ba dA nI ya ar+tha
253a1(rgyud): / b+ha s+ya me b+ha ga wan karma No a she Sha taHkA yaM ku ru swA hA/ oM pad+ma hasta ya swA hA/ oM bud+d+ha d+harma saM g+hA ya swA hA/ bklags pas las thad 'grub pa yino// dus gsum du bzlas
253a2(rgyud): mtshams med pa lnga rnam par dag par 'gyuraro// las kyi sgrib pa tha~Mng rnam par dag par 'gyuraro// a ga ri'i bdug spros dang / thal ba dang / chu dang / yungs kar dang / seng ldeng gi phur bu la sogs pas
253a3(rgyud): mtshams bcing // rims nad thaMd la srung skud bcing bar bya'o// nad thaMd la mar ram/ mar nag gam/ chu la yongasu bzlas te smin par bya'o// lus las khyab pa'i nad la mtshon chas bcad cing sA
253a4(rgyud): skud kyang bya'o// lto na ba la tshwa chus nyams par byed pa 'am/ 'jim bgam/ chus kyang bya'o// migau nad la skud pa dkar po rna ba la bcing bar bya'o// so'i nad la ka ra bi ra'i so shing gis
253a5(rgyud): mchis bcing ba la ni tshon sna lnga'i srung ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bar du yongasu bzlas nas seng ldeng gi pur 'u ba ni la bcings/ phyogs bzhir gdab par byas na mtshams bcings pa yi
253a6(rgyud): zadu srung skud dam/ chu 'am/ thal bas bya'o// gza' thang la tshon sna lnga'i skud pas bya'o// rims thaMd la skud pa dkar pos bya'o// sbal dang / srin bu dang / ba spu bying dang / lhog pa dang / gre ba 'gags pa rnams
253a7(rgyud): la sbrang rtsi po pi ling dang ldan pas bya'o// mi gi nad la di zhim po'i chu'am/ rgya skegs kyi chu 'am/ sbrang rtsi 'am/ shing mngar gyis bya'o// rtsod pa'i dus thadu rtsod pa dang / mi nyan par brjod pa la chu la yongasu
253a8(rgyud): bzlas te gdong bkru bar bya'o// yul gzhan gyi rgyal po'i 'tshe ba las yul 'khor du bum pa gang ba yang dag par gzhag nas gtsang mas gos gtsang ma gyon te mchod pa chen po byas shing bklags
253b1(rgyud): zhi ba chen por 'gyu'o// de yi chus kyang gtor bar byas nas sen thang srung ba yin// nye bar 'tshe ba dzad dang / yams rnams zhi ba yino// phyag rgya tsan dan gyi thig le la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi ngang
253b2(rgyud): du yongasu bzlas na mtsham med pa zad zad par byed// rtag tu bzlas na khyim srung ba'o// pad+ma'i sbyin sregs seMn tha~Md kyi srung ba'o// can gyi sbyin sregs gza' dang / 'byung po dang / rgyu skar thed lnga
253b3(rgyud): srung ba'o// rgyal ba dang / rnar rgyal ba dang / gzhan gyis mo thub pa dang / na gu li dang / dri'i na gu l-i dang / d+ha ra ni dang / mi 'jigs pa'i lag pa dang / dbang po'i lag pa dang / dri'i pr-i yang ku dang / 
253b4(rgyud): ta ka ra dang / 'khor lo dang / 'khor lo chen po dang / rnam par gnon pa dang / so ma rA dzi dang / su nad nga zhes bya ba ste// de dag gang yang rung ba la brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du yongasu bzlas nas nong
253b5(rgyud): bu lta bur byas nas mgo bo dang / dpung ba la bcing bar byo byis pa rnams kyi ni mgul du'o// bud med rnams kyi mdon su bcangs na rang nyid mchog tu skal ba dang ldan par phyo
253b6(rgyud): g.yang med pa nyams nas bu yang stero// nor bu 'di bcangs pas thang srung ba byas pa yi no// dug dang mes mi tshug so// dgis byas pa yang skye bar mi 'gyuraro// nad byung ba yang mi skye zhing myur du
253b7(rgyud): zhi bar 'gyuraro// bza' rab tu yang zhi bar 'gyur/ rlung dang sprin dang thog ni chus rangs par byad// ka ra bi ra'i lcug mas ni las thaMd byed// 'phen pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying po mchog tu
253b8(rgyud): grub pa 'das ma bsgrubs par yang las 'di rnams byed// de nas sgrub par 'dod thang ska cho ga ni tshon sde ma lus sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugaso mnyam par bri bar bya ste/ 'phags pa s+ya
254a1(rgyud): // ras gzigs dbang phyug ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba ri dgas kyi lpags pa smang dkris byas shing phrug ba gi cha lugs 'chang brgyan zad kyis brgyan pa bya'o// lha bapo mkhan ga
254a2(rgyud): sbyong dang ldan pas ri mo ri bri bar bya'o// de nas sgrub bo po ska gzugs de'i mdun du ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la me tog dkar po bkram ste/ dri zhim po'i rgas bkang ba'i bum pa brgyad
254a3(rgyud): bzhag par bya'o// nye bar spyod pa brgyad dang / nye bar mkhe ba drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / khrag med pa'i gtor ma sha dang bcas pa pa'o// a ga ru'i bdug spos bsregs la rig pa stong phrag brgyad bzla
254a4(rgyud): par bya'o// nyin zhag gcig du bsnyung bar gnas pa 'am/ nga gsu za zhing dus gsuM nga khrus byas nas gos gtsang ma gyon/ bar gyur pas bzlas pa bya'o// da na sku gzun kyi mdun du
254a5(rgyud): nyid bris pa bltas nyid mthong bas dga' bar 'gyur zhing // ji srid du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byon te bas pa zad yongasu rdzogs par byed// ldeng pos mig sman la
254a6(rgyud): yongasu bzlas te mig la bsdus na de nas mi snang bar 'gyur zhing na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur// yang dag par rmongs pa med pa'i tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin rab tu 'tho'o// sgrub pa po ga
254a7(rgyud): 'dod pa de 'dis byed nas bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sada' seda' chen po 'darab spyadan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / dge slong de dag byang chub da ge
254a8(rgyud): ngag dang / gtsang mo'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bac+doMs kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod/ 'phaDa ba don yod zhaDa
254b1(rgyud): snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen pa'i mdo rdzogaso// rgya gar gyi mkhan po a mo g+ha badz+ra dang / bod kyi lots+tsha ba dge slong rin chen grags pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab po'o// rgyag
254b2(rgyud): Ar+ya a mo g+ha pA sha hr-i da yaM ma hA ya na nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skadadu/ 'phaT ba don yod zhags par snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub seMd dus gsu du ga sh+ye shing bzhugs
254b3(rgyud): pa thang la phyag 'tsha'o// 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dgad ltar zung ba'i sangs dang / 'phags pa nyan thos thad la phyag 'tshalo// yang dag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhuT pa rnaMs la phyag 'tsha'o// 
254b4(rgyud): blo gros chen po shA ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tsha'o// 'phags pa byams pa la phyogs pa byang chub sengar rnams la phyag 'tsha'o// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcob pa yang dag pa rdza
254b5(rgyud): ba'i sangs rgyas 'od bag med la phyag 'tshal// dkon mtshogasu la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub se la se 'a chen po'o 'ad pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje chen po dang lda/ 
254b6(rgyud): pa la phyag 'tshalo// mthu chen po thob pa la phyag 'tsho lo// de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas/ 'phaT pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyu gi kha nas brjod pa de bzhin gash+ye ba'i spyan sngar 'khor mang

254b8(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ a tsau ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma ra ma ra/ mi ri mi ri/ mu ru mu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bi r-i bi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ mau ri bi
255a1(rgyud): // ma hA bad langasta/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hA shud d+ha sarba/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bo d+ha bo d+ha/  d+hi bo d+hi/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu ku r+tha/ pa rA ma shud d+ha
255a2(rgyud): satwa ka ra ka ra/ ki ki rI/ ku ru ku ru/ mahA s+thAm prAp+tA/ tsa la tsa la/ sany+tsa la sany+tsa la/ bi tsa la zo tso la/ e TaHe Ta Ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri shwa ro/ b+hA ru b+ha ru/ ta ra ta ra/ ti ra ti r-I/ d+hu ru tu ru/ e h+ye
255a3(rgyud): kA ru Ni ka/ ma hA pa shu ba ti be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ro/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+ha ru/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ pa ra ba ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ma ra ma ra/ la ra la raM/ ha raM ha ra/ ha ha hI hI hu hu/ oM kA ra brah+ma ba Sha d+ha rad+ha ra
255a4(rgyud): d+ha red+hi r-id+hi bi/ d+hA rA d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ Na car/ na nga ba rab ra/ sa ra ha ra/  sI sha ta sa ha sra pra ti man+ti ta sha ri / dz+wa la dz+wa la ta pa ta pa/ b+hA saM b+hA sa/ b+h+ra ma g+ne si/ b+ha ga zhan ma

255b2(rgyud): be d+h+yaM ga/ tsa tur Ar+ya sa t+ya saM pra kA sha ka/ ta ba ta ba/ ta pa ta ma/ da ma da ma/ sa ma sa ma/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ ma hA ta mo/ an d+ha ka ra bi d+ha ma na/ ShaT pA ra mi tA pa ri pA ra ka/ ma la ma la/ khi
255b3(rgyud): li mi laM/ mu lu mu lu/ Ta Ta TaT/ Tha Tharba Tha/ Ti Ti/ Ta Tu Tu Tu/ thaM dzi dzi wi/ tru Tu dzuH/ a Ne ye tsadz+nyA k+Shi ta pe ri ka ra/ e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni ka I shwa ra/ ma he shwar/ mahA b+hU ta ga Na saM b+hany+dza ka/

255b6(rgyud): ma hA kA ru Ni ka sarba karba A wa ra Na bi shod+de ka/ sarba dz+nyA dz+nyA na ba ri pU ra ka/ sarba byAdI pa ri mai tsaka/ sarba satwa A shA pa ri pU ra ka/ sarba satwa sa mA shA ya na kar na mostu ta swA hA/ a mo g+ha ya swA hA/ 
255b7(rgyud): b+ha bA shA ya swAhA/ a dzi tA ya sAhA/ a bA ra dzi tA yai swAhA/ a mi tA b+hA ya sAhA/ a mi tA b+ha su tA ya swA hA/ mA ra bai n+ya pra mdza nA ya swAhA/ ab+h+ra A ya swAhA/ a b+ha la pra dA ya swA hA/ dza yA ya sAH/ 
255b8(rgyud): bi dza ya ya swA hA/ dza ya bi dza yA ya swAhA/ ba ra dA ya swA hA/ ba ra prad ya swA hA/ a kA la mr-i t+yu pra sha ma nA ya swA hA/ i rany+tsa me karma ku ru na mo sU te sAhA/ oM ra Na raHhUM phaT/ oM dza ya hUM phaT/ 
256a1(rgyud): / oM dz+ra dzi dz+ra swAhA/ oM hU~M dz+wa ya swA hA/ oM mr-i trai lo kya ba dza ya a mo gA pA sha a pra tiha ta hrIHhaHhUM phaT swA hA/ gzung sngags 'di'i cho ga ni a mo g+ha bA sha'i gzungs bum pa la bzlas pas
256a2(rgyud): bgegs kyis brlabs pa 'am/ 'dra gdon gyis zin pa 'am/ byad 'og tu chud pa 'am/ bud med byung dad cing bu med pa'o/ bu mi 'tsho ba la sogs pa la phan par bya ba'i phyir cho ga pa na/ 'bab chu'i 'a
256a3(rgyud): mam/ shing gcig pa'i drung ngam/ lam gyi gni mdo'am/ khang steng la sogs pa'i dbus nas dkyil 'khor gyis blang bar bya// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa/ bsgo bozhol/ nu phyogs mo// khya phyogs kyi
256a4(rgyud): sgo btod pa cig tshon rtsi dkar po sna gtsigs bris te/ dbu su yang pad+ma dkar po mdab ma brgyad pa cig bris la/ gser dngul laM zangs kyi bum pa ma zhum pa/ mi 'jigs pa'aM/ kham pa'i bum
256a5(rgyud): ba sar pa so btang ba'i nag po dang ra rimed pa gcig spos chu sa btang ste/ rin po che sna lnga/ 'bru sna lnga blugs la/ mgular sa dkar po sa pa kha char ma bcad pa dang / me tog brang
256a6(rgyud): bas bcings te/ khar shug pa'o/ thang shing mi mgo lcogs bcug la me tog dang 'bras bus rgyan pa gcig pad+ma'i steng du bzhag la/ gzungs klog pa nyid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dang
256a7(rgyud): phyugi skur bsgyur te// bum pa de yang rin chen rdzing bu bdud rtsi'i chus gang bar bsams la/ chu de'i nang nas pad+ma dkar po cig byung par bsas te/ pad+ma de la 'phar pa spyan ngas gon dbang phyugi snying po
256a8(rgyud): ge dkar po bsams te/ yig de las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug du gyur par bsams la mchod pa dang / bstod pa byas te/ gang bsgrubs pa'i dngos po grub par gyur cig ces / 
256b1(rgyud): 'a btab pas/ a mo g+ha pA sha'i gzungs mang pos bub pa de la lan bcu gsuM du tshig gzhan mi smra bar bzlas te/ bum pa de'i spyi bo nas blugs na 'gegs dang gdon la sogs pa las thar
256b2(rgyud): 'gyuraro// de la gos dang bcas par spyi bo nas blugs la/ blugs pa'i tshe yang gzungs klog pa dang / klog par bya ba gnyis kas kyang lus phyi la gnyis dag pa dang / 'dre gdon las thar bar sems rtse
256b3(rgyud): tu sems shing bklago// gos gshar ba da yang yugs dor ba'i thab su bor la/ gos dkar po sar pa gon te/ spos dang / me tog la sogs pas lus brgyan pa de nyid lan gcig bklags pas bsrus
256b4(rgyud): ta bkras kyang krogo/ dkyil 'khor de'i kho ra khor yug tu 'jig rten skyong bar brgyad kyang so so'i ming smos te spyan drangs la mchod nas/ las gang bsgrub pa de grub par 'gyur cig ce smon lam
256b5(rgyud): nas/ mchod pa rnam pa lnga pa gtsigs mchod la/ 'thung po phal rnams la yang gtor ma rgya cher sbyi no// bdag srung ba dang / mtshas bcad pa yang a mo g+ha pA sha'i gzungs de nyid kyis tshul
256b6(rgyud): bzhin du byas na/ de yang ches brgyad la bya ba'i rig so// cho ga 'di bgegs kyis brlams pa la sogs po gang du smos pa rnams la thar par 'gyur ba 'ba' shig tu ma zad kyi/ mi thamal pa la
256b7(rgyud): byas na ya~Md phyis 'gegs dang / byad snyoms kyis mi tshugs/ nad 'go bas mi thebs/ dbul che zhing bas mos cog 'grub par 'gyuraro// rin po che sna lnga la gser byi ru/ mu tig dung / shel/ sman rdza
256b8(rgyud): laHing sha b+ta g+h+ri/ gi ri kini/ sa ha/ sa ha de ga/ 'bru sna lnga gnas so ga/ 'braso ga/ til/ gro/ mon sran/ ma sha'o// rang DoM ba don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs// rgyags
257a1(rgyud): // AN+ya a mo g+ha pA ra mi ta Shan+dA ri pU ra ya na ma d+hA ra Ni / bong ska du/ 'phags pa yod nags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas
257a2(rgyud): dang / byang chub sed tha~Mng la phyag 'tsha'o// dus gsuM du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gash+ye pa thaMd la phyag 'tshal// byang chub seda' sedang chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa spyan ras
257a3(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// oM a mo g+ha bA sha ma hA da na pA ra mi ta pa ri pU ra ya hUM/ da ra da ra/ bi bi d+ha ra/ bi tsi traHsarba satwA u ba b+ho ga/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ ma hA dA nra/ pA dza me g+ha pra
257a4(rgyud): brta ya/ ta ra ta ra/ tA ra ya ma hA pad+ma ma Ni hUM phaT swAhA/ 'di ni ngan yid zhags pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po chen po ste/ gang gis yungs 'bru tsam gyi sbyin pa yang byin te ngan
257a5(rgyud): gyis lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na mchod sbyin chen po rnar 'phrul pa chen po shid+d+ha rgyas pa chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzoDa par 'gyur// dus gsumyi de bani/ 
257a6(rgyud): gshegs pa zed la phyag 'tsha'o// byang chub sed seda' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tsha'o// oM a mo g+ha shi la/ po b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ Sh+Ta
257a7(rgyud): ra/ ma hA shud d+has r+b+ba pad+ma'i b+hUShi/ b+h+rUM gad+hA ra d+hA \u0f7f/ sa maH a wa lo ki/ hU~M phaT swA mthungs 'di gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad bcung nas bsrung bar gnas pa byas tem smra ba
257a8(rgyud): nyiT ca gcog dun pas ba byas/ de na sa dan yod gags pa sna pa'i sa 'arjid phyi/ sa la na byas pacas kyis yod banu khrings de / pacin po dang ldan pa dzub tu/ 
257b1(rgyud): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po mang po lus la 'byung zhing / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du grags par 'gyuraro// gang zhig nyi ma re re zhing gzungs
257b2(rgyud): 'di dran par byed na de ni rtag tu tshul khrims yongasu dag par 'gyuraro// dge slong gang la la zhig tshul khrims zhig cing nyams par gyur pas bsnyung bar gnas pa byas te/ gzungs 'di bzlas brjed byas
257b3(rgyud): pa tsam gyis mdal tshul khrims yongasu dag par 'gyur zhing tshul khrims mang po dang ldan par 'gyuraro// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs thaMd la phyag 'tsha'o// byang chub senga' seda' chen po snying
257b4(rgyud): rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshale// oM e mo g+ha k+ShAn ti sarba bo d+hi satwa kA mi Na/ kA NakA Na ma hA ma tr-i ka ru Na/ sarba satwa bta sa la/ ma hA ka
257b5(rgyud): Ni ka/ sarba satwa kA mi Na hUM paT swA hA/ gzungs 'di dran pas seMn/ du gyur pa thaMd la bzod pa dang / bzod pa chen po dang / snying brtsi ba dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sem kyis mnyam pa
257b6(rgyud): gnas pa dang / byol seng gi skye gnasu gtogs pa'i ri dwags dang / bye dang / ldod 'go la sogs pa dang ngag 'das pa gang yin pa dang / gnas pa gang yin pa dang / skye bar 'gyur ba gang ba dag
257b7(rgyud): rnams la snying brtsa ba'i phyir gang la la zhig gzungs 'di dran pas bzod pa'i mchog sgom par byed na de san dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro tha~Md las yongasu thar par 'gyur zhing /

263b7(rgyud): don du nyin ra bzhin du tshig gzhan mi smra bar snying po 'di lan bdun bdun dan pas bzlas par bya'o// lag na rdo rje gang la la dag 'di ltar sdig pa mi dag pa bcu rab tu spyod pa/ mtshams
263b8(rgyud): mad po byed pa/ dam pa'i chos la bskur pa 'debs pa/ 'phags pa'i gang zag la rab tu bsnyas pas de dag san dmyal bar gzhol bas tshe'i dus byas par 'gyur ba dang / dge slong gang
264a1(rgyud): / la dag rang gi bslab pa'i sdom pa 'dral ba/ tshul khrims kyi sdom pa ral cing zhig pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon lam gus shing 'khu ba dang / dam pa'i chos la rma 'dzi
264a2(rgyud): bas tshe'i dus byas par gyur nas sen dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur pa de dag gi don du bye ma gtsang ma la lan gangs bdun bdun bzlas nas/ dur khrod du bor ba'i ro dang / ro bsregs pa'i rus
264a3(rgyud): pa 'am/ du ri 'chad bcug pa'i ro'am/ rus pa la bye ma des gtor bar bya'o// gang dang gang na sen rnams kyi rus pa gang dag yod bde dang de dag tu bye maM das gtor ma thag tu/ de dang der byes
264a4(rgyud): phog pa'i san de dag rnams sen dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro dang / sha za'i skye gnas dang / gnod sbyin gyi skye gnasu skyes par gyur na yang de dag da'i bod la tshe rjes zad mtho
264a5(rgyud): kyi 'jig rten lha dang ma'i gan su rab tu gzhol bar 'gyurazhing / phyin chad nam yang sen thad dmyal ba dang / yi dag sa dang / dud 'pho'i 'go ba rnams skye bar mi 'gyuraro// 6

264b1(rgyud): rnams kyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa zang rnam par dag par 'gyur zhing de dag thams cad kyang mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gzhol bar 'gyuro// bungad dung la sogs pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas
264b2(rgyud): gnas mthon po'i rtse mo nas dung de bus na/ sems can gang dag gis dung de'i sgra thos pa'i skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ lha 'am/ yi dwags ma/ dud 'gro'i skyes gnasu
264b3(rgyud): gtogs pa de dag zad bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gzhol bar 'gyur zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang phrad nas chos thos te rims kyis mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'gyur

264b6(rgyud): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// tshe de rjes thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'acu'o// tshe rabs thad du skye 'dun par 'gyu ro// tsan dkar po la lan
264b7(rgyud): bdun bzlas brjod byas nas dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba dang / dkor sa 'am/ skya bo dbus sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang du bdug par byas na/ gang dag da'i dri la bsdams pa'i sen de dag pad kya
264b8(rgyud): las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par byang bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi sku yongasu rdzogs pa rab tu 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyuraro// chos gos la rab tu bdugs nas lus la gyonan
265a1(rgyud): // gang zag de'i sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad ma lus par rnam par dag par 'gyuro// lus la bab pa tsam gyis bag chags kyi drim dang / ser sna dang nyon mongs pa'i skyon thams cad

265b1(rgyud): 'od dpag tu med pas spyi bor rgyan pa/ zla ba tshes pa mgo la thogs pa/ gdong gsum gyi dang po khro ba/ g.yas cung zad 'dzum pa/ g.yon gad mo dgod pa/ lag pa bzhi pa/ g.yas dang po na

266b7(rgyud): sdig pa dang / bka mI shis pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa thad bzlog par bgyi ba dang / dus ma lags par 'gum pa thad bzlog par bgyi ba dang / ma zhugs pa rnams dad par bgyi ba dang / bgegs dang log

267a1(rgyud): dang / chad pa spangs pa dang / mtshon cha spangs pa dang / dug gzhil ba bgyis pa dang / gang la la zhig 'gal bar bgyid pa de ma mchis te/ da ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcu

269a7(rgyud): rig sngags kyi snying po gdong bcu gcig pa zhes bgyi ba mthu chen po dang ldan pa sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu gcig gis gsungs pa mchis pa te/ deng bdag gis sems can thaMd la sman cing bde bar
269a8(rgyud): 'gyi ba dang / bro nad thams cad zhi bar bgyi ba dang / sdig pa thams cad sbyang ba dang / bkra mi shes pa zod bzlog par 'gyi ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad dgag pa dang / dus ma lags par 'grub
269b1(rgyud): pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / ngan sems can rnams gdul zhing dad pa thob par bgyi ba dang / mya ngan gyi sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dag bde ba thob par bgyi ba dang / khon dang bcas pa rnams 'dab par
269b2(rgyud): bgyi ba dang / bdud dang gdon bgegs rnams zhi bar bgyi ba dang / sems kyi smon pa rnams mngon par smra bar bgyi ba'i slad bshad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni 'jig rten lce dang ba
269b3(rgyud): pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa la sogs pa gang gis kyang rig sngags 'dis srung bar 'gyis pa dang / 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / 
269b4(rgyud): yi ger bris nas spel bar bgyid pa de dag la bgegs bgyid pa dang / bdud kyi bar chad dang / mtshon cha dang / dbyug pa dang / dug dang byang stems thams cad kyis gnod par 'gyur ba ma mchis
269b5(rgyud): lagaso bdag gis rig sngags 'di gnas pa'i phyogasu ring yang rung nye yang rung ste/ ji tsam du mtshams 'gram pa las 'das na sa gnod pa bgyid du mchi ba ma mthong lags te/ sdig pa
269b6(rgyud): las nges par rnam par smin par gyur pa ni ma gtogs lags so// bcom ldan 'das des dngos po 'di nges par de ltabu lags par bgyis nas mngon par yid ches pas blang bar bgyi'o// rnam par rtog
269b7(rgyud): pa ni mi bgyi'o// de ltar bgyis na gdon bgegs thams cad thag ring du spong bas nye bar mchi zhing glags rnyed par mi 'gyur lag so// rig sngags kyi snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mtshun
269b8(rgyud): bar bsngags pa brjod cing / mtshungs par rjesu thugs rangs par mdzad pa lag so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongasu bzung ba mdzad pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mngon
270a1(rgyud): / dran lag ste/ bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sngon rol na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma brgya'i spyan thogs pa mi mnga'
270a2(rgyud): gnag tor yon tan rab tu rgyas pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bgyi ba 'jig rten tu byung ste/ bdag de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pas bcom ldan 'das de las rig sngags 'dis mnos lags te/ rig
270a3(rgyud): sngags 'di thob pa'i cha phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong bar gyur/ mi slu ba'i chos kyi bzod pa yang thob par gyur pas rig sngags 'di mthu chen po dang ldan par rig par bgyi lag
270a4(rgyud): da lta bas na yongasu dang ba dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi 'am rigs kyi bu mo la sogs bdag gis rig sngags 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don par 'tshal na gus pas sems
270a5(rgyud): rtse gcig tu dran pas bcangs te rtag par nang par langs nas chos bzhin du yongasu dag par 'gyis te/ rig snga/ 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na cha 'di nyid la phan
270a6(rgyud): yon rnam pa bcu thob par 'gyur lagaso// cu gang zhe na/ rtag tu lus la bro nad ma mchis par 'gyur pa dang / rtag par phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongasu gzung bar 'gyur ba dang
270a7(rgyud): nor dang / rin po che dang / gos dang / zas bas pa ma mchis pa dag la long spyod par 'gyur ba dang / dgra thed thul zhing / 'jigs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ya rabs btsun pa rnams kyis bsku
270a8(rgyud): zhing gsong bor smra bar 'gyur ba dang / dug dang 'di gdon gyis mi tshugs shing gnod pa gyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / mtshon cha dang / dbyig pa thaMd kyis gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / 
270b1(rgyud): kyis 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / thugs kyis 'grus pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / dus ma lags par 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dag lag so// gan/ 
270b2(rgyud): yang yon gyi sman yon rnam pa bzhi thob par 'gyur te/ 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe/ sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / rnams kyang ngan 'gro rnamasu ltung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / yang ba ma spangs
270b3(rgyud): bas 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ba dag lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mngon par dran lags te/ 'di nas bskal
270b4(rgyud): pa gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma rnyed dag gi snga rol dag gi yang ches snga rol na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas man da ra ba'i bsung zhes bkyi
270b5(rgyud): ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe bdag khyim bdag chen po zhig tu gyur pas sangs rgyasad la rig sngags 'di ma nes lags te/ rig sngags 'di thob ma thag tu bskal pa bzhi
270b6(rgyud): khri'i 'khor ba bsil lag so// rig sngags 'di klog pa dang / 'dzin pa dag gis gzhan yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs rje chen po'i ye shes kyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md kyi
270b7(rgyud): rnam par thar pa'i chos kyi sgo thob par 'gyur te/ de'i mthu stobs kyi dbang gis gang dag brtson ra dam por chud pa dang / btson char stsal ba dang / 'gum pa la thug pa dang / tsha ba dang / zhugs dang klu dang
270b8(rgyud): chom rkun dang / dug dang / khyad snyams dang / mi dang mi ma lags pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bgegs thams cad las yongs skyob par bgyid pa lag so// bdag ni 'dre
271a1(rgyud): / yi dbang gis sems can thams cad kyi gnas dang / skyabs dang / yongasu skyob pa dang / yongasu srung ba dang / dbugs 'byin pa dang / gling dang // kha khyim du gyur pa lag so// rig sngags 'di'i
271a2(rgyud): mthus gnod sbyin dang / srin po ma rungs pa thams cad yongasu bsdu zhing bzung nas sngar byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems bskyed bstsal nas/ de'i rjes la bla na mchis pa yang dag par rdzog
271a3(rgyud): ba'i byang rgab la 'god par bgyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi rig sngags 'di'i gzi bin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pas gang la la zhig gis lan cig tsam bzlas brjod bgyis na yang
271a4(rgyud): ba'i ltung ba bzhi dang / mtshams ma mchis pa lnga yongasu 'byung bar 'gyur na/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du smrab pa lta smos kyang tsa'i tshal lags/ gang dag sangs rgyas bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong dum
271a5(rgyud): las dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun pa rnams kyis deng gdod rig snga gas 'di thos par 'gyur ba lags na len pa dang / 'dzin pa da / ji skad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshalags
271a6(rgyud): gang la la zhigs gdugs mtshan du rig sngags 'di klog pa dang / 'den pa dang / 'dzin par bgyid na bdag gis de dag gi smod pa ci mchis pa yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyid lag so// gang la
271a7(rgyud): zhigs zla ba phyed cing tshes bcu bzhi 'am bco lnga la smang ba bgyis te/ sdom pa yang dag par blangs nas chos bzhin du yongasu dag par bgyis te/ sems rtsa gcig tu bdag rje su ngan par bgyis
271a8(rgyud): nas rig sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na/ bskal ba bzhi khri'i 'khor ba bsnyil bar 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rig sngags 'di'i dbang gis ming btsun zhing thos par da/ 
271b1(rgyud): bar gyur lags te/ gang la la zhig gis sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i tshan nas brjod cing yid la bsams pa dang / gzhan 'ga' zhig gi skad cig tsam du bsam pa zab pa nas/ 
271b2(rgyud): bdag gi ming nas brjod cing rjesu dran par gyur na de gnyis kyi ston mnyam shing mtshungs lag so// bad gis ming nas brjod pa de dag thams cad kyang phyir ma ldog pa'i sa thob par 'gyuraro// bren
271b3(rgyud): bde dang bral bar 'gyur/ sgrib pa thams cad dang / 'dzags pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nongs pa zhu byang bar 'gyur lan bdag gis bstan pa'i rig sngags 'di
271b4(rgyud): len pa nge ba 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / ji skad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags te/ grang zemo de dag bla na ma mchis pa'i byang chub lag mthil nam
271b5(rgyud): pa bzhin du khong du chud cing legs par 'gyur bar rig pa ra bgyid lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sem sa dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la leg so la gso
271b6(rgyud): shes sngags pa brjed nas/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis son thams cad la de lta bu'i bems pa dang / snying rje'i bsam pa bskyed pa nas rig sngags chen po 'di rnam par phye ste bstan pa yin pas
271b7(rgyud): khyong thabs 'di'i dbang gi sems can thams cad kyi nad kyi sdug bsngal dang / sgrib pa dang / bgegs dang / 'jig pa dang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes pa las yongasu skyob pa thar par byas nas
271b8(rgyud): sems can thang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar la rnam par 'jog pa yin te// rigs kyi bu nga yang rdza su yi rang nas khyod kyi rig sngags yongasu bzung gis khyed kyi spros
272a1(rgyud): // shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mos g.yas pa'i lha ngas
272a2(rgyud): la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// rig sngags 'di 'don pa gang lags pa ngas 'di skad du/ dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tsha'o// 'phags pa de bzhin ga rtse
272a3(rgyud): pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thaMd la gus par phyag

272a5(rgyud): oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ in+te ban+te/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa l-i pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su ba re/ e li mi li/ tsi ti dzA la ma pa na ya shud+d+ha tA swA hA/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka ya swA hA/ 
272a6(rgyud): 'di ni rtsa ba'i rag sngags lags te/ gang la la zhig gis rje su dran ning bzlas brjod bgyis na gong du bstan pa lta bu ljon khyad par du 'phags pa dge 'thob par 'gyur lag so// dkon mcho
272a7(rgyud): gsum la gus par phyag 'tshalo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom
272a8(rgyud): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zad la gus par phyag 'tsha'o// byang chub sem dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan
272b1(rgyud): ba la phyag 'tshalo// d+ya thA/ ha ha ha ha/ i li mi li/ tsi li pi li/ khi li hi le swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das 'dis chab dang gos la gdab pa'i sngags lags te/ gang la la zhig dkyil la
272b2(rgyud): du 'jug par 'tshal na sngar khrus bgyis te/ de'i rjes la sngags 'dis chab la lan bdun btab ta lus la gtor nas bsang bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang sngags 'dis lan bdun btab ste
272b3(rgyud): bzod bgo bar bgyi lagaso// dkon mchog gsum la gus par bag 'tsha'o// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag

272b6(rgyud): sngags lags te/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas pog bsregs mchod pa bgyid pa'i tshe sngags 'dres pog spos la lan bdun btab te gdod sreg par bgyi'o// mar me spar bar 'chal
272b7(rgyud): na yang sngar sngags 'dis 'bru mar le lan bdun ste gdod mar me spang bar bgyi lag so// dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshalo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes
272b8(rgyud): rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po li gus par bag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bad la gus par phyag 'tshal

273a3(rgyud): sngags 'dis me tog la lan bdun btab ste sku gzugs la gtor bar 'gyi'o// gzhan yang sngags 'dis byug spos la lan bdun btab ste/ sku gzugs la byug par bgyi'o// gzhan yang sngags
273a4(rgyud): 'dres phreng ba la lan bdun btab ste sku gzugs la rgyan par 'gyi lag so// dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tsha'o// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang

273a7(rgyud): la mchod cing dbul ba'i zhal zas la gdab pa'i sngags lags te/ gang la la zhal zas dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la sogs pas sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i tshe sngar sngags 'dis lan nyi shu
273a8(rgyud): rtsa gcig bzlas te btab nas do'i rjes la gdod mchod pa 'gyi lag so// dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tsha'o// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang
273b1(rgyud): mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sada' chen po

273b3(rgyud): shing la gdang ba'i sngags lags te/ gal te la la zhig gong du bstan pa'i rig sngags kyis bgyi ba mchis te/ sdang sngags 'dis me tog sha ta'i shing la lan gcig gdab par bgyi'o// zhugs
273b4(rgyud): 'bud par 'chal na legs shig tu me tag sha ta'i shing blangs nas dum bu sumra nur btubs te/ zho dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi'i nang du spangs nas zhag lon par bgyis te/ gdug re bum bu ri ra
273b5(rgyud): blangs nas sngags lan btab sa zhugs kyi nang du dor bar bgyi'o// de dag thams cad bas par bsregs lags nas de'i rjes la gdod bgyi ba ci mchis pa bgyi lag so// dkon mchag
273b6(rgyud): gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco ba pa
273b7(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par bag 'tsha'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang
273b8(rgyud): ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tsha'o// tad+ya thA/ i li mi li/ bi li to le/ tsi li hi liM swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni mtshal dgus pa'i sngags lags te/ mtshams dgum par 'tshal na sngas
274a1(rgyud): // 'dis chab la lan bdun btab ste/ phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o// yang na yungs kar ram/ thal ba gtsang ma la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste/ phyogs bzhir gtor na sems kyi
274a2(rgyud): nye bar ji tsam bkum pa mtsham su gyur nas yongasu srung bar 'gyur lag so// dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tsha'o// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par

274a4(rgyud): chen po 'phags pa spyan ras go zigs dbang phyug thugs rnga chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tsha'o// d+ya thA/ 'i rje'i 9/ tiTi tiH/ tsaT tsa Te/ bon+d+ha bin+d+he/ ka tsa ka tsa/ b+ha ga 'an/ ar+tha
274a5(rgyud): ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ sa b+ha sa b+ha sa b+ha naM swA hA/ bcom lda na 'das 'di ni bdag slar rang gi gan su mchi bar bskul ba 'i sngags lags na bgyi bci mchis pa bgyis lags na/ 
274a6(rgyud): bdag slar rang gi gan su mchi bar bskal pa'i sngags 'dis cha ba la lan bdun sngags kyi btab ste/ phyog bzhir gtor na bdag slang mchi bar 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'di
274a7(rgyud): ni dngos grub mngon du ma ma gyur lags kyis kyang lasu bgyi ba rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis pas sems rtsa gcig tu bzlas brjod bgyis na smon pa rnams kyang mi 'grub pa gang yang mi mchis
274a8(rgyud): lag so// gang zhig spyos nad gdugs re lan re ldang ba 'am/ gdugs gnyis shing lan re ldang ba 'am/ gdugs gnyis shing lan re ldang ba 'am/ gdug sum zhing lan re ldang ba 'am/ gdugs
274b1(rgyud): gzhi zhing lan re ldang ba re/ gdon 'byung pos bgyis pa 'am/ mkha' gro mas bgyis pa 'am/ sha zas bgyis pa 'am/ lu srul pos bgyis pa 'o/ spro byad kyis 'gyis pa 'am/ brjed byed kyis bgyis
274b2(rgyud): ba 'am/ 'dre gdon ma rungs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'gyis pa yang rung ste/ nad pa de dag la sngags 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad btab na 'tshe bar 'gyur lag so// gal te sgrib pa lci ba zhig lags
274b3(rgyud): na tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la sngags lan re bzlas zhing re re mdud de brgya rtsa brgyad chad par 'gyis nas nad pa'i mgul ba 'am dpung pa la btags na kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa du byang zhing bron
274b4(rgyud): kyang sos par 'gyur lag so// gal te skrangs pa dang / 'bras kyi phreng ba dang / shu ba dang / phrol mig dang / rma 'dzag pa dang / g.yan pa la sogs pa'i nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bro 'tshal bar gyur
274b5(rgyud): tam/ ral gi dang / mda' dang / mdung la sogs pa phog ste spros par gyur tam/ sbrul dang / sdig pa dang / rtsangs pa dang / bung ba dang / gdug pa la sogs pas zin par gyur na sngags
274b6(rgyud): 'di lan bdun bzlas te btab na sos par 'gyur lag so// gal te slob pa lci ba zhig lags na ngog sa ser po'i 'jims pa la lan 'dun sngags kyis btab te bro 'tshal ba'i dmigs
274b7(rgyud): thugs na sel bar 'gyur lag so// gal te rlung nad na pa 'am/ phyogs gcig pa langs par gyur tam/ rna ba 'on pa 'am/ sna ma tshub pa 'am/ rlung gis zin pa'i nad la sogs pas bro
274b8(rgyud): 'tshal bar gyur na sem rtsa gcig tu sdug 'odis bzlas brjod bgyis nas nad pa de dag la lan brgya rtsa brgyadang sngags kyis btab na nad sos par 'a gyur lag so// gal te sprib pa lci ba zhig
275a1(rgyud): / lags na 'bru mar dang / ru rta rnams bskol te sngags lan bdun btab nas lus la bskus sam/ rna ba dang / snar blugs sam/ 'tshal tu stsal na bro nad sos par 'gyur lags// 
275a2(rgyud): gzhan yang bro nad gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bro 'tshal bar 'gyur na sems rtsa gcig tu sngags 'di gdab par bgyi'o// yang na bdag nyid kyis bzlas brjod bgyis na 'tsho bar 'gyur lags
275a3(rgyud): gal te rig sngags 'ad sgrub par 'tshal na sngar sra zhing 'phan sgron ma mchis pa'i tsan dan dkar po las byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzugs srid du mtho byad dang do
275a4(rgyud): mchis pa sug pa lag pa g.yon pa na pad+ma leb rgan dang ril ba thogs pa/ lag pa g.yas pa brkang nas bgang phreng thogs shing 'jigs pa ma mchis pa stsol ba'i lag tu ston pa gdong
275a5(rgyud): bcu gcig par bgyis te/ mdun gyi gdong gsum ni byams pa dang / snying rje dang bcas pa'i mtshan dang ldan paragyi'o// g.yon phyogs kyi gdong gsum ni khro bo'i mtshan tsha
275a6(rgyud): du bgyi'o// g.yas phyogs kyi gdong gsum ni mche ba dkar po gyen du 'byung ba'i mtshan can du bgyi'o// rgyab kyi gdong gcig ni khro gtum che zhing rab tu dkon pa'i mtshan can du bgyi'o// spyi ba'i
275a7(rgyud): gdong gcig ni sangs rgyas kyi zhal gyi gzugs can du bgyi'o// mgo rgyan de dag thams cad kyi nang na sangs rgyas kyi sku bzhugs par bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
275a8(rgyud): dbang phyug re'i lus ni do shal la sogs pargyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan par 'gyi'o// gzugs bgyis lags nas smon pa rnams grub par 'tshal ba gang lags pa des gos sar pa ga
275b1(rgyud): ma bgos te/ bsnyung ba bgyis nas sdom pa yang dag par blangs te/ zla ba dkar po yong ches gcig nas tshes brgyad kyi bar du gdugs gcig la dus gsum du sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad dang
275b2(rgyud): yang na dpag tu mtshos par bzlas brjed bgyi'o// de slan chad gnas dben pa gcig tu sun gtsang ma bting ste/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzugs bgyis pa kha nub phyag
275b3(rgyud): su bstan de bzhag la/ nyams kyis ci 'byor pa'i gza' ba dang btung ba dag gis mchod nas a ga ru dang / du ru ka 'ba' shig sreg par 'gro'o// rnal 'dor pa de 'bru che dang ro ma'i zas 'tshal nas
275b4(rgyud): ma bzhin du bzlas brjod bgyis te/ gdugs gsum pa la bgyi'o// de slan chad mchod pa'i yo byad bshams pa yang snga ma bas ches khyad par du 'phags par bgyi'o// rnal 'byor pa dade zas
275b5(rgyud): dgang gsum po 'di lta ste/ 'o ma dang / zhe dang / 'brasaHna 'ba' zhig 'tshal bar 'gyi'o// byang chub kyi shing blangs nas gzugs de'i mdun du zhug spang bar bya'o// gzhan yang shing de
275b6(rgyud): blangs nas dum bu stong rtsa brgyad du gdugs te du ru ka'i mar gyi nang du blangs nas gdugs gcig la dum bu gcig blangs te/ sngags lan ra bzlas nas zhugs kyi nang du dor bar bgyi zhing 'a
275b7(rgyud): par gyur na de'i tshes chen po rnams rab tu g.yo bar gyur la/ de'i dbang gis sku gzugs bgyis pa de yang rab tu g.yo zhing nang gi gong na mchis pa'i gdong gi kha nas spa byung nas rnal 'byor pa
275b8(rgyud): de la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu legaso legs// khyod kyis 'di ltar nad tan brtson 'grus kyis smon pa rnams yongasu gnyer bas bdag gis khyod kyi smon pa yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// khyod ni
276a1(rgyud): / nas na mkha' la 'phur te 'gro 'am/ yang na khyod rgyu zhing 'gro ba la thogs pa med pa 'am/ yang na drang srong rig 'dzin gyi rgyal po byed par gyur pa 'am/ yang na bdag ji lta ba bzhin du
276a2(rgyud): rang dbang thogs pa med pa nyid bya'o// zhes bsdigs pa brjod par 'gyur lagaso// gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas zla ba dkar po yar gyi ngo tshes bco lnga la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs da
276a3(rgyud): phyug gi gzugs gdong bcu gcig pa de sangs rgyas kyi ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag ste/ gos sar pa gtsang ma bgos la gso sbyong dang sdom pa yang dag par blangs te
276a4(rgyud): gdugs mtshan gcig la rab tu bsrung bar bgyis na sum na'i me tog stong rtsa brgyad blangs te/ me tog re re blangs nas snga gsalan re btab ste/ thams cad bas pa'i bar du bgyis na
276a5(rgyud): de'i tshe gzugs bgyis pa de'i mdun du gdong gcig kha nas 'brug sgra lta bu'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de'i dbang gi/ sa sa chen po yang rab tu g.yo bar gyur pas rnal 'byor pas
276a6(rgyud): de'i tshe rang gi sems bde bar bzhag nas skrag cing 'jigs pa mi bskyed par rig sngags dang / smon cing sgrub pa gang lags pa 'ba' shig rje su dran par bgyis te/ 'di skad du/ byang chub ses
276a7(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshalo// bdag nam zhig na sems can thams cad kyi mgon dang skyibasu
276a8(rgyud): gyur nas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi smon pa rnams yongasu skong bar 'gyur zhes brjod par gyur na/ de'i tshe spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis ji ltar smon pa rnams stsol bar
276b1(rgyud): 'gyur te// smon pa rnams rtsol ba'i tshe lha dang kA la sogs pa gang gis kyang 'di chad dang bgegs pagyid par mi 'gyur lag so// gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas zla ba la gzara' zhugs pa'i tshem
276b2(rgyud): mar srang gcig blangs te dngul gyi snod kyi nang du stsal nas gzugs bgyis pa'i mdun du bzhag ste/ sngags 'dis bzlas brjod 'gyis na zla ba yang snga ma kho bzhed du skyabs 'og tu gyur pas/ 
276b3(rgyud): de nas blangs te 'tshal na lus kyi bro nad rnams mi 'brang ba gang yang ma mchis lags// gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas ldeng ros dang / gi'u wang cha mnyam par bgyis te/ gzugs bgyis bder
276b4(rgyud): mdun du bzhag nas sngags 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas ta chab kyis smras nas dpral ba la thig le bgyis na don rnam pa gsum 'grub par 'gyur lag so// sngar bstan pa bzhin du cha ngon
276b5(rgyud): po dang sbyar te khrus bgyis na bgegs thaMd dang / bro nad ma rungs pa thams cad gsal zhing 'brang bar 'gyur lag so// gzhan yang gal te pha rol gyi dpag tshogs kyis ga yul
276b6(rgyud): 'breg par 'gyur na un ci mar rtsi'i 'bras bu cig blangs te sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis btab nas gzugs 'gyis pa de'i g.yon phyogs kyi khro bo'i gdong la byugs te/ dgra' phyogasu
276b7(rgyud): kha bstan na dgra'i dmag tshogs rnams drung du 'chi bar mi 'gyur lag so// gzhan yang gal te yul phyogasu me dang phyugs la rims nad byung bar gyur na gzugs bgyis pa de'i mdun du
276b8(rgyud): shing shug pa'i zhugs bus la/ gzhan yang shing de blangs nas dum bu stong rtsa brgyad du btubs te/ dum bu gcig blangs nas yungs 'bru'i mar gyis bskus te/ sngags lan re bzlas nas
277a1(rgyud): // zhugs kyi nang du dor bar bgyi zhing thams cad bas pa'i bar du bgyi'o// gzhan yang skad pa dmar po la mdud pa bdun mdud/ mdud pa lan re mdud cing sngags lan re bzlas
277a2(rgyud): nas nang gi gong na mchis pa'i gdong gi spyi bo la btags na rims nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ rims nad zhi nas sngags thag kyang 'grol bar 'gyur lag so// gzhan yang blo bu
277a3(rgyud): du mkha' gre ma dang 'byung po la sogs pa'i gdon gyis zin te bros 'tshal bar gyur na skud pa dkar po la sngags mdud nyi shu rtsa gcig mdu/ sngags la nar bzlas shing mdud pa ra re mdung
277a4(rgyud): nas mdun gyi byams pa dang snying rje dang ldan pa'i gdong gi spyi bo la brtags nas zhag lon te slar bkol la nad pa'i mgu le du btags ni bre nad sos par 'gyur lag so// gal te las
277a5(rgyud): kye sgrib pa lci ba zhig lags te sos par ma gyur na sdug sa zag de blangs nas yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/ snga ma'i gzugs kyi spyi bo la btags nas zhag
277a6(rgyud): lon te slar bkrol la nad pa'i mgul du btags na nges par 'tshe bar 'gyur pa lagaso// gzhan yang gang la la zhig blo nad rgyun rangs kyis btab nas sdug bsngal zhing sos par ba gyur
277a7(rgyud): tsam/ 'dre gdon ma rungs pa khyim du zhugs par gyur na hun lug thang 'brum bu brgya rtsa brgyad blangs te gzugs bgyis be de'i mdun du 'bru bu re ra blangs la sngags lan re btab nas zhugs
277a8(rgyud): kyi nang du dor bar bgyi zhing thade bas pa'i bang du bgyi'o// gzhan yang skud pa dkar po la sngags mdud nyi shu rtsa gcig mdud de sngags lan ro bzla zhing mdud pa re re mdud nas mdun gyi byams
277b1(rgyud): pa dang snying rje dang ldan pa'i gdong gi spyi bo la btags nas zhag lon te slar bkrol nas nang pa'i mgul du btags na bro nad rnams 'byung zhing gdon bgegs ma rungs pa 'byer zhing dgyes
277b2(rgyud): par 'gyur lagaso// gzhan yang mi mdza' bdag gis glags tsal bar gyur te/ 'thab cing rtsod pa dang / byang stams kyis gnod pa bgyis par gyur na me tog dang pog spos la sogs bsna
277b3(rgyud): tshogs kyi gzugs bgyis pa de la mchod cing bi na ya ka'i gzugs kyi mdud du zhugs spar nas 'an ti 'bras bu 'brul bu brgya rtsa brgyad blangs te sngags lan re btab nas zhugs kyi na
277b4(rgyud): du dor bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang skud pa dkar bro la ma dang ba brgya rtsa brgyad mdud ta/ sngags lan re bzla zhing re re mdad nas gzugs de'i g.yon phyogs kyi khro ba'i gdong gi spyi bo la
277b5(rgyud): btags nas zhag bzhi lon te slar bkol la bskrad pa de blangs te/ mi mdza' ba de'i ming nas brjod mdud pa re re na so so tha dad par sbas nas re re la yang sngags lan re tsA
277b6(rgyud): zhing ra ra nas btubs te/ thad bas pa'i bar du bgyes na mi mdza' de dag ci 'gyi'o 'tshal mi 'byor cing rang nyid skyabasu mchi bar 'gyur lagaso// gzhan yang gang la la zhig legs pa'i
277b7(rgyud): dngos po 'grub par 'tshal na tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la sngags mdud brgya rtsa brgyad mdung/ sngagaso lan re bzla zhing mdud pa re re mdud nas yang gzugs bgyis pa'i mdun du lan bdun
277b8(rgyud): gyi btab ste/ byams dang snying rje dang ldan pa'i gdong gi spyi bo la btags nas zhag lon te slar bkrol nas bdag nyid kyi lus la btags na smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur
278a1(rgyud): // lag so// gzhan yang gang la la zhig sgrib pa'i bgegs dang ldan pas legs pa'i dngos po rnams phal cher smon pa yid bzhin du 'grub par ma gyur tam/ bkra mi shis pa'i
278a2(rgyud): dngos po dag dus dusu rgya ma mchis par 'gyur na spos chab kyis gzugs bgyis pa de bkru bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang chab la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste bi na ye ka'i gzugs
278a3(rgyud): bkru bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang chab la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/ nga nyid kyi lus la gtor na sgrir pa dang bgegs thams cad zhu byang nas smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub bar
278a4(rgyud): 'gyur lag so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugs de skad ces smras pa/ 'khor mang po thams cad kyis 'thun par skyes bu chen po le gso
278a5(rgyud): leg so// sen thams cad la phan par 'dod pa'i phyir rig sngags 'di smras pas bdag cag kyang rje su yi rang zhing mo ngasu 'dzin par smon to zhes bsngags pa brjod par gyur
278a6(rgyud): to// de nas 'khor mang po thams cad dga' mgu rangs par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyag byas te gyes par gyur to// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
278a7(rgyud): dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogaso// // zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba bcom ldan 'das kyi rings lugs pa ban d+he chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bskyor cing zhus te gtan
278a8(rgyud): la phab pa// byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa steng dang / mig stong pa dang ldan pa'i cho ga zhib mo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
278b1(rgyud): thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa/ ri gru 'dzin na byang chub sems dpa' phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gnas na/ rin
278b2(rgyud): po tsha bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams na bzhugs shing / bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i seng+ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs te/ khri de ni rin po che'i mchog snga tshegos du mas spras pa/ rin po che sna 'dun gyi
278b3(rgyud): rgyal mtshan rnams kyis yongasu brtsegs pa ldang ba dang sbyangs pa ste/ de'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das seng ge ri khrid nyid la bzhugs nas 'di snyam dgongs te/ ngang byang chub sems dpang rga
278b4(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i gzungs bshad gor ma chag snyam du dgongaso// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po du ma dang / thabs gcig tu 'jugs pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dang
278b5(rgyud): drug rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ po rin po che'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi snga dang / ba#

278b7(rgyud): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rin po che'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sem dpa' rdo rje'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub
278b8(rgyud): sems dpe' bams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dbang chen po rnams kyang / de bzhin gshegs
279a1(rgyud): // thams cad kyis spyi bo nas dbang bskur ga chos kyi rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi sras sha stag dang thabs gcig/ 'od srang chen po la sogs gang dag gis nyan thos dag gi sa

279a3(rgyud): po chen po bzhi 'phags skyes po la sogs pa du ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi me yin

279b7(rgyud): gis 'khor 'dir the tsom skyes gyur der// rgyu dang su yi mthu lags ma 'tshal na// ci smad rdzu 'bral mngon shes bstan bgyis pa/ rgyal ba byams pa'i thugs can bka' stsa la gsol
279b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/ kye rigs kyi bu khyod la sogs 'di ltar shes par gyis shig/ da ltar 'khor gyi dkyil
280a1(rgyud): // 'khor 'di na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ming 'phags pa spyad ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya ba zhig yod// 'di ni bskal pa du ma nas 'gro ba'i don mthar bya
280a2(rgyud): pa byams pa dang / snying rje dang thabs la mkhas pa/ bsgoms pas sgrub pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la nus pa dang ldan pa ste/ sems can gyi khams thad la zhi ba dang / bde bar 'dod pas rdzu
280a3(rgyud): 'phrul gyi stobs chen po 'di phyu 'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las la
280a4(rgyud): dgos legs par bgos nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bral mo sbyar te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa 'acom ldan 'das bdag la snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyis gas
280a5(rgyud): sngags snying ltar bzung ba mchis te/ sems can gyi kham thad kyis phan pa dang / bde ba thob par bgyi ba dang / sdig pa'i las thang dang / las lci ba rnams 'byung bar bgyi ba dang / 9/ 
280a6(rgyud): dang ma khom pa rnams yongasu spang bar bgyi ba dang / dge ba'i phyogs bsod nams thams cad 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / 
280a7(rgyud): 'jigs pa dang / gnod bzang yongasu spang ba dang / mchog thams cad myur du yongasu rdzogs par bgyi ba'i sladadu/ bdag dade brjod par 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba'i spyad

280b1(rgyud): gsang sngags gang brjod par 'dod pa 'di/ da ltar legs par khyod kyis dus la bab kyis myur du smros shig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

280b3(rgyud): 'das bdag gis dran pa bskal pa du ma 'das par gyur pa na/ 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od zer stong gi rgyal po dag par gnas pa zhes bgyi ba byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom

280b6(rgyud): kyi sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba chen po bya ba'i phyir/ snying lta bu'i gsang sngags 'di zung shig/ ces bka' stsal to// bdag ni de'i tshe thog ma nyid du sa dang po la gnas pa
