305a5(rgyud): par 'gyur snyam du sem so// yang 'byung po gnyug mar gan sa pa thams cad bdag gis bgo ba bzhin du gnas par gyur zag snyam du sems zhes brjod par bgyi'o// gal to yang
305a6(rgyud): la bsams pa 'di thob cing dngos grub de thob na gzhan la mi brjod par bdag nyid kyis 'tshal bar bgyi'o// gal te cho ga 'di grub na bzlas par bgyi/ gcig tu bzung bar bgyi'o// 'din
305a7(rgyud): bslab pa gcig tu gas // su zhig sna tshogs 'tshal ba des a ga ru nag po'i chab kyis dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis la/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjed
305a8(rgyud): bgyi'o// yid la bsams pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyid pa'i phyag rgya bcu pa yang bcing ba bgyi'o// 'on tang 'chal ba yongasu rdzogs par rnyed par 'gyuraro// de'i tshe glegs bam 'di bzhin du/ 
305b1(rgyud): sems shing / su zhig 'di bzhin du mchod pa bgyid na/ gzhan du mi 'gyuraro// gzungs sngags kyi cho ga rdzogaso// / yang cho ga gzhan te su zhig bde ba bde thob par 'tshal ba des/ 
305b2(rgyud): bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu'i phyag rgya dgu pa bcings la rtsa ba'i gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyi'o// til nag po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjed bgyis te/ mer bsregs na ci 'tshal
305b3(rgyud): ba bzhin du 'gru'o// ci nas rgyal po dga' bar bgyi 'tshal na des rgyal po gnas pa na mchis pa'i shing las lcug ma blangs te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjed bgyis la/ rgyal po'i kun
305b4(rgyud): dga' ra ba der bor na dga' bar 'gyu ro// gal te sems can sdig pa can rnams dang / ngag rnams tshar gcod par 'tshal na/ des shing nam pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ 
305b5(rgyud): mar bsregs na dbang du 'gyur// yang cho ga gzhan te lha dang / 'byung po ma dul ba der sladu/ gu gul dang yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te mer bsre
305b6(rgyud): nad 'byung po thams cad bdag nyid tshul bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro// gang du nang byung na chab kyis dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis te/ der ba mar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la
305b7(rgyud): mer bsregs na nad zhi bar 'gyuraro// mar de nyid las nyung zhig nad pa la blung na 'tshe bar 'gyuraro// sngon yul ko bi nar nang byung ste/ nad pa rnams gdugs gcig gnyis bre 'tshal nas gu me// 
305b8(rgyud): do'i tshe dbug kyi yul gyi mi bden gyur ces bgyi ba der mchis te/ des gzungs sngags 'di'i cho ga bgyis nas bsgrags pa dang / nad cha do// 'thung po rgyal po yang yul de nas byung // 
306a1(rgyud): // thams cad kyis kyang 'di'i stobs 'tshal te/ gang du rang gi 'khor du pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'chi ba der thog ma'i rtsa ba'i gsang sngags bcings la bcangs la/ gsang
306a2(rgyud): sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ dgra po chom rkun rnams bdag nyid mi rung bar 'gyuraro// su zhig tshe zad pa des 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcings par
306a3(rgyud): bgyi/ nyin gcig bzhin mchod par bgyi/ a ga ru nag po'i bdug pas bdugs par 'gyi zhing / gsang sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de tshe ring bar 'gyuraro// bud med gang
306a4(rgyud): zhig bu mi phyin na ba mang la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ de la blud na zhi ba dang bde bar 'gyuraro// gang bskyed bo'i bu dang / bu mo dag kyang yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur// 
306a5(rgyud): mtshan mo bzang po sngon gyi bsod nams rnams kyis rgyan cing / sems can rnams dga' ba dang / mir skyes pan rtag/ tu mchod pa'i 'o su 'gyur zhing 'de ba mchog rnams myong
306a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// su zhig mig na ba des mig stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya bcings la gzungs sngags thams cad kyi phyag rgyas mig la phyag rgyas btab na sos par 'gyur ro// ji ltar stang gi bya/ 
306a7(rgyud): kyi lha bde ba myong ba rnams mthong ba de lta bu'i mthong ba dang ldan par 'gyu ro// da ni ri mo bri ba'i cho ga brjod par bgyi ste/ ri mo bri ba'i tshad ras dkar po bgyis la byang chub sems dpa'
306a8(rgyud): mdog 'jam+bu'i chu bo'i gser lta bu bri bar bgyi'o// lag pa stong dang ldan 'gyi'o// lag pa so so'i lag mthil na mig re re mchis par bgyi ste/ sbyin ma mchis po'i chen gyis dri
306b1(rgyud): bgyi'o// tshon rtsi yang ka pid tha dang bsre bar 'gyi'o// mgo la rin po che sna bdun gyi cod pan bri bar bgyi'o// yan lag dang / nying lag rnamasu rgyan gyis brgyad par bri bar bya'o// yang na ras
306b2(rgyud): la byang chub sems dpa' srid khru gang ba bris te/ lag pa gnyis bri bar bgyi'o// gong du smos pa'i lag pa stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya lnga pas/ rig sngags 'chang gis mchod pa bgyi'o// gal te
306b3(rgyud): lag pa dang / mig stong dang ldan par ma gyur na/ dpral bar mig gcig bgyi'o// yang 'od ni tshig gzhan te/ su zhig chos kyi sgo 'od mchod par 'tshal na/ thog ma ras la bri bar bya'o// de ni
306b4(rgyud): ltar bri mar bgyi ste/ cho ga snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor bgyi'o// de nas ri mo mkhan bslab pa brgyad bzung ba cha khung sar mchis te/ slar log nas legs par bkrus pa gtsang mas drib
306b5(rgyud): bya'o// tshon rtsi rung bas cho ga bzhon bris la/ de'i tshe dkyil 'khor gyi dbusu mchis te/ der bsnyung ba bgyis pa nyi ma nyi shu gcig tu mched pa'i las rgya char bgyis na/ 
306b6(rgyud): de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer gtong ste/ de la the tshom mi 'gyi'o// slad kyis zla ba dang / nyi ma lta bu'i 'od kyang 'gyid// gang dpe ba dang dad pas mi 'gyid pa des ni ma
306b7(rgyud): gtog so// byang chub sems dpa' lag pa stong dang ldan pa'i cho ga'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs byung ba'o tshe yang dag gis bdud 'dul ba'i lus mig stong dang ldan pa
306b8(rgyud): sprul pa'o// ma go re re las kyang sangs rgyas re re sprul te/ de dag ni bskal pa bzang po la sangs rgyas stong 'byung ba lag so// lag pastong las lag pa re re la ya 'khor los
307a1(rgyud): / bsgyur ba'i rgyal po ra ra sprul to// de dag ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po stong 'thung ba lag go// bdud 'dul ba'i tshogs kyi nang na/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni thad kyi
307a2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyad ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ngas gsang sngags 'di sangs rgyas kyi mthus rgyas par
307a3(rgyud): bshad na/ bskal pa 'das kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugs/ bcom ldan 'das las gsang sngags 'di thos nas @
307a4(rgyud): dga' ste/ yi rang nas bzung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gzungs sngags 'di brjod// na mo rat+na ra sh+mi tsan+d+ra a laM kA ra mArga te dza pu t+ya tsak+Sha ra bi ShA ya rA dza ya ta thA
307a5(rgyud): tA ya/ tad+ya thAHrat+na rat+na/ ta ta sha rat+na/ rat+na pra ti ma te/ rat+na pra b+hA ratA da ka te swAhA/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags ba spyad ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzungs sngags
307a6(rgyud): 'di brjod nas/ de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'du shes mid 'du shes med min skye mched la thug bar du/ rnam pa drug du g.yos// rab tu g.yo so// 'og min
307a7(rgyud): gyi lha'i ris na/ dbang phyug chen po yang mi bde bar gyur to// lha'i gnas der 'jigs pa chen po yang byung // ngan song du gyur pa zang kyang sdug bsngal chen po rnyed zhes sgra chen po 'byin cing
307a8(rgyud): 'phos 'bros te/ gang song mi she so// de'i cha sprul pas ngan song du myur pa'i 'khor chen po la 'di tsa skad ces so// gal te gsang sngags 'di las 'da' zhing 'gras par byed na mgo bo rdul
307b1(rgyud): phra rab bzhin du bgyis// gsang sngags 'di'i mthus ni 'thor// rgya mtsho chen po skes so// lha ma yin gyi dpag pham par bgyid do// 'byung po rnams tshar gcod// sdig pa can gyi mi rnams kya
307b2(rgyud): gtsedo// nad chen po dag kyang chad par bgyid do// yul bsrungs par yang 'gyur ro// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyang phyag 'tshalo// rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig gsang sngags 'di brjod cing 'dzi/ 
307b3(rgyud): ba de'i gzi brjid dang / stobs yul thung dus bshad par mi nu'o// gzungs sngags 'di 'chang zhing brjod pa ni dpa' bar 'gyuraro// drug pa dang / stobs dang ldan pa dang / gang dang ldan par 'gyur// ji srid
307b4(rgyud): 'tsho ba'i bar du rgyal po byams par 'gyuraro// ci 'tshal ba thams cad 'gru'o// su zhig bdud pham par bgyid par 'tshal ba der 'du ga ba gtsang ma la rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gaH
307b5(rgyud): bzlas brjed bgyi'o// su zhig 'di snyam du bdag la sems can thams cad nyams par 'tshal ba das/ so shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te mchos na byams
307b6(rgyud): par 'gyu ro// su zhig bdag gi tshig thogs pa med par 'gyur bar 'tshal ba das/ shu dag la lan stong rtsa bzlas brjod bgyis la stong khar bskus na 'gru'o// las dngag la yang rtsa ba'i gsang
307b7(rgyud): sngags brjod// phyag rgya yang bcing bar bgyi'o// lag pa gnyis rgyab sprang sbyar la mthe bong gnyis brkya // phyag rgya 'di ni ji ltar bdag srung ba de bzhin du gzhan yang srung // mtshams bca
307b8(rgyud): pa yang bgyid// gang zhig tu mchin chaba'am/ bal ba lag par blangs te len bdud bzlas 'arjod bgyis la/ bangag gi steng du gtor na/ phyogs bzhir mtshams bcad par yang 'gyur// 
308a1(rgyud): / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'byung po rnams sam/ bgegs dang / log 'dren rnams kyis mtho brtsams par gyur na/ bal po se'u shing gi lhug pa la
308a2(rgyud): gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyis te/ ngal gyis bzhugs na sos par 'gyuraro// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i so so'i rig pa'i phyag rgya thogs pa med pa ste/ gsum pa'o// gsang sngags
308a3(rgyud): ni 'di lags te/ ni ma s+pharba bud d+ha d+harma saM g+hA ya/ na mai Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra s+ya bo d+hi satwA s+ya/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+yA/ bo d+hi satwA s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ d+hu bi d+hu bi kA ya d+hu pi/ pra sha ma ni s+phA ha/ log par wA
308a4(rgyud): ba gzhan mu stegs can rnams 'dul bar nuso// su zhig dus gsum du gsang sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa re ra brjod pa des/ sang sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das bye ba phrag bcu la mchod pa'i lba
308a5(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa 'gyes par 'gyuraro// lu mang du skye bar mi 'gyuraro// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe ngan 'gro ga sum po dag las yosu thar bar 'gyuraro// 'jig ce
308a6(rgyud): gyi khams bde ba can du mchi bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi de'o spyi bor phyag bzhag te/ 'od skad du bu ma 'jigs shig/ nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'ongaso// 
308a7(rgyud): skyes nas dus pa yin pa mchi bas 'chi bar mi 'gyuraro// 'dir 'byung po rnams kyis gla gos rnyed par mi 'gyur zhes gsung // 'greng ste lag pa g.yon 'gru mo bkug pa dang por brkyang ste
308a8(rgyud): mi 'jigs pa sbyin par bgyi// lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong lag mthil du bkug pa sor mo bzhis mnan te/ khu tshung 'di rna ba g.yas pa'i gong dug la mdzub mo sprul bar bgyi/ 2
308b1(rgyud): bar bgyi/ bskum par bgyi'o// phyag rgya 'di ni stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu gtog pa'i las rnams 'byung bar 'gyi ba'i smad smras pa ste bcu bzhi pa'o// phyag rgya 'di ni nyin gcig
308b2(rgyud): bzhin dus gsum du bcings la gsang sngags kyang lan bdun brjod na/ mtshams med pa lnga po dag dang / rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi po dab kyang 'byeng bar 'gyid nus par 'gyuraro// sems can thad la snying
308b3(rgyud): rje chen po bskyed na/ las kyi rtsa ba thams cad tshig par 'gyur// gang gi tshe tshe 'di 'dor ba na/ sangs rgyas dang phrad par 'gyuraro// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur// dpag tu med cing
308b4(rgyud): zad pa'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyuraro// mnyam pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin thob par 'gyur// lus la ltas rnam pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'byung bar 'gyuraro// lus la gnod pa mi 'byung // mig nad dang rnab
308b5(rgyud): nad dang / sna'i nad dang / lhund mi 'byung // phyi dang nang gi nang za zhi bar 'gyuraro// sngon gyi las mi dge ba rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyuraro// gal te char mi 'bab ni til nag po la
308b6(rgyud): ra dzA'i mar gyis spras te/ ril bur bgyis la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod 'gyos te/ mtsha'ung su la na de'i mod la cha ri dbab po// gal te char ches na yungs kar gyi mar gyis snga ma'i
308b7(rgyud): tog spras la ril bur bgyis te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod 'gyis la mche'udu su la na char 'chad par 'gyuraro// sor mo lnga phan tshun bsnol te/ g.yon pa'i ser mo rnams kyis g.yas
308b8(rgyud): pa'i ser mo rnams dam du 'khyud la mgo bo'i steng tu bzhag ste/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags bzlas brjod 'gyi'o// 'di ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten du bdud 'dul ba'i phyag rgya ste
309a1(rgyud): / bco lnga pa'o// phyag rgya 'dis ri bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du bskul bar bgyi// gdugs nyi shu rtsa dgu'i bar du tsun dan dkar po'i 'dag gus dkyil 'khor byug/ ma
309a2(rgyud): gtsang ma dgro mo// de'i tshe khrus bgyis la gos gtsang ma bgos te/ a ga ru nag po'i bdug par 'gyi'o// rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod 'gyi'o// 'di ni sngar snyan par bgyi'o// de nas
309a3(rgyud): yungs kar dang / til nag po lhan cig btags la/ po sum gang tsam la lan gcig bzlas brjod pagyis te zhug sung do// de ltar gdugs bdun gyi bang du gdugs gcig cang / yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad
309a4(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyis na/ ci 'tshal ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyu ro// 'greng la rkang pa mnyam par nye bar gzhibs te/ lag pa ga yas pa zung du thams cad rkang la bkan te/ dbus mo'i sta
309a5(rgyud): du bzhag// lag pa g.yon pa yang de bzhin du bgyi'o// 'di na byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa stsol ba'i phyag rgya ste/ bcu drug pa'o// phyag rgya 'di ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i
309a6(rgyud): rten gyi drung du gcings la/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod 'gyis na/ sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa stsal bar 'gyuraro// yang na shu ta'i sa bon dang / yungs kar dang / 
309a7(rgyud): shu dag dang / nya'u shing dang / 'di dag sangs rgyas kyi spyan snga 'am/ bla gab med pa'i phyogasu sbyin sreg bgyi'o// gsang sngags lan sum cu rtsa gnyis bzlas brjod bgyiro// me tog dang / 'dug
309a8(rgyud): pas mchod par bgyi'o// 'di ni gsang sngags kyi cho ga lags te/ ci rtsom pa thams cad bzhin du 'grub bo// gsang sngags gang mi 'grub na// gsang sngags 'di bzlas brjod 'gyis ni/ 
309b1(rgyud): 'grog// rmi lam mthong bar 'tsham na gsang sngags yang brjod cing phyag rgya 'di yang bcings na ci 'tshal ba rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyuraro// mi bsod nams dang mi ldan pa gang zhig dngos gru
309b2(rgyud): mi tho ba na/ gsang sngags 'di gdugs bdun gyi bar du gdugs gcig kyang dus gsum du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ ci 'tshal ba de bzhin du 'gru'o// de'i tshe yang byang chub kyi
309b3(rgyud): rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'o khang par 'dug ste chos bshod// dair k+Sha sdug bsngal chen po myong ba dge mthong nas/ snying rje chen po skyes te/ gal te yongs skyob pa zhig yod na/ sdug
309b4(rgyud): bsngal gyi gnod pa rnams las thar bar 'gyur snyamo// de'i cha dang klu'i bu mo chos 'dod pa cig gis rin po che 'dzag rten gyi khams mi mdzod gcig rib cig phul ba dang / des kyang sdug
309b5(rgyud): bsngal thams cad yongasu thar bar byed pa'i chos bsha // da che der gsang sngags 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chu'i snying pos kun tu srung ba'i phyir gsang sngags
309b6(rgyud): spra so// bi ma le ma hA bi ma le/ oM ha ra ma hA o ha re/ hu ma re mahA ma ra swAhA/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gsang sngags 'di 'dzin na/ de gar mchi bar bdud kyi
309b7(rgyud): 'khor gyis sdug bsngal bar bgyid pa'i bar du bdag gis rtag tu kun tu srung bar bgyi'o// gang la la zhig blo bur du 'jigs par gyur tam/ ra shi yul lam gzhan gyi yul lam/ chom
309b8(rgyud): rkun dang phyir rgol bdag byung na des tshon skud sA lnga pa ba cing bar bgyi ste/ mdad pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor la/ mdung pa re re zhing yang gsang sngags lan re re bzlas brjod bgyis te/ lag
310a1(rgyud): // g.yon pa la bcing bar bgyi'o// lag pa g.yon pa'i srin lag dang / gung mo dang / mdzub mo rnams khu tshur bcangs la/ mthe bos de dag mnan/ mthe'u chung brkyang ste/ ngagra logs
310a2(rgyud): bldan la gsang sngags kyang lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' mig dang ldan pa'i kun tu srung ba'i phyag rgya sde bcu bdud pa'o// gsang sngags lan bcu bdud bzlas
310a3(rgyud): brjed bgyis na/ dgra thams cad ldog par 'gyur zhing / gnod par bgyi mi nuso// de'i tshe yang byang chub sems dpa' gangs kyi ro la gnas te chos kyang 'cha 'o// der gnod sbyin dang srin po rnaH
310a4(rgyud): kyi yul na sems can rnams phan tshun za zhing de dag la dge ba'i sems med par mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du nam zhig na 'dul bar 'gyur snyam nas de'i tshe der song ste
310a5(rgyud): yul dang de dag gi don gyi phyir lag pa stong dang ldan zhig mig stong dang ldan pa'i lus sprul nas deng bdud rnams pham par byaso// der gzungs sngags 'di yang smra so// de nas
310a6(rgyud): srin po'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i gan du song ste/ las de bshags nas phyag byaso// byang chub sems dpa' kyang phyag rgya bcu bdun gyis phyag rgyas btab pa dang / de'i mod la bang chub
310a7(rgyud): kyi lam thob bo// 'greng ste rkang pa phan tshun nye bar gzhings la snying khar thal mo sbyar te mthe'u phan tshun bsna'o// g.yon pas g.yas pa la 'khyud par bgyi/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags kyang
310a8(rgyud): lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod 'gyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya yongasu rdzogs pa ste/ bco brgyad pa'o// yid la bsam pa rnams
310b1(rgyud): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// su zhig ngan 'gro drug po dag gi sems can rnams skyob par 'tshal ba des/ 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings par bgyi ste/ sor mo bcu rtse sprad la lag rting ngabye/ sor mo'i bang
310b2(rgyud): yang sor gnyis gnyis tsam gyis ma phrad par bgyi'o// phyag rgya 'dis byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams yongasu thar bar bgyid cing / 'gro ba drug po dag tu zhugs pa dang 'ong bar rig par
310b3(rgyud): bgyi ste/ phyag rgya de'i cho ga'o// yang skyil mo krung bcas te mchis la log pa g.yon pa dbus mo'i steng tu lag mthil bkan te bzhag par bgyi'o// g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis la/ lag
310b4(rgyud): mthil dbus mo'i stang du kha bub ste/ gzhag par bgyi'o// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugi dam tshig yongasu rdzogs pa yang dag pa'i byang chub
310b5(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya ste bcu dgu pa'o// 'di ni rang bzhin gyi 'gog ba dang mtshungs te// dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams phyag rgya 'di gcig bus sangs rgyas kyi
310b6(rgyud): brnye so// phyag rgya 'dis las mi dge ba tha~Md 'byung bar 'gyu ro/ la te sgrub pa po skyil mo krung bcas te mchis rnams mngon du gda' bar ma gyur na/ gdugs bdun gyi bar du dgon pa'i phyogs
310b7(rgyud): kyi gnasu phyag rgya 'dis gzungs 'di brjod la shin tu dad pas sangs rgyas la phyag bgyi zhing / gdugs mtshan drug tu las rnams so sor bshags na/ nga'i tshe tshes bdun du gda' bar 'gyur/ 
310b8(rgyud): bsod nams dpag tu ma mchis shing grangs ma mchis par 'gyuraro// yang lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo bzhi khu tshur bcangs la g.yas pa'i sor mo bzhis g.yon pa'i mthe khong bcangs
311a1(rgyud): // te bcung zhig mchis la g.yas pa'i mdzub mos g.ya'o// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugi sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i rnam pa rnams
311a2(rgyud): dgug pa'i phyag rgya ste nyi shu pa'o// gsang sngags ni 'di lags te/ oM ku Te ku Te/ ku na ra~M tsi li tsi li/ tsi li l-i swA hA/ gsang sngags 'di dang / phyag rgya 'di ni lhag par rgya che ba'o// rig
311a3(rgyud): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi ri bu mo gang la la zhig ci rtsom pa rmi lam du mthong bar 'tshal na/ gsang sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod 'gyis na/ yid la ci 'asams pa rmi lam du mthong
311a4(rgyud): bar 'gyur// su zhig gdugs gcig bzhin du goms par bgyid na/ las rnams byang bar 'gyur// byang chub kyi sems mi bskyod// rmi lam bzang po dpal du 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi shing drung
311a5(rgyud): na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar du mthong zhing byang chub tu lung stong bar mi bar 'gyuro// brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sog/ sa ba lha rnams kyang kun tu srung bar bya'o// yang 'greng ste na
311a6(rgyud): ba ban tshun bsnyen ga lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong lag mthol du bkug ste/ sor mo bzhis khu tshur bcangs la snying khar bzhag/ g.yas pa yang de bzhin bgyi la/ rna ba g.yas pa
311a7(rgyud): steng du bzhag ste/ mdzub mos g.ya'o// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugs lha dang / klu la sogs pa 'khor brgyad po dag dgug pa'i phyag rgya ste/ nyi
311a8(rgyud): shu rtsa gcig pa'o// gsang sngags ni 'di lags te/ na mo ni gan+d+ha na mo dadra ba na swAhU~M/ na mo ni dzi la swA hA/ i h+ye hi swA hA/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig phyag rgya 'din
311b1(rgyud): gsang sngags 'di 'dzin tam/ 'don tam/ klog pa tshe rabs bdun dran par 'gyuraro// sbal bdug pas zid par mi 'gyuraro// dug kyang gdug par mi 'gyur ro// lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugaso
311b2(rgyud): rgyal po'i chad pas 'jigs pa mi 'byung // skal pa mang por sems can dmyal mi mtsho'o// sdug bsngal nyam su mi myong // gang brjod par 'byung po rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gcig lhags te/ gas
311b3(rgyud): sngags 'di nyan par 'gyuraro// gang gi drung du 'byung po mchi ba der sdud pa dkar po gdags par bgyi ste/ mdud pa bzhi bcu rtsa dgu bor la/ mdud pa re re la yang la der bzlas brjod 'gyis
311b4(rgyud): mgul tu btags na bde bar 'gyur// gi le te yul du yams kyi nang byung ste/ sems can mang du 'gum ni/ rgyal po'i ba spyad mos tshal nas pad+ma dag bslangs la/ pad+ma re re la yang
311b5(rgyud): lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te kha sreg sa ba bgyis na/ yams kyi nad 'chad par 'gyuraro// yang skyil mo krung bcas te mchis la lag pa g.yon pa'i ma
311b6(rgyud): bong dang / gung mo rtse mo sbed/ lag mthil bkan la dbus mo g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag/ g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis la/ pus mo g.yas pa'i steng du kha phub ste bzhago// sor po
311b7(rgyud): gzhan bskyed la/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgya ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// ci 'tshal ba de
311b8(rgyud): bzhin du 'gru'o// sdug bsngal las thang bar 'gyur// gang gi mtshams med pa lnga po'i las dge bgyis pa/ sdig pa re re'i byor yang / dper na 'dzam bu'i gling gi sa'i rdul gyi rdul phra
312a1(rgyud): // rabs mtha' dag re re'i bskal par sems can dmyal bar mchi 'tshal la/ 'byung ba ni nges par mchis mar gyur na// des de'i tshe ring basbrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdu
312a2(rgyud): du tshas bco lnga'i zla ba nya la/ zas mi 'tshal bar phyag rgya 'di bcings la/ gsang sngags 'di yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ sngon gyi las kyi sdug bsngal thad 'bang
312a3(rgyud): 'gyed nus par 'gyur// lhag ma lus pa ni gnas ma lags shing skabs ma mchi so// yang 'greng ste lag pa g.yon pas rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong chang par bcug la/ lag po g.yas
312a4(rgyud): pas g.yon pa'i lag mthim nas bzung ste/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i dbang dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i phyag rgya ste/ 
312a5(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// dpag tshad stong gi phyogasu 'chi' tshal na yang dka' ba ma mchi so// gsang sngags ni dben pa ra mchis la bzlas brjod 'gyi'o// yang lag pa
312a6(rgyud): galen pa'i mthe bos mthe'u chung gi sen mo mnan la/ g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis te/ sor mo lhag pa gsum gsum mchis pa brkyang la/ lag mthil du bkug ste/ spyi 'or
312a7(rgyud): bzhag la rtsa ba'i rigs sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / dbang gi phyag rgya ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// 
312a8(rgyud): la dbang 'tho'o// yang thal mo reg par sbyar te/ thal mo'i nang khog stong du bgyis la mdzub mo gnyis kyis g.yo'o// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rgyal po'i snying po la spyad
312b1(rgyud): drang ba'i phyag rgya nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// gsang sngags ni 'di lags te/ oM A ro lig tre lo kyo bo dza ya/ sarba ga tru pra pa ba nas ra ya su waM Ta bA sAhA/ byang chub sems pa 'phags pa spyan ras 'jig+sa
312b2(rgyud): dbang phyug lag pastod dang / mig stong dang ldan pa'i cho gzhi mo rdzogaso// / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong spyad stong dang ldan pa thogs mi mnga'
312b3(rgyud): thugs rje chen po'i sems rgya cher yongasu rdzogs pa ces bya ba'i gzungs// / bam po dang po'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thad la phyag 'tsho'o// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
312b4(rgyud): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ri po Ta la'i steng / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhal mod khang rin po che bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor na nor bu ring po che rnam pa sna tshog+sa
312b5(rgyud): kyis rab tu rgyan pa'i rin cha'i sad+ma'i gdan rin po che'i rgya mtshan dang ba dan dag gis 'khor bar bkod cing spungs pa la bzhugs te/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs gdan de la
312b6(rgyud): nas kun 'dzin ces bya ba'i gzung sngags bshad par bzhed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub
312b7(rgyud): sems dpa' kun 'dzin gyi rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rin po che'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sman mngon par 'phags pa
312b8(rgyud): dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i bkod pa dang / byang chub sada' bkod pa chen po dang
313a1(rgyud): / byang chub sems dpa'i rin chen snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' namakha'i snying po dang / 
313a2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rgyal
313a3(rgyud): zo chen po dbang bskur 'o thos pa sha stag dang thabs gcig// gzhan yang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po thad kyang dgra bcom pa'i sa bcu spyad pa tshad med pa grangs med pa dag dang thabs gcigo// 
313a4(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ni gtso bor gyur to// gzhan yang chas ris kyi lha tshad med pa snyed dang thabs gcig ste/ lha'i bu kAt+ta ma ra ni gtso bor gyur to// gzhan yang lha dang
313a5(rgyud): lha'i bu tshad med pa snyed dang thabs gcig ste/ lha'i bu ku b+ha ka ni gtso bor gyur to// gzhan 'jig rten skyong ba dang / rgya la chen ris bzhi'i rgyal po tshad med pa snyed dang thabs
313a6(rgyud): gcig ste/ lha'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung nr-i gtso bor gyur to// gzhan yang lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang
313a7(rgyud): mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa tshad med bsnyed dang thabs gcig ste/ klu'i rgyal po chen po ri'i dpol ni gtso bor gyur to// gzhan yang 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i bu mo tshad med bsnyed da
313a8(rgyud): thabs gcig ste/ lha'i bu mo gzhon nu'i mig ces bya ba ni gtso bor gyur to// gzhan yang na mkha'i lha dang / chu bo dang / rgya mtsho'i lha dang / chu mig lha dang / chu klung gi lha dang / smad gyi lha da
313b1(rgyud): ljon shing gi lha dang / nags tshal gyi lha dang / khang khyim gyi lha dang / chu'i lha dang / me'i lha dang / rlung gi lha dang / sa'i lha dang / ri'i lha dang / gzhal med khang la sogs pa'i lha tshad med pa
313b2(rgyud): snyed kyang so so nas 'dus shing lcags par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor mang po'i nang du gsang ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyis 'od zer bkye bas phyogs
313b3(rgyud): btsu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang gser gyi kha dog can du gyur to// lha'i gzhal med khang rnams dang / klu'i khang khyim rnams
313b4(rgyud): dang lha'i gtso bo rnams kyi gnal med khang rnams kyang rab tu g.yos par gyur/ chu bo dang / mtsho dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / ri khor yug dang / ri rab lhun po dang / sa'i ri dang / ri dgas po rnams kyang
313b5(rgyud): rab tu g.yos par gyur to// nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / nor bu dang / me dang / rgyu skar dang / gza'i 'od rnams kyang zil gyis maH/ na te mi snang bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
313b6(rgyud): kun 'dzin gyi rgyal pos ngo mtshar rma du byung ba'i mtshan ma de dag mthong ba dang / sngon chad nam yang de lta bu ma byung // zhes ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces
313b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi mtshan ma 'di lta bu 'di dag sus bgyi lags zhes gsol nas/ tshig su bcad zhu ba zhus pa/ ding ni su zhig mngon par sangs rgyas na/ 'di ltar 'od zer chen po
313b8(rgyud): rab bkye bas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gser gyi mdog tu gyur// stong chen 'jig rten khams kyang de bzhin lags/ dang ni su zhig rang dbang po gyur na/ ya mtshan rdzu 'phrul chen po mthu
314a1(rgyud): / nas/ mtha' med sangs rgyas zhing rnams rab g.yos shing / lha kA gzhal med khang rnams mi bder gyur/ sa yi mthu lags rgyu rkyen ma rtogs pa/ 'khor mang 'di dag the tsom
314a2(rgyud): 'tshal gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rje chen po yis// rdzu 'phrul 'di yi rkyen rkyen bkas bshad gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kud 'dzin gyi rgyal po la bka'
314a3(rgyud): stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed kyis 'di rig par bya ste/ deng 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dus pa 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya ba zhig yod
314a4(rgyud): bde/ sngon bskal pa tshad med pa nas byams po chen po dang snying rje chen po phun sum tshogs par gyur pa/ gzungs kyi sgo tshad med pa snyed shin tu bsgoms shing mngon par bsgrub par gyur pa/ 
314a5(rgyud): sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'dod pa'i phyir gsang ste 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu chen po bstan pa yin// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang
314a6(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te gos chags bcos nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ste bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ce
314a7(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs rje chen po'i sems zhes bgyi ba'i gzung sngags mchis te/ sems can mang po rnams la sman pa dang bdab 'thob par bgyi ba dang / bro nang zad
314a8(rgyud): bsal bar bgyi ba dang / tshe ring bar 'gyur ba dang / phyug cing 'byor pa dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i las dang kha na ma tho ba lci ba rnams yongasu sbyang zhing bsal ba dang / spyi bo'i
314b1(rgyud): bgegs rnams dang 'bral ba dang / chos dkar po'i yon tan thams cad 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / dge ba'i sa bon thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyi ba dang / 'jigs shing skrag pa zad yo
314b2(rgyud): spang bar bgyi ba dang / re bi thams cad myur du yongasu rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du deng bshad par 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan
314b3(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod snying rje chen pos sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir rig sngags bshad par 'dod pas deng dus la bab kyis myur du smros shig dang / 
314b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs par dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang rje su thugs dgyes par mdzad// bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyad ras gzigs dbang phyugs yang
314b5(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag mngon par ngan lags te/ sngon byung ba'i bskal pa'ibum phrag tshad ma mchis pa snyed 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'a
314b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od stong gi rgyal po'i bar gnas pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des bdag dang sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i skad thogs
314b7(rgyud): ba ma mchis pa'i thugs rje chen po rgya cher yongasu rdzogs pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs 'di bka' stsal nas/ phyag gser gyi kha dog can gyis bdag gi spyi bo byugs te 'di skad ces/ rigs kyi
314b8(rgyud): shu khyod thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'di zung shig dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus ngan pa'i sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba chen po byed par 'gyuraro// zhes bka' stsal to// bdag de'i bde
316a1(rgyud): / sa dang po la gnas pa las rig sngags 'di lan gcig thos pa tsam gyis sa brgyad pa las yang dag par 'gyur lag so// bdag de'i tshe de'i dus de sems rab tu dga' zhing makru
316a2(rgyud): bar gyur pa'i slad du smon lam 'di skad du btab lags te/ gal te bdag ma 'ong ba'i dus na sems cad thams cad la sman cing bde bar 'gyid pa'i 'o su 'gyur yang dag pa zhig las na/ deng
316a3(rgyud): gi lus 'di nyid lag pa stong dang / mig stong tshang bar 'gyur 'gyur cig ces smon lam btab ma thag tu lus las sug pa stong dang mig stong tshang par byung bar gyur te/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rte
316a4(rgyud): gyi khams mtha' ma mchis pa rnams kyang gsal bar bgyis par gyur lag so// dang slan chad sangs rgyas tshad ma mchis pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ched ma mchis pa dag tu gzus
316a5(rgyud): 'di yang dang yang du thos shing mngon sum du yang dag par bla sa pa dang / gzhan yang dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs pa tshad ma mchis pa bskyed pas bskal pa 'bum phrag
316a6(rgyud): ma mchis pa rnyed pa kyi 'khor ba phra mo las yang dag par 'das par gyur lag so// dang slan chad gzungs 'di rtag par 'don cing yongasu bzung nas nam du yang mi bskrad par bgyis pa'i slad du
316a7(rgyud): skye ba thams cad rtag par sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar pad+ma las brdzus te skyes pas mngal du skye ba'i lus blangs par bya myur lag so// dge slong ngem/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam
316a8(rgyud): dge bsnyed ma 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang la la zhig 'di'i don cing yongasu 'dzin par 'tshal bdas sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i sems bskyed nas/ dang po kho nar bdag la smon
316b1(rgyud): 'di skad gda' par 'gyi lag so// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje che la phyag 'tshalo// dag gis chos thams cad myur tu rtogs par shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zug rje
316b2(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo// bdag gis ye shes mig ni myur du thob par shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje tsha la phyag 'tshalo// bdag gis sems can thams cad myur du sgrol bar shog/ sman ras
316b3(rgyud): gzigs dbang thugs rje tsha la phyag 'tsha'o// bdag gis thabs mkhas pa dag srung du thob par shog// spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshalo// bdag ni myur du shes rab gro yis
316b4(rgyud): sgrol bar shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thug rje che la phyag 'tsha'o// bdag ni myung du sdug bsngal mtsho las 'da' bar shog// spyan ras gzigs dbang thug rje che la phyag 'tshalo// bad gis myur
316b5(rgyud): du tshul khrims rkang gi lam thob shog/ sprad ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tsha'o// bdag gis myur du mya ngan 'da' ba'i ri 'dzeg yog/ spyan ras gzigs dang
316b6(rgyud): thugs rje che la phyag 'tsha'o// bdag gis myur du 'dus ma bas kyi khyim byin shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje tsha la phyag 'tshalo// bdag ni myur du chos nyid sku dang mtshungs par shes/ 
316b7(rgyud): bdag ni ral gI ri la 'dzeg/ ral gi ro ni ring snyil shog/ bdag ni tshun chad phrad gyur na/ chu tshan me mur rang zhi sho// sems can dmyal bar 'dage seng na/ sems can dmyal ba rang bskas
316b8(rgyud): shog// bdag ni yi drags gan song na/ bkres skom dag ni 'grangs par shog/ bdag ni lha min gnas song na/ ngan sems rang ni dul bar shog/ bdag ni dud 'gro'i gnas phyin na/ rang nyid
319a1(rgyud): shes rab cha thob shog/  skad du spong lam btab nas sems rtse gcig tu bdag gi ming nas 'don cing rje su dran par bgyi'o// gzhan yang bdag ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'od da
319a2(rgyud): med rje su dran par bgyis nas/ de'i rjes la gzungs sngags 'di mtshan gcig la lan bdun tshang bar 'don par bgyid na bskal pa 'bub brag brgyad stong snye du 'khor bar 'gyur ba'i kha nam
319a3(rgyud): bo ba'i lci ba rnams yongasu bsal cing 'byung bar 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha 'am mi gang la la zhig thugs rje chen po'i tshogs
319a4(rgyud): 'di 'don cing 'dzin par bgyid na 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe phyugs pa cu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams der gshegs nas phyag skyong bar 'gyur bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skye bar
319a5(rgyud): 'tshal ba ji ltar smon pa bzhin nga de dag tu skye bar 'gyur la gso// bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol te/ com ldan 'das sems can gang la la zhig thugs rje chen
319a6(rgyud): be'i rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongasu 'dzin pa dag gal te ngad 'gro gsum po dag tu ltung bar gyur na bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// thugs rje chen po'i rig
319a7(rgyud): sngags 'don cing yongasu 'dzin pa dag gal te sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams rnamasu skye bar ma gyur na bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyuro// thugs rje chen po'i rog sngag
319a8(rgyud): 'don cing yong su 'dzin pa dag gal te ting 'dzin dang spongs pa tshad ma mchis pa snyed thob par ma gyur na bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// thugs rje chen po'i rig snga
319b1(rgyud): 'dod cing yongasu 'dzin pa dag gal te tshe 'di nyid la smon pa thams cad ji ltar smon pa bzhin du grub par ma gyur na snying rje chen po'i sems kyi gzungs zhes mi bgyi lags te/ mi dge ba rnams dang
319b2(rgyud): sems rkye tu ma 'gyis pa ni ma gtogs lagaso// bung bad gang la la zhig bud med kyi lus kyis yongasu skyo nas skyes pa'i lus thob par 'tshal ba gang lags pa des thugs rje chen po'i sems
319b3(rgyud): kyi gzungs kyi tshogs 'di 'don cing yongasu bzung bas gal te bud med kyi dngos po las yongasu gyur te/ skyes pa'i lus thob par ma gyur na bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi
319b4(rgyud): bkri'o// the tshom gyi bsam pa cung zad cig bskyed par gyur na gdon mi 'tshal bar gang smon pa'i 'bras bu de mngon par 'grub par mi lag so// sems cad gang la la zhig dge 'dun gyi zhal zas
319b5(rgyud): dang dkor 'phrog cing chud gson pa gang lags pa de dag nas sa rgyas stong 'jig rten du byung ba dag la 'gyod pas mthil zhing bshags na yang 'byang zhing tshangs par mi 'gyur mod
319b6(rgyud): kyi/ 'on kyang thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'di bton pa tsam gyi de dag yongasu 'byung ba 'gyur ba lag ste/ dkon mchog gsum gyi zhal zas dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor nor 'phrog cing
319b7(rgyud): chung gson pa de dag ni phyogs bcu'i ston pa rnams mngon sum du gyur pa'i sman sngar bshags na gdod yongasu 'brang bar 'gyur lags na/ thugs rje chen po ri gzungs 'di 'don pa'i tshe phyogs su
319b8(rgyud): sten pa rnams deng gshegs nas dbang mdzad par 'gyur bas kho na ma tho ba'o sgrib pa de dag thams cad kyang yongasu 'byung bar 'gyur/ mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang / gang
320a1(rgyud): // zag la skur pa btab pa dang / chos la bskur ba btab pa dang / gso sbyong ba shig pa dang / tshul khrims bshigs pa dang / mchod rten bshig pa dang / gtsug lag khang bshig pa thadang / 
320a2(rgyud): dge 'dun gyi dkor brkun pa dang / yong su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa sun por bgyis pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa sdig pa'i las lci ba ci bgyis pa thams cad yongasu 'byung bar 'gyur lags
320a3(rgyud): rig sngags 'di la the tshom 'tshal ba'i dngos po gcig ma gtogs te/ the tshom 'tshal bar gyur na tha na kha na ma tho ba chung ngu'i las yang ba tsam yang yongasu 'byung bar mi 'gyur na kha na ma tho
320a4(rgyud): blta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/ kha na ma tho ba lci bdag so dasu 'byang bar mi 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang byang chub kyi ring ba'i rgyuni 'gyid par 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das la ya
320a5(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha dang mi gang la la zhig thugs rje chen po'i sems kyi rog sngags 'di'i don cing 'dzin pa de dag ni dge ba'i bskye ba rnam pa bco
320a6(rgyud): lnga 'thob par 'gyur zhing gshis ngan du 'chi ba rnam pa bco lnga len par mi 'gyur lag so// gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba de yang 'di lta ste/ gang zag da bkrus pas nyon mongs te
320a7(rgyud): 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / mtshon cha dang lcag dbyug gis 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / kho na mchis pa'i dgra'i sug par 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / g.yul ngor 'chi ba re mi 'gyur ba dang / stag
320a8(rgyud): dang spyang gi dang gcan zan ma rungs pa'i khar 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / sbrul gdug pa dang rtsangs pa dang sdig pa'i khar 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / chab dang / zhugs kyi nang du 'bying zhing zhig tshig
320b1(rgyud): ste 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / dug gis 'chi 'ang mi 'gyur ba dang / byang sems kyi 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / myos nas dran pa nyams te 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / ri dang ljon
320b2(rgyud): shing dang ngam grog dang g.yang sa nas ldang ste 'chi bar mi 'gyur pa dang / mi ma rungs pa'i byad kyis 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / logs pa'i 'ang gdon ma rungs pas bklags rnyed 'chi ba'i dus bgyid
320b3(rgyud): par mi 'gyur pa dang / nad ngan pas lus lang kris te 'chi ba'i dus bgyi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / cha ma lags pas bdag nyid la gnod pa bgyod ta 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur pa dag/ 
320b4(rgyud): lags te/ thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongasu 'dzin par bgyid pa de dag nogashis ngan du 'chi ba rnam pa bco lnga po 'di dag gis 'chi ba'i dus 'gyid par mi 'gyur lags
320b5(rgyud): dge ba'i skye ba rnam pa bco lnga po zab par 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ skye ba thams cad rgyal po dge ba dang mjal bar 'gyu ra ba dang / rtag par yul dge bar skye bar 'gyur ba dang
320b6(rgyud): rtag par dus bzang po dang mjal bar 'gyur ba dang / rtag par dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'jal bar 'gyur ba dang / rtag par lus kyi dbang po chang bar 'gyur ba dang / lam gyi sems
320b7(rgyud): goms par 'gyur ba dang / sdom pa'i tshul khrims nyams par mi bgyid pa dang / 'khor rnams drin gyis 'dre zhing 'dum par 'gyur ba dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams rtag par 'byor cing ldan pa
320b8(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / rtag par gzhan gyi bkur zhing rim gro bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / yo byad bdog pa rnams gzhan gyis 'phrog par mi 'gyur ba dang / yid la smon pa rnams bsams pa bzhin du 'grub
321a1(rgyud): // bar 'gyur pa dang / lha dang kA dge pa rnams kyis rtag tu srung zhing yongs skyob par 'gyur pa dang / skye ba thams cad sangs rgyas mthong zhing chos thob par 'gyur ba dang / yang dag pa'i chos
321a2(rgyud): zos nas don zab me rtog par 'gyur ba dag lags te/ lha 'am mi gang la la zhig thugs rje chen po'i sems kyis rtag tu gzungs 'di 'dod cing yongasu 'dzin par bgyid pa gang lags pa
321a3(rgyud): de dag ni dge ba'i skye ba rnam pa bco lnga po 'di dag thob par bgyid par 'gyur bas/ lha mi thams cad kyis rtag par bton nas yongasu bzung bar bgyi ste la lo bskyed par mi bgyi'o// byang chub
321a4(rgyud): sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang blugs de skad ces smra sa nas/ 'khor 'dus pa'i mdun du thal mo sbyar te drang por la dug nas sems can rnams la snying rje chen po'i sems bskye
321a5(rgyud): 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyi thogs pa mi mngal ba'i thugs rje che na po'i sems rgya cher yongasu rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi tshig gya nom pa 'di dag smraso// / na mo rat+na tra yA
321a6(rgyud): yad na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shA rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba ban d+ha na tshad na ka rA ya/ sarba pA ba sa mu dr-i ts+tsho Sha Na ka rA ya/ sarba byA d+hi pra sha ma naka
321a7(rgyud): rA ya/ sarba i t+yu ba dra bi nA sha naM ka rA ya/ sar+b+ba b+he yeSh+Ta tA ra NA ka rA ya/ tas+ya/ na mas+thi tA i daM Ar+ya ba lo ki ta shwa rA ya/ ta ba nI la kany+dza na ma bar ma hr-i da ya/ mA brta yi ShA mo/ sarba ar+tha/ 
321a8(rgyud): sA d+ha nAM/ shu b+hai tsa ta nAM/ sarba b+hU tA nAM/ pA ba mArga bi sho d+ha ki/ tad+ya thA/ A lo taM/ a d+hi be ti/ lo ka sa ti krAn+ta/ ai h+ye hi ma hA bo d+hi satwA/ he bo d+hi satwA/ he ma hA bo d+ha satwA/ haM pri ya bo d+hi satwa/ 
321b1(rgyud): haM pat+na ka ru Ni ka ma hA s+pha ra hr-i da yaM/ e h+ye hi Ar+yA ba po ki ti shwa rA ya/ ba ra ma me tri tsit+ta kA rA Ni ka ru ku ru/ karmA sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bid+yAn da hi de hi/ me a re ga ma bi tsa ga ma/ sid d+ha yo
321b2(rgyud): gI shwa re/ du hu du tsu bIr+ye ne mahA bi n+yan+te/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ren+da shwa rA/ tsa la tsa la kha mi la mU NaM/ e r+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra/ dzi na kr-iny+dza dza nA mu ku nA/ a ma kr-i ta sha rI ra/ la~M ba bral ba'i la bam
321b3(rgyud): sing shud+d+ha d+hi ra/ ba la ba la ma hA ba la/ ma la ma la ma hA ma la/ tsa la tsa la ma hA tsa la/ kr-iSh+Na baH/ kr-iSh+Ta pak+Sha/ kr-iSh+Ta bA sha/ nam+b+ha ta na he pad+ma hasta/ tsa ra tsa ran shrI re/ shwa re kr-iSh+Ta sarba kr-i ta yadz+nyo \u0f7f
321b4(rgyud): bA ti/ ai h+yaM hi ma hA bA rA mu kha tri pu ra da ha ne shA ra/ nA rA ya Na ba la rU pa be Sha d+ha ra/ he nI la kar+N+Na/ i h+ya hi/ ma hA ha la ha la/ bi Sha ni ri dza ta/ lo ka s+ya/ rA ga bi 'a bi nA sha na/ dr-i Sha bi Sha
321b5(rgyud): bi rA sha naM/ mo ha ba Sha bi nA sha ne/ ni mo kA Na hu lu hu lu/ muny+tsamuny+tsa/ mu hu mu du/ rA hu la rA hu la ha la ha re ma hA pad+ma na bA/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ bu d+hu bu d+hu/ Sho d+ha
321b6(rgyud): bo d+ha ya/ bo d+ha yA mi ta ba nI la kar+N+Na/ e h+ye hi nI la kat+tha/ e h+ye he bA ma s+thi ta ma hA sa ha mu kha/ he sa ha sa/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ me hAT+Ta n+yA hA s+ya/ e h+ye hi b+ho b+ho ma hA sid+d+ha yo gI shwa ra b+ha Na b+hU Na bAH
321b7(rgyud): sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bid+yAn sma re sma ra tAM/ he b+ha ga bin+ta lo ka bi lo ka ste/ ta thA ga tA nA da dA ha me daR+sha na kA ma s+ya dnga? niHpra sA d+ha ya ma swA hA/ bid+d+ha ye swA hAM/ mi hA sid+d+ha ye swA hA/ sid+d+ha yo
321b8(rgyud): gI shwa rA ya swA hA/ nI la kar+N+Na ya swA hA/ ba rA hra mu khA ya swA hA/ ma hA bA rA mu khA ya swA hA/ na ra si ha ma khA ya swA hA/ ma hA na ra si ha ma khA ye swA hA/ badz+ra hasta ya swA hA/ ma hA badz+ra hastA ya
322a1(rgyud): / swAt+ma/ sid d+ha bi d+yA d+ha rA ya swAhA/ ma hA sing d+ha bid+ya d+ha rA ya swAhA/ pad+ma hastA ya swA hA/ ma hA pad+ma hastA ya swAhA/ kr-iSh+Na sarba kr-i ta yadz+nyo pa bI tA ya swA hA/ ma hA mA la ma ku Ta d+ha rA
322a2(rgyud): ya swA hA/ tsakrA yu d+he d+ha rA ya swAh+ne/ shaM kha sheb+da na rnA da na ka rA ya swAhA/ bo d+he na ka rA ya swA/ bA ma skan d+ha de shas+tho ta kr-iSh+NI dzi nA ya swAhA/ lA ma hAsta b+ha g+hA tsarba ni bA sa nA ya swA hA/ lo
322a3(rgyud): shwa ra ya swA hA/ ma hA lo ke shwa rA ya swAhA/ sarba sid+d+hi shwa rA ya swA hA/ rakA rak+Sha mAM swA hA/ ku ru rak+Sha mArti nAM swA hA/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ Ar+yA ba lo ki ta shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya ma hA satwA
322a4(rgyud): mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sid d+hun tu me man+ta bA da ni swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugs rig sngags 'di smras
322a5(rgyud): ma thags chen po yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur/ lha rnams kyis kyang rin po che'i me tog char mngon par bab bar gyur/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang
322a6(rgyud): rdza su thugs dgyes par gyur/ lha'i bdud dang mu stegs can rnams ni 'jigs shing sngangs nas pu zing zhes byed par gyur// 'khor 'dus pa mang po thams cad las kha cig gis ni rgyun
322a7(rgyud): tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur/ kha cigs ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur/ kha tsog gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur/ kha cig gis ni dgra
322a8(rgyud): bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur/ kha cig gis ni sa dang po dang sa gnyis pa dang sa gsum pa dang sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa thob par gyur nas/ sa bcu pa'i bar du thob par gyur/ sin
322b1(rgyud): tshad med pa snyed ni byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// de nas tshangs pa chen stan las langs te/ gos chags bcos nas gus par thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
322b2(rgyud): dpa' chen po spyan ros gathogs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smra so// kye skyes bu chen po lag so// bdagis sngon 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus pa tshad med pa snyed dag tu chos
322b3(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs dang / gzungs rnam pa sna tshogs thos par gyur mod kyi/ sngon chad nam yang thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po'i sems kyi gzungs chen po'i rig sngags kyi tshig
322b4(rgyud): gya nom pa 'di lta bu thos par ma gyur na/ skyes bu chen po khyod kyis bdag la gzungs 'di'i dbyings kyi mtshan nyid rgya cher bsha du gsol/ bdag cag 'khor mang po rnams shin tu thos pa
322b5(rgyud): moso// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis tshangs pa tshan chol smras pa/ lha'i rgyal po khyod thabs mkhas pas/ sems can zad la phan gdags pa'i
322b6(rgyud): phyir de skad du nges pa yin pas/ dang khyod legs par nyon cog dang bdag gis khyod la mdo tsam zhig bshad par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug smras pa/ de na
322b7(rgyud): snying rje chen po'i sems yin/ mnyam pa'i sems yin/ mdus ma byas kyi sems yin/ mngon par zhen pa med pa'i sems yin/ stang nyid du lta ba'i sems yin/ gus pa'i sems
322b8(rgyud): yin/ dam pa'i sems yin// 'dres pa med pa'i sems yin/ bla na meng ba'i byang chub kyi sems yin te/ nga lta bu'i sems gang yin pa de dag ni gzungs kyi mtshan nyid yin par rig
323a1(rgyud): / par bya ste/ khyod kyis 'di kho na bzhin du mngon par sgrub par bya'o// tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen pos smras pa/ bdag cag 'khor mang po rnams ni deng gdod gzungs 'di
323a2(rgyud): mtshan nyid gang yin pa khong du chud par 'gyur bas dang phyin chad yongasu gzungs nas brjed par bgyid pa'i thugs mi thu'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras
323a3(rgyud): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongasu 'dzin pa gang yin pa des byang chub kyi sems rgya chen po bskyed nas/ sems can zad yongs mya ngan
323a4(rgyud): 'das par dam bca' yang dag par blangs par byam bdag nyid gse sbyong dang tshul khrims la gnas nas sems can rnams la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed/ rtag par ri
323a5(rgyud): sngags 'di rgyun chang ba med par gdon par bya'o// gnas khang gtsang mo'i nang du 'dug ste/ yongasu dag par khru sa byas nas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ ba dan spyangs ma
323a6(rgyud): me spar te/ spos dang / me tog dang / zhal zas kyi mchod pa byas nas sems rtse gcig tu gtad/ dmigs pa tha dad pa gzhan la mi dmigs par chos bzhin du 'don cing yongasu
323a7(rgyud): 'dzin par byang na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' nyi 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od lha dang / drang srong tshad med pa snyed dag der lhags nas dbang byed cing mngon rtags kyang ston/ 
323a8(rgyud): par gyur la/ bdag kyang de'i tshe mig stong gis de la ltar bar byed/ lag pa stong gis ni de la yongasu srung zhing byin gyis rloms par byed pas 'jig rten pa'i gtsug lag ji snyed
323b1(rgyud): pa de dag kyang yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur/ mu stegs can gyi chos kyi cho ga dang / sprang ji snyed pa thams cad kyang rtogs shing khong du chud par 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'di 'don ci
323b2(rgyud): yongasu 'dzin par byed pa gang yin pa des ni 'jig rten na gdon nad pa rnam pa brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa dag gsos nas 'tsho bar byed// 'di srin thams cad la dbang byed cing lho
323b3(rgyud): bu'i 'dud rnams kyang 'dul bar byed/ mu stegs can rnams kyang tshar gcod par byed// gal te ri 'am dgon ma na gnas te mdo sde kha ton du 'don pa dang bsam gtan sbos bo na ri'i lha
323b4(rgyud): dang / 'di srin gnod pa byed pa dag nan gyis rkyal ka byas nas sems mnyam par gzhag tu ma rung bar gyur/ rig sngags 'di lan cig bzlas pa byas na 'di srid de dag thams
323b5(rgyud): 'chi bar 'gyuraro// gal te chos bzhin du bzlas brjo byas te/ sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i sems ba skyed par gyur na/ bdag kyang de'i tshe dge ba'i lha dang / 
323b6(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po tha~Mng dang / lag na rdo rje gsang ba pa rnams la rtag par de'i rje su 'brang zhing yongasu srung bgyis shig/ der nyo 'khor na gnas nas mig gis 'bras bu bzhin du yongasu
323b7(rgyud): bsrungs shig/ rang gi srog dbang po bzhin du yongasu skyobs shig ces bsgo bar 'gyuraro// gang dag la bsgo bar byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshogasu bcang smras pa/ bdag gis gsang ba
323b8(rgyud): bdag po rdo rje 'chang // bdud rtsi 'khyil ba sme gcig lcags kyu can// stobs ldan shang ka ra dang sde brkyang dag/ btang na rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed// dag gis dbang phyug dang
324a1(rgyud): // ni mthu chen dang // ku bi ra dang ser skya'i bdag po dag/ btang nas rtag tu gzung 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag gis nor srung dang ni chu lha dang / dge rgyas dang ni pa ra tsa tra dag/ btang nas
324a2(rgyud): rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed // bdag gisa~M sa sar tsa dang ma hA ra// ku lan tan ta dang ni lngas rtsen dag/ btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag gis bi baM ka la'i rgyal po da
324a3(rgyud): dpal ldan byi ta dang ni swe ra hA rA/ btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag gis tshangs pa dang ni saM ba ra/ gnas gtsang sde lnga dag dang mtsham dag/ btang nas rtag tu gzungs
324a4(rgyud): 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag gis brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum lha/ spobs chen dpal ldan dang no sa ta na// btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag gi rgyal po yul 'dra
324a5(rgyud): srung dang ni// ma mo lha la sogs pa mthu chen 'khor// tang nas rtag tu gzus 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag gi rgya la po 'phags skyes po dang ni/ mig mi gzang dang rnam thos
324a6(rgyud): bu dag kyang // btas nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin par byed/ bdag gis gser mdog rma bya'i rgyal po dang / sde dpon nyi shu brgyad dang drang srong 'khor// btang nas rtag tu gzung 'dzin srung bar byed/ 
324a7(rgyud): bdag gis nor bu bzang po dag dang ni/ sde dpon chen pos 'dzin bu la ba/ btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag gis dga' bo dang ni bsnyen dga' bo// klu rgyal rgya mtsho dang ni a
324a8(rgyud): la'i 'dab// btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed// bdagis lha ma yin dang dri za dang // mkha' lding mi 'am lto 'phye rnams// btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed// 
324b1(rgyud): bdag gis chu dang me dang glog gi lha/ grul bum bdag po dang ni sha za dag/ btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed// dge ba'i lha de dag dang klu'i rgyal po dang ma mo la sogs pa de dag kya
324b2(rgyud): so so nas 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa/ mthu chen po dang ldan pa'i gnod sbyin dag gis kyang rtag par thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'don cing yengasu srung zhing skyob par byed pas/ gang zag
324b3(rgyud): de ri dang dgod pa na gcig pu nyal bar gyur pa ra yang dge ba'i lha de dag ras kyi mtshan mos de la bsrungs nas bgegs dang bar chad yongasu sel bar byed// gal te gcong rong dag du
324b4(rgyud): gnas de sam ster bar gyur pa las rig sngags 'di bzlas par gyur na de'i dbang gis dge ba'i lha dang / klu'i rgya la po dag dge ba'i me'i gzugasu mngon par sprul nas lam
324b5(rgyud): yang dag pa nyid ston par 'gyuraro// gal te dang nag sa tshal dang dgon pa dag tu gnas pa las chu dang ma zin na/ sa phongs par gyur na yang klu'i rgyal po dag gis yongasu su
324b6(rgyud): ba'i phyir chu dang ma ngag mngon par sprul par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzhan yang gzungs 'di 'don cing yongasu 'dzin pa dag gi ched du
324b7(rgyud): gnod pa dang bgags yongasu bas la ba'i phyir shin tu bsil ba'i tshog su btsad pa 'di dag smraso// gang zhig ri dang 'brog dgon song ba las/ stag dang spyang ki gcan zad gtum pa
324b8(rgyud): dang / rtsangs pa sprul dang 'dre srin phrad gyur kyang // gzungs 'di 'don pa zos na gnod mi nus/ gang shig chu bo rgya mtshor zhugs pa las/ gdug pa'i klu dang chu srin ma rungs dang / gnod smra
325a1(rgyud): srin po nya dang rus sbal dag/ gzungs 'di thos nas so sor 'bang bar 'gyur// gang zhig g.yul spyod dgra yis bskor ba'am/ chos rkun ma rungs nong ni bregs pa'i cha
325a2(rgyud): rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs na/ de dag brtse sems bskyed nas ldog par 'gyur// gang zhig rgyal po'i gyad las thogs pa dang / lcag sgrog khang spyil brtson ra re chud pa'i tshe/ 
325a3(rgyud): rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/ rgyal pos brtse sems kyis ni gtong bar 'gyur// gang zhig byang snyems dug mda'i khrim zhugs te/ zas skem dug can gyis na bsang
325a4(rgyud): pa'i tshe/ rtse gcig thugs rje chen pa'i gzungs bzlas na// dug nyid zil dang zas skom nyid 'gyur// bud med sbrum ma bu ni btsa' bo'i tshe// bdud kyi 'gegs byas sdug bsngal mi bco
325a5(rgyud): tsher rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/ 'di gdon byer nas bde bar bca' bar 'gyur/ kA gang na gtum pos gdug pa'i dbugs btang bas/ tsha ba'i
325a6(rgyud): nad kyis nyen nas 'ching nyi tshe/ rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/ rims nang bsal nas tshe ni ring bar 'gyur/ klu gdon rgyu bas gtses te spangs pa dang / shu 'bras
325a7(rgyud): mi bzad dag khrag 'dzag pa'i tshe// rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na// mchil ma lan gsum dbyugs pas skrangs pa zhi// sems can rtog pas mi dge bskyed pas na
325a8(rgyud): byad stems sngags dang dgras ni gtsas pa'i tshe/ rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/ snyems gnod kun gtong pa'i mag la 'du/ sdig 'phel snyigs mis dmachos
325b1(rgyud): 'jig pa na/ 'dod pa'i me chen sems ni rmongs log pas// khyod shug so sor gzhan la 'dod zhen nas// nyin mtshan log bsam rgyun ni mi 'chad che/ gang zhig thugs rje chen
325b2(rgyud): po'i gzungs bzlas na// 'dod pa'i me zhi log pa'i sems bsal 'gyur// bdag gis gzungs 'di'i mthu stobs rgyas brjod na/ bskal par brjod kyang mthar thug yong mi 'gyur// 
325b3(rgyud): rig sngags 'di lan lnga bzlas te tshen snga lnga'i skud pa la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi mdud nas mgul du gdags par bya'o// gzungs 'di ni 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang+ga'i klung gi
325b4(rgyud): bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rnal 'byor pa gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug mngon par bsgrub pa yongasu
325b5(rgyud): ma rdzogs pa yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / byang chub tu sems ma skyed pa dag myur du byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya ba'i phyir dang / nyan thos kyi gang zag gang dag
325b6(rgyud): 'bras bu mngon du ma byas pa de dag myur du mngon du bya ba'i phyir stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na drang srong gang dag bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed pa dag
325b7(rgyud): myur du sems skyed par bya ba'i phyir dang / seM ni gang dag theg pa chen po 'ad la dad par dbang po ma thob pa dag gzungs 'di'i byin gyis brlabs kyi mthus thog pa chen po'i sa bon dang chos
325b8(rgyud): kyi myu gu 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin pas thabs mkhas pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje'i mthus pa dag gis ci dang ci 'dod pa thams cad 'byor par byed// gzhan yang stong
326a1(rgyud): / gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mun pa mun nag gi gnas ngan 'gro gsum po'i sems can ji snyed gnas pa dag bdag gis rig sngags 'di tho bar gyur
326a2(rgyud): thad sdug bsngal dang bral bar 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sa dang po ma thob pa dag ni myur du thob par 'gyur la// sa bcu pa'i bar du yang ma thob pa thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang
326a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar du yang byin par byed pa'i phyir mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byadang brgyad cu yang rang gi ngang gis 'thob par 'gyuraro// gal te nyan thos kyi gang zag gang dag gzungs
326a4(rgyud): rna bar lan cig thos par gyur tam/ gzungs 'di spyod cing yi gar bris sam/ drang mo'i sems kyi chos bzhin du gnas par byed na/ dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi po dag ma btsal bar rang
326a5(rgyud): gi nga gis thob par 'gyur// steng gsum gyi stong chen bo'i 'jig rten gyi khams na ring / mu k+Shu dang / brag dang / phywa mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu ji snyed pa dag kyang g.yo zhing 'khol
326a6(rgyud): bar nuso// ri rab lhun po nas ri khor yug gi bar dag kyang g.yo zhing rdul phran bzhin du 'jig par nus// de na gnas pa'i sems can ji snyed pa dag kyang thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub
326a7(rgyud): tu sems bskyed par nuso// sems can gang dag tshe 'di nyid la smon pa rnams mngon par 'grub par 'dod na zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du gso sbyong dang / tshul khrims la gnas nas gzungs
326a8(rgyud): 'di bzlas brjod byas la gdon mi za bar smon pa rnams kyang mngon par 'grub par 'gyur// 'khor ba'i mtha' nas 'khong ba'i mthar thug pa'i bar du yang sdig pa'i las zad pa lus
326b1(rgyud): bar yongasu 'byung bar 'gyuraro// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i nang dang phyi rol na sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' ji skad cig bzhugs pa rnams dang / tshangs pa
326b2(rgyud): brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha dang / drang srong dang / klu'i rgyal po ji snyed gnas pa thams cad kyis kyang mkhyen cing shes par 'gyuraro// lha 'am mi gang yang rung ste/ gzungs 'di
326b3(rgyud): 'don cing yongasu 'dzin pa de dag chu klung ngam/ rgya mtshor zhugs te khras byas pa las de na gnas pa'i sems can de dag de dag gis lus bkrus pa'i chus lus la reg par gyur na/ sdig pa'i
326b4(rgyud): las dang kha na ma tho ba lci ba zad yongasu byed nas zhing yongs dag pa dag tu pong+ga las 'ardzus te spyi bar 'gyur bas mngal dang / drang gsher dang / sgo nga las skyes pa'i lus len par mi 'gyur na len
326b5(rgyud): pa dang 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don pa lta smos kyang ci dges/ gzungs 'di 'don cing yong su 'dzin pa de dag lam du zhugs te 'gro ba'i tshe rlung chen po langs te/ 
326b6(rgyud): gang zag de'i lus dang / spu dang / skra dang / gos la bus pa'i rlung gang yin pa de rdzi phyogasu song ba'i sems can gzhan gyi lus la reg par gyur na// de dag gi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa'i las ci nga
326b7(rgyud): thad ma lus par yongasu 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ yang ngan 'gro gsum po dag gi rnam par smin pa myong bar mi 'gyur zhing / rtag par sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur bas na yongs
326b8(rgyud): 'dzin pa dag gi bsod nams dang 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bya'o// gsungs 'di bzlas brjod byed pa'i khan mo ji tsam tshig tu brjod par byung ba
327a1(rgyud): // dge yang rung / mi dge yang rung ste/ lha'i bu'i bdud dang / mu stegs can dang / lha da k+Sha dang / 'dre srid thad kyis thos par gyur na de dag thams cad rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyil
327a2(rgyud): nyid du 'gyur bas/ de la sangs rgyas ji lta ba bzhin du gus pa'i sems bskyed nas bkur sti deng rim gro byed par 'gyuraro// gzungs 'di 'don cing yongasu 'dzin pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi
327a3(rgyud): sku'i gtang nyid rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed rnams kyis pangs shing gnas par mdzad pa'i phyir// gang zag de ni/ 'od can gyi lus kyi
327a4(rgyud): gter yin par rig par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi 'od zer gyis sdang bar mdzad pa'i phyir// gang za gad ni byams pa dang / snying rje'i gter yin pa bya ste/ 'a
327a5(rgyud): ltar gzungs kyi sems can yongasu skyob par byed pa'i phyiraro// gang zag de ni dam pa'i chos kyi sde snod yin par rig/ par bya ste/ gzungs kyi sgo thad kun sdud par byed pa'i phyir
327a6(rgyud): gang zag de ni bsam gtan dang / ting 'dzin gyi sde snod yin par rig par bya ste/ ting 'dzin brgya steng rnams rtag par mngon sum du gyur pa'i phyiro// gang zag de ni na mkha'i mdzod pa
327a7(rgyud): par rig par bya ste/ rtag par stong pa nyid kyi shes rab kyi sems can la blta ba'i phyiraro// gang zag de ni 'dzags pa med pa'i mdzod par rig par bya ste/ lha dang / klu dang dge ba'i lha rnam
327a8(rgyud): rtag par yongasu srung ba'i phyir// gang zag de ni dam pa'i tshig gi mdzod yin par rig par bya ste/ kha nas gzungs kyi sgra 'thung ba la rgyun chad pa med pa'i phyir// gang zag de ni rtag par
327b1(rgyud): gnas pa'i gter yin par rig par bya ste/ 'jig pa gsum gyi bskal pa dag gis gzhig par mi nus pa'i phyir// gang zag de ni rnam par grol ba'i mdzod yin par rig par bya ste/ 
327b2(rgyud): bu'i bdud dang mu stegs can gyis bshol bar mi nus pa'i phyir// gang zag de ni sman gyi rgyal po'i mdzod yin par rig par bya ste/ rtag par gzungs kyi sems can pa rnams kyi nang gal 'a
327b3(rgyud): phyiro// gang zag de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi gter yin par rig par bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam su rgyu ba la rang dbang thob pa'i phyi'o// de bas na gang zag de'i snyen gyi bsngags pa brjod na nams kyang
327b4(rgyud): mthar thug par mi 'gyur// rigs kyi bu gang la la zhog 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal gyis yongasu skyo nas tshe ring ba'i sman yongasu tshol bar 'dod pas dben pa'i gan su 'dug nas ma
327b5(rgyud): yengasu dag par ba de/ gos la sngags kyis btan nasamag par bya'i// chu dang zas dang spos dang smad drabs la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste spyod bar byed/ 
327b6(rgyud): gdodan mi za bang tshe ring bar 'gyur// gal te chos bzhin du mtshams bcad do// chos bzhin du yong su 'dzid par byed na thad mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/ de la mtshams bcad pa'i tshi
327b7(rgyud): ni rang gi la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/ sa la ri mo bris nas mtshams bcad par byed// yod na na gtsang ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas phyogs
327b8(rgyud): bzhir gtor nas mtshams bcad par ba'o// yang na yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste phyogs bzhir gtong nas mtshams bcad par bya'o// yang na 'du shes
328a1(rgyud): / kyis gang du phyin pa tshun tshad mtsham su 'gro'o// yang na thal ba gtsang mal lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste mtshams bcad par bya'o// yang mtshan sA lnga'i srung
328a2(rgyud): ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste phyogs bzhir bskor nas mtshams bcad par bya'o// de ltar chos bzhin du 'di yongasu 'dzin par gyur no rang gi rang gis 'bras bu thob
328a3(rgyud): par 'gyur// gzungs 'di'i mang thos pa tsam gyis kyang bskal pa tshad med pa snyed kyi 'khor ba'i kha na mtho ba'i lci ba rnams yong su 'byung bar 'gyur na/ 'don pa dang 'dzin pa lta smos kya
328a4(rgyud): ci dgos/ rig sngags 'di 'don pa'i gang zag gang yin pa de dag ni sangs rgyas tshad med pa snyed la mchod cing rim go byas nas dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya cher bskyed pa yin par rig par
328a5(rgyud): bya'o// gang dag sems can sdug bsngal gyi bgags la yongasu 'dren pa'i chang du ba chos bzhon du 'don pa gang yin pa de dag ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin pas
328a6(rgyud): ring por mi thogs par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur 'ar rig par bya'o// ci tsam du sems can sna // cog tsha du bzlas brjod byas te/ de dag gi rna lam du grags par
328a7(rgyud): byas nas byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur bar byed na/ gang zag de dag yon chad med dpag tu med pa dag 'tho'i par 'gyur pas brjod kyis mo lang so// gang la la zhig sems rtse gcig tu sem
328a8(rgyud): dang lus gso sbyong dang tshul khrims la gnas nas/ sen thaMd kyi sngon gyi las kyi kha na ma tho ba rnams bshags nas bdag nyid kyis bskal pa tshad med pa nas byas pa'i sdig pa'i
328b1(rgyud): las rnam pa sna tshogs 'grol bshags te/ kha nas gzungs 'di myur du bzlas brjod byas na/ dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi po de dag tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// dbang po rnon po
328b2(rgyud): rab dang ldan pa sgom pa'i thabs la mkhas pa zhig yin na ni sa bcu'i 'bras bu yang dka' ba med par 'gyur na/ 'jig rten gyi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa phrad tshegs yongasu
328b3(rgyud): gnyer ba mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po dang / smon lam gyi mthu shin tu zab pa'i phyir dang / gzungs 'di'i byin gyis
328b4(rgyud): brlabs shin tu rgya che ba'i phyir// bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ yul gang dag na gnod pa byung bar gyur na de'i tshe yang de'i rgyal pos yang dag pa'i chos kyis
328b5(rgyud): yul 'dzin cing mi rnams bag yangasu bkod/ seMn snyams las mi gcod cing / nyes pa byung ba rnams yong su sbyangs nas nyid mtshan bdun gyi bar du lus dang sem
328b6(rgyud): kyi brtson 'grus bskyed/ thugs rje chen po'i sems kyi gzung sngags 'di 'don par byed na/ yul de'i gnod pa dang / bgegs thaMd yongasu bsal bar 'gyur/ 'bru rnams legs shing
328b7(rgyud): mi mang po bde bar 'ogyuraro// gzhan yang phas kyi rgol ba'i dge dag yang nas yang du 'ongs te gtses pas 'bangs mang po bde bar gyur tam/ blon po chen ngos rku bshams nas
328b8(rgyud): log par gyur tam// rims nad byung bar gyur tam/ than chen byung bar gyur tam/ nyi zla rgyu ba nor bar gyur tam/ de lta bu la sogs par gnod pa byung bar gyur na/ de'i tshe snying rje chen
329a1(rgyud): // po dang ldan pa'i mig stong ba'i gzugs byas nas der phyog su kha bstan te spos dang / me tog dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rin po che'i bA re rnam pa sna tshogs dang / ro
329a2(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i zas dang skom gyis sems rtsa gcig tu mchod par bya'o// gzhan yang rgyal po des nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus bskyed/ gzungs kyi chog
329a3(rgyud): gya nom pa 'di 'don par byed/ phas kyi dgra rnams cang dul bar gyur nas slar log ste/ so so nas tshul bzhin du yul skyong zhing yul yang 'dre bar gnas par byams pa'i sems
329a4(rgyud): kyi phan tshun gcig la gcig blta bar 'gyur/ rgyal bu dang blon po rnams kyang sri zhu dang drang dkan spyod par 'gyur// btsun mo dang sras rnams kyang rgyal po la sr-i zhu dang bsnyen bku
329a5(rgyud): byed par 'gyur// lha dang klu dang 'dre srin rnams kyang yul de srung zhing skyong bar 'gyur/ char chu dus bzhin du 'ja cing 'bru rnams legs pas mi mang po rnams kyang
329a6(rgyud): rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang khyim du nad chen ma rungs pa dang phrad par gyur tam/ ltas ngan sna tshogs byung bar gyur tam/ 'di srin dang log pa'i bdud rnams kyis
329a7(rgyud): khyim dkrugs par gyur tam/ mi ma rungs pa dag gis klang skur btab nas rku bshams te gnod pa byas par gyur tam/ khyim mi chachung rnams phyi nang mi 'dum par gyur na/ snying
329a8(rgyud): rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mig stong pa'i gzugs byas pa'i mdun du dkyil 'khor byas nas sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yod la byas
329b1(rgyud): nas gzungs sngags 'di lan stong tshang bar bzlas na/ gong du smos pa'i dngos po ngan pa de dag thams cad yongasu 'byung bar 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan kun dga' bos
329b2(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'da'i ming ci lag/ ji ltar yongasu bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rig sngags 'di
329b3(rgyud): la ming rnam pa sna tshogs yod/ rgya cher yong su rdzogs pa zhes kyang bya'o// thogs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po zhes kyang bya'o// sdug bsngal rnams las yongasu skyob pa'i gzus
329b4(rgyud): zhes kyang bya'o// tshe sring ba'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o// ngan 'gro yongasu sbyong ba'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o// las kyi slob pa rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o// smon
329b5(rgyud): pa rnams yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o// sems kyi rjesu rang dbang du gyur pa'i gzungs te/ sa kyang bya'o// sa gong ma rnams las myur du 'dar
329b6(rgyud): ba'i gzungs zhes pa'o// de ltar yongasu bzungs par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa
329b7(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'di'i ming ci lags na/ 'di lta bu'i gzungs bstan pa la mkhas pa der gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sem da
329b8(rgyud): 'di'i ming ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces kyang bya'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes kyang bya'o// rang stong pa'i mig can zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' spyad ngas
330a1(rgyud): // gzigs dang phyug 'do'i ming dang gzi byin dang mthu stobs ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad med pa'i snga rol nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas
330a2(rgyud): mtshan yang de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag pa'i chos kyi snang ba zhes bya bar gyur pa yid yang / thugs rje chen po dang smen lam gyi mthus sems can bde bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i
330a3(rgyud): lus mngon du bstan pa yin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor mang po khyod dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / lha dang / klu rnams kyis gus pas bkur sti byas nas
330a4(rgyud): brnyas par mi bya'o// lha dang mi zad kyis rtag par mchod par byas te/ sems rtse gcig tu mang nas brjod par byed na bsod nams tshad med pa rnyed 'thob par 'gyur/ kha na ma the ba tshang
330a5(rgyud): med pa snyed yongasu 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshe 'das nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi zhing khamasu skye bar 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ kun
330a6(rgyud): dga' bo gal te rin po che sna tshogs phun sum tshogs shing phyug bor 'gyur bar 'dod na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'o lag la mchod po bya'o// mi bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtsas par gyur
330a7(rgyud): na zhags pa thogs pa'i lag la mchod// khor bar nad rnams yod par gyur na rin po che'i lhung bzed thogs pa'i lag la mcho do// 'di gdon thams cad gdul bar 'dod na rin po che ri ral
330a8(rgyud): gr-i thogs pa'i lag la mchod// lha'i bu'i bdud zad 'dul bar 'dod na rdo rje thogs pa'i lag la mchod// mig mi gsal te 'od dang mi ldan par gyur na me shel gyi nor bu thags pa'i lag
330b1(rgyud): la mchod// cha ba'i rims kyi thebs te bsil bar 'dod rin po che'i mnga' thogs pa'i lag la mchod// blon thabs 'thon por 'dod na rin po che'i gzhu thogs pa'i lag la mchod// grogs
330b2(rgyud): po mdza' bshes dang byur du phrad par 'dod na rin po che'i mdar thogs pa'i lag la mchodado// lus la nang sna tshogs kyi thebs par gyur na lcug me thogs pa'i lag la mchod// lus kyi
330b3(rgyud): bgegs ma rus pa bsal bar 'dod na rnga yab dkar po thogs pa'i lag la mchod// thams cad 'thun pa'i 'khor du gyur par 'dod na bu pa thogs pa'i lag la mchod// stag dang
330b4(rgyud): 'bar spyad dang ngos deng gcan zan ma rungs pa thang spong bar 'dod na phung thogs pa'i lag la mchod// gnas dang dus thang du rgyal po'i bgegs las thar bar 'dong dgra sta thogs pa
330b5(rgyud): lag pa mchod// bu dang bu mo dang g.yegs 'khor gyi phyi ni shel gyi gagu 'khor thogs pa'i lag la mchod/ yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phyir ni pad+mo dkang po thogs
330b6(rgyud): pa'i lag la mchod// phyogs bcu'i zhing yongasu dag pa dag tu skye bar 'dod na pad+mo sngon po thogs pa'i lag la mcho // shes rab chen po dang ldan par 'dod na rin po che'i me long tha
330b7(rgyud): ba'i lag la mchod// phyogs ban+de ri de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mngon sum du mthong bar 'dod na pad+ma dmar po thogs pa'i lag la mched// sa'i gter 'byin par 'dod na rin po che
330b8(rgyud): za ma tog thogs pa'i lag la mchodado// drang srong gi lamangon par 'grub par 'did na sprin sna lnga thog pa'i lag la mchod// tshangs par skye bar 'dod na ril ba thogs pa'i lag la mchod
331a1(rgyud): // lha'i gzhal med khang du skye bar 'dod na pad+ma lel rgan thogs pa'i lag la mchod// phyogs gzhan gyi dag phyir rgol babasal ba 'dod na ral gri dang mdung bogs pa'i lag la mo
331a2(rgyud): dge ba'i lha 'di thang dgug par 'dod na rin po che'i dung thogs pa'i lag la mchodado// lha 'di thams cad 'khol bar 'dod na thod pa'i khar thogs pa'i lag la mchod// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
331a3(rgyud): myur du gshegs nas phyag gis byug par 'dod na bgrang phreng 'dzin pa'i lag la mchodo// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs mchog dam thad mngon par grub par 'dod na rin po che'i dril bu thogs pa'i lag la
331a4(rgyud): mched// tshig gi spobs pa gya nom pa dang ldan pa 'dod na rin po che'i phyag rgya thogs pa'i lag la mchod// dge ba'i lha dang klu rnams rtag par 'ongs te srung zhing yongasu spyag par 'dzin
331a5(rgyud): lcags kyu thogs pa'i lag la mchod// byams pa dang snying rjes sems can thad yongasu skyob par 'dod na mkha sol pogs pa'i lag la mchod// sems can zad kyis rta
331a6(rgyud): par phan tshun gus pas bsnyen bkur byed cing brtse bar sems par 'dod thal mo sbyar ba'i lag la mchod// skye ba'i skye gnas thams cad de bzhin bshegs pa rnams kyang mi 'bral
331a7(rgyud): bar 'dod na sprul pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa'i lag la mchod// skye ba'i tshe rangs tha~Mdu rtag par de bzhin gshegs po'i pho brang du gnas nas mngal gyi snying por mi 'gyur bar 'dod na
331a8(rgyud): sprul pa'i gzhil med khang thogs pa'i lag la mchodo// mang du thos pa'i shes rgya chen po dang ldan par 'dod na rin po cher mdo sde glags pa ma thogs pa'i lag la mchod// da ltar gyi lu
331b1(rgyud): 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi sku la thug pa'i bar rtag par byang chub sems las log par mi 'gyur bar 'dod na phyir mi ldog pa'i gser gyi 'khor lo thogs pa'i lag la mchodado// phyogs
331b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams myur du gshegs nas spyi bo nas phyag gis byugs te lung bstan par 'dod na spyi bo na sprul pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa'i lag la mchod// shing thog dang 'bru rnams
331b3(rgyud): grub par 'dod na dgun 'brum thogs pa'i lag la mchod// de ltar mngon par sgrub pa'i cho ga stong yod kyang dang mdor bsdus nas mdo tsam zhig bstan pa yino// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
331b4(rgyud): kun dga' bo khyod kyis shin tu yongasu dad pa'i sems kyis gzungs 'di zung la 'dzam+bu'i glang du rgya cher yongasu spel nas rgyun mi 'tshad par bya'o// gzungs 'di khams gsum gyi sems can
331b5(rgyud): kyis nyon mongs pa dang la rgya tshar pan 'dogs par byed pa sa gzungs 'angs yongasu g.yos ni mi 'tsho ba gang yang mad rig sngags chen mo 'ongs shing skam po la btal na yang yal
331b6(rgyud): ga dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu skye bar 'gyur na rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i sems can lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ sems can nad kyis thebs pa rnams gsos na mi 'tsho ba'i
331b7(rgyud): gnas nges par mdo// rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di'i byin gyis brlangs dang mthu bas gyis mi khyab pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsngags pa brjod kyang mthang thug par mi 'gyur// sngon 'das
331b8(rgyud): ba'i dus yun ring po nas dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya cher 'gyed pa ma yin na tha na 'di'i ming tsam yang thos par mi 'gyur na mngon du mthong ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ lha dang mi dang klu la sogs pa'i 'khor ma
332a1(rgyud): // po khyang rnams ngas gzungs 'di'i sngags pa brjod pa thos nas thaMd kyis rjesu yid rang bar bya'o// gang la la zhig gis rig sngags 'di la bskur pa btab par gyur na gang+ga'i klung bye ba phrag
332a2(rgyud): dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas de dag la skur ba btab par 'gyuraro// gal te gzungs 'di lo the tsom dang yid mi ches pa skyes par gyur na/ gang zag de ni phan yon chen po dang gtan du 'bral
332a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur bas bskal pa brgya stong snyed du dran 'gror 'khor zhing 'byung ba'i dus med/ rtag par sangs rgyas kyang mi mthong / chos kyang mi thos/ dag 'dun yang bzeng bar mi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ 
332a4(rgyud): 'khor dang 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha dang klu dang / 'dra srin
332a5(rgyud): thad bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs 'di'i sngags pa rjod pa thos nas/ zad kyis rab tu dga' zhing mgu bar bka yang dag par blangs nas mngon par sgrub par gyur to// de nas bya
332a6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' nyi 'dra kyis thugs rje chen po'i gzungs 'dzin pa dag yongasu srung ba'i chang du rig sngags chen po 'di smras// / na me bud d+ha gu ra De/ na mo d+harmA ma hA ti/ na maHsa g+hA ya Na~M/ 
332a7(rgyud): tri bu pi sa tru ne na ma/ rig sngags 'di bton na kha na mtho ba thams cad yongasu 'byung bar 'gyur/ bdud spong bar byed/ bgegs rnams sel bar 'gyur bas lan ra btin nas sangs rgyas la
332a8(rgyud): phyag 'tshal la ni re bya'o// de bzhin du nyan de bzhin dus gsum du rig sngags bzlas nas sangs rgyas la phyag byas na/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skye bzed du yid du 'ong ba'i mtshan shin tu mdzes
332b1(rgyud): par re rer 'bras bu rnam par smin pa thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od kyis kyang rnal 'byor pa dag yongs srung ba'i phyir gzungs 'di smra so// sin ti te soSh+Tha/ adz+nyA mi ta sa rba
332b2(rgyud): sin khi ta ba liM tiSh+Tha/ ya mi d+hU ta oM d+huSh+Ta/ ku la toSh+Tha kha~M maiSh+Te swA hA/ rig sngags 'di lan lnga bzlas nas tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la sngags mdud byas te/ gang du na bar gdags par bya'o// rig sdig
332b3(rgyud): 'di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung bzhi bcu'i bye me snyed kyis gsungs pa yin pas dang bdag gis kyang rnal 'byung ba dge yongasu srung ba'i phyir dang / bgegs thams cad yongasu bsal ba
332b4(rgyud): phyir dang / nad ma rungs pa thaMd yongasu bsal ba'i byar dang / dge ba'i chos zad yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / 'jigs shing skrag pa zang yongasu spang ba'i phyir bstan pa yi no// bcom ldan
332b5(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub se mas dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugs bstan pa'i tshi/ sngags 'di ni yang dag par bden te mi bden pa ci yang med// 
332b6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i drung du 'ong bar 'dod ni gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab te bsregs na byang chub sems dpa' 'ong bar 'gyur// gang la lo zhig byi la'i gdon gyi
332b7(rgyud): zin par gyur na byi la'i mgo rus bsregs pa'i thal ba sa gtsang ma dang bsres te/ 'jim pa la byi la'i gzugs byas nas mig stong pa'i gzugs mdud gyi du ur mo'i kr-i gtsang ma la
332b8(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/ dus bu brgya rtsa brgyad du 'chad nas sngags lan re gdon cing de'i ming nas lanar brjod na gtan 'tsho bar 'gyuraro// bad stems kyis phog par gyur na/ 
333a1(rgyud): / gu gul dang ga pur cha mnyam par byas te/ dun pa'i chu gtsang ma bre gang dang bsres nas bskol te phul gang tsam lus pa blangs na/ mig stong pa'i gzugs kyi mdun du lan
333a2(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad sdigs kyis btab ste 'thungs no 'tsho bar 'gyuro// gal te sdig pa dang sbrul gyos zin par gyur na bca' snga'i phye ma la lan 'dun sngags kyis btab ste rma khar bskus ni 'phral
333a3(rgyud): du 'tshe bar 'gyur// gal te mi ma rungs dag gis rku ba shams nas/ gnod pa byas par gyur nas gtsang ma 'am/ bag zan nam/ spra tshil la pi rol po'i gzugs bas te mig stong pa'i gzu
333a4(rgyud): kyi mdun du ur mo'i khri le lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab nas sngags kyis lan ra brjod lan re btubs nas pa ro/ la gyi ming nas brjod/ bsregs zin nas dum bu brgya rtsa brgyad
333a5(rgyud): du byas na pha rol po dgar zhing nam 'tshe bar bar du gus pas bkur zhing byams par 'gyur// gang dag mig nad kyis btab te/ mig gis 'bras bu nyams par gyur tam/ mdol
