333a6(rgyud): par gyur tam/ mi bsal bar gyur tam/ ling tog dkar po dang dmar po dag gos khebs te 'di dang mi ldan par gyur na/ a ru ra dang / ba ru ra dang / skyu ru ra 'brum bu ra zhib tu btags te/ 'thab
333a7(rgyud): pa'i tshe gtsang sbra bya dgos pas bud med gsar du bu bcas pa dang / khyi dang phag rnams bsnyen par mi bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nas brjod/ sbrang rtsi dkar po dang / mi'i 'o ma dang
333a8(rgyud): sbyar nas mig le bsku bar bya'o// 'o ma de yang bu khye'u bcas pa'i nu no rung gi bu mo btsas pa'i nu zh-i ni mi rung // sman de spyar zin nas kyang mig stong pa'i gzugs kyi mdun du lan
333b1(rgyud): rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/ mig la bskus nas zhag bdun gyi bar du khang pa dben par rlung bsrungs na mogo 'bras bu skye bar 'gyur bas ling tog sngon po dang dkar po bsal te gsal
333b2(rgyud): ba rgyas par 'gyur// yang dag gdon rnams kyis btab ste spros par gyur na/ stag dang / 'phar ba dang / spung ki'iri spags pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab te lus la 'gos na
333b3(rgyud): sos par 'gyur// gal te sbrul gyis zon par gyur na gang zin pa'i mi nga'i rna lpags blangs nas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste rma khar sman na ses par 'gyuraro// gzer thabs
333b4(rgyud): ma rungs pas snying la gzeng te 'chi la thug na ka pyi ta la ga ba tsam chu gtsang ma phul gang tsam dang sbyar te/ bskol nas phul phyed lus pa la lan 'dud sngags kyis btab ste gcig
333b5(rgyud): car smad na sos par 'gyuraro// sman te yang bud med kyi dang du bskol bar mi bya'o// ro langs kyi gdon gyis btab nas rgyud ring sun 'ar gyur gu gul la len nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags
333b6(rgyud): kyis btang ste sreg te sngar 'dug par bya'o// yang na ri bong gi rtug pa'i ril bu bdun blangs te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas ming tu bcu ga ni sos par 'gyur te/ sha dang chang nga
333b7(rgyud): bkru ba rnam pa lnga dang / tshig ngan pa rnams srung dgo so// yang na ba bla dang / yungs kar dang / lan tshwa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab te nad pa'i khri'i drang du bsregs na/ gon/ 
333b8(rgyud): de'i lus 'jigs par 'gyur bas 'dag pa'i thugs mi thung ste 'byur bar 'gyuraro// gal te gzhogs phyed na zhing rna ba dang sna sungs par gyur tam/ rkang lag sdud mi nus par gyur na ru Na
334a1(rgyud): // til mar gyi nang du bskol te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas lus la bskus na gtan du 'tsho bar 'gyur// yang na nga'i mngal lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis
334a2(rgyud): ste lus la bskus na yang soseM par 'gyuraro// gal te bu btsa' dka' bar gyur na/ til mar la len nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyi btab ste/ bud med sbrum ma'i lte ba dang mo mtshan la bskus na
334a3(rgyud): myusbyar du btsa' bar 'gyur// bud med sbrum ma gang dag mngal du bu shi bar gyur na gi'u si srang gcig chu phul do'i nang du bskol te phul gang lus pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis
334a4(rgyud): nanas blud na/ sdug bsngal zhing na ba ming bar 'thung bar 'a g+huro// sha ma 'byung tu mi btub par gyur na yang sman 'dir thungs na phan par 'gyur// gle bung du snying ka gzod par gyur/ 
334a5(rgyud): de ni ri shul gyi gzar thabs zhes bya ba yin pas kun tu ru dang pog dkar po ma grugs pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcigs gas kyis btab te ci tsam 'byor ba byin nas smon du bcug na
334a6(rgyud): 'tsho bar 'gyuraro// sha chang dang / dku ba rnam pa lnga srung dag so// mes tshig par gyur na ba lang gi lci ba dron pa la len nyi shu rtsagacig sngags kyis btab ste rma kar bskus na 'tsho bar 'gyur// 
334a7(rgyud): srin bu khod par zhugs te na bar gyur na rta dkar po'i gcin phul phyed la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags btab ste blung na 'tsho bar 'gyur// tshabs phye ba la phul gang blud ni srid du thag pa bcus
334a8(rgyud): ba bzhin du rang 'byung bar 'gyur// shu tshan byung ba la leng se'u hra 'ardungs pa'i khu ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste shu ba'i steng du drugs na rtsa ba rang byung bar 'gyur bse mod/ 
334b1(rgyud): la 'tsho bar 'gyuraro// mig tu snang ma zhugs te na bar gyur na bong bu'i rtug pa btsir ba'i khu ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste mtshan mo mig tu blugs na 'tshor bar 'gyuraro// 
334b2(rgyud): lto ba ra bar gyur na khron pa'i chu gtsang ma'i nang du lan tshwa ma grugs pa 'bum bu nyi shu rtsa gcig bor te/ len nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas phul phyeng 'thungs na phan par 'gyuraro// 
334b3(rgyud): mig tshag por gyur tam/ mig tu sha lhag byung bar gyur tam/ ling tog byung bar gyur na ke'u kha tsha'i shing gi lo ma brdungs te btsir ba'i khu ba la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste/ da'i nang du kha
334b4(rgyud): pa'i dong tshe gcig mtshan gcig spangs nas yang lan bdun sngags kyis btab te mig tu blugs na 'tshe bar 'gyuraro// gal te mtshan mo 'jug tshe 'jigs spangs nas/ mi bde bar gyur na skung
334b5(rgyud): pa dkar po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ta mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig byas nas mgul du btags na 'jigs shing sdang ba dang 'bral bar 'gyur// 'jigs pa
334b6(rgyud): dang bral bar kho nar ma zed kyi bsod nams kyang thob la sdig pa rnams kyang 'bying bar 'gyuraro// gal te khyi me'i khor du ltas ngan byung bar gyur na bal po seru'i shing gi yal ga blangs nas dum cu
334b7(rgyud): stong rtsa brgyad du btubs te/ mgo mjug gnyi gar mar dang zho bskus nas sngags lan re bzlas shing r-i raM bsregs te stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar byas nas gdon bgags thams cad rab tu zhi'i
334b8(rgyud): 'gyur te/ de yang sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bya dgo so// shu dag dkar po blangs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/ dpung pa g.yas pa la btags na g.yul ngor 'thab pa dang 'brel
335a1(rgyud): // ba'i gtam smra ba'i gnas thaMd du rgyal bar 'gyur// ke ru khi che'i shing gi lo la 'am yal ga yang rung ste/ dum bur btubs nas mgo mjug gnyi gar ba mar yang dag pa dang / sna
335a2(rgyud): rtsi dkar po dang bzhi bskus te sngags lan re bzla zhing dum bu ra re sreg pa stong rtsa brgyad tshang bya'o// nyin gcig la dus gsum du bya zhing dus gcig la yang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te zhag bdun cha
335a3(rgyud): bar gyur na sngags mkhan de rang gis mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyuraro// gdon mthu bo che gdul 'dod na lung tang la lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu sngags kyis btab ste/ bu ram dang sbrang rtsi bskus nas
335a4(rgyud): 'phags pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i gzugs byas pa'i ma dun du bsreg par bya'o// ge'u wang srang gcig bai DUr+ya'i bum pa'i nang du bcug ste/ 'phags pa snying chen po dang ldan pa'i gzu
335a5(rgyud): byas pa'i mdun du bzhag nas sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis btang ste lus la bskus sam dpral bar thig le byas na lha dang / klu dang / 'dra srin dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa thang rab tu
335a6(rgyud): dga' bar 'gyuraro// gal te la la zhig btson rar chud par gyur na phug ron dkar po'i rtug pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis bta' ste lag pa la bskus nas mtshon cha la byugs na chen
335a7(rgyud): cha rang rang grol bar 'gyuraro// gal te kho shug chu dang me bzhin du mi 'dum par gyur na bya dur pa'i mjug ma blangs te/ 'phags pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i gzugs byas pa'i mdun
335a8(rgyud): du sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis btang nas lus la btags na// de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du gcig la gcig dga' zhing byams pa dang bkur bar 'gyur// lo tog dang 'bras bu rnams la srin rtse
335b1(rgyud): zhugs te za bar gyur nas 'am thal ba 'am bye ma gtsang ma blangs te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab nas zhing gi phyogs bzhir gtor na srin bu rnams 'gyes par 'gyu ro// chu gtsang ma
335b2(rgyud): la sngags kyis btab ste 'bras bu'i ljon shing la gtor na srin bu 'bras bu la za ba'i thugs mi thu'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ sha ra ma hA sha ra/ tu lu tu lu ma hA tu lu/ oM ku me ha ni sha
335b3(rgyud): oM ku me ha ni sha ga/ bcom ldan las kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang la la zhig 'bru dkon pa'i gnas phyir te/ su be byung nas zan zad par gyur na khyed kyis mig brtsams nas lus dang bar bsrang
335b4(rgyud): te sems rtse gcig tu gzung sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad ba zas nas mig phye shig dang / lha dang / kyis lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa snang bkang nas khyer te 'ong bar 'gyur
335b5(rgyud): gal te khyim na gnas pa'i tsha dgos par gyur na sbed gtsang mi stong pa mdun tu bzhag nas mig btsums te kha chus ba kang nas lhung ma'i lhag ma dang rdo yab dang lhung bza
335b6(rgyud): la gtor bar bya'o// chus gtor zin nas mig btsums te gzungs 'di lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu bzlas na rang gi ngang gis raM brgya dang ldan pa'i zas snod kun gang ba 'byung bar 'gyur bas blangs
335b7(rgyud): nas zhag bdun gyi bar du bza' bar bya'o// de ltar na 'dir mthu stobs ni bsam gyis mo khyab par rog par bya'o// zas zos zin nas mig btsums te/ sar kha zhes brjod nas zas kyis ldan
335b8(rgyud): ma yang spang bar bya'o// zas zos te lhor mid nas kyang myur du 'ju bar 'gyur bas stobs dang ldan zhing bde ba 'thob par 'gyur/ thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// kun dpa
336a1(rgyud): / bo thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i gzungs ni 'di yin te/ na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ na ma a dan ni ya/ ug tsi du uka tsi du/ ma ti la li la/ ma lu te/ 
336a2(rgyud): min tin mi swA hA/ gzungs 'di 'dzin pas phyogs bzhi nas rgyun chad pa'i ri'i rtse mor dkyil 'khor byas nas mchims bcad lus bsrungs nas khar ba'i lhung bzang chu du cig khron pa'i chu
336a3(rgyud): gtsang mas bkang ste mdud du bzhag nas gzung sngags zlas na gdon mi za bar skar ma gsal ba gcig 'ong bar 'gyur bas/ 'ong ba'i tshe 'jigs pa mi bskyed par sems bde bar ma
336a4(rgyud): par gzhag nas sems rtse gcig tu gzung sngags 'don par byed na/ dbang po rno zhing shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur bas mi shes pa ci yang med par 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa'i la
336a5(rgyud): gyi chos kyang mi rtogs pa ci yang med par 'gyuraro// thos brgyud pa'i tshe skar ma mchog tu gsal ba cog lhung bze kyi chu'i nang du 'ong bar 'du shes bskyed pa'o// byang chub
336a6(rgyud): sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po rgya cher yongasu rdzogs pa'i gzungs// baM po gnyis pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
336a7(rgyud): dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gus pas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sngon bsam gyis mi khyaba' pa'i bsod
336a8(rgyud): nams bsags pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis/ deng bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la lung bstan par mdzad pa dang / bdag snying rje chen po bskyed nas sems can zad la sman par bgyi ba dang / bcing ba
336b1(rgyud): mtha' dag bcad pa dang / 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur par bzhed pa lags pas/ dang bdag gis yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad par 'tshal te/ dus tha ma'i sems can rnam
336b2(rgyud): yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs 'di zos pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi mthus de dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgyu dang bral ba nas bde ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur lagaso// bcom ldan 'das du
336b3(rgyud): lnga brgya tha ma yul lam/ gong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grol rdal gang yang rung ba dag tu dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la sogs pas rtag par gdugs ma
336b4(rgyud): lan drug tu chos bzhin du yum zhes bgyi ba gzungs sngags kyi chos kyi rnams grangs 'di klog cing 'dod pa dang / yongasu 'a dzin par bgyid na/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'a
336b5(rgyud): drin rje su dran zhing gzo bo'i slad du rtag par rje su 'brangs na sa/ gang zag de dag yongasu srung bar bgyid cing spong bar mi bgyid pas 'dre srin thams cad kyis gdon par
336b6(rgyud): mi 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang tshe rabs kyi sgrib pa lci ba zad kyang dus gcig tu yongasu 'bang bar 'gyur/ gzung sngags kyi dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya'i chos kyi sgo thams cad kyang sku
336b7(rgyud): du yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma'i sems can rnams ni phal cher sdig pa'i
336b8(rgyud): dri ma lhun sdug cing bsod nams chung bas yongasu 'dzin par bgyid pa zhig mchis na yang / 'dre srin dag gis gnod pa bgyid pas/ dang bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi
337a1(rgyud): / sems can rnams la rgya cher sman par bgyid pa dang / sems can rnams la bde bar bgyid pa dang / lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pa'i tsha du gzungs kyi chos bshad par 'tshal te/ 
337a2(rgyud): bdag gis sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad ma mchis bsnyed kyi bar du gzungs kyi chos 'di la bsten cing mchod pa bgyis lags so// 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs
337a3(rgyud): rgyas rnams kyi bar dag kyang yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i rgyas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par brnyed pa lags pas/ rigs kyi bu
337a4(rgyud): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig sems rtse gcig tu lus zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnams grangs 'di 'don cing klog pa dang / yongasu 'dzin par bgyid na de dag tshe 'di nyid
337a5(rgyud): la tshig spobs pa myur zhing thogs pa ma mchis pa dang khe/ sa rab dang spobs pa mngon par rtogs par 'gyur bas/ lha dang mi'i 'khor mang po'i nang na mchog tu 'gyur/ 
337a6(rgyud): gang dag thos pa rnams kyang rab tu dga' zhing thams cad kyi spyi bo lab tu de phyag bgyid par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun mthong bar 'gyur/ gang ci smras
337a7(rgyud): kyang rung ste thams cad kyis yid ches nyan par 'gyur lagaso te/ de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi mthu lags te/ rang nyid kyi mthun
337a8(rgyud): ma lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la khyod kyis 'di ltar lha dang mi dang lha ma yin la sogs pa de dag thang la phan pa dang / bde dang
337b1(rgyud): bya ba dang / las kyi lam yengasu sbyang ba'i cha du smras pa leg so leg so zhes sngags pa brjod nas/ ngas kyang deng ye shes kyi phyag rgyas bta' nas// khyod byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po la sog
337b2(rgyud): pa'i sems rnam pa sna tshogs las gtan du ldeg par mi 'gyur bar bya'o// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'o spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang
337b3(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das bdag mngon par dran lags te/ 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad ma mchis nas/ yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di longasu bzung bas
337b4(rgyud): ri be Ta la la mchis pa'i tshe bdud kyi rgyal pos bdud kyi la khor mang po dang 'grogs nas bdag gis chos dkrug cing / sngags kyi tshig rnams mngon par mi 'grub par bgyi la
337b5(rgyud): bshams pa las do'i tsha bdag gis yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs 'das bdud mang po rnams btul nas thams cad sa sor gyes par gyur pas// gzungs 'di 'i mi thu bas m+b+ha ma
337b6(rgyud): khyab par rig par bgyi lag so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byams pa dang / snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad la phan gdags shing / lha dang mi rnams
337b7(rgyud): bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das dpa 'khor 'dus pa chen po'i mdun du byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong spyad stong dang ldan pa'i yum zhes bya ba'i
337b8(rgyud): gzus lus po che'i sngags 'di smra se// na maHsarba ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo rat+na tra yA ye/ na me a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ aR+Sha te samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki ta shwa rA ya / be d+hi satwA
338a1(rgyud): // ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru NI kA ya na mo ma hAs+thA ma prAp+tA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo bi bu la'i man su pra tiSh+Thi ta saM g+hA ya/ sUr+ya sha ta sa ha sra a
338a2(rgyud): tri ta re ka pra b+ha a be b+ha si ta mUr+ha ye ma hA ma Ni mu ku Te kuN+Da la a laM kA ra d+hA re NaM/ b+ha ga bA taM pad+ma bA Na ye/ sarba li ka u pA sha ma nA ya/ bi bi d+ha mu khaM sa ma bai sha biSh+Ti sarba satwa pa ri moH
338a3(rgyud): ka ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM d+hur b+hu ga ma hA lo ka kar Na nA tha ma sid d+he mi ra b+ha drA bi nAM sha ka rA ya/ rA ga dra Sha mo ha dz+wa la sha ma ka/ sha sa ka sa pA shA sa nA ka ra/ rakA sarba pA pa durga ta pra sha ma
338a4(rgyud): na ka ra ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ba da na ka ra/ he hi ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra da pad+ma lo ka saM b+hu ta/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka dza TA mu ku nA le kr-i ta sha rI re/ ma Ni ka na ka sha ta badz+ra bai rU rA l-i kr-i ta sha rI rA
338a5(rgyud): a mi tA b+hA sa na ka ma lA la kr-i ta pra b+ha ra// la ri tsan ma hI du na/ nar ni ra sha ta sa ha sra/ a dz+wa la shi ta kA la/ ma/ bo d+hisatwA ya/ bo d+ha ma bi d+ha ma/ bi nA sha ya bi na sha ya/ 
338a6(rgyud): ma hA yan traM k+She sha ka ba ta/ a ba ba d+ha bi bo d+ha satwa/ saM sA rA tsa ra ka br-i ma tha na/ pu ru sha pad+ma/ pu ruSha nA gaM/ pu ru Sha sA ga ra/ pu ru Sha saM ha/ bi ra bi ra sha ya/ su yan+ta su yan+ta/ Sha8
338a7(rgyud): ba ra/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ sa ma sa ma/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ pra sha sa yi pra shA sa ya/ bi rau bi ri/ tsi ri tsi ra/ mu ru mu ru/ mu yu mu yu/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ d+hu na d+hA na/ bi d+hu na'i d+hu na/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ gA ya gA la
338a8(rgyud): gA d+ha ya gA d+ha ya/ ha sa ha sa/ pra ha sa pra ha sa/ bi bi d+ha k+She sha bA sa na/ ma ma bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba/ s+ya ha ra ha ra/ se ha ra saM ha ra/ du ru ti du ru ti/ ma hA man+ta du ru to/ ka ra Ni sha ta pa ra si ka/ 
338b1(rgyud): b+ha ba bi sa ni/ sha ma ka ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra da swA hA/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugs/ bcom ldan 'das la pad+ma chen po'i phyag rin po che'i
338b2(rgyud): bkod pa'i khar ba'i yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di smras ma thag tu/ stong sum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi lha'i gnas kyi bar dag rnam pa
338b3(rgyud): drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos par 'gyur to// lha rnams kyis kyang rin po che'i me tog gi char mngon par phab po// 'og min gyi lha dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams kyang g.yo zhing maM de bas shin tu
338b4(rgyud): 'jigs shing sngangs par gyur to// nod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'dre gdon ma rungs pa thams cad kyang sdug bsngal na po myong ba'i sgra sgang chen pos phyung nas shar nub tu
338b5(rgyud): zhing bros kyang gang du 'gro ba'i gnas kyang rig cing rnyed par ma gyur to// de nas sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpas 'khor mang po rnams dang / 'di srin ma rungs pa thams cad la gang gis
338b6(rgyud): bdag gi rig sngags las mnga' zhing rje su 'brang bar byed na/ de dag gi lus kyi yan lag dang / nying lag thad rab tu na zhing 'jig par 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'dis ni ri rnams 'jom shing
338b7(rgyud): rgya mtsho chen po skems par byed// lha ma yin gyi dmag rnams rnam par bcom nas pham par byed// yul 'khor rnams dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal rnams yongasu srung bar byed/ 
338b8(rgyud): gdon dang / nad dang / sman gyi dug dang / srin bu'i dug dang / log pa dang / ma rungs pa'i mo rnams pham zhing rab tu na par byed// sum bcu rtsa gsum po'i lha rnams gtul nas rab tu dul bar byed/ 
339a1(rgyud): // smras pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen po'i grong rab tu dga' ba na bzhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu btsun pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srid po dang
339a2(rgyud): mi 'am ci la sogs pa'i 'khor sangs rgyas chos la gnas pa tshad med pa thams cad kyis kyang dus gcig tu bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
339a3(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'dis ni sgrib pa'i ri bo shin tu rgya che ba dag kyang rnam par 'joms par bgyid pas gang la la zhig
339a4(rgyud): nyan tam/ klog gam 'don tam/ yongasu 'dzin par bgyid dam/ mthong bar gyur na/ de dag la nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa nag po ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag thams cad zhu byang bar 'gyur lag sa
339a5(rgyud): gzhan yang gang la la zhig rtag par nad par langs nas gus ba'i sems kyis yum gyi gzungs 'di lan nyi shu rtsa bag glog gam/ 'don par bgyid ni/ byang chub se del spyan
339a6(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid rtag par de'i rjesu 'brangs nas yongasu srung ba bgyid cing yongasu skyob par bgyid // gang la la zhig smon lan rgya chen po dang / ting 'dzin gyi sgo chen po thams cad
339a7(rgyud): myur du 'grub par 'tshal na/ gzig pu gnas dben par mchis nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid la dran par bgyi zhing / gzhan yid la mi bgyi bar rtag par
339a8(rgyud): gzungs 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na smon lam rnams mi 'grub pa gang yang ma mchis lag so// gzhan yang sems can thad kyi snying drung du sdug par 'gyur/ ngan 'gro'i sgo/ 
339b1(rgyud): thams cad du lhung bar mi 'gyur lag so// mchis kyang rung ma mchis kyang rung ste/ rtag par sangs rgyas mdun na bzhugs par 'du shes nye bar bzhag par gyur na/ gang zag de skye ba'i gnas
339b2(rgyud): babargya stong tshad ma mchis pa kun tu bsags pa'i sdig pa'i las ci mchis pa de dag thams cad zhu byang bar 'gyur// gang zag de 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po stong gi bsod nams phun su
339b3(rgyud): tshogs pa dag la long spyod par 'gyur// skye ba thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang dus gcig du skye bar 'gyur/ btsun pa'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur lags
339b4(rgyud): gang la la zhig rtag par spos sam/ me tog snyim pa gang pa byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du mngon par gtor nas/ gzungs
339b5(rgyud): 'di pan nyi shu rtsa gcig 'don par bgyid na/ stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ston dang snying rje chen po'i chos nyid 'thob par 'gyur/ gang zag de 'jig rten na mthar gyi
339b6(rgyud): mthu chen mo myur du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lag so// gang la la zhig rtag par byang chub sems dpa' gdong dang / mig dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad la rnam par lta ste/ gzungs 'di lan stong
339b7(rgyud): rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug myur nga lus mngon sum du bstan nas rnal 'byor par mthong bar 'gyur bas/ dri ma dang bral nas sa dang / 
339b8(rgyud): po dang / sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i ting 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur bas 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gsal bar bgyid par 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tsha bsam gtan dang ting 'dzin la sogs
340a1(rgyud): par 'jug par bzhin du 'chi bar 'gyur bas tshe rabs thams cad du sngon gyi gnas rjesu dran pa'i shes rab thob par 'gyur/ kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa ci mchis pa thams cad kyang
340a2(rgyud): nu zhing byang bar 'gyur lag so// gzungs 'di yongasu 'dzin par 'tshal ba des rtag par dpyid zla ra ba dang / dbyer zla 'bring po dang / ston zla tha chung tshes gcig nas ches bcu'i bar du gso sbyong dang tshul
340a3(rgyud): khrims la gnas nas gos dkar po gtsang ma bgos te/ zas dkar gsum 'tshal nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nas/ ring bsrel gyi mdun du tsan dan dkar po'i 'dzi ba las
340a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor khru gang gru bzhi bgyis nas/ me tog dang spos rnam pa sna tshogs dkyil 'khor gyi nang du gtor nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar spos kyis bdugs te
340a5(rgyud): zhugs mar bltams nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sem sa dpa' rnams la gus pa'i sems bskyed// rtag par gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad 'dron par bgyid na/ 
340a6(rgyud): bco lnga'i nub mo byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid dkyil 'khor gyi nang du mchi bar 'gyur pas/ rnal 'byor pas mthong ma thag tu mtshams ma mchis pa lnga'i kha na
340a7(rgyud): mtho ba shin tu lci bi'i slob pa ci mchis pa thams cad nu byung nas/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi los thams cad yong su dag par 'gyur bas// sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin gyi mthu dang / dang
340a8(rgyud): bskur ba'i sa'i mthu dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i sa'i mthu dang / khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi sa yang 'thob par 'gyur lagaso// bcom ldan 'das gal te dgung char dbab par chan
340b1(rgyud): bar gyur na/ gnam du bltas nas gzungs 'di stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na zil ngar gyi char dus bzhin du 'bab par 'gyur lag so// dog sa la bltas nas gzungs 'di lan stong
340b2(rgyud): brgyad tshang bar 'don par 'gyid na 'bru rnam pa sna tshogs legs par 'gyur lag so// rtsang po dang / tshab mig bskams pa'i ngang du gzung 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na/ chab 'phel
340b3(rgyud): zhing rgyas par 'gyur lag so// blond kyi thabs pa thad kyi mdun du rang gi sug pa lag pa la sngags 'das lan bdud bsngags te sug pas byabs na 'tsho bar 'gyur lag so// gang dran pa
340b4(rgyud): pa'i mdun du gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod pa gyis na yang dag pa'i dran pa 'thob par 'gyur lag so// gang dag bkres sdom gyis nyin pa'i mdun du de'i gdong pa
340b5(rgyud): bltas nas gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na bkres skom gyis nyen pa'i 'du shes ngan pa thams cad rang tu gsal bar 'gyur las so// gang dag mtshams dgum
340b6(rgyud): par 'tshal na rdzing chab kyi nang du zhags te/ chos bzhin du bzungs 'di yongasu rdzogs par bris nas rgyal mtshan khar btags na dpag tshad brgya tshun chadadu gdon bgags ci yang ma ma
340b7(rgyud): te/ mtshams bkum pa nyid du gyur nas yongasu bsrungs par 'gyur lag so// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig rtag par gdugs gcig bzhin du bzungs 'di lan stong
340b8(rgyud): rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na gang zag de'i bsod nams brjod kyis mi lang bas rig sngags 'dzin pa de dag btsun zhing dbang phyug dang ldan par 'gyur/ gzhan yang skye bo mang po kun gyis
341a1(rgyud): / byams shing bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur smon lam rnams yid bzhin du yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur lagaso// gang dag bdud gdul bar 'tshal na yum gyi gzungs 'di bzlas
341a2(rgyud): / gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas sngags 'di lan re bzlas shing lan gcig sreg par byas nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na yongasu bsal bar 'gyur
341a3(rgyud): lag so// gal te skye bo mang po thams cad dga' bar 'tshal na rtag par lhung ma'i lcug ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/ g.yang khar bcas na tshad kyis byams shing
341a4(rgyud): bkur bar 'gyur lag so// gang dag bdag nyid spobs pa dang / shes rab dang ldan par 'tshal na shu dag srang gcig phye mar btags te/ chab mer dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar nas ril bu 'gyi ste
341a5(rgyud): yum gyi gzungs 'dis mtshan ma gsum po 'di lta ste/ dod dang / dung pa dang / 'od byung gi bar du sngags kyis gdab pa bgyi'o// mtshan ma de dag thob nas gdugs re bzhin sngan
341a6(rgyud): gyi rol bu tsam bdun bdun 'tshal nas snying kar yang yang byug par bgyi ste/ de ltar zhag brgya'i bar du 'tshal na thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur bas/ bdag nyid
341a7(rgyud): lus kun tu bsdud pa'i gdugs re zhing yum gyi gzung 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas phyag rgya rnam pa bcu gnyis kyang bgyi'o// de la dang po byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan
341a8(rgyud): ba'i lus kun tu bsdad pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ sngar langs nas 'greng ste/ lus drang por bsrang nas rkang pa gnyis gshing ste/ rkang pa g.yas pa chung zad cig dgug par bgyi'o// snga
341b1(rgyud): sug pa lag pa g.yon pa thur du brkyang nas gung mo dang srin lag gnyis bkug ste/ lag mthil du bzhag la mthe'u chung dang / mdzub mo dang / mthe bong ni yan par brkyang ste/ lag mthil bkan
341b2(rgyud): nas gyen du phyogs par bgyi'o// de'i rjes la sug pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis nas gung mo bkug ste/ phrag pa dang mnyam par bgyis nas lag mthil mdud du blta bar bgyi ste/ 
341b3(rgyud): ni lus kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya zhes 'gyi'o// gal te bdud dang mu stegs can log par blta ba'i thebs po bcom nas yang dag pa'i lam du gzung bar 'tshal na/ phyag rgya 'od bgyid nas sngags
341b4(rgyud): lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas gdon mi 'tshal bar sbed pa bzhin 'grub par 'gyur lag so// gzungs ni 'di lta ste/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo kyi te shwa rA ya / bo d+ha saH
341b5(rgyud): ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ a bat+ta a bit+ta/ ba ri bat+ta/ e hi ai ha~M swAhA/ de la gnyis byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i ku 'dzin
341b6(rgyud): gyi gzungs phyag rgya ni 'di legs te/ snga ma'i lus kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya bzhin du thal mo sbyar te snying kar bzhag nas sor mo lnga snol mar btang ste/ g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan nas
341b7(rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis drang por gleng ste/ rtse mo phrad par bgyis li/ mthe bo gnyis mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshogs pa dang po mnan nas cung zad cig dbye bar bgyi ste/ dri ni kun 'dzin gyi gzungs kyi
341b8(rgyud): phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o// phyag rgya 'di dgyis par gyur na bskal pa tshad ma mchis pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig pa'i las ci mchis pa thang dus gcig tu yongasu byang bar 'gyur/ slad mo
342a1(rgyud): dus kyi tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par dag tu skye bar 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub tu nye ba'i tshe bdud kyi rgyal
342a2(rgyud): bos klags btsal ba dang / kun 'dzin gyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya 'di mdzad pas shin tu bde ba'i bsam gtan dang ting 'dzin brnyes par gyur to// gzungs ni 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ sarba d+hA ra Ni/ me N+Dal/ 
342a3(rgyud): e hi e hi/ pra b+hA shud d+hA/ satwa ba la swA hA/ de la gsum pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / bsam gtan dang / ting 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ni 'di lags// slar bla gos
342a4(rgyud): phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mos g.yas pa'i lha nges la btsugs te/ spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste rtse mo sprad la mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo'i tshogs
342a5(rgyud): gnyis pa'i steng du bkan par bgyi ste/ chos kyi phyag rgya 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang / bsam gtan dang / ting 'dzin gyi phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
342a6(rgyud): thams cad kyis kyang chos 'di mngon par bslab pas/ bsam gtan dang / ting 'dzin dang / rnam par grol ba brnyas pa lags te/ rig sngags ni snga ma dang 'thun lags// gang la la zhig gdu
342a7(rgyud): ro bzhin du phyag rgya 'od bgyis te mchod pa'i gyis na phyogs bcur sangs rgyab rnam myur du mthong bar 'gyuraro// de la bzhi pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags
342a8(rgyud): tar langs nas bgrang ste rkang pa gnyis gshibs nas sngar gung mo dang / srin lag dang / mtha'u chung rnams rgyab sprad pa mdzub mo gnyis 'greng ste rtse mo sprad nas mthe bang gnyis mdzub mo'i chog/ 
342b1(rgyud): gis gnyis pa'i steng mnan te/ lag pa gnyis kyi bar du tshon sna lnga tsam phye nas smin mtsham su bzhag par bgyi ste/ 'di ni mig stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o// phyag rgya'i chos kyi
342b2(rgyud): sgo 'dib gyis par gyur na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khabs gya nom pa bya ba phrag brgya stong skad mthong bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams re re nas kyang byang chub
342b3(rgyud): sems dpa' 'bum phrag bcu dang bzhi stong rnal 'byor pa de'i grogs 'gyid par 'gyur lagaso// gang dag dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi sgor lan gsum ma zhugs pa de dag phyag rgya'i chos kyis
342b4(rgyud): 'di mthong du yang mi rungs la cho ga 'di yang 'gyir mi rung lag so// rtags mthong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chos dang ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa gsal ba cig lags na
342b5(rgyud): ni ci smon pa de dag zad yong su rdzogs par 'gyur lagaso/ gzungs ni 'di lta ste/ oM sarba tsak+ShAHka rA ya/ d+ha raH/ a nA ya swA hA/ de la lnga pa byang chub sems dpa' mig steng
342b6(rgyud): ldan pa'i lag stong kun sdud pa'i phyag rgyan 'di lags te/ langs nas sug pa rkang pa gshibs te/ sngar sug paM lag pa g.yas pa'i lag mthil bkang nas sor mo lnga so sor phan tshun
342b7(rgyud): du bsnyen te/ ngo rdza su la sreg pa lag pa g.yon pa'i lag mthil g.yas pa'i steng du mnan nas snying kar 'dzeg pa gang lags pa 'di ni lag stong kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi ste/ 
342b8(rgyud): steng gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud ji snyed mchis ba zang sdud cing 'dul bar 'gying lag so// gzungs sngags ni 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ a bi lo ki te shwa rA ya/ sarba duSh+TA / 
343a1(rgyud): hA ya ni swA hA/ de la dag pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pas ting 'dzin rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di legs te/ 'greng ste rting pa gnyi spyad nas/ sdang sug pa lag pa
343a2(rgyud): g.yon pa'i so so 'greng ste gung mo bkug nas mdun du phul la/ de'i rjes la sug pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis nas/ gung mo bkug ste nang log su 'phrul ba 'di ni ting 'dzin rtogs par
343a3(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi ba lags te/ 'dis ting 'dzin dang / ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i bkod pa dang / chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri ba'i snying yang rtogs par 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
343a4(rgyud): rgud kyang mngon du 'gyid par 'gyur lag so// rig sngags 'a ji snga ma nyid bzla bar bgyi'o// de la 'dun pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pas lha kI sde brgyad dang / 'dra srin rnams dgug cing sdug
343a5(rgyud): phyag rgya ni 'di legs te/ 'greng nas rkang pa gnyis gan/ bas te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i srin lagagis mthe bong sen ma la reg par 'gyis nas/ de'i rjes la sug pa
343a6(rgyud): lag pa g.yas pa de bzhin du bgyis te/ mthe'u chung dang gung mo gnyis dang por sgreng nas rtse mo phan tshun phrang bar 'gyis la/ lag ngor gyis mig gnyi sbyar nas mdzub mo ni phan tshun rmya bar bgyi'o// 
343a7(rgyud): rig sngags ni 'di lta ste/ oM sar+b+ba de ba nA ga a na ri swA hA/ de la brgyad pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pas tshangs pa chen po dang / brgya byin lho'i dbang po g.yang dran nas chos 'dri nas chos tha
343a8(rgyud): nas chos 'dri ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te phyag rgya snga ma'i steng du lag ngar gyi tshogs gnyis phye nas/ sug pa lag pa'i rlung sprid/ lag mthil bkan la mdzub mo ni phan tshun rgyu bar bgyi
343b1(rgyud): rig sngags ni 'di lta ste/ oM ma hA brah+ma ya a hi e hi swA hA/ phyag rgya dang rig sngags 'dis ni gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i sgo mo tshad ma mchis shing grangs ma mchis pa thaMd yang dag par sdud cing 'ad bar
343b2(rgyud): bgyi'o// gal te nyi zla la gza' zhugs par gyur na/ chab mar le lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis gdab par 'gyi'o// yang na lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags bzla bar bgyi'o// chal bar phyag rgyas bteb
343b3(rgyud): ste 'tshal na dbang po rdo bar 'gyur bas gdugs gcig la sh+lo ka khri longs par 'gyur la gso// phyag rgya'i chos kyi sgo mo 'di ni da bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' spyan pa
343b4(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa lag so// de la dgu pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pa'i rab tu dga' ba'i yidazhan gyi nor buphyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'grang nas snying kar
343b5(rgyud): thal mo sbyar te/ mthe bong gnyis ka lag mthil du / gau na sa sor mo gzhan bzhi ni drang por sgreng ste stong kar thal mo sbyang nas rig sngags snga ma 'don par bgyid na/ gdon mi
343b6(rgyud): 'chal bar lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang dag tu 'jug par 'gyur/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnamasu kun tu rgyu zhing rin po che brgyad stong bsams pa bzhin thob nas sangs rgyas
343b7(rgyud): rnams la mchod pa bgyid par 'gyur lags// gang la la zhig chos kyi spro 'di mngon par sgrub pa gang lags pa des nang par sngar langs nas khrus yongasu dag par bgyis te/ phyag rgya 'di
343b8(rgyud): bgyis na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mngon sum du mthong nas bskal pa ched ma mchis pa snyeng kyi 'khor ba'i las ngan pa'i kha na ma tho ba lci ba rnams yongasu 'byangs
344a1(rgyud): 'gyur bas ngo'i slad du yon 'di lta bu'i bsngags pa brjod pa lag so// de la bcu pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pa'i smon pa rnams yid bzhin du mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgyan
344a2(rgyud): 'di lags te/ phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du 'gyis pa las mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste mthe bong gnyis kyi sen mo mnan nas mdzub mo'i sen ma ni rgyab sprad par bgyi ste/ rig sngags ni snga ma nyid
344a3(rgyud): bar 'gyi'o// de ltar bgyis na smon pa rnams mngon par 'grub cing / gdon mi za bar byang chub kyi lam las ldog par mi 'gyur las so// de la bcu gcog pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong
344a4(rgyud): pa'i 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i ting 'dzin gyi bya brgya ni 'di lags te/ phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du 'gyis pa las mdzub mo lnga dang por spring ste thal mo dbye bar bgyi'o// 
344a5(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di ni bdag sngon rgyu'i sa la gnas pa'i gang+gA kAng gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag le stsal pas/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi
344a6(rgyud): mngon sum du gyur pa lags te/ rig sngags ni snga ma nyid bzla bar 'gyi'o// de la bcu gnyis pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas sangs rgyas spyan 'dren pa'i ting 'dzin gyi bge rgyan
344a7(rgyud): 'di lags te/ phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du snying kar thal mo sbyang na mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun rgyu bar bgyi'o// rig sngags ni 'di lta ste/ i sar+b+ba bud d+ha sa ma ya~M/ oM hi a hi/ brah+ma shud d+he satwa sAhA
344a8(rgyud): de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong lag stong dang ldan po'i dkyil 'khor 'di ba'i cho ga ni 'di lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa'i yum gyi dkyil 'khor dade/ rig
344b1(rgyud): sngags dang / phyag rgya'i chos 'dis ni dus tha ma'i dus kyi tshe rig sngags 'dzin pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig sngags kyi gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor mnyam pa'i ting 'dzin thang
344b2(rgyud): myur du gsal bar mthong bar 'gyur bar bgyid pas/ rog sngags 'dzin pa'i gang zag gang lags pa des rtag par dge bsngags te/ dri mo gtam rnams smra bar mi bgyi'o// gzungs las
344b3(rgyud): 'byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang / ting 'dzin dang / mtshan ma ya mtshan can rnam pa sna tshogs gang lags pa de dag ma brtags par babacol tu rgyun par mi 'gyi'o// yongasu dang ba'i sems kyis dran pa
344b4(rgyud): bar gzhag zhes skad cig tsam du yang rnam par g.yeng bar mi 'gyur// gal te khe la gdubs snad rol tu gzhan dag la tha dad pa'i mtshan ma ston par 'gyid na/ sdig pa'i las sbyor bar la
344b5(rgyud): yang de dag 'grub par mi 'gyur lag so// gal te yang dag pa'i yongasu ba ba dang / chos kyi bsam pa gang lags bde sa sgom par mi 'gying na/ 'gyes pa rnams chadang 'chal
344b6(rgyud): zhing don ma mchis par sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong ba tsam du bas kyi/ nams kyang sgrub du ngas mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur bas rtag par nan tan brtson 'grus kyis tshul khrims yon
344b7(rgyud): dag par bsrungs nas sku'i rnam pa lnga dang / sha tshong 'tshal bar mi 'gyi'o// gal te dbyen tshig dang / g.yo sgyu'i tshig dang pra dag gi tshig smra bar gyur tam/ dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / 
344b8(rgyud): rig sngags kyi gtsuba'o nongs pa 'di dag byung bar gyur na/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thad kyis spong bar mdzad pas/ 'di skad ngas khyed spangs pa ma yin yang gzigs pa

345a3(rgyud): gdon thams cad dang / mu stegs can rnams dang / bi na ya ka rnams dang / khams gcig tu sdu ba dang / las gcig la gnas pa dang / gtan tu skangs ma mchis par 'gyur ba legs dang /

345a6(rgyud): gang zag de dag rnams kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur bar mthong lags te/ de ltar ma'i 'grub pa de yang bdag gis nongs pad ma lags kyi/ de dag rang nyid kyi nongs skyon lags pas don do'i sngang
345a7(rgyud): gzungs 'di'i cho ga dang / glegs bam de dag gis mthong zhing thos par mi bgyi/ 'don cing 'dzin tu stsal 'ang yang mi bgyi ste/ gang dag tshangs par spyod pa yongasu dag pa srung ba dang / byams de
345a8(rgyud): dang / snying rjer sems dang ldan pa dang / seMn la snying rje zhing byang chub yongasu gnyir bar bgyid pa dag gis yi gang bris nas klog pa dang 'don pa dang / yongasu 'dzin par gyur na/ yum gyi gzungs/ 
345b1(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par 'grub par 'gyur bso// chos kyi cho ga 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugi mchog tu gsang ba'i snying po lags pa
345b2(rgyud): slad rigs sngags 'dzin pas yang dag po'i sems dang / brtson grus kyi semis kyi yan lag dang / nying lag dang / rus pa dang / sha dang / rtsa rgyus dang / kAng dang / mgo dang / mig la sogs pa

345b6(rgyud): rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa 'gyes nas/ yang dag pa'i spyod pa dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus dang / blta bas bgrod pa'i phyogs dang / rdo galan
345b7(rgyud): lam mngon par 'grub par 'gyid cing / de dag dus 'di nas bla na mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar dun nams kyang ldog par mi 'gyur bar 'gyod pa'o// 
345b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor de yang gtsug lag khang gi nang ngam 'i 'am/ chab mig 'bab pa'am/ chags tshal gyi drung du yang rus ste/ nyen 'khor kun tu khru gang yan chad na shing gi rtsa ba dang / ngog sa
346a1(rgyud): pa dang / gyo mo dang / gor ma dang / rus pa la sogs pa ci mchis pa brkos te bsal nas/ dog sa bzang po las rmang khru gang tsam du blangs te/ brdungs nas mnyam por bgyis la ba lang
346a2(rgyud): gi lci ba dang / spos chab ngogs ser po dang bsres nas 'jim pa bgyis te legs par byug cing zhal zhal bgyis nas gling lngar bgo bar bgyi'o// de la dbus kyi gling ni zhang du khwa gsum tsam
346a3(rgyud): du bgyis te/ dbus kho nar khru do gru bzhir lham par mchis pa'i rin po che'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgya rtsa brgyad dang ldan pa cig bri bar bya'o// gzhan yang 'khor lo dbu su rin po che'i pad+ma kha bye
346a4(rgyud): 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis mchis pa khru gang ba gcig bri bar 'gyi'o// gzhan yang 'khor lo'i tha ma 'khor bar 'od 'bar bya bri bar bya'o// de'i rjes la gling gi grwa bzhir pad+ma kha phye ba
346a5(rgyud): re re bri bar bya'o// gzhan yang pad+ma re re'i steng du yid bzhin gyi nor bu re ra bris nas/ nor bu bzhi po'i steng 'bar ba bri bar bya/ 'o// gzhan yang 'da' ma sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i
346a6(rgyud): pad+ma de'i steng du byang chub sems dpa' spyan ris gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs tsan dkar po las bigyis pa cig bzhag par bgyi'o// de nas gling gnyis pa ni zhang du khru gang bar bgyis na
346a7(rgyud): sngar grwa bzhir pad+ma kha phye ba re re bri bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang pad+ma de dag re re'i stedu ri rab lhun po'i stan rim pa gsum mchis pa gsum gsum bris nas byang shar mtshams kyi stan la da
346a8(rgyud): phyug chen po'i lha bri'o// shar lho'i mtshams kyi stan la ni lha mthu chen bri'o// lho nub mtshams kyi stan la ni tshangs pa chen po bri'o// nub byang mtshams kyi stan la ni brgya byin bri bar
346b1(rgyud): bya'o// gzhan yang ngos bzhir ni rin po che'i me tog dang / phreng ba bcu drug bri bar bgyi'o// de nas gling gsum pa ni zhang du khru do bri bar bgyis te/ sa gzhi sngon po la gser gyi thig bkye ba
346b2(rgyud): 'ba' shig bri bar bgyi'o// de nas gling bzhi pa ni zheng du khru geng bar bgyis ste/ ngos bzhi spril bar chad nyi shu rtsa brgyad du byas nas bar cha dum bu re re nang du yang pad+ma kha bya ba ra ra bri bar
346b3(rgyud): bgyi'o// gzhan yang go rims bzhin du pad+ma dag ra'i steng du yang rdo rje tho ba dang / rtsa gsum po'i phyag rgya dang / dgra sta'i phyag rgya dang / gri'i phyag rgya dang / rang gri'i phyag rgya dang / dung gi phyag rgya
346b4(rgyud): dang / chu gi'i phyag rgya dang / zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang / dbyig pa thogs pa'i phyag rgya dang / gdugs kyi phyag rgya dang / yid bzhi na gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang / gshin rje'i dbyig pa'i phyag
346b5(rgyud): rgya dang / bi na ya ka'i phyag rgya dang / mtshan cha'i phyag rgya dang / 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang / sug pa lag pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya rnams ser bris nas/ phyag rgya de dag kun
346b6(rgyud): la yang 'od 'bar ba dag bri bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang lho phyogs kyi chab sbyor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni 'thab bral gyi lha bri'o// nub phyogs kyi chab sgor bar chang bgyis pa'i nang du ni chu
346b7(rgyud): lnga bri'o// byang phyogs kyi chab skor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du na~M ku be ra bri'o// shar phyogs kyi chab spyir bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni lha gzhon bri bar bya'o// de nas gru bzhi'i gnas so
346b8(rgyud): sor ni rgyal po bzhi khri gnyer can g.yog 'khor da bcas pa/ bri bar 'gyi'o// de nas gling lnga pa ni khru gang bar 'gyis te/ ngos bzhi kun tu 'bribras bu'i ljon shing dang / me tog gi ldan
347a1(rgyud): / shing dang / rin po che'i ljon shing rnam pa sna tshogs bri bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang gru bzhi kun tu rin po che'i ri rab lhun po re ra bri bar 'gyi'o// chab sgo bzhir ni rgya mtsho chen po'i chab
347a2(rgyud): bri bar bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi slad nang gi gling rnams kyi sa bzhi ni kha dog sngon por bgyi'o// gzhan yang smad nang gi gling rnams kyi nub phyogs kyi chab sgo'i lho'i ngos kyi zur la sngags
347a3(rgyud): mkhan 'byung zhing 'jug pa'i chab sgo gcig dan par bgyi'o// gzhan yang spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs bgyis pa gcig dbus su sbyangs te
347a4(rgyud): shar phyog su lta bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i mdo sde glags bam gcig pad+ma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis mchis pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhan
347a5(rgyud): nasar gzugs bgyis pa de'i mdun du gzhan yang nA/ dkar po'i dri cha zhal bu bcu drug dang / zhal zas rnam pa sna tshogs dang / zas dkar gsum dang / shing tog la sogs
347a6(rgyud): bas bkang ba'i gzhong bu nyi shu rtsa lnga dang / spos chab bre gang dang / bum pa dang sna tshogs dang / me tog dang / ljon shing gi yal ga la sogs pas kha rgyan pa nyi shu rtsa lnga dang / me tog dang / phrang
347a7(rgyud): ba snga sna nas nyi shu dang / mar mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / drug spos dang / spos kyi phye ma dang / de la sogs pa'i spos de'i che nyi shu dang / byang chub sems pa'i gzugs bris pa'i 'phan dang / dang tshan/ 
347a8(rgyud): sna tshogs las 'gyos pa'i 'phan spyi phreng nyi shu rtsa lnga bsham par bgyi'o// 'di ltar mtshon pa bgyid pa'i zhal de ba dang / snong spyad dadeng / bum pa la sogs pa de dag thams cad gser dang / dngul
347b1(rgyud): khar ba la sogs pa las bgyis pa las sbyar bar bgyi'o// gal te yang dag par ma mchis na brnyan ma yang rung lag so// 'di ltar yo byad de dag thams cad kyang slad nang gi gling rnams ngos bzhi
347b2(rgyud): chos bzhin du dri zhing 'gam par bgyi'o// gdan dang / me tog sna tshogs gzugs shing gtong bar bgyi'o// 'bras sa lu'i me tog dang / yung kar dang / me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dkyil 'khor
347b3(rgyud): gyi steng du gtir bar bgyi'o// zhal zas de dag kyang gdugs gcig bzhin du gsar du 'gyis pa bzang po las mchod par bgyi'o// sngags mkhan yang 'thung 'jug gi tshe khrus yongs dag
347b4(rgyud): bgyis nas byug spos byug ste/ gos sar pa gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// zas dkar gsum 'tshal nas tsan dan dang / a ga ru dang / du ru ka dang / ga pur lo sogs pa bsres te/ gdugs
347b5(rgyud): gcig la dus gsum du byang chub sems dpa' sman ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs bgyis pa la mchod par bgyi'o// nang gi gling gsum
347b6(rgyud): pa'i nang du mig stong pa'i gzugs bzhag pa'i mdun du rang byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa gsum po dag yang dag par blang bar dam bca' bar bgyi'o// gdugs mtshan du slad rol gyi gling
347b7(rgyud): ni nub phyogs kyi chab sgor skyil mo krung bcas te miches nas gdugs gcig la yum gyi gzungs lan stong rtsa brgyad bar chad ma mchis par bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ gdugs nyi shu rtsa
347b8(rgyud): gcig gi bar du bsam pa gtugs te/ mchod par bgyi'o// gzhan yang dus drug tu dkyil 'khor gyi nung ngos zung gyi chab sgo nas dkyil 'khor nang du zhugs nas/ gling gsum pa'i tshe
348a1(rgyud): kyi chab sgor 'geng ste/ sngar bstan pa'i phyag rgya dang po dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum pa nas bcu gnyis pa sangs rgyas spyan 'dren pa'i ting 'dzin gyi bar gyi phyag rgya kun
348a2(rgyud): bgyis nas sngags lan bdun bdun bzla bar 'gyi'o// phyag rgya bcu gnyis pa'i bar du bgyis lags nas kyang bdag nyid byang chub chen pa'o smon lam shin tu brtan pa las phyir mi ldog pa
348a3(rgyud): bgyi'o zhes smon lam btab nas ga yar 'dren par 'gyid na/ thams cad nye bar mchi bar 'gyur bas lus drang por bsrang ste mchis nas/ ngas pa'i sems kyis lha 'di thams cad spri rtsa
348a4(rgyud): chod pa ma mchis par mig sngar mchiso snyam du 'ang shas nye bar bzhag ste/ tha dad pa'i yul la mi dmigs par lus po che'i sngags snga ma lan nyi shu rtse gcig 'don par
348a5(rgyud): bgyis na/ de'i mtshan mo gzugs bgyis pa de las 'od zer chen po byug nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs yang phyug nyid gdon mi 'tshal bar mngon sumadu
348a6(rgyud): lus ston par 'gyur te/ lus bstan nas mchi ba'i tshe kun dga' ba'i lus kyi byad gzugasu mngon par sprul nas// dga' zhing 'ab pa'i bzhin gyis rnal 'byor pa de la ci zhig dgos gang
348a7(rgyud): zhig smon ces 'dra bar 'gyur bas// de'i tshe sngags mkhan gyos 'di slad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / gzungs dang ting 'dzin gyis chos yongasu gnyer ba dang / gnan
348a8(rgyud): yang dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags kyi cho ga thams cad mngon par 'grub pa dang / 'ang gdon thams cad gidul zhing dag nyan par 'gyur bar 'tshalo zhes lan gdab par brgyas
348b1(rgyud): de ltar smon pa rnams grub nas kyang bdag nyid rig par bgyi'i gzhan dag la brjod par mi bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di ni bal ras sam/ gtsongs la ri mo bris te/ bgyis na
348b2(rgyud): yang rung lag so// smon pa thams cad 'grub par 'tshal na chab kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis la/ a ga ru sreg ste/ lus po che'i sngags snga ma lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ 
348b3(rgyud): basman pa rnams yod bzhin du 'grub pa'i phyag rgya snga ma 'gyis na/ smon pa thams cing bsams pa bzhin du 'grub cing yong su rdzogs par 'byung lag so// gal te skye bo mang po thams
348b4(rgyud): dga' bar 'gyur bar 'tshal ni rab tu dga' ba'i yid zhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya snga ma 'gyis nas lus po che'i sngag sa kyi til 'bru la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dbab par 'gyi'o// 
348b5(rgyud): yang na sngags lan re bzlas nas/ lan re zhugs kyi na da du dor ba lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na thams cad yid bzhin du dka' bar 'gyur lagaso// gnod sbyin rnams
348b6(rgyud): dga' bar 'tshal na gnod sbyin gyi kun dga' ba'i ljon shing gi yal ga blangs te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas kun dga' ra bar bor na dge' bar 'gyur lags/ mi ma
348b7(rgyud): rungs pa dgar gyur pa gdul bar 'tshal na shing khong len 'bog pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas/ sngags la nir bcu zhing lan re zhug su dong ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad
348b8(rgyud): chang bar bgyis na skyab su'i tshe zhing thul bar 'gyur lags// 'dra gdon gdul dka' ba zhig mchis na gu gul dang / yungs kar la lan nye shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab das/ sngags
349a1(rgyud): // lan ra bzla zhing lan re zhug su dor ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na 'dre gdon thams cad rang dul bar 'gyur lag so// yul phyogs rims nang thung bar gyur na cha
349a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis nas/ ba mar bzang po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/ sngags lan ra bzla zhing lan re zhugs su dor ba lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar 'gyis na
349a3(rgyud): rims thams cid zhi bar 'gyuraro// yang na chab nyung zad cig blangs te rims kyi thebs pa 'tshal du stsal na 'bral du 'che bar 'gyur lags// sngan yul ge byin zhes bgyi bar rims na
349a4(rgyud): byung nas/ gang rims kyis ba' pa de dag gdugs zham gcig gam gnyis las mi 'da' bar mchi bar dus bgyid par gyur to// de'i cha bram ze can te zhes pagyi ba zhig snying rje chen
349a5(rgyud): pa skyes nas/ cho ga'i sgo 'di bshams nas yul khams gcig gi rims kyi thebs pa thams cad ses pa sa/ thams cad zhi bar gyur te/ rims gtong ba'i 'dre
349a6(rgyud): gdon gyi rgyal po yang de'i tshe yul nas byung bar gyur pa'i slad sman yon che bar rig par bgyi lagaso// gal te pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi btses par gyur tam/ chom rkun dang / 'dra/ 
349a7(rgyud): pa 'byung bar gyur na lus kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya dang po bgyis te/ rig sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod 'gyis na ngag dang chom rkun de dag thams cad rang gi dang gis rab tu na
349a8(rgyud): bar 'gyur lagaso// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig las kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang gi tshe rab su nye ba'i tshe 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyag rgya snga ma bgyis
349b1(rgyud): teng gdugs re bzhin du mchod pa bgyis nas/ a ga ru bsregs te/ nig sngags lan stong rtsa brgyas bzlas nas/ sngags lan re bzlas nas de'i ming nas lan re 'don par bgyis na las
349b2(rgyud): kyi sgrib pa de dag yongasu bsgyung bar 'gyur lag so// sngon yul bA ra na ser khyim bdag cig gnas pa las/ bu gcig las ma mchis pa de lo bcu drug pas mi thub par gyur nas/ lo ba
349b3(rgyud): lnga len pa dang / khyims bdag khyod shug mya mya ngan gyis rang nyams par gyur to// de'i tshe bram ze zhig sgro kun tu zhing nas slong 'a las/ khyim bdag de mthong nas ci'i phyir mi bde bar gyur
349b4(rgyud): ces smras pa dang / khyim bdag gis le sgyus de dag rgya sa par bshad// de nas bram ze khyim bdag de la mya ngan ma bya dpar bdag gis bsngo ba bzhin du byos shig dang / khyod
349b5(rgyud): bu tshe rang bar 'gyur zhes smras nas de'i tshe bram ze des cho ga'i sgo 'di nyid zhag bdun tshang bar bgyis pa dang / ga shin rje khyim bdag de la khyed kyi bu'i tshe tshad lo bcu drug
349b6(rgyud): las mi thub pas/ lo bco lnga lon te lo gcig las ma lus pa las/ dang dag pa'i rkyen dang phrad pas lo brgya grub par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'dir nga 'ongs nas bsgo ba yino// zhes smras pa dang
349b7(rgyud): de'i tshe khom bdag khyo shugs rab tu dga' zhing mgu bar gyur pas/ khyim gyi nor ci mchis bstag ste/ sangs rgyas dang ches dang / dge 'dun la phul bas/ cha ga 'di ni bsam gyis ma
349b8(rgyud): khyab po'i mthu chen po dang ldan par rig par 'gyi lagaso// sngang 'dus pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang / rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen par lan gsum zhugs pa zhig lags te/ dkyil
350a1(rgyud): 'khor mi 'tshal te/ phyag rgya bgyis nas rig sngags bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyis smon pa rnams mi 'grub pa gang yang ma mchis la myur du mngon par rdzogs par sa
350a2(rgyud): rgyas par 'gyur lag so// bud med gang la la zhig bu btsa' bo'i tshe/ sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur na/ chab mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste 'tshal du stsal mnges par
350a3(rgyud): 'dra bar 'gyur zhing / khye'u dang bu mo btsas pa gang lags pa de dag kyang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba sna tshogs kyis rgyan nas sngon bsod nams bsags pa'i mthus
350a4(rgyud): skye bo mang po kun gyi snying du sdug par 'gyur/ rtag par mi'i nang du long spyod khyad par du 'phags pa dag la long spyod par 'gyur lag so// sems can gang la la zhig mig nad kyis thebs te sdug
350a5(rgyud): bsngal zhing mi bde bar gyur na/ sngags mkhan gyi nga chu sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya bgyis nas sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te mig la phyag rgyas
350a6(rgyud): btab par 'gyur na mig kyang 'tshe bar 'gyur lo rgyu deng rkyen des gang zag de lha'i mig thob par 'gyur pas lha rnams gsal bar mthong zhing long spyod mchog la long spyod par 'gyur lags
350a7(rgyud): sa// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mag stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i bzugs 'dri bar tshig ni ras dkang po khru bcu drug pa 'am/ khru nyi shu pa yong rung ste/ byang chub
350a8(rgyud): sems dpa' de'i lus ni 'dzam bu'i gser gyi khe dog can du bgyis te/ gdong la mog gsum mchis pa/ sug pa lag pa stong dang ldan zhing / sug pa lag pa stong po de dag re re'i mthil/ 
350b1(rgyud): du yang mig re re bri'o// sug pa lag pa chen po yang dag pa nyid ni bco brgyad mchis te/ sdang sug pa gnyis kyis ni stong kar thal mo sbyang bar bgyi'o// sug pa gcig gis ni rdo rje'i thob
350b2(rgyud): thog so// yang gcig gis ni rtse gsum pa thog so// yang gcig gis ni glags bam thog so// yang gcig gis ni rin po che'i phyag rgya thog so// yang gtsigs ni 'khar sil thog sa/ 
350b3(rgyud): yang cig gis ni 'od zer kha dog lnga 'bon par bgyid// yang gcig gis ni 'grang phreng thog so// yang gcig gis ni ril ba thog so// yang gcig gis ni zil ngar yongasu gtong ba'i la
350b4(rgyud): tu ston to// yang gcig gis ni rin po che'i char sna tshog sa 'bebs shing mi 'jigs pa'i lag tu ston to// yang gnyis ni lte ba'i thad kar g.yon pa g.yas pas mnan na
350b5(rgyud): mthil bkan te mchi so// sug pa lag pa gzhan dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag thams cad ni sprul pa'i sug pa lags te/ sug pa de dag kun kyang so so nas mtshon cha
350b6(rgyud): dang / phyag rgya sna tshogs thogs pas/ kha cig ni sug pa lag po'i phyag rgya brkyang ba nyi tsha ba yang mchis te/ so so nas mi mthun pas snying po'i mang las/ ji skad byang chub sems
350b7(rgyud): dpa' don lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi mgo rgyan thog so// gang ngar la ni gdung 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rgyan to// lus la ni phreng ba thogs shing lha'i rin po che'i gos gya nem pa dag
350b8(rgyud): bags pa yin no zhes gzungs pa lta bu'o// chen rtsi nga dag gi nang du ko ba'i smon stsal bar mi bgyi'o// kun tu ra'i khu ba dang sbyar bar bgyi/ gang ngag yum gyi gzungs kyi cho ga bgyid par
351a1(rgyud): // 'tshal na sngar de'i gzugs ri mor bri'o// gzugs ri mor bri bar yang nges par chos bzhin du 'gyi 'tshal bas ri mo 'di ba'i gnas khang nye 'khor kun tu tsan ngan pa/ 
351a2(rgyud): po'i chab kyis dog sa la byug te dkyil 'khor brgya'o// gzhan yang ri mo mkhan 'thung 'jug gi tshe khrus pagyos nas/ gos sar pa gtsang ma 'gos te/ nyin re bzhin sdom pa brgyad la
351a3(rgyud): dag par blang bar bgyi'o// chos bzhin du gzugs bris lags nas kyang / ri mo mkhan chos bzhin du ma bgyis par dogs par gyur na/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa gcig yid la ji ltar mos
351a4(rgyud): pa bzhin du bgyis te/ ba dad dang / me tog dang / zhal zas da 8/ zas dkar gsum dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos chab dang / me tog sna tshogs kyi kun tu khyab par bkram
351a5(rgyud): nas mchod pa rgya cher bgyis te/ rnal 'byor pa dang / ri mo mkhan gang lags pa des gdugs gcig la dus gsum du gzugs dris pa'i mdun du nongs pa rnams 'thol
351a6(rgyud): bshags na/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig chang pa'i mtshan mo mag stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs bris pa las 'od zer chen po byung nas/ nyini zil gyis men na te/ 'od kyi phyogs
351a7(rgyud): bcu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang / tshad ma mchis pa thams cad thogs pa ma mchis par gsal bar bgyis pas/ rnal 'byor pa dang / ri mo
351a8(rgyud): mkhan gang lags pa de dag dang / sems can gang dag 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams cad shin tu lci ba'i kha na ma tho ba ci mchis pa dus gcig tu zhu byang nas yongs su dag par
351b1(rgyud): 'gyur lag so// cho ga 'di smrab pa gang lags pa des sems rtse gcig tu ma bgyis pa ni ma gtogs leg so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'i
351b2(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bdag gis sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyis kyang phyag stong dang spyan stong po 'ang dag bstan nas/ bdud chen po rnams
351b3(rgyud): gdul ba mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang bdag gis kyang la go stong dang mig stong po 'di dag bstan nas bdud chen po rnams btul ba lags te/ sug pa lag pa snying po
351b4(rgyud): de dag kyang so so nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po re re mngon par sprul nas bskal po rabs stong gi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bgyid par 'gyur la mig
351b5(rgyud): stong po de dag kyang so so nas sangs rgyas re re mngon par sprul nas bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas su/ nga dang mtshungs par 'gyur bar 'gyur ba'i snang
351b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i lus bdud 'dul ba'i nang nas mchog tu gyur pa la sogs/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gi thig
351b7(rgyud): dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ leg so lag so// ngas kyang byin gyis brlabs kyi mthus bskal pa mthar thug pa'i bar du khyod kyi gzungs 'di bon gyis brlabs par bya'o// 
351b8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thegs pa'i mngal ba'i thugs rje chen po yar yongs su rdzogs pa'i gzungs// bam po gsum pa/ de nas byang chub
352a1(rgyud): / sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis bsngags pa brjod pa thos nas rab tu dga' zhing mgu bar gyur pas bal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan
352a2(rgyud): 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs kyi phyag rgya mngon par sgrub par bgyid pa mchis lags
352a3(rgyud): sor bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas kyang rje su yi rang gis khyod kyis shod kyi/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa dang / nam byang chu
352a4(rgyud): sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rig snga gas 'di smras pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'du shes med 'du shes med mi
352a5(rgyud): byi bar gyi lha'i gnas thams cad kyang rnam pa drug du rab tu g.yos par gyur to// 'og min gyi lha dang / dbang phyug chen po yang mi bde bar shin tu skrag par gyur to// 'dra
352a6(rgyud): gdon ma rungs pa thams cad kyang sdug bsngal chen po myong bar gyur pas/ ku co 'don cing shar nub tu byer nas 'gro ba'i gnas kyang mi rnyed par gyur to// de nas sprul pa'i lus kyis 'cha
352a7(rgyud): mang po rnams dang 'dre gdon ma rungs pa rnams la khyed gal te bdag gi rig sngags kyi rje su mi 'bral zhing 'grel bar byas par gyur na mgo tshal bar 'gas par 'gyuraro zhes
352a8(rgyud): bsgo'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs sngags 'dis ni ri rnams 'joms par bgyis shing rgya mtsho chen po bskams par bgyid// rig sngags 'dis ni lha ma yin gyi dpung rnams bcoms
352b1(rgyud): / yul rnams srung bar bgyid // rig sngags 'dis ni 'dre gdon ma rungs pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang mi ma rungs pa thams cad char gcod par bgyid do// rig sngags jis
352b2(rgyud): ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'joms shing dul bar bgyid lagaso// rig kyi bu gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongasu 'dzin par bgyid na/ gang zag de'i mthu stobs brjod
352b3(rgyud): kyis mi ling ngo // rig sngags 'di 'don pa dang / yongasu 'dzin pa de dag btsun zhing dbang phyug dang ldan pa dang / nam 'tsho'i bar du rgyal pos byams shing yid du 'chi ba dang / smon pa rnams yongs
352b4(rgyud): rdzogs par bgyi // gang la la zhig phyir rgol ba'i bdud gdul bar 'tshal na spros gu gul bsregs te/ bdag gi lus po che'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod paphyi
352b5(rgyud): skye bo mang po thams cad kyis bdag la byams par 'chal na lcug ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste g.yang khang bcas na byams shing bkur bar bgyi'o// 
352b6(rgyud): bodag nyid spobs pa dang shes rab dang ldan par 'tshal na/ shu dag la lan stong rje brgyang sngags kyis btab ste/ snying kar bskus na thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs par
352b7(rgyud): thob par 'gyur te/ yum gyi gzungs kyi snying po'i phyag rgya bgyi'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa'i phyag
352b8(rgyud): rgya 'di lags te/ sug pa lag pa gnyis rgyab spang de spar nas the bong gnyis mdun du brkyang bar bgyi'o// phyag rgya 'ongs ni bdag kyang srung zhing gzhan yang spang bar bgyi'o// 
353a1(rgyud): phyogs gang du mchi yang rung ste/ mtshams dgum par 'tshal bas/ tshab gtsang ma 'am thal ba gtsang ma la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste/ gang du mchis pa'i gnas
353a2(rgyud): der chab 'am/ thal ba snyim pa gang sngar rang gi lus la gtor nas/ de'i rjes la phyogs bzhir chos bzhin du gtor na/ de nyid mtsham su 'grub par 'gyur lag so// rigs kyi bre'am rigs kyi bu
353a3(rgyud): mo gang la la zhig 'dra srin ma rungs pa dang / log pa'i gdon mang po rnams kyis gtses par gyur na bal mo se'u'i yal ga dang / grib logs kyi lcang ma'i yal ga blangs te/ rig sngags 'di bzlas
353a4(rgyud): brjod bgyis nas nad pa la gnus nand gang yang ru ste mi 'a tsho ba ma mchis lag so// rig sngags ni 'di lta ste/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha d+harma saM g+ha ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA la/ b+he d+hi twA ya/ 
353a5(rgyud): na mo badz+ra pa Na ye/ bo d+hi satwa ye/ tad+ya thA/ bi si bi si/ kA ya si gi ba la sha pa la sha ni swAhA/ rig sngags kyi phyag rgya 'dis ni log par blta ba'i mu stegs can rnams 'dul bar bgyid
353a6(rgyud): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig rtag par gdugs dang po 'char ba'i tshe dang / gdugs kyi gung dang / gdugs bas pa'i tshe/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod pagyes na/ rnam pa sna tshogs
353a7(rgyud): kyis sangs rgyas bya ba phrag bcu la mchod pa 'gyis pa dang / bye brag tu gyur pa ma mchis pas nam du yang bud med kyi dngos po len par mi 'gyur tshe 'das nas kyang ngan song gsum po dag dang gtan
353a8(rgyud): du 'bral zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi zhing yong su dag par skye bar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyogs spyi bo la byugs te/ khyad par zhing du skye bar 'gyur pasam 'dzag shig
353b1(rgyud): ces bka' stsal par 'gyur/ tshe 'di nyid la yang glo bur du 'chi bar mi 'gyur zhing / 'di gdon dag gis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur lag so// de la byang chub sada' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
353b2(rgyud): gis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi kha na ma tho ba yongasu skyob pa'i phyag ni 'di lags te/ 'greng nas 'di ltar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa mdun du brkyang ste/ sor mo lnga so sor phye nas mdun
353b3(rgyud): thul te sor mo lnga char spong // da'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong lag mthil du bkug ste/ sor mo gzhan bzhi ni khu tshur ngu bcangs nas rna ba g.yas pa'i thad kar bzhag ste// lus ze
353b4(rgyud): tshe'i sngags bzlas nas mdzub mo ni phan tshun rgya bar bgyi'o// phyag/ rgya ni gdugs gcig la dus gsum du bgro 'tshal bas/ dus gcig tshe yang lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na mtshams ma
353b5(rgyud): mchis pa lnga dang / shin tu lci ba bzhi'i kha na ma tho ba rnams kyang byang bar 'gyur lag so// seMn thang byams pa dang / snying rje bskyed pa gyur na kha na ma tho ba thaMd kyi rtsa ba bsregs nas/ tshe 'das
353b6(rgyud): pa'i rjes la yang sangs rgyas rnams dang 'jal bar 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag du yang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bgyid par 'gyur/ gzhan yang bas pa ma mchis pa'i gter zhes
353b7(rgyud): bgyi ba'i gzungs dang / ye shes mnyam pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur/ gzhan yang mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur/ gzhan yang tshe 'di nyid la mig dang / rna ba dang sna dang / 
353b8(rgyud): lce la sogs pa bro 'tshal bar mi 'gyur zhing / lus kyi nang thad kyang yongasu 'byung bar 'gyur sngon gyi las dang / kha na ma tha ba rnams kyang zhu byang bar 'gyur lag so// gal than pa byung bar gyur na
354a1(rgyud): / 'bru yog po'i 'bras bu mar dang sbyar te/ ril bu bgyis nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste char rdzing du bor nas/ dgung char 'bab par 'gyur lag go// gal te chang ches na 'bras sa
354a2(rgyud): lu brngos pa'i me tog yungs 'bra'i mar dang sbyar te/ ril bu bgyis nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste chab rdzing bur bor na dgung char 'chad par 'gyur lag so// de la byang chub sems dpal
354a3(rgyud): spyan+da ras gzigs dbang phyug stong gsum gyi stor chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud rnams brtul ba'i phyag rgya na 'di lags te/ sor mo stsol mar btang ste// g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan
354a4(rgyud): / khu tshur dam du bcangs te spyi bor bzhag nas lus po che'i sngags bzlas brjod pa gyos na mkhon pa'i dgra thams cad rang dul bar 'gyur lag so// cho ga 'di bgying ba gang lags pades
354a5(rgyud): ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du tshes nyi shu dgu'i mtshan mo tsan dan dkar po'i phye ma'i dkyil 'a khor bgyis te/ me tog sna tshogs bkram nas yongasu
354a6(rgyud): dag par khrus te/ gos gsar pa gtsang ma bgos nas sug par bog phor thogs te/ a ga ru bsregs la kha shar phyogasu bltas te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan
354a7(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug lag stong mog stong dang ldan pa sbyin la mchis par 'du shes nye bang bzhag ste/ lus po che'i sngags la na stod rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na 'do dngos grub bo bar
354a8(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i phani yon dang po mchog lag so// gzhan yong yungs kar til gyi 'bras bu gcig tu bsres te brdungs nas phye mar bgyis te/ phog gsum gyis cung zad cig blangs nas lan gas
354b1(rgyud): sngags kyis btab ste zhug su 'ding ba dgung bdun chang bar bgyis la gdugs re la yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na/ smad kyis ci bgyi'o 'tshal mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags
354b2(rgyud): de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'jigs pa ma mchis pa chen po'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'greng nas sug pa rkang pa gnyis gzhibs te/ snga sug pa lag pa
354b3(rgyud): g.yas pa bkan te lag ngar g.yon pa btag nas pus mo'i steng du bzhag par bgyis te/ sug pa lag pa g.yon yang de bzhin du bgyis na/ rtag par ring bsrel gyi mdun du lus po
354b4(rgyud): che'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ myur du sems can la mi 'jigs pa stsal ba'i ting 'dzin gyi sgo thob par 'gyur lag so// gzhan yang shing kun dang / yungs
354b5(rgyud): dang / shu dag dang / ta ta pa'i ril bu blangs te dngos po 'di dgu zhugs kyi nang du bor te sreg par bgyi'o// 'di dag sre ga pa yang sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar ram
354b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ram/ gnas gtsang ma dag tu bsregs nas lus po che'i sngags bzlas te/ sngags lan re bzla zhing lan ri bsregs pa brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar be gyis nas spos dang me tog
354b7(rgyud): ngag gis rig sngags la mchod pa bgyis na// ci dang ci smon pa rnams yid bzhin du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lag so// gal te rig sngags gzhan gyis mthub pa dag sngags 'dis
354b8(rgyud): gang nas thams cad thu ring 'grub par 'gyur lag so// gal te rmi ltas mthong ba 'tshal na sngags 'di bzlas nas phyag rgya babyos te mog la btab na ci dang ci mthong bar 'tshal 'ad
355a1(rgyud): / ngag thams cad rmi lam du mthong bar 'tshal lagaso// bsod nams ma mchis pa gang dag ci bgyi'o 'tshal yid bzhin du 'grub par mi 'gyur na/ gdugs re bzhin rig
355a2(rgyud): 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'don pa dgung bdun du tshang bar gyur na cing ci smod pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das bdege sdom klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gan su rgya mtsho
355a3(rgyud): chos 'dus sar tshe ston pa na/ klu mang po rnam sdug bsngal chen po rnams myong bar mthong ba dang / klu mang po rnams la snying brtsa nes de dag sdug bsngal las yang dag par bzla ba dang / sems
355a4(rgyud): mang po rnams sdug bsngal dang bral zhing mkhon pa'i dgra ma ma chis par bgyi ba'i slad chos bstan pa las do'i cha klu'i bu mos chos 'di gnyid ba'i slad du nor bu rin po chem mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi
355a5(rgyud): khams ri ba cig phul ba dang / bdag gis de la yum gzung sa 'di rgya cher bstan pas sdug bsngal gyi bgegs rnams dang bral bar gyur lag so// de nas byang chub senga' tshwa shel
355a6(rgyud): gyi rig sngags 'di yongasu 'dzin pa dag la phan gdags shing bgegs yongasu srung ba'i phyir sngags 'ang smra so// bi ma le/ ma hA bi ma la/ u ha le/ ma hA u ha le/ hu ma lo/ mah+ne hu ma le/ saM ha la
355a7(rgyud): ma hA sa hA le/ tsi le ta s+yAhA// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig phyogs gang du gnas kyang rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang lag pa stong dang ldan pa'i chos kyi chag
355a8(rgyud): 'di yong su 'dzin par 'gyid na/ bdag kyang rtag par de dag gi rje su 'brang ste/ yongasu srung bar 'gyid pas bdud kyi'o kho re rnams kyi bar dag gis gtse bar mi 'gyur lag so// gang la la zhig
355b1(rgyud): khrel zhing phongs par gyur tam/ pha rol dgras gtses sam/ chom rkun dag gis gnod pa 'gyid par 'gyur na/ tshon sna lnga'i skud ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste sngags lan
355b2(rgyud): re bzlo zhing mdud pa re re bdud nas/ dpung pa g.yon pa la mdud par bgyi'o// gzhan yang sug pa g.yon pa'i srin lag dang / gung mo dang / mdzub mo rnams khu chur bcangs te/ mthe bos sten
355b3(rgyud): du mnan nas mthe chung chom rkun gyi phyogasu kha bstan te/ sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na thams cad ring gyun nas gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur lag so// sngon byang chub senga' spyan
355b4(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gangs ri la gnas te chos ston pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i yul na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams sems can gyi sha khrag 'ba' shig 'tshal zhing / dge
355b5(rgyud): sems ci yang ma mchis pa mthong ba dang / de'i tshe byang chu sems dpa' de thabs la mkhas pas phan gdags shing sems can gdul ba'i che du rdzu 'phrul gyis mthus
355b6(rgyud): de ma thag tu yul de dag tu mchis nas/ mig stong dang lag stong dang ldan pa'i sa bdud gdul ba'i lus mngon par bstan te/ yum gyi gzungs mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgya bgyis
355b7(rgyud): pa dang / de che srin po'i yum gyi rgyal po bdag gi thang du mchis nas/ mongs pa 'bo la bshags te phyag bgyis pa dang / 'angag gis kyang mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgya sa btab pas
355b8(rgyud): de bla na ma mchis pa'i lam mngon par grub par gyur lag so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'geng nas sug
356a1(rgyud): parkang pa gnyis gzhibs te/ snying kar thal mo sbyar te mthe'u chung gnyis snol mar btang zhing / g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan nas lus po che'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa
356a2(rgyud): gcig bzlas nas/ cho ga rnam pa sna tshogs gang bgyid kyang rung ste/ thams cad mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lag so// de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugs 'go ba
356a3(rgyud): drug po dag sdug bsngal gyi bgegs par yongasu skyob pa'i 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'gro be drug gi sems can sdug bsngal las yongasu skyob par 'tshal na 'khor lo'i phyag
356a4(rgyud): rgya spyad par bgyi ste/ 'di ltar sor mo bcu'i rtse mo bon tshun phrad par bgyi ste/ lag par gyi tshigs dang / lag mthithol mi bar bgyi'o// sor mo rnams kyi bar yang tshan gang tsaman
356a5(rgyud): par bgyi ste/ 'di na byang chub sems dpa' de 'gro ba da po dag tu gnas nas sdug bsngal gyi 'gags las yongasu bzlas pa zhes bgyi ste/ 'di ltar phyag rgya'i 'khor lo
356a6(rgyud): 'di'i dbang gis thams cad sdug bsngal dang bral bar gyur paso// de la byang chub sems dpa'i mig stong dang ldan pa'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyag rgya 'di logs te/ skyil
356a7(rgyud): mo krung bcas nas/ sngar sreg pa g.yon pa brkyang ste/ sor mo ldo tsa bkan nas/ pus mo g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag go/ de'i rdzi pi la sug pa log pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ 
356a8(rgyud): sor mo lnga cang kha spung nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i steng du mnan par bgyi'o// 'di ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyag rgya dang 'dra ste/ 'das pa dang / mabyon pa dang / da ltar
356b1(rgyud): bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mtshungs par phyag rgya 'ongs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur pa lags pas/ phyag rgya 'dis ni las kyi sgrib pa thams cad
356b2(rgyud): sel bar bgyidado// rnal 'byor pa bsam gtan sgom pa gong dag ting 'dzin mngon sum du ma gyur na gdugs mtshan bdun gyi bar du dgon pa'i gnas su ma mchis nas gzungs 'di
356b3(rgyud): bzlas te phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas/ sems rtse gcig tu sangs rgyas rnams mig mngar mngon sum du bzhugs pa yid la babyas te/ gdugs mtshan gcig la lan drug
356b4(rgyud): du 'thol bshags bgyis na/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi nga mngon sum du 'gyur zhing / bsod nams kyis phung po chen po tshad ma mchis// dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams
356b5(rgyud): kyang 'thob par 'gyur lags so// de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas sum cu rtsa gsum ba'i lha rnams dgug pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags
356b6(rgyud): te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i so ri mo bzhi khu tshur gtsang bar bgyi'o// de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pas g.yon pa'i mthe bong khro tshur bcangs pa bzhin
356b7(rgyud): bcangs nas/ lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bo la g.yas pa'i chang ba'i gong du rtse mo byung nas// sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'i 'dzub mo ni phan tshun rmya bar bgyi'o// sngags
356b8(rgyud): ni 'di lta ste/ oM ku tsa ku tsa~M/ ku tsi ya ri/ tsa ra tsa ri/ tsa ri le swAhA/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya dang sngags 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
357a1(rgyud): / mo gang la la zhig mchis nyal kang phyag rgya 'di bgyis te sngags 'di lan re bzlas shing / snying kar phyag rgya lan re bgyi ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad chang bar gyur na/ 
357a2(rgyud): sems la ci dang ci 'dod pa rnams rmi lam du rig cing mthong bar 'gyur lags so// gang la la zhig rtag par phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas/ sngags 'di bzlas brjod pa gyis
357a3(rgyud): na/ sdig pa thams cad byung nas byang chub kyi sems stong par mi 'gyur bas/ gang zag de mtshan mo mchis nyol ba'o cho g.yar lam na rgya cher 'phel zhing bkra shis par
357a4(rgyud): 'gyur/ g.yar lam mde bzhin gshegs pa byang chu kyi shing drung du bzhugs nas lung ston pa dang / mngon pa ra rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ba'i bar dag
357a5(rgyud): kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / lha rnams kyang rtag tu nye bar mchis nas/ rim gro bgyid cing yongasu srung bar 'gyur lag so// de la
357a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas lha dang / klu dang / 'dre gdon sde brgyad po dgug pa'i phyag rgyani 'di lags te/ 'greng nas sug pa rkang pa gnyis gshegs te
357a7(rgyud): sngar sreg pa lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong lag mthil du bkug nas/ sor mo bzhi khu tshur bcangs te snying kar banag/ de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du
357a8(rgyud): bgyis te/ lag pa g.yas pa na drung du btad nas/ mdzub mo phan tshun du rgyu bar bgyi'o// sngags ni 'di lta ste/ na mo n+do la kat+ma/ nam sa rA sha pa ta swA hA/ na ma Ar+yA sha la sA
357b1(rgyud): oM hi e hi swAhA/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gzungs dang / phyag rgya 'di len tam/ 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ 'don par bgyis na/ myur du tshe rabs
357b2(rgyud): bdun tshun chad kyi sngon gyi gnas kyi dngos po rje su dran par 'gyur/ sbrul gdugs pas zin par mi 'gyuraro// dug gi mi tshugs par 'gyur/ mtshon gyis gnod pa bgyid pa
357b3(rgyud): mi 'gyur/ rgyal bas gshe bar mi 'gyur/ nams kyang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mo 'gyur leg so// gang la la zhig gdugs re bzhin du rig sngags 'di
357b4(rgyud): 'don par bgyid na/ 'di srin sde brgyad pa rnams rig sa gas 'dod pa'i drung du nye bar mtshos nas/ rig sngags 'don pa nyan par bgyid// rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
357b5(rgyud): bu mo gang la la zhig 'dre gdon gyis zin par gyur na/ skud pa dkar po la sngags kyis btab ste/ sngags lan ra bzla zhing mdud pa rer mdung/ mdud pa bzhi bcu rtsa
357b6(rgyud): dgu tshang bar bgyis nas/ de'i mgul du btags na de'i nad sel bar 'gyur lag so// gal te yul gang du ltas ngan pa dang / rims nang byung ste/ yul mi mang du gum par gyur na
357b7(rgyud): rgyal po'i ku dga' ra ba dang / rdzing dag du pad+ma stong rtsa brgyad blangs te/ pad+ma ri ra la sngags lan btag nas zhu gas kyi nang du bor tabs par bsregs na rims cad rab tu zhi bar 'a
357b8(rgyud): lagaso// de la byang chub sems dpa'i mig snying dang ldan pa'i rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ skyil me krung bcos nas sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i gung mo mthe tho
358a1(rgyud): rtse mo dang sbyar te bkun la/ ser mo gzhan gsum ni brkyang nas pus mo g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag par bgyi'o// de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa yang de ban/ 
358a2(rgyud): du bgyis na/ sug pa lag po pus mo g.yas pa'i steng du kha spub tu bzhag par bgyi'o// gang la la zhig rtag par phag rgya 'di bgyis nas lus po che'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
358a3(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyis na// smon lam rnams yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / sdug bsngal rnams kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la
358a4(rgyud): zhig mi dge ba bcu dang mtshams ma mchis pa lnga la sos/ sa pa'i dngos sdig phun sum tshogs par 'gyis pas 'dzem bu'i gling gi sa ci mchis pa dag thams cad rdul phras
358a5(rgyud): tu bgyis la/ rdul phra rabs de re yang bskal pa ra re mngon par byung bar gyur na/ gang dag de dngos sdig rna ba sna tshogs bgyis pa'i dbang gis bskal pa'i
358a6(rgyud): grangs de snyed kyi bar du sems can dmyal bar lhung nas sdug bsngal myong zhing gtan tu 'byung ba'i dus ma mchis pa zhig lags na yang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
358a7(rgyud): ngag gis ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar zla ba dkar po'i ngo tshas bco lnga lnga gdugs mtshan macig zas bkum ste phyag rgya mdud nas/ rigs sngags
358a8(rgyud): stang rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas na gong du bstan pa'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad byang bar 'gyur te/ gal te byang bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na/ de lta bu'o gnas ma mchis lag
358b1(rgyud): so// de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa la rang dbang thob pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ langs nas 'greng
358b2(rgyud): sngar sug po g.yon pas sug pa rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong la btsir nas khu tshur bcangs pa bzhin du bgyi'o// de'i rjes la sug pa lags pa g.yas pas g.yon
358b3(rgyud): pa'i lag par gyi steng du btsir nas/ lus po che'i sngags lan bdun par bgyis nas/ dpag tshad brgya stong du mar mchi 'tshal na yang bka' ba ma mchis par 'gyur
358b4(rgyud): lags so// sngags 'don pa'i tshe sgra 'byung bar mi 'gyur// de la byang chub sems dpa' mag stong dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul la rang dbang thob pa'i phyag rgyan
358b5(rgyud): 'di lags te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong mthe'u chung gi sen mo'i stang du reg pa bgyi'o// de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas
358b6(rgyud): pa yang de bzhin du bgyis nas/ sor mo gzhan gsum ni so sor yin par sgreng ste/ lag ngar gyi tshogs sbyar nas spyi bo'i steng du bzhag ste/ lus po che'i
358b7(rgyud): sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'dzin par bgyid na/ dang sang 'bur te mchongag dang 'dra bar rang dbang du mche bar 'gyur lagaso// de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams
358b8(rgyud): sems rtse gcig tu spyad 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ sug pa gnyis na mkha' la thal mo sbyar te/ lag par gyi tshigs sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis ni phan tshun rgyu
